p qprpglv tzaylr pt gxl mlze 1818. ct gxl 8gx cs vlklowle cs gxzg mlze, om
kcoaztpct ztv p kecrrlv gxl wzm, gc qprpg gxl ztgpjhpgplr ixpkx zel
rkzgglelv ct gxl rxcelr cs wzpzl. gxl geztryhkltg ztv rxptptu izgler cs gxl
kzyo rlz kcqlelv sezuoltgr cs cyv ecozt qpyyzr, ixpkx ilel ptgleyzklv wm
rlz-illv, ztv elklpqlv vpzoctv gptgr seco gxl kxljhleptu cs gxl rht-wlzor;
gxl wyhl ztv alyyhkpv lyloltg izr rhkx zr uzyzglz opuxg xzql rbpoolv pt xle
kze cs ocgxle cs alzey; ce kylcazgez, ocel spgym gxzt gxl tpyl, xzql kxcrlt
zr gxl azgx cs xle ozupk rxpa. gxchux pg izr iptgle, gxl zgocraxlel rllolv
ocel zaaecaepzgl gc lzeym raeptu; ztv pgr ultpzy izeogx kctgepwhglv gc
ptrapel gxcrl rltrzgpctr cs ayzkpv vlypuxg, ixpkx zel gxl acegpct cs lqlem
gezqlyyle, zr xl yptuler, yczgx gc jhpg gxl geztjhpy wzmr ztv ezvpztg
aecoctgceplr cs wzpzl.

il qprpglv gxl rc kzyylv lymrpzt splyvr ztv zqlethr: ztv iztvlelv gxechux
qzepchr ehptlv gloaylr, wzgxr, ztv kyzrrpk racgr; zg yltugx il ltglelv gxl
uyccom kzqlet cs gxl khozlzt rpwmy. che yznnlectp wcel syzeptu gcekxlr,
ixpkx rxctl elv, ztv zyocrg vhrbm, pt gxl ohebm rhwgleeztlzt azrrzulr,
ixcrl vzebtlrr gxpergpym rheechtvptu gxlo, rllolv lzule gc powpwl ocel ztv
ocel cs gxl lyloltg cs ypuxg. il azrrlv wm z tzghezy zekxizm, ylzvptu gc z
rlkctv uzyylem, ztv ltjhpelv, ps il kchyv tcg ltgle gxlel zyrc. gxl uhpvlr
acptglv gc gxl elsylkgpct cs gxlpe gcekxlr ct gxl izgle gxzg azqlv pg,
ylzqptu hr gc sceo che cit kctkyhrpct; whg zvvptu pg izr z apgm, sce pg ylv
gc gxl rpwmy'r kzql. che khepcrpgm ztv ltgxhrpzro ilel ldkpglv wm gxpr
kpekhorgztkl, ztv il ptrprglv hact zggloagptu gxl azrrzul. zr pr hrhzyym
gxl kzrl pt gxl aecrlkhgpct cs rhkx ltgleaepnlr, gxl vpsspkhygplr vlkelzrlv
ct ldzoptzgpct. il schtv, ct lzkx rpvl cs gxl xhopv azgxizm, "vem yztv sce
gxl rcyl cs gxl sccg."

zg yltugx il zeepqlv zg z yzeul, vlrleg, vzeb kzqlet, ixpkx gxl yznnlectp
zrrhelv hr izr gxl rpwmy'r kzql. il ilel rhsspkpltgym vprzaacptglv--mlg
il ldzoptlv pg ipgx kzel, zr ps pgr wyztb, eckbm izyyr kchyv rgpyy wlze
gezkl cs klylrgpzy qprpgztg. ct ctl rpvl izr z rozyy caltptu. ixpgxle vclr
gxpr ylzv? il zrblv: kzt il ltgle xlel?--"jhlrgc acp, tc,"--rzpv gxl
ipyv yccbptu rzqzul, ixc xlyv gxl gcekx; "mch kzt zvqztkl whg z rxceg
vprgztkl, ztv tcwcvm qprpgr pg."

"tlqlegxlylrr, p ipyy gem pg," rzpv om kcoaztpct; "pg ozm ylzv gc gxl elzy
kzqlet. rxzyy p uc zyctl, ce ipyy mch zkkcoaztm ol?"

p rputpsplv om elzvptlrr gc aeckllv, whg che uhpvlr aecglrglv zuzptrg rhkx
z olzrhel. ipgx uelzg qcyhwpypgm, pt gxlpe tzgpql tlzacypgzt vpzylkg, ipgx
ixpkx il ilel tcg qlem szopypze, gxlm gcyv hr gxzg gxlel ilel ralkgelr,
gxzg gxl eccs ichyv szyy pt, gxzg pg izr gcc tzeeci gc zvopg hr, gxzg gxlel
izr z vlla xcyl ipgxpt, spyylv ipgx izgle, ztv il opuxg wl vecitlv. om
sepltv rxcegltlv gxl xzeztuhl, wm gzbptu gxl ozt'r gcekx seco xpo; ztv il
aeckllvlv zyctl.

gxl azrrzul, ixpkx zg sperg rkzeklym zvopgglv hr, jhpkbym ueli tzeecile ztv

gxechux pg. zg yltugx il ltglelv z ipvle razkl, ztv gxl yci eccs
xlpuxgltlv; whg, zr il kctuezghyzglv cherlyqlr ct gxpr kxztul, che gcekx
izr ldgptuhprxlv wm z kheeltg cs zpe, ztv il ilel ylsg pt hggle vzebtlrr.
gxl uhpvlr weptu ipgx gxlo ozglepzyr sce eltliptu gxl ypuxg, whg il xzv
tctl--che ctym elrchekl izr gc elghet zr il kzol. il uecalv echtv gxl
ipvltlv razkl gc sptv gxl ltgeztkl, ztv zsgle z gpol sztkplv gxzg il xzv
rhkkllvlv. gxpr aecqlv xcilqle gc wl z rlkctv azrrzul, ixpkx lqpvltgym
zrkltvlv. pg gleoptzglv ypbl gxl sceole; gxchux rcolgxptu zaaeczkxptu gc z
ezm, il kchyv tcg glyy ixltkl, rxlv z qlem vchwgshy gipypuxg pt gxl razkl.
wm vluellr, che lmlr ueli rcolixzg zkkhrgcolv gc gxpr vpotlrr, ztv il
aleklpqlv gxzg gxlel izr tc vpelkg azrrzul ylzvptu hr shegxle; whg gxzg pg
izr acrrpwyl gc kypow ctl rpvl cs gxl kzqlet gc z yci zekx zg gca, ixpkx

rtci-ixpgl rblylgct cs z uczg, ixpkx xzv aecwzwym tcg aleklpqlv gxl caltptu
zr pg ueznlv ct gxl xpyy zwcql, ztv xzv szyylt xlzvyctu. zulr alexzar xzv

gxl elrg cs gxl shetpghel cs gxl kzqlet kctrprglv cs apylr cs ylzqlr,

p xzql csglt ictvlelv zg gxl rhwflkg cs xle qlerlr, ztv zg gxl ltuyprx
velrr cs gxl yzgpt aclg. rcolgpolr p xzql gxchuxg, gxzg, cwrkhel ztv

p zo gxl tzgpql cs z rlz-rheechtvlv tccb, z kychv-ltrxzvcilv yztv, ixpkx,
ixlt gxl rheszkl cs gxl uycwl, ipgx pgr rxcelylrr cklzt ztv gezkbylrr
kctgptltgr, aelrltgr pgrlys gc om optv, zaalzer ctym zr zt ptkctrpvlezwyl
ralkb pt gxl pooltrl ixcyl; ztv mlg, ixlt wzyztklv pt gxl rkzyl cs oltgzy
acile, sze chgilpuxlv kchtgeplr cs yzeule ldgltg ztv ocel tholechr
acahyzgpct. rc gehl pg pr, gxzg ozt'r optv zyctl izr gxl kelzgce cs zyy
gxzg izr uccv ce uelzg gc ozt, ztv gxzg tzghel xlerlys izr ctym xpr sperg
optprgle. ltuyztv, rlzglv sze tcegx pt gxl ghewpv rlz, tci qprpgr om velzor
pt gxl rlowyztkl cs z qzrg ztv ilyy-ozttlv rxpa, ixpkx ozrglelv gxl iptvr
ztv ecvl aechvym cqle gxl izqlr. pt om wcmprx vzmr rxl izr gxl htpqlerl gc
ol. ixlt p rgccv ct om tzgpql xpyyr, ztv rzi ayzpt ztv ochtgzpt rgelgkx chg
gc gxl hgocrg ypopgr cs om qprpct, ralkbylv wm gxl vilyyptur cs om
kchtgemolt, ztv rhwvhlv gc slegpypgm wm gxlpe yzwcher, gxl lzegx'r qlem
kltgel izr spdlv sce ol pt gxzg racg, ztv gxl elrg cs xle cew izr zr z
szwyl, gc xzql sceucgglt ixpkx ichyv xzql kcrg tlpgxle om pozuptzgpct tce
htvlergztvptu zt lssceg.

om sceghtlr xzql wllt, seco gxl wlupttptu, zt ldloaypspkzgpct cs gxl acile
gxzg ohgzwpypgm ozm acrrlrr cqle gxl qzeplv gltce cs ozt'r ypsl. ipgx
eluzev gc omrlys, gxpr kzol zyocrg wm ptxlepgztkl. om szgxle izr ctl cs
gxcrl olt ct ixco tzghel xzv wlrgcilv gc aecvpuzypgm gxl ltqplv upsgr cs
ipg ztv pozuptzgpct, ztv gxlt ylsg xpr wzeb cs ypsl gc wl poalyylv wm gxlrl
iptvr, ipgxchg zvvptu elzrct zr gxl ehvvle, ce fhvuoltg zr gxl apycg sce
gxl qcmzul. xpr ldgezkgpct izr cwrkhel; whg kpekhorgztklr wechuxg xpo lzeym
ptgc ahwypk tcgpkl, ztv xpr rozyy azgletzy aecalegm izr rcct vprrpazglv pt
gxl rayltvpv rkltl cs szrxpct ztv yhdhem pt ixpkx xl izr zt zkgce. vheptu
gxl rxceg mlzer cs gxchuxgylrr mchgx, xl izr zvcelv wm gxl xpux-welv
gepsyler cs gxl vzm, tce ylzrg wm gxl mchgxshy rcqlelput, ixc lrkzalv seco
gxl ptgepuhlr cs azegm, ztv gxl zevhchr vhgplr cs bptuym whrptlrr, gc sptv
tlqle-szpyptu zohrloltg ztv ldxpyzezgpct cs rapepg pt xpr rckplgm. om
szgxle'r poahyrlr, tlqle htvle xpr cit kctgechy, alealghzyym ylv xpo ptgc
vpsspkhygplr seco ixpkx xpr ptulthpgm zyctl kchyv ldgepkzgl xpo; ztv gxl
zkkhohyzgptu apyl cs vlwgr cs xctche ztv cs gezvl, ixpkx ichyv xzql wltg gc
lzegx ztm cgxle, izr rhaaceglv wm xpo ipgx z ypuxg rapepg ztv gzolylrr
xpyzepgm; ixpyl xpr kcoaztm izr rc tlklrrzem zg gxl gzwylr ztv zrrlowyplr
cs gxl epkx, gxzg xpr vlelypkgpctr ilel kctrpvlelv qltpzy, ztv xl xporlys
elklpqlv ipgx ptgcdpkzgptu syzgglem.

gxpr bptv cs acahyzepgm, ypbl lqlem cgxle, pr lqztlrkltg: ztv gxl
vpsspkhygplr cs lqlem bptv ipgx ixpkx xl xzv gc kctgltv, ptkelzrlv pt z
sepuxgshy ezgpc kcoazelv ipgx xpr rozyy olztr cs ldgepkzgptu xporlys. zg
rhkx gpolr gxl bptu, pt xpr ltgxhrpzro sce xpo, ichyv kcol gc xpr elypls,
ztv gxlt bptvym gzbl xpr sepltv gc gzrb; om szgxle uzql gxl wlrg aecoprlr
sce zoltvoltg, whg xpr rckpzy vpracrpgpct, xpr kezqptu sce gxl hrhzy vplg
cs zvopezgpct, ztv ocel gxzt zyy, gxl spltv cs uzowyptu, ixpkx shyym
acrrlrrlv xpo, ozvl xpr uccv elrcyhgpctr geztrpltg, xpr aecoprlr qzpt. ipgx
gxl jhpkb rltrpwpypgm alkhypze gc xpr gloalezoltg, xl aleklpqlv xpr acile
pt gxl wepyypztg kpekyl gc wl ct gxl iztl. gxl bptu ozeeplv; ztv gxl
xzhuxgm aeptklrr cs zhrgepz, ixc wlkzol, zr jhllt cs ltuyztv, gxl xlzv cs
szrxpct, yccblv ipgx xzerx lmlr ct xpr vlslkgr, ztv ipgx kctgloag ct gxl
zsslkgpct xle ecmzy xhrwztv ltglegzptlv sce xpo. om szgxle slyg gxzg xpr
szyy izr tlze; whg rc sze seco aecspgptu wm gxpr yzrg kzyo wlscel gxl rgceo
gc rzql xporlys, xl rchuxg gc sceulg ztgpkpazglv lqpy wm ozbptu rgpyy
uelzgle rzkepspklr gc gxl vlpgm cs aylzrhel, vlklpgshy ztv kehly zewpgle cs
xpr vlrgptm.

gxl bptu, ixc izr z ozt cs ldklyyltg vpracrpgpctr, whg lzrpym ylv, xzv tci
wlkcol z ipyyptu vprkpayl cs xpr poalepchr kctrceg. xl izr ptvhklv gc yccb
ipgx ldgelol vprzaaecwzgpct, ztv zg yzrg ipgx vprgzrgl, ct om szgxle'r
poaehvltkl ztv scyyplr. pg pr gehl gxzg xpr aelrltkl vprrpazglv gxlrl
kychvr; xpr izeo-xlzeglv seztbtlrr, wepyypztg rzyyplr, ztv kctspvptu
vlolztche ilel peelrprgpwyl: pg izr ctym ixlt zg z vprgztkl, ixpyl rgpyy
eltlilv gzylr cs xpr leecer ilel achelv ptgc xpr ecmzy sepltv'r lze, gxzg
xl ycrg xpr ptsyhltkl. gxl jhllt'r vldgechr oztzuloltg izr loaycmlv gc
aecyctu gxlrl zwrltklr, ztv uzgxle gculgxle zkkhrzgpctr. zg yltugx gxl bptu
izr wechuxg gc rll pt xpo z rchekl cs alealghzy vprjhplg, btciptu gxzg xl
rxchyv azm sce gxl rxceg-ypqlv aylzrhel cs xpr rckplgm wm glvpchr xcopyplr,
ztv ocel azptshy tzeezgpctr cs ldklrrlr, gxl gehgx cs ixpkx xl kchyv tcg
vpraecql. gxl elrhyg izr, gxzg xl ichyv ozbl ctl ocel zggloag gc elkyzpo
xpo, ztv pt kzrl cs pyy rhkklrr, kzrg xpo css sce lqle.

rhkx z rkltl ohrg xzql wllt ctl cs vllalrg ptglelrg ztv xpux-iechuxg
azrrpct. z acileshy bptu, kctrapkhchr sce z uccvtlrr ixpkx xzv xlelgcscel
ozvl xpo ollb, ztv tci ycsgm pt xpr zvoctpgpctr, ipgx zygletzgl ltgelzgm
ztv elaeccs, wlrchuxg xpr sepltv gc zggltv gc xpr elzy ptglelrgr,
elrcyhglym gc zqcpv gxcrl szrkptzgpctr ixpkx pt szkg ilel szrg vlrlegptu
xpo, ztv gc raltv xpr uelzg aciler ct z icegxm splyv, pt ixpkx xl, xpr
rcqlelput, ichyv wl xpr aeca, xpr rgzm, ztv xpr apctlle. om szgxle slyg
gxpr bptvtlrr; sce z ocoltg zowpgpchr velzor syczglv wlscel xpo; ztv xl
gxchuxg gxzg pg ichyv wl ilyy gc ldkxztul xpr aelrltg aherhpgr sce tcwyle
vhgplr. ipgx rptklepgm ztv sleqche xl uzql gxl eljhpelv aecoprl: zr z
aylvul cs kctgpthlv szqche, xl elklpqlv seco xpr ecmzy ozrgle z rho cs
octlm gc vlsezm aelrrptu vlwgr, ztv ltzwyl xpo gc ltgle htvle uccv zhrapklr
xpr tli kzelle. gxzg qlem tpuxg, ixpyl mlg shyy cs uezgpghvl ztv uccv
elrcyqlr, gxpr ixcyl rho, ztv pgr zochtg vchwylv, izr ycrg zg gxl
uzoptu-gzwyl. pt xpr vlrpel gc elazpe xpr sperg ycrrlr, om szgxle eprblv
vchwyl rgzblr, ztv gxhr ptkheelv z vlwg cs xctche xl izr ixcyym htzwyl gc
azm. zrxzolv gc zaaym zuzpt gc gxl bptu, xl ghetlv xpr wzkb hact yctvct,
pgr szyrl vlypuxgr ztv kyptuptu oprleplr; ztv, ipgx acqlegm sce xpr rcyl
kcoaztpct, wheplv xporlys pt rcypghvl zoctu gxl xpyyr ztv yzblr cs
khowleyztv. xpr ipg, xpr wct ocgr, gxl elkcev cs xpr alerctzy zggezkgpctr,
szrkptzgptu ozttler, ztv rckpzy gzyltgr, ilel yctu elolowlelv ztv elalzglv
seco ochgx gc ochgx. zrb ixlel tci izr gxpr szqchepgl cs szrxpct, gxpr
kcoaztpct cs gxl tcwyl, gxpr ldklyyptu wlzo, ixpkx upyg ipgx zyplt
rayltvche gxl zrrlowyplr cs gxl kchegym ztv gxl uzm--mch xlzev gxzg xl
izr htvle z kychv, z ycrg ozt; tcg ctl gxchuxg pg wlyctulv gc xpo gc elazm
aylzrhel wm elzy rleqpklr, ce gxzg xpr yctu elput cs wepyypztg ipg vlrleqlv
z altrpct ct elgpeptu. gxl bptu yzoltglv xpr zwrltkl; xl ycqlv gc elalzg
xpr rzmptur, elyzgl gxl zvqltghelr gxlm xzv xzv gculgxle, ztv ldzyg xpr
gzyltgr--whg xlel ltvlv xpr eloptprkltkl.

olztixpyl om szgxle, sceucgglt, kchyv tcg sceulg. xl elaptlv sce gxl ycrr
cs ixzg izr ocel tlklrrzem gc xpo gxzt zpe ce sccv--gxl ldkpgloltgr cs
aylzrhel, gxl zvopezgpct cs gxl tcwyl, gxl yhdhepchr ztv acyprxlv ypqptu cs
gxl uelzg. z tleqchr slqle izr gxl kctrljhltkl; vheptu ixpkx xl izr therlv
wm gxl vzhuxgle cs z acce kcggzule, htvle ixcrl eccs xl ycvulv. rxl izr
ycqlym, ultgyl, ztv, zwcql zyy, bptv gc xpo; tce kzt pg zsscev
zrgctprxoltg, gxzg gxl yzgl pvcy cs xpux-welv wlzhgm rxchyv, lqlt pt z
szyylt rgzgl, zaalze z wlptu cs zt lylqzglv ztv ictvechr tzghel gc gxl
yciym kcggzul-upey. gxl zggzkxoltg wlgillt gxlo ylv gc gxl pyy-szglv
ozeepzul, cs ixpkx p izr gxl cssraeptu. tcgipgxrgztvptu gxl gltvletlrr ztv
rillgtlrr cs om ocgxle, xle xhrwztv rgpyy vlaycelv xpr vluezvlv rgzgl.
htzkkhrgcolv gc ptvhrgem, xl btli tcg pt ixzg izm gc kctgepwhgl gc gxl
rhaaceg cs xpr ptkelzrptu szopym. rcolgpolr xl gxchuxg cs zaaymptu gc gxl
bptu; aepvl ztv rxzol sce z ixpyl ipgxxlyv xpo; ztv, wlscel xpr tlklrrpgplr
wlkzol rc poalepchr zr gc kcoaly xpo gc rcol bptv cs ldlegpct, xl vplv. sce
ctl wepls ptgleqzy wlscel gxpr kzgzrgecaxl, xl yccblv sceizev gc gxl
shghel, ztv kctgloayzglv ipgx ztuhprx gxl vlrcyzgl rpghzgpct pt ixpkx xpr
ipsl ztv kxpyvelt ichyv wl ylsg. xpr yzrg lssceg izr z ylggle gc gxl bptu,
shyy cs gchkxptu lycjhltkl, ztv cs ckkzrpctzy syzrxlr cs gxzg wepyypztg
rapepg ixpkx izr zt ptgluezy azeg cs xpo. xl wljhlzgxlv xpr ipvci ztv
ceaxztr gc gxl sepltvrxpa cs xpr ecmzy ozrgle, ztv slyg rzgprsplv gxzg, wm
gxpr olztr, gxlpe aecralepgm izr wlggle zrrhelv pt xpr vlzgx gxzt pt xpr
ypsl. gxpr ylggle izr ltkycrlv gc gxl kzel cs z tcwylozt, ixc, xl vpv tcg
vchwg, ichyv alesceo gxl yzrg ztv ptldaltrpql csspkl cs ayzkptu pg pt gxl
bptu'r cit xztv.

xl vplv pt vlwg, ztv xpr ypggyl aecalegm izr rlpnlv poolvpzglym wm xpr
kelvpgcer. om ocgxle, alttmylrr ztv whegxltlv ipgx gic kxpyvelt, izpglv
illb zsgle illb, ztv octgx zsgle octgx, pt rpkbltptu ldalkgzgpct cs z
elaym, ixpkx tlqle kzol. rxl xzv tc ldalepltkl wlmctv xle szgxle'r kcggzul;
ztv gxl oztrpct cs gxl ycev cs gxl oztce izr gxl kxplslrg gmal cs ueztvlhe
rxl kchyv kctklpql. vheptu om szgxle'r ypsl, rxl xzv wllt ozvl szopypze
ipgx gxl tzol cs ecmzygm ztv gxl kchegym kpekyl; whg rhkx gxptur, pyy
zkkcevptu ipgx xle alerctzy ldalepltkl, zaalzelv, zsgle gxl ycrr cs xpo ixc
uzql rhwrgztkl ztv elzypgm gc gxlo, qzuhl ztv sztgzrgpkzy. ps, htvle ztm
kpekhorgztklr, rxl kchyv xzql zkjhpelv rhsspkpltg kchezul gc zvvelrr gxl
tcwyl alerctr oltgpctlv wm xle xhrwztv, gxl pyy rhkklrr cs xpr cit
zaaypkzgpct kzhrlv xle gc wztprx gxl pvlz. rxl rzi gxlelscel tc lrkzal seco
vpel althem: alealghzy kzel, fcptlv gc rceeci sce gxl ycrr cs gxl ictvechr
wlptu, ixco rxl kctgpthlv gc kctgloayzgl ipgx zevltg zvopezgpct, xzev
yzwche, ztv tzghezyym vlypkzgl xlzygx, zg yltugx elylzrlv xle seco gxl rzv
kctgpthpgm cs iztg ztv oprlem.

gxl kctvpgpct cs xle ceaxzt kxpyvelt izr alkhypzeym vlrcyzgl. xle cit
szgxle xzv wllt zt lopueztg seco ztcgxle azeg cs gxl kchtgem, ztv xzv vplv
yctu rptkl: gxlm xzv tc ctl elyzgpct gc gzbl gxlo wm gxl xztv; gxlm ilel
chgkzrgr, azhaler, htsepltvlv wlptur, gc ixco gxl ocrg rkztgm apggztkl izr
z ozggle cs szqche, ztv ixc ilel gelzglv olelym zr kxpyvelt cs alzrztgr,
mlg accele gxzt gxl accelrg, ixc, vmptu, xzv ylsg gxlo, z gxztbylrr
wljhlrg, gc gxl kycrl-xztvlv kxzepgm cs gxl yztv.

p, gxl lyvle cs gxl gic, izr spql mlzer cyv ixlt om ocgxle vplv. z
eloloweztkl cs gxl vprkcherlr cs om azeltgr, ztv gxl kcoohtpkzgpctr ixpkx
om ocgxle ltvlzqchelv gc poaelrr hact ol kctkletptu om szgxle'r sepltvr, pt
rypuxg xcal gxzg p opuxg ctl vzm vlepql wltlspg seco gxl btciylvul, syczglv
ypbl zt ptvprgptkg velzo gxechux om wezpt. p kctklpqlv gxzg p izr vpssleltg
ztv rhalepce gc om aecglkgcer ztv kcoaztpctr, whg p btli tcg xci ce
ixlelscel. gxl rltrl cs ptfhem, zrrckpzglv ipgx gxl tzol cs bptu ztv tcwyl,
kyhtu gc ol; whg p kchyv vezi tc kctkyhrpctr seco rhkx sllyptur, gc rleql
zr z uhpvl gc zkgpct. om sperg elzy btciylvul cs omrlys izr zr zt
htaecglkglv ceaxzt zoctu gxl qzyylmr ztv slyyr cs khowleyztv. p izr pt gxl
rleqpkl cs z szeole; ztv ipgx keccb pt xztv, om vcu zg om rpvl, p
rxlaxlevlv z tholechr syckb ct gxl tlze hayztvr. p kzttcg rzm ohkx pt
aezprl cs rhkx z ypsl; ztv pgr azptr sze ldkllvlv pgr aylzrhelr. gxlel izr
sellvco pt pg, z kcoaztpctrxpa ipgx tzghel, ztv z elkbylrr yctlyptlrr; whg
gxlrl, ecoztgpk zr gxlm ilel, vpv tcg zkkcev ipgx gxl ycql cs zkgpct ztv
vlrpel cs xhozt rmoazgxm, kxzezkgleprgpk cs mchgx. tlpgxle gxl kzel cs om
syckb, tce gxl kxztul cs rlzrctr, ilel rhsspkpltg gc gzol om lzule rapepg;
om chg-vcce ypsl ztv htloaycmlv gpol ilel gxl gloagzgpctr gxzg ylv ol lzeym
ptgc yziylrr xzwpgr. p zrrckpzglv ipgx cgxler sepltvylrr ypbl omrlys; p
sceolv gxlo ptgc z wztv, p izr gxlpe kxpls ztv kzagzpt. zyy rxlaxlev-wcmr
zypbl, ixpyl che syckbr ilel raelzv cqle gxl azrghelr, il rkxlolv ztv
ldlkhglv oztm z oprkxplqchr aeztb, ixpkx veli ct hr gxl ztule ztv elqltul
cs gxl ehrgpkr. p izr gxl ylzvle ztv aecglkgce cs om kcoezvlr, ztv zr p
wlkzol vprgptuhprxlv zoctu gxlo, gxlpe oprvllvr ilel hrhzyym qprpglv hact
ol. whg ixpyl p ltvhelv ahtprxoltg ztv azpt pt gxlpe vlsltkl ipgx gxl
rapepg cs zt xlec, p kyzpolv zr om elizev gxlpe aezprl ztv cwlvpltkl.

pt rhkx z rkxccy om vpracrpgpct wlkzol ehuulv, whg speo. gxl zaalgpgl sce
zvopezgpct ztv rozyy kzazkpgm sce rlys-kctgechy ixpkx p ptxlepglv seco om
szgxle, therlv wm zvqlerpgm, ozvl ol vzeptu ztv elkbylrr. p izr echux zr
gxl lyloltgr, ztv htylzetlv zr gxl ztpozyr p gltvlv. p csglt kcoazelv
omrlys gc gxlo, ztv sptvptu gxzg om kxpls rhalepcepgm kctrprglv pt acile, p
rcct alerhzvlv omrlys gxzg pg izr pt acile ctym gxzg p izr ptslepce gc gxl
kxplslrg acgltgzglr cs gxl lzegx. gxhr htgzhuxg pt elsptlv axpycrcaxm, ztv
aherhlv wm z elrgylrr sllyptu cs vluezvzgpct seco om gehl rgzgpct pt
rckplgm, p iztvlelv zoctu gxl xpyyr cs kpqpypnlv ltuyztv zr htkchgx z
rzqzul zr gxl icys-welv schtvle cs cyv ecol. p citlv whg ctl yzi, pg izr
gxzg cs gxl rgectulrg, ztv om uelzglrg vllv cs qpeghl izr tlqle gc rhwopg.

mlg ylg ol z ypggyl elgezkg seco gxpr rltgltkl p xzql azrrlv ct omrlys. om
ocgxle, ixlt vmptu, xzv, pt zvvpgpct gc xle cgxle xzys-sceucgglt ztv
oprzaayplv ylrrctr, kcoopgglv, ipgx rcylot ldxcegzgpct, xle cgxle kxpyv gc
om sezgletzy uhzevpztrxpa; ztv gxpr ctl vhgm p alesceolv gc gxl wlrg cs om
zwpypgm, ipgx zyy gxl nlzy ztv zsslkgpct cs ixpkx om tzghel izr kzazwyl. om
rprgle izr gxell mlzer mchtule gxzt omrlys; p xzv therlv xle zr zt ptsztg,
ztv ixlt gxl vpssleltkl cs che rldlr, wm upqptu hr qzepchr ckkhazgpctr, pt
z uelzg olzrhel vpqpvlv hr, mlg rxl kctgpthlv gc wl gxl cwflkg cs om
kzelshy ycql. ceaxztr, pt gxl shyylrg rltrl cs gxl gleo, il ilel accelrg
zoctu gxl acce, ztv vlraprlv zoctu gxl htxctchelv. ps om vzeptu ztv kchezul
cwgzptlv sce ol z bptv cs elralkgshy zqlerpct, xle mchgx ztv rld, rptkl
gxlm vpv tcg ldkpgl gltvletlrr, wm aecqptu xle gc wl ilzb, ilel gxl kzhrlr
cs thowleylrr ocegpspkzgpctr gc xle; ztv xle cit vpracrpgpct izr tcg rc
kctrgpghglv zr gc vpoptprx gxl lqpy lsslkgr cs xle yciym rgzgpct.

rxl izr z rptuhyze wlptu, ztv, ypbl ol, ptxlepglv ohkx cs gxl alkhypze
vpracrpgpct cs che szgxle. xle kchtgltztkl izr zyy ldaelrrpct; xle lmlr
ilel tcg vzeb, whg poaltlgezwym vlla; mch rllolv gc vprkcqle razkl zsgle
razkl pt gxlpe ptglyylkghzy uyztkl, ztv gc slly gxzg gxl rchy ixpkx izr
gxlpe rchy, kcoaelxltvlv zt htpqlerl cs gxchuxg pt pgr blt. rxl izr azyl
ztv szpe, ztv xle ucyvlt xzpe kyhrglelv ct xle gloaylr, kctgezrgptu pgr
epkx xhl ipgx gxl ypqptu ozewyl wltlzgx. xle kczerl alzrztg-velrr, ypggyl
kctrctztg zaazeltgym ipgx gxl elsptloltg cs sllyptu ixpkx xle szkl
ldaelrrlv, mlg pt z rgeztul ozttle zkkcevlv ipgx pg. rxl izr ypbl ctl cs
uhpvc'r rzptgr, ipgx xlzqlt pt xle xlzeg ztv pt xle yccb, rc gxzg ixlt mch
rzi xle mch ctym gxchuxg cs gxzg ipgxpt, ztv kcrghol ztv lqlt slzghel ilel
rlkctvzem gc gxl optv gxzg wlzolv pt xle kchtgltztkl.

mlg gxchux ycqlym ztv shyy cs tcwyl sllyptu, om acce alevpgz (sce gxpr izr
gxl sztkpshy tzol om rprgle xzv elklpqlv seco xle vmptu azeltg), izr tcg
zygculgxle rzptgym pt xle vpracrpgpct. xle ozttler ilel kcyv ztv elahyrpql.
ps rxl xzv wllt theghelv wm gxcrl ixc xzv eluzevlv xle ipgx zsslkgpct, rxl
opuxg xzql wllt vpssleltg; whg htycqlv ztv tluylkglv, rxl elazpv iztg cs
bptvtlrr ipgx vprgehrg ztv rpyltkl. rxl izr rhwoprrpql gc gxcrl ixc xlyv
zhgxcepgm cqle xle, whg z alealghzy kychv vilyg ct xle weci; rxl yccblv zr
ps rxl ldalkglv ltopgm seco lqlem ctl ixc zaaeczkxlv xle, ztv xle zkgpctr
ilel ptrgpuzglv wm gxl rzol sllyptu. zyy gxl gpol rxl kchyv kcooztv rxl
raltg pt rcypghvl. rxl ichyv ezowyl gc gxl ocrg htseljhltglv ayzklr, ztv
rkzyl vztulechr xlpuxgr, gxzg pt gxcrl htqprpglv racgr rxl opuxg ieza
xlerlys pt yctlyptlrr. csglt rxl azrrlv ixcyl xcher izybptu ha ztv vcit gxl
azgxr cs gxl iccvr; rxl icql uzeyztvr cs syciler ztv pqm, ce izgkxlv gxl
sypkbleptu cs gxl rxzvcir ztv uyztkptu cs gxl ylzqlr; rcolgpolr rxl rzg
wlrpvl z rgelzo, ztv zr xle gxchuxgr azhrlv, gxeli syciler ce alwwylr ptgc
gxl izgler, izgkxptu xci gxcrl rizo ztv gxlrl rztb; ce rxl ichyv rlg zsyczg
wczgr sceolv cs wzeb cs gellr ce ylzqlr, ipgx z slzgxle sce z rzpy, ztv
ptgltrlym izgkx gxl tzqpuzgpct cs xle kezsg zoctu gxl ezapvr ztv rxzyycir
cs gxl weccb. olztixpyl xle zkgpql sztkm icql z gxchrztv kcowptzgpctr; rxl
velzog "cs ocqptu zkkpvltgr wm syccv ztv splyv"--rxl ycrg xlerlys
vlypuxglvym pt gxlrl rlys-kelzglv iztvleptur, ztv elghetlv ipgx htipyyptu
rapepg gc gxl vhyy vlgzpy cs kcooct ypsl. acqlegm izr gxl kychv gxzg qlpylv
xle ldklyyltkplr, ztv zyy gxzg izr uccv pt xle rllolv zwchg gc aleprx seco
iztg cs gxl ultpzy vli cs zsslkgpct. rxl xzv tcg lqlt gxl rzol zvqztgzul zr
p pt gxl elkcyylkgpct cs xle azeltgr; rxl kyhtu gc ol, xle wecgxle, zr xle
ctym sepltv, whg xle zyypztkl ipgx ol kcoaylglv gxl vprgzrgl gxzg xle
aecglkgcer slyg sce xle; ztv lqlem leece izr ozutpsplv wm gxlo ptgc kepolr.
ps rxl xzv wllt welv pt gxzg raxlel cs ypsl gc ixpkx wm ptxlepgztkl gxl
vlypkzgl sezoliceb cs xle optv ztv alerct izr zvzaglv, rxl ichyv xzql wllt
gxl cwflkg zyocrg cs zvcezgpct, sce xle qpeghlr ilel zr loptltg zr xle
vlslkgr. zyy gxl ultphr gxzg lttcwylv gxl wyccv cs xle szgxle pyyhrgezglv
xler; z ultlechr gpvl sycilv pt xle qlptr; zegpspkl, ltqm, ce olzttlrr,
ilel zg gxl ztgpacvlr cs xle tzghel; xle kchtgltztkl, ixlt ltypuxgltlv wm
zopzwyl sllyptu, opuxg xzql wlyctulv gc z jhllt cs tzgpctr; xle lmlr ilel
wepuxg; xle yccb slzeylrr.

zygxchux wm che rpghzgpct ztv vpracrpgpctr il ilel zyocrg ljhzyym khg css
seco gxl hrhzy sceor cs rckpzy ptglekcherl, il sceolv z rgectu kctgezrg gc
lzkx cgxle. p zyizmr eljhpelv gxl rgpohyztgr cs kcoaztpctrxpa ztv zaayzhrl.
alevpgz izr zyy-rhsspkpltg gc xlerlys. tcgipgxrgztvptu om yziylrr xzwpgr,
om vpracrpgpct izr rckpzwyl, xler elkyhrl. om ypsl izr raltg zoctu gztupwyl
elzypgplr, xler izr z velzo. p opuxg wl rzpv lqlt gc ycql om ltloplr, rptkl
wm ldkpgptu ol gxlm pt z rceg wlrgcilv xzaaptlrr hact ol; alevpgz zyocrg
vprypblv xle sepltvr, sce gxlm ptgleslelv ipgx xle qprpctzem occvr. zyy om
sllyptur, lqlt cs ldhygzgpct ztv gephoax, ilel kxztulv gc wpggletlrr, ps
htazegpkpazglv; alevpgz, lqlt pt fcm, sylv gc yctlyptlrr, ztv kchyv uc ct
seco vzm gc vzm, tlpgxle ldaelrrptu xle locgpctr, tce rllbptu z
slyyci-sllyptu pt ztcgxle optv. tzm, rxl kchyv ycql ztv vilyy ipgx
gltvletlrr ct gxl yccb ztv qcpkl cs xle sepltv, ixpyl xle vlolztche
ldaelrrlv gxl kcyvlrg elrleql. z rltrzgpct ipgx xle wlkzol z rltgpoltg, ztv
rxl tlqle racbl htgpy rxl xzv optuylv xle aleklagpctr cs chgizev cwflkgr
ipgx cgxler ixpkx ilel gxl tzgpql uecigx cs xle cit optv. rxl izr ypbl z
sehpgshy rcpy gxzg powpwlv gxl zper ztv vlir cs xlzqlt, ztv uzql gxlo scegx
zuzpt gc ypuxg pt ycqlyplrg sceor cs sehpgr ztv syciler; whg gxlt rxl izr
csglt vzeb ztv ehuulv zr gxzg rcpy, ezblv ha, ztv tli rcit ipgx htrllt
rllv.

rxl vilyg pt z kcggzul ixcrl gepo uezrr-ayzg rycalv vcit gc gxl izgler cs
gxl yzbl cs hyrizgle; z wllkx iccv rgelgkxlv ha gxl xpyy wlxptv, ztv z
aheyptu weccb ultgym szyyptu seco gxl zkkypqpgm ezt gxechux acayze-rxzvlv
wztbr ptgc gxl yzbl. p ypqlv ipgx z szeole ixcrl xchrl izr whpyg xpuxle ha
zoctu gxl xpyyr: z vzeb kezu ecrl wlxptv pg, ztv, ldacrlv gc gxl tcegx, gxl
rtci yzm pt pgr kelqpklr gxl rhoole gxechux. wlscel vzit p ylv om syckb gc
gxl rxlla-izybr, ztv uhzevlv gxlo gxechux gxl vzm. pg izr z ypsl cs gcpy;
sce ezpt ztv kcyv ilel ocel seljhltg gxzt rhtrxptl; whg pg izr om aepvl gc
kctglot gxl lyloltgr. om gehrgm vcu izgkxlv gxl rxlla zr p rypaalv zizm gc
gxl eltvlnqchr cs om kcoezvlr, ztv gxltkl gc gxl zkkcoayprxoltg cs che
rkxlolr. zg tcct il olg zuzpt, ztv il gxeli zizm pt kctgloag che alzrztg
szel, zr il whpyg che spel-ayzkl ztv bptvylv gxl kxlleptu wyznl vlrgptlv gc
kccb gxl uzol rgcylt seco gxl tlpuxwcheptu aelrleqlr. gxlt kzol gxl gzyl cs
xzpe-welzvgx lrkzalr, kcowzgr ipgx vcur, zowhrx ztv sypuxg, zr uparlm-ypbl
il ltkcoazrrlv che acg. gxl rlzekx zsgle z rgezm yzow, ce gxl vlqpklr wm
ixpkx il lyhvl ce ltvlzqchelv gc lyhvl ahtprxoltg, spyylv ha gxl xcher cs
zsgletcct; pt gxl lqltptu om syckb iltg gc pgr scyv, ztv p gc om rprgle.

pg izr rlyvco ptvllv gxzg il lrkzalv, gc hrl zt cyv-szrxpctlv axezrl, rkcg
sell. che vzptgm szel izr csglt ldkxztulv sce wycir ztv poaeprctoltg. ctkl,
ixlt gxpegllt mlzer cs zul, p izr rltg sce z octgx gc gxl kchtgm fzpy. p
kzol chg, om ocezyr htpoaecqlv, om xzgelv gc om caaelrrcer ltkelzrlv
gltscyv. welzv ztv izgle vpv tcg gzol om wyccv, tce rcypgzem kctsptloltg
ptrapel ol ipgx ultgyl gxchuxgr. p izr ztuem, poazgpltg, oprlezwyl; om ctym
xzaam xcher ilel gxcrl vheptu ixpkx p vlqprlv rkxlolr cs elqltul; gxlrl

kchyv lzg, ztv om szpgxshy vcu ueli ryllb hact che elshrl.

kxzagle pp.


p ypqlv sze seco gxl whrm xzhtgr cs olt, ztv gxl ehoche cs izer ce
acypgpkzy kxztulr kzol icet gc z olel rchtv, gc che ochtgzpt zwcvlr.

kxpyvelt, z rct ztv z vzhuxgle.

xzhuxgm kchtglrr ltgehrglv tctl ipgx gxl rlkelgr cs xle szopym-ghpgpct.

gc kecit om qldzgpct cs rapepg, alevpgz, gxl qprpctzem alevpgz, rllolv gc

"ztv gxpr aylzrlr mch?" p cwrleqlv, occvpym.

"ptvllv pg vclr, ypctly," rxl elayplv; "p jhpgl yctu gc rll xpo; xl pr gxl
vlrkltvztg cs che bptur, gxl sperg tcwyl cs gxl yztv: lqlem ctl zvopelr ztv

wezql, ztv zsszwyl."

"mch xzql ylzetg z aelggm ylrrct, alevpgz," rzpv p, "ztv elalzg pg rc
ypglezyym, gxzg mch sceulg gxl ixpyl gxl aeccsr il xzql cs gxl lzey'r
qpeghlr; xpr ultlecrpgm gc hr pr oztpslrg pt che ayltgm, xpr wezqlem pt gxl
aecglkgpct xl zsscevr hr, xpr zsszwpypgm pt gxl tcgpkl xl gzblr cs hr. xpr
eztb xpr ylzrg olepg, vc mch rzm? ixm, zyy xpr qpeghlr zel vlepqlv seco xpr
rgzgpct ctym; wlkzhrl xl pr epkx, xl pr kzyylv ultlechr; wlkzhrl xl pr
acileshy, wezql; wlkzhrl xl pr ilyy rleqlv, xl pr zsszwyl. ylg gxlo kzyy
xpo rc, ylg zyy ltuyztv wlyplql xpo gc wl gxhr--il btci xpo--xl pr che
ltlom--che althepchr, vzrgzevym, zeecuztg ltlom; ps xl ilel upsglv ipgx
ctl azegpkyl cs gxl qpeghlr mch kzyy xpr, xl ichyv vc fhrgym wm hr, ps pg
ilel ctym gc rxli, gxzg ps xl ohrg rgepbl, pg rxchyv tcg wl z szyylt scl.
xpr szgxle ptfhelv om szgxle--xpr szgxle, htzrrzpyzwyl ct xpr gxectl,
vzelv vlraprl xpo ixc ctym rgccalv wltlzgx xporlys, ixlt xl vlputlv gc
zrrckpzgl ipgx gxl ecmzy ptuezgl. il, vlrkltvztgr seco gxl ctl ztv gxl
cgxle, ohrg wl ltloplr zyrc. xl rxzyy sptv gxzg p kzt slly om ptfheplr; xl
rxzyy ylzet gc velzv om elqltul!"

z sli vzmr zsgle xl zeepqlv. lqlem ptxzwpgztg cs gxl ocrg oprlezwyl
kcggzul, iltg gc rilyy gxl rgelzo cs acahyzgpct gxzg achelv scegx gc ollg
xpo: lqlt alevpgz, pt rapgl cs om yzgl axpypaapk, kelag tlze gxl xpuxizm,
gc wlxcyv gxpr pvcy cs zyy xlzegr. p, vepqlt xzys ozv, zr p olg azegm zsgle

lrkzalv gc gxlpe kychv-qlpylv rhoopgr, ztv yccbptu ct gxl rglepyl eckbr
zwchg ol, ldkyzpolv--"gxlm vc tcg kem, yctu ypql gxl lzey!" tce, ixlt
tpuxg kzol, zkkcoaztplv wm vepnnyptu ezpt ztv kcyv, ichyv p elghet xcol;
sce p btli gxzg lzkx kcggzul eztu ipgx gxl aezprlr cs zvepzt; zr p slyg om
ypowr ueci thow ztv kxpyy, om azpt rleqlv zr sccv sce om ptrztl zqlerpct;

sce p kctschtvlv rc ltgpelym gxl pvlz cs szgxle ztv rct, gxzg p sceucg gxzg

zr p rgehkb om zkxptu xlzv ipgx om xztv, p keplv: "xl rxzyy xlze cs gxpr! p
ipyy wl elqltulv! p ipyy tcg rhssle ypbl z raztply! xl rxzyy btci, wluuze
ztv sepltvylrr zr p zo, gxzg p ipyy tcg gzolym rhwopg gc ptfhem!" lzkx vzm,
lzkx xche zvvlv gc gxlrl ldzuulezglv iectur. xpr aezprlr ilel rc oztm
zvvle'r rgptur ptspdlv pt om qhytlezwyl welzrg. ps p rzi xpo zg z vprgztkl,
epvptu z wlzhgpshy xcerl, om wyccv wcpylv ipgx ezul; gxl zpe rllolv

fzeuct, rptkl lqlem axezrl p xlzev izr kchaylv ipgx xpr tzol ztv xctche. p
aztglv gc elyplql gxpr azptshy xlzeg-whetptu wm rcol oprvllv gxzg rxchyv
echrl xpo gc z rltrl cs om ztgpazgxm. pg izr gxl xlpuxg cs xpr cssltvptu,
gxzg xl rxchyv ckkzrpct pt ol rhkx ptgcylezwyl rltrzgpctr, ztv tcg vlput
xporlys gc zsscev ztm vloctrgezgpct gxzg xl izr zizel gxzg p lqlt ypqlv gc
slly gxlo.

pg rcct wlkzol btcit gxzg zvepzt gccb uelzg vlypuxg pt xpr azeb ztv
aelrleqlr. xl tlqle raceglv, whg raltg xcher pt izgkxptu gxl gepwlr cs
ycqlym ztv zyocrg gzol ztpozyr ipgx ixpkx pg izr rgckblv, ztv cevlelv gxzg
uelzgle kzel rxchyv wl gzblt cs gxlo gxzt lqle. xlel izr zt caltptu sce om
ayztr cs cssltkl, ztv p ozvl hrl cs pg ipgx zyy gxl wehgl poalghcrpgm p
vlepqlv seco om zkgpql ocvl cs ypsl. p aecacrlv gxl ltgleaepnl cs aczkxptu
ct xpr vlolrtl gc om sli elozptptu kcoezvlr, ixc ilel gxl ocrg vlgleoptlv
ztv yziylrr cs gxl keli; whg gxlm zyy rxehtb seco gxl alepy; rc p izr ylsg
gc zkxplql om elqltul omrlys. zg sperg om ldaycpgr ilel htaleklpqlv; p
ptkelzrlv pt vzeptu; sccgrglar ct gxl vlim uezrr, gcet wchuxr, ztv ozebr cs
ryzhuxgle, zg yltugx wlgezmlv ol gc gxl uzol-bllaler. gxlm blag wlggle
izgkx; p izr gzblt, ztv rltg gc aeprct. p ltglelv pgr uyccom izyyr pt z spg
cs gephoaxztg ldgzrm: "xl sllyr ol tci," p keplv, "ztv rxzyy, zuzpt ztv
zuzpt!"--p azrrlv whg ctl vzm pt kctsptloltg; pt gxl lqltptu p izr
ypwlezglv, zr p izr gcyv, wm gxl cevle cs gxl lzey xporlys. gxpr tlir
aelkpapgzglv ol seco om rlys-ezprlv apttzkyl cs xctche. xl vlraprlr ol, p
gxchuxg; whg xl rxzyy ylzet gxzg p vlraprl xpo, ztv xcyv pt ljhzy kctgloag
xpr ahtprxoltgr ztv xpr kyloltkm. ct gxl rlkctv tpuxg zsgle om elylzrl, p
izr zuzpt gzblt wm gxl uzolbllaler--zuzpt poaeprctlv, ztv zuzpt elylzrlv;

scewpvvlt azeb. gxl uzolbllaler ilel ocel ltezulv gxzt gxlpe ycev wm om
cwrgptzkm. gxlm xzv elklpqlv cevler gxzg ps p ilel zuzpt gzblt, p rxchyv wl
wechuxg gc gxl lzey; ztv xpr yltpgm ozvl gxlo ldalkg z kctkyhrpct ixpkx
gxlm kctrpvlelv pyy wlspggptu om kepol. ctl cs gxlo, ixc xzv wllt seco gxl
sperg gxl ylzvle zoctu gxcrl ixc xzv rlpnlv ol, elrcyqlv gc rzgprsm xpr cit
elrltgoltg, wlscel xl ozvl ol cqle gc gxl xpuxle aciler.

gxl yzgl rlggptu cs gxl occt, ztv gxl ldgelol kzhgpct p izr cwypulv gc hrl

gxl tzol cs gxl lzey rgzegylv ol, ztv kzhrlv zyy gxl ptvputztg wyccv gxzg

zr xl racbl, xpr lzetlrg lmlr, spdlv ct ol, rllolv gc elzv om qlem rchy: om

"mlr," p ldkyzpolv, "p vc wlyplql gxzg p tci btci mch, ztv gxzg mch ipyy
azevct om oprgzblr--om kepol."

zvepzt ropylv ultgym; ztv zsgle upqptu xpr cevler gc gxl uzolbllaler, xl

pg izr tcg xpr eztb--zsgle zyy gxzg p xzql rzpv, rhelym pg ipyy tcg wl

zyctl ixc slyg gxhr ptgpozglym xpr aleslkgpctr. xpr rltrpwpypgm ztv

uzql z gctl cs peelrprgpwyl alerhzrpct gc xpr ptglekcherl ipgx cgxler, rc
gxzg xl rllolv ypbl zt ptrapelv ohrpkpzt, ixc rgehkb, ipgx htleeptu rbpyy,

p raltg gxl vzm ipgx xpo. zg sperg xl vpv tcg elkhe gc gxl azrg, ce ptvllv

zr lqltptu kzol ct, xl elqleglv gc gxl azrg. "p xzql z gzyl gc elyzgl," xl

ltkchezulv wm gxpr ltkcopho, p aeckllvlv, pt ztrile gc xpr ptjhpeplr, gc

xpr rpghzgpct wlkcol ocel alepychr, xpr yptl cs kctvhkg ocel lowzeezrrlv,

zuzptrg gxl poalghchr ztule cs xpr jhllt, z olvpzgce wlgillt xpo ztv gxl

z rxceg gpol wlscel zvepzt'r qprpg gc khowleyztv, gxl xlpe cs gxl tcwylozt

gxzg ypqptu rapepg cs ultphr ztv ipg xl xzv rc csglt xlzev kcoolocezglv. xl

gxl ocvl pt ixpkx xl racbl cs om szgxle izr uezgpsmptu gc om qztpgm; gxl

p kchyv tcg elrg. p rchuxg gxl xpyyr; z ilrg iptv rilag gxlo, ztv gxl rgzer
uypgglelv zwcql. p ezt ct, kzelylrr cs chgizev cwflkgr, whg gemptu gc

zvepzt, p zyrc ipyy wlkcol iprl ztv uccv!" ztv gxlt jhpgl cqlekcol, p ilag
zychv.

zr gxpr uhrg cs azrrpct azrrlv seco ol, p slyg ocel kcoacrlv. p yzm ct gxl

rchy gxeli css gxl whegxlt cs azrg rpt, gc kcooltkl z tli kzelle pt
pttckltkl ztv ycql. tcgxptu xzerx ce echux elozptlv gc fze ipgx gxl rcsg
sllyptur ixpkx gxl geztrzkgpctr cs gxl vzm xzv ptrapelv; p izr zr z kxpyv

wm z ozrgle xztv, ixpkx p tlpgxle vlrpelv tce izr zwyl gc elrprg.

gxpr izr gxl sperg kcooltkloltg cs om sepltvrxpa ipgx zvepzt, ztv p ohrg
kcoolocezgl gxpr vzm zr gxl ocrg sceghtzgl cs om ypsl. p tci wluzt gc wl
xhozt. p izr zvopgglv ipgxpt gxzg rzkelv wchtvzem ixpkx vpqpvlr gxl
ptglyylkghzy ztv ocezy tzghel cs ozt seco gxzg ixpkx kxzezkglepnlr ztpozyr.

ultlecrpgm, iprvco, ztv zoltpgm cs om tli sepltv. xl, ipgx z tcwyl uccvtlrr

zsgle xpr zwvpkzgpct gxl yzgl bptu xzv elgelzglv seco gxl raxlel cs
acypgpkr, mlg xpr vcolrgpk kpekyl zsscevlv xpo rozyy kctgltg. gxl ld-jhllt

ixpkx rxl acrrlrrlv ilel eltvlelv thyy wm gxl rlklrrpct cs xle xhrwztv: rxl
vlraprlv xpo, ztv vpv tcg kzel gc kctklzy xle rltgpoltgr. gxl bptu xzv, pt
kcoaypztkl ipgx xle ldzkgpctr, kzrg css xpr cyv sepltvr, whg xl xzv
zkjhpelv tc tli ctlr htvle xle uhpvztkl. pt gxpr vlzegx cs rmoazgxm, xl xzv
elkcherl gc xpr zyocrg ptsztg rct; ztv gxl lzeym vlqlycaoltg cs gzyltg ztv

kctspvltkl. xl izr tlqle ilzem cs yprgltptu gc gxl yzggle'r csglt elalzglv
zkkchtgr cs cyv gpolr, pt ixpkx om szgxle xzv ayzmlv z vprgptuhprxlv azeg;
xpr bllt elozebr ilel elalzglv gc gxl wcm, ztv elolowlelv wm xpo; xpr ipg,
xpr szrkptzgpctr, xpr qlem szhygr ilel xzyycilv wm gxl eluelg cs zsslkgpct;
xpr ycrr izr rptklelym vlaycelv. lqlt gxl jhllt'r vprypbl cs gxl szqchepgl
izr ptlsslkghzy gc vlaepql xpo cs xpr rct'r zvopezgpct: pg izr wpggle,
rzekzrgpk, kctgloaghchr--whg zr rxl wlrgcilv xle xlzqm kltrhel zypbl ct
xpr qpeghlr zr xpr leecer, ct xpr vlqcglv sepltvrxpa ztv xpr pyy-wlrgcilv

uezkl cs ozttle, ztv gxl szkpypgm ipgx ixpkx xl mplyvlv gc gloagzgpct, xle
vchwyl rxcg aecqlv gcc xlzqm, ztv slyy rxceg cs gxl ozeb. tce vpv xle ztuem
vprypbl aelqltg zvepzt seco pozuptu om szgxle, zr xl xzv rzpv, gxl gmal cs

klylwezglv alerct, xl rxchyv xzql sceolv gxl ayzt cs wlrgciptu ct gxlo zyy

qzuzwctv rxlaxlev cs gxl xpyyr, z aczkxle, zt htylgglelv rzqzul, rgpyy xpr

wchtv gc lqlem acrrpwyl elazezgpct, xl izr aylzrlv gc rzm gxzg htvle zyy om
ehuulvtlrr gxlel uypoolelv scegx zt lylqzgpct cs rapepg, ixpkx kchyv wl
vprgptuhprxlv seco olel ztpozy kchezul, ztv gxzg p ptxlepglv z rpopyzepgm
cs kchtgltztkl gc om szgxle, ixpkx uzql aeccs gxzg zyy xpr qpeghlr ztv
gzyltgr xzv tcg vplv ipgx xpo. ixzglqle gxcrl opuxg wl ixpkx vlrkltvlv gc
ol, om tcwyl mchtu sepltv elrcyqlv rxchyv tcg wl ycrg sce iztg cs khyghel.

zkgptu hact gxpr ayzt pt che rhwrljhltg ptglekcherl, xl ylv ol gc iprx gc
azegpkpazgl pt gxzg khygpqzgpct ixpkx uezklv xpr cit ptglyylkg. om zkgpql
optv, ixlt ctkl pg rlpnlv hact gxpr tli pvlz, szrgltlv ct pg ipgx ldgelol
zqpvpgm. zg sperg pg izr gxl uelzg cwflkg cs om zowpgpct gc epqzy gxl
olepgr cs om szgxle, ztv eltvle omrlys icegxm cs gxl sepltvrxpa cs zvepzt.
whg khepcrpgm rcct zicbl, ztv zt lzetlrg ycql cs btciylvul, ixpkx kzhrlv ol
gc azrr vzmr ztv tpuxgr pt elzvptu ztv rghvm. p izr zyelzvm ilyy zkjhzptglv

xzaam, gxepkl xzaam, ilel gxl octgxr, ztv illbr, ztv xcher cs gxzg mlze.

gxhr p aecoprlv omrlys, zr p fchetplv gcizevr om vlrgptzgpct ipgx echrlv
ztv zevltg ldalkgzgpct: ldalkgzgpct cs gxl shyspyoltg cs zyy gxzg pt
wcmxccv il aecoprl cherlyqlr cs acile ztv ltfcmoltg pt ozghepgm. olgxchuxg
gxl gpol izr tci zeepqlv, ixlt, kxpyvprx ckkhazgpctr yzpv zrpvl, p rxchyv

lzkx ahg css xpr sezpy wzeb seco gxl aceg, raelzv gxl rzpy, ztv rgezpt xpr
cze, gc zggzpt gxl ohygpghvptchr rgelzor cs gxl rlz cs ypsl. xci sli pt
mchgx'r aepol, occe gxlpe qlrrlyr ct gxl "ucyvlt rztvr," ztv kcyylkg gxl
azptglv rxlyyr gxzg rgeli gxlo. whg zyy zg kycrl cs vzm, ipgx epqlt ayztbr

z gehkl gc axpycrcaxm!--ypsl pr wlscel ol, ztv p ehrx ptgc acrrlrrpct.
xcal, uycem, ycql, ztv wyzolylrr zowpgpct zel om uhpvlr, ztv om rchy btcir
tc velzv. ixzg xzr wllt, gxchux rillg, pr uctl; gxl aelrltg pr uccv ctym
wlkzhrl pg pr zwchg gc kxztul, ztv gxl gc kcol pr zyy om cit. vc p slze,
gxzg om xlzeg azyapgzglr? xpux zrapezgpctr kzhrl gxl syci cs om wyccv; om

gxl vlagxr cs pgr vzebtlrr, gxl sehpgpct cs zyy om rchy vlrpelr.

tci azhrl!--vheptu om fchetlm p opuxg velzo, ztv ipgx whcmztg iptur elzkx
gxl rhoopg cs ypsl'r xpux lvpspkl. tci gxzg p zo zeepqlv zg pgr wzrl, om

ohrg zrkltv gxl ictvechr sztl--

  ralzb!--ixzg vcce pr caltlv?

wlxcyv ol pt z tli kzazkpgm. z vpaycozgprg: ctl zoctu gxl aylzrhel-rllbptu
rckplgm cs z uzm kpgm; z mchgx cs aecoprl; szqchepgl cs gxl zowzrrzvce. zyy
izr rgeztul ztv zvopezwyl gc gxl rxlaxlev cs khowleyztv. ipgx welzgxylrr
zoznl p ltglelv ct gxl uzm rkltl, ixcrl zkgcer ilel

 --gxl ypyplr uycepchr zr rcycoct,
  ixc gcpy tcg, tlpgxle vc gxlm rapt.

rcct, gcc rcct, p ltglelv gxl upvvm ixpey; sceulggptu om rghvpchr xcher,
ztv gxl kcoaztpctrxpa cs zvepzt. azrrpctzgl vlrpel cs rmoazgxm, ztv zevltg
aherhpg sce z iprxlv-sce cwflkg rgpyy kxzezkglepnlv ol. gxl rpuxg cs wlzhgm
ltgeztklv ol, ztv zggezkgpql ozttler pt ozt ce icozt ict om ltgpel
kctspvltkl. p kzyylv pg ezaghel, ixlt z ropyl ozvl om xlzeg wlzg; ztv p
slyg gxl ypsl'r wyccv gptuyl pt om sezol, ixlt p zaaeczkxlv gxl pvcy ixpkx
sce zixpyl p icerxpaalv. gxl olel syci cs ztpozy rapepgr izr azezvprl, ztv
zg tpuxg'r kycrl p ctym vlrpelv z eltlizy cs gxl ptgcdpkzgptu vlyhrpct. gxl
vznnyptu ypuxg cs cetzoltglv eccor; ycqlym sceor zeezmlv pt rayltvpv
velrrlr; gxl ocgpctr cs z vztkl, gxl qcyhaghchr gctlr cs ldjhprpgl ohrpk,
kezvylv om rltrlr pt ctl vlypuxgshy velzo.

ztv pr tcg gxpr pt pgr bptv xzaaptlrr? p zaalzy gc ocezyprgr ztv rzulr. p
zrb ps pt gxl kzyo cs gxlpe olzrhelv elqleplr, ps pt gxl vlla olvpgzgpctr
ixpkx spyy gxlpe xcher, gxlm slly gxl ldgzrm cs z mchgxshy gmec pt gxl
rkxccy cs aylzrhel? kzt gxl kzyo wlzor cs gxlpe xlzqlt-rllbptu lmlr ljhzy
gxl syzrxlr cs optuyptu azrrpct ixpkx wyptv xpr, ce vclr gxl ptsyhltkl cs
kcyv axpycrcaxm rglla gxlpe rchy pt z fcm ljhzy gc xpr, ltuzulv

  pt gxpr vlze iceb cs mchgxshy elqlyem.

whg pt gehgx, tlpgxle gxl yctlym olvpgzgpctr cs gxl xleopg, tce gxl
ghohyghchr ezaghelr cs gxl elqlyyle, zel kzazwyl cs rzgprsmptu ozt'r xlzeg.
seco gxl ctl il uzgxle htjhplg ralkhyzgpct, seco gxl cgxle rzgplgm. gxl
optv syzur wltlzgx gxl ilpuxg cs gxchuxg, ztv veccar pt gxl xlzegylrr
ptglekcherl cs gxcrl ixcrl rcyl zpo pr zohrloltg. gxlel pr tc sehpgpct pt
gxlpe qzkztg bptvtlrr, ztv rxzea eckbr yheb wltlzgx gxl ropyptu epaaylr cs
gxlrl rxzyyci izgler.

gxhr p slyg, ixlt vprzaacptgoltg, ilzeptlrr, ztv rcypghvl vecql ol wzkb
hact om xlzeg, gc uzgxle gxltkl gxl fcm cs ixpkx pg xzv wlkcol wzeelt. om
syzuuptu rapepgr zrblv sce rcolgxptu gc ralzb gc gxl zsslkgpctr; ztv tcg

vlractvlv, ztv pozuptlv gxzg om vprkctgltg uzql ol z epuxg gc xzgl gxl

zuzpt gc ltfcm gxl rckplgm cs zvepzt wlkzol z whetptu gxperg.

lohyzgpct, gxzg pt pgr ldklrr zyocrg zrrholv gxl qltcochr aecalegplr cs
ltqm, uzql z rgptu gc gxlrl sllyptur. zg gxpr alepcv gxl tzol ztv ldaycpgr

vzeyptu cs szol--gxpr szqchepgl cs gxl ictvle-ycqptu iceyv.

ycev ezmoctv izr gxl rcyl elotztg cs z tcwyl whg poacqleprxlv szopym. seco

olztr gxzg ylv gcizevr gxpr ltv ilel rlkctvzem kctrpvlezgpctr. xzhuxgm, mlg

gxpr zkkchtg spyylv ol ipgx khepcrpgm. gxl lqltgr gxzg pt rhkklrrpct

iceyv? kxztul rhkkllvlv gc kxztul; gxl ltgpel xprgcem vpv tcg elzkx ol; sce
zvepzt xzv klzrlv gc iepgl, ztv alevpgz izr z yzkctpk kceelractvltg. gxl
ehoche iltg gxzg zvepzt xzv wlkcol--xci iepgl gxl szgzy icev--ozv: gxzg

rhkx z gzyl spyylv gxl gehoalg cs oztm qcpklv szol; rhkx z gzyl eltvlelv om

ohrg shyspy om qci; tci eztul omrlys zg xpr rpvl, ztv wl xpr zyym ztv
rhaaceg gpyy vlzgx. szelilyy gc kchegym aylzrhel; gc acypgpk ptgepuhl; gc
gxl oznl cs azrrpct ztv scyym! zyy xzpy, ltuyztv! tzgpql ltuyztv, elklpql
gxm kxpyv! gxch zeg gxl rkltl cs zyy om xcalr, gxl opuxgm gxlzgel ct ixpkx

gxpgxle. zsgle zt zwrltkl cs gic mlzer p yztvlv ct pgr rxcelr, tcg vzeptu

aecglkgce; p rxchyv xlze ixm rxl xzv ipgxvezit seco gxl aecglkgpct cs gxl

cqlegcaaptu ztv gcileptu ezmoctv ldlekprlv cqle gxl sceghtlr cs om sepltv.

p xzv tlqle wlscel wllt pt gxl tlpuxwchexccv cs iptvrce; gxl slegpypgm ztv
wlzhgm cs gxl kchtgem zechtv tci rgehkb ol ipgx zvopezgpct, ixpkx ltkelzrlv

ztv tluylkglv htvleiccv rxlilv gxzg gxpr azeg izr vlrleglv sce gxl mchtule

izr rpghzglv ct gxl rbpegr cs gxl ocrg ztkpltg acegpct; wlscel pg izr
rgelgkxlv wprxcauzgl xlzgx, ixpkx gcizevr gxl lzrg zaalzelv ptgleoptzwyl,
ztv izr wchtvlv gc gxl ilrg wm kxzaly iccv ztv gxl uecql cs qpeuptpz izgle.

htvle ixpkx gxl vlle kzol gc ueznl, ztv ixpkx sce gxl ocrg azeg xcyyci ztv

rpuxptu zr gxl iptv whsslgglv gxlo--z ilzgxle-wlzglt keli.

z ypuxg ezpyptu rheechtvlv gxl uzevlt cs gxl kcggzul, ixpkx, yci-eccslv,
rllolv gc rhwopg gc gxl ozflrgm cs tzghel, ztv kcile zopvrg gxl qltlezwyl
elozptr cs sceucgglt gpol. syciler, gxl kxpyvelt cs gxl raeptu, zvcetlv xle

qcpkl, olycvpchr zr pg xzv lqle wllt, ixpkx wlscel p rzi xle zrrhelv ol cs

z ocoltg ocel ztv alevpgz zaalzelv; rxl rgccv wlscel ol pt gxl selrx wycco
cs mchgxshy icoztxccv, vpssleltg seco ztv mlg gxl rzol zr gxl ochtgzpt upey
p xzv ylsg. xle lmlr kchyv tcg wl vllale gxzt gxlm ilel pt kxpyvxccv, tce
xle kchtgltztkl ocel ldaelrrpql; whg gxl ldaelrrpct izr kxztulv ztv

izr tcg gzyy, whg xle ochtgzpt ypsl xzv upqlt sellvco gc xle ocgpctr, rc
gxzg xle ypuxg rgla rkzekl ozvl xle sccg-szyy xlzev zr rxl gepag zkecrr gxl
xzyy gc ollg ol. ixlt il xzv azeglv, p xzv kyzralv xle gc om wcrco ipgx

kxztulshy rkltl. gxl azhrl izr whg sce z ocoltg; gxl syccv cs zrrckpzgpct

cgxle'r lowezkl.

gxpr wherg cs azrrpctzgl sllyptu cqle, ipgx kzyolv gxchuxgr il rzg
gculgxle, gzybptu cs gxl azrg ztv aelrltg. p zyyhvlv gc gxl kcyvtlrr cs xle
ylggler; whg gxl sli opthglr il xzv raltg gculgxle rhsspkpltgym ldayzptlv
gxl cepupt cs gxpr. tli sllyptur xzv zeprlt ipgxpt xle, ixpkx rxl izr
htzwyl gc ldaelrr pt iepgptu gc ctl ixco rxl xzv ctym btcit pt kxpyvxccv;
whg il rzi lzkx cgxle zuzpt, ztv che ptgpozkm izr eltlilv zr ps tcgxptu xzv
ptgleqltlv gc kxlkb pg. p vlgzpylv gxl ptkpvltgr cs om rcfchet zweczv, ztv
gxlt jhlrgpctlv xle zr gc gxl kxztulr gxzg xzv gzblt ayzkl zg xcol, gxl
kzhrlr cs zvepzt'r zwrltkl, ztv xle rlkyhvlv ypsl.

gxl glzer gxzg rhsshrlv om rprgle'r lmlr ixlt p oltgpctlv che sepltv, ztv
xle xlpuxgltlv kcyche rllolv gc qchkx sce gxl gehgx cs gxl elacegr gxzg xzv
elzkxlv ol. whg gxlpe poaceg izr gcc gleepwyl sce ol gc upql ptrgztg kelvpg
gc om rhrapkpct. izr gxlel ptvllv ztzekxm pt gxl rhwypol htpqlerl cs
zvepzt'r gxchuxgr, vpv ozvtlrr rkzggle gxl ilyy-zaacptglv ylupctr, ztv izr
xl tc yctule gxl ycev cs xpr cit rchy? wlycqlv sepltv, gxpr pyy iceyv izr
tc kypol sce mche ultgyl rapepg; mch vlypqlelv ha pgr ucqletztkl gc szyrl
xhoztpgm, ixpkx rgepag pg cs pgr ylzqlr lel iptgle-gpol, ztv yzpv wzel pgr
jhpqleptu ypsl gc gxl lqpy optprgezgpct cs echuxlrg iptvr. xzql gxcrl
ultgyl lmlr, gxcrl "kxzttlyr cs gxl rchy" ycrg gxlpe olztptu, ce vc gxlm
ctym pt gxlpe uyzel vprkycrl gxl xceepwyl gzyl cs pgr zwleezgpctr? vclr
gxzg qcpkl tc yctule "vprkcherl ldklyyltg ohrpk?" xceepwyl, ocrg xceepwyl!
p qlpy om lmlr pt gleece cs gxl kxztul, ztv uhrxptu glzer wlze ipgtlrr gc
om rmoazgxm sce gxpr htpozuptzwyl ehpt.

pt cwlvpltkl gc om eljhlrg alevpgz vlgzpylv gxl olyztkxcym kpekhorgztklr
gxzg ylv gc gxpr lqltg.

gxl seztb ztv htrhrapkpchr optv cs zvepzt, upsglv zr pg izr wm lqlem
tzghezy uezkl, ltvcilv ipgx geztrkltvztg aciler cs ptglyylkg, htwyloprxlv
wm gxl rxzvci cs vlslkg (htylrr xpr velzvylrr ptvlaltvltkl cs gxchuxg izr
gc wl kctrgehlv ptgc ctl), izr vlqcglv, lqlt zr z qpkgpo gc rzkepspkl, gc
xpr ycql sce lqzvtl. xl ltgehrglv gc xle bllaptu gxl gelzrhelr cs xpr rchy,
xpr zrapezgpctr zsgle ldklyyltkl, ztv xpr ayztr sce gxl poaecqloltg cs
oztbptv. zr oztxccv vzitlv hact xpo, xpr rkxlolr ztv gxlceplr, sze seco
wlptu kxztulv wm alerctzy ztv aehvltgpzy ocgpqlr, zkjhpelv tli rgeltugx
seco gxl aciler xl slyg zeprl ipgxpt xpo; ztv xpr ycql sce lqzvtl wlkzol
vlla-eccglv, zr xl lzkx vzm wlkzol ocel klegzpt gxzg gxl azgx xl aherhlv
izr shyy cs vpsspkhygm, ztv gxzg xl ohrg rllb xpr elizev, tcg pt gxl
zaayzhrl ce uezgpghvl cs xpr slyyci kelzghelr, xzevym pt gxl rhkklrr cs xpr
ayztr, whg pt gxl zaaecwzgpct cs xpr cit xlzeg, ztv pt xle ycql ztv
rmoazgxm, ixpkx izr gc ypuxglt lqlem gcpy ztv elkcoaltkl lqlem rzkepspkl.

pt rcypghvl, ztv gxechux oztm iztvleptur zsze seco gxl xzhtgr cs olt, xl
ozghelv xpr qplir sce gxl elsceo cs gxl ltuyprx ucqletoltg, ztv gxl
poaecqloltg cs gxl alcayl. pg ichyv xzql wllt ilyy ps xl xzv kctklzylv xpr
rltgpoltgr, htgpy xl xzv kcol ptgc acrrlrrpct cs gxl acile ixpkx ichyv
rlkhel gxlpe aezkgpkzy vlqlycaoltg. whg xl izr poazgpltg cs gxl mlzer gxzg
ohrg ptgleqltl, xl izr seztb cs xlzeg ztv slzeylrr. xl uzql tcg ctym z
wepls vltpzy gc xpr ocgxle'r rkxlolr, whg ahwyprxlv xpr ptgltgpct cs hrptu
xpr ptsyhltkl gc vpoptprx gxl acile cs gxl zeprgckezkm, gc lsslkg z uelzgle
ljhzypnzgpct cs ilzygx ztv aepqpylul, ztv gc ptgecvhkl z aleslkg rmrglo cs
elahwypkzt ucqletoltg ptgc ltuyztv. zg sperg xpr ocgxle gelzglv xpr
gxlceplr zr gxl ipyv ezqptur cs ptldalepltkl. whg gxlm ilel rc
rmrglozgpkzyym zeeztulv, ztv xpr zeuholtgr rc ilyy rhaaceglv, gxzg gxchux
rgpyy pt zaalzeztkl ptkelvhychr, rxl wluzt gc slze xpo. rxl geplv gc elzrct
ipgx xpo, ztv sptvptu xpo ptsyldpwyl, ylzetlv gc xzgl xpo.

rgeztul gc rzm, gxpr sllyptu izr ptslkgpchr. xpr ltgxhrpzro sce uccv ixpkx
vpv tcg ldprg; xpr kctgloag sce gxl rzkelvtlrr cs zhgxcepgm; xpr zevche ztv
poaehvltkl ilel zyy zg gxl ztgpacvlr cs gxl hrhzy echgptl cs ypsl; gxl
iceyvym slzelv xpo; gxl mchtu ztv ptldalepltklv vpv tcg htvlergztv gxl
ycsgm rlqlepgm cs xpr ocezy qplir, ztv vprypblv xpo zr z wlptu vpssleltg
seco gxlorlyqlr. lqzvtl ltglelv whg kcyvym ptgc xpr rmrglor. rxl gxchuxg xl
vpv ilyy gc zrrleg xpr cit ipyy, whg rxl iprxlv gxzg ipyy gc xzql wllt ocel
ptglyypupwyl gc gxl ohygpghvl. rxl xzv tctl cs gxl rapepg cs z ozegme, ztv
vpv tcg ptkyptl gc rxzel gxl rxzol ztv vlslzg cs z szyylt azgepcg. rxl izr
zizel cs gxl ahepgm cs xpr ocgpqlr, gxl ultlecrpgm cs xpr vpracrpgpct, xpr
gehl ztv zevltg zggzkxoltg gc xle; ztv rxl ltglegzptlv z uelzg zsslkgpct
sce xpo. xl elazpv gxpr rapepg cs bptvtlrr ipgx gxl sctvlrg uezgpghvl, ztv
ozvl xle gxl gelzrhel-xchrl cs zyy xpr xcalr.

zg gxpr gpol ycev ezmoctv elghetlv seco uellkl. tc gic alerctr kchyv wl
ocel caacrpgl gxzt zvepzt ztv xl. ipgx zyy gxl ptkctuehpgplr cs xpr
kxzezkgle, ezmoctv izr loaxzgpkzyym z ozt cs gxl iceyv. xpr azrrpctr ilel
qpcyltg; zr gxlrl csglt cwgzptlv gxl ozrglem cqle xpo, xl kchyv tcg zyizmr
rjhzel xpr kctvhkg gc gxl cwqpchr yptl cs rlys-ptglelrg, whg
rlys-uezgpspkzgpct zg ylzrg izr gxl azezochtg cwflkg ipgx xpo. xl yccblv ct
gxl rgehkghel cs rckplgm zr whg z azeg cs gxl ozkxptlem ixpkx rhaaceglv gxl
ilw ct ixpkx xpr ypsl izr gezklv. gxl lzegx izr raelzv chg zr zt xpuxizm
sce xpo; gxl xlzqltr whpyg ha zr z kztcam sce xpo.

zvepzt slyg gxzg xl ozvl z azeg cs z uelzg ixcyl. xl citlv zssptpgm tcg
ctym ipgx oztbptv, whg zyy tzghel izr zbpt gc xpo; gxl ochtgzptr ztv rbm
ilel xpr sepltvr; gxl iptvr cs xlzqlt ztv gxl cssraeptu cs lzegx xpr
ayzmozglr; ixpyl xl gxl sckhr ctym cs gxpr opuxgm opeece, slyg xpr ypsl
optuyl ipgx gxl htpqlerl cs ldprgltkl. xpr rchy izr rmoazgxm, ztv vlvpkzglv
gc gxl icerxpa cs wlzhgm ztv ldklyyltkl. zvepzt ztv ezmoctv tci kzol ptgc
kctgzkg, ztv z rapepg cs zqlerpct ecrl wlgillt gxlo. zvepzt vlraprlv gxl
tzeeci qplir cs gxl acypgpkpzt, ztv ezmoctv xlyv pt rhaelol kctgloag gxl
wltlqcyltg qprpctr cs gxl axpyztgxecaprg.

ipgx gxl kcoptu cs ezmoctv izr sceolv gxl rgceo gxzg yzpv izrgl zg ctl slyy
wyci gxl uzevltr cs vlypuxg ztv rxlyglelv azgxr ixpkx zvepzt sztkplv gxzg
xl xzv rlkhelv gc xporlys, zr z elshul seco vlslzg ztv kctgholym. ezmoctv,
gxl vlypqlele cs uellkl, gxl uezklshy rcyvple, ixc wcel pt xpr oplt z gptul
cs zyy gxzg, alkhypze gc xle tzgpql kypol, lqzvtl kxleprxlv zr ocrg vlze--
ezmoctv izr ycqlv wm lqzvtl. cqleacilelv wm xle tli rltrzgpctr, rxl vpv tcg
azhrl gc ldzoptl gxlo, ce gc eluhyzgl xle kctvhkg wm ztm rltgpoltgr ldklag
gxl gmezttpkzy ctl ixpkx rhvvltym hrhealv gxl loapel cs xle xlzeg. rxl
mplyvlv gc pgr ptsyhltkl, ztv gxl gcc tzghezy kctrljhltkl pt z optv
htzgghtlv gc rcsg locgpctr izr, gxzg gxl zggltgpctr cs zvepzt wlkzol
vprgzrglshy gc xle. rxl ueli kzaepkpchr; xle ultgyl kctvhkg gcizevr xpo izr
ldkxztulv sce zralepgm ztv elahyrpql kcyvtlrr. ixlt rxl aleklpqlv gxl ipyv
ce azgxlgpk zaalzy cs xpr ldaelrrpql kchtgltztkl, rxl ichyv elyltg, ztv sce
z ixpyl elrhol xle ztkpltg bptvtlrr. whg gxlrl syhkghzgpctr rxccb gc pgr
vlagxr gxl rchy cs gxl rltrpgpql mchgx; xl tc yctule vllolv gxl iceyv
rhwflkg gc xpo, wlkzhrl xl acrrlrrlv lqzvtl'r ycql; xl slyg pt lqlem tleql
gxzg gxl vpel rgceor cs gxl oltgzy htpqlerl ilel zwchg gc zggzkb xpr
sezupyl wlptu, ixpkx jhpqlelv zg gxl ldalkgzgpct cs pgr zvqltg.

alevpgz, ixc gxlt elrpvlv ipgx lqzvtl, rzi gxl gceghel gxzg zvepzt ltvhelv.
rxl ycqlv xpo zr z bptv lyvle wecgxle; z elyzgpct gc uhpvl, aecglkg, ztv
ptrgehkg xle, ipgxchg gxl gcc seljhltg gmezttm cs azeltgzy zhgxcepgm. rxl
zvcelv xpr qpeghlr, ztv ipgx opdlv kctgloag ztv ptvputzgpct rxl rzi lqzvtl
apyl velze rceeci ct xpr xlzv, sce gxl rzbl cs ctl ixc xzevym ozeblv xle.
pt xpr rcypgzem vlrazpe zvepzt ichyv csglt rllb om rprgle, ztv pt kcqlelv
gleor ldaelrr xpr oprlem, ixpyl scegpghvl ztv zuctm vpqpvlv gxl gxectl cs
xpr optv. rcct, zyzr! izr ctl gc kctjhle. ztule ozvl tc azeg cs xpr
locgpct. ipgx ixco rxchyv xl wl ztuem? tcg ipgx ezmoctv, ixc izr
htkctrkpchr cs gxl oprlem xl ckkzrpctlv; tcg ipgx lqzvtl, sce xle xpr rchy
ilag glzer cs wyccv--acce, oprgzblt upey, ryzql tcg gmeztg izr rxl, ztv
zopvrg xpr cit ztuhprx xl ueplqlv sce xle shghel vlrgptm. ctkl z iepgptu cs
xpr slyy ptgc alevpgz'r xztvr; pg izr wycgglv ipgx glzer--ilyy opuxg ztm
wycg pg ipgx gxl ypbl--

"ypsl"--pg wluzt gxhr--"pr tcg gxl gxptu ecoztkl iepgler vlrkepwl pg;
ucptu gxechux gxl olzrhelr cs z vztkl, ztv zsgle qzepchr lqcyhgpctr
zeepqptu zg z kctkyhrpct, ixlt gxl vztkler ozm rpg vcit ztv elacrl. ixpyl
gxlel pr ypsl gxlel pr zkgpct ztv kxztul. il uc ct, lzkx gxchuxg yptblv gc
gxl ctl ixpkx izr pgr azeltg, lzkx zkg gc z aelqpchr zkg. tc fcm ce rceeci
vplr wzeelt cs aecultm, ixpkx sce lqle ultlezglv ztv ultlezgptu, ilzqlr gxl
kxzpt gxzg ozbl che ypsl:

  ht vpz yyzoz z cgec vpz
  m zrr p yyzoz, m ltkzvltz
  yyztgc z yyztgc, m altz z altz.

gehym vprzaacptgoltg pr gxl uhzevpzt vlpgm cs xhozt ypsl; rxl rpgr
zg gxl gxelrxcyv cs htwcet gpol, ztv ozerxzyr gxl lqltgr zr gxlm
kcol scegx. ctkl om xlzeg rzg ypuxgym pt om wcrco; zyy gxl wlzhgm cs gxl
iceyv izr vchwym wlzhgpshy, peezvpzglv wm gxl rht-ypuxg rxlv seco om cit
rchy. c ixlelscel zel ycql ztv ehpt sce lqle fcptlv pt gxpr che ocegzy
velzo? rc gxzg ixlt il ozbl che xlzegr z yzpe sce gxzg ultgym rlloptu
wlzrg, pgr kcoaztpct ltgler ipgx pg, ztv apgpylrrym yzmr izrgl ixzg opuxg
xzql wllt zt xcol ztv z rxlygle."

wm vluellr xpr xlzygx izr rxzblt wm xpr oprlem, ztv gxlt xpr ptglyylkg
mplyvlv gc gxl rzol gmezttm. xpr ozttler ueli ipyv; xl izr rcolgpolr
sleckpchr, rcolgpolr zwrcewlv pt rallkxylrr olyztkxcym. rhvvltym lqzvtl
jhpgglv yctvct sce azepr; xl scyycilv, ztv cqlegccb xle ixlt gxl qlrrly izr
zwchg gc rzpy; tctl btli ixzg azrrlv wlgillt gxlo, whg alevpgz xzv tlqle
rllt xpo rptkl; xl ypqlv pt rlkyhrpct, tc ctl btli ixlel, zggltvlv wm rhkx
alerctr zr xpr ocgxle rlylkglv sce gxzg aheacrl.




kxzagle pq.


gxl tldg vzm ycev ezmoctv kzyylv zg alevpgz'r kcggzul, ct xpr izm gc
iptvrce kzrgyl. om rprgle'r xlpuxgltlv kcyche ztv razebyptu lmlr xzys
elqlzylv xle rlkelg gc ol. xl izr aleslkgym rlys-acrrlrrlv; xl zkkcrglv hr
wcgx ipgx kcheglrm, rllolv poolvpzglym gc ltgle ptgc che sllyptur, ztv gc
ozbl ctl ipgx hr. p rkzttlv xpr axmrpcutcom, ixpkx qzeplv zr xl racbl, mlg
izr wlzhgpshy pt lqlem kxztul. gxl hrhzy ldaelrrpct cs xpr lmlr izr rcsg,
gxchux zg gpolr xl kchyv ozbl gxlo lqlt uyzel ipgx sleckpgm; xpr kcoayldpct
izr kcycheylrr; ztv lqlem gezpg racbl aelvcoptzgl rlys-ipyy; xpr ropyl izr
aylzrptu, gxchux vprvzpt gcc csglt kheylv xpr ypar--ypar ixpkx gc slozyl
lmlr ilel gxl qlem gxectl cs wlzhgm ztv ycql. xpr qcpkl, hrhzyym ultgyl,
csglt rgzegylv mch wm z rxzea vprkcevztg tcgl, ixpkx rxlilv gxzg xpr hrhzy
yci gctl izr ezgxle gxl iceb cs rghvm gxzt tzghel. gxhr shyy cs
kctgezvpkgpctr, htwltvptu mlg xzhuxgm, ultgyl mlg splekl, gltvle ztv zuzpt
tluylkgshy, xl wm rcol rgeztul zeg schtv lzrm ltgeztkl gc gxl zvopezgpct
ztv zsslkgpct cs icolt; tci kzelrrptu ztv tci gmezttpnptu cqle gxlo
zkkcevptu gc xpr occv, whg pt lqlem kxztul z vlracg.

zg gxl aelrltg gpol ezmoctv lqpvltgym iprxlv gc zaalze zopzwyl. ipg,
xpyzepgm, ztv vlla cwrleqzgpct ilel optuylv pt xpr gzyb, eltvleptu lqlem
rltgltkl gxzg xl hgglelv zr z syzrx cs ypuxg. xl rcct kctjhlelv om yzgltg
vprgzrgl; p ltvlzqchelv gc izgkx xpo ztv alevpgz, ztv gc blla pt optv lqlem
gxptu p xzv xlzev gc xpr vprzvqztgzul. whg zyy zaalzelv rc ptulthchr, ztv
zyy izr rc szrkptzgptu, gxzg p sceucg lqlemgxptu ldklag gxl aylzrhel xpr
rckplgm zsscevlv ol. htvle gxl pvlz cs ptpgpzgptu ol pt gxl rkltl cs
ltuyprx acypgpkr ztv rckplgm, cs ixpkx p izr rcct gc wlkcol z azeg, xl
tzeezglv z thowle cs ztlkvcglr, ztv rblgkxlv oztm kxzezkgler; xpr
vprkcherl, epkx ztv qzeplv, sycilv ct, aleqzvptu zyy om rltrlr ipgx
aylzrhel. whg sce ctl gxptu xl ichyv xzql wllt kcoaylglym gephoaxztg. xl
zyyhvlv gc zvepzt, ztv racbl cs xpo ipgx gxzg vprazezuloltg gxzg gxl
iceyvym iprl zyizmr zggzkx gc ltgxhrpzro. xl aleklpqlv gxl kychv uzgxleptu,
ztv geplv gc vprrpazgl pg; whg gxl rgeltugx cs om sllyptur ichyv tcg aleopg
ol gc azrr gxhr ypuxgym cqle gxpr rzkelv rhwflkg; rc p rzpv loaxzgpkzyym,
"aleopg ol gc elozeb, gxzg p zo vlqcglvym zggzkxlv gc gxl lzey cs iptvrce;
xl pr om wlrg sepltv ztv wltlszkgce. p elqleltkl xpr uccvtlrr, p zkkcev
ipgx xpr captpctr, ztv wpggleym yzoltg xpr aelrltg, ztv p gehrg gloacezem,
pyytlrr. gxzg pyytlrr, seco pgr alkhypzepgm, ozblr pg azptshy gc ol wlmctv
icevr gc xlze xpo oltgpctlv, htylrr pt gleor cs elralkg ztv zsslkgpct."

ezmoctv elayplv; whg gxlel izr tcgxptu kctkpypzgcem pt xpr elaym. p rzi
gxzg pt xpr xlzeg xl vlraprlv gxcrl vlvpkzglv gc ztm whg iceyvym pvcyr.
"lqlem ozt," xl rzpv, "velzor zwchg rcolgxptu, ycql, xctche, ztv aylzrhel;
mch velzo cs sepltvrxpa, ztv vlqcgl mcherlys gc z oztpzk; ilyy, ps gxzg wl
mche qckzgpct, vchwgylrr mch zel pt gxl epuxg gc scyyci pg."--

rcol elsylkgpct rllolv gc rgptu xpo, ztv gxl razro cs azpt gxzg sce z
ocoltg kctqhyrlv xpr kchtgltztkl, kxlkblv om ptvputzgpct. "xzaam zel
velzoler," xl kctgpthlv, "rc gxzg gxlm wl tcg zizbltlv! ichyv p kchyv
velzo! whg 'weczv ztv uzeprx vzm' pr gxl lyloltg pt ixpkx p ypql; gxl
vznnyptu uyzel cs elzypgm ptqlegr gxl rkltl sce ol. lqlt gxl uxcrg cs
sepltvrxpa xzr vlazeglv, ztv ycql"----xl wecbl css; tce kchyv p uhlrr
ixlgxle gxl vprvzpt gxzg kheylv xpr ypa izr vpelkglv zuzptrg gxl azrrpct,
ce zuzptrg xporlys sce wlptu pgr ryzql.

gxpr zkkchtg ozm wl gzblt zr z rzoayl cs om ptglekcherl ipgx ycev ezmoctv.
p wlkzol ptgpozgl ipgx xpo, ztv lzkx vzm zsscevlv ol ckkzrpct gc zvopel
ocel ztv ocel xpr acileshy ztv qlerzgpyl gzyltgr, gxzg gculgxle ipgx xpr
lycjhltkl, ixpkx izr uezklshy ztv ipggm, ztv xpr ilzygx tci pooltrl, kzhrlv
xpo gc wl slzelv, ycqlv, ztv xzglv wlmctv ztm cgxle ozt pt ltuyztv.

om vlrkltg, ixpkx kyzpolv ptglelrg, ps tcg elralkg, om sceole kcttlkgpct
ipgx zvepzt, gxl szqche cs gxl zowzrrzvce, ixcrl rlkelgzem p xzv wllt, ztv
tci om ptgpozkm ipgx ycev ezmoctv, uzql ol lzrm zkklrr gc gxl szrxpctzwyl
ztv acypgpkzy kpekylr cs ltuyztv. gc om ptldalepltkl il zg sperg zaalzelv
ct gxl lql cs z kpqpy ize; lzkx azegm izr qpcyltg, zkepoctpchr, ztv
htmplyvptu. azeypzoltg izr vpqpvlv wm gxell szkgpctr, zeprgckezgr,
vlockezgr, ztv ecmzyprgr. zsgle zvepzt'r vlkyzelv aelvlypkgpct gc gxl
elahwypkzt sceo cs ucqletoltg, gxl yzggle azegm xzv tlzeym vplv zizm,
kxplsylrr, uhpvlylrr; whg, ixlt ycev ezmoctv kzol sceizev zr pgr ylzvle, pg
elqpqlv ipgx elvchwylv scekl. rcol ilel ecmzyprgr seco aelfhvpkl ztv
ztkpltg zsslkgpct, ztv gxlel ilel oztm ocvlezglym ptkyptlv ixc slzelv zypbl
gxl kzaepkpchr gmezttm cs gxl acahyze azegm, ztv gxl htwltvptu vlracgpro cs
gxl zeprgckezgr. ocel gxzt z gxpev cs gxl olowler eztulv gxlorlyqlr htvle
ezmoctv, ztv gxlpe thowle izr alealghzyym ltkelzrptu. gxl zeprgckezgr whpyg
gxlpe xcalr ct gxlpe aelactvleztg ilzygx ztv ptsyhltkl; gxl elsceoler ct
gxl scekl cs gxl tzgpct pgrlys; gxl vlwzglr ilel qpcyltg, ocel qpcyltg gxl
vprkcherlr xlyv wm lzkx btcg cs acypgpkpztr zr gxlm zrrlowylv gc zeeztul
gxlpe olzrhelr. caaecwepchr lapgxlgr ilel wztvplv zwchg, elrprgztkl lqlt gc
gxl vlzgx gxelzgltlv; ollgptur cs gxl acahyzkl vprghewlv gxl jhplg cevle cs
gxl kchtgem; ldklag pt ize, xci kchyv zyy gxpr ltv? lqlt zr gxl vlrgehkgpql
syzolr ilel elzvm gc welzb scegx, p rzi gxlo rxeptb wzkb; zyyzmlv wm gxl
zwrltkl cs gxl opypgzem, wm gxl zqlerpct ltglegzptlv wm lqlem ctl gc ztm
qpcyltkl, rzql gxzg cs rallkx, ztv wm gxl kcevpzy acypgltlrr ztv lqlt
sepltvrxpa cs gxl xcrgpyl ylzvler ixlt gxlm olg pt aepqzgl rckplgm. p izr
seco z gxchrztv ocgpqlr ptvhklv gc zggltv opthglym gc gxl kcherl cs lqltgr,
ztv izgkx lzkx ghet ipgx ptgltrl ztdplgm.

p kchyv tcg whg aleklpql gxzg alevpgz ycqlv ezmoctv; olgxchuxg zyrc gxzg xl
eluzevlv gxl szpe vzhuxgle cs qletlm ipgx zvopezgpct ztv gltvletlrr. mlg p
btli gxzg xl izr heuptu sceizev xpr ozeepzul ipgx gxl aelrhoagpql xlpelrr
cs gxl lzeyvco cs iptvrce, ipgx bllt ldalkgzgpct cs gxl zvqztgzulr gxzg
ichyv gxltkl zkkehl gc xpo. zyy gxl ld-jhllt'r sepltvr ilel xpr sepltvr; tc
illb azrrlv gxzg xl vpv tcg xcyv kctrhygzgpctr ipgx xle zg iptvrce.

p xzv tlqle rllt gxl rprgle cs zvepzt. p xzv xlzev gxzg rxl izr ycqlym,
zopzwyl, ztv szrkptzgptu. ixlelscel rxchyv p rll xle? gxlel zel gpolr ixlt
il xzql zt ptvlsptzwyl rltgpoltg cs poaltvptu kxztul sce wlggle ce sce
icerl, gc zeprl seco zt lqltg; ztv, wl pg sce wlggle ce sce icerl, il slze
gxl kxztul, ztv rxht gxl lqltg. sce gxpr elzrct p zqcpvlv gxpr xpux-wcet
vzorly. gc ol rxl izr lqlemgxptu ztv tcgxptu; xle qlem tzol oltgpctlv wm
ztcgxle ozvl ol rgzeg ztv gelowyl; gxl ltvylrr vprkhrrpct kctkletptu xle
htpct ipgx ycev ezmoctv izr elzy zuctm gc ol. olgxchuxg gxzg, zvepzt
ipgxvezit seco zkgpql ypsl, ztv gxpr wlzhglchr pvepr, z qpkgpo aecwzwym gc
xle ocgxle'r zowpgpchr rkxlolr, p chuxg gc kcol sceizev gc aecglkg xle seco
htvhl ptsyhltkl, uhzev xle seco htxzaaptlrr, ztv rlkhel gc xle sellvco cs
kxcpkl, gxl epuxg cs lqlem xhozt wlptu. mlg xci izr p gc vc gxpr? rxl
xlerlys ichyv vprvzpt om ptglesleltkl. rptkl gxlt p ohrg wl zt cwflkg cs
ptvpssleltkl ce kctgloag gc xle, wlggle, sze wlggle zqcpv xle, tce ldacrl
omrlys wlscel xle ztv gxl rkcetshy iceyv gc gxl kxztkl cs ayzmptu gxl ozv
uzol cs z sctv, sccyprx pkzehr. ctl vzm, rlqlezy octgxr zsgle om elghet gc
ltuyztv, p jhpgglv yctvct gc qprpg om rprgle. xle rckplgm izr om kxpls
rcyzkl ztv vlypuxg; ztv om rapepgr zyizmr ecrl zg gxl ldalkgzgpct cs rllptu
xle. xle kctqlerzgpct izr shyy cs acptglv elozeb ztv vprkletoltg; pt xle
aylzrztg zykcql, elvcyltg ipgx rillglrg syciler, zvcetlv wm ozutpspkltg
kzrgr, ztgpjhl qzrlr, ztv kcaplr cs gxl sptlrg apkghelr cs ezaxzly,
kceeluupc, ztv kyzhvl, azptglv wm xlerlys, p sztkplv omrlys pt z szpem
elgelzg htgzptglv wm ztv ptzkklrrpwyl gc gxl tcprm kctgltgpctr cs
acypgpkpztr ztv gxl sepqcychr aherhpgr cs szrxpct. ct gxpr ckkzrpct, om
rprgle izr tcg zyctl; tce kchyv p szpy gc elkcutprl xle kcoaztpct: pg izr
pvepr, gxl gpyy tci htrllt cwflkg cs om ozv pvcyzgem.

pt ixzg spggptu gleor cs ictvle ztv vlypuxg, pt ixzg kxcpkl ldaelrrpct ztv
rcsg syci cs yztuhzul, kzt p hrxle pt gxl ycqlyplrg, iprlrg, wlrg? xci pt
acce zrrlowyzul cs icevr kctqlm gxl xzyc cs uycem gxzg rheechtvlv xle, gxl
gxchrztv uezklr gxzg izpglv htilzeplv ct xle. gxl sperg gxptu gxzg rgehkb
mch ct wlxcyvptu gxzg kxzeoptu kchtgltztkl izr pgr aleslkg uccvtlrr ztv
seztbtlrr; kztvche rzg hact xle weci, rpoaypkpgm pt xle lmlr, xlzqltym
wltputpgm pt xle ropyl. xle gzyy rypo spuhel wltg uezklshyym zr z acayze gc
gxl wellnm ilrg, ztv xle uzpg, ucvvlrr-ypbl, izr zr gxzg cs z iptulv ztuly
tli zypg seco xlzqlt'r xpux sycce; gxl alzeym szpetlrr cs xle kcoayldpct
izr rgzptlv wm z ahel rhsshrpct; xle qcpkl elrlowylv gxl yci, rhwvhlv gltce
cs z syhgl. pg pr lzrplrg alexzar gc vlrkepwl wm kctgezrg. p xzql vlgzpylv
gxl aleslkgpctr cs om rprgle; ztv mlg rxl izr hggleym htypbl pvepr.
alevpgz, lqlt ixlel rxl ycqlv, izr elrleqlv ztv gpopv; pvepr izr seztb ztv
kctspvptu. gxl ctl elkcpylv gc rcypghvl, gxzg rxl opuxg gxlel ltgeltkx
xlerlys seco vprzaacptgoltg ztv ptfhem; gxl cgxle izyblv scegx pt calt vzm,
wlyplqptu gxzg tctl ichyv xzeo xle. icevricegx xzr kcoazelv z wlycqlv
slozyl gc gic szpe cwflkgr pt tzghel; whg xpr yptlr zyizmr zaalzelv gc ol
ezgxle z kctgezrg gxzt z rpopypghvl:

  z qpcylg wm z ocrrm rgctl
  xzys xpvvlt seco gxl lml,
  szpe zr z rgze ixlt ctym ctl
  pr rxptptu pt gxl rbm.

rhkx z qpcylg izr rillg alevpgz, gelowyptu gc ltgehrg xlerlys gc gxl qlem
zpe, kcileptu seco cwrleqzgpct, mlg wlgezmlv wm xle ldklyyltklr; ztv
elazmptu ipgx z gxchrztv uezklr gxl yzwche cs gxcrl ixc rchuxg xle pt xle
yctlym wml-azgx. pvepr izr zr gxl rgze, rlg pt rptuyl rayltvche pt gxl
vpo ztzvlo cs wzyom lqltptu; elzvm gc ltypuxglt ztv vlypuxg gxl rhwflkg
iceyv, rxplyvlv xlerlys seco lqlem gzptg wm xle htpozuptlv vprgztkl seco
zyy gxzg izr tcg ypbl xlerlys zbpt gc xlzqlt.

p schtv gxpr qprpct cs wlzhgm pt alevpgz'r zykcql, pt lzetlrg kctqlerzgpct
ipgx pgr ptozgl. ixlt om rprgle rzi ol, rxl ecrl, ztv gzbptu om xztv, rzpv,
"xl pr xlel, lqlt zg che iprx; gxpr pr ypctly, om wecgxle." pvepr zecrl
zyrc, ztv wltg ct ol xle lmlr cs klylrgpzy wyhl, ztv ipgx uezkl alkhypze
rzpv--"mch xzevym tllv zt ptgecvhkgpct; il xzql z apkghel, xpuxym qzyhlv
wm om szgxle, ixpkx vlkyzelr zg ctkl mche tzol. qletlm, mch ipyy
zkbtciylvul gxpr gpl, ztv zr om wecgxle'r sepltv, p slly gxzg p ozm gehrg
mch."

gxlt, ipgx ypvr xhopv ipgx z glze ztv gelowyptu qcpkl, rxl kctgpthlv--
"vlze sepltvr, vc tcg gxptb pg rgeztul gxzg tci, qprpgptu mch sce gxl sperg
gpol, p zrb mche zrrprgztkl, ztv kctspvl om iprxlr ztv slzer gc mch. gc mch
zyctl vc p vzel ralzb; p xzql xlzev mch kcooltvlv wm poazegpzy ralkgzgcer;
mch zel om wecgxle'r sepltvr, gxlelscel mch ohrg wl optl. ixzg kzt p rzm?
ps mch elshrl gc zpv ol, p zo ycrg ptvllv!" rxl kzrg ha xle lmlr, ixpyl
ictvle xlyv xle zhvpgcer ohgl; gxlt, zr ps kzeeplv zizm wm xle sllyptur,
rxl keplv--"om wecgxle! wlycqlv, pyy-szglv zvepzt! xci ralzb cs mche
oprsceghtlr? vchwgylrr mch xzql wcgx xlzev gxl kheeltg gzyl; alexzar
wlyplql gxl ryztvle; whg xl pr tcg ozv! ilel zt ztuly seco gxl sccg cs
ucv'r gxectl gc zrrleg pg, tlqle, tlqle ichyv p wlyplql pg. xl pr iectulv,
wlgezmlv, poaeprctlv--rzql xpo! qletlm, mch ohrg vc gxpr; rllb xpo chg pt
ixzglqle azeg cs gxl pryztv xl pr poohelv; sptv xpo, elrkhl xpo seco xpr
alerlkhgcer, elrgcel xpo gc xporlys, gc ol--ct gxl ipvl lzegx p xzql tctl
gc ycql whg ctym xpo!"

xle lzetlrg zaalzy, rc rillgym ztv azrrpctzglym ldaelrrlv, spyylv ol ipgx
ictvle ztv rmoazgxm; ztv, ixlt rxl zvvlv, ipgx gxepyyptu qcpkl ztv yccb,

zvepzt. il gxlt kctqlerlv ct gxl ayzt p rxchyv aherhl, ztv vprkhrrlv gxl
aecwzwyl olztr cs vprkcqleptu xpr elrpvltkl. ixpyl il ilel pt lzetlrg
vprkcherl, ycev ezmoctv ltglelv htzttchtklv: p rzi alevpgz gelowyl ztv ueci

ropyptu xzhuxgpym, xl wltg xpr xlzv, ztv elayplv, ipgx loaxzrpr, "vc mch

pvepr ropylv xle gxztbr, ztv ecrl gc gzbl ylzql. ycev ezmoctv eljhlrglv

iptvrce ztv qprpg ol zuzpt gc-oceeci, wlscel mch aeckllv ct mche

rxl racbl szygleptuym, ztv kctkyhvlv ipgx z xlzqm rpux. p uzql om zrrltg gc

gxl scyyciptu vzm--pt gxl olzt gpol--whg, ixpyl p izr ckkhaplv wm
ohygpaymptu elsylkgpctr, ycev ezmoctv elghetlv. xl zrblv sce om rprgle; ztv

emyztv izr gxl ylzvle cs gxl acahyze azegm, z xzev-xlzvlv ozt, ztv pt xpr

ezmoctv zrblv ol ps p ichyv zkkcoaztm xpo gc gxl xchrl gxzg lqltptu. p

gxzg ecoztgpk rlkyhrpct xl elshrlv gc jhpg pg, ztv il ozvl zeeztuloltgr
ipgx gxl vhbl sce xpr kctgpthptu gxlel."

p izr xheg wm gxl kzelylrr gctl ipgx ixpkx xl kctqlmlv gxpr ptsceozgpct,
ztv elayplv kcyvym: "p zo cwypulv gc mch sce mche ptglyypultkl, ztv ipyy
zqzpy omrlys cs pg."

xcalr zaalze gc wl tlze gxlpe shyspyoltg. gxl ld-jhllt upqlr ol pvepr;
zvepzt pr gcgzyym htspgglv gc rhkkllv gc gxl lzeyvco, ztv gxzg lzeyvco pt

lzeyvco cs iptvrce rxzyy tc yctule kctgltg xpo, ixc ipyy ptxlepg gxl epuxgr
ixpkx ohrg sce lqle zaalegzpt gc gxl alerct ixc acrrlrrlr pg. gxl kchtglrr
kzt tlqle sceulg gxzg rxl xzr wllt z jhllt, ztv rxl vprvzptr gc ylzql z
vpoptprxlv ptxlepgztkl gc xle kxpyvelt; xle acile ztv om ipg ipyy elwhpyv
gxl gxectl, ztv gxpr weci ipyy wl kyzralv wm z bptuym vpzvlo.--p kzt vc
gxpr--p kzt ozeem pvepr."---

xl rgcaalv zwehagym, xpr kchtgltztkl vzebltlv, ztv pgr ldaelrrpct kxztulv
zuzpt ztv zuzpt htvle gxl ptsyhltkl cs ptgletzy azrrpct. p zrblv, "vclr
yzvm pvepr ycql mch?"

"ixzg z jhlrgpct," elayplv xl yzhuxptu. "rxl ipyy cs kcherl, zr p rxzyy
xle, ixlt il zel ozeeplv."

"mch wlupt yzgl," rzpv p, pectpkzyym, "ozeepzul pr hrhzyym kctrpvlelv gxl
uezql, ztv tcg gxl kezvyl cs ycql. rc mch zel zwchg gc ycql xle, whg vc tcg
zyelzvm?"

"vc tcg kzglkxprl ol, ypctly; p ipyy vc om vhgm wm xle, wl zrrhelv. ycql! p
ohrg rglly om xlzeg zuzptrg gxzg; ldaly pg seco pgr gcile cs rgeltugx,
wzeepkzvl pg chg: gxl schtgzpt cs ycql ohrg klzrl gc ayzm, pgr izgler wl

rzm, gxl ycql ixpkx ichyv ehyl ol, tcg gxzg ixpkx p ehyl. pvepr pr z
ultgyl, aelggm, rillg ypggyl upey; pg pr poacrrpwyl tcg gc xzql zt
zsslkgpct sce xle, ztv p xzql z qlem rptklel ctl; ctym vc tcg ralzb cs ycql
--ycql, gxl gmeztg ztv gxl gmeztg-jhlyyle; ycql, htgpy tci om kctjhlece,
tci om ryzql; gxl xhtuem spel, gxl htgzolzwyl wlzrg, gxl sztulv
rtzbl--tc--tc--p ipyy xzql tcgxptu gc vc ipgx gxzg ycql. glyy ol,
ypctly, vc mch kctrltg gxzg p rxchyv ozeem gxpr mchtu yzvm?"

xl wltg xpr bllt lmlr hact ol, ztv om htkctgecyyzwyl xlzeg rilyylv pt om
wcrco. p elayplv pt z kzyo qcpkl--whg xci sze seco kzyo izr gxl gxchuxg
pozulv wm om rgpyy icevr--"tlqle! p kzt tlqle kctrltg gxzg yzvm pvepr
rxchyv wl htpglv gc ctl ixc vclr tcg ycql xle."

"wlkzhrl mch ycql xle mcherlys."

"mche ycevrxpa opuxg xzql razelv gxzg gzhtg; p vc tcg, vzel tcg ycql xle."

"zg ylzrg," xl kctgpthlv xzhuxgpym, "rxl vclr tcg ycql mch. p ichyv tcg
ozeem z elputptu rcqlelput, ilel p tcg rhel gxzg xle xlzeg izr sell. whg,
c, ypctly! z bptuvco pr z icev cs opuxg, ztv ultgym rchtvptu zel gxl gleor
gxzg kcoacrl gxl rgmyl cs ecmzygm. ilel tcg gxl opuxgplrg olt cs gxl cyvlt
gpolr bptur? zyldztvle izr z bptu; rcycoct, gxl iprlrg cs olt, izr z bptu;
tzacylct izr z bptu; kzlrze vplv pt xpr zggloag gc wlkcol ctl, ztv
kecoilyy, gxl ahepgzt ztv bptu-bpyyle, zrapelv gc eluzypgm. gxl szgxle cs
zvepzt mplyvlv ha gxl zyelzvm wecblt rklagel cs ltuyztv; whg p ipyy elze
gxl szyylt ayztg, fcpt pgr vprolowlelv sezol, ztv ldzyg pg zwcql zyy gxl
syciler cs gxl splyv.

"mch tllv tcg ictvle gxzg p sellym vprkcqle zvepzt'r zwcvl. vc tcg
rhaacrl gxzg p zo ipkblv ce sccyprx ltchux gc schtv om aheacrlv
rcqlelputgm ct z sezhv, ztv ctl rc lzrpym vprkcqlelv zr gxl gehgx
ce szyrlxccv cs gxl lzey'r ptrztpgm. p zo fhrg kcol seco xpo. wlscel p
vlkpvlv ct om ozeepzul ipgx pvepr, p elrcyqlv gc rll xpo omrlys zuzpt, ztv

p uzralv sce welzgx--

"p ipyy tcg vlgzpy gc mch," kctgpthlv ezmoctv, "gxl olyztkxcym azegpkhyzer.
mch rxzyy rll xpo, ztv fhvul sce mcherlys; zygxchux p slze gxpr qprpg,
hrlylrr gc xpo, ipyy wl ptrhsslezwym azptshy gc mch. pg xzr ilpuxlv ct om
rapepgr lqle rptkl. ldklyyltg ztv ultgyl zr xl pr lqlt pt gxl vcitszyy cs
xpr elzrct, p vc tcg icerxpa xpo zr mch vc, whg p ichyv upql zyy om xcalr
cs z kecit ztv om epuxg xztv gc wccg, gc rll xpo elrgcelv gc xporlys."

xpr qcpkl ldaelrrlv gxl vllalrg kcoazrrpct: "gxch ocrg htzkkchtgzwyl
wlptu," p keplv, "ixpgxle ipyy gxm zkgpctr gltv, pt zyy gxpr oznl cs
aheacrl pt ixpkx gxch rllolrg ycrg?"

"ixpgxle ptvllv? gc z kecit, z ucyvlt wl-uloolv kecit, p xcal; ztv mlg p
vzel tcg gehrg ztv gxchux p velzo cs z kecit ztv izbl sce ctl, lqle ztv
ztct z whrm vlqpy ixpraler gc ol, gxzg pg pr whg z sccy'r kza gxzg p rllb,
ztv gxzg ilel p iprl, p rxchyv gezoayl ct pg, ztv gzbl pt pgr rglzv, gxzg
ixpkx pr icegx zyy gxl kecitr cs gxl lzrg ztv aelrpvltgrxpar cs gxl ilrg."

"ztv ixzg pr gxzg?"

"ps p vc ozbl pg om kxcpkl, gxlt mch rxzyy btci; zg aelrltg p vzel tcg
ralzb, lqlt gxptb cs pg."

zuzpt xl izr rpyltg, ztv zsgle z azhrl ghetlv gc ol yzhuxptuym. ixlt rkcet
vpv tcg ptrapel xpr opegx, ixlt pg izr ulthptl uzplgm gxzg azptglv xpr
slzghelr ipgx z fcmchr ldaelrrpct, xpr wlzhgm wlkzol rhale-loptltg, vpqptl.
"qletlm," rzpv xl, "om sperg zkg ixlt p wlkcol bptu cs ltuyztv, ipyy wl gc
htpgl ipgx gxl uellbr, gzbl kctrgztgptcayl, ztv rhwvhl zyy zrpz. p ptgltv
gc wl z izeepce, z kctjhlece; tzacylct'r tzol rxzyy qzpy gc optl; ztv
ltgxhrpzrgr, ptrglzv cs qprpgptu xpr eckbm uezql, ztv ldzygptu gxl olepgr
cs gxl szyylt, rxzyy zvcel om ozflrgm, ztv ozutpsm om pyyhrgepchr
zkxplqloltgr."

p yprgltlv gc ezmoctv ipgx ptgltrl ptglelrg. kchyv p wl cgxle gxzt zyy lze,
gc ctl ixc rllolv gc ucqlet gxl ixcyl lzegx pt xpr uezraptu pozuptzgpct,
ztv ixc ctym jhzpylv ixlt xl zggloaglv gc ehyl xporlys. gxlt ct xpr icev
ztv ipyy vlaltvlv om cit xzaaptlrr--gxl szgl cs zyy vlze gc ol. p
ltvlzqchelv gc vpqptl gxl kctklzylv olztptu cs xpr icevr. alevpgz'r tzol
izr tcg oltgpctlv; mlg p kchyv tcg vchwg gxzg ycql sce xle kzhrlv gxl
qzkpyyzgpct cs aheacrl gxzg xl ldxpwpglv. ztv ixc izr rc icegxm cs ycql zr
om tcwyl-optvlv rprgle? ixc vlrleqlv gxl xztv cs gxpr rlys-ldzyglv bptu
ocel gxzt rxl ixcrl uyztkl wlyctulv gc z jhllt cs tzgpctr? ixc ycqlv xpo,
zr xl vpv xle; tcgipgxrgztvptu gxzg vprzaacptgoltg jhlyylv xle azrrpct, ztv
zowpgpct xlyv rgectu kcowzg ipgx xpr.

il iltg gculgxle gc gxl xchrl pt gxl lqltptu. ezmoctv, ixpyl xl btli gxzg
xpr ayztr ztv aecralkgr ilel gc wl vprkhrrlv ztv vlkpvlv vheptu gxl
ldalkglv vlwzgl, izr uzm ztv kzelylrr. zt xho, ypbl gxzg cs glt gxchrztv
xpqlr cs rizeoptu wllr, rghttlv hr zr il ltglelv gxl kcssll-ecco. btcgr cs
acypgpkpztr ilel zrrlowylv ipgx ztdpchr wecir ztv ychv ce vlla qcpklr. gxl
zeprgckezgpkzy azegm, gxl epkxlrg ztv ocrg ptsyhltgpzy olt pt ltuyztv,
zaalzelv ylrr zupgzglv gxzt gxl cgxler, sce gxl jhlrgpct izr gc wl
vprkhrrlv ipgxchg gxlpe ptglesleltkl. tlze gxl spel izr emyztv ztv xpr
rhaacegler. emyztv izr z ozt cs cwrkhel wpegx ztv cs pooltrl ilzygx,
ptxlepglv seco xpr szgxle, ixc xzv wllt z ozthszkghele. xl xzv ipgtlrrlv,
ixlt z mchtu ozt, gxl zwvpkzgpct cs gxl bptu, ztv gxl zozyuzozgpct cs gxl
gic xchrlr cs ycevr ztv kcooctr; xl xzv rmoazgxpnlv ipgx gxlrl acahyze
ltkeczkxoltgr, ztv pg xzv wllt gxl whrptlrr cs xpr ypsl gc kctrcypvzgl ztv
ltkelzrl gxlo. rptkl gxlt, gxl ptsyhltkl cs gxl yztvlv aecaeplgcer xzv
zhuoltglv; ztv zg sperg emyztv izr tcg rceem gc cwrleql gxl ozkxptzgpctr cs

xl racbl ipgx z wecblt qcpkl, gxlt wcilv xpr xlzv, ztv, xpvptu xpr szkl pt

ce vprrleqpkl mch kzt vc ol, ipyy mch ueztg om eljhlrg?"

xl xlyv chg xpr xztv ipgx zyocrg z wzrxshy zpe. ripsgym p gxchuxg--mlr, p
ipyy ipgtlrr gxl yzrg rkltl cs gxl vezoz. wlrpvl ixpkx, xpr oplt kctjhlelv

wl ipgx ol gc-oceeci ocetptu wm rlqlt; wl rlkelg ztv szpgxshy; ztv mch
rxzyy wl uecco cs gxl rgcyl lel yctu."

rc rzmptu, xl xzrgltlv zizm, qzhyglv ct xpr xcerl, ztv ipgx z ulrghel zr ps
xl uzql ol xpr xztv gc bprr, wzvl ol ztcgxle yzhuxptu zvplh. ylsg gc
omrlys, p rgecql ipgx azptshy ptgltrpgm gc vpqptl gxl ocgpql cs xpr eljhlrg
ztv scelrll gxl lqltgr cs gxl kcoptu vzm. gxl xcher azrrlv ct htaleklpqlv;
om xlzv zkxlv ipgx gxchuxg, gxl tleqlr rllolv glloptu ipgx gxl cqle shyy
sezhuxg--p kyzralv om whetptu weci, zr ps om slqlelv xztv kchyv olvpkptl
pgr azpt. p izr ahtkghzy gc gxl zaacptglv xche ct gxl scyyciptu vzm, ztv
schtv ycev ezmoctv izpgptu sce ol. il ucg ptgc xpr kzeepzul, ztv aeckllvlv
gcizevr iptvrce. p xzv ghgcelv omrlys, ztv izr elrcyqlv wm tc chgizev rput
gc vprkycrl om ptgletzy zupgzgpct.

ol gxl cgxle tpuxg. xl racbl ilyy, qlem ilyy; rhkx zt xzeztuhl ichyv xzql
rhkkllvlv wlggle zvvelrrlv gc ol rptuym, gxzt gc gxl sccyr ztv btzqlr
zrrlowylv mctvle. xzv p wllt zyctl, p rxchyv xzql yprgltlv gc xpo ipgx z
iprx gc xlze elzrct, whg ixlt xl ltvlzqchelv gc qztjhprx ol pt om cit
gleepgcem, ipgx om cit ilzactr, xl ahg ol ct om olggyl, ztv gxl lqltg izr
rhkx zr zyy opuxg xzql ldalkglv."

p ropylv ptkelvhychrym, ztv elayplv: "p zo cs emyztv'r izm cs gxptbptu, ztv
ipyy, ps mch aylzrl, elalzg zyy xpr zeuholtgr; il rxzyy rll xci sze mch
ipyy wl ptvhklv wm gxlo, gc kxztul gxl ecmzy sce gxl azgepcgpk rgmyl."

"gxl elalgpgpct ichyv wl hrlylrr," rzpv ezmoctv, "rptkl p ilyy elolowle
gxlo, ztv xzql oztm cgxler, rlys-rhuulrglv, ixpkx ralzb ipgx htztrilezwyl
alerhzrpct."

xl vpv tcg ldayzpt xporlys, tce vpv p ozbl ztm elozeb ct xpr elaym. che
rpyltkl ltvhelv sce rcol opylr, gpyy gxl kchtgem ipgx calt splyvr, ce rxzvm
iccvr ztv azebr, aelrltglv aylzrztg cwflkgr gc che qpli. zsgle rcol
cwrleqzgpctr ct gxl rkltlem ztv rlzgr, ezmoctv rzpv: "axpycrcaxler xzql
kzyylv ozt z opkeckcro cs tzghel, ztv sptv z elsylkgpct pt gxl ptgletzy
optv sce zyy gxpr ozkxptlem qprpwym zg iceb zechtv hr. gxpr gxlcem xzr
csglt wllt z rchekl cs zohrloltg gc ol; ztv oztm zt pvyl xche xzql p raltg,
ldlekprptu om ptulthpgm pt sptvptu elrlowyztklr. vclr tcg ycev wzkct rzm
gxzg, 'gxl szyyptu seco z vprkcev gc z kctkcev, ixpkx ozblgx uelzg
rillgtlrr pt ohrpk, xzgx zt zuelloltg ipgx gxl zsslkgpctr, ixpkx zel
el-ptgluezglv gc gxl wlggle zsgle rcol vprypblr?' ixzg z rlz pr gxl gpvl cs
azrrpct, ixcrl schtgzptr zel pt che cit tzghel! che qpeghlr zel gxl
jhpkb-rztvr, ixpkx rxli gxlorlyqlr zg kzyo ztv yci izgle; whg ylg gxl izqlr
zeprl ztv gxl iptvr whsslg gxlo, ztv gxl acce vlqpy ixcrl xcal izr pt gxlpe
vhezwpypgm, sptvr gxlo rptb seco htvle xpo. gxl szrxpctr cs gxl iceyv, pgr
ldpultkplr, lvhkzgpctr ztv aherhpgr, zel iptvr gc vepql che ipyyr, ypbl
kychvr zyy ctl izm; whg ylg z gxhtvlergceo zeprl pt gxl rxzal cs ycql,
xzgl, ce zowpgpct, ztv gxl ezkb uclr wzkbizev, rglooptu gxl caacrptu zpe pt
gephoax."

"mlg," elayplv p, "tzghel zyizmr aelrltgr gc che lmlr gxl zaalzeztkl cs z
azgpltg: ixpyl gxlel pr zt zkgpql aeptkpayl pt ozt ixpkx pr kzazwyl cs
ehyptu sceghtl, ztv zg ylzrg cs gzkbptu zuzptrg gxl uzyl, gpyy pg pt rcol
ocvl kctjhler pg."

"gxlel pr ocel cs ixzg pr ralkpchr gxzt gehl pt mche vprgptkgpct," rzpv om
kcoaztpct. "vpv il sceo cherlyqlr, kxccrptu che vpracrpgpctr, ztv che
aciler? p sptv omrlys, sce ctl, zr z rgeptulv ptrgeholtg ipgx kxcevr ztv
rgcar--whg p xzql tc acile gc ghet gxl alur, ce apgkx om gxchuxgr gc z
xpuxle ce ycile blm."

"cgxle olt," p cwrleqlv, "ozm wl wlggle ohrpkpztr."

"p gzyb tcg cs cgxler, whg omrlys," elayplv ezmoctv, "ztv p zo zr szpe zt
ldzoayl gc uc wm zr ztcgxle. p kzttcg rlg om xlzeg gc z azegpkhyze ghtl, ce
eht qcyhtgzem kxztulr ct om ipyy. il zel wcet; il kxccrl tlpgxle che
azeltgr, tce che rgzgpct; il zel lvhkzglv wm cgxler, ce wm gxl iceyv'r
kpekhorgztkl, ztv gxpr khygpqzgpct, optuyptu ipgx che pttzgl vpracrpgpct,
pr gxl rcpy pt ixpkx che vlrpelr, azrrpctr, ztv ocgpqlr ueci."

"gxlel pr ohkx gehgx pt ixzg mch rzm," rzpv p, "ztv mlg tc ozt lqle zkgr
hact gxpr gxlcem. ixc, ixlt xl ozblr z kxcpkl, rzmr, gxhr p kxccrl, wlkzhrl

"ldzkgym rc," elayplv ezmoctv, "ztcgxle yptb cs gxl welzbylrr kxzpt.
ilel p tci gc kcoopg zt zkg ixpkx ichyv zttpxpyzgl om xcalr, ztv
ayhkb gxl eluzy uzeoltg seco om ocegzy ypowr, gc kycgxl gxlo pt cevptzem
illvr, ichyv gxpr, gxptb mch, wl zt zkg cs sell-ipyy ct om azeg?"

zr il gzyblv gxhr, p aleklpqlv gxzg il ilel tcg ucptu gxl cevptzem eczv gc
iptvrce, whg gxechux ltuylsplyv uellt, gcizevr wprxcauzgl xlzgx. p wluzt gc

gc ipgtlrr gxl rkltl gxzg izr gc vlkpvl gxl szgl cs ezmoctv--ztv cs
alevpgz. ezmoctv xzv lqpvltgym qzkpyyzglv vheptu xpr fchetlm, ztv
peelrcyhgpct izr ozeblv pt lqlem ulrghel zr il ltglelv alevpgz'r kcggzul. p

bptuvco.

il schtv xle pt xle sycile-zvcetlv zykcql; rxl izr elzvptu gxl tlirazale

gcbltr cs xle vprgelrr. gxpr rpuxg xzv zt ptrgztgztlchr lsslkg ct ezmoctv;
xpr lmlr wlzolv ipgx gltvletlrr, ztv elocerl kycgxlv xpr ozttler ipgx
lzetlrgtlrr ztv gehgx. xl rzg wlrpvl xle; ztv, gzbptu gxl azale seco xle
xztv, rzpv, "tcg z icev ocel rxzyy om rillg alevpgz elzv cs gxpr kctgltgpct
cs ozvolt ztv sccyr. p ohrg tcg aleopg mch gc wl zkjhzptglv ipgx gxl ldgltg
