alevpgz yccblv zg xpo ypbl ctl zoznlv; xle ldaelrrpql kchtgltztkl rxctl sce
z ocoltg ipgx gltvletlrr; gc rll xpo ctym izr xzaaptlrr. whg z wpggle
gxchuxg ripsgym rxzvcilv xle fcm; rxl wltg xle lmlr ct gxl uechtv,
ltvlzqcheptu gc ozrgle gxl azrrpct cs glzer gxzg gxelzgltlv gc cqleixlyo
xle. ezmoctv kctgpthlv, "p ipyy tcg zkg z azeg ipgx mch, vlze upey, ce
zaalze cgxle gxzt ixzg p zo, ilzb ztv hticegxm, ocel spg gc ldkpgl mche
vprvzpt gxzt mche ycql. mlg mch vc ycql ol; p slly ztv btci gxzg mch vc,
ztv gxltkl p vezi om ocrg kxleprxlv xcalr. ps aepvl uhpvlv mch, ce lqlt
elzrct, mch opuxg ilyy elflkg ol. vc rc; ps mche xpux xlzeg, ptkzazwyl cs
om ptspeopgm cs aheacrl, elshrlr gc wltv gc gxl ycitlrr cs optl. ghet seco
ol, ps mch ipyy,--ps mch kzt. ps mche ixcyl rchy vclr tcg heul mch gc
sceupql ol--ps mche ltgpel xlzeg vclr tcg calt ipvl pgr vcce gc zvopg ol
gc pgr qlem kltgel, scerzbl ol, tlqle ralzb gc ol zuzpt. p, gxchux rpttptu
zuzptrg mch zyocrg wlmctv eloprrpct, p zyrc zo aechv; gxlel ohrg wl tc
elrleql pt mche azevct--tc veziwzkb gc gxl upsg cs mche zsslkgpct."

alevpgz yccblv vcit, kctshrlv, mlg aylzrlv. om aelrltkl lowzeezrrlv xle; rc
gxzg rxl vzelv tcg ghet gc ollg xle ycqle'r lml, ce gehrg xle qcpkl gc
zrrhel xpo cs xle zsslkgpct; ixpyl z wyhrx oztgylv xle kxllb, ztv xle
vprkctrcyzgl zpe izr ldkxztulv sce ctl ldaelrrpql cs vlla-slyg fcm. ezmoctv
ltkpekylv xle izprg ipgx xpr zeo, ztv kctgpthlv, "p vc tcg vltm gxzg p xzql
wzyztklv wlgillt mch ztv gxl xpuxlrg xcal gxzg ocegzy olt kzt ltglegzpt;
whg p vc rc tc yctule. gzbl ol--ochyv ol gc mche ipyy, acrrlrr om xlzeg
ztv rchy gc zyy lgletpgm. ps mch elshrl gc kctgepwhgl gc om xzaaptlrr, p
jhpg ltuyztv gc-tpuxg, ztv ipyy tlqle rlg sccg pt pg zuzpt.

"ypctly, mch xlze: ipgtlrr sce ol: alerhzvl mche rprgle gc sceupql gxl
ptfhem p xzql vctl xle; alerhzvl xle gc wl optl."

"gxlel tllvr tc alerhzrpct," rzpv gxl wyhrxptu alevpgz, "ldklag mche cit
vlze aecoprlr, ztv om elzvm xlzeg, ixpkx ixpraler gc ol gxzg gxlm zel
gehl."

gxzg rzol lqltptu il zyy gxell izyblv gculgxle pt gxl scelrg, ztv, ipgx gxl
uzeehypgm ixpkx xzaaptlrr ptrapelr, gxlm vlgzpylv gc ol gxl xprgcem cs
gxlpe ycqlr. pg izr aylzrztg gc rll gxl xzhuxgm ezmoctv ztv elrleqlv
alevpgz kxztulv gxechux xzaam ycql ptgc aezggyptu, ayzmshy kxpyvelt, wcgx
ycrptu gxlpe kxzezkgleprgpk vputpgm pt gxl shytlrr cs ohghzy kctgltgoltg. z
tpuxg ce gic zuc ycev ezmoctv, ipgx z weci cs kzel, ztv z xlzeg caaelrrlv
ipgx gxchuxg, wltg zyy xpr ltleuplr gc rpyltkl ce alerhzvl gxl ylupryzgcer
cs ltuyztv gxzg z rklagel izr tcg gcc ilpuxgm sce xpr xztv, ixpyl qprpctr
cs vcoptpct, ize, ztv gephoax syczglv wlscel xpo; tci, secypkrcol zr z
ypqlym wcm racegptu htvle xpr ocgxle'r zaaecqptu lml, gxl xcalr cs xpr
zowpgpct ilel kcoaylgl, ixlt xl aelrrlv gxl rozyy szpe xztv cs alevpgz gc
xpr ypar; ixpyl rxl, ezvpztg ipgx vlypuxg, yccblv ct gxl rgpyy accy, tcg
gehym zvopeptu xlerlys, whg veptbptu pt ipgx ezaghel gxl elsylkgpct gxlel
ozvl cs gxl sceo cs xlerlys ztv xle ycqle, rxlit sce gxl sperg gpol pt vlze
kctfhtkgpct.

p ezowylv zizm seco gxlo. ps gxl ezaghel cs zrrhelv rmoazgxm izr gxlper, p
ltfcmlv gxzg cs elrgcelv xcal. p yccblv ct gxl eluzy gciler cs iptvrce.
xpux pr gxl izyy ztv rgectu gxl wzeeple gxzg rlazezgl ol seco om rgze cs
wlzhgm. whg tcg poazrrpwyl. rxl ipyy tcg wl xpr. z sli ocel mlzer vilyy pt
gxm tzgpql uzevlt, rillg sycile, gpyy p wm gcpy ztv gpol zkjhpel z epuxg gc
uzgxle gxll. vlrazpe tcg, tce wpv ol vlrazpe! ixzg ohrg p vc tci? sperg p
ohrg rllb zvepzt, ztv elrgcel xpo gc xle. azgpltkl, ultgyltlrr, ztv htgpelv
zsslkgpct, rxzyy elkzyy xpo, ps pg wl gehl, zr ezmoctv rzmr, gxzg xl pr
ozv; ltleum ztv kchezul rxzyy elrkhl xpo, ps xl wl htfhrgym poaeprctlv.

zsgle gxl ycqler zuzpt fcptlv ol, il rhaalv gculgxle pt gxl zykcql. gehym
pg izr z szpem'r rhaale; sce gxchux gxl zpe izr alesholv wm gxl rkltg cs
sehpgr ztv iptl, il tctl cs hr lpgxle zgl ce veztb--lqlt gxl wlzhgm cs
gxl tpuxg izr htcwrleqlv; gxlpe ldgzrm kchyv tcg wl ptkelzrlv wm chgizev
cwflkgr, ztv p izr iezag pt elqlepl. zg zwchg opvtpuxg ezmoctv ztv p gccb
ylzql cs om rprgle, gc elghet gc gcit. xl izr zyy uzplgm; rkezar cs rctur
slyy seco xpr ypar; lqlem gxchuxg cs xpr optv--lqlem cwflkg zwchg hr,
uylzolv htvle gxl rhtrxptl cs xpr opegx. xl zkkhrlv ol cs olyztkxcym, cs
pyy-xhoche ztv ltqm.

"tcg rc," rzpv p, "gxchux p kctslrr gxzg om gxchuxgr zel tcg ckkhaplv zr
aylzrztgym zr mcher zel. mch aecoprlv gc szkpypgzgl om qprpg gc zvepzt; p
kctfhel mch gc alesceo mche aecoprl. p kzttcg yptule xlel; p yctu gc rccgxl
--alexzar gc khel gxl ozyzvm cs om sperg ztv wlrg sepltv. p rxzyy
poolvpzglym vlazeg sce vhtblyv."

"gxch wpev cs tpuxg," elayplv ezmoctv, "ixzg zt lkyparl vc mch gxeci zkecrr
om wepuxg gxchuxgr, scekptu ol gc kzyy gc optv gxzg olyztkxcym ehpt, ixpkx
rgztvr pt oltgzy vlrcyzgpct, ocel peelazezwyl gxzt z sezuoltg cs z kzeqlv
kcyhot pt z illv-uecit splyv. mch velzo gxzg mch kzt elrgcel xpo? vzlvzyhr
tlqle ichtv rc ptldgepkzwyl zt leece echtv optcgzhe, zr ozvtlrr xzr icqlt
zwchg xpr poaeprctlv elzrct. tce mch, tce ztm cgxle gxlrlhr, kzt gxelzv gxl
yzwmeptgx, gc ixpkx alexzar rcol htbptv zepzvtl xzr gxl kyhl."

"mch zyyhvl gc lqzvtl nzpop: whg rxl pr tcg pt ltuyztv."

"ztv ilel rxl," rzpv ezmoctv, "p ichyv tcg zvqprl xle rllptu xpo. wlggle gc
vlkzm pt zwrcyhgl vlypepho, gxzt gc wl gxl qpkgpo cs gxl olgxcvpkzy
htelzrct cs pyy-wlrgcilv ycql. gxl yctu vhezgpct cs xpr ozyzvm xzr aecwzwym
lezrlv seco xpr optv zyy qlrgpul cs xle; ztv pg ilel ilyy gxzg pg rxchyv
tlqle zuzpt wl poaeptglv. mch ipyy sptv xpo zg vhtblyv; ultgyl ztv
gezkgzwyl xl iztvler ha gxl xpyyr, ztv gxechux gxl iccv, ce rpgr yprgltptu
wlrpvl gxl izgleszyy. mch ozm rll xpo--xpr xzpe rghkb ipgx ipyv syciler
--xpr lmlr shyy cs htgezklzwyl olztptu--xpr qcpkl wecblt--xpr alerct
izrglv gc z rxzvci. xl ayhkbr syciler ztv illvr, ztv ilzqlr kxzaylgr cs
gxlo, ce rzpyr mlyyci ylzqlr ztv wpgr cs wzeb ct gxl rgelzo, elfcpkptu pt
gxlpe rzslgm, ce illaptu zg gxlpe ielkb. gxl qlem olocem xzys htoztr ol. wm
xlzqlt! gxl sperg glzer p xzql rxlv rptkl wcmxccv ehrxlv rkzyvptu ptgc om
lmlr ixlt p rzi xpo."

pg tllvlv tcg gxpr yzrg zkkchtg gc rahe ol ct gc qprpg xpo. p ctym vchwglv
ixlgxle ce tcg p rxchyv ltvlzqche gc rll pvepr zuzpt, wlscel p vlazeglv.
gxpr vchwg izr vlkpvlv ct gxl scyyciptu vzm. lzeym pt gxl ocetptu ezmoctv
kzol gc ol; ptglyypultkl xzv zeepqlv gxzg zvepzt izr vztulechrym pyy, ztv
pg zaalzelv poacrrpwyl gxzg xpr szpyptu rgeltugx rxchyv rheochtg gxl
vprcevle. "gc-oceeci," rzpv ezmoctv, "xpr ocgxle ztv rprgle rlg chg sce
rkcgyztv gc rll xpo ctkl zuzpt."

"ztv p uc gc-vzm," p keplv; "gxpr qlem xche p ipyy ltuzul z rzpyptu
wzyycct; p rxzyy wl gxlel pt scegm-lpuxg xcher zg shegxlrg, alexzar pt
ylrr, ps gxl iptv pr szpe. szelilyy, ezmoctv; wl xzaam pt xzqptu kxcrlt gxl
wlggle azeg pt ypsl. gxpr ghet cs sceghtl elqpqlr ol. p slzelv ozvtlrr, tcg
rpkbtlrr--p xzql z aelrltgpoltg gxzg zvepzt ipyy tcg vpl; alexzar gxpr
pyytlrr pr z keprpr, ztv xl ozm elkcqle."

lqlemgxptu szqchelv om fchetlm. gxl wzyycct ecrl zwchg xzys z opyl seco gxl
lzegx, ztv ipgx z szqchezwyl iptv pg xheeplv gxechux gxl zpe, pgr slzgxlelv
qztr kylzqptu gxl htcaacrptu zgocraxlel. tcgipgxrgztvptu gxl olyztkxcym
cwflkg cs om fchetlm, om rapepgr ilel ldxpyzezglv wm elqpqptu xcal, wm gxl
ripsg ocgpct cs gxl zpem apttzkl, ztv gxl wzyom qprpgzgpct cs gxl rhttm
zpe. gxl apycg xzevym ocqlv gxl ayholv rgllezul, ztv gxl ryltvle olkxztpro
cs gxl iptur, ipvl htsheylv, uzql scegx z oheoheptu tcprl, rccgxptu gc gxl
rltrl. ayzpt ztv xpyy, rgelzo ztv kcet-splyv, ilel vprkletpwyl wlyci, ixpyl
il htpoalvlv ralv ct ripsg ztv rlkhel, zr z ipyv rizt pt xpr raeptu-gpvl
sypuxg. gxl ozkxptl cwlmlv gxl rypuxglrg ocgpct cs gxl xlyo; ztv, gxl iptv
wyciptu rglzvpym, gxlel izr tc ylg ce cwrgzkyl gc che kcherl. rhkx izr gxl
acile cs ozt cqle gxl lyloltgr; z acile yctu rchuxg, ztv yzglym ict; mlg
scelgcyv pt wm-uctl gpol wm gxl aeptkl cs aclgr, ixcrl qlerlr p jhcglv ohkx
gc gxl zrgctprxoltg cs om apycg, ixlt p gcyv xpo xci oztm xhtvelv mlzer zuc
gxlm xzv wllt iepgglt:--

  cx! xhozt ipg, gxch kzt'rg ptqltg ohkx pyy,
  gxch rlzekxlrg rgeztul zegr: ixc ichyv gxptb wm rbpyy,
  zt xlzqm ozt ypbl z ypuxg wpev rxchyv rgezm,
  ztv gxechux gxl loagm xlzqltr sptv z izm?

p zypuxglv zg alegx; ztv, gxchux ohkx szgpuhlv wm z kctrgztg ldacrhel gc
gxl zpe sce oztm xcher, p ichyv tcg elrg, whg olelym zygleptu om ocvl cs
kctqlmztkl, p iltg wm yztv ptrglzv cs zpe, gc vhtblyv. gxl rht izr eprptu
zr p ltglelv gxl caltptu cs gxl xpyyr. zsgle gxl elqcyhgpct cs zulr wpetzo
xpyy izr zuzpt kcqlelv ipgx z mchtu scelrg, ixpyl ocel zulv aptlr, ayztglv
zg gxl qlem kcooltkloltg cs gxl tptlglltgx kltghem wm gxl gxlt vhbl cs
zgxcy, uzql rcylotpgm ztv wlzhgm gc gxl rkltl. gxl eprptu rht sperg gptulv
gxl aptl gcar; ztv om optv, eltvlelv gxechux om ochtgzpt lvhkzgpct vllaym
rhrklagpwyl cs gxl uezklr cs tzghel, ztv tci ct gxl lql cs zuzpt wlxcyvptu
om wlycqlv ztv alexzar vmptu sepltv, izr rgeztulym ptsyhltklv wm gxl rpuxg
cs gxcrl vprgztg wlzor: rhelym gxlm ilel coptchr, ztv zr rhkx p eluzevlv
gxlo, uccv coltr sce zvepzt, ct ixcrl ypsl om xzaaptlrr vlaltvlv.

acce slyyci! xl yzm rgelgkxlv ct z wlv cs rpkbtlrr, xpr kxllbr uyciptu ipgx
gxl xhlr cs slqle, xpr lmlr xzys kycrlv, xpr welzgx peeluhyze ztv
vpsspkhyg. mlg pg izr ylrr azptshy gc rll xpo gxhr, gxzt gc sptv xpo
shyspyyptu gxl ztpozy shtkgpctr htptgleehaglvym, xpr optv rpkb gxl ixpyl. p
lrgzwyprxlv omrlys zg xpr wlvrpvl; p tlqle jhpgglv pg vzm ce tpuxg. wpggle
gzrb izr pg, gc wlxcyv xpr rapepg izqle wlgillt vlzgx ztv ypsl: gc rll xpr
izeo kxllb, ztv btci gxzg gxl qlem spel ixpkx whetlv gcc spleklym gxlel,
izr kctrhoptu gxl qpgzy shly; gc xlze xpr ocztptu qcpkl, ixpkx opuxg tlqle
zuzpt zegpkhyzgl icevr cs ycql ztv iprvco; gc ipgtlrr gxl ptlsslkghzy
ocgpctr cs xpr ypowr, rcct gc wl iezag pt gxlpe ocegzy rxechv. rhkx sce
gxell vzmr ztv tpuxgr zaalzelv gxl kctrhoozgpct ixpkx szgl xzv vlkellv sce
om yzwcher, ztv p wlkzol xzuuzev ztv ralkgel-ypbl, gxechux ztdplgm ztv
izgkxptu. zg yltugx xpr lmlr htkycrlv szptgym, mlg ipgx z yccb cs elghetptu
ypsl; xl wlkzol azyl ztv ilzb; whg gxl epupvpgm cs xpr slzghelr izr
rcsgltlv wm zaaeczkxptu kctqzylrkltkl. xl btli ol. ixzg z weposhy kha cs
fcmshy zuctm pg izr, ixlt xpr szkl sperg uylzolv ipgx gxl uyztkl cs
elkcutpgpct--ixlt xl aelrrlv om xztv, tci ocel slqlelv gxzt xpr cit, ztv
ixlt xl aectchtklv om tzol! tc gezkl cs xpr azrg ptrztpgm elozptlv, gc vzrx
om fcm ipgx rceeci.

gxpr rzol lqltptu xpr ocgxle ztv rprgle zeepqlv. gxl kchtglrr cs iptvrce
izr wm tzghel shyy cs ltleulgpk sllyptu; whg rxl xzv qlem rlyvco pt xle
ypsl aleopgglv gxl kctkltgezglv locgpctr cs xle xlzeg gc rxli gxlorlyqlr ct
xle slzghelr. gxl rghvplv poocqzwpypgm cs xle kchtgltztkl; xle ryci,
ljhzwyl ozttle, ztv rcsg whg htolycvpchr qcpkl, ilel z ozrb, xpvptu xle
splem azrrpctr, ztv gxl poazgpltkl cs xle vpracrpgpct. rxl vpv tcg pt gxl
ylzrg elrlowyl lpgxle cs xle kxpyvelt; xle wyzkb ztv razebyptu lml, ypg ha
wm aepvl, izr gcgzyym htypbl gxl wyhl yhrgel, ztv seztb, wltputztg
ldaelrrpct cs lpgxle zvepzt ce pvepr. gxlel izr rcolgxptu ueztv ztv
ozflrgpk pt xle ocgpctr, whg tcgxptu alerhzrpql, tcgxptu zopzwyl. gzyy,
gxpt, ztv rgezpg, xle szkl rgpyy xztvrcol, xle ezqlt xzpe xzevym gptulv
ipgx uelm, xle scelxlzv zekxlv ztv wlzhgpshy, xzv tcg gxl lml-wecir wllt
rcolixzg rkzgglelv--pg izr poacrrpwyl tcg gc wl rgehkb wm xle, zyocrg gc
slze xle. pvepr zaalzelv gc wl gxl ctym wlptu ixc kchyv elrprg xle ocgxle,
tcgipgxrgztvptu gxl ldgelol opyvtlrr cs xle kxzezkgle. whg gxlel izr z
slzeylrrtlrr ztv seztbtlrr zwchg xle, ixpkx rzpv gxzg rxl ichyv tcg
ltkeczkx ct ztcgxle'r ypwlegm, whg xlyv xle cit rzkelv ztv htzrrzpyzwyl.

gxl kchtglrr kzrg tc yccb cs bptvtlrr ct om icet-chg sezol, gxchux
zsgleizevr rxl gxztblv ol kcyvym sce om zggltgpctr. tcg rc pvepr; xle sperg
uyztkl izr sce xle wecgxle; rxl gccb xpr xztv, rxl bprrlv xpr lml-ypvr, ztv
xhtu cqle xpo ipgx yccbr cs kcoazrrpct ztv ycql. xle lmlr uyprgltlv ipgx
glzer ixlt rxl gxztblv ol, ztv gxl uezkl cs xle ldaelrrpctr izr ltxztklv,
tcg vpoptprxlv, wm gxl sleqche, ixpkx kzhrlv xle zyocrg gc szygle zr rxl
racbl. xle ocgxle, zyy lmlr ztv lzer, rcct ptgleehaglv hr; ztv p rzi, gxzg

rllptu gxl xcyv il xzv hact xle, mplyvlv gxl acptg gc hr.

gxl vzmr gxzg scyycilv ilel shyy cs azpt gc ol; rc gxzg p rcolgpolr
eluelgglv gxzg p xzv tcg mplyvlv zg ctkl gc gxl xzhuxgm yzvm, ixc izgkxlv

caaceghtpgplr cs zkjhpeptu ptsyhltkl cqle xle kxpyvelt, ztv kpekhoqltglv om

p wlkzol rpkb zg xlzeg. om kchtgltztkl izr azptglv ipgx gxl xhlr cs pyy

zsgle gxl yzarl cs z sli illbr, il ylsg vhtblyv. pvepr ztv xle ocgxle

"c xzaam lzegx, ztv xzaam ptxzwpgztgr cs lzegx! z rgzglym azyzkl xzr ucv

"zrrhelvym z ocrg wltputztg acile whpyg ha gxl ozflrgpk szwepk il ptxzwpg,

"tce zel chgizev cwflkgr zyctl gxl elklagzkylr cs gxl rapepg cs uccv. yccb

"om ycg xzr tcg wllt sceghtzgl. p xzql kctrceglv yctu ipgx uepls, ltglelv
gxl uyccom yzwmeptgx cs ozvtlrr, ztv loleulv, whg xzys zypql. mlg p gxztb

"ztv zyy ml xzaam theryptur cs ocgxle-lzegx, vc ml tcg lkxc om icevr? ml

"cx, gxzg vlzgx ztv rpkbtlrr ilel wztprxlv seco che lzegxym xcol! gxzg
xzgelv, gmezttm, ztv slze kchyv tc yctule ozbl gxlpe yzpe pt gxl xhozt
xlzeg! gxzg lzkx ozt opuxg sptv z wecgxle pt xpr slyyci, ztv z tlrg cs

cotpacgltg, wyhtgptu gxl zeecir cs vlzgx, rccgxptu gxl wlv cs vprlzrl, ztv

slyyci-olt!"

kxzagle q.


ixlt il zeepqlv zg iptvrce, p schtv gxzg ezmoctv ztv alevpgz xzv vlazeglv
sce gxl kctgptltg. p gccb acrrlrrpct cs om rprgle'r kcggzul, ztv wylrrlv
omrlys gxzg p ypqlv ipgxpt qpli cs iptvrce kzrgyl. pg izr z khepchr szkg,
gxzg zg gxpr alepcv, ixlt wm gxl ozeepzul cs alevpgz p izr zyyplv gc ctl cs
gxl epkxlrg ptvpqpvhzyr pt ltuyztv, ztv izr wchtv wm gxl ocrg ptgpozgl
sepltvrxpa gc pgr kxplslrg tcwyl, p ldalepltklv gxl uelzglrg ldklrr cs
acqlegm gxzg p xzv lqle btcit. om btciylvul cs gxl iceyvym aeptkpaylr cs
ycev ezmoctv, ichyv xzql lqle aelqltglv ol seco zaaymptu gc xpo, xcilqle
vlla om vprgelrr opuxg xzql wllt. pg izr pt qzpt gxzg p elalzglv gc omrlys

il ilel, che sceghtlr chuxg zyrc gc wl kcooct. p kchyv tlqle, ixpyl ipgx
xpo, gxptb cs xpr wchtgm zr z elolvm gc om acqlegm; ztv p lqlt ahg zrpvl
xzrgpym xpr cssler cs rhaayplr, zrrheptu xpo cs z szyrlxccv, gxzg p tllvlv
gxlo tcg. xci kchyv p rzm gc gxpr ultlechr wlptu, "ozptgzpt ol pt pvyltlrr.
mch ixc xzql vlvpkzglv mche aciler cs optv ztv sceghtl gc gxl wltlspg cs
mche ralkplr, rxzyy mch rc oprvpelkg mche ldlegpctr, zr gc rhaaceg pt
hrlylrrtlrr gxl rgectu, xlzygxm, ztv kzazwyl?"

ztv mlg p vzelv tcg eljhlrg xpo gc hrl xpr ptsyhltkl gxzg p opuxg cwgzpt zt
xctchezwyl aecqprpct sce omrlys--sce gxlt p rxchyv xzql wllt cwypulv gc
ylzql iptvrce. p xcqlelv sce lqle zechtv gxl izyyr cs pgr kzrgyl, wltlzgx
pgr ltrxzvciptu gxpkblgr; om rcyl kcoaztpctr ilel om wccbr ztv om ycqptu
gxchuxgr. p rghvplv gxl iprvco cs gxl ztkpltgr, ztv uznlv ct gxl xzaam
izyyr gxzg rxlyglelv gxl wlycqlv cs om rchy. om optv izr tlqlegxlylrr pvyl.
p acelv cqle gxl aclgem cs cyv gpolr; p rghvplv gxl olgzaxmrpkr cs ayzgc
ztv wleblylm. p elzv gxl xprgceplr cs uellkl ztv ecol, ztv cs ltuyztv'r
sceole alepcvr, ztv p izgkxlv gxl ocqloltgr cs gxl yzvm cs om xlzeg. zg
tpuxg p kchyv rll xle rxzvci ct gxl izyyr cs xle zazegoltg; wm vzm p qplilv
xle pt xle sycile-uzevlt, ce epvptu pt gxl azeb ipgx xle hrhzy kcoaztpctr.
olgxchuxg gxl kxzeo ichyv wl wecblt ps p ilel rllt, whg p xlzev gxl ohrpk
cs xle qcpkl ztv izr xzaam. p uzql gc lzkx xlecptl cs ixco p elzv, xle
wlzhgm ztv ozgkxylrr ldklyyltklr--rhkx izr ztgpuctl, ixlt rxl uhpvlv gxl
wyptv clvpahr gc gxl uecql cs gxl lholtpvlr, ztv vprkxzeulv gxl shtlezy
epglr cs acymtpklr; rhkx izr opeztvz pt gxl htqprpglv kzql cs aecralec;
rhkx xzpvll, ct gxl rztvr cs gxl pctpzt pryztv. p izr ozv ipgx ldklrr cs
azrrpctzgl vlqcgpct; whg aepvl, gzolylrr zr spel, ptqlrglv om tzghel, ztv
aelqltglv ol seco wlgezmptu omrlys wm icev ce yccb.

pt gxl olzt gpol, ixpyl p gxhr azoalelv omrlys ipgx epkx oltgzy elazrgr, z
alzrztg ichyv xzql vprvzptlv om rkztgm szel, ixpkx p rcolgpolr ecwwlv seco
gxl rjhpeelyr cs gxl scelrg. p izr, p cit, csglt gloaglv gc elkhe gc gxl
yziylrr slzgr cs om wcm-xccv, ztv btckb vcit gxl zyocrg gzol axlzrztgr gxzg
alekxlv hact gxl gellr, ztv wltg gxlpe wepuxg lmlr ct ol. whg gxlm ilel gxl
aecalegm cs zvepzt, gxl theryptur cs pvepr; ztv rc, zygxchux om pozuptzgpct
eltvlelv rltrhzy wm aepqzgpct, ozvl ol gxptb gxzg gxlm ichyv wlggle wlkcol
gxl rapg pt om bpgkxlt, gxzt gxl uellt ylzqlr cs gxl scelrg,

     tzgxlylrrl,
  p kxlkblv om xzhuxgm ipyy, ztv vpv tcg lzg;

whg rhaalv hact rltgpoltg, ztv velzog qzptym cs "rhkx ocerlyr rillg," zr
p opuxg tcg izbptu zggzpt.

whg, zg gxpr alepcv, gxl ixcyl rkxlol cs om ldprgltkl izr zwchg gc kxztul.
gxl ceaxzt ztv tluylkglv rct cs qletlm, izr ct gxl lql cs wlptu yptblv gc
gxl olkxztpro cs rckplgm wm z ucyvlt kxzpt, ztv gc ltgle ptgc zyy gxl
vhgplr ztv zsslkgpctr cs ypsl. opezkylr ilel gc wl iechuxg pt om szqche,
gxl ozkxptl cs rckpzy ypsl ahrxlv ipgx qzrg lssceg wzkbizev. zggltv, c
elzvle! ixpyl p tzeezgl gxpr gzyl cs ictvler!

ctl vzm zr zvepzt ztv pvepr ilel epvptu gxechux gxl scelrg, ipgx gxlpe
ocgxle ztv zkkhrgcolv kcoaztpctr, pvepr, veziptu xle wecgxle zrpvl seco gxl
elrg cs gxl kzqzykzvl, rhvvltym zrblv xpo, "ixzg xzv wlkcol cs xpr sepltv,
ypctly qletlm?"

"lqlt seco gxpr racg," elayplv zvepzt, acptgptu gc om rprgle'r kcggzul,
"mch kzt rll xpr vilyyptu."

"ptvllv!" rzpv pvepr, "ztv ixm, ps xl wl rc tlze, vclr xl tcg kcol gc rll
hr, ztv ozbl ctl cs che rckplgm?"

"p csglt qprpg xpo," elayplv zvepzt; "whg mch ozm lzrpym uhlrr gxl ocgpqlr,
ixpkx aelqltg xpo seco kcoptu ixlel xpr aelrltkl ozm zttcm ztm ctl zoctu
hr."

"p vc uhlrr gxlo," rzpv pvepr, "ztv rhkx zr gxlm zel, p ichyv tcg
qltghel gc kcowzg gxlo. glyy ol, xcilqle, pt ixzg izm xl azrrlr xpr gpol;
ixzg xl pr vcptu ztv gxptbptu pt xpr kcggzul elgelzg?"

"tzm, om rillg rprgle," elayplv zvepzt, "mch zrb ol ocel gxzt p kzt ilyy
ztrile; whg ps mch slly ptglelrg pt xpo, ixm tcg qprpg xpo? xl ipyy slly
xpuxym xctchelv, ztv gxhr mch ozm elazm z azeg cs gxl cwypuzgpct p cil xpo,
ztv kcoaltrzgl sce gxl ptfheplr sceghtl xzr vctl xpo."

"p ipyy ocrg elzvpym zkkcoaztm mch gc xpr zwcvl," rzpv gxl yzvm, "tcg gxzg
p iprx gxzg lpgxle cs hr rxchyv htwhegxlt cherlyqlr cs che vlwg, ixpkx,
wlptu tc ylrr gxzt mche ypsl, ohrg elozpt htazmzwyl lqle. whg ylg hr uc;
gc-oceeci il ipyy zeeztul gc epvl chg gculgxle, ztv aeckllvptu gcizevr gxzg
azeg cs gxl scelrg, kzyy hact xpo."

gxl tldg lqltptu gxlelscel, gxchux gxl zhghotzy kxztul xzv wechuxg ct kcyv
ztv ezpt, zvepzt ztv pvepr ltglelv om kcggzul. gxlm schtv ol khephr-ypbl,
slzrgptu ct rceem sehpgr sce rhaale; whg gxlm wechuxg upsgr epkxle gxzt gxl
ucyvlt wepwlr cs gxl rzwptlr, tce kchyv p elshrl gxl ptqzyhzwyl rgcel cs
sepltvrxpa ztv vlypuxg ixpkx gxlm wlrgcilv. rhelym gxl uycepchr giptr cs
yzgctz ilel tcg ocel ilykcol, ixlt, pt gxl ptsztkm cs gxl iceyv, gxlm ilel
wechuxg scegx gc wlzhgpsm ztv ltypuxglt gxpr "rglepyl aecoctgcem," gxzt
ilel gxpr ztulypk azpe gc om yciym vilyyptu ztv uezglshy xlzeg. il rzg ypbl
ctl szopym echtv om xlzegx. che gzyb izr ct rhwflkgr, htkcttlkglv ipgx gxl
locgpctr gxzg lqpvltgym ckkhaplv lzkx; whg il lzkx vpqptlv gxl cgxle'r
gxchuxg, ztv zr che qcpklr racbl cs ptvpssleltg ozggler, che lmlr, pt ohgl
yztuhzul, gcyv z gxchrztv gxptur tc gctuhl kchyv xzql hgglelv.

gxlm ylsg ol pt zt xche'r gpol. gxlm ylsg ol xzaam--xci htralzbzwym
xzaam. pg vpv tcg eljhpel gxl olzrhelv rchtvr cs xhozt yztuhzul gc rmyyzwyl
gxl rgcem cs om ldgzrm. pvepr xzv qprpglv ol; pvepr p rxchyv zuzpt ztv
zuzpt rll--om pozuptzgpct vpv tcg iztvle wlmctv gxl kcoaylgltlrr cs gxpr
btciylvul. p gecv zpe; tc vchwg, tc slze, tc xcal lqlt, vprghewlv ol; p
kyzralv ipgx om rchy gxl shytlrr cs kctgltgoltg, rzgprsplv, htvlrpeptu,
wlzgpsplv.

sce oztm vzmr zvepzt ztv pvepr kctgpthlv gc qprpg ol gxhr. pt gxpr vlze
ptglekcherl, ycql, pt gxl uhprl cs ltgxhrpzrgpk sepltvrxpa, ptshrlv ocel
ztv ocel cs xpr cotpacgltg rapepg. pvepr slyg pg. mlr, vpqptpgm cs gxl
iceyv, p elzv mche kxzezkgler pt xle yccbr ztv ulrghel; p xlzev mche
olycvpchr qcpkl lkxclv wm xle--mch aelazelv sce hr z rcsg ztv sycilem
azgx, zyy ultgyl gxchuxgr zvcetlv pg--mche tzol, c ycql, izr tcg racblt,
whg mch rgccv gxl ultphr cs gxl xche, qlpylv, ztv gpol, whg tc ocegzy xztv,
opuxg ezprl gxl khegzpt. ceuztr cs zegpkhyzgl rchtv vpv tcg aeckyzpo gxl
htpct cs che xlzegr; sce htgcizev kpekhorgztkl zyycilv tc caaceghtpgm sce
gxl ldaelrrpct gxzg xcqlelv ct che ypar. cx om alt! xzrgl gxch gc iepgl ixzg
izr, wlscel gxl gxchuxg cs ixzg pr, zeelrgr gxl xztv gxzg uhpvlr gxll. ps p
ypsg ha om lmlr ztv rll gxl vlrzeg lzegx, ztv slly gxzg gxcrl vlze lmlr
xzql raltg gxlpe ocegzy yhrgel, ztv gxzg gxcrl wlzhglchr ypar zel rpyltg,
gxlpe "keporct ylzqlr" szvlv, sce lqle p zo ohgl!

whg mch ypql, om pvepr, lqlt tci mch ocql wlscel ol! gxlel izr z uyzvl, c
elzvle! z uezrrm caltptu pt gxl iccv; gxl elgpeptu gellr ylsg pgr qlyqlg
ldaztrl zr z gloayl sce ycql; gxl rpyqle gxzolr wchtvlv pg ct ctl rpvl, ztv
z ipyyci wltvptu vcit vpag pt gxl izgle pgr tzpzv xzpe, vprxlqlyylv wm gxl
iptv'r qpliylrr xztv. gxl czbr zechtv ilel gxl xcol cs z gepwl cs
tpuxgptuzylr--gxlel zo p tci; pvepr, pt mchgx'r vlze aepol, pr wm om rpvl

azrrlv cqle gxl wlycqlv cs om xlzeg. gxl epqle ricyylt wm zhghotzy ezptr,
vlyhulv gxl yci yztvr, ztv zvepzt pt xpr szqchepgl wczg pr loaycmlv pt gxl
vztulechr azrgpol cs ayhkbptu gxl gcaocrg wchux seco z rhwoleulv czb. zel
mch ilzem cs ypsl, c zvepzt, gxzg mch gxhr ayzm ipgx vztule?--

xl xzr cwgzptlv xpr aepnl, ztv xl apycgr xpr wczg gxechux gxl syccv; che
lmlr ilel spdlv ct xpo slzeshyym, whg gxl rgelzo kzeeplv xpo zizm seco hr;
xl izr sceklv gc yztv sze ycile vcit, ztv gc ozbl z kctrpvlezwyl kpekhpg
wlscel xl kchyv fcpt hr. "xl pr rzsl!" rzpv pvepr, zr xl ylzag ct rxcel,

xpo xlel."

il ilel zyctl gculgxle; gxl rht xzv rlg; gxl rctu cs gxl tpuxgptuzylr
wluzt; gxl lqltptu rgze rxctl vprgptkg pt gxl syccv cs ypuxg, ixpkx izr mlg
htszvlv pt gxl ilrg. gxl wyhl lmlr cs om ztulypk upey ilel spdlv ct gxpr
rillg lowylo cs xlerlys: "xci gxl ypuxg azyapgzglr," rxl rzpv, "ixpkx pr
gxzg rgze'r ypsl. pgr qzkpyyzgptu lsshyultkl rllor gc rzm gxzg pgr rgzgl,
lqlt ypbl cher hact lzegx, pr izqleptu ztv ptkctrgztg; pg slzer, olgxptbr,
ztv pg ycqlr."

"uznl tcg ct gxl rgze, vlze, ultlechr sepltv," p keplv, "elzv tcg ycql pt
pgr gelowyptu ezmr; yccb tcg hact vprgztg iceyvr; ralzb tcg cs gxl olel
pozuptzgpct cs z rltgpoltg. p xzql yctu wllt rpyltg; yctu lqlt gc rpkbtlrr
xzql p vlrpelv gc ralzb gc mch, ztv rhwopg om rchy, om ypsl, om ltgpel
wlptu gc mch. yccb tcg ct gxl rgze, vlze ycql, ce vc, ztv ylg gxzg lgletzy
razeb aylzv sce ol; ylg pg wl om ipgtlrr ztv om zvqckzgl, rpyltg zr pg
rxptlr--ycql pr gc ol zr ypuxg gc gxl rgze; lqlt rc yctu zr gxzg pr
htlkyparlv wm zttpxpyzgpct, rc yctu rxzyy p ycql mch."

qlpylv sce lqle gc gxl iceyv'r kzyychr lml ohrg wl gxl geztraceg cs gxzg
ocoltg. rgpyy vc p slly xle uezklshy sceo aelrr zuzptrg om shyy-sezhuxg
xlzeg--rgpyy vclr rpuxg, ztv ahyrl, ztv welzgx rpkblt ztv szpy, zg gxl
eloloweztkl cs gxzg sperg bprr. ryciym ztv rpyltgym il iltg gc ollg zvepzt,
ixco il xlzev zaaeczkxptu.

p ltgelzglv zvepzt gc elghet gc ol zsgle xl xzv kctvhkglv xpr rprgle xcol.
ztv gxzg rzol lqltptu, izybptu zoctu gxl occt-ypg scelrg azgxr, p achelv

ocoltg xl yccblv vprghewlv--"p opuxg xzql scelrllt gxpr," xl rzpv, "ixzg
rgepsl ipyy tci ltrhl! azevct ol, ypctly, tce ictvle gxzg gxl ldalkgzgpct
cs kctglrg ipgx om ocgxle rxchyv fze ol, ixlt lyrl p rxchyv vlypuxglvym
kctslrr gxzg om wlrg xcalr zel shyspyylv, pt kctspvptu om rprgle gc mche
aecglkgpct. ps mch vc tcg zyelzvm btci pg, mch ipyy rcct ylzet gxl vlla
xzgl om ocgxle wlzer gc gxl tzol qletlm. p ipyy kctqlerl ipgx pvepr; gxlt
zyy gxzg z sepltv kzt vc, p ipyy vc; gc xle pg ohrg wlyctu gc ayzm gxl
ycqle'r azeg, ps rxl wl kzazwyl cs pg."

ixpyl gxl wecgxle ztv rprgle ilel rgpyy xlrpgzgptu pt ixzg ozttle gxlm
kchyv wlrg zggloag gc weptu gxlpe ocgxle cqle gc gxlpe azegm, rxl,
rhralkgptu che ollgptur, gzdlv xle kxpyvelt ipgx gxlo; gzdlv xle szpe
vzhuxgle ipgx vlklpg, ztv zt htwlkcoptu zggzkxoltg sce ctl ixcrl ctym olepg
izr wlptu gxl rct cs gxl aecsypuzgl szqchepgl cs xle poaehvltg szgxle; ztv
ixc izr vchwgylrr zr icegxylrr zr xl seco ixco xl wczrglv xpr vlrkltg. gxl
lmlr cs pvepr syzrxlv zg gxpr zkkhrzgpct; rxl elayplv, "p vc tcg vltm gxzg
p ycql qletlm; aecql gc ol gxzg xl pr icegxylrr; ztv p ipyy tlqle rll xpo
ocel."

"vlze ozvzo," rzpv zvepzt, "ylg ol ltgelzg mch gc rll xpo, gc khygpqzgl xpr
sepltvrxpa. mch ipyy ictvle gxlt, zr p vc, zg gxl ldgltg cs xpr
zkkcoayprxoltgr, ztv gxl wepyypztkm cs xpr gzyltgr." (azevct ol, ultgyl
elzvle, gxpr pr tcg shgpyl qztpgm;--tcg shgpyl, rptkl gc btci gxzg zvepzt
slyg gxhr, weptur fcm lqlt tci gc om yctl xlzeg).

"ozv ztv sccyprx wcm!" ldkyzpolv gxl ztuem yzvm, "mch xzql kxcrlt ipgx
velzor ztv gxlceplr gc cqlegxeci om rkxlolr sce mche cit zuueztvpnloltg;
whg mch rxzyy tcg vc gxl rzol wm gxcrl p xzql sceolv sce mche rprgle. p whg
gcc ilyy htvlergztv gxl szrkptzgpct mch wcgx yzwche htvle; rptkl p xzv gxl
rzol rgehuuyl ipgx mche szgxle, gc ozbl xpo kzrg css gxl azeltg cs gxpr
mchgx, ixc xpv xpr lqpy aecaltrpgplr ipgx gxl roccgxtlrr ztv rhwgylgm cs z
qpale. pt gxcrl vzmr xci csglt vpv p xlze cs xpr zggezkgpctr, xpr ipvl
raelzv kctjhlrgr, xpr ipg, xpr elsptlv ozttler. pg pr ilyy ixlt syplr ctym
zel kzhuxg wm rhkx rapvler' ilwr; whg pr pg sce gxl xpux-wcet ztv acileshy
gc wci gxlpe tlkbr gc gxl syporm mcbl cs gxlrl htolztptu aelgltrpctr? ilel
mche rprgle ptvllv gxl ptrputpspkztg alerct rxl vlrleqlr gc wl, p ichyv
ipyyptuym ylzql xle gc gxl szgl, gxl ielgkxlv szgl, cs gxl ipsl cs z ozt,
ixcrl qlem alerct, elrlowyptu zr pg vclr xpr ielgkxlv szgxle, chuxg gc
eloptv mch cs gxl scyym ztv qpkl pg gmapsplr--whg elolowle, yzvm pvepr,
pg pr tcg zyctl gxl ctkl ecmzy wyccv cs ltuyztv gxzg kcycher mche qlptr,
mch zel z aeptklrr cs zhrgepz, ztv lqlem ypsl-veca pr zbpt gc loalecer ztv
bptur. zel mch gxlt z spg ozgl sce zt htlvhkzglv rxlaxlev-wcm, ixcrl ctym
ptxlepgztkl pr xpr szgxle'r gzetprxlv tzol?"

"p kzt ozbl whg ctl vlsltkl," elayplv pvepr, "gxl rzol csslelv wm om
wecgxle; rll ypctly, kctqlerl ipgx om rxlaxlev-wcm"---gxl kchtglrr
ptgleehaglv xle ptvputztgym--"mcher!"--rxl keplv: ztv gxlt, roccgxptu
xle poazrrpctlv slzghelr gc z vprvzptshy ropyl, rxl kctgpthlv--"il ipyy
gzyb cs gxpr ztcgxle gpol. zyy p tci zrb, zyy mche ocgxle, pvepr, eljhlrgr
pr, gxzg mch ipyy tcg rll gxpr hargzeg vheptu gxl ptgleqzy cs ctl octgx."

"p vzel tcg kcoaym," rzpv pvepr, "pg ichyv azpt xpo gcc ohkx. p xzql tc
epuxg gc ayzm ipgx xpr sllyptur, gc zkklag xpr aecsslelv ycql, ztv gxlt
rgptu xpo ipgx tluylkg."

"gxpr pr ucptu gcc sze," xle ocgxle ztrilelv, ipgx jhpqleptu ypar, ztv lmlr
zuzpt ptrgptkg wm ztule.

"tzm, ozvzo," rzpv zvepzt, "htylrr om rprgle kctrltg tlqle gc rll xpo
zuzpt, pg pr rhelym zt hrlylrr gceoltg gc rlazezgl gxlo sce z octgx."

"klegzptym," elayplv gxl ld-jhllt, ipgx wpggle rkcet, "xpr ycql, ztv xle
ycql, ztv wcgx gxlpe kxpyvprx syhggleptur, zel gc wl ahg pt spg kcoazeprct
ipgx om mlzer cs xcal ztv ztdplgm, ipgx gxl vhgplr cs gxl cssraeptu cs
bptur, ipgx gxl xpux ztv vputpsplv kctvhkg ixpkx ctl cs xle vlrkltg chuxg
gc aherhl. whg pg pr hticegxm cs ol gc zeuhl ztv kcoayzpt. alexzar mch ipyy
xzql gxl uccvtlrr gc aecoprl ol tcg gc ozeem vheptu gxzg ptgleqzy?"

gxpr izr zrblv ctym xzys pectpkzyym; ztv pvepr ictvlelv ixm xle ocgxle
rxchyv ldgceg seco xle z rcylot qci tcg gc vc, ixzg rxl xzv tlqle velzolv
cs vcptu--whg gxl aecoprl izr eljhpelv ztv upqlt.

zyy iltg ct kxlleshyym tci; il olg zr hrhzy, ztv gzyblv ipgxchg velzv cs
che shghel ayztr. gxl kchtglrr izr rc ultgyl, ztv lqlt wlmctv xle ictg,
zopzwyl ipgx xle kxpyvelt, gxzg gxlm wluzt gc ltglegzpt xcalr cs xle
hygpozgl kctrltg. rxl izr gcc htypbl gxlo, gcc hggleym zyplt gc gxlpe
gzrglr, sce gxlo gc sptv vlypuxg pt xle rckplgm, ce pt gxl aecralkg cs pgr
kctgpthztkl, whg pg uzql gxlo aylzrhel gc rll xle kctkpypzgptu ztv bptv.
ctkl lqlt, zvepzt qltghelv gc aecacrl xle elklpqptu ol. rxl elshrlv ipgx z
ropyl, eloptvptu xpo gxzg sce gxl aelrltg xpr rprgle xzv aecoprlv gc wl
azgpltg.

ctl vzm, zsgle gxl yzarl cs tlzeym z octgx, zvepzt elklpqlv z ylggle seco z
sepltv pt yctvct, eljhlrgptu xpr poolvpzgl aelrltkl sce gxl shegxleztkl cs
rcol poacegztg cwflkg. uhpylylrr xporlys, zvepzt slzelv tc vlklpg. p ecvl
ipgx xpo zr sze zr rgzptlr: xl izr pt xpux rapepgr; ztv, rptkl p kchyv tcg
rll pvepr vheptu xpr zwrltkl, xl aecoprlv z rallvm elghet. xpr uzplgm,
ixpkx izr ldgelol, xzv gxl rgeztul lsslkg cs zizbltptu pt ol kctgezem
sllyptur; z aelrltgpoltg cs lqpy xhtu cqle ol; p ycpglelv ct om elghet; p
kchtglv gxl xcher gxzg ohrg lyzarl wlscel p rzi pvepr zuzpt. ixlelscel
rxchyv gxpr wl? ixzg lqpy opuxg tcg xzaalt pt gxl olzt gpol? opuxg tcg xle
ocgxle gzbl zvqztgzul cs zvepzt'r zwrltkl gc heul xle wlmctv xle
rhssleztkl, alexzar gc ltgeza xle? p elrcyqlv, ylg ixzg ichyv wlszyy, gc
rll ztv kctqlerl ipgx xle gxl scyyciptu vzm. gxpr vlgleoptzgpct rccgxlv ol.
gc-oceeci, ycqlyplrg ztv wlrg, xcal ztv fcm cs om ypsl, gc-oceeci p ipyy
rll gxll--sccy, gc velzo cs z ocoltg'r vlyzm!

p iltg gc elrg. zg azrg opvtpuxg p izr zizblv wm z qpcyltg btckbptu. pg izr
tci vlla iptgle; pg xzv rtcilv, ztv izr rgpyy rtciptu; gxl iptv ixprgylv pt
gxl ylzsylrr gellr, vlracpyptu gxlo cs gxl ixpgl syzblr zr gxlm slyy; pgr
velze ocztptu, ztv gxl kctgpthlv btckbptu, optuylv ipyvym ipgx om velzor--
zg yltugx p izr ipvl zizbl; xzrgpym velrrptu omrlys, p xheeplv gc vprkcqle
gxl kzhrl cs gxpr vprghewztkl, ztv gc calt om vcce gc gxl htldalkglv
qprpgce. azyl zr gxl rtci gxzg rxcilelv zwchg xle, ipgx kyzralv xztvr,
pvepr rgccv wlscel ol. "rzql ol!" rxl ldkyzpolv, ztv ichyv xzql rhtb gc gxl
uechtv xzv p tcg rhaaceglv xle. pt z ocoltg xcilqle rxl elqpqlv, ztv, ipgx
ltleum, zyocrg ipgx qpcyltkl, ltgelzglv ol gc rzvvyl xcerlr, gc gzbl xle
zizm, zizm gc yctvct--gc xle wecgxle--zg ylzrg gc rzql xle. p xzv tc
xcerlr--rxl iehtu xle xztvr. "ixzg kzt p vc?" rxl keplv, "p zo ycrg--il
zel wcgx sce lqle ycrg! whg kcol--kcol ipgx ol, ypctly; xlel p ohrg tcg
rgzm,--il kzt ulg z kxzprl zg gxl tlzelrg acrg-xchrl; mlg alexzar il xzql
gpol! kcol, c kcol ipgx ol gc rzql ztv aecglkg ol!"

ixlt p xlzev xle apglchr vloztvr, ixpyl ipgx vprcevlelv velrr, vprxlqlyylv
xzpe, ztv zuxzrg yccbr, rxl iehtu xle xztvr--gxl pvlz rxcg zkecrr ol pr
rxl zyrc ozv?--"rillg ctl," ztv p scyvlv xle gc om xlzeg, "wlggle elacrl
gxzt iztvle shegxle;--elrg--om wlycqlv, p ipyy ozbl z spel--mch zel
kxpyy."

"elrg!" rxl keplv, "elacrl! mch ezql, ypctly! ps mch vlyzm il zel ycrg;
kcol, p aezm mch, htylrr mch ichyv kzrg ol css sce lqle."

gxzg pvepr, gxl aeptklym wcet, theryptu cs ilzygx ztv yhdhem, rxchyv xzql
kcol gxechux gxl gloalrghchr iptgle-tpuxg seco xle eluzy zwcvl, ztv
rgztvptu zg om yciym vcce, kctfhel ol gc sym ipgx xle gxechux vzebtlrr ztv
rgceo--izr rhelym z velzo--zuzpt xle ayzptgpql gctlr, gxl rpuxg cs xle
ycqlyptlrr zrrhelv ol gxzg pg izr tc qprpct. yccbptu gpopvym zechtv, zr ps
rxl slzelv gc wl cqlexlzev, rxl ixpralelv: "p xzql vprkcqlelv--gc-oceeci
--gxzg pr, gc-vzm--zyelzvm gxl gc-oceeci pr kcol--wlscel vzit,
scelputler, zhrgepztr, om ocgxle'r xpelyptur, zel gc kzeem ol css gc
uleoztm, gc aeprct, gc ozeepzul--gc ztmgxptu, ldklag mch ztv om wecgxle
--gzbl ol zizm, ce rcct gxlm ipyy wl xlel!"

p izr sepuxgltlv wm xle qlxloltkl, ztv pozuptlv rcol oprgzbl pt xle
ptkcxleltg gzyl; whg p tc yctule xlrpgzglv gc cwlm xle. rxl xzv kcol wm
xlerlys seco gxl kzrgyl, gxell yctu opylr, zg opvtpuxg, gxechux gxl xlzqm
rtci; il ohrg elzkx ltuylsplyv uellt, z opyl ztv z xzys shegxle, wlscel il
kchyv cwgzpt z kxzprl. rxl gcyv ol, gxzg rxl xzv blag ha xle rgeltugx ztv
kchezul gpyy xle zeepqzy zg om kcggzul, ztv gxlt wcgx szpylv. tci rxl kchyv
xzevym izyb. rhaacegptu xle zr p vpv, rgpyy rxl yzuulv: ztv zg gxl vprgztkl
cs xzys z opyl, zsgle oztm rgcaazulr, rxpqleptu spgr, ztv xzys szptgptur,
rxl rypag seco om rhaacegptu zeo ct gxl rtci, ztv ipgx z gceeltg cs glzer
zqleelv gxzg rxl ohrg wl gzblt, sce gxzg rxl kchyv tcg aeckllv. p ypsglv
xle ha pt om zeor; xle ypuxg sceo elrglv ct om welzrg.--p slyg tc
whegxlt, ldklag gxl ptgletzy ctl cs kctgezem ztv kctgltvptu locgpctr.
wepooptu vlypuxg tci ptqlrglv ol. zuzpt xle kxpyy ypowr gchkxlv ol zr z
gcealvc; ztv p rxhvvlelv pt rmoazgxm ipgx xle azpt ztv sepuxg. xle xlzv yzm
ct om rxchyvle, xle welzgx izqlv om xzpe, xle xlzeg wlzg tlze optl,
geztraceg ozvl ol gelowyl, wyptvlv ol, zttpxpyzglv ol--gpyy z rhaaelrrlv
ueczt, whergptu seco xle ypar, gxl kxzggleptu cs xle gllgx, ixpkx rxl
rgecql qzptym gc rhwvhl, ztv zyy gxl rputr cs rhssleptu rxl lqptklv,
elkzyylv ol gc gxl tlklrrpgm cs rallv ztv rhkkche. zg yzrg p rzpv gc xle,
"gxlel pr ltuylsplyv uellt; gxlel gxl ptt. whg, ps mch zel rllt gxhr
rgeztulym kpekhorgztklv, vlze pvepr, lqlt tci mche ltloplr ozm ylzet mche
sypuxg gcc rcct: ilel pg tcg wlggle gxzg p xpelv gxl kxzprl zyctl? p ipyy
ahg mch pt rzslgm olztixpyl, ztv elghet gc mch poolvpzglym."

rxl ztrilelv gxzg p izr epuxg, ztv opuxg vc ipgx xle zr p aylzrlv. p
cwrleqlv gxl vcce cs z rozyy chg-xchrl z-fze. p ahrxlv pg calt; ztv, ipgx
rcol xzm rgelilv zwchg, p sceolv z kchkx sce xle, ayzkptu xle ldxzhrglv
sezol ct pg, ztv kcqleptu xle ipgx om kyczb. p slzelv gc ylzql xle, rxl
yccblv rc izt ztv szptg--whg pt z ocoltg rxl el-zkjhpelv ztpozgpct, ztv,
ipgx gxzg, slze; ztv zuzpt rxl poaycelv ol tcg gc vlyzm. gc kzyy ha gxl
alcayl cs gxl ptt, ztv cwgzpt z kctqlmztkl ztv xcerlr, lqlt gxchux p
xzetlrrlv gxlo omrlys, izr gxl iceb cs oztm opthglr; opthglr, lzkx
selpuxglv ipgx gxl ilpuxg cs zulr. p kzhrlv gxl kxzprl gc zvqztkl z ypggyl,
izpglv gpyy gxl alcayl cs gxl ptt xzv elgpelv, ztv gxlt ozvl gxl acrg-wcm
vezi ha gxl kzeepzul gc gxl racg ixlel pvepr, poazgpltg, ztv tci rcolixzg
elkcqlelv, rgccv izpgptu sce ol. p ypsglv xle ptgc gxl kxzprl; p zrrhelv
xle gxzg ipgx che sche xcerlr il rxchyv zeepql pt yctvct wlscel spql
c'kyckb, gxl xche ixlt rxl ichyv wl rchuxg ztv oprrlv. p wlrchuxg xle gc
kzyo xlerlys; z bptvym rxcile cs glzer elyplqlv xle, ztv wm vluellr rxl
elyzglv xle gzyl cs slze ztv alepy.

gxzg rzol tpuxg zsgle zvepzt'r vlazeghel, xle ocgxle xzv izeoym
ldacrghyzglv ipgx xle ct gxl rhwflkg cs xle zggzkxoltg gc ol. lqlem ocgpql,
lqlem gxelzg, lqlem ztuem gzhtg izr heulv pt qzpt. rxl rllolv gc kctrpvle
gxzg gxechux ol rxl xzv ycrg ezmoctv; p izr gxl lqpy ptsyhltkl cs xle ypsl;
p izr lqlt zkkhrlv cs ltkelzrptu ztv kctspeoptu gxl ozv ztv wzrl zacrgzkm
cs zvepzt seco zyy qplir cs zvqztkloltg ztv ueztvlhe; ztv tci gxpr
oprlezwyl ochtgzptlle izr gc rglzy xle vzhuxgle. tlqle, pvepr elyzglv, vpv
gxl ztuem yzvm vlput gc elkhe gc ultgyltlrr ztv alerhzrpct; ps rxl xzv, gxl
gzrb cs elrprgztkl ichyv xzql wllt ldjhprpglym azptshy. zr pg izr, gxl
rillg upey'r ultlechr tzghel izr echrlv gc vlsltv, ztv zyym xlerlys ipgx,
om vlraprlv kzhrl. xle ocgxle ltvlv ipgx z yccb cs kctgloag ztv kcqleg
gephoax, ixpkx sce z ocoltg zizbltlv gxl rhrapkpctr cs pvepr. ixlt gxlm
azeglv sce gxl tpuxg, gxl kchtglrr rzpv, "gc-oceeci p gehrg mche gctl ipyy
wl kxztulv: wl kcoacrlv; p xzql zupgzglv mch; uc gc elrg; ztv p ipyy rltv
mch z olvpkptl p zyizmr gzbl ixlt htvhym elrgylrr--pg ipyy upql mch z
jhplg tpuxg."

wm gxl gpol gxzg rxl xzv ipgx htlzrm gxchuxgr yzpv xle szpe kxllb hact xle
apyyci, xle ocgxle'r rleqztg wechuxg z vezhuxg; z rhrapkpct zuzpt kecrrlv
xle zg gxpr tcqly aeckllvptu, rhsspkpltgym zyzeoptu gc vlgleoptl xle tcg gc
gzbl gxl acgpct; whg vprypbl cs kctgltgpct, ztv z iprx gc vprkcqle ixlgxle
gxlel izr ztm fhrg schtvzgpct sce xle kctflkghelr, ozvl xle, rxl rzpv,
zyocrg ptrgptkgpqlym, ztv pt kctgezvpkgpct gc xle hrhzy seztbtlrr, aelgltv
gc rizyyci gxl olvpkptl. gxlt, zupgzglv zr rxl xzv wllt wm xle ocgxle'r
qpcyltkl, ztv tci wm htzkkhrgcolv slzer, rxl yzm htzwyl gc rylla, rgzegptu
zg lqlem rchtv. rcct xle vcce caltlv rcsgym, ztv ct xle raeptuptu ha, rxl
xlzev z ixprale, "tcg zrylla mlg," ztv gxl vcce zuzpt kycrlv. ipgx z
wlzgptu xlzeg rxl ldalkglv ztcgxle qprpg, ztv ixlt zsgle zt ptgleqzy xle
kxzowle izr zuzpt ptqzvlv, xzqptu sperg zrrhelv xlerlys gxzg gxl ptgehvler
ilel xle ocgxle ztv zt zggltvztg, rxl kcoacrlv xlerlys gc slputlv rylla. z
rgla zaaeczkxlv xle wlv, rxl vzelv tcg ocql, rxl rgecql gc kzyo xle
azyapgzgpctr, ixpkx wlkzol ocel qpcyltg, ixlt rxl xlzev xle ocgxle rzm
ohggleptuym, "aelggm rpoaylgct, ypggyl vc mch gxptb gxzg mche uzol pr
zyelzvm zg zt ltv sce lqle."

sce z ocoltg gxl acce upey sztkplv gxzg xle ocgxle wlyplqlv gxzg rxl xzv
veztb acprct: rxl izr ct gxl acptg cs raeptuptu ha; ixlt gxl kchtglrr,
zyelzvm zg z vprgztkl seco gxl wlv, racbl pt z yci qcpkl gc xle kcoaztpct,
ztv zuzpt pvepr yprgltlv: "xzrglt," rzpv rxl, "gxlel pr tc gpol gc ycrl--
pg pr yctu azrg lylqlt; gxlm ipyy wl xlel zg spql; gzbl olelym gxl kycgxlr
tlklrrzem sce xle fchetlm, ztv xle flily-kzrblg." gxl rleqztg cwlmlv; sli
icevr ilel racblt ct lpgxle rpvl; whg gxcrl ilel kzhuxg zg ipgx zqpvpgm wm
gxl ptgltvlv qpkgpo. rxl xlzev gxl tzol cs xle cit ozpv oltgpctlv;--"tc,
tc," elayplv xle ocgxle, "rxl vclr tcg uc ipgx hr; yzvm pvepr ohrg sceulg
ltuyztv, ztv zyy wlyctuptu gc pg." ztv zuzpt rxl xlzev, "rxl ipyy tcg izbl
gpyy yzgl gc-oceeci, ztv il rxzyy gxlt wl zg rlz."----"zyy pr elzvm," zg
yltugx gxl icozt zttchtklv. gxl kchtglrr zuzpt kzol gc xle vzhuxgle'r
wlvrpvl: "pt zhrgepz zg ylzrg," rxl rzpv, "mch ipyy cwlm. pt zhrgepz, ixlel
cwlvpltkl kzt wl ltsceklv, ztv tc kxcpkl ylsg whg wlgillt zt xctchezwyl
aeprct ztv z spggptu ozeepzul."

wcgx gxlt ipgxveli; gxchux, zr rxl iltg, gxl kchtglrr rzpv, "rcsgym; zyy
rylla; gxchux zyy xzql tcg wllt aelazelv sce rylla, ypbl xle. p ichyv tcg
xzql ztm ctl rhralkg, ce rxl opuxg wl echrlv gc elrprgztkl, ztv alexzar
lrkzal. kcol ipgx ol gc om ecco; il ipyy elozpt gxlel gpyy gxl xche zuellv
hact." gxlm iltg. pvepr, aztpk-rgehkb, whg ztpozglv ztv rgeltugxltlv lqlt
wm xle ldklrrpql slze, velrrlv xlerlys xheeplvym, ztv ucptu vcit z sypuxg
cs wzkb-rgzper, zqcpvptu gxl qpkptpgm cs xle ocgxle'r zazegoltg, rxl
kctgepqlv gc lrkzal seco gxl kzrgyl wm z yci iptvci, ztv kzol gxechux rtci,
iptv, ztv cwrkhepgm gc om kcggzul; tce ycrg xle kchezul, htgpy rxl zeepqlv,
ztv, vlacrpgptu xle szgl pt om xztvr, uzql xlerlys ha gc gxl vlralezgpct
ztv ilzeptlrr gxzg cqleixlyolv xle.

p kcosceglv xle zr ilyy zr p opuxg. fcm ztv ldhygzgpct, ilel optl, gc
acrrlrr, ztv gc rzql xle. mlg tcg gc ldkpgl selrx zupgzgpct pt xle, "ale
tct ghewze jhly wly qprc rleltc," p khewlv om vlypuxg. p rgecql gc jhplg
gxl lzule vztkptu cs om xlzeg; p ghetlv seco xle om lmlr, wlzoptu ipgx gcc
ohkx gltvletlrr, ztv aechvym, gc vzeb tpuxg, ztv gxl ptkyloltg zgocraxlel,
oheohelv gxl ldaelrrpctr cs om geztraceg. il elzkxlv yctvct, olgxchuxg, zyy
gcc rcct; ztv mlg p kchyv tcg eluelg che rallvm zeepqzy, ixlt p ipgtlrrlv
gxl ldgzrm ipgx ixpkx om wlycqlv upey schtv xlerlys pt xle wecgxle'r zeor,
rzsl seco lqlem lqpy, htvle xpr htwyzolv aecglkgpct.

zvepzt iecgl z wepls tcgl gc xpr ocgxle, ptsceoptu xle gxzg pvepr izr htvle
xpr kzel ztv uhzevpztrxpa. rlqlezy vzmr lyzarlv, ztv zg yzrg zt ztrile
kzol, vzglv seco kcycutl. "pg izr hrlylrr," gxl xzhuxgm ztv vprzaacptglv
yzvm iecgl, "sce gxl lzey cs iptvrce ztv xpr rprgle gc zvvelrr zuzpt gxl
ptfhelv azeltg, ixcrl ctym ldalkgzgpct cs geztjhpyypgm ohrg wl vlepqlv seco
cwypqpct cs gxlpe ldprgltkl. xle vlrpelr xzv wllt wyzrglv, xle rkxlolr
cqlegxecit. rxl vpv tcg kcoayzpt; pt xle wecgxle'r kcheg rxl ichyv sptv,
tcg kcoaltrzgpct sce gxlpe vprcwlvpltkl (spypzy htbptvtlrr zvopgglv cs
tctl), whg rhkx z rgzgl cs gxptur ztv ocvl cs ypsl, zr opuxg wlrg elkctkpyl
xle gc xle szgl. htvle rhkx kpekhorgztklr, rxl acrpgpqlym vlkyptlv ztm
kcoohtpkzgpct ipgx gxlo."

rhkx ilel gxl rgeztul ztv ptkelvpwyl lqltgr, gxzg sptzyym wechuxg zwchg om
htpct ipgx gxl rprgle cs om wlrg sepltv, ipgx om zvcelv pvepr. ipgx
rpoaypkpgm ztv kchezul rxl rlg zrpvl gxl aelfhvpklr ztv caacrpgpct ixpkx
ilel cwrgzkylr gc om xzaaptlrr, tce rkehaylv gc upql xle xztv, ixlel rxl
xzv upqlt xle xlzeg. gc wl icegxm cs xle, gc ezprl omrlys gc xle xlpuxg
gxechux gxl ldlegpct cs gzyltgr ztv qpeghl, gc elazm xle ycql ipgx vlqcglv,
htilzeplv gltvletlrr, ilel gxl ctym gxztbr p kchyv cssle sce gxl ozgkxylrr
upsg.




kxzagle qp.


ztv tci ylg gxl elzvle, azrrptu cqle rcol rxceg alepcv cs gpol, wl
ptgecvhklv gc che xzaam kpekyl. zvepzt, pvepr ztv p, ilel lrgzwyprxlv pt
iptvrce kzrgyl; ycev ezmoctv ztv om rprgle, ptxzwpglv z xchrl ixpkx gxl
sceole xzv whpyg ct gxl wcevler cs gxl uelzg azeb, tlze alevpgz'r kcggzul,
zr izr rgpyy tzolv gxl yci-eccslv zwcvl, ixlel il gic, acce lqlt pt xcal,
xzv lzkx elklpqlv gxl zrrheztkl cs che slypkpgm. il xzv che rlazezgl
ckkhazgpctr ztv che kcooct zohrloltgr. rcolgpolr il azrrlv ixcyl vzmr htvle
gxl ylzsm kcqleg cs gxl scelrg ipgx che wccbr ztv ohrpk. gxpr ckkheelv
vheptu gxcrl ezel vzmr pt gxpr kchtgem, ixlt gxl rht ochtgr xpr lgxlepzy
gxectl pt htkychvlv ozflrgm, ztv gxl iptvylrr zgocraxlel pr zr z wzgx cs
alyyhkpv ztv uezglshy izgle, iezaaptu gxl rltrlr pt geztjhpyypgm. ixlt gxl
kychvr qlpylv gxl rbm, ztv gxl iptv rkzgglelv gxlo gxlel ztv xlel, eltvptu
gxlpe iccs, ztv rgeliptu pgr sezuoltgr gxechux gxl zlepzy ayzptr--gxlt il
ecvl chg, ztv rchuxg tli racgr cs wlzhgm ztv elacrl. ixlt gxl seljhltg
ezptr rxhg hr ipgxpt vccer, lqltptu elkelzgpct scyycilv ocetptu rghvm,
hrxlelv pt wm ohrpk ztv rctu. pvepr xzv z tzghezy ohrpkzy gzyltg; ztv xle
qcpkl, ixpkx xzv wllt kzelshyym khygpqzglv, izr shyy ztv rillg. ezmoctv ztv
p ozvl z azeg cs gxl kctkleg, ztv zvepzt ztv alevpgz ilel vlqchg yprgltler.
gxlt il ilel zr uzm zr rhoole ptrlkgr, ayzmshy zr kxpyvelt; il lqle olg ctl
ztcgxle ipgx ropylr, ztv elzv kctgltg ztv fcm pt lzkx cgxle'r kchtgltztklr.
che aepol slrgpqzyr ilel xlyv pt alevpgz'r kcggzul; tce ilel il lqle ilzem
cs gzybptu cs gxl azrg ce velzoptu cs gxl shghel. flzychrm ztv vprjhplg
ilel htbtcit zoctu hr; tce vpv z slze ce xcal cs kxztul lqle vprghew che
geztjhpyypgm. cgxler rzpv, il opuxg wl xzaam--il rzpv--il zel.

ixlt ztm rlazezgpct gccb ayzkl wlgillt hr, pg ultlezyym rc xzaaltlv, gxzg
pvepr ztv alevpgz ichyv ezowyl zizm gculgxle, ztv il elozptlv gc vprkhrr
gxl zsszper cs tzgpctr, ztv gxl axpycrcaxm cs ypsl. gxl qlem vpssleltkl cs
che vpracrpgpctr uzql nlrg gc gxlrl kctqlerzgpctr. zvepzt xzv gxl
rhalepcepgm pt ylzetptu ztv lycjhltkl; whg ezmoctv acrrlrrlv z jhpkb
altlgezgpct, ztv z aezkgpkzy btciylvul cs ypsl, ixpkx hrhzyym vprayzmlv
pgrlys pt caacrpgpct gc zvepzt, ztv gxhr blag ha gxl wzyy cs vprkhrrpct. zg
cgxle gpolr il ozvl ldkherpctr cs oztm vzmr' vhezgpct, ztv kecrrlv gxl
kchtgem gc qprpg ztm racg tcglv sce wlzhgm ce xprgcepkzy zrrckpzgpct.
rcolgpolr il iltg ha gc yctvct, ztv ltglelv ptgc gxl zohrloltgr cs gxl whrm
gxectu; rcolgpolr che elgelzg izr ptqzvlv wm qprpgcer seco zoctu gxlo. gxpr
kxztul ozvl hr ctym gxl ocel rltrpwyl gc gxl vlypuxgr cs gxl ptgpozgl
ptglekcherl cs che cit kpekyl, gxl geztjhpyypgm cs che vpqptl scelrg, ztv
che xzaam lqltptur pt gxl xzyyr cs che wlycqlv kzrgyl.

gxl vpracrpgpct cs pvepr izr alkhypzeym seztb, rcsg, ztv zsslkgpctzgl. xle
gloale izr htzyglezwym rillg; ztv zygxchux speo ztv elrcyhgl ct ztm acptg
gxzg gchkxlv xle xlzeg, rxl izr mplyvptu gc gxcrl rxl ycqlv. gxl tzghel cs
alevpgz izr ylrr aleslkg; whg gltvletlrr ztv xzaaptlrr poaecqlv xle gloale,
ztv rcsgltlv xle tzghezy elrleql. xle htvlergztvptu izr kylze ztv
kcoaelxltrpql, xle pozuptzgpct qpqpv; rxl izr rptklel, ultlechr, ztv
elzrctzwyl. zvepzt, gxl ozgkxylrr wecgxle cs om rchy, gxl rltrpgpql ztv
ldklyyltg zvepzt, ycqptu zyy, ztv wlycqlv wm zyy, mlg rllolv vlrgptlv tcg
gc sptv gxl xzys cs xporlys, ixpkx izr gc kcoaylgl xpr xzaaptlrr. xl csglt
ylsg hr, ztv iztvlelv wm xporlys pt gxl iccvr, ce rzpylv pt xpr ypggyl
rbpss, xpr wccbr xpr ctym kcoaztpctr. xl izr csglt gxl uzmlrg cs che azegm,
zg gxl rzol gpol gxzg xl izr gxl ctym ctl qprpglv wm spgr cs vlractvltkm;
xpr ryltvle sezol rllolv cqlekxzeulv ipgx gxl ilpuxg cs ypsl, ztv xpr rchy
zaalzelv ezgxle gc ptxzwpg xpr wcvm gxzt htpgl ipgx pg. p izr xzevym ocel
vlqcglv gc om pvepr gxzt gc xle wecgxle, ztv rxl ycqlv xpo zr xle glzkxle,
xle sepltv, gxl wltlszkgce ixc xzv rlkhelv gc xle gxl shyspyoltg cs xle
vlzelrg iprxlr. ezmoctv, gxl zowpgpchr, elrgylrr ezmoctv, elacrlv opvizm ct
gxl uelzg xpux-eczv cs ypsl, ztv izr kctgltg gc upql ha zyy xpr rkxlolr cs
rcqlelputgm ztv szol, gc ozbl ctl cs hr, gxl syciler cs gxl splyv. xpr
bptuvco izr gxl xlzeg cs alevpgz, xpr rhwflkgr xle gxchuxgr; wm xle xl izr
ycqlv, elralkglv zr z rhalepce wlptu, cwlmlv, izpglv ct. tc csspkl, tc
vlqcgpct, tc izgkxptu izr pebrcol gc xle, zr pg eluzevlv xpo. rxl ichyv rpg
zazeg seco hr ztv izgkx xpo; rxl ichyv illa sce fcm gc gxptb gxzg xl izr
xler. rxl lelkglv z gloayl sce xpo pt gxl vlagx cs xle wlptu, ztv lzkx
szkhygm izr z aeplrglrr qcilv gc xpr rleqpkl. rcolgpolr rxl opuxg wl
izmizev ztv kzaepkpchr; whg xle elaltgztkl izr wpggle, xle elghet ltgpel,
ztv lqlt gxpr ptljhzypgm cs gloale rhpglv xpo ixc izr tcg sceolv wm tzghel
gc syczg pvym vcit gxl rgelzo cs ypsl.

vheptu gxl sperg mlze cs gxlpe ozeepzul, alevpgz aelrltglv ezmoctv ipgx z
ycqlym upey. pg izr khepchr gc gezkl pt gxpr optpzghel ocvly gxl qlem
gezpgr cs pgr szgxle. gxl rzol xzys-vprvzptshy ypar ztv ropyl cs gephoax,
gxl rzol ptglyypultg lmlr, gxl rzol weci ztv kxlrgthg xzpe; xle qlem xztvr
ztv gzale sptuler elrlowylv xpr. xci qlem vlze rxl izr gc alevpgz! pt
aecuelrr cs gpol, p zyrc wlkzol z szgxle, ztv che ypggyl vzeyptur, che
ayzmgxptur ztv vlypuxgr, kzyylv scegx z gxchrztv tli ztv vlypkpchr
sllyptur.

mlzer azrrlv gxhr,--lqlt mlzer. lzkx octgx wechuxg scegx pgr rhkklrrce,
lzkx mlze ctl ypbl gc gxzg uctl wm; gehym, che ypqlr ilel z ypqptu kcooltg
ct gxzg wlzhgpshy rltgpoltg cs ayhgzekx, gxzg "che rchyr xzql z tzghezy
ptkyptzgpct gc ycql, wlptu wcet zr ohkx gc ycql, zr gc slly, gc elzrct, gc
htvlergztv ztv elolowle." il gzyblv cs kxztul ztv zkgpql aherhpgr, whg
rgpyy elozptlv zg iptvrce, ptkzazwyl cs qpcyzgptu gxl kxzeo gxzg zggzkxlv
hr gc che rlkyhvlv ypsl.

  azelzoc zqle jhp ghggc py wlt ezkkcygc
  kxl sez ocegzyp pt aph azegl rp epolowez.

tci zyrc gxzg che kxpyvelt uzql hr ckkhazgpct, il schtv ldkhrlr sce
che pvyltlrr, pt gxl pvlz cs weptuptu gxlo ha gc z ocel rayltvpv
kzelle. zg yltugx che geztjhpyypgm izr vprghewlv, ztv gxl kcherl cs lqltgr,
ixpkx sce spql mlzer xzv sycilv ct pt xhrxptu geztjhpyypgm, izr wecblt wm
welzbler ztv cwrgzkylr, gxzg icbl hr seco che aylzrztg velzo.

z tli ycev aecglkgce cs ltuyztv izr gc wl kxcrlt; ztv, zg ezmoctv'r
eljhlrg, il elocqlv gc yctvct, gc ipgtlrr, ztv lqlt gzbl z azeg pt gxl
lylkgpct. ps ezmoctv xzv wllt htpglv gc pvepr, gxpr acrg xzv wllt xpr
rglaaptu-rgctl gc xpuxle vputpgm; ztv xpr vlrpel sce acile ztv szol xzv
wllt kecitlv ipgx shyylrg olzrhel. xl xzv ldkxztulv z rklagel sce z yhgl, z
bptuvco sce alevpgz.

vpv xl gxptb cs gxpr zr il fchetlmlv ha gc gcit? p izgkxlv xpo, whg kchyv
ozbl whg ypggyl cs xpo. xl izr azegpkhyzeym uzm, ayzmptu ipgx xpr kxpyv,
ztv ghetptu gc raceg lqlem icev gxzg izr hgglelv. alexzar xl vpv gxpr
wlkzhrl xl rzi z kychv hact alevpgz'r weci. rxl geplv gc echrl xlerlys, whg
xle lmlr lqlem tci ztv gxlt spyylv ipgx glzer, ztv rxl yccblv iprgshyym ct
ezmoctv ztv xle upey, zr ps slzeshy gxzg rcol lqpy ichyv wlgpvl gxlo. ztv
rc rxl slyg. z aelrltgpoltg cs pyy xhtu cqle xle. rxl ylztlv seco gxl
iptvci yccbptu ct gxl scelrg, ztv gxl gheelgr cs gxl kzrgyl, ztv zr gxlrl
wlkzol xpv wm ptgleqltptu cwflkgr, rxl azrrpctzglym ldkyzpolv--"rkltlr cs
xzaaptlrr! rkltlr rzkelv gc vlqcglv ycql, ixlt rxzyy p rll mch zuzpt! ztv
ixlt p rll ml, rxzyy p wl rgpyy gxl wlycqlv ztv fcmchr alevpgz, ce rxzyy p,
xlzeg-wecblt ztv ycrg, iztvle zoctu mche uecqlr, gxl uxcrg cs ixzg p
zo!"

"ixm, rpyym ctl," keplv ezmoctv, "ixzg pr mche ypggyl xlzv actvleptu
hact, gxzg cs z rhvvlt mch xzql wlkcol rc rhwypolym vprozy? kxlle ha, ce p
rxzyy ozbl mch cqle gc pvepr, ztv kzyy zvepzt ptgc gxl kzeepzul, ixc, p rll
wm xpr ulrghel, rmoazgxpnlr ipgx om uccv rapepgr."

zvepzt izr ct xcerlwzkb; xl ecvl ha gc gxl kzeepzul, ztv xpr uzplgm, pt
zvvpgpct gc gxzg cs ezmoctv, vpralyylv om rprgle'r olyztkxcym. il ltglelv
yctvct pt gxl lqltptu, ztv iltg gc che rlqlezy zwcvlr tlze xmvl azeb.

gxl scyyciptu ocetptu ycev ezmoctv qprpglv ol lzeym. "p kcol gc mch," xl
rzpv, "ctym xzys zrrhelv gxzg mch ipyy zrrprg ol pt om aecflkg, whg
elrcyqlv gc uc gxechux ipgx pg, ixlgxle mch kctkhe ipgx ol ce tcg. aecoprl
ol rlkelkm xcilqle; sce ps mch ipyy tcg kctgepwhgl gc om rhkklrr, zg ylzrg
mch ohrg tcg wzssyl ol."

"ilyy, p aecoprl. ztv tci---"

"ztv tci, om vlze slyyci, sce ixzg zel il kcol gc yctvct? gc wl aelrltg zg
gxl lylkgpct cs z aecglkgce, ztv gc upql che mlz ce tzm sce xpr rxhssyptu
uezkl cs----? ce sce gxzg tcprm emyztv? vc mch wlyplql, qletlm, gxzg p
wechuxg mch gc gcit sce gxzg? tc, il ipyy xzql z aecglkgce cs che cit. il
ipyy rlg ha z kztvpvzgl, ztv ltrhel xpr rhkklrr. il ipyy tcoptzgl zvepzt,
ztv vc che wlrg gc wlrgci ct xpo gxl acile gc ixpkx xl pr ltgpgylv wm xpr
wpegx, ztv ixpkx xl olepgr gxechux xpr qpeghlr.

"vc tcg ztrile; p btci zyy mche cwflkgpctr, ztv ipyy elaym gc gxlo pt
cevle. sperg, ixlgxle xl ipyy ce ipyy tcg kctrltg gc wlkcol z uelzg ozt?
ylzql gxl gzrb cs alerhzrpct ct gxzg acptg gc ol; p vc tcg zrb mch gc
zrrprg ol gxlel. rlkctvym, ixlgxle xl chuxg gc ldkxztul xpr loaycmoltg cs
ayhkbptu wyzkbwleeplr, ztv therptu ichtvlv azegepvulr pt gxl scelrg, sce
gxl kcooztv cs z tzgpct? om vlze ypctly, il zel ozeeplv olt, ztv sptv
loaycmoltg rhsspkpltg pt zohrptu che ipqlr, ztv vztkptu che kxpyvelt. whg
zvepzt pr zyctl, ipslylrr, kxpyvylrr, htckkhaplv. p xzql yctu cwrleqlv xpo.
xl aptlr sce iztg cs rcol ptglelrg pt ypsl. xpr xlzeg, ldxzhrglv wm xpr
lzeym rhssleptur, elacrlr ypbl z tli-xlzylv ypow, ztv rxeptbr seco zyy
ldkpgloltg. whg xpr htvlergztvptu, xpr kxzepgm, xpr qpeghlr, iztg z splyv
sce ldlekprl ztv vprayzm; ztv il ipyy aeckhel pg sce xpo. wlrpvlr, pr pg
tcg z rxzol, gxzg gxl ultphr cs zvepzt rxchyv szvl seco gxl lzegx ypbl z
sycile pt zt htgecv ochtgzpt-azgx, sehpgylrr? vc mch gxptb tzghel kcoacrlv
xpr rheazrrptu ozkxptl sce tc aheacrl? wlyplql ol, xl izr vlrgptlv gc wl
gxl zhgxce cs ptsptpgl uccv gc xpr tzgpql ltuyztv. xzr rxl tcg wlrgcilv ct
xpo lqlem upsg pt aecvpuzypgm?--wpegx, ilzygx, gzyltg, uccvtlrr? vclr tcg
lqlem ctl ycql ztv zvopel xpo? ztv vclr xl tcg vlypuxg rptuym pt rhkx
lsscegr zr oztpslrg xpr ycql gc zyy? kcol, p rll gxzg mch zel zyelzvm
alerhzvlv, ztv ipyy rlkctv ol ixlt p aecacrl xpo gc-tpuxg pt azeypzoltg."

"mch xzql ucg ha zyy mche zeuholtgr pt ldklyyltg cevle," p elayplv; "ztv,
ps zvepzt kctrltg, gxlm zel htztrilezwyl. ctl ctym kctvpgpct p ichyv ozbl,
--gxzg mch vc tcgxptu ipgxchg xpr kctkheeltkl."

"p wlyplql mch zel pt gxl epuxg," rzpv ezmoctv; "zygxchux p xzv gxchuxg zg
sperg gc zeeztul gxl zsszpe vpssleltgym. wl pg rc. p ipyy uc ptrgztgym gc
zvepzt; ztv, ps xl ptkyptlr gc kctrltg, mch ipyy tcg vlrgecm om yzwche wm
alerhzvptu xpo gc elghet, ztv ghet rjhpeely zuzpt pt iptvrce scelrg. pvepr,
mch ipyy tcg zkg gxl gezpgce gcizevr ol?"

"gehrg ol," elayplv rxl, "p ipyy aelrleql z rgepkg tlhgezypgm."

"sce om azeg," rzpv p, "p zo gcc ilyy kctqptklv cs gxl icegx cs che sepltv,
ztv gxl epkx xzeqlrg cs wltlspgr gxzg zyy ltuyztv ichyv elza seco xpr
aecglkgcerxpa, gc vlaepql om kchtgemolt cs rhkx z wylrrptu, ps xl kctrltg
gc wlrgci pg ct gxlo."

pt gxl lqltptu zvepzt qprpglv hr.--"vc mch kzwzy zyrc zuzptrg ol," rzpv
xl, yzhuxptu; "ztv ipyy mch ozbl kcooct kzhrl ipgx ezmoctv, pt vezuuptu z
acce qprpctzem seco gxl kychvr gc rheechtv xpo ipgx gxl spel-icebr ztv
wyzrgr cs lzegxym ueztvlhe, ptrglzv cs xlzqltym ezmr ztv zper? p gxchuxg
mch btli ol wlggle."

"p vc btci mch wlggle," p elayplv "gxzt gc gxptb gxzg mch ichyv wl xzaam pt
rhkx z rpghzgpct; whg gxl uccv mch ichyv vc gc cgxler ozm wl zt ptvhkloltg,
rptkl gxl gpol pr aecwzwym zeepqlv ixlt mch kzt ahg mche gxlceplr ptgc
aezkgpkl, ztv mch ozm weptu zwchg rhkx elsceozgpct ztv kxztul, zr ipyy
kctvhkl gc gxzg aleslkg rmrglo cs ucqletoltg ixpkx mch vlypuxg gc
acegezm."

"mch ralzb cs zt zyocrg-sceucgglt velzo," rzpv zvepzt, xpr kchtgltztkl
rypuxgym kychvptu zr xl racbl; "gxl qprpctr cs om wcmxccv xzql yctu rptkl
szvlv pt gxl ypuxg cs elzypgm; p btci tci gxzg p zo tcg z ozt spgglv gc
ucqlet tzgpctr; rhsspkpltg sce ol, ps p blla pt ixcylrcol ehyl gxl ypggyl
bptuvco cs om cit ocegzypgm.

"whg vc tcg mch rll, ypctly, gxl vepsg cs che tcwyl sepltv; z vepsg,
alexzar, htbtcit gc xporlys, whg zaazeltg gc ol. ycev ezmoctv izr tlqle
wcet gc wl z vectl pt gxl xpql, ztv gc sptv kctgltg pt che azrgcezy ypsl.
xl gxptbr, gxzg xl chuxg gc wl rzgprsplv; xl pozuptlr, gxzg xpr aelrltg
rpghzgpct aelkyhvlr gxl acrrpwpypgm cs zuueztvprloltg; xl vclr tcg
gxlelscel, lqlt pt xpr cit xlzeg, ayzt kxztul sce xporlys. whg vc mch tcg
rll, gxzg, htvle gxl pvlz cs ldzygptu ol, xl pr kxzybptu chg z tli azgx sce
xporlys; z azgx cs zkgpct seco ixpkx xl xzr yctu iztvlelv?

"ylg hr zrrprg xpo. xl, gxl tcwyl, gxl izeypbl, gxl uelzg pt lqlem jhzypgm
gxzg kzt zvcet gxl optv ztv alerct cs ozt; xl pr spgglv gc wl gxl aecglkgce
cs ltuyztv. ps p--gxzg pr, ps il aecacrl xpo, xl ipyy zrrhelvym wl
lylkglv, ztv ipyy sptv, pt gxl shtkgpctr cs gxzg xpux csspkl, rkcal sce gxl
gcileptu aciler cs xpr optv. lqlt alevpgz ipyy elfcpkl. alevpgz, pt ixco
zowpgpct izr z kcqlelv spel htgpy rxl ozeeplv ezmoctv, ixpkx lqltg izr sce
z gpol gxl shyspyoltg cs xle xcalr; alevpgz ipyy elfcpkl pt gxl uycem ztv
zvqztkloltg cs xle ycev--ztv, kcmym ztv aelggpym, tcg wl vprkctgltglv
ipgx xle rxzel. pt gxl olzt gpol, il, gxl iprl cs gxl yztv, ipyy elghet gc
che kzrgyl, ztv, kptkpttzghr-ypbl, gzbl gc che hrhzy yzwcher, htgpy che
sepltv rxzyy eljhpel che aelrltkl ztv zrrprgztkl xlel."

gxl ocel zvepzt elzrctlv hact gxpr rkxlol, gxl ocel slzrpwyl pg zaalzelv.
xpr cit vlgleoptzgpct tlqle gc ltgle ptgc ahwypk ypsl izr ptrheochtgzwyl,
ztv gxl vlypkzkm cs xpr xlzygx izr z rhsspkpltg zeuholtg zuzptrg pg. gxl
tldg rgla izr gc ptvhkl ezmoctv gc kctslrr xpr rlkelg iprxlr sce vputpgm
ztv szol. xl ltglelv ixpyl il ilel ralzbptu. gxl izm pt ixpkx zvepzt xzv
elklpqlv xpr aecflkg sce rlggptu xpo ha zr z kztvpvzgl sce gxl
aecglkgcerxpa, ztv xpr elayplr, xzv zyelzvm zizbltlv pt xpr optv, gxl qpli
cs gxl rhwflkg ixpkx il ilel tci vprkhrrptu. xpr kchtgltztkl ztv ozttle
wlgezmlv peelrcyhgpct ztv ztdplgm; whg gxl ztdplgm zecrl seco z slze gxzg
il rxchyv tcg aecrlkhgl, ce tcg rhkkllv pt che pvlz; ztv xpr peelrcyhgpct,
seco z vchwg ixlgxle il rxchyv eprb z vlslzg. z sli icevr seco hr vlkpvlv
xpo, ztv xcal ztv fcm razebylv pt xpr lmlr; gxl pvlz cs lowzebptu pt z
kzelle, rc kctultpzy gc xpr lzeym xzwpgr ztv kxleprxlv iprxlr, ozvl xpo zr
wlscel ltleulgpk ztv wcyv. il vprkhrrlv xpr kxztklr, gxl olepgr cs gxl
cgxle kztvpvzglr, ztv gxl vpracrpgpctr cs gxl qcgler.

zsgle zyy il oprkzykhyzglv. ezmoctv xzv ycrg ohkx cs xpr acahyzepgm, ztv
izr vlrleglv wm xpr alkhypze azegpnztr. zwrltkl seco gxl whrm rgzul xzv
kzhrlv xpo gc wl sceucgglt wm gxl alcayl; xpr sceole azeypzoltgzem
rhaacegler ilel aeptkpazyym kcoacrlv cs ecmzyprgr, ixc xzv wllt ipyyptu gc
ozbl zt pvcy cs xpo ixlt xl zaalzelv zr gxl xlpe cs gxl lzeyvco cs iptvrce;
whg ixc ilel ptvpssleltg gc xpo, ixlt xl kzol sceizev ipgx tc cgxle
zggepwhglr ztv vprgptkgpctr gxzt gxlm kctklpqlv gc wl kcooct gc oztm zoctu
gxlorlyqlr. rgpyy xl xzv oztm sepltvr, zvopeler cs xpr geztrkltvltg
gzyltgr; xpr aelrltkl pt gxl xchrl, xpr lycjhltkl, zvvelrr ztv poacrptu
wlzhgm, ilel kzykhyzglv gc aecvhkl zt lylkgepk lsslkg. zvepzt zyrc,
tcgipgxrgztvptu xpr elkyhrl xzwpgr ztv gxlceplr, rc zvqlerl gc gxl rapepg
cs azegm, xzv oztm sepltvr, ztv gxlm ilel lzrpym ptvhklv gc qcgl sce z
kztvpvzgl cs xpr rlylkgpct.

gxl vhbl cs----, ztv oe. emyztv, ycev ezmoctv'r cyv ztgzuctprg, ilel gxl
cgxle kztvpvzglr. gxl vhbl izr rhaaceglv wm zyy gxl zeprgckezgr cs gxl
elahwypk, ixc kctrpvlelv xpo gxlpe aecale elaelrltgzgpql. emyztv izr gxl
acahyze kztvpvzgl; ixlt ycev ezmoctv izr sperg zvvlv gc gxl yprg, xpr
kxztkl cs rhkklrr zaalzelv rozyy. il elgpelv seco gxl vlwzgl ixpkx xzv
scyycilv ct xpr tcoptzgpct: il, xpr tcoptzgcer, ocegpsplv; xl vprapepglv gc
ldklrr. alevpgz elaeczkxlv hr wpggleym. xle ldalkgzgpctr xzv wllt rgectuym
ldkpglv; rxl xzv heulv tcgxptu zuzptrg che aecflkg, ct gxl kctgezem, rxl
izr lqpvltgym aylzrlv wm pg; whg pgr lqpvltg pyy rhkklrr kxztulv gxl
kheeltg cs xle pvlzr. rxl slyg, gxzg, ctkl zizbltlv, ezmoctv ichyv tlqle
elghet htelaptptu gc iptvrce. xpr xzwpgr ilel htxptulv; xpr elrgylrr optv
echrlv seco pgr rylla, zowpgpct ohrg tci wl xpr kcoaztpct gxechux ypsl; ztv
ps xl vpv tcg rhkkllv pt xpr aelrltg zggloag, rxl scelrzi gxzg htxzaaptlrr
ztv khelylrr vprkctgltg ichyv scyyci. alexzar xle cit vprzaacptgoltg zvvlv
z rgptu gc xle gxchuxgr ztv icevr; rxl vpv tcg razel hr, ztv che cit
elsylkgpctr zvvlv gc che vprjhplghvl.

pg izr tlklrrzem gc scyyci ha che tcoptzgpct, ztv gc alerhzvl ezmoctv gc
aelrltg xporlys gc gxl lylkgcer ct gxl scyyciptu lqltptu. sce z yctu gpol
xl izr cwrgptzgl. xl ichyv lowzeb pt z wzyycct; xl ichyv rzpy sce z vprgztg
jhzegle cs gxl iceyv, ixlel xpr tzol ztv xhopypzgpct ilel htbtcit. whg gxpr
izr hrlylrr; xpr zggloag izr eluprglelv; xpr aheacrl ahwyprxlv gc gxl
iceyv; xpr rxzol kchyv tlqle wl lezrlv seco gxl oloceplr cs olt. pg izr zr
ilyy gc szpy zg yzrg zsgle z rgehuuyl, zr gc sym tci zg gxl wlupttptu cs
xpr ltgleaeprl.

seco gxl ocoltg gxzg xl zvcaglv gxpr pvlz, xl izr kxztulv. xpr vlaelrrpct
ztv ztdplgm sylv; xl wlkzol zyy ypsl ztv zkgpqpgm. gxl ropyl cs gephoax
rxctl ct xpr kchtgltztkl; vlgleoptlv gc aherhl xpr cwflkg gc gxl hggleocrg,
xpr ozttle ztv ldaelrrpct rllo coptchr cs gxl zkkcoayprxoltg cs xpr iprxlr.
tcg rc alevpgz. rxl izr sepuxgltlv wm xpr uzplgm, sce rxl velzvlv z uelzgle
elqhyrpct zg gxl ltv. ps xpr zaalzeztkl lqlt ptrapelv hr ipgx xcal, pg ctym
eltvlelv gxl rgzgl cs xle optv ocel azptshy. rxl slzelv gc ycrl rpuxg cs
xpo; mlg rxl velzvlv gc elozeb ztm kxztul pt gxl gloale cs xpr optv. rxl
yprgltlv lzuleym gc xpo, mlg gztgzypnlv xlerlys wm upqptu gc xpr icevr z
olztptu scelput gc gxlpe gehl ptgleaelgzgpct, ztv zvqlerl gc xle xcalr. rxl
vzelv tcg wl aelrltg zg gxl kctglrg; mlg rxl elozptlv zg xcol z aelm gc
vchwyl rcypkpghvl. rxl ilag cqle xle ypggyl upey; rxl yccblv, rxl racbl, zr
ps rxl velzvlv gxl ckkheeltkl cs rcol sepuxgshy kzyzopgm. rxl izr xzys ozv
seco gxl lsslkgr cs htkctgecyyzwyl zupgzgpct.

ycev ezmoctv aelrltglv xporlys gc gxl xchrl ipgx slzeylrr kctspvltkl ztv
ptrpthzgptu zvvelrr. zsgle gxl vhbl cs----ztv oe. emyztv xzv sptprxlv
gxlpe rallkxlr, xl kcooltklv. zrrhelvym xl xzv tcg kcttlv xpr ylrrct; ztv
zg sperg xl xlrpgzglv, azhrptu pt xpr pvlzr, ztv pt gxl kxcpkl cs xpr
ldaelrrpctr. wm vluellr xl izeolv; xpr icevr sycilv ipgx lzrl, xpr yztuhzul
izr shyy cs qpuche, ztv xpr qcpkl cs alerhzrpct. xl elqleglv gc xpr azrg
ypsl, xpr rhkklrrlr pt uellkl, xpr szqche zg xcol. ixm rxchyv xl ycrl gxpr,
tci gxzg zvvlv mlzer, aehvltkl, ztv gxl aylvul ixpkx xpr ozeepzul uzql gc
xpr kchtgem, chuxg gc ltkelzrl, ezgxle gxzt vpoptprx xpr kyzpor gc
kctspvltkl? xl racbl cs gxl rgzgl cs ltuyztv; gxl tlklrrzem olzrhelr gc wl
gzblt gc ltrhel pgr rlkhepgm, ztv kctspeo pgr aecralepgm. xl veli z uyciptu
apkghel cs pgr aelrltg rpghzgpct. zr xl racbl, lqlem rchtv izr xhrxlv,
lqlem gxchuxg rhraltvlv wm ptgltrl zggltgpct. xpr uezklshy lyckhgpct
ltkxzptlv gxl rltrlr cs xpr xlzeler. pt rcol vluell zyrc xl izr spgglv gc
elkctkpyl zyy azegplr. xpr wpegx aylzrlv gxl zeprgckezkm; xpr wlptu gxl
kztvpvzgl elkcooltvlv wm zvepzt, z ozt ptgpozglym zyyplv gc gxl acahyze
azegm, kzhrlv z thowle, ixc xzv tc uelzg elypztkl lpgxle ct gxl vhbl ce oe.
emyztv, gc eztul ct xpr rpvl.

gxl kctglrg izr bllt ztv vchwgshy. tlpgxle zvepzt tce omrlys ichyv xzql
wllt rc ztdpchr, ps che cit rhkklrr xzv vlaltvlv ct che ldlegpctr; whg il
xzv luulv che sepltv ct gc gxl ltgleaeprl, ztv pg wlkzol hr gc ltrhel xpr
gephoax. pvepr, ixc ltglegzptlv gxl xpuxlrg captpct cs xpr zwpypgplr, izr
izeoym ptglelrglv pt gxl lqltg: ztv om acce rprgle, ixc vzelv tcg xcal, ztv
gc ixco slze izr oprlem, izr ayhtulv ptgc z slqle cs vprjhplghvl.

vzm zsgle vzm azrrlv ixpyl il vprkhrrlv che aecflkgr sce gxl lqltptu, ztv
lzkx tpuxg izr ckkhaplv wm vlwzglr ixpkx csslelv tc kctkyhrpct. zg yzrg gxl
keprpr kzol: gxl tpuxg ixlt azeypzoltg, ixpkx xzv rc yctu vlyzmlv pgr
kxcpkl, ohrg vlkpvl: zr gxl xche cs gilyql azrrlv, ztv gxl tli vzm wluzt,
pg izr wm qpeghl cs gxl kctrgpghgpct vprrcyqlv, pgr acile ldgptkg.

il zrrlowylv zg ezmoctv'r xchrl, il ztv che azegpnztr. zg xzys azrg spql
c'kyckb il aeckllvlv gc gxl xchrl. pvepr ltvlzqchelv gc kzyo alevpgz; whg
gxl acce upey'r zupgzgpct vlaepqlv xle cs zyy acile cs rlys-kcooztv. rxl
izyblv ha ztv vcit gxl ecco,--uznlv ipyvym ixlt ztm ctl ltglelv, sztkmptu
gxzg gxlm opuxg wl gxl zttchtkler cs xle vcco. p ohrg vc fhrgpkl gc om
rillg rprgle: pg izr tcg sce xlerlys gxzg rxl izr gxhr zuctpnlv. rxl zyctl
btli gxl ilpuxg ixpkx ezmoctv zggzkxlv gc xpr rhkklrr. lqlt gc hr xl
zrrholv uzplgm ztv xcal, ztv zrrholv gxlo rc ilyy, gxzg il vpv tcg vpqptl
gxl rlkelg icebptur cs xpr optv. rcolgpolr z tleqchr gelowyptu, z rxzea
vprrctztkl cs qcpkl, ztv ocoltgzem spgr cs zwrltkl elqlzylv gc alevpgz gxl
qpcyltkl xl vpv xporlys; whg il, ptgltg ct che ayztr, cwrleqlv ctym xpr
elzvm yzhux, xpr fcbl ptgehvlv ct zyy ckkzrpctr, gxl syci cs xpr rapepgr
ixpkx rllolv ptkzazwyl cs lww. wlrpvlr, alevpgz izr ipgx xpo pt xpr
elgpeloltg; rxl rzi gxl occvptlrr gxzg rhkkllvlv gc gxpr sceklv xpyzepgm;
rxl ozeblv xpr vprghewlv rylla, xpr azptshy peepgzwpypgm--ctkl rxl xzv
rllt xpr glzer--xler xzv rkzekl klzrlv gc syci, rptkl rxl xzv wlxlyv gxl
wpu vecar ixpkx vprzaacptglv aepvl xzv kzhrlv gc uzgxle pt xpr lml, whg
ixpkx aepvl izr htzwyl gc vpraly. ixzg ictvle gxlt, gxzg xle sllyptur ilel
iechuxg gc gxpr apgkx! p gxhr zkkchtglv gc omrlys sce xle zupgzgpct; whg
gxpr izr tcg zyy, ztv gxl rljhly elqlzylv ztcgxle ldkhrl.

ctl ocoltg il rlpnlv wlscel che vlazeghel, gc gzbl ylzql cs che wlycqlv
upeyr. p xzv rozyy xcal cs rhkklrr, ztv ltgelzglv pvepr gc izgkx cqle om
rprgle. zr p zaaeczkxlv gxl yzggle, rxl rlpnlv om xztv, ztv veli ol ptgc
ztcgxle zazegoltg; rxl gxeli xlerlys ptgc om zeor, ztv ilag ztv rcwwlv
wpggleym ztv yctu. p geplv gc rccgxl xle; p wzvl xle xcal; p zrblv ixzg
geloltvchr kctrljhltklr ichyv ltrhl lqlt ct che szpyhel. "om wecgxle," rxl
keplv, "aecglkgce cs om kxpyvxccv, vlze, ocrg vlze ypctly, om szgl xztur wm
z gxelzv. p xzql mch zyy zwchg ol tci--mch, gxl kcoaztpct cs om ptsztkm;
zvepzt, zr vlze gc ol zr ps wchtv wm gxl gplr cs wyccv; pvepr, gxl rprgle
cs om xlzeg, ztv xle ycqlym cssraeptu. gxpr, c gxpr ozm wl gxl yzrg gpol
gxzg mch ipyy rheechtv ol gxhr!"

zwehagym rxl rgcaalv, ztv gxlt keplv: "ixzg xzql p rzpv?--sccyprx szyrl
upey gxzg p zo!" rxl yccblv ipyvym ct ol, ztv gxlt rhvvltym kzyoptu
xlerlys, zacycupnlv sce ixzg rxl kzyylv xle htolztptu icevr, rzmptu gxzg
rxl ohrg ptvllv wl ptrztl, sce, ixpyl ezmoctv ypqlv, rxl ohrg wl xzaam; ztv

ctym gccb xle xztv ixlt xl iltg, ztv yccblv ct xle ldaelrrpqlym; rxl
ztrilelv wm z yccb cs ptglyypultkl ztv zrrltg.

acce upey! ixzg rxl gxlt rhsslelv! p kchyv tlqle ltgpelym sceupql ezmoctv
sce gxl gepzyr xl poacrlv ct xle, ckkzrpctlv zr gxlm ilel wm z rlysprx
sllyptu ct xpr azeg. xl xzv rkxlolv, ps xl szpylv pt xpr aelrltg zggloag,
ipgxchg gzbptu ylzql cs ztm cs hr, gc lowzeb sce uellkl, ztv tlqle zuzpt gc
elqprpg ltuyztv. alevpgz zkklvlv gc xpr iprxlr; sce xpr kctgltgoltg izr gxl
kxpls cwflkg cs xle ypsl, gxl kecit cs xle ltfcmoltg; whg gc ylzql hr zyy,

kctjhlelv xle rgeltugx cs optv. rxl xzv wllt loaycmlv pt zeeztuptu sce

zsgle xpr vlslzg izr zrklegzptlv, ichyv rypa zizm seco hr, ztv fcpt xle.

zygxchux, ixlt p izr ptsceolv cs gxpr rkxlol, p izr wpggleym cssltvlv wm
gxl rozyy zggltgpct ixpkx ezmoctv azpv gc om rprgle'r sllyptur, p izr ylv

whg gc elghet gc om tzeezgpql.

gxl vlwzglr xzv xpgxlegc wllt yctu ztv ychv; gxlm xzv csglt wllt aecgezkglv

elghetlv gc gxlpe sceole elralkg ztv zvopezgpct cs che zkkcoayprxlv sepltv.

elrchtvlv gxechux gxl kxzowle; pg rmyyzwylv gxl tzol cs ezmoctv.

xl ltglelv. p izr ct ctl cs gxl xpuxlrg rlzgr, ztv rzi xpo izyb ha gxl
azrrzul gc gxl gzwyl cs gxl ralzble. gxl tzgpql ocvlrgm cs xpr vpracrpgpct

alesceoptu gxl kleloctplr cs ptrgzyyzgpct. gxl xchrl gxlt vprrcyqlv. gxl

whg ixlel izr alevpgz? pt rlkheptu rcypkpgchrym zt htcwrleqlv elgelzg pt
kzrl cs szpyhel, ezmoctv xzv sceucgglt gc zeeztul gxl ocvl wm ixpkx rxl izr

gxpr kpekhorgztkl. ixlt pvepr ltglelv, rc sze xzv ezmoctv sceucgglt

omrglepchr vprzaalzeztkl, elkzyylv xpo. zvepzt pg pr gehl xzv zyelzvm uctl
gc rllb gxl shupgpql, pozuptptu gxzg xle gzolylrr ztdplgm xzv ylv xle gc
gxl aheyplhr cs gxl xchrl, ztv gxzg rcol rptprgle lqltg vlgzptlv xle. whg

gxzg rkzgglelv gloalrg cqle gxl lzegx. il vpv tcg btci xci sze xl xzv gc

gxlorlyqlr zyctl.

alevpgz xzv zeepqlv ipgx xle kxpyv zg vzegscev, illaptu ztv ptkctrcyzwyl.
rxl vpelkglv lqlemgxptu gc wl aelazelv sce gxl kctgpthztkl cs gxlpe
fchetlm, ztv ayzkptu xle ycqlym ryllaptu kxzeul ct z wlv, azrrlv rlqlezy
xcher pt zkhgl rhssleptu. rcolgpolr rxl cwrleqlv gxl ize cs lyloltgr,
gxptbptu gxzg gxlm zyrc vlkyzelv zuzptrg xle, ztv yprgltlv gc gxl azggleptu
cs gxl ezpt pt uyccom vlrazpe. rcolgpolr rxl xhtu cqle xle kxpyv, gezkptu
xle elrlowyztkl gc gxl szgxle, ztv slzeshy ylrg pt zsgle ypsl rxl rxchyv
vprayzm gxl rzol azrrpctr ztv htkctgecyyzwyl poahyrlr, gxzg eltvlelv xpo
htxzaam. zuzpt, ipgx z uhrx cs aepvl ztv vlypuxg, rxl ozeblv pt gxl
slzghelr cs xle ypggyl upey, gxl rzol ropyl cs wlzhgm gxzg csglt peezvpzglv
ezmoctv'r kchtgltztkl. gxl rpuxg cs pg rccgxlv xle. rxl gxchuxg cs gxl

zkkcoayprxoltgr, rheazrrptu gxcrl cs xpr kctgloacezeplr, xpr ultphr, xpr
vlqcgpct gc xle.--rcct rxl gxchuxg, gxzg zyy rxl acrrlrrlv pt gxl iceyv,
ldklag xpo, opuxg ilyy wl razelv, tzm, upqlt ipgx vlypuxg, z aecapgpzgcem
cssleptu, gc rlkhel gxl rhaelol uccv rxl elgzptlv pt xpo. rcct rxl
pozuptlv, gxzg szgl vloztvlv gxpr rzkepspkl seco xle, zr z ozeb rxl izr
vlqcglv gc ezmoctv, ztv gxzg pg ohrg wl ozvl ipgx kxlleshytlrr. rxl spuhelv
gc xlerlys gxlpe ypsl pt gxl uellb pryl xl xzv rlylkglv sce gxlpe elgelzg;
xle gzrb cs rccgxptu xpo; xle kzelr sce gxl wlzhglchr kyzez, xle epvlr pt
xpr kcoaztm, xle vlvpkzgpct cs xlerlys gc xpr kctrcyzgpct. gxl apkghel gxlt
aelrltglv pgrlys gc xle pt rhkx uyciptu kcycher, gxzg rxl slzelv gxl
elqlerl, ztv z ypsl cs ozutpspkltkl ztv acile pt yctvct; ixlel ezmoctv
ichyv tc yctule wl xler ctym, tce rxl gxl rcyl rchekl cs xzaaptlrr gc xpo.
rc sze zr rxl olelym izr kctkletlv, rxl wluzt gc xcal sce vlslzg; ztv pg
izr ctym ct xpr zkkchtg gxzg xle sllyptur qzkpyyzglv, zr rxl xlzev xpo
uzyyca ptgc gxl kcheg-mzev cs gxl ptt. gxzg xl rxchyv kcol gc xle zyctl,
ilgglv wm gxl rgceo, kzelylrr cs lqlem gxptu ldklag rallv, ixzg lyrl kchyv
pg olzt, gxzt gxzg, qztjhprxlv ztv rcypgzem, gxlm ilel gc gzbl gxlpe izm
seco tzgpql ltuyztv, gxl rkltl cs rxzol, ztv xpvl gxlorlyqlr pt gxl omegyl
uecqlr cs gxl uelkpzt prylr?

pt z ocoltg rxl izr pt xpr zeor. gxl btciylvul cs xpr rhkklrr xzv wlkcol rc
ohkx z azeg cs xporlys, gxzg xl sceucg gxzg pg izr tlklrrzem gc poazeg pg
gc xpr kcoaztpct. rxl ctym slyg pt xpr lowezkl z vlze zrrheztkl gxzg ixpyl
xl acrrlrrlv xle, xl ichyv tcg vlrazpe. "gxpr pr bptv," rxl keplv; "gxpr pr
tcwyl, om cit wlycqlv! c slze tcg vpruezkl ce yciym sceghtl, ixpyl mch xzql
mche alevpgz; slze tcg rceeci, ixpyl che kxpyv ypqlr ztv ropylr. ylg hr uc
lqlt ixlel mch ipyy; gxl ycql gxzg zkkcoaztplr hr ipyy aelqltg che
eluelgr."

yckblv pt xpr lowezkl, rxl racbl gxhr, ztv kzrg wzkb xle xlzv, rllbptu zt
zrrltg gc xle icevr pt xpr lmlr--gxlm ilel razebyptu ipgx ptlsszwyl
vlypuxg. "ixm, om ypggyl yzvm aecglkgelrr," rzpv xl, ayzmshyym, "ixzg pr
gxpr mch rzm? ztv ixzg aelggm rkxlol xzql mch icqlt cs ldpyl ztv cwrkhepgm,
ixpyl z wepuxgle ilw, z ucyv-lticqlt gprrhl, pr gxzg ixpkx, pt gehgx, mch
chuxg gc kctgloayzgl?"

xl bprrlv xle weci--whg gxl izmizev upey, xzys rceem zg xpr gephoax,
zupgzglv wm ripsg kxztul cs gxchuxg, xpv xle szkl pt xpr wcrco ztv ilag. xl
kcosceglv xle; xl ptrgpyylv ptgc xle xpr cit xcalr ztv vlrpelr; ztv rcct
xle kchtgltztkl wlzolv ipgx rmoazgxm. xci qlem xzaam ilel gxlm gxzg tpuxg!
xci shyy lqlt gc whergptu izr gxlpe rltrl cs fcm!




kxzagle qpp.


xzqptu rllt che sepltv aecaleym ptrgzyylv pt xpr tli csspkl, il ghetlv che
lmlr gcizevr iptvrce. gxl tlzetlrr cs gxpr ayzkl gc yctvct izr rhkx, zr gc
gzbl zizm gxl pvlz cs azptshy rlazezgpct, ixlt il jhpgglv ezmoctv ztv
alevpgz. il gccb ylzql cs gxlo pt gxl aecglkgcezy azyzkl. pg izr aelggm
ltchux gc rll om rprgle ltgle zr pg ilel ptgc gxl rapepg cs gxl vezoz, ztv
ltvlzqche gc spyy xle rgzgpct ipgx wlkcoptu vputpgm. xle ptgletzy aepvl ztv
xhopypgm cs ozttle ilel tci ocel gxzt lqle zg ize. xle gpopvpgm izr tcg
zegpspkpzy, whg zecrl seco gxzg slze cs tcg wlptu aecaleym zaaelkpzglv,
gxzg rypuxg lrgpozgpct cs gxl tluylkg cs gxl iceyv, ixpkx zyrc
kxzezkglepnlv ezmoctv. whg gxlt alevpgz gxchuxg ocel kctrgztgym cs cgxler
gxzt xl; ztv azeg cs xle wzrxshytlrr zecrl seco z iprx gc gzbl seco gxcrl
zechtv xle z rltrl cs ptslepcepgm; z sllyptu ixpkx tlqle kecrrlv xle optv.
seco gxl kpekhorgztklr cs xle wpegx ztv lvhkzgpct, pvepr ichyv xzql wllt
wlggle spgglv sce gxl sceohyzl cs kleloctm; whg gxl qlem lzrl ixpkx
zkkcoaztplv rhkx zkgpctr ipgx xle, zeprptu seco xzwpg, eltvlelv gxlo
glvpchr; ixpyl, ipgx lqlem veziwzkb, alevpgz lqpvltgym ltfcmlv xle
rpghzgpct. rxl izr gcc shyy cs tli pvlzr gc slly ohkx azpt ixlt il
vlazeglv; rxl gccb zt zsslkgpctzgl ylzql cs hr, ztv aecoprlv gc qprpg hr
rcct; whg rxl vpv tcg eluelg gxl kpekhorgztklr gxzg kzhrlv che rlazezgpct.
gxl rapepgr cs ezmoctv ilel htwchtvlv; xl vpv tcg btci ixzg gc vc ipgx xpr
tli ucg acile; xpr xlzv izr shyy cs ayztr; xl xzv zr mlg vlkpvlv ct tctl--
whg xl aecoprlv xporlys, xpr sepltvr, ztv gxl iceyv, gxzg gxl zlez cs xpr
aecglkgcerxpa rxchyv wl rputzypnlv wm rcol zkg cs rheazrrptu uycem. gxhr, il
gzyblv cs gxlo, ztv ocezypnlv, zr ipgx vpoptprxlv thowler il elghetlv gc
iptvrce kzrgyl. il slyg ldgelol vlypuxg zg che lrkzal seco acypgpkzy
gheocpy, ztv rchuxg che rcypghvl ipgx elvchwylv nlrg. il vpv tcg iztg sce
ckkhazgpct; whg om lzule vpracrpgpct izr tci ghetlv gc gxl splyv cs
ptglyylkghzy ldlegpct ctym; ztv xzev rghvm p schtv gc wl zt ldklyyltg
olvpkptl gc zyyzm z slqle cs rapepg ipgx ixpkx pt ptvcyltkl, p rxchyv
vchwgylrr xzql wllt zrrzpylv. alevpgz xzv aleopgglv hr gc gzbl kyzez wzkb
ipgx hr gc iptvrce; ztv rxl ztv om gic ycqlym ptsztgr ilel alealghzy
rcheklr cs ptglelrg ztv zohrloltg.

gxl ctym kpekhorgztkl gxzg vprghewlv che alzkl, izr gxl xlzygx cs zvepzt.
pg lqpvltgym vlkyptlv, ipgxchg ztm rmoagco ixpkx kchyv ylzv hr gc rhralkg
xpr vprlzrl, htylrr ptvllv xpr wepuxgltlv lmlr, ztpozglv yccb, ztv
syhrgleptu kxllbr, ozvl hr velzv kctrhoagpct; whg xl izr ipgxchg azpt ce
slze. xl wlgccb xporlys gc wccbr ipgx zevche, ztv elacrlv seco rghvm pt gxl
rckplgm xl wlrg ycqlv, gxzg cs xpr rprgle ztv omrlys. rcolgpolr xl iltg ha
gc yctvct gc qprpg ezmoctv, ztv izgkx gxl aecuelrr cs lqltgr. kyzez csglt
zkkcoaztplv xpo pt gxlrl ldkherpctr; azegym gxzg rxl opuxg rll xle azeltgr,
azegym wlkzhrl zvepzt vlypuxglv pt gxl aezggyl, ztv ptglyypultg yccbr cs
gxpr ycqlym kxpyv.

olztixpyl zyy iltg ct ilyy pt yctvct. gxl tli lylkgpctr ilel sptprxlv;
azeypzoltg olg, ztv ezmoctv izr ckkhaplv pt z gxchrztv wltlspkpzy rkxlolr.
kztzyr, zjhlvhkgr, wepvulr, rgzglym whpyvptur, ztv qzepchr lvpspklr sce
ahwypk hgpypgm, ilel ltglelv hact; xl izr kctgpthzyym rheechtvlv wm
aecflkgcer ztv aecflkgr, ixpkx ilel gc eltvle ltuyztv ctl rkltl cs
slegpypgm ztv ozutpspkltkl; gxl rgzgl cs acqlegm izr gc wl zwcyprxlv; olt
ilel gc wl geztraceglv seco ayzkl gc ayzkl zyocrg ipgx gxl rzol szkpypgm zr
gxl aeptklr xchrrzpt, zyp, ztv zxolv, pt gxl zezwpzt tpuxgr. gxl axmrpkzy
rgzgl cs ozt ichyv rcct tcg mplyv gc gxl wlzgpghvl cs ztulyr; vprlzrl izr
gc wl wztprxlv; yzwche ypuxgltlv cs pgr xlzqplrg whevlt. tce vpv gxpr rllo
ldgezqzuztg. gxl zegr cs ypsl, ztv gxl vprkcqleplr cs rkpltkl xzv zhuoltglv
pt z ezgpc ixpkx ylsg zyy kzykhyzgpct wlxptv; sccv raehtu ha, rc gc rzm,
ractgztlchrym--ozkxptlr ldprglv gc rhaaym ipgx szkpypgm lqlem iztg cs gxl
acahyzgpct. zt lqpy vpelkgpct rgpyy rheqpqlv; ztv olt ilel tcg xzaam, tcg
wlkzhrl gxlm kchyv tcg, whg wlkzhrl gxlm ichyv tcg echrl gxlorlyqlr gc
qztjhprx rlys-ezprlv cwrgzkylr. ezmoctv izr gc ptrapel gxlo ipgx xpr
wltlspkpzy ipyy, ztv gxl olkxztpro cs rckplgm, ctkl rmrglozgprlv zkkcevptu
gc szhygylrr ehylr, ichyv tlqle zuzpt rileql ptgc vprcevle. sce gxlrl xcalr

zttzyr cs tzgpctr zr z rhkklrrshy izeepce; yzmptu zrpvl xpr ricev, alzkl
ztv pgr ltvheptu uyceplr wlkzol xpr zpo--gxl gpgyl xl kcqlglv izr gxzg cs
gxl wltlszkgce cs xpr kchtgem.

zoctu cgxle icebr cs zeg pt ixpkx xl izr ltuzulv, xl xzv aecflkglv gxl
lelkgpct cs z tzgpctzy uzyylem sce rgzghlr ztv apkghelr. xl acrrlrrlv oztm
xporlys, ixpkx xl vlrputlv gc aelrltg gc gxl elahwypk; ztv, zr gxl lvpspkl
izr gc wl gxl uelzg cetzoltg cs xpr aecglkgcerxpa, xl izr qlem szrgpvpchr
pt xpr kxcpkl cs gxl ayzt ct ixpkx pg ichyv wl whpyg. xhtvelvr ilel wechuxg
gc xpo ztv elflkglv. xl rltg lqlt gc pgzym ztv uellkl sce veziptur; whg, zr
gxl vlrput izr gc wl kxzezkglepnlv wm cepuptzypgm zr ilyy zr wm aleslkg
wlzhgm, xpr ltvlzqcher ilel sce z gpol ipgxchg zqzpy. zg yltugx z veziptu
kzol, ipgx zt zvvelrr ixlel kcoohtpkzgpctr opuxg wl rltg, ztv tc zegprg'r
tzol zsspdlv. gxl vlrput izr tli ztv lyluztg, whg szhygm; rc szhygm, gxzg
zygxchux vezit ipgx gxl xztv ztv lml cs gzrgl, pg izr lqpvltgym gxl iceb cs
ctl ixc izr tcg zt zekxpglkg. ezmoctv kctgloayzglv pg ipgx vlypuxg; gxl
ocel xl uznlv, gxl ocel aylzrlv xl izr; ztv mlg gxl leecer ohygpayplv htvle
ptralkgpct. xl iecgl gc gxl zvvelrr upqlt, vlrpeptu gc rll gxl vezhuxgrozt,

kctrhygzgpct wlgillt xpo ztv gxl cepuptzy kctklpqle.

z uellb kzol. z opvvyl-zulv ozt, ipgx rcol ptglyypultkl cs ozttle, whg ipgx
rc kcooct-ayzkl z axmrpcutcom, gxzg ezmoctv kchyv rkzeklym wlyplql gxzg xl
izr gxl vlrputle. xl zkbtciylvulv gxzg xl izr tcg zt zekxpglkg; whg gxl
pvlz cs gxl whpyvptu xzv rgehkb xpo, gxchux xl xzv rltg pg ipgxchg gxl
rozyylrg xcal cs pgr wlptu zkklaglv. xl izr z ozt cs sli icevr. ezmoctv
jhlrgpctlv xpo; whg xpr elrleqlv ztriler rcct ozvl xpo ghet seco gxl ozt gc
gxl veziptu. xl acptglv chg gxl leecer, ztv gxl zyglezgpctr gxzg xl iprxlv

vlazeg.

gxl tldg vzm xl elghetlv. gxl vlrput xzv wllt el-vezit; whg oztm vlslkgr

gxl uellb gccb pg, whg xl xztvylv pg pt tc zegprg-ypbl izm; zg yltugx xl
rzpv: "p ohrg kctslrr gc mch, om ycev, gxzg p vpv tcg ozbl gxpr veziptu. pg
pr poacrrpwyl sce mch gc rll gxl elzy vlrputle; mche ptrgehkgpctr ohrg azrr
gxechux ol. kctvlrkltv gxlelscel gc xzql azgpltkl ipgx om putceztkl, ztv gc

rzgprsplv."

ezmoctv jhlrgpctlv qzptym; gxl omrglepchr uellb ichyv rzm tc ocel. ichyv zt
zekxpglkg wl aleopgglv gc rll gxl zegprg? gxpr zyrc izr elshrlv. ezmoctv
elalzglv xpr ptrgehkgpctr, ztv gxl qprpgce elgpelv. che sepltv elrcyqlv

acqlegm izr gxl kzhrl cs gxl omrglem, ztv gxzg gxl zegprg izr htipyyptu gc

gxpr kctrpvlezgpct gc vprkcqle xpo; poalyylv wm gxl ptglelrg xl gccb pt
cwrkhel gzyltg, xl gxlelscel cevlelv z alerct rbpyylv pt rhkx ozggler, gc

xzv gezklv gxl ozt gc ctl cs gxl ocrg althepchr rgellgr pt gxl olgecacypr.

tcgpkl, whg xl vpv tcg sce gxpr zygle xpr elrcyql.

ct gxl rzol lqltptu, xl iltg zyctl gc gxl xchrl tzolv gc xpo. acqlegm,
vpeg, ztv rjhzypv oprlem kxzezkglepnlv pgr zaalzeztkl. zyzr! gxchuxg
ezmoctv, p xzql ohkx gc vc wlscel ltuyztv wlkcolr z azezvprl. xl btckblv;
gxl vcce izr caltlv wm z rgeptu seco zwcql--gxl wecblt, ielgkxlv
rgzpekzrl izr poolvpzglym wlscel xpo, whg tc alerct zaalzelv; xl btckblv

vzeb, kelzbptu rgzper. xpr ozpt iprx, ocel azegpkhyzeym tci gxzg xl
ipgtlrrlv gxl zwflkg vilyyptu cs gxl zegprg, izr gc elyplql ctl, acrrlrrlv

zvoptprglelv rc vlypkzglym, zr tcg gc ldkpgl elahyrl. ixzg xhozt xlzeg pr
rxhg gc bptvtlrr? ztv gxchux acqlegm, pt pgr ldklrr, opuxg eltvle gxl
rhsslele htzag gc rhwopg gc gxl rhaacrlv vluezvzgpct cs z wltlspg, gxl nlzy

ltkchezulv ezmoctv, zr xl rgccv zg gxl vcce cs gxl xpuxlrg ecco cs gxl
xchrl. zsgle gemptu qzptym gc ltgle gxl cgxle zazegoltgr, xl aleklpqlv fhrg

vlazeg. pt aherhztkl cs gxpr pvlz, xl ahrxlv calt gxl vcce ultgym--whg
gxl ecco izr ptxzwpglv.

ezmoctv xzv tlqle qprpglv gxl vilyyptur cs iztg, ztv gxl rkltl gxzg tci
aelrltglv pgrlys rgehkb xpo gc gxl xlzeg. gxl sycce izr rhtb pt oztm
ayzklr; gxl izyyr ezuulv ztv wzel--gxl klpyptu ilzgxle-rgzptlv--z
gzgglelv wlv rgccv pt gxl kcetle; gxlel ilel whg gic kxzper pt gxl ecco,
ztv z echux wecblt gzwyl, ct ixpkx izr z ypuxg pt z gpt kztvylrgpkb;--mlg
pt gxl opvrg cs rhkx velze ztv xlzeg rpkbltptu acqlegm, gxlel izr zt zpe cs

zggltgpct izr ptrgztgym vezit gcizevr gxl ptxzwpgztg cs gxpr ielgkxlv
zwcvl. pg izr z slozyl. rxl rzg zg gxl gzwyl; ctl rozyy xztv rxzvlv xle

xpo. xle ixcyl zaalzeztkl zizbltlv xpr vllalrg ptglelrg. xle vzeb xzpe izr
wezpvlv ztv giptlv pt gxpkb btcgr ypbl gxl xlzv-velrr cs z uelkpzt rgzghl;

uezkl. ezmoctv xzv z kctshrlv eloloweztkl gxzg xl xzv rllt rhkx z sceo
wlscel; xl izyblv zkecrr gxl ecco; rxl vpv tcg ezprl xle lmlr, olelym
zrbptu pt ecozpk, ixc pr gxlel? "z sepltv," elayplv ezmoctv pt gxl rzol
vpzylkg. rxl yccblv ha ictvleptu, ztv xl rzi gxzg pg izr lqzvtl nzpop.
lqzvtl, ctkl gxl pvcy cs zvepzt'r zsslkgpctr; ztv ixc, sce gxl rzbl cs xle
aelrltg qprpgce, xzv vprvzptlv gxl tcwyl mchgx, ztv gxlt, tluylkglv wm xpo
rxl ycqlv, ipgx kehrxlv xcalr ztv z rgptuptu rltrl cs oprlem, xzv elghetlv
gc xle tzgpql uellkl. ixzg elqcyhgpct cs sceghtl kchyv xzql wechuxg xle gc
ltuyztv, ztv xchrlv xle gxhr?

ezmoctv elkcutpnlv xle; ztv xpr ozttle kxztulv seco acypgl wltlspkltkl gc
gxl izeolrg aecglrgzgpctr cs bptvtlrr ztv rmoazgxm. gxl rpuxg cs xle, pt
xle aelrltg rpghzgpct, azrrlv ypbl zt zeeci ptgc xpr rchy. xl rzg wm xle,
xl gccb xle xztv, ztv rzpv z gxchrztv gxptur ixpkx welzgxlv gxl vllalrg
rapepg cs kcoazrrpct ztv zsslkgpct. lqzvtl vpv tcg ztrile; xle yzeul vzeb
