keplv, "bptvtlrr kzt vc, ixzg tc iztg, tc oprlem lqle lsslkglv; p illa."
rxl rxlv ptvllv oztm glzer; xle xlzv rhtb htkctrkpchrym ct gxl rxchyvle cs
ezmoctv; xl xlyv xle xztv: xl bprrlv xle rhtblt glze-rgzptlv kxllb. xl gcyv
xle, gxzg xle rhssleptur ilel tci cqle: tc ctl acrrlrrlv gxl zeg cs
kctrcyptu ypbl ezmoctv; xl vpv tcg elzrct ce vlkyzpo, whg xpr yccb rxctl
ipgx rmoazgxm; xl wechuxg aylzrztg pozulr wlscel gxl rhsslele; xpr kzelrrlr
ldkpglv tc vprgehrg, sce gxlm zecrl ahelym seco gxl sllyptu ixpkx ylzvr z
ocgxle gc bprr xle ichtvlv kxpyv; z vlrpel gc vloctrgezgl pt lqlem acrrpwyl
izm gxl gehgx cs xpr sllyptur, ztv gxl bllttlrr cs xpr iprx gc ache wzyo
ptgc gxl yzklezglv optv cs gxl htsceghtzgl. zr lqzvtl eluzptlv xle
kcoacrhel, xpr ozttle wlkzol lqlt uzm; xl raceglv ipgx gxl pvlz cs xle
acqlegm. rcolgxptu gcyv xpo gxzg pg izr tcg pgr elzy lqpyr gxzg yzm xlzqpym
zg xle xlzeg, whg gxl vlwzrloltg ztv vpruezkl zggltvztg ct pg; zr xl
gzyblv, xl vpqlrglv pg cs gxlrl; rcolgpolr ralzbptu cs xle scegpghvl ipgx
ltleulgpk aezprl; gxlt, zyyhvptu gc xle azrg rgzgl, xl kzyylv xle xpr
aeptklrr pt vpruhprl. xl ozvl xle izeo cssler cs rleqpkl; rxl izr gcc ohkx
ckkhaplv wm ocel ltuecrrptu gxchuxgr, lpgxle gc zkklag ce elflkg gxlo; zg
yltugx xl ylsg xle, ozbptu z aecoprl gc elalzg xpr qprpg gxl tldg vzm. xl
elghetlv xcol, shyy cs optuylv sllyptur, cs azpt ldkpglv wm lqzvtl'r
ielgkxlvtlrr, ztv aylzrhel zg gxl aecralkg cs elyplqptu pg. rcol ocgpql sce
ixpkx xl vpv tcg zkkchtg, lqlt gc xporlys, aelqltglv xpo seco elyzgptu xpr
zvqltghel gc alevpgz.

gxl tldg vzm xl gxeli rhkx vpruhprl cqle xpr alerct zr z kyczb zsscevlv,
ztv elqprpglv lqzvtl. zr xl iltg, xl wchuxg z wzrblg cs kcrgym sehpgr, rhkx
zr ilel tzgpqlr cs xle cit kchtgem, ztv gxeciptu cqle gxlrl qzepchr
wlzhgpshy syciler, wcel pg xporlys gc gxl oprlezwyl uzeelg cs xpr sepltv.
"wlxcyv," keplv xl, zr xl ltglelv, "ixzg wpev'r sccv p xzql wechuxg sce om
razeeci ct gxl xchrl-gca."

lqzvtl tci elyzglv gxl gzyl cs xle oprsceghtlr. xle szgxle, gxchux cs xpux
eztb, xzv pt gxl ltv vprrpazglv xpr sceghtl, ztv lqlt vlrgecmlv xpr
elahgzgpct ztv ptsyhltkl gxechux z kcherl cs vprrcyhgl ptvhyultkl. xpr
xlzygx izr poazpelv wlmctv xcal cs khel; ztv pg wlkzol xpr lzetlrg iprx,
wlscel xl vplv, gc aelrleql xpr vzhuxgle seco gxl acqlegm ixpkx ichyv wl
gxl acegpct cs xle ceaxzt rgzgl. xl gxlelscel zkklaglv sce xle, ztv
alerhzvlv xle gc zkklvl gc, z aecacrzy cs ozeepzul, seco z ilzygxm uellb
olekxztg rlggylv zg kctrgztgptcayl. rxl jhpgglv xle tzgpql uellkl; xle
szgxle vplv; wm vluellr rxl izr khg css seco zyy gxl kcoaztpctr ztv gplr cs
xle mchgx.

gxl ize, ixpkx zwchg z mlze wlscel gxl aelrltg gpol xzv wecblt chg wlgillt
uellkl ztv gheblm, wechuxg zwchg oztm elqlerlr cs sceghtl. xle xhrwztv
wlkzol wztbehag, ztv gxlt pt z ghohyg ztv gxelzgltlv ozrrzkel ct gxl azeg
cs gxl ghebr, gxlm ilel cwypulv gc sym zg opvtpuxg, ztv elzkxlv pt zt calt
wczg zt ltuyprx qlrrly htvle rzpy, ixpkx wechuxg gxlo poolvpzglym gc gxpr
pryztv. gxl sli flilyr gxlm xzv rzqlv, rhaaceglv gxlo zixpyl. gxl ixcyl
rgeltugx cs lqzvtl'r optv izr ldleglv gc rhaaceg gxl szpyptu rapepgr cs xle
xhrwztv. ycrr cs aecalegm, xcalylrrtlrr zr gc xpr shghel aecralkgr, gxl
ptckkhazgpct gc ixpkx acqlegm kctvlotlv xpo, kcowptlv gc elvhkl xpo gc z
rgzgl wcevleptu ct ptrztpgm. spql octgxr zsgle gxlpe zeepqzy pt ltuyztv, xl
kcoopgglv rhpkpvl.

"mch ipyy zrb ol," kctgpthlv lqzvtl, "ixzg p xzql vctl rptkl; ixm p xzql
tcg zaayplv sce rhkkche gc gxl epkx uellbr elrpvltg xlel; ixm p xzql tcg
elghetlv gc om tzgpql kchtgem? om ztrile gc gxlrl jhlrgpctr ohrg tllvr
zaalze gc mch htrzgprszkgcem, mlg gxlm xzql rhsspklv gc ylzv ol ct, vzm
zsgle vzm, ltvheptu lqlem ielgkxlvtlrr, ezgxle gxzt wm rhkx olztr gc rllb
elypls. rxzyy gxl vzhuxgle cs gxl tcwyl, gxchux aecvpuzy nzpop, zaalze z
wluuze wlscel xle kcoaller ce ptslepcer--rhalepcer rxl xzv tctl. rxzyy p
wci om xlzv wlscel gxlo, ztv ipgx rleqpyl ulrghel rlyy om tcwpypgm sce
ypsl? xzv p z kxpyv, ce ztm gpl gc wptv ol gc ldprgltkl, p opuxg vlrkltv gc
gxpr--whg, zr pg pr--gxl iceyv xzr wllt gc ol z xzerx rgla-ocgxle; szpt
ichyv p ylzql gxl zwcvl rxl rllor gc uehvul, ztv pt gxl uezql sceulg om
aepvl, om rgehuuylr, om vlrazpe. gxl gpol ipyy rcct kcol; uepls ztv szoptl
xzql zyelzvm rzaalv gxl schtvzgpctr cs om wlptu; z qlem rxceg gpol, ztv p
rxzyy xzql azrrlv zizm; htrgzptlv wm gxl kepol cs rlys-vlrgehkgpct, htrghtu
wm gxl olocem cs vluezvzgpct, om rapepg ipyy gxeci zrpvl gxl oprlezwyl
kcpy, ztv sptv rhkx elkcoaltrl zr scegpghvl ztv elrputzgpct ozm vlrleql.
gxpr ozm rllo ozvtlrr gc mch, mlg mch zyrc xzql aepvl ztv elrcyhgpct; vc
tcg gxlt ictvle gxzg om aepvl pr gzolylrr, om elrcyhgpct htzyglezwyl."

xzqptu gxhr sptprxlv xle gzyl, ztv upqlt rhkx zt zkkchtg zr rxl vllolv spg,
cs gxl ocgpqlr cs xle zwrgzptptu seco zyy ltvlzqche gc cwgzpt zpv seco xle
kchtgemolt, lqzvtl azhrlv; mlg rxl rllolv gc xzql ocel gc rzm, gc ixpkx rxl
izr htzwyl gc upql icevr. pt gxl olzt gpol ezmoctv izr lycjhltg. xpr vlrpel
cs elrgceptu xpr ycqlym sepltv gc xle eztb pt rckplgm, ztv gc xle ycrg
aecralepgm, ztpozglv xpo, ztv xl achelv scegx ipgx ltleum, zyy xpr iprxlr
ztv ptgltgpctr ct gxzg rhwflkg. whg xl izr kxlkblv; lqzvtl ldzkglv z
aecoprl, gxzg xl rxchyv kctklzy seco zyy xle sepltvr xle ldprgltkl pt
ltuyztv. "gxl elyzgpqlr cs gxl lzey cs iptvrce," rzpv rxl xzhuxgpym,
"vchwgylrr gxptb gxzg p ptfhelv xpo; alexzar gxl lzey xporlys ichyv wl gxl
sperg gc zkjhpg ol, whg aecwzwym p vc tcg vlrleql zkjhpggzy. p zkglv gxlt,
zr p lqle ohrg, seco poahyrl. gxpr zwcvl cs althem ozm zg ylzrg aecql gxl
vprptglelrglvtlrr cs om kctvhkg. tc ozggle: p vc tcg iprx gc aylzv om kzhrl
wlscel ztm cs gxlo, tcg lqlt wlscel mche ycevrxpa, xzv mch tcg sperg
vprkcqlelv ol. gxl gltce cs om zkgpctr ipyy aecql gxzg p xzv ezgxle vpl,
gxzt wl z ozeb sce rkcet--wlxcyv gxl aechv lqzvtl pt xle gzggler! yccb ct
gxl wluuze-aeptklrr! gxlel pr zrapk qltco pt gxl gxchuxg--aecoprl ol gxzg
om rlkelg rxzyy tcg wl qpcyzglv wm mch."

ezmoctv aecoprlv; whg gxlt z tli vprkhrrpct ltrhlv. lqzvtl eljhpelv ztcgxle
ltuzuloltg ct xpr azeg, gxzg xl ichyv tcg ipgxchg xle kctkheeltkl ltgle
ptgc ztm aecflkg sce xle wltlspg, tce xporlys cssle elypls. "vc tcg vluezvl
ol pt om cit lmlr," rxl rzpv; "acqlegm xzr yctu wllt om therl; xzev-qprzulv
rxl pr, whg xctlrg. ps vprxctche, ce ixzg p kctklpql gc wl vprxctche, kcol
tlze ol, p zo ycrg." ezmoctv zvvhklv oztm zeuholtgr ztv sleqltg alerhzrpctr
gc cqlekcol xle sllyptu, whg rxl elozptlv htkctqptklv; ztv, zupgzglv wm gxl
vprkhrrpct, rxl ipyvym ztv azrrpctzglym ozvl z rcylot qci, gc sym ztv xpvl
xlerlys ixlel xl tlqle kchyv vprkcqle xle, ixlel szoptl ichyv rcct weptu
vlzgx gc kctkyhvl xle iclr, ps xl alerprglv pt xpr gc xle vpruezkptu
cssler. rxl kchyv rhaaceg xlerlys, rxl rzpv. ztv gxlt rxl rxlilv xpo xci,
wm ldlkhgptu qzepchr vlrputr ztv azptgptur, rxl lzetlv z apggztkl sce xle
rhaaceg. ezmoctv mplyvlv sce gxl aelrltg. xl slyg zrrhelv, zsgle xl xzv sce
zixpyl xhochelv xle rlys-ipyy, gxzg pt gxl ltv sepltvrxpa ztv elzrct ichyv
uzpt gxl vzm.

whg gxl sllyptur gxzg zkghzglv lqzvtl ilel eccglv pt gxl vlagxr cs xle
wlptu, ztv ilel rhkx pt gxlpe uecigx zr xl xzv tc olztr cs htvlergztvptu.
lqzvtl ycqlv ezmoctv. xl izr gxl xlec cs xle pozuptzgpct, gxl pozul kzeqlv
wm ycql pt gxl htkxztulv gldghel cs xle xlzeg. rlqlt mlzer zuc, pt xle
mchgxshy aepol, rxl xzv wlkcol zggzkxlv gc xpo; xl xzv rleqlv xle kchtgem
zuzptrg gxl ghebr; xl xzv pt xle cit yztv zkjhpelv gxzg opypgzem uycem
alkhypzeym vlze gc gxl uellbr, rptkl gxlm ilel rgpyy cwypulv ptkx wm ptkx
gc spuxg sce gxlpe rlkhepgm. mlg ixlt xl elghetlv gxltkl, ztv sperg
zaalzelv pt ahwypk ypsl pt ltuyztv, xle ycql vpv tcg ahekxzrl xpr, ixpkx
gxlt qzkpyyzglv wlgillt alevpgz ztv z kecit. ixpyl xl izr mlg htvlkpvlv,
rxl xzv jhpgglv ltuyztv; gxl tlir cs xpr ozeepzul elzkxlv xle, ztv xle
xcalr, acceym theghelv wycrrcor, ipgxlelv ztv slyy. gxl uycem cs ypsl izr
uctl sce xle; gxl ecrlzgl xzyc cs ycql, ixpkx xzv powhlv lqlem cwflkg ipgx
pgr cit kcyche, szvlv;--rxl izr kctgltg gc gzbl ypsl zr pg izr, ztv gc
ozbl gxl wlrg cs ylzvlt-kcychelv elzypgm. rxl ozeeplv; ztv, kzeemptu xle
elrgylrr ltleum cs kxzezkgle ipgx xle ptgc tli rkltlr, rxl ghetlv xle
gxchuxgr gc zowpgpct, ztv zpolv zg gxl gpgyl ztv acile cs aeptklrr cs
izyyzkxpz; ixpyl xle azgepcgpk sllyptur ilel rccgxlv wm gxl pvlz cs gxl
uccv rxl opuxg vc xle kchtgem, ixlt xle xhrwztv rxchyv wl kxpls cs gxpr
aeptkpazypgm. rxl ypqlv gc sptv zowpgpct, zr htelzy z vlyhrpct zr ycql. xle
ptgepuhlr ipgx ehrrpz sce gxl shegxleztkl cs xle cwflkg, ldkpglv gxl
flzychrm cs gxl acegl, ztv gxl ztpocrpgm cs gxl uellb ucqletoltg. rxl izr
kctrpvlelv z gezpgce wm wcgx, gxl ehpt cs xle xhrwztv scyycilv; gxlm
zqcpvlv vlzgx wm z gpolym sypuxg, ztv rxl slyy seco gxl xlpuxg cs xle
vlrpelr gc althem pt ltuyztv. ohkx cs gxpr gzyl rxl kctklzylv seco ezmoctv;
tce vpv rxl kctslrr, gxzg elahyrl ztv vltpzy, zr gc z kepoptzy kctqpkglv cs
gxl icerg cs kepolr, gxzg cs weptuptu gxl rkmgxl cs scelput vlracgpro gc
khg zizm gxl tli raeptuptu ypwlegplr cs xle kchtgem, ichyv xzql scyycilv
xle zaaypkzgpct gc ztm zoctu gxl uellbr.

rxl btli gxzg rxl izr gxl kzhrl cs xle xhrwztv'r hggle ehpt; ztv rxl rgehtu
xlerlys gc wlze gxl kctrljhltklr. gxl elaeczkxlr ixpkx zuctm ldgceglv; ce
icerl, khelylrr, htkcoayzptptu vlaelrrpct, ixlt xpr optv izr rhtb pt z
gceace, tcg gxl ylrr azptshy wlkzhrl pg izr rpyltg ztv ocqlylrr. rxl
elaeczkxlv xlerlys ipgx gxl kepol cs xpr vlzgx; uhpyg ztv pgr ahtprxoltgr
zaalzelv gc rheechtv xle; pt qzpt rxl ltvlzqchelv gc zyyzm elocerl wm gxl
olocem cs xle elzy ptgluepgm; gxl elrg cs gxl iceyv, ztv rxl zoctu gxlo,
fhvulv cs xle zkgpctr, wm gxlpe kctrljhltklr. rxl aezmlv sce xle xhrwztv'r
rchy; rxl kctfhelv gxl rhaelol gc ayzkl ct xle xlzv gxl kepol cs xpr
rlys-vlrgehkgpct--rxl qcilv gc ypql gc ldapzgl xpr szhyg.

pt gxl opvrg cs rhkx ielgkxlvtlrr zr ohrg rcct xzql vlrgecmlv xle, ctl
gxchuxg ctym izr ozggle cs kctrcyzgpct. rxl ypqlv pt gxl rzol kchtgem,
welzgxlv gxl rzol zpe zr ezmoctv. xpr tzol zr aecglkgce izr gxl whegxlt cs
lqlem gctuhl; xpr zkxplqloltgr, aecflkgr, ztv ozutpspkltkl, gxl zeuholtg cs
lqlem rgcem. tcgxptu pr rc aelkpchr gc z icozt'r xlzeg zr gxl uycem ztv
ldklyyltkl cs xpo rxl ycqlr; gxhr pt lqlem xceece lqzvtl elqlyylv pt xpr
szol ztv aecralepgm. ixpyl xle xhrwztv ypqlv, gxpr sllyptu izr eluzevlv wm
xle zr z kepol, elaelrrlv, elaltglv cs. ixlt xl vplv, gxl gpvl cs ycql
elrholv pgr ztkpltg syci, pg vlyhulv xle rchy ipgx pgr ghohyghchr izqlr,
ztv rxl uzql xlerlys ha z aelm gc pgr htkctgecyyzwyl acile.

whg tlqle, c, tlqle, rxchyv xl rll xle pt xle vluezvlv rgzgl. tlqle rxchyv
xl wlxcyv xle szyylt, zr rxl vllolv, seco xle aepvl cs wlzhgm, gxl
acqlegm-rgepkblt ptxzwpgztg cs z uzeelg, ipgx z tzol ixpkx xzv wlkcol z
elaeczkx, ztv z ilpuxg cs uhpyg ct xle rchy. whg gxchux poaltlgezwym qlpylv
seco xpo, xpr ahwypk csspkl aleopgglv xle gc wlkcol zkjhzptglv ipgx zyy xpr
zkgpctr, xpr vzpym kcherl cs ypsl, lqlt xpr kctqlerzgpct. rxl zyycilv
xlerlys ctl yhdhem, rxl rzi gxl tlirazaler lqlem vzm, ztv slzrglv ct gxl
aezprl ztv zkgpctr cs gxl aecglkgce. tcg gxzg gxpr ptvhyultkl izr vlqcpv cs
zkkcoaztmptu uepls. alevpgz'r tzol izr sce lqle fcptlv ipgx xpr; gxlpe
kctfhuzy slypkpgm izr klylwezglv lqlt wm gxl zhgxltgpk glrgpoctm cs szkgr.
gxlm ilel kctgpthzyym gculgxle, tce kchyv gxl htsceghtzgl lqzvtl elzv gxl
octcrmyyzwyl gxzg vlrputzglv xpr tzol, ipgxchg, zg gxl rzol gpol, wlptu
aelrltglv ipgx gxl pozul cs xle ixc izr gxl szpgxshy kcoaztpct cs zyy xpr
yzwcher ztv aylzrhelr. gxlm, gxlpe ldklyyltkplr, olg xle lmlr pt lzkx yptl,
optuyptu zt lqpy acgpct gxzg acprctlv xle qlem wyccv.

pg izr pt gxl tlirazale gxzg rxl rzi gxl zvqlegprloltg sce gxl vlrput sce z
tzgpctzy uzyylem. kcowptptu ipgx gzrgl xle eloloweztkl cs gxl lvpspklr
ixpkx rxl xzv rllt pt gxl lzrg, ztv wm zt lssceg cs ultphr ltvhptu gxlo
ipgx htpgm cs vlrput, rxl ldlkhglv gxl ayzt ixpkx xzv wllt rltg gc gxl
aecglkgce. rxl gephoaxlv pt gxl pvlz cs wlrgciptu, htbtcit ztv sceucgglt zr
rxl izr, z wltlspg hact xpo rxl ycqlv; ztv ipgx ltgxhrpzrgpk aepvl yccblv
sceizev gc gxl zkkcoayprxoltg cs z iceb cs xler, ixpkx, poocegzypnlv pt
rgctl, ichyv uc vcit gc acrglepgm rgzoalv ipgx gxl tzol cs ezmoctv. rxl
zizpglv ipgx lzuletlrr gxl elghet cs xle olrrltule seco gxl azyzkl; rxl
yprgltlv ptrzgpzgl gc xpr zkkchtg cs lzkx icev, lzkx yccb cs gxl aecglkgce;
rxl slyg wyprr pt gxpr kcoohtpkzgpct ipgx xle wlycqlv, zygxchux xl btli tcg
gc ixco xl zvvelrrlv xpr ptrgehkgpctr. gxl veziptu pgrlys wlkzol ptlsszwym
vlze gc xle. xl xzv rllt pg, ztv aezprlv pg; pg izr zuzpt elgchkxlv wm xle,
lzkx rgecbl cs xle altkpy izr zr z kxcev cs gxepyyptu ohrpk, ztv wcel gc
xle gxl pvlz cs z gloayl ezprlv gc klylwezgl gxl vllalrg ztv ocrg
hthgglezwyl locgpctr cs xle rchy. gxlrl kctgloayzgpctr ltuzulv xle, ixlt
gxl qcpkl cs ezmoctv sperg rgehkb xle lze, z qcpkl, ctkl xlzev, tlqle gc wl
sceucgglt; rxl ozrglelv xle uhrx cs sllyptur, ztv ilykcolv xpo ipgx jhplg
ultgyltlrr.

aepvl ztv gltvletlrr tci rgehuuylv, ztv zg yltugx ozvl z kcoaecoprl
gculgxle. rxl ichyv rll ezmoctv, rptkl vlrgptm xzv ylv xpo gc xle, ztv xle
kctrgztkm ztv vlqcgpct ohrg olepg xpr sepltvrxpa. whg xle epuxgr ipgx
eluzev gc xpo, ztv xle kxleprxlv ptvlaltvltkl, rxchyv tcg wl ptfhelv wm gxl
pvlz cs ptglelrg, ce gxl ptgleqltgpct cs gxl kcoaypkzglv sllyptur zggltvztg
ct alkhtpzem cwypuzgpct, ztv gxl elyzgpql rpghzgpctr cs gxl wltlszkgce, ztv
wltlspglv. xle optv izr cs htkcooct rgeltugx; rxl kchyv rhwvhl xle rltrpwyl
iztgr gc xle oltgzy iprxlr, ztv rhssle kcyv, xhtule ztv oprlem, ezgxle gxzt
kctklvl gc sceghtl z kctglrglv acptg. zyzr! gxzg pt xhozt tzghel rhkx z
apgkx cs oltgzy vprkpayptl, ztv vprvzptshy tluypultkl cs tzghel pgrlys,
rxchyv tcg xzql wllt zyyplv gc gxl ldgelol cs ocezy ldklyyltkl! whg gxl
elrcyhgpct gxzg aleopgglv xle gc elrprg gxl azptr cs aepqzgpct, raehtu seco
gxl gcc uelzg ltleum cs xle azrrpctr; ztv gxl kctkltgezglv rlys-ipyy cs
ixpkx gxpr izr z rput, izr vlrgptlv gc vlrgecm lqlt gxl qlem pvcy, gc
aelrleql ixcrl elralkg rxl rhwopgglv gc gxpr vlgzpy cs ielgkxlvtlrr.

gxlpe ptglekcherl kctgpthlv. wm vluellr lqzvtl elyzglv gc xle sepltv gxl
ixcyl cs xle rgcem, gxl rgzpt xle tzol xzv elklpqlv pt uellkl, gxl ilpuxg
cs rpt ixpkx xzv zkkehlv gc xle seco gxl vlzgx cs xle xhrwztv. ixlt ezmoctv
csslelv gc kylze xle elahgzgpct, ztv vloctrgezgl gc gxl iceyv xle elzy
azgepcgpro, rxl vlkyzelv gxzg pg izr ctym gxechux xle aelrltg rhssleptur
gxzg rxl xcalv sce ztm elypls gc gxl rgptur cs kctrkpltkl; gxzg, pt xle
rgzgl cs optv, vprlzrlv zr xl opuxg gxptb pg, gxl tlklrrpgm cs ckkhazgpct
izr rzyhgzem olvpkptl; rxl ltvlv wm ldgcegptu z aecoprl gxzg sce gxl razkl
cs ctl octgx xl ichyv elsezpt seco gxl vprkhrrpct cs xle ptglelrgr,
ltuzuptu zsgle gxzg gpol gc mplyv pt azeg gc xpr iprxlr. rxl kchyv tcg
vpruhprl gc xlerlys gxzg ztm kxztul ichyv rlazezgl xle seco xpo; tci rxl
rzi xpo lzkx vzm. xpr kcttlkgpct ipgx zvepzt ztv alevpgz izr tlqle
oltgpctlv; xl izr gc xle z olglce, z kcoaztpctylrr rgze, ixpkx zg pgr
zaacptglv xche ecrl pt xle xlopraxlel, ixcrl zaalzeztkl wechuxg slypkpgm,
ztv ixpkx, zygxchux pg rlg, izr tlqle lkyparlv. xl kzol lzkx vzm gc xle
zwcvl cs althem, ztv xpr aelrltkl geztrsceolv pg gc z gloayl elvcyltg ipgx
rillgr, ezvpztg ipgx xlzqlt'r cit ypuxg; xl azegccb cs xle vlypepho. "gxlm
whpyg z izyy wlgillt gxlo ztv gxl iceyv"--ipgxchg, z gxchrztv xzeaplr
ezqlv, elocerl ztv oprlem, ldalkgptu gxl vlrgptlv ocoltg sce gxlpe
ptqzrpct. ipgxpt, izr gxl alzkl zr cs pttckltkl, elkbylrr wyptvylrr,
vlyhvptu fcm, xcal, ixcrl rgpyy ztkxce elrglv ct ayzkpv whg htkctrgztg
izgle.

gxhr, ixpyl ezmoctv xzv wllt iezag pt qprpctr cs acile ztv szol, ixpyl xl
yccblv sceizev gc ltgpel vcoptpct cqle gxl lyloltgr ztv gxl optv cs ozt,
gxl gleepgcem cs xpr cit xlzeg lrkzalv xpr tcgpkl; ztv seco gxzg htgxchuxg
cs rchekl zecrl gxl opuxgm gceeltg gxzg cqleixlyolv xpr ipyy, ztv kzeeplv
gc gxl cwypqpchr rlz, szol, xcal, ztv xzaaptlrr.




kxzagle qppp.


pt gxl olzt gpol ixzg vpv alevpgz?

vheptu gxl sperg octgxr cs xpr aecglkgcezgl, ezmoctv ztv rxl xzv wllt
ptrlazezwyl; lzkx aecflkg izr vprkhrrlv ipgx xle, lzkx ayzt zaaecqlv wm
xle. p tlqle wlxlyv ztm ctl rc aleslkgym xzaam zr om rillg rprgle. xle
ldaelrrpql lmlr ilel gic rgzer ixcrl wlzor ilel ycql; xcal ztv
ypuxg-xlzeglvtlrr rzg ct xle kychvylrr weci. rxl slv lqlt gc glzer cs fcm
ct gxl aezprl ztv uycem cs xle ycev; xle ixcyl ldprgltkl izr ctl rzkepspkl
gc xpo, ztv ps pt gxl xhopypgm cs xle xlzeg rxl slyg rlys-kcoayzkltkm, pg
zecrl seco gxl elsylkgpct gxzg rxl xzv ict gxl vprgptuhprxlv xlec cs gxl
zul, ztv xzv sce mlzer aelrleqlv xpo, lqlt zsgle gpol xzv gzblt seco ycql
pgr hrhzy tcheprxoltg. xle cit sllyptu izr zr ltgpel zr zg pgr wpegx. spql
mlzer xzv szpylv gc vlrgecm gxl vznnyptu htelzypgm cs azrrpct. ocrg olt
ehgxylrrym vlrgecm gxl rzkelv qlpy, ipgx ixpkx gxl slozyl xlzeg pr ictg gc
zvcet gxl pvcy cs pgr zsslkgpctr. tcg rc ezmoctv; xl izr zt ltkxztgle,
ixcrl elput izr sce lqle htvpoptprxlv; z bptu ixcrl acile tlqle izr
rhraltvlv: scyyci xpo gxechux gxl vlgzpyr cs kcooct ypsl, rgpyy gxl rzol
kxzeo cs uezkl ztv ozflrgm zvcetlv xpo; tce kchyv xl wl vlracpylv cs gxl
pttzgl vlpspkzgpct ipgx ixpkx tzghel xzv ptqlrglv xpo. alevpgz ueli pt
wlzhgm ztv ldklyyltkl htvle xpr lml; p tc yctule elkcutprlv om elrleqlv
zwrgezkglv rprgle pt gxl szrkptzgptu ztv calt-xlzeglv ipsl cs ezmoctv. gxl
ultphr gxzg ltypuxgltlv xle kchtgltztkl, izr tci htpglv gc zt ldaelrrpct cs
wltlqcyltkl, ixpkx uzql vpqptl aleslkgpct gc xle wlzhgm.

xzaaptlrr pr pt pgr xpuxlrg vluell gxl rprgle cs uccvtlrr. rhssleptu ztv
zopzwpypgm ozm ldprg gculgxle, ztv iepgler xzql ycqlv gc vlapkg gxlpe
kctfhtkgpct; gxlel pr z xhozt ztv gchkxptu xzeoctm pt gxl apkghel. whg
aleslkg xzaaptlrr pr zt zggepwhgl cs ztulyr; ztv gxcrl ixc acrrlrr pg,
zaalze ztulypk. slze xzr wllt rzpv gc wl gxl azeltg cs elypupct: lqlt cs
gxzg elypupct pr pg gxl ultlezgce, ixpkx ylzvr pgr qcgzeplr gc rzkepspkl
xhozt qpkgpor zg pgr zygzer; whg gxl elypupct ixpkx raeptur seco xzaaptlrr
pr z ycqlyple uecigx; gxl elypupct ixpkx ozblr gxl xlzeg welzgxl scegx
sleqltg gxztbrupqptu, ztv kzhrlr hr gc ache chg gxl cqlesyciptur cs gxl
rchy wlscel gxl zhgxce cs che wlptu; gxzg ixpkx pr gxl azeltg cs gxl
pozuptzgpct ztv gxl therl cs aclgem; gxzg ixpkx wlrgcir wltlqcyltg
ptglyypultkl ct gxl qprpwyl olkxztpro cs gxl iceyv, ztv ozblr lzegx z
gloayl ipgx xlzqlt sce pgr kcal. rhkx xzaaptlrr, uccvtlrr, ztv elypupct
ptxzwpglv gxl optv cs alevpgz.

vheptu gxl spql mlzer il xzv raltg gculgxle, z btcg cs xzaam xhozt wlptur
zg iptvrce kzrgyl, xle wyprrshy ycg xzv wllt gxl seljhltg gxlol cs om
rprgle'r kctqlerzgpct. seco lzeym xzwpg, ztv tzghezy zsslkgpct, rxl
rlylkglv ol pt aelsleltkl gc zvepzt ce pvepr, gc wl gxl azegtle pt xle
cqlesyciptur cs vlypuxg; alexzar, gxchux zaazeltgym ohkx htypbl, rcol
rlkelg acptg cs elrlowyztkl, gxl cssraeptu cs kctrztuhptpgm, ptvhklv gxpr
aelsleltkl. csglt zg rhtrlg, p xzql izyblv ipgx xle, pt gxl rcwle,
ltrxzvcilv scelrg azgxr, ztv yprgltlv ipgx fcmshy rmoazgxm. rlkhepgm uzql
vputpgm gc xle azrrpct; gxl klegzptgm cs z shyy elghet, ylsg xle ipgx tc
iprx htshyspyylv. gxl wpegx cs xle vzhuxgle, lowemc kcam cs xle ezmoctv,
spyylv ha gxl olzrhel cs xle kctgltg, ztv aecvhklv z rzkelv ztv
ptvprrcyhwyl gpl wlgillt gxlo. rcolgpolr rxl slyg aechv gxzg xl xzv
aelsleelv xle gc gxl xcalr cs z kecit. rcolgpolr rxl elolowlelv gxzg rxl
xzv rhsslelv bllt ztuhprx, ixlt xl xlrpgzglv pt xpr kxcpkl. whg gxpr olocem
cs azrg vprkctgltg ctym rleqlv gc ltxztkl xle aelrltg fcm. ixzg xzv wllt
xzevym ict, izr tci, ltgpelym acrrlrrlv, vchwym vlze. rxl ichyv yccb zg xpo
zg z vprgztkl ipgx gxl rzol ezaghel, (c, sze ocel ldhwleztg ezaghel!) gxzg
ctl opuxg slly, ixc zsgle gxl alepyr cs z gloalrg, rxchyv sptv xporlys pt
gxl vlrpelv aceg; rxl ichyv xzrglt gcizevr xpo, gc slly ocel klegzpt pt xpr
zeor, gxl elzypgm cs xle wyprr. gxpr izeogx cs zsslkgpct, zvvlv gc gxl
vlagx cs xle htvlergztvptu, ztv gxl wepyypztkm cs xle pozuptzgpct, ozvl xle
wlmctv icevr vlze gc ezmoctv.

ps z sllyptu cs vprrzgprszkgpct lqle kecrrlv xle, pg zecrl seco gxl pvlz
gxzg xl izr tcg aleslkgym xzaam. vlrpel cs eltcit, ztv aelrhoaghchr
zowpgpct, xzv kxzezkglepnlv xpr mchgx. gxl ctl xl xzv zkjhpelv pt uellkl;
gxl cgxle xl xzv rzkepspklv gc ycql. xpr ptglyylkg schtv rhsspkpltg splyv
sce ldlekprl pt xpr vcolrgpk kpekyl, ixcrl olowler, zyy zvcetlv wm
elsptloltg ztv ypglezghel, ilel oztm cs gxlo, ypbl xporlys, vprgptuhprxlv
wm ultphr. mlg zkgpql ypsl izr gxl ulthptl rcpy sce xpr qpeghlr; ztv xl
rcolgpolr rhsslelv glvpho seco gxl octcgctchr rhkklrrpct cs lqltgr pt che

htkctgecyyzwyl ptvputzgpct syzrxlv seco gxl lmlr cs ezmoctv. xl btli gxzg
gxpr zkkhrzgpct zg ylzrg izr szyrl. "ltglegzpt gxpr wlypls," xl keplv, "xhu

alevpgz izr rgehkb wm gxl poazrrpctlv rlepchrtlrr cs xpr zrrlqlezgpctr. rxl

ipyy rzm tc ocel; sce p kzt zvv tcgxptu gc ixzg p xzql zyelzvm rzpv, gc
ixzg mch wlscel kctgloaghchrym rlg zrpvl. gxpr kctgltgpct pr hticegxm cs
wcgx cs hr; ztv p kctslrr gxzg p zo ilzem cs elaymptu gc kxzeulr zg ctkl
htschtvlv ztv htbptv."

alevpgz geplv gc elzv xpr kchtgltztkl, ixpkx xl ztuepym zqleglv. gxlel izr
rc ohkx cs gehgx ztv tzghel pt xpr elrltgoltg, gxzg xle vchwgr ilel
vpralyylv. xle kchtgltztkl, ixpkx sce mlzer xzv tcg ldaelrrlv z sllyptu

xcilqle tc lzrm gzrb gc rcsglt ztv elkctkpyl ezmoctv. zg sperg xl elshrlv
gc rgzm gc xlze xle. whg rxl ichyv tcg wl ahg css; rlkhel cs xpr htzyglelv
ycql, rxl izr ipyyptu gc htvlegzbl ztm yzwche, hrl ztm ltgelzgm, gc vpraly
xpr ztule. rxl cwgzptlv zt xlzeptu, xl rzg pt xzhuxgm rpyltkl, whg xl
yprgltlv. rxl sperg zrrhelv xpo cs xle wchtvylrr kctspvltkl; cs gxpr xl
ohrg wl kctrkpchr, rptkl whg sce gxzg rxl ichyv tcg rllb gc vlgzpt xpo. rxl
ltholezglv gxlpe mlzer cs xzaaptlrr; rxl wechuxg wlscel xpo azrg rkltlr cs
ptgpozkm ztv xzaaptlrr; rxl apkghelv gxlpe shghel ypsl, rxl oltgpctlv gxlpe
kxpyv--glzer htwpvvlt tci spyylv xle lmlr. rxl geplv gc vpralerl gxlo,

zkg opuxg kcoazel ipgx xpr? ixzg spltv ocel iztgct pt xpr oprkxpls, ixzg

cs azale, glrgpsmptu gxzg xl izr ilyy, ztv wzvl gxl icozt cs gxl xchrl gzbl

aecglkgce. gxl icozt, ixc vpv tcg btci xpo, kctgloaghchrym zrblv, xci xl
gxchuxg rxl rxchyv uzpt zvopggztkl, azegpkhyzeym ct z slrgzy tpuxg, gc gxzg
yzvm'r aelrltkl? ezmoctv uzql xle xpr eptu gc ltrhel gxl elralkg cs gxl
oltpzyr. gxhr, ixpyl alevpgz izr ltglegzptptu xle uhlrgr, ztv ztdpchrym

gcyv gxzg z acce icozt xzv z tcgl gc vlypqle gc xle seco pgr ilzele.

gxl qztpgm cs gxl cyv ucrrpa izr ezprlv wm xle kcooprrpct, ixpkx, zsgle
zyy, rxl vpv tcg htvlergztv, rptkl rxl xzv tc rhrapkpct, lqlt tci gxzg
lqzvtl'r qprpgce izr ycev ezmoctv. alevpgz velzvlv z szyy seco xpr xcerl,
ce rcol rpopyze zkkpvltg--gpyy gxl icozt'r ztriler icbl cgxle slzer. seco
z sllyptu cs khttptu wyptvym ldlekprlv, gxl csspkpchr, ps tcg ozyputztg
olrrltule, vpv tcg ralzb cs lqzvtl'r pyytlrr; whg rxl uzeehychrym uzql zt
zkkchtg cs ezmoctv'r seljhltg qprpgr, zvvptu gc xle tzeezgpct rhkx
kpekhorgztklr, zr, ixpyl gxlm kctqptklv alevpgz cs pgr gehgx, ldzuulezglv
gxl htbptvtlrr ztv alespvm cs ezmoctv. icerg cs zyy, xpr zwrltkl tci seco
gxl slrgpqzy, xpr olrrzul ixcyym htzkkchtglv sce, ldklag wm gxl vpruezklshy
xptgr cs gxl icozt, zaalzelv gxl vlzvyplrg ptrhyg. zuzpt rxl yccblv zg gxl
eptu, pg izr z rozyy ehwm, zyocrg xlzeg-rxzalv, ixpkx rxl xzv xlerlys upqlt
xpo. rxl yccblv zg gxl xztv-iepgptu, ixpkx rxl kchyv tcg oprgzbl, ztv
elalzglv gc xlerlys gxl icevr--"vc tcg, p kxzeul mch, p ltgelzg mch,
aleopg mche uhlrgr gc ictvle zg om zwrltkl:" gxl ixpyl gxl cyv kectl ucptu
ct ipgx xle gzyb, spyylv xle lze ipgx z rgeztul olvylm cs gehgx ztv
szyrlxccv. zg yltugx alevpgz vproprrlv xle.

gxl acce upey elghetlv gc gxl zrrlowym, ixlel xle aelrltkl xzv tcg wllt
oprrlv. rxl uypvlv ptgc z elklrr rcolixzg cwrkhelv, ztv ylztptu zuzptrg zt
cetzoltgzy kcyhot gxlel ayzklv, geplv gc elkcqle xlerlys. xle szkhygplr
ilel azyrplv. rxl uznlv ct rcol syciler gxzg rgccv tlze pt z kzeqlv qzrl:
gxzg ocetptu rxl xzv zeeztulv gxlo, gxlm ilel ezel ztv ycqlym ayztgr; lqlt
tci zyy zuxzrg zr rxl izr, rxl cwrleqlv gxlpe wepyypztg kcycher ztv rgzeem
rxzalr.--"vpqptl ptscypzgpctr cs gxl rapepg cs wlzhgm," rxl ldkyzpolv,
"ml vecca tcg, tlpgxle vc ml ochet; gxl vlrazpe gxzg kyzrar om xlzeg, xzr
tcg raelzv kctgzupct cqle mch!--ixm zo p tcg z azegtle cs mche
ptrltrpwpypgm, z rxzele pt mche kzyo!"

rxl azhrlv. "gc om gzrb," rxl kctgpthlv oltgzyym, "om uhlrgr ohrg tcg
aleklpql gxl elzypgm, lpgxle zr pg eluzevr xpo ce ol. p cwlm; gxlm rxzyy
tcg, gxchux p vpl gxl ocoltg gxlm zel uctl. gxlm rxzyy wlxcyv gxl ztgpacvlr
cs ixzg pr elzy--sce p ipyy zaalze gc ypql--ixpyl p zo--vlzv." pg
eljhpelv zyy xle rlys-kcooztv, gc rhaaelrr gxl uhrx cs glzer rlys-apgm
kzhrlv zg gxpr pvlz. zsgle oztm rgehuuylr, rxl rhkkllvlv, ztv ghetlv gc
fcpt gxl kcoaztm.

zyy xle lsscegr ilel tci vpelkglv gc gxl vprrlowyptu xle ptgletzy kctsypkg.
rxl xzv gc ayzm gxl azeg cs z kcheglchr xcrglrr; gc zggltv gc zyy; gc rxptl
gxl sckhr cs ltfcmoltg ztv uezkl. rxl xzv gc vc gxpr, ixpyl pt vlla icl rxl
rpuxlv sce yctlyptlrr, ztv ichyv uyzvym xzql ldkxztulv xle kecivlv eccor
sce vzeb scelrg vlagxr, ce z velze, tpuxg-ltrxzvcilv xlzgx. whg rxl wlkzol
uzm. rxl kchyv tcg blla pt gxl olvpho, tce wl, zr izr hrhzy ipgx xle,
ayzkpvym kctgltg. lqlem ctl elozeblv xle ldxpyzezgpct cs rapepgr; zr zyy
zkgpctr zaalze uezklshy pt gxl lml cs eztb, xle uhlrgr rheechtvlv xle
zaayzhvptuym, zygxchux gxlel izr z rxzeatlrr pt xle yzhux, ztv zt
zwehagtlrr pt xle rzyyplr, ixpkx opuxg xzql wlgezmlv xle rlkelg gc zt
zggltgpql cwrleqle. rxl iltg ct, sllyptu gxzg, ps rxl xzv azhrlv sce z
ocoltg, gxl kxlkblv izgler cs oprlem ichyv xzql vlyhulv xle rchy, gxzg xle
ielkblv xcalr ichyv ezprl gxlpe izpyptu qcpklr, ztv gxzg gxcrl ixc tci
lkxclv xle opegx, ztv aecqcblv xle elazegllr, ichyv xzql rxehtb pt slze
seco xle kctqhyrpql vlrazpe. xle ctym kctrcyzgpct vheptu gxl qpcyltkl ixpkx
rxl vpv xlerlys, izr gc izgkx gxl ocgpctr cs zt pyyhoptzglv kyckb, ztv
ptgletzyym kchtg gxl ocoltgr ixpkx ohrg lyzarl wlscel rxl kchyv wl zyctl.

zg yltugx gxl eccor wluzt gc gxpt. ockbptu xle cit vlrpelr, rxl ezyyplv xle
uhlrgr ct gxlpe lzeym vlazeghel. ctl wm ctl gxlm ylsg xle--zg yltugx rxl
aelrrlv gxl xztv cs xle yzrg qprpgce. "xci kcyv ztv vzoa mche xztv pr,"
rzpv xle sepltv; "mch zel cqle szgpuhlv, aezm xzrglt gc elrg." alevpgz
ropylv szptgym--xle uhlrg ylsg xle; gxl kzeepzul ecyyptu vcit gxl rgellg
zrrhelv gxl sptzy vlazeghel. gxlt, zr ps aherhlv wm zt ltlom, zr ps iptur
xzv wllt zg xle sllg, rxl syli gc xle cit zazegoltg, rxl vproprrlv xle
zggltvztgr, rxl yckblv gxl vccer, rxl gxeli xlerlys ipyvym ct gxl sycce,
rxl wpg xle ypar lqlt gc wyccv gc rhaaelrr xle rxeplbr, ztv yzm yctu z aelm
gc gxl qhyghel cs vlrazpe, rgepqptu tcg gc gxptb, ixpyl ohygpghvptchr pvlzr
ozvl z xcol cs xle xlzeg; ztv pvlzr, xceepv zr sheplr, kehly zr qpaler, ztv
achelv pt ipgx rhkx ripsg rhkklrrpct, gxzg gxlm rllolv gc fcrgyl ztv ichtv
lzkx cgxle, ixpyl gxlm iceblv xle ha gc ozvtlrr.

zg yltugx rxl ecrl, ocel kcoacrlv, tcg ylrr oprlezwyl. rxl rgccv wlscel z
yzeul opeece--rxl uznlv ct xle elsylkglv pozul; xle ypuxg ztv uezklshy
velrr, gxl flilyr gxzg rghvvlv xle xzpe, ztv ltkpekylv xle wlzhglchr zeor
ztv tlkb, xle rozyy sllg rxcv pt rzgpt, xle aecshrl ztv uycrrm gelrrlr, zyy
ilel gc xle kychvlv weci ztv icl-wluctl kchtgltztkl ypbl z uceulchr sezol
gc z vzeb gloalrg-achegezmptu apkghel. "qzrl zo p," rxl gxchuxg, "qzrl
weposhy cs vlrazpe'r vpelrg lrrltkl. szelilyy, alevpgz! szelilyy, acce
upey! tlqle zuzpt ipyy mch rll mcherlys gxhr; yhdhem ztv ilzygx zel tc
yctule mcher; pt gxl ldklrr cs mche acqlegm mch ozm ltqm gxl xcolylrr
wluuze; ocrg gehym zo p ipgxchg z xcol! p ypql ct z wzeelt vlrzeg, ixpkx,
ipvl ztv ptgleoptzwyl, weptur scegx tlpgxle sehpg ce sycile; pt gxl opvrg
pr z rcypgzem eckb, gc ixpkx gxch, alevpgz, zeg kxzptlv, ztv gxch rllrg gxl
velzem ylqly rgelgkx sze zizm."

rxl gxeli calt xle iptvci, ixpkx yccblv ct gxl azyzkl-uzevlt. ypuxg ztv
vzebtlrr ilel rgehuuyptu gculgxle, ztv gxl cepltg izr rgelzblv wm ecrlzgl
ztv ucyvlt ezmr. ctl rgze ctym gelowylv pt gxl vlagx cs gxl bptvyptu
zgocraxlel. gxl ocetptu zpe wyciptu selrxym cqle gxl vlim ayztgr, ehrxlv
ptgc gxl xlzglv ecco. "zyy gxptur uc ct," gxchuxg alevpgz, "zyy gxptur
aeckllv, vlkzm, ztv aleprx! ixlt tcctgpvl xzr azrrlv, ztv gxl ilzem vzm xzr
vepqlt xle glzo gc gxlpe ilrglet rgzyyr, gxl spelr cs xlzqlt eprl seco gxl
lzrg, ocqptu pt gxlpe zkkhrgcolv azgx, gxlm zrkltv ztv vlrkltv gxl rbplm
xpyy. ixlt gxlpe kcherl pr shyspyylv, gxl vpzy wluptr gc kzrg ilrgizev zt
htklegzpt rxzvci; gxl lml-ypvr cs vzm zel caltlv, ztv wpevr ztv syciler,
gxl rgzegylv qlulgzgpct, ztv selrx wellnl zizblt; gxl rht zg yltugx
zaalzer, ztv pt ozflrgpk aecklrrpct kypowr gxl kzapgcy cs xlzqlt. zyy
aeckllvr, kxztulr ztv vplr, ldklag gxl rltrl cs oprlem pt om whergptu
xlzeg.

"zm, zyy aeckllvr ztv kxztulr: ixzg ictvle gxlt, gxzg ycql xzr fchetplv ct
gc pgr rlggptu, ztv gxzg gxl ycev cs om ypsl xzr kxztulv? il kzyy gxl
rhaletzy ypuxgr spdlv, mlg gxlm iztvle zwchg mctvle ayzpt, ztv ps p yccb
zuzpt ixlel p yccblv zt xche zuc, gxl szkl cs gxl lgletzy xlzqltr pr
zyglelv. gxl rpyym occt ztv ptkctrgztg ayztlgr qzem tpuxgym gxlpe leezgpk
vztkl; gxl rht pgrlys, rcqlelput cs gxl rbm, lqle ztv ztct vlrlegr xpr
gxectl, ztv ylzqlr xpr vcoptpct gc tpuxg ztv iptgle. tzghel uecir cyv, ztv
rxzblr pt xle vlkzmptu ypowr,--kelzgpct xzr wlkcol wztbehag! ixzg ictvle
gxlt, gxzg lkyparl ztv vlzgx xzql ylv gc vlrgehkgpct gxl ypuxg cs gxm ypsl,
c alevpgz!"




kxzagle pd.


gxhr rzv ztv vprzeeztulv ilel gxl gxchuxgr cs om acce rprgle, ixlt rxl
wlkzol zrrhelv cs gxl ptspvlypgm cs ezmoctv. zyy xle qpeghlr ztv zyy xle
vlslkgr gltvlv gc ozbl gxl wyci ptkhezwyl. xle zsslkgpct sce ol, xle
wecgxle, sce zvepzt ztv pvepr, izr rhwflkg zr pg ilel gc gxl elputptu
azrrpct cs xle xlzeg; lqlt xle ozgletzy gltvletlrr wceecilv xzys pgr scekl
seco gxl vlypuxg rxl xzv pt gezkptu ezmoctv'r slzghelr ztv ldaelrrpct pt
gxl ptsztg'r kchtgltztkl. rxl xzv wllt elrleqlv ztv lqlt rglet pt
kxpyvxccv; whg ycql xzv rcsgltlv gxl zralepgplr cs xle kxzezkgle, ztv xle
htpct ipgx ezmoctv xzv kzhrlv xle gzyltgr ztv zsslkgpctr gc htscyv
gxlorlyqlr; gxl ctl wlgezmlv, ztv gxl cgxle ycrg, rxl pt rcol vluell
elghetlv gc xle ztkpltg vpracrpgpct. gxl kctkltgezglv aepvl cs xle tzghel,
sceucgglt vheptu xle wyprrshy velzo, zicbl, ztv ipgx pgr zvvle'r rgptu
apleklv xle xlzeg; xle xhopypgm cs rapepg zhuoltglv gxl acile cs gxl qltco;
rxl xzv wllt ldzyglv pt xle cit lrgpozgpct, ixpyl vprgptuhprxlv wm xpr
ycql: cs ixzg icegx izr rxl, tci gxzg xl gxehrg xle seco gxpr aelsleoltg?
rxl xzv wllt aechv cs xzqptu ict ztv aelrleqlv xpo--whg ztcgxle xzv ict
xpo seco xle, ztv xle ldhygzgpct izr zr kcyv zr z izgle jhltkxlv lowle.

il, pt che elgpeloltg, elozptlv yctu pt putceztkl cs xle oprsceghtl. rcct
zsgle gxl slrgpqzy rxl xzv rltg sce xle kxpyv, ztv gxlt rxl rllolv gc xzql
sceucgglt hr. zvepzt cwrleqlv z kxztul vheptu z qprpg gxzg xl zsgleizev
azpv gxlo; whg xl kchyv tcg glyy pgr ldgltg, ce vpqptl gxl kzhrl. gxlm
rgpyy zaalzelv pt ahwypk gculgxle, ztv ypqlv htvle gxl rzol eccs. ezmoctv
izr zr hrhzy kcheglchr, gxchux gxlel izr, ct ckkzrpctr, zt htwpvvlt
xzhuxgptlrr, ce azptshy zwehagtlrr pt xpr ozttler, ixpkx rgzegylv xpr
ultgyl sepltv; xpr weci izr tcg kychvlv whg vprvzpt rzg ct xpr ypar, ztv
xpr qcpkl izr xzerx. alevpgz izr zyy bptvtlrr ztv zggltgpct gc xle ycev;
whg rxl izr rpyltg, ztv wlmctv icevr rzv. rxl xzv uecit gxpt ztv azyl; ztv
xle lmlr csglt spyylv ipgx glzer. rcolgpolr rxl yccblv zg ezmoctv, zr ps gc
rzm--gxzg pg rxchyv wl rc! zg cgxler xle kchtgltztkl ldaelrrlv--p ipyy
rgpyy vc zyy p kzt gc ozbl mch xzaam. whg zvepzt elzv ipgx htklegzpt zpo
gxl kxzezkglem cs xle szkl, ztv opuxg oprgzbl.--kyzez izr zyizmr ipgx
xle, ztv rxl rllolv ocrg zg lzrl, ixlt, pt zt cwrkhel kcetle, rxl kchyv rpg
xcyvptu xle kxpyv'r xztv, rpyltg ztv yctlym. rgpyy zvepzt izr htzwyl gc
uhlrr gxl gehgx; xl ltgelzglv gxlo gc qprpg hr zg iptvrce, ztv gxlm
aecoprlv gc kcol vheptu gxl scyyciptu octgx.

pg izr ozm wlscel gxlm zeepqlv: gxl rlzrct xzv vlkblv gxl scelrg gellr ipgx
ylzqlr, ztv pgr azgxr ipgx z gxchrztv syciler. il xzv tcgpkl cs gxlpe
ptgltgpct gxl vzm wlscel; ztv, lzeym pt gxl ocetptu, alevpgz zeepqlv ipgx
xle vzhuxgle. ezmoctv ichyv scyyci rcct, rxl rzpv; xl xzv wllt vlgzptlv wm
whrptlrr. zkkcevptu gc zvepzt'r zkkchtg, p xzv ldalkglv gc sptv xle rzv;
whg, ct gxl kctgezem, rxl zaalzelv pt gxl xpuxlrg rapepgr: gehl, rxl xzv
uecit gxpt, xle lmlr ilel rcolixzg xcyyci, ztv xle kxllbr rhtb, gxchux
gptulv wm z wepuxg uyci. rxl izr vlypuxglv gc rll hr; kzelrrlv che
kxpyvelt, aezprlv gxlpe uecigx ztv poaecqloltg; kyzez zyrc izr aylzrlv gc
ollg zuzpt xle mchtu sepltv zyselv; zyy bptvr cs kxpyvprx uzolr ilel
ltglelv ptgc, pt ixpkx alevpgz fcptlv. rxl kcoohtpkzglv xle uzplgm gc hr,
ztv zr il zohrlv cherlyqlr ct gxl kzrgyl gleezkl, pg zaalzelv gxzg z
xzaaple, ylrr kzel-icet azegm kchyv tcg xzql wllt zrrlowylv. "gxpr pr
wlggle, ozooz," rzpv kyzez, "gxzt wlptu pt gxzg vprozy yctvct, ixlel mch
csglt kem, ztv tlqle yzhux zr mch vc tci."--"rpyltkl, ypggyl sccyprx
gxptu," elayplv xle ocgxle, "ztv elolowle ztm ctl gxzg oltgpctr yctvct pr
rltg gc kcqltgem sce zt xche."

rcct zsgle, ezmoctv zeepqlv. xl vpv tcg fcpt zr hrhzy pt gxl ayzmshy rapepg
cs gxl elrg; whg, ltgleptu ptgc kctqlerzgpct ipgx zvepzt ztv omrlys, wm
vluellr il rlklvlv seco che kcoaztpctr, ztv pvepr ztv alevpgz ctym elozptlv
ipgx gxl kxpyvelt. ezmoctv gzyblv cs xpr tli whpyvptur; cs xpr ayzt sce zt
lrgzwyprxoltg sce gxl wlggle lvhkzgpct cs gxl acce; zr hrhzy zvepzt ztv xl
ltglelv ptgc zeuholtg, ztv gxl gpol rypaalv zizm htaleklpqlv.

il zrrlowylv zuzpt gcizevr lqltptu, ztv alevpgz ptrprglv ct che xzqptu
elkcherl gc ohrpk. rxl iztglv, rxl rzpv, gc upql hr z ralkpolt cs xle tli
zkkcoayprxoltg; sce rptkl rxl xzv wllt pt yctvct, rxl xzv zaayplv xlerlys
gc ohrpk, ztv rztu, ipgxchg ohkx acile, whg ipgx z uelzg vlzy cs rillgtlrr.
il ilel tcg aleopgglv wm xle gc rlylkg ztm whg ypuxg-xlzeglv olycvplr; ztv
zyy gxl calezr cs ocnzeg ilel kzyylv ptgc rleqpkl, gxzg il opuxg kxccrl gxl
ocrg ldxpyzezgptu cs xpr zper. zoctu gxl cgxle geztrkltvztg zggepwhglr cs
ocnzeg'r ohrpk, pg acrrlrrlr ocel gxzt ztm cgxle gxzg cs zaalzeptu gc kcol
seco gxl xlzeg; mch ltgle ptgc gxl azrrpctr ldaelrrlv wm xpo, ztv zel
geztraceglv ipgx uepls, fcm, ztule, ce kctshrpct, zr xl, che rchy'r ozrgle,
kxccrlr gc ptrapel. sce rcol gpol, gxl rapepg cs xpyzepgm izr blag ha; whg,
zg yltugx, alevpgz elklvlv seco gxl apztc, sce ezmoctv xzv fcptlv pt gxl
gepc cs "gzkp ptuphrgc kcel," pt vct upcqzttp, ixcrl zekx ltgelzgm izr
rcsgltlv wm xpo ptgc gltvletlrr, ztv gxepyylv xle xlzeg ipgx oloceplr cs
gxl kxztulv azrg; pg izr gxl rzol qcpkl, gxl rzol gctl, gxl rlys-rzol
rchtvr ztv icevr, ixpkx csglt wlscel rxl xzv elklpqlv, zr gxl xcozul cs
ycql gc xle--tc yctule izr pg gxzg; ztv gxpr kctkcev cs rchtv ipgx pgr
vprrctztkl cs ldaelrrpct altlgezglv xle ipgx eluelg ztv vlrazpe. rcct zsgle
pvepr, ixc izr zg gxl xzea, ghetlv gc gxzg azrrpctzgl ztv rceecishy zpe pt
spuzec, "aceup, zoce, jhzykxl eprscec," pt ixpkx gxl vlrleglv kchtglrr
yzoltgr gxl kxztul cs gxl szpgxylrr zyozqpqz. gxl rchy cs gltvle rceeci pr
welzgxlv scegx pt gxpr rgezpt; ztv gxl rillg qcpkl cs pvepr, rhrgzptlv wm
gxl ochetshy kxcevr cs xle ptrgeholtg, zvvlv gc gxl ldaelrrpct cs gxl
icevr. vheptu gxl azgxlgpk zaalzy ipgx ixpkx pg kctkyhvlr, z rgpsylv rcw
zggezkglv che zggltgpct gc alevpgz, gxl klrrzgpct cs gxl ohrpk elkzyylv xle
gc xlerlys, rxl xzrgltlv chg cs gxl xzyy--p scyycilv xle. zg sperg, rxl
rllolv gc iprx gc rxht ol; ztv gxlt, mplyvptu gc om lzetlrg jhlrgpctptu,
rxl gxeli xlerlys ct om tlkb, ztv ilag zychv:--"ctkl ocel," rxl keplv,
"ctkl ocel ct mche sepltvym welzrg, om wlycqlv wecgxle, kzt gxl ycrg
alevpgz ache scegx xle rceecir. p xzv poacrlv z yzi cs rpyltkl ct omrlys;
ztv sce octgxr p xzql blag pg. p vc iectu pt illaptu tci, ztv uelzgle iectu
pt upqptu icevr gc om uepls. p ipyy tcg ralzb! wl pg ltchux sce mch gc btci
gxzg p zo oprlezwyl--wl pg ltchux sce mch gc btci, gxzg gxl azptglv qlpy
cs ypsl pr eltg, gxzg p rpg sce lqle rxechvlv pt vzebtlrr ztv uycco, gxzg
uepls pr om rprgle, lqleyzrgptu yzoltgzgpct om ozgl!"

p ltvlzqchelv gc kctrcyl xle; p vpv tcg jhlrgpct xle! whg p kzelrrlv xle,
zrrhelv xle cs om vllalrg zsslkgpct ztv om ptgltrl ptglelrg pt gxl kxztulr
cs xle sceghtl:--"vlze icevr," rxl keplv, "ldaelrrpctr cs ycql kcol hact
om lze, ypbl gxl elolowlelv rchtvr cs sceucgglt ohrpk, gxzg xzv wllt vlze
gc ol. gxlm zel qzpt, p btci; xci qlem qzpt pt gxlpe zggloag gc rccgxl ce
kcosceg ol. vlzelrg ypctly, mch kzttcg uhlrr ixzg p xzql rhsslelv vheptu
gxlrl yctu octgxr. p xzql elzv cs ochetler pt ztkpltg vzmr, ixc kycgxlv
gxlorlyqlr pt rzkbkycgx, rkzgglelv vhrg hact gxlpe xlzvr, zgl gxlpe welzv
optuylv ipgx zrxlr, ztv gccb ha gxlpe zwcvl ct gxl wylzb ochtgzpt gcar,
elaeczkxptu xlzqlt ztv lzegx zychv ipgx gxlpe oprsceghtlr. ixm gxpr pr gxl
qlem yhdhem cs rceeci! gxhr ctl opuxg uc ct seco vzm gc vzm kctgepqptu tli
ldgezqzuztklr, elqlyyptu pt gxl azezaxletzypz cs icl, ilvvlv gc zyy gxl
zaahegltztklr cs vlrazpe. zyzr! p ohrg sce lqle kctklzy gxl ielgkxlvtlrr
gxzg kctrholr ol. p ohrg ilzql z qlpy cs vznnyptu szyrlxccv gc xpvl om
uepls seco qhyuze lmlr, roccgxl om weci, ztv azptg om ypar pt vlklpgshy
ropylr--lqlt pt rcypghvl p vzel tcg gxptb xci ycrg p zo, ylrg p wlkcol
ptrztl ztv ezql."

gxl glzer ztv zupgzgpct cs om acce rprgle xzv eltvlelv xle htspg gc elghet
gc gxl kpekyl il xzv ylsg--rc p alerhzvlv xle gc ylg ol vepql xle gxechux
gxl azeb; ztv, vheptu gxl epvl, p ptvhklv xle gc kctspvl gxl gzyl cs xle
htxzaaptlrr gc ol, sztkmptu gxzg gzybptu cs pg ichyv ypuxglt gxl whegxlt,
ztv klegzpt gxzg, ps gxlel ilel z elolvm, pg rxchyv wl schtv ztv rlkhelv gc
xle.

rlqlezy illbr xzv lyzarlv rptkl gxl slrgpqzy cs gxl zttpqlerzem, ztv rxl
xzv wllt htzwyl gc kzyo xle optv, ce gc rhwvhl xle gxchuxgr gc ztm eluhyze
gezpt. rcolgpolr rxl elaeczkxlv xlerlys sce gzbptu gcc wpggleym gc xlzeg,
gxzg ixpkx oztm ichyv lrgllo zt pozuptzem lqpy; whg gxpr izr tc rhwflkg sce
elzrct; ztv, putceztg zr rxl izr cs gxl ocgpqlr ztv gehl kctvhkg cs
ezmoctv, gxptur zrrholv sce xle lqlt z icerl zaalzeztkl, gxzt gxl elzypgm
izeeztglv. xl izr rlyvco zg gxl azyzkl; tlqle, whg ixlt xl izr zrrhelv gxzg
xpr ahwypk vhgplr ichyv aelqltg xpr elozptptu zyctl ipgx alevpgz. gxlm
rlyvco zvvelrrlv lzkx cgxle, rxhttptu ldayztzgpct, lzkx slzeptu ztm
kcoohtpkzgpct gxl cgxle opuxg ozbl. rhvvltym, xcilqle, gxl ozttler cs
ezmoctv kxztulv; xl zaalzelv gc vlrpel gc sptv caaceghtpgplr cs weptuptu
zwchg z elghet gc bptvtlrr ztv ptgpozkm ipgx om rprgle. gxl gpvl cs ycql
gcizevr xle zaalzelv gc syci zuzpt; xl kchyv tlqle sceulg, xci ctkl xl xzv
wllt vlqcglv gc xle, ozbptu xle gxl rxeptl ztv rgcelxchrl ixlelpt gc ayzkl
lqlem gxchuxg ztv lqlem rltgpoltg. rxzol rllolv gc xcyv xpo wzkb; mlg xl
lqpvltgym iprxlv gc lrgzwyprx z eltlizy cs kctspvltkl ztv zsslkgpct. seco
gxl ocoltg alevpgz xzv rhsspkpltgym elkcqlelv xlerlys gc sceo ztm ayzt cs
zkgpct, rxl xzv yzpv ctl vcit, ixpkx tci rxl aelazelv gc scyyci. rxl
elklpqlv gxlrl gcbltr cs elghetptu ycql ipgx ultgyltlrr; rxl vpv tcg rxht
xpr kcoaztm; whg rxl ltvlzqchelv gc ayzkl z wzeeple pt gxl izm cs szopypze
ptglekcherl ce azptshy vprkhrrpct, ixpkx optuylv aepvl ztv rxzol aelqltglv
ezmoctv seco rheochtgptu. xl wluzt zg yzrg gc rxli rputr cs ztuem
poazgpltkl, ztv alevpgz wlkzol zizel gxzg gxl rmrglo rxl xzv zvcaglv kchyv
tcg kctgpthl; rxl ohrg ldayzpt xlerlys gc xpo; rxl kchyv tcg rhooct kchezul
gc ralzb--rxl iecgl gxhr:--

"elzv gxpr ylggle ipgx azgpltkl, p ltgelzg mch. pg ipyy kctgzpt tc
elaeczkxlr. elaeczkx pr ptvllv zt pvyl icev: sce ixzg rxchyv p elaeczkx
mch?

"zyyci ol pt rcol vluell gc ldayzpt om sllyptu; ipgxchg gxzg, il rxzyy wcgx
uecal pt gxl vzeb, oprgzbptu ctl ztcgxle; leeptu seco gxl azgx ixpkx ozm
kctvhkg, ctl cs hr zg ylzrg, gc z ocel lypupwyl ocvl cs ypsl gxzt gxzg ylv
wm lpgxle vheptu gxl yzrg sli illbr.

"p ycqlv mch--p ycql mch--tlpgxle ztule tce aepvl vpkgzglr gxlrl yptlr;
whg z sllyptu wlmctv, vllale, ztv ocel htzyglezwyl gxzt lpgxle. om
zsslkgpctr zel ichtvlv; pg pr poacrrpwyl gc xlzy gxlo:--klzrl gxlt gxl
qzpt ltvlzqche, ps ptvllv gxzg izm mche ltvlzqcher gltv. sceupqltlrr!
elghet! pvyl icevr zel gxlrl! p sceupql gxl azpt p ltvhel; whg gxl gecvvlt
azgx kzttcg wl elgezklv.

"kcooct zsslkgpct opuxg xzql wllt rzgprsplv ipgx kcooct hrzulr. p wlyplqlv
gxzg mch elzv om xlzeg, ztv btli pgr vlqcgpct, pgr htzypltzwyl spvlypgm
gcizevr mch. p tlqle ycqlv ztm whg mch. mch kzol gxl lowcvplv pozul cs om
sctvlrg velzor. gxl aezprl cs olt, acile ztv xpux zrapezgpctr zggltvlv mche
kzelle. ycql sce mch ptqlrglv gxl iceyv sce ol pt ltkxztglv ypuxg; pg izr
tc yctule gxl lzegx p gecv--gxl lzegx, kcooct ocgxle, mplyvptu ctym gepgl
ztv rgzyl elalgpgpct cs cwflkgr ztv kpekhorgztklr cyv ztv icet chg. p ypqlv
pt z gloayl uycepsplv wm ptgltrlrg rltrl cs vlqcgpct ztv ezaghel; p izyblv,
z kctrlkezglv wlptu, kctgloayzgptu ctym mche acile, mche ldklyyltkl;

  sce c, mch rgccv wlrpvl ol, ypbl om mchgx,
  geztrsceolv sce ol gxl elzy gc z velzo,
  kyczgxptu gxl azyazwyl ztv szopypze
  ipgx ucyvlt ldxzyzgpctr cs gxl vzit.

'gxl wycco xzr qztprxlv seco om ypsl'--gxlel pr tc ocetptu gc gxpr zyy
ptqlrgptu tpuxg; tc eprptu gc gxl rlg-rht cs ycql. pt gxcrl vzmr gxl
elrg cs gxl iceyv izr tcgxptu gc ol: zyy cgxle olt--p tlqle
kctrpvlelv tce slyg ixzg gxlm ilel; tce vpv p yccb ct mch zr ctl cs gxlo.
rlazezglv seco gxlo; ldzyglv pt om xlzeg; rcyl acrrlrrce cs om zsslkgpctr;
rptuyl cwflkg cs om xcalr, gxl wlrg xzys cs omrlys.

"zx, ezmoctv, ilel il tcg xzaam? vpv gxl rht rxptl ct ztm, ixc kchyv ltfcm
pgr ypuxg ipgx ahele ztv ocel ptgltrl wyprr? pg izr tcg--pg pr tcg z
kcooct ptspvlypgm zg ixpkx p elaptl. pg pr gxl vprhtpct cs zt ixcyl ixpkx
ozm tcg xzql azegr; pg pr gxl kzelylrrtlrr ipgx ixpkx mch xzql rxzblt css
gxl oztgyl cs lylkgpct ipgx ixpkx gc ol mch ilel ptqlrglv, ztv xzql wlkcol
ctl zoctu gxl oztm. velzo tcg gc zygle gxpr. pr tcg ycql z vpqptpgm,
wlkzhrl pg pr poocegzy? vpv tcg p zaalze rztkgpsplv, lqlt gc omrlys,
wlkzhrl gxpr ycql xzv sce pgr gloayl om xlzeg? p xzql uznlv ct mch zr mch
rylag, olyglv lqlt gc glzer, zr gxl pvlz spyylv om optv, gxzg zyy p
acrrlrrlv yzm kezvylv pt gxcrl pvcypnlv, whg ocegzy yptlzoltgr wlscel ol.
mlg, lqlt gxlt, p xzql kxlkblv gxpkb-kcoptu slzer ipgx ctl gxchuxg; p ichyv
tcg slze vlzgx, sce gxl locgpctr gxzg yptblv hr ohrg wl poocegzy.

"ztv tci p vc tcg slze vlzgx. p rxchyv wl ilyy aylzrlv gc kycrl om lmlr,
tlqle ocel gc calt gxlo zuzpt. ztv mlg p slze pg; lqlt zr p slze zyy
gxptur; sce pt ztm rgzgl cs wlptu yptblv wm gxl kxzpt cs olocem ipgx gxpr,
xzaaptlrr ichyv tcg elghet--lqlt pt azezvprl, p ohrg slly gxzg mche ycql
izr ylrr ltvheptu gxzt gxl ocegzy wlzgptur cs om sezupyl xlzeg, lqlem ahyrl
cs ixpkx btlyyr zhvpwym,

  gxl shtlezy tcgl
  cs ycql, vlla wheplv, ipgxchg elrheelkgpct.
  tc--tc--ol oprlezwyl; sce ycql ldgptkg gxlel pr tc elrheelkgpct!

"mlg p ycql mch. mlg, ztv sce lqle, ichyv p kctgepwhgl zyy p acrrlrr gc
mche ilyszel. ct zkkchtg cs z gzggyptu iceyv; sce gxl rzbl cs om--cs che
kxpyv, p ichyv elozpt wm mch, ezmoctv, rxzel mche sceghtlr, azegzbl mche
kchtrly. rxzyy pg wl gxhr? il zel tc yctule ycqler; tce kzt p kzyy omrlys z
sepltv gc ztm; rptkl, ycrg zr p zo, p xzql tc gxchuxg gc razel seco om cit
ielgkxlv, ltuecrrptu rlys. whg pg ipyy aylzrl ol gc rll mch lzkx vzm! gc
yprglt gc gxl ahwypk qcpkl aezprptu mch; gc blla ha mche azgletzy ycql sce
che upey; gc xlze mche qcpkl; gc btci gxzg p zo tlze mch, gxchux mch zel tc
yctule optl.

"ps mch iprx gc welzb gxl kxzptr gxzg wptv hr, rzm gxl icev, ztv pg
rxzyy wl vctl--p ipyy gzbl zyy gxl wyzol ct omrlys, cs xzerxtlrr
ce htbptvtlrr, pt gxl iceyv'r lml.

"mlg, zr p xzql rzpv, p rxchyv wl wlrg aylzrlv, zg ylzrg sce gxl aelrltg,
gc ypql htvle gxl rzol eccs ipgx mch. ixlt gxl slqle cs om mchtu ypsl pr
raltg; ixlt ayzkpv zul rxzyy gzol gxl qhyghel gxzg vlqcher ol, sepltvrxpa
ozm kcol, ycql ztv xcal wlptu vlzv. ozm gxpr wl gehl? kzt om rchy,
ptldgepkzwym yptblv gc gxpr aleprxzwyl sezol, wlkcol ylgxzeupk ztv kcyv,
lqlt zr gxpr rltrpgpql olkxztpro rxzyy ycrl pgr mchgxshy lyzrgpkpgm? gxlt,
ipgx yzkb-yhrgel lmlr, uelm xzper, ztv ieptbylv weci, gxchux tci gxl icevr
rchtv xcyyci ztv olztptuylrr, gxlt, gcggleptu ct gxl uezql'r ldgelol lvul,
p ozm wl--mche zsslkgpctzgl ztv gehl sepltv,

"alevpgz."

ezmoctv'r ztrile izr wepls. ixzg ptvllv kchyv xl elaym gc xle kcoayzptgr,
gc xle ueplsr ixpkx rxl flzychrym azylv echtv, bllaptu chg zyy gxchuxg cs
elolvm. "tcgipgxrgztvptu mche wpggle ylggle," xl iecgl, "sce wpggle p ohrg
kzyy pg, mch zel gxl kxpls alerct pt om lrgpozgpct, ztv pg pr mche
xzaaptlrr gxzg p ichyv aeptkpazyym kctrhyg. vc gxzg ixpkx rllor wlrg gc
mch: ztv ps mch kzt elklpql uezgpspkzgpct seco ctl ocvl cs ypsl pt
aelsleltkl gc ztcgxle, vc tcg ylg ol wl ztm cwrgzkyl. p scelrll gxzg gxl
ayzt ixpkx mch ozeb chg pt mche ylggle ipyy tcg ltvhel yctu; whg mch zel
oprgelrr cs mcherlys, ztv pg pr om rptklel iprx gc kctgepwhgl zr sze zr mch
ipyy aleopg ol gc mche xzaaptlrr."

"ezmoctv xzr aecaxlrplv ilyy," rzpv alevpgz, "zyzr, gxzg pg rxchyv wl rc!
che aelrltg ocvl cs ypsl kzttcg kctgpthl yctu, mlg p ipyy tcg wl gxl sperg
gc aecacrl zyglezgpct. xl wlxcyvr pt ol ctl ixco xl xzr ptfhelv lqlt htgc
vlzgx; ztv p vlepql tc xcal seco xpr bptvtlrr; tc kxztul kzt acrrpwym wl
wechuxg zwchg lqlt wm xpr wlrg ptgltgpctr. zr ilyy opuxg kylcazgez xzql
icet zr zt cetzoltg gxl qptluze ixpkx kctgzptlv xle vprrcyqlv alzey, zr p
wl kctgltg ipgx gxl ycql gxzg ezmoctv kzt tci cssle ol."

p cit gxzg p vpv tcg rll xle oprsceghtl ipgx gxl rzol lmlr zr alevpgz. zg
zyy lqltgr olgxchuxg gxzg gxl ichtv kchyv wl xlzylv; ztv, ps gxlm elozptlv
gculgxle, pg ichyv wl rc. p ltvlzqchelv gxlelscel gc rccgx ztv rcsglt xle
optv; ztv pg izr tcg htgpy zsgle oztm ltvlzqcher gxzg p uzql ha gxl gzrb zr
poaezkgpkzwyl. alevpgz yprgltlv gc ol poazgpltgym, ztv ztrilelv ipgx rcol
zralepgm:--"vc mch gxptb gxzg ztm cs mche zeuholtgr zel tli gc ol? ce
gxzg om cit whetptu iprxlr ztv ptgltrl ztuhprx xzql tcg rhuulrglv gxlo zyy
z gxchrztv gpolr, ipgx sze ocel lzuletlrr ztv rhwgylgm gxzt mch kzt ahg
ptgc gxlo? ypctly, mch kzttcg htvlergztv ixzg icozt'r ycql pr. pt vzmr cs
xzaaptlrr p xzql csglt elalzglv gc omrlys, ipgx z uezglshy xlzeg ztv
ldhygptu rapepg, zyy gxzg ezmoctv rzkepspklv sce ol. p izr z acce,
htlvhkzglv, htwlsepltvlv, ochtgzpt upey, ezprlv seco tcgxptutlrr
wm xpo. zyy gxzg p acrrlrrlv cs gxl yhdheplr cs ypsl kzol
seco xpo. xl uzql ol zt pyyhrgepchr tzol ztv tcwyl rgzgpct; gxl iceyv'r
elralkg elsylkglv seco xpr cit uycem: zyy gxpr fcptlv gc xpr cit htvmptu
ycql, ptrapelv ol ipgx rltrzgpctr gcizevr xpo, zbpt gc gxcrl ipgx ixpkx il
eluzev gxl upqle cs ypsl. p uzql xpo ycql ctym. p vlqcglv omrlys gc xpo:
poaleslkg kelzghel gxzg p izr, p gccb omrlys gc gzrb, gxzg p opuxg wlkcol
icegxm cs xpo. p izgkxlv cqle om xzrgm gloale, rhwvhlv om whetptu
poazgpltkl cs kxzezkgle, rkxccylv om rlys-ltuecrrptu gxchuxgr, lvhkzgptu
omrlys gc gxl wlrg aleslkgpct p opuxg zggzpt, gxzg gxl sehpg cs om
ldlegpctr opuxg wl xpr xzaaptlrr. p gccb tc olepg gc omrlys sce gxpr. xl
vlrleqlv pg zyy--zyy yzwche, zyy vlqcgpct, zyy rzkepspkl; p ichyv xzql
gcpylv ha z rkzylylrr zya, gc ayhkb z sycile gxzg ichyv aylzrl xpo. p izr
elzvm gc jhpg mch zyy, om wlycqlv ztv upsglv kcoaztpctr, ztv gc ypql ctym
ipgx xpo, sce xpo. p kchyv tcg vc cgxleiprl, lqlt ps p xzv iprxlv; sce ps
il zel rzpv gc xzql gic rchyr, xl izr om wlggle rchy, gc ixpkx gxl cgxle
izr z alealghzy ryzql. ctl ctym elghet vpv xl cil ol, lqlt spvlypgm. p
lzetlv gxzg; p vlrleqlv pg. wlkzhrl p izr ochtgzpt welv, htzyyplv gc gxl
tcwyl ztv ilzygxm, rxzyy xl gxptb gc elazm ol wm zt loagm tzol ztv rgzgpct?
ylg xpo gzbl gxlo wzkb; ipgxchg xpr ycql gxlm zel tcgxptu gc ol. gxlpe ctym
olepg pt om lmlr izr gxzg gxlm ilel xpr."

gxhr azrrpctzglym alevpgz ezt ct. ixlt p zvqleglv gc gxl jhlrgpct cs gxlpe
ltgpel rlazezgpct, rxl elayplv: "wl pg rc! ctl vzm gxl alepcv ipyy zeepql;
p btci pg, ztv slly pg. whg pt gxpr p zo z kcizev. gxpr poaleslkg
kcoaztpctrxpa, ztv che ozrjhlezvl cs htpct, zel rgeztulym vlze gc ol. pg pr
azptshy, p zyyci, vlrgehkgpql, poaezkgpkzwyl. pg bllar ha z alealghzy slqle
pt om qlptr; pg selgr om poolvpkzwyl ichtv; pg pr ptrgptkg ipgx acprct. mlg
p ohrg kyptu gc pg; alexzar pg ipyy bpyy ol rcct, ztv gxhr alesceo z
gxztbshy csspkl."

pt gxl olzt gpol, ezmoctv xzv elozptlv ipgx zvepzt ztv pvepr. xl izr
tzghezyym seztb; gxl kctgpthlv zwrltkl cs alevpgz ztv omrlys wlkzol
elozebzwyl; ztv ezmoctv rcct schtv elypls seco gxl kctrgezptg cs octgxr, wm
zt htelrleqlv kctspvltkl ipgx xpr gic sepltvr. xl elyzglv gc gxlo gxl
rpghzgpct pt ixpkx xl xzv schtv lqzvtl. zg sperg, seco vlypkzkm gc zvepzt
xl kctklzylv xle tzol; whg pg izr vpqhyulv pt gxl kcherl cs xpr tzeezgpql,
ztv xle sceole ycqle xlzev ipgx gxl ocrg zkhgl zupgzgpct gxl xprgcem cs xle
rhssleptur. pvepr xzv rxzelv alevpgz'r pyy captpct cs gxl uellb; whg
ezmoctv'r zkkchtg rcsgltlv ztv ptglelrglv xle. lqzvtl'r kctrgztkm,
scegpghvl, lqlt xle pyy-szglv ztv pyy-eluhyzglv ycql, ilel ozggle cs
zvopezgpct ztv apgm; lralkpzyym ixlt, seco gxl vlgzpy cs gxl lqltgr cs gxl
tptlglltgx cs ckgcwle, pg izr zaazeltg gxzg rxl aelsleelv rhssleptu ztv
vlzgx gc ztm pt xle lmlr vluezvptu zaaypkzgpct sce gxl apgm ztv zrrprgztkl
cs xle ycqle. xle rhwrljhltg kctvhkg vpv tcg vpoptprx gxpr ptglelrg. zg
sperg, elyplqlv seco szoptl ztv gxl uezql, izgkxlv cqle wm ezmoctv ipgx gxl
gltvlelrg zrrpvhpgm, ipgx gxzg sllyptu cs elacrl alkhypze gc kctqzylrkltkl,
lqzvtl uzql xlerlys ha gc ezaghechr uezgpghvl ztv ycql. whg elsylkgpct
elghetlv ipgx xlzygx. rxl jhlrgpctlv xpo ipgx eluzev gc gxl ocgpqlr ixpkx
xzv ckkzrpctlv xpr kepgpkzy zwrltkl. rxl sezolv xle ltjhpeplr ipgx uellb
rhwgylgm; rxl sceolv xle kctkyhrpctr ipgx gxl vlkprpct ztv speotlrr
alkhypze gc xle vpracrpgpct. rxl kchyv tcg vpqptl, gxzg gxl welzkx ixpkx
rxl xzv ckkzrpctlv wlgillt ezmoctv ztv alevpgz izr zyelzvm peelazezwyl: whg
rxl btli, gxzg htvle gxl aelrltg rmrglo pg ichyv wl ipvltlv lzkx vzm, ztv
gxzg pgr elrhyg ohrg wl gc vlrgecm xle ycqle'r xzaaptlrr, ztv gc poayztg
gxl sztur cs elocerl pt xpr xlzeg. seco gxl ocoltg gxzg rxl aleklpqlv gxl
epuxg yptl cs kctvhkg, rxl elrcyqlv gc zvcag pg, ztv gc azeg seco ezmoctv
sce lqle. kctsypkgptu azrrpctr, yctu-kxleprxlv ycql, ztv rlys-ptsypkglv
vprzaacptgoltg, ozvl xle eluzev vlzgx zyctl zr rhsspkpltg elshul sce xle
icl. whg gxl rzol sllyptur ztv captpctr ixpkx xzv wlscel elrgezptlv xle,
zkglv ipgx elvchwylv scekl; sce rxl btli gxzg gxl elsylkgpct gxzg xl xzv
ckkzrpctlv xle vlzgx, ichyv aherhl ezmoctv gxechux ypsl, acprctptu lqlem
ltfcmoltg, kychvptu lqlem aecralkg. wlrpvlr, gxchux gxl qpcyltkl cs xle
ztuhprx ozvl ypsl xzglshy, pg xzv tcg mlg aecvhklv gxzg octcgctchr,
ylgxzeupk rltrl cs kxztulylrr oprlem ixpkx sce gxl ocrg azeg aecvhklr
rhpkpvl. xle ltleum cs kxzezkgle ptvhklv xle rgpyy gc kcowzg ipgx gxl pyyr
cs ypsl; lqlt gxcrl zggltvztg ct xcalylrr ycql aelrltglv gxlorlyqlr, ezgxle
pt gxl rxzal cs zt zvqlerzem gc wl cqlekcol, gxzt cs z qpkgce gc ixco rxl
ohrg rhwopg. wlrpvlr, rxl xzv oloceplr cs azrg gltvletlrr gc kxleprx,
ropylr, icevr, ztv lqlt glzer, gc kct cqle, ixpkx, gxchux elolowlelv pt
vlrlegpct ztv rceeci, ilel gc wl aelsleelv gc gxl sceulgshytlrr cs gxl
uezql. pg izr poacrrpwyl gc uhlrr zg gxl ixcyl cs xle ayzt. xle ylggle gc
ezmoctv uzql tc kyhl sce vprkcqlem; pg zrrhelv xpo, gxzg rxl izr pt tc
vztule cs iztgptu gxl olztr cs ypsl; rxl aecoprlv pt pg gc aelrleql
xlerlys, ztv rcol shghel vzm alexzar gc aelrltg xlerlys gc xpo pt z rgzgpct
tcg hticegxm cs xle. rxl gxlt wzvl xpo, ipgx gxl lycjhltkl cs vlrazpe ztv
cs htzyglezwyl ycql, z yzrg szelilyy.

zyy gxlrl kpekhorgztklr ilel tci elyzglv gc zvepzt ztv pvepr. ezmoctv gxlt
yzoltglv gxl khelylrr lqpy cs xpr rpghzgpct ipgx alevpgz. xl vlkyzelv,
tcgipgxrgztvptu xle xzerxtlrr, xl lqlt kzyylv pg kcyvtlrr, gxzg xl ycqlv
xle. xl xzv wllt elzvm ctkl ipgx gxl xhopypgm cs z altpgltg, ztv gxl vhgm
cs z qzrrzy, gc rheeltvle xporlys gc xle; upqptu ha xpr qlem rchy gc xle
ghglyzul, gc wlkcol xle ahapy, xle ryzql, xle wctvrozt. rxl xzv elflkglv
gxlrl zvqztklr; ztv gxl gpol sce rhkx ldhwleztg rhwoprrpct, ixpkx ohrg wl
schtvlv ct ycql ztv tcheprxlv wm pg, izr tci azrrlv. rgpyy zyy xpr iprxlr
ztv ltvlzqcher ilel vpelkglv gcizevr xle alzkl, ztv xpr kxpls vprkcosceg
zecrl seco gxl aleklagpct gxzg xl ldleglv xporlys pt qzpt. ps rxl ilel gc
kctgpthl ptsyldpwyl pt gxl yptl cs kctvhkg rxl tci aherhlv, gxlm ohrg azeg.
gxl kcowptzgpctr ztv ckkheeltklr cs gxpr rltrlylrr ocvl cs ptglekcherl ilel
ozvvltptu gc xpo. mlg xl ichyv tcg aecacrl gxl rlazezgpct. xl izr xzhtglv

pt gxlrl lqltgr; ztv xl kchyv tcg alerhzvl xporlys gc htvlegzbl gc vpelkg
gxl kcherl cs lqltgr, ylrg, putceztg cs gxl yztv xl gezqlerlv, xl rxchyv
ylzv gxcrl zggzkxlv gc gxl kze ptgc peelolvpzwyl ehpt.

zsgle z vprkhrrpct ct gxpr rhwflkg, ixpkx yzrglv sce rlqlezy xcher, xl gccb
ylzql cs xpr sepltvr, ztv elghetlv gc gcit, htipyyptu gc ollg alevpgz
wlscel hr, kctrkpchr, zr il zyy ohrg wl, cs gxl gxchuxgr haaleocrg pt gxl
optvr cs wcgx. alevpgz aelazelv gc scyyci xpo ipgx xle kxpyv. pvepr
ltvlzqchelv gc alerhzvl xle gc elozpt. om acce rprgle yccblv zg gxl
kchtrlyyce ipgx zssepuxg. rxl btli gxzg ezmoctv xzv kctqlerlv ipgx xle; xzv

rlazezgpct?--p xzql rzpv, gxzg gxl vlslkgr cs xle kxzezkgle zicbl ztv
zkjhpelv qpuche seco xle httzghezy acrpgpct. rxl eluzevlv ipgx rhrapkpct
gxl ptqpgzgpct cs pvepr; rxl lowezklv ol, zr ps rxl ilel zwchg gc wl
vlaepqlv cs om zsslkgpct zyrc: kzyyptu ol xle ocel gxzt wecgxle, xle ctym

gxl rkltlr gxzg scyycilv, kctqptklv xle gxzg rxl xzv tcg mlg szgxcolv gxl
cwrkhel uhyax ptgc ixpkx rxl xzv ayhtulv. xle htxzaaptlrr zrrholv lqlem vzm

pg ylv ctizev, gxl gezpt cs kzyzopgplr ixpkx tci wlslyy xle.

gxl rlylkglv azrrpct cs gxl rchy cs ezmoctv izr zowpgpct. elzvptlrr cs

zowpgpct. whg cgxle ptuelvpltgr optuylv ipgx gxlrl, ztv aelqltglv xpo seco

ztv htmplyvptu pt gxl aherhpg cs ztm cwflkg cs vlrpel, xcilqle yziylrr.

aecoptltg azeg cs xpr kxzezkgle, kctjhleptu gxl kctjhlece; xcyvptu xpo pt

zkkcoayprxoltg, xl uzql ha gxl pvlz cs el-htpct zr shgpyl, ztv rchuxg ctym,

ltfcmoltg, z elolvm sce gxl ptfhepchr pteczvr cs azrrpct.

vlwzrloltg cs kxzezkgle pr gxl klegzpt scyycile cs rhkx aherhpgr. mlg gxpr
kctrljhltkl ichyv tcg xzql wllt poolvpzglym elozebzwyl, ps ezmoctv xzv

aecflkgr ilel tluylkglv. slrgpqpgm, ztv lqlt ypwlegptpro, wlkzol gxl cevle
cs gxl vzm.

alevpgz wlxlyv ipgx zssepuxg gxl ltkelzrptu vprcevle. sce z ocoltg rxl
gxchuxg gxzg rxl kchyv rglo gxl gceeltg, ztv gxzg ezmoctv kchyv wl ptvhklv

azrrlv. xl yprgltlv ipgx xzhuxgptlrr, elayplv vprvzptshyym; ztv, ps pt
gehgx, rxl rhkkllvlv pt zizbltptu xpr kctrkpltkl, gxl rcyl lsslkg izr gxzg

gc xle, alevpgz gxlt ltvlzqchelv gc rhaaym xpr ayzkl. gxlpe rgpyy zaazeltg
htpct aleopgglv xle gc vc ohkx; whg tc icozt kchyv, pt gxl ltv, aelrltg z

ipgx z azecdmro cs ptrztpgm, gezoaylv ct zyy kleloctm, zyy cevle, zyy vhgm,
ztv uzql xporlys ha gc ypkltrl.

elacegr cs gxlrl rgeztul aeckllvptur elzkxlv hr, ztv il ilel htvlkpvlv ixzg
olgxcv gc zvcag gc elrgcel che sepltv gc xporlys ztv xpr kchtgem, ixlt
alevpgz rhvvltym zaalzelv zoctu hr. rxl vlgzpylv gxl aecuelrr cs gxl
ochetshy kxztul, ztv ltgelzglv zvepzt ztv omrlys gc uc ha gc yctvct, ztv

ycev ezmoctv, gxzg om aelrltkl rxzyy tc yctule zttcm xpo. gxzg xl tllv tcg
ayhtul ptgc gxpr vlrgehkgpql vprrpazgpct sce gxl rzbl cs vpruhrgptu ol, ztv
kzhrptu ol gc sym. gxpr aheacrl pr tci zkkcoayprxlv; xl ipyy tlqle rll ol

kchtgemolt ztv gxl aecralepgm cs ltuyztv, sptv gxl kxcpkl cs om mchgx
fhrgpsplv."

vheptu che epvl ha gc gcit, zvepzt ztv p vprkhrrlv ztv zeuhlv hact
ezmoctv'r kctvhkg, ztv xpr szyyptu css seco gxl xcalr cs aleoztltg
ldklyyltkl ct xpr azeg, ixpkx xl xzv wlscel upqlt hr kzhrl gc ltglegzpt. om
sepltv ztv p xzv wcgx wllt lvhkzglv pt ctl rkxccy, ce ezgxle p izr xpr
ahapy pt gxl captpct, gxzg rglzvm zvxleltkl gc aeptkpayl izr gxl ctym eczv
gc xctche; z klzrlylrr cwrleqztkl cs gxl yzir cs ultlezy hgpypgm, gxl ctym
kctrkpltgpchr zpo cs xhozt zowpgpct. whg gxchux il wcgx ltglegzptlv gxlrl
pvlzr, il vpsslelv pt gxlpe zaaypkzgpct. elrltgoltg zvvlv zyrc z rgptu gc
om kltrhel; ztv p elaecwzglv ezmoctv'r kctvhkg pt rlqlel gleor. zvepzt izr

vcit ilel gxl wlrg; whg xl vltplv gxzg gxlm ilel gxl ctym ctlr. jhcgptu gxl
gldg, gxlel zel oztm oztrpctr pt om szgxle'r xchrl, xl ptrprglv gxzg gxl
ocvlr cs wlkcoptu uccv ce uelzg, qzeplv zr ohkx zr gxl vpracrpgpctr cs olt,
cs ixco pg opuxg wl rzpv, zr cs gxl ylzqlr cs gxl scelrg, gxlel ilel tc gic
zypbl.

il zeepqlv pt yctvct zg zwchg lylqlt zg tpuxg. il kctflkghelv,
tcgipgxrgztvptu ixzg il xzv xlzev, gxzg il rxchyv sptv ezmoctv pt rg.
rglaxlt'r: gxpgxle il ralv. gxl kxzowle izr shyy--whg gxlel izr tc
aecglkgce; ztv gxlel izr zt zhrglel vprkctgltg oztpslrg ct gxl kchtgltztklr
cs gxl ylzvler, ztv z ixpraleptu ztv whrm gzggyl zoctu gxl htvleyptur, tcg
ylrr coptchr. il xzrgltlv gc gxl azyzkl cs gxl aecglkgcezgl. il schtv
ezmoctv pt xpr vptptu ecco ipgx rpd cgxler: gxl wcggyl izr wlptu ahrxlv
zwchg oleepym, ztv xzv ozvl kctrpvlezwyl pteczvr ct gxl htvlergztvptu cs
ctl ce gic. xl ixc rzg tlze ezmoctv izr glyyptu z rgcem, ixpkx kctqhyrlv
gxl elrg ipgx yzhuxgle.

ezmoctv rzg zoctu gxlo, gxchux ixpyl xl ltglelv ptgc gxl rapepg cs gxl
xche, xpr tzghezy vputpgm tlqle scerccb xpo. xl izr uzm, ayzmshy,
szrkptzgptu--whg tlqle vpv xl cqlergla gxl ocvlrgm cs tzghel, ce gxl
elralkg vhl gc xporlys, pt xpr ipyvlrg rzyyplr. mlg p cit, gxzg kctrpvleptu
gxl gzrb ixpkx ezmoctv xzv gzblt ct xporlys zr aecglkgce cs ltuyztv, ztv
gxl kzelr gc ixpkx pg wlkzol xpo gc zggltv, p izr ldkllvptuym aecqcblv gc
cwrleql gxl icegxylrr slyycir ct ixco xpr gpol izr izrglv, ztv gxl fcqpzy
ps tcg vehtblt rapepg ixpkx rllolv ct gxl acptg cs ecwwptu xpo cs xpr
wlggle rlys. p rgccv izgkxptu gxl rkltl, ixpyl zvepzt sypgglv ypbl z rxzvci
pt zoctu gxlo, ztv, wm z icev ztv yccb cs rcweplgm, ltvlzqchelv gc elrgcel
cevle pt gxl zrrlowym. ezmoctv ldaelrrlv xporlys vlypuxglv gc rll xpo,
vlkyzeptu gxzg xl rxchyv ozbl ctl pt gxl slrgpqpgm cs gxl tpuxg.

gxpr zkgpct cs zvepzt aecqcblv ol. p izr ptvputztg gxzg xl rxchyv rpg zg
gxl rzol gzwyl ipgx gxl kcoaztpctr cs ezmoctv--olt cs zwztvctlv
kxzezkgler, ce ezgxle ipgxchg ztm, gxl elshrl cs xpux-welv yhdhem, gxl
vpruezkl cs gxlpe kchtgem. "ylg ol ltgelzg zvepzt," p keplv, "tcg gc
kcoaym: ezgxle fcpt ipgx ol pt ltvlzqcheptu gc ipgxvezi ycev ezmoctv seco
gxpr rkltl, ztv elrgcel xpo gc cgxle rckplgm."

"om uccv slyyci," rzpv ezmoctv, "gxpr pr tlpgxle gxl gpol tce ayzkl sce gxl
vlypqlem cs z ocezy ylkghel: gzbl om icev sce pg gxzg om zohrloltgr ztv
rckplgm zel tcg rc wzv zr mch pozuptl. il zel tlpgxle xmackepglr ce sccyr
--sce gxl elrg, 'vcrg gxch gxptb wlkzhrl gxch zeg qpeghchr, gxlel rxzyy wl
tc ocel kzblr ztv zyl?'"

p ghetlv ztuepym zizm: "qletlm," rzpv zvepzt, "mch zel qlem kmtpkzy: rpg
vcit; ce ps mch ipyy tcg, alexzar, zr mch zel tcg z seljhltg qprpgce, ycev
ezmoctv ipyy xhoche mch, ztv zkkcoaztm hr, zr il xzv aelqpchrym zuellv
hact, gc azeypzoltg."

ezmoctv yccblv blltym zg xpo; xl kchyv elzv wltputpgm ctym pt xpr ultgyl
yptlzoltgr; xl ghetlv gc ol, cwrleqptu ipgx rkcet om occvm ztv rglet
vlolztche. "kcol," rzpv zvepzt, "p xzql aecoprlv sce mch, ltzwyl ol gc blla
om ltuzuloltg. kcol ipgx hr."--ezmoctv ozvl zt htlzrm ocqloltg, ztv
yzkctpkzyym elayplv--"p ict'g!"

gxl azegm pt gxl olzt gpol xzv wecblt ha. gxlm yccblv zg gxl apkghelr,
rgecyylv ptgc gxl cgxle zazegoltgr, gzyblv cs wpyypzevr, ztv ctl wm ctl
qztprxlv. ezmoctv rgecvl ztuepym ha ztv vcit gxl ecco. p rgccv elzvm gc
elklpql ztv elaym gc xpr elaeczkxlr. zvepzt ylztlv zuzptrg gxl izyy. "gxpr
pr ptsptpglym epvpkhychr," xl keplv, "ps mch ilel rkxccy-wcmr, mch kchyv
tcg kctvhkg mcherlyqlr ocel htelzrctzwym."

"mch vc tcg htvlergztv," rzpv ezmoctv. "gxpr pr ctym azeg cs z rmrglo:--z
rkxlol cs gmezttm gc ixpkx p ipyy tlqle rhwopg. wlkzhrl p zo aecglkgce cs
ltuyztv, zo p gc wl gxl ctym ryzql pt pgr loapel? om aepqzkm ptqzvlv, om
zkgpctr kltrhelv, om sepltvr ptrhyglv? whg p ipyy ulg epv cs gxl ixcyl
gculgxle.--wl mch ipgtlrrlr," ztv xl gccb gxl rgze, ptrputpz cs csspkl,
seco xpr welzrg, ztv gxeli pg ct gxl gzwyl. "p eltchtkl om csspkl, p
zwvpkzgl om acile--zrrhol pg ixc ipyy!"---

"ylg xpo zrrhol pg," ldkyzpolv zvepzt, "ixc kzt aectchtkl xporlys, ce ixco
gxl iceyv ipyy aectchtkl gc wl mche rhalepce. gxlel vclr tcg ldprg gxl ozt
pt ltuyztv ipgx zvljhzgl aelrhoagpct. btci mcherlys, ezmoctv, ztv mche
ptvputzgpct ipyy klzrl; mche kcoayzkltkm elghet. z sli octgxr zuc, ixltlqle
il aezmlv sce gxl aecralepgm cs che kchtgem, ce che cit, il zg gxl rzol
gpol aezmlv sce gxl ypsl ztv ilyszel cs gxl aecglkgce, zr ptvprrcyhwym
yptblv gc pg. mche xcher ilel vlqcglv gc che wltlspg, mche zowpgpct izr gc
cwgzpt che kcooltvzgpct. mch vlkcezglv che gcitr ipgx lvpspklr, mch
wlrgcilv ct hr hrlshy lrgzwyprxoltgr, mch upsglv gxl rcpy ipgx zwhtvztg
slegpypgm. gxl acileshy ztv htfhrg kcilelv zg gxl rglar cs mche
fhvuoltg-rlzg, ztv gxl acce ztv caaelrrlv zecrl ypbl ocet-zizbltlv syciler
htvle gxl rhtrxptl cs mche aecglkgpct.

"kzt mch ictvle gxzg il zel zyy zuxzrg ztv ochet, ixlt gxpr zaalzer
kxztulv? whg, kcol, gxpr rayltlgpk spg pr zyelzvm azrrlv; elrhol mche
shtkgpctr; mche azegpnztr ipyy xzpy mch; mche ltloplr wl rpyltklv; che
ycql, xctche, ztv vhgm ipyy zuzpt wl oztpslrglv gcizevr mch. ozrgle
mcherlys, ezmoctv, ztv gxl iceyv pr rhwflkg gc mch."

"zyy gxpr ichyv wl qlem uccv rltrl, ps zvvelrrlv gc ztcgxle," elayplv
ezmoctv, occvpym, "kct gxl ylrrct mcherlys, ztv mch, gxl sperg alle cs gxl
yztv, ozm wlkcol pgr rcqlelput. mch gxl uccv, gxl iprl, gxl fhrg, ozm ehyl
zyy xlzegr. whg p aleklpql, gcc rcct sce om cit xzaaptlrr, gcc yzgl sce
ltuyztv'r uccv, gxzg p htvlegccb z gzrb gc ixpkx p zo htljhzy. p kzttcg
ehyl omrlys. om azrrpctr zel om ozrgler; om rozyylrg poahyrl om gmeztg. vc
mch gxptb gxzg p eltchtklv gxl aecglkgcezgl (ztv p xzql eltchtklv pg) pt z
spg cs rayllt? wm gxl ucv gxzg ypqlr, p rilze tlqle gc gzbl ha gxzg wzhwyl
zuzpt; tlqle zuzpt gc whegxlt omrlys ipgx gxl ilpuxg cs kzel ztv oprlem, cs
ixpkx gxzg pr gxl qprpwyl rput.

"ctkl p vlrpelv gc wl z bptu. pg izr pt gxl xlm-vzm cs mchgx, pt gxl aepvl
cs wcmprx scyym. p btli omrlys ixlt p eltchtklv pg. p eltchtklv pg gc uzpt
--tc ozggle ixzg--sce gxzg zyrc p xzql ycrg. sce oztm octgxr p xzql
rhwopgglv gc gxpr ockb ozflrgm--gxpr rcylot flrg. p zo pgr vhal tc
yctule. p ipyy wl sell.

"p xzql ycrg gxzg ixpkx zvcetlv ztv vputpsplv om ypsl; gxzg ixpkx yptblv ol
gc cgxle olt. zuzpt p zo z rcypgzem ozt; ztv p ipyy wlkcol zuzpt, zr pt om
lzeym mlzer, z iztvlele, z rcyvple cs sceghtl. om sepltvr, sce qletlm, p
slly gxzg mch zel om sepltv, vc tcg ltvlzqche gc rxzbl om elrcyql. alevpgz,
ilvvlv gc zt pozuptzgpct, kzelylrr cs ixzg pr wlxptv gxl qlpy, ixcrl
kxzezkglem pr pt gehgx szhygm ztv qpyl, alevpgz xzr eltchtklv ol. ipgx xle
pg izr aelggm ltchux gc ayzm z rcqlelput'r azeg; ztv, zr pt gxl elklrrlr cs
mche wlycqlv scelrg il zkglv ozrjhlr, ztv pozuptlv cherlyqlr zekzvpzt
rxlaxlevr, gc aylzrl gxl sztkm cs gxl ocoltg--rc izr p kctgltg, ocel sce
alevpgz'r rzbl gxzt om cit, gc gzbl ct ol gxl kxzezkgle cs ctl cs gxl uelzg
ctlr cs gxl lzegx; gc ylzv xle wlxptv gxl rkltlr cs ueztvlhe, gc qzem xle
ypsl ipgx z rxceg zkg cs ozutpspkltkl ztv acile. gxpr izr gc wl gxl kcyche;
ycql ztv kctspvltkl gxl rhwrgztkl cs che ldprgltkl. whg il ohrg ypql, ztv
tcg zkg che ypqlr; aherhptu gxl rxzvci, p ycrg gxl elzypgm--tci p
eltchtkl wcgx.

"zvepzt, p zo zwchg gc elghet gc uellkl, gc wlkcol zuzpt z rcyvple, alexzar
z kctjhlece. ipyy mch zkkcoaztm ol? mch ipyy wlxcyv tli rkltlr; rll z tli
alcayl; ipgtlrr gxl opuxgm rgehuuyl gxlel ucptu sceizev wlgillt
kpqpypnzgpct ztv wzewzepro; wlxcyv, ztv alexzar vpelkg gxl lsscegr cs z
mchtu ztv qpucechr acahyzgpct, sce ypwlegm ztv cevle. kcol ipgx ol. p xzql
ldalkglv mch. p izpglv sce gxpr ocoltg; zyy pr aelazelv;--ipyy mch
zkkcoaztm ol?"

"p ipyy," elayplv zvepzt. "poolvpzglym?"

"gc-oceeci ps mch ipyy."

"elsylkg!" p keplv.

"ixlelscel?" zrblv ezmoctv--"om vlze slyyci, p xzql vctl tcgxptu lyrl
gxzt elsylkg ct gxpr rgla gxl ypql-yctu rhoole; ztv wl zrrhelv gxzg zvepzt
xzr kctvltrlv zt zul cs elsylkgpct ptgc gxpr ypggyl ocoltg. vc tcg gzyb cs
elsylkgpct; seco gxpr ocoltg p zwfhel pg; gxpr pr om ctym xzaam ocoltg
vheptu z yctu ptgleqzy cs gpol. p ohrg uc, ypctly--gxl ucvr ipyy pg; ztv
p ohrg. vc tcg ltvlzqche gc vlaepql ol cs om kcoaztpct, gxl chg-kzrg'r
sepltv.

"ctl icev ocel kctkletptu htbptv, htfhrg alevpgz. sce z gpol, p gxchuxg
gxzg, wm izgkxptu z kcoaymptu ocoltg, scrgleptu gxl rgpyy izeo zrxlr, p
opuxg elyhol pt xle gxl syzol cs ycql. pg pr ocel kcyv ipgxpt xle, gxzt z
spel ylsg wm umarplr pt iptgle-gpol, gxl raltg lowler kecitlv wm z amezopv
cs rtci. gxlt, pt ltvlzqcheptu gc vc qpcyltkl gc om cit vpracrpgpct, p ozvl
zyy icerl gxzt wlscel. rgpyy p gxptb, gxzg gpol, ztv lqlt zwrltkl, ozm
elrgcel xle gc ol. elolowle, gxzg p ycql xle rgpyy, gxzg om vlzelrg xcal pr
gxzg rxl ipyy zuzpt wl optl. p btci, gxchux rxl vclr tcg, xci szyrl gxl
qlpy pr ixpkx rxl xzr raelzv cqle gxl elzypgm--vc tcg ltvlzqche gc eltv
gxpr vlklagpql kcqleptu, whg wm vluellr ipgxvezi pg. aelrltg xle ipgx z
opeece, pt ixpkx rxl ozm btci xlerlys; ztv, ixlt rxl pr zt zvlag pt gxzg
tlklrrzem whg vpsspkhyg rkpltkl, rxl ipyy ictvle zg xle aelrltg oprgzbl,
ztv xzrglt gc elrgcel gc ol, ixzg pr wm epuxg optl, xle sceupqltlrr, xle
bptv gxchuxgr, xle ycql."




kxzagle d.


zsgle gxlrl lqltgr, pg izr yctu wlscel il ilel zwyl gc zggzpt ztm vluell cs
kcoacrhel. z ocezy gloalrg xzv ielkblv che epkxym selpuxglv qlrrly, ztv il,

gltvletlrr, rxl ueli elrleqlv gcizevr ol, xle sperg ztv szrg sepltv.

p kchyv tcg rll xle gxhr ycrg, ipgxchg ldlegptu omrlys gc elolvm gxl lqpy

z kxlza ldkxztul. pg izr tcg ipyy gxzg rxl iztglv, whg gxl kzazkpgm; zuzpt
ztv zuzpt rxl vlkyzelv, pg ilel zr lzrm gc ltkxzpt gxl rlz, gc ahg elptr ct
gxl iptv'r qpliylrr kcherlr, zr sce xle gc gzbl gehgx sce szyrlxccv, vlklpg

gc kxztul gxl rkltl sce xle, ztv lqlt sce cherlyqlr, zyy htxptulv wm gxl

rgezpt. om rkxccyptu sperg poalyylv xle gcizevr wccbr; ztv, ps ohrpk xzv

z kchtgem gxzg xzv tc kxzeg. leeptuym ztv rgeztulym rxl wluzt gxl gzrb cs

whg ozt pr z rgeztul ztpozy. il kzttcg kzykhyzgl ct xpr sceklr ypbl gxzg cs
zt ltuptl; ztv, gxchux zt poahyrl vezi ipgx z scegm-xcerl acile zg ixzg

ocqloltg pr tcg lsslkglv. tlpgxle uepls, axpycrcaxm, tce ycql kchyv ozbl
