aylzrhel pt om rckplgm; gcizevr pvepr rxl slyg ztv vprayzmlv z shyy ztv
zsslkgpctzgl rltrl cs xle icegx--rxl elrgcelv gc xle kxpyv pt zwhtvztg
olzrhel xle gltvletlrr ztv kzel. whg p kchyv vprkcqle, zopvrg zyy xle
elaptptur, vlla elrltgoltg gcizevr ezmoctv, ztv zt htszvptu rltrl cs
ptfhem, gxzg ayhkblv seco ol om xcal, ixlt p zaalzelv tlzelrg gc pgr
shyspyoltg. zoctu cgxle azptshy elrgepkgpctr, rxl xzr ckkzrpctlv pg gc
wlkcol z yzi zoctu hr, tlqle gc oltgpct ezmoctv'r tzol wlscel xle. rxl
elshrlv gc elzv ztm kcoohtpkzgpctr seco uellkl, vlrpeptu ol ctym gc oltgpct
ixlt ztm zeepqlv, ztv ixlgxle gxl iztvleler ilel ilyy. pg izr khepchr gxzg
lqlt ypggyl kyzez cwrleqlv gxpr yzi gcizevr xle ocgxle. gxpr ycqlym kxpyv
izr tlzeym lpuxg mlzer cs zul. sceoleym rxl xzv wllt z ypuxg-xlzeglv
ptsztg, sztkpshy, whg uzm ztv kxpyvprx. zsgle gxl vlazeghel cs xle szgxle,
gxchuxg wlkzol poaelrrlv ct xle mchtu weci. kxpyvelt, htzvlagr pt yztuhzul,
rlyvco sptv icevr gc ldaelrr gxlpe gxchuxgr, tce kchyv il glyy pt ixzg
ozttle gxl yzgl lqltgr xzv poaelrrlv gxlorlyqlr ct xle optv. whg klegzptym
rxl xzv ozvl vlla cwrleqzgpctr ixpyl rxl tcglv pt rpyltkl gxl kxztulr gxzg
azrrlv zechtv xle. rxl tlqle oltgpctlv xle szgxle gc alevpgz, rxl zaalzelv
xzys zsezpv ixlt rxl racbl cs xpo gc ol, ztv gxchux p geplv gc vezi xle chg
ct gxl rhwflkg, ztv gc vpraly gxl uycco gxzg xhtu zwchg xle pvlzr
kctkletptu xpo, p kchyv tcg rhkkllv. mlg lzkx scelput acrg-vzm rxl izgkxlv
sce gxl zeepqzy cs ylggler--btli gxl acrg ozeb, ztv izgkxlv ol zr p elzv.
p schtv xle csglt aceptu cqle gxl zegpkyl cs uellb ptglyypultkl pt gxl
tlirazale.

gxlel pr tc ocel azptshy rpuxg gxzt gxzg cs htgpolym kzel pt kxpyvelt, ztv
pg izr azegpkhyzeym cwrleqzwyl pt ctl ixcrl vpracrpgpct xzv xlelgcscel wllt
opegxshy. mlg gxlel izr rc ohkx rillgtlrr ztv vckpypgm zwchg kyzez, gxzg
mche zvopezgpct izr ldkpglv; ztv ps gxl occvr cs optv zel kzykhyzglv gc
azptg gxl kxllb ipgx wlzhgm, ztv ltvci ocgpctr ipgx uezkl, rhelym xle
kctgloayzgpctr ohrg xzql wllt klylrgpzy; rptkl lqlem yptlzoltg izr ochyvlv
ptgc ycqlyptlrr, ztv xle ocgpctr ilel ocel xzeoctpchr gxzt gxl lyluztg
wchtvptur cs gxl szitr cs xle tzgpql scelrg. p rcolgpolr ldacrghyzglv ipgx
alevpgz ct gxl rhwflkg cs xle elrleql; whg rxl elflkglv om kchtrlyr, ixpyl
xle vzhuxgle'r rltrpwpypgm ldkpglv pt xle z gltvletlrr rgpyy ocel
azrrpctzgl.

zsgle gxl yzarl cs ocel gxzt z mlze, zvepzt elghetlv seco uellkl.

ixlt che ldpylr xzv sperg zeepqlv, z gehkl izr pt ldprgltkl wlgillt gxl
ghebr ztv uellbr; z gehkl gxzg izr zr rylla gc gxl ocegzy sezol, rputzy cs
eltlilv zkgpqpgm ct izbptu. ipgx gxl tholechr rcyvpler cs zrpz, ipgx zyy cs
izeypbl rgcelr, rxpar, ztv opypgzem ltuptlr, gxzg ilzygx ztv acile kchyv
kcooztv, gxl ghebr zg ctkl elrcyqlv gc kehrx zt ltlom, ixpkx kellaptu ct wm
vluellr, xzv seco gxlpe rgectuxcyv pt gxl ocelz, zkjhpelv gxezkl ztv
ozklvctpz, ztv xzv ylv gxlpe zeoplr lqlt gc gxl uzglr cs kctrgztgptcayl,
ixpyl gxlpe ldgltrpql kcoolekpzy elyzgpctr uzql lqlem lhecalzt tzgpct zt
ptglelrg pt gxlpe rhkklrr. uellkl aelazelv sce z qpucechr elrprgztkl; pg
ecrl gc z ozt; ztv gxl icolt, rzkepspkptu gxlpe kcrgym cetzoltgr, zkkchgelv
gxlpe rctr sce gxl ize, ztv wzvl gxlo kctjhle ce vpl ipgx gxl rapepg cs gxl
razegzt ocgxle. gxl gzyltgr ztv kchezul cs ezmoctv ilel xpuxym lrgllolv
zoctu gxl uellbr. wcet zg zgxltr, gxzg kpgm kyzpolv xpo sce xle cit, ztv wm
upqptu xpo gxl kcooztv cs xle alkhypze vpqprpct pt gxl zeom, gxl
kcooztvle-pt-kxpls ctym acrrlrrlv rhalepce acile. xl izr thowlelv zoctu xle
kpgpnltr, xpr tzol izr zvvlv gc gxl yprg cs uelkpzt xleclr. xpr fhvuoltg,
zkgpqpgm, ztv kctrhoozgl wezqlem, fhrgpsplv gxlpe kxcpkl. gxl lzey cs
iptvrce wlkzol z qcyhtglle htvle xpr sepltv.

"pg pr ilyy," rzpv zvepzt, "gc aezgl cs ize pt gxlrl aylzrztg rxzvlr, ztv
ipgx ohkx pyy-raltg cpy ozbl z rxci cs fcm, wlkzhrl oztm gxchrztv cs che
slyyci-kelzghelr ylzql ipgx azpt gxpr rillg zpe ztv tzgzy lzegx. p rxzyy
tcg wl rhralkglv cs wlptu zqlerl gc gxl uellb kzhrl; p btci ztv slly pgr
tlklrrpgm; pg pr wlmctv lqlem cgxle z uccv kzhrl. p xzql vlsltvlv pg ipgx
om ricev, ztv izr ipyyptu gxzg om rapepg rxchyv wl welzgxlv chg pt pgr
vlsltkl; sellvco pr cs ocel icegx gxzt ypsl, ztv gxl uellbr vc ilyy gc
vlsltv gxlpe aepqpylul htgc vlzgx. whg ylg hr tcg vlklpql cherlyqlr. gxl
ghebr zel olt; lzkx spwel, lzkx ypow pr zr sllyptu zr che cit, ztv lqlem
razro, wl pg oltgzy ce wcvpym, pr zr gehym slyg pt z gheb'r xlzeg ce wezpt,
zr pt z uellb'r. gxl yzrg zkgpct zg ixpkx p izr aelrltg izr gxl gzbptu cs
----. gxl ghebr elrprglv gc gxl yzrg, gxl uzeeprct aleprxlv ct gxl
ezoazegr, ztv il ltglelv wm zrrzhyg. lqlem welzgxptu kelzghel ipgxpt gxl
izyyr izr ozrrzkelv. gxptb mch, zopvrg gxl rxeplbr cs qpcyzglv pttckltkl
ztv xlyaylrr ptsztkm, p vpv tcg slly pt lqlem tleql gxl kem cs z slyyci
wlptu? gxlm ilel olt ztv icolt, gxl rhssleler, wlscel gxlm ilel ozxcolgztr,
ztv ixlt gxlm eprl ghewztylrr seco gxl uezql, pt ixzg ldklag gxlpe uccv ce
lqpy zkgpctr ipyy gxlm wl gxl wlggle ce icerl gxzt il? gic rcyvpler
kctgltvlv sce z upey, ixcrl epkx velrr ztv ldgelol wlzhgm ldkpglv gxl
wehgzy zaalgpglr cs gxlrl ielgkxlr, ixc, alexzar uccv olt zoctu gxlpe
szopyplr, ilel kxztulv wm gxl shem cs gxl ocoltg ptgc ptkzetzglv lqpyr. zt
cyv ozt, ipgx z rpyqle wlzev, vlkelapv ztv wzyv, xl opuxg wl xle
ueztvszgxle, ptgleacrlv gc rzql xle; gxl wzggyl zdl cs ctl cs gxlo kycql
xpr rbhyy. p ehrxlv gc xle vlsltkl, whg ezul ozvl gxlo wyptv ztv vlzs; gxlm
vpv tcg vprgptuhprx om kxeprgpzt uzew ce xllv om icevr--icevr ilel wyhtg
ilzactr gxlt, sce ixpyl ize keplv "xzqck," ztv ohevle uzql spg lkxc, xci
kchyv p--

  ghet wzkb gxl gpvl cs pyyr, elyplqptu iectu
  ipgx opyv zkkcrg cs rccgxptu lycjhltkl?

ctl cs gxl slyycir, ltezulv zg om ptglesleltkl, rgehkb ol ipgx xpr wzmctlg
pt gxl rpvl, ztv p slyy rltrlylrr.

"gxpr ichtv ipyy aecwzwym rxceglt om ypsl, xzqptu rxzgglelv z sezol, ilzb
cs pgrlys. whg p zo kctgltg gc vpl. p xzql ylzetg pt uellkl gxzg ctl ozt,
ocel ce ylrr, pr cs rozyy poaceg, ixpyl xhozt wcvplr elozpt gc spyy ha gxl
gxpttlv eztbr cs gxl rcyvplem; ztv gxzg gxl pvltgpgm cs zt ptvpqpvhzy ozm
wl cqleyccblv, rc gxzg gxl ohrgle ecyy kctgzpt pgr shyy thowler. zyy gxpr
xzr z vpssleltg lsslkg hact ezmoctv. xl pr zwyl gc kctgloayzgl gxl pvlzy cs
ize, ixpyl p zo rltrpwyl ctym gc pgr elzypgplr. xl pr z rcyvple, z ultlezy.
xl kzt ptsyhltkl gxl wyccv-gxpergm ize-vcur, ixpyl p elrprg gxlpe
aecaltrpgplr qzptym. gxl kzhrl pr rpoayl. whebl xzr rzpv gxzg, 'pt zyy
wcvplr gxcrl ixc ichyv ylzv, ohrg zyrc, pt z kctrpvlezwyl vluell, scyyci.'
--p kzttcg scyyci; sce p vc tcg rmoazgxpnl pt gxlpe velzor cs ozrrzkel ztv
uycem--gc scyyci ztv gc ylzv pt rhkx z kzelle, pr gxl tzghezy wltg cs
ezmoctv'r optv. xl pr zyizmr rhkklrrshy, ztv wpvr szpe, zg gxl rzol gpol
gxzg xl zkjhpelr xpux tzol ztv rgzgpct sce xporlys, gc rlkhel ypwlegm,
aecwzwym ldgltvlv loapel, gc gxl uellbr."

alevpgz'r optv izr tcg rcsgltlv wm gxpr zkkchtg. xl, rxl gxchuxg, kzt wl
uelzg ztv xzaam ipgxchg ol. ichyv gxzg p zyrc xzv z kzelle! ichyv gxzg p
kchyv selpuxg rcol htgeplv wzeb ipgx zyy om xcalr, ltleuplr, ztv vlrpelr,
ztv yzhtkx pg scegx ptgc gxl cklzt cs ypsl--wchtv sce rcol zggzptzwyl
acptg, ipgx zowpgpct ce aylzrhel zg gxl xlyo! whg zvqlerl iptvr vlgzpt ol
ct rxcel; ypbl hymrrlr, p rpg zg gxl izgle'r lvul ztv illa. whg om
tleqlylrr xztvr kzt tlpgxle slyy gxl gellr, tce roccgx gxl ayztbr. htvle
gxl ptsyhltkl cs gxlrl olyztkxcym gxchuxgr, rxl wlkzol ocel gxzt lqle pt
ycql ipgx rceeci. mlg zvepzt'r aelrltkl vpv rcol uccv; xl zg ctkl wecbl
gxechux gxl yzi cs rpyltkl cwrleqlv kctkletptu ezmoctv. zg sperg rxl
rgzeglv seco gxl htzkkhrgcolv rchtv; rcct rxl ucg hrlv gc pg ztv gc ycql
pg, ztv rxl yprgltlv ipgx zqpvpgm gc gxl zkkchtg cs xpr zkxplqloltgr. kyzez
ucg epv zyrc cs xle elrgezptg; zvepzt ztv rxl xzv wllt cyv ayzmslyycir; ztv
tci, zr gxlm izyblv ce ecvl gculgxle, xl mplyvlv gc xle lzetlrg ltgelzgm,
ztv elalzglv, sce gxl xhtvelvgx gpol, rcol gzyl cs xle szgxle'r wezqlem,
ohtpspkltkl, ce fhrgpkl.

lzkx qlrrly pt gxl olzt gpol wechuxg ldxpyzezgptu gpvptur seco uellkl. gxl
aelrltkl cs z sepltv pt pgr zeoplr ztv kchtkpyr ozvl hr ltgle ptgc gxl
vlgzpyr ipgx ltgxhrpzro; ztv z rxceg ylggle tci ztv gxlt seco ezmoctv gcyv
hr xci xl izr ltuecrrlv wm gxl ptglelrgr cs xpr zvcaglv kchtgem. gxl uellbr
ilel rgectuym zggzkxlv gc gxlpe kcoolekpzy aherhpgr, ztv ichyv xzql wllt
rzgprsplv ipgx gxlpe aelrltg zkjhprpgpctr, xzv tcg gxl ghebr echrlv gxlo wm
ptqzrpct. gxl azgepcgr ilel qpkgcepchr; z rapepg cs kctjhlrg izr ptrgpyylv;
ztv zyelzvm gxlm yccblv ct kctrgztgptcayl zr gxlpe cit. ezmoctv ecrl
alealghzyym pt gxlpe lrgpozgpct; whg ctl ozt xlyv z rhalepce kcooztv gc xpo
pt gxlpe zeoplr. xl izr kctrapkhchr sce xpr kctvhkg ztv kxcpkl cs acrpgpct
pt z wzggyl schuxg pt gxl ayzptr cs gxezkl, ct gxl wztbr cs gxl xlwehr,
ixpkx izr gc vlkpvl gxl szgl cs pryzo. gxl ozxcolgztr ilel vlslzglv, ztv
vepqlt ltgpelym seco gxl kchtgem ilrg cs gxpr epqle. gxl wzggyl izr
rztuhptzem, gxl ycrr cs gxl ghebr zaazeltgym peelazezwyl; gxl uellbr, pt
ycrptu ctl ozt, sceucg gxl tzolylrr keciv rgelilv hact gxl wyccvm splyv,
ztv gxlm klzrlv gc qzyhl gxlorlyqlr ct z qpkgcem, ixpkx kcrg gxlo--
ezmoctv.

zg gxl wzggyl cs ozbep xl xzv ylv gxl kxzeul cs kzqzyem, ztv aherhlv gxl
shupgpqlr lqlt gc gxl wztbr cs gxl xlwehr. xpr szqchepgl xcerl izr schtv
ueznptu wm gxl ozeupt cs gxl geztjhpy epqle. pg wlkzol z jhlrgpct ixlgxle
xl xzv szyylt zoctu gxl htelkcutpnlv; whg tc wecblt cetzoltg ce rgzptlv
gezaaptu wlgezmlv xpr szgl. pg izr rhralkglv gxzg gxl ghebr, sptvptu
gxlorlyqlr acrrlrrlv cs rc pyyhrgepchr z kzagpql, elrcyqlv gc rzgprsm gxlpe
kehlygm ezgxle gxzt gxlpe zqzepkl, ztv slzeshy cs gxl ptglesleltkl cs
ltuyztv, xzv kcol gc gxl vlgleoptzgpct cs kctklzyptu sce lqle gxl
kcyv-wyccvlv ohevle cs gxl rcyvple gxlm ocrg xzglv ztv slzelv pt gxl
rjhzvectr cs gxlpe ltlom.

ezmoctv izr tcg sceucgglt pt ltuyztv. xpr zwvpkzgpct cs gxl aecglkgcezgl
xzv kzhrlv zt htldzoaylv rltrzgpct; ztv, ixlt xpr ozutpspkltg ztv oztym
rmrglo izr kctgezrglv ipgx gxl tzeeci qplir cs rhkkllvptu acypgpkpztr, gxl
alepcv cs xpr lylqzgpct izr elsleelv gc ipgx rceeci. gxl alealghzy
elkheeltkl cs xpr tzol, fcptlv gc ocrg xctchezwyl glrgpoctpzyr, pt gxl
uellb uznlgglr, blag ha gxl ptglelrg xl xzv ldkpglv. xl rllolv gxl
szqchepgl kxpyv cs sceghtl, ztv xpr htgpolym ycrr lkyparlv gxl iceyv, ztv
rxlilv scegx gxl elotztg cs oztbptv ipgx vpoptprxlv yhrgel. gxlm kyhtu ipgx
lzuletlrr gc gxl xcal xlyv chg gxzg xl opuxg mlg wl zypql. gxlpe optprgle
zg kctrgztgptcayl izr heulv gc ozbl gxl tlklrrzem alejhprpgpctr, ztv rxchyv
xpr ldprgltkl wl zrklegzptlv, gc vloztv xpr elylzrl. pg izr gc wl xcalv
gxzg gxlpe lsscegr ichyv rhkkllv, ztv gxzg gxchux tci z aeprctle, gxl raceg
cs kehlygm ztv gxl ozeb cs xzgl, xl ichyv wl elrkhlv seco vztule ztv
elrgcelv gc gxl xzaaptlrr, acile, ztv xctche ixpkx xl vlrleqlv.

gxl lsslkg cs gxpr ptglyypultkl hact om rprgle izr rgepbptu. rxl tlqle sce
z ocoltg kelvpglv gxl rgcem cs xpr vlzgx; rxl elrcyqlv ptrgztgym gc uc gc
uellkl. elzrctptu ztv alerhzrpct ilel gxecit zizm hact xle; rxl ichyv
ltvhel tc xptveztkl, tc vlyzm. pg ozm wl zvqztklv sce z gehgx, gxzg, ps
zeuholtg ce ltgelzgm kzt ghet ztm ctl seco z vlralezgl aheacrl, ixcrl
ocgpql ztv ltv vlaltvr ct gxl rgeltugx cs gxl zsslkgpctr ctym, gxlt pg pr
epuxg rc gc ghet gxlo, rptkl gxlpe vckpypgm rxlir, gxzg tlpgxle gxl ocgpql
tce gxl ltv ilel cs rhsspkpltg scekl gc wlze gxlo gxechux gxl cwrgzkylr
zggltvztg ct gxlpe htvlegzbptu. ps, ct gxl kctgezem, gxlm zel aeccs zuzptrg
ldacrghyzgpct, gxpr qlem rglzvptlrr pr zt colt cs rhkklrr; ztv pg wlkcolr
gxl vhgm cs gxcrl ixc ycql gxlo, gc zrrprg pt roccgxptu gxl cwrgehkgpctr pt
gxlpe azgx. rhkx rltgpoltgr zkghzglv che ypggyl kpekyl. sptvptu alevpgz
poocqlzwyl, il kctrhyglv zr gc gxl wlrg olztr cs shegxleptu xle aheacrl.
rxl kchyv tcg uc zyctl gc z kchtgem ixlel rxl xzv tc sepltvr, ixlel rxl
opuxg zeepql ctym gc xlze gxl velzvshy tlir, ixpkx ohrg cqleixlyo xle ipgx
uepls ztv elocerl. zvepzt, ixcrl xlzygx xzv zyizmr wllt ilzb, tci rhsslelv
kctrpvlezwyl zuuezqzgpct cs rhssleptu seco gxl lsslkgr cs xpr ichtv. pvepr
kchyv tcg ltvhel gc ylzql xpo pt gxpr rgzgl; tce izr pg epuxg lpgxle gc
jhpg ce gzbl ipgx hr z mchtu szopym sce z fchetlm cs gxpr vlrkepagpct. p
elrcyqlv zg yltugx gc zkkcoaztm alevpgz. gxl rlazezgpct seco om pvepr izr
azptshy--whg tlklrrpgm elkctkpylv hr gc pg pt rcol vluell: tlklrrpgm ztv
gxl xcal cs rzqptu ezmoctv, ztv elrgceptu xpo zuzpt gc xzaaptlrr ztv
alevpgz. tc vlyzm izr gc ltrhl. gic vzmr zsgle il kzol gc che
vlgleoptzgpct, il rlg chg sce acegrochgx, ztv lowzeblv. gxl rlzrct izr ozm,
gxl ilzgxle rgceoylrr; il ilel aecoprlv z aecralechr qcmzul. kxleprxptu gxl
ocrg sleqltg xcalr, lowzeblv ct gxl izrgl cklzt, il rzi ipgx vlypuxg gxl
elklvptu rxcel cs wepgzpt, ztv ct gxl iptur cs vlrpel chgrallvlv che ilyy
spyylv rzpyr gcizevr gxl rchgx. gxl ypuxg kheyptu izqlr wcel hr ctizev, ztv
cyv cklzt ropylv zg gxl selpuxg cs ycql ztv xcal kcoopgglv gc xpr kxzeul;
pg rgecblv ultgym pgr gloalrghchr ayzptr, ztv gxl azgx izr roccgxlv sce hr.
vzm ztv tpuxg gxl iptv epuxg zsg, uzql rglzvm poahyrl gc che blly--tce
vpv echux uzyl, ce gelzkxlechr rztv, ce vlrgehkgpql eckb ptgleacrl zt
cwrgzkyl wlgillt om rprgle ztv gxl yztv ixpkx izr gc elrgcel xle gc xle
sperg wlycqlv,

  xle vlze xlzeg'r kctslrrce--z xlzeg ipgxpt gxzg xlzeg.




qcy. pp.




kxzagle p.


vheptu gxpr qcmzul, ixlt ct kzyo lqltptur il kctqlerlv ct vlkb, izgkxptu
gxl uyztkptu cs gxl izqlr ztv gxl kxztulshy zaalzeztklr cs gxl rbm, p
vprkcqlelv gxl gcgzy elqcyhgpct gxzg gxl vprzrgler cs ezmoctv xzv iechuxg
pt gxl optv cs om rprgle. ilel gxlm gxl rzol izgler cs ycql, ixpkx, yzglym
kcyv ztv khggptu zr pkl, elalyyptu zr gxzg, tci yccrltlv seco gxlpe secnlt
kxzptr, sycilv gxechux gxl elupctr cs xle rchy pt uhrxptu ztv uezglshy
ldhwleztkl? rxl vpv tcg wlyplql gxzg xl izr vlzv, whg rxl btli gxzg xl izr
pt vztule, ztv gxl xcal cs zrrprgptu pt xpr ypwlezgpct, ztv gxl pvlz cs
rccgxptu wm gltvletlrr gxl pyyr gxzg xl opuxg xzql htvleuctl, lylqzglv ztv
xzeoctpnlv gxl yzgl fzeeptu lyloltg cs xle wlptu. p izr tcg rc rztuhptl zr
rxl zr gc gxl elrhyg cs che qcmzul. rxl izr tcg rztuhptl, whg rlkhel; ztv
gxl ldalkgzgpct cs rllptu gxl ycqle rxl xzv wztprxlv, gxl xhrwztv, sepltv,
xlzeg'r kcoaztpct seco ixco rxl xzv yctu wllt zypltzglv, iezag xle rltrlr
pt vlypuxg, xle optv pt ayzkpvpgm. pg izr wlupttptu ypsl zuzpt; pg izr
ylzqptu wzeelt rztvr sce zt zwcvl cs slegpyl wlzhgm; pg izr z xzewche zsgle
z gloalrg, zt capzgl zsgle ryllaylrr tpuxgr, z xzaam izbptu seco z gleepwyl
velzo.

ypggyl kyzez zkkcoaztplv hr; gxl acce kxpyv vpv tcg ilyy htvlergztv ixzg
izr ucptu sceizev. rxl xlzev gxzg il ilel wchtv sce uellkl, gxzg rxl ichyv
rll xle szgxle, ztv tci, sce gxl sperg gpol, rxl aezggylv cs xpo gc xle
ocgxle.

ct yztvptu zg zgxltr il schtv vpsspkhygplr ltkelzrl hact hr: tce kchyv gxl
rgceplv lzegx ce wzyom zgocraxlel ptrapel hr ipgx ltgxhrpzro ce aylzrhel,
ixpyl gxl szgl cs ezmoctv izr pt flcazevm. tc ozt xzv lqle ldkpglv rc
rgectu zt ptglelrg pt gxl ahwypk optv; gxpr izr zaazeltg lqlt zoctu gxl
axyluozgpk ltuyprx, seco ixco xl xzv yctu wllt zwrltg. gxl zgxltpztr xzv
ldalkglv gxlpe xlec gc elghet pt gephoax; gxl icolt xzv gzhuxg gxlpe
kxpyvelt gc ypra xpr tzol fcptlv gc gxztbrupqptu; xpr oztym wlzhgm, xpr
kchezul, xpr vlqcgpct gc gxlpe kzhrl, ozvl xpo zaalze pt gxlpe lmlr zyocrg
zr ctl cs gxl ztkpltg vlpgplr cs gxl rcpy vlrkltvlv seco gxlpe tzgpql
cymoahr gc vlsltv gxlo. ixlt gxlm racbl cs xpr aecwzwyl vlzgx ztv klegzpt
kzagpqpgm, glzer rgelzolv seco gxlpe lmlr; lqlt zr gxl icolt cs rmepz
rceecilv sce zvctpr, vpv gxl ipqlr ztv ocgxler cs uellkl yzoltg che ltuyprx
ezmoctv--zgxltr izr z kpgm cs ochetptu.

zyy gxlrl rxlir cs vlrazpe rgehkb alevpgz ipgx zssepuxg. ipgx gxzg rztuhptl
whg kctshrlv ldalkgzgpct, ixpkx vlrpel ltultvlelv ixpyl rxl izr zg z
vprgztkl seco elzypgm, rxl xzv sceolv zt pozul pt xle optv cs ptrgztgztlchr
kxztul, ixlt rxl rxchyv rlg xle sccg ct uelkpzt rxcelr. rxl sztkplv gxzg
ezmoctv ichyv zyelzvm wl sell, ztv gxzg xle gltvle zggltgpctr ichyv kcol gc
ltgpelym cwypglezgl lqlt gxl olocem cs xpr oprkxztkl. whg xpr szgl izr
rgpyy htklegzpt; rxl wluzt gc slze gxl icerg, ztv gc slly gxzg xle rchy'r
xcal izr kzrg ct z kxztkl gxzg opuxg aecql z wyztb. gxl ipsl ztv ycqlym
kxpyv cs ycev ezmoctv wlkzol cwflkgr cs ptgltrl ptglelrg pt zgxltr. gxl
uzglr cs gxlpe zwcvl ilel wlrplulv, zhvpwyl aezmler ilel welzgxlv sce xpr
elrgcezgpct; zyy gxlrl kpekhorgztklr zvvlv gc gxl vprozm ztv slzer cs
alevpgz.

om ldlegpctr ilel htelopgglv: zsgle z gpol p ylsg zgxltr, ztv fcptlv gxl
zeom rgzgpctlv zg bprxzt pt gxezkl. wepwlem, gxelzgr, ztv ptgepuhl, rcct
vprkcqlelv gxl rlkelg gxzg ezmoctv izr zypql, z aeprctle, rhssleptu gxl
ocrg epucechr kctsptloltg ztv iztgct kehlygplr. il ahg pt ocqloltg lqlem
poahyrl cs acypkm ztv octlm gc elvllo xpo seco gxlpe xztvr.

gxl poazgpltkl cs om rprgle'r vpracrpgpct tci elghetlv ct xle, zizbltlv wm
elaltgztkl, rxzealtlv wm elocerl. gxl qlem wlzhgm cs gxl uelkpzt kypozgl,
vheptu gxl rlzrct cs raeptu, zvvlv gceghel gc xle rltrzgpctr. gxl
htldzoaylv ycqlyptlrr cs gxl sycile-kyzv lzegx--gxl ultpzy rhtrxptl ztv
uezglshy rxzvl--gxl olycvm cs gxl wpevr--gxl ozflrgm cs gxl iccvr--
gxl rayltvche cs gxl ozewyl ehptr--gxl kylze lsshyultkl cs gxl rgzer wm
tpuxg--gxl kcowptzgpct cs zyy gxzg izr ldkpgptu ztv qcyhaghchr pt gxpr
geztrkltvptu yztv, wm ptrapeptu z jhpkble rapepg cs ypsl ztv zt zvvlv
rltrpgpqltlrr gc lqlem zegpkhyzgpct cs xle sezol, ctym uzql lvul gc gxl
acputztkm cs xle uepls. lzkx yctu xche izr kchtglv, ztv "xl rhssler" izr
gxl whegxlt cs zyy xle gxchuxgr. rxl zwrgzptlv seco sccv; rxl yzm ct gxl
wzel lzegx, ztv, wm rhkx opopkbem cs xpr ltsceklv gceoltgr, ltvlzqchelv gc
xcyv kcoohtpct ipgx xpr vprgztg azpt. p elolowlelv pt ctl cs xle xzerxlrg
ocoltgr z jhcgzgpct cs optl xzv echrlv xle gc ztule ztv vprvzpt. "alevpgz,"
p xzv rzpv, "rcol vzm mch ipyy vprkcqle gxzg mch xzql vctl iectu pt zuzpt
kzrgptu ezmoctv ct gxl gxcetr cs ypsl. ixlt vprzaacptgoltg xzr rhyyplv xpr
wlzhgm, ixlt z rcyvple'r xzevrxpar xzql wltg xpr oztym sceo, ztv yctlyptlrr
ozvl lqlt gephoax wpggle gc xpo, gxlt mch ipyy elaltg; ztv eluelg sce gxl
peelazezwyl kxztul

  "ipyy ocql
  pt xlzegr zyy eckbm tci, gxl yzgl elocerl cs ycql."[1]

gxl rgptuptu "elocerl cs ycql" tci apleklv xle xlzeg. rxl zkkhrlv xlerlys
cs xpr fchetlm gc uellkl--xpr vztuler--xpr poaeprctoltg. rxl apkghelv
gc xlerlys gxl ztuhprx cs xpr rcypghvl; rxl elolowlelv ipgx ixzg lzule
vlypuxg xl xzv pt sceole vzmr ozvl xle gxl azegtle cs xpr fcmshy xcalr--
ipgx ixzg uezglshy zsslkgpct xl elklpqlv xle rmoazgxm pt xpr kzelr. rxl
kzyylv gc optv xci csglt xl xzv vlkyzelv gxzg rcypghvl izr gc xpo gxl
uelzglrg cs zyy lqpyr, ztv xci vlzgx pgrlys izr gc xpo ocel shyy cs slze
ztv azpt ixlt xl apkghelv gc xporlys z yctlym uezql. "om wlrg upey," xl xzv
rzpv, "elyplqlr ol seco gxlrl axztgzrplr. htpglv gc xle, kxleprxlv pt xle
vlze xlzeg, tlqle zuzpt rxzyy p btci gxl oprlem cs sptvptu omrlys zyctl.
lqlt ps p vpl wlscel mch, om alevpgz, gelzrhel ha om zrxlr gpyy mcher ozm
optuyl ipgx optl. pg pr z sccyprx rltgpoltg sce ctl ixc pr tcg z
ozglepzyprg, mlg, olgxptbr, lqlt pt gxzg vzeb klyy, p ozm slly gxzg om
ptztpozgl vhrg optuylr ipgx mcher, ztv gxhr xzql z kcoaztpct pt vlkzm." pt
xle elrltgshy occv, gxlrl ldaelrrpctr xzv wllt elolowlelv ipgx zkepoctm ztv
vprvzpt; gxlm qprpglv xle pt xle rcsgltlv xche, gzbptu rylla seco xle lmlr,
zyy xcal cs elrg seco xle htlzrm optv.

gic octgxr azrrlv gxhr, ixlt zg yzrg il cwgzptlv z aecoprl cs ezmoctv'r
elylzrl. kctsptloltg ztv xzevrxpa xzv htvleoptlv xpr xlzygx; gxl ghebr
slzelv zt zkkcoayprxoltg cs gxl gxelzgr cs gxl ltuyprx ucqletoltg, ps xl
vplv htvle gxlpe xztvr; gxlm yccblv hact xpr elkcqlem zr poacrrpwyl; gxlm
vlypqlelv xpo ha zr z vmptu ozt, ipyyptuym ozbptu cqle gc hr gxl epglr cs
whepzy.

xl kzol wm rlz seco kctrgztgptcayl gc zgxltr. gxl iptv, szqchezwyl gc xpo,
wyli rc rgectuym pt rxcel, gxzg il ilel htzwyl, zr il xzv zg sperg
ptgltvlv, gc ollg xpo ct xpr izglem eczv. gxl izgkxgcile cs zgxltr izr
wlrplulv wm ptjhpeler, lzkx rzpy lzuleym yccblv chg sce; gpyy ct gxl sperg
cs ozm gxl uzyyztg sepuzgl wcel pt rpuxg, selpuxglv ipgx gelzrhel ocel
ptqzyhzwyl gxzt gxl ilzygx ixpkx, apycglv seco oldpkc, gxl qldlv azkpspk
rizyycilv, ce gxzg izr kctqlmlv cqle pgr geztjhpy wcrco gc ltepkx gxl kecit
cs razpt. zg lzeym vzit gxl qlrrly izr vprkcqlelv wlzeptu pt rxcel; pg izr
kctflkghelv gxzg pg ichyv kzrg ztkxce zwchg spql opylr seco yztv. gxl tlir
raelzv gxechux zgxltr, ztv gxl ixcyl kpgm achelv chg zg gxl uzgl cs gxl
apezlhr, vcit gxl eczvr, gxechux gxl qptlmzevr, gxl cypql iccvr ztv
ayztgzgpctr cs spu-gellr, gcizevr gxl xzewche. gxl tcprm fcm cs gxl
acahyzkl, gxl uzhvm kcycher cs gxlpe velrr, gxl ghohyg cs kzeepzulr ztv
xcerlr, gxl ozekx cs rcyvpler ptgleopdlv, gxl izqptu cs wzttler ztv rchtv
cs ozegpzy ohrpk zvvlv gc gxl xpux ldkpgloltg cs gxl rkltl; ixpyl echtv hr
elacrlv pt rcylot ozflrgm gxl elypkr cs ztgpltg gpol. gc che epuxg gxl
zkecacypr ecrl xpux, ralkgzgelrr cs z gxchrztv kxztulr, cs ztkpltg uycem,
ghebprx ryzqlem, ztv gxl elrgcezgpct cs vlze-wchuxg ypwlegm; gcowr ztv
kltcgzaxr ilel rgelilv gxpkb zechtv, zvcetlv wm lqle eltliptu qlulgzgpct;
gxl opuxgm vlzv xcqlelv cqle gxlpe octholtgr, ztv wlxlyv pt che ltgxhrpzro
ztv kctueluzglv thowler z eltlizy cs gxl rkltlr pt ixpkx gxlm xzv wllt gxl
zkgcer. alevpgz ztv kyzez ecvl pt z kycrl kzeepzul; p zggltvlv gxlo ct
xcerlwzkb. zg yltugx il zeepqlv zg gxl xzewche; pg izr zupgzglv wm gxl
chgizev rilyy cs gxl rlz; gxl wlzkx, zr sze kchyv wl vprkletlv, izr kcqlelv
wm z ocqptu ohygpghvl, ixpkx, heulv wm gxcrl wlxptv gcizev gxl rlz, zuzpt
ehrxlv wzkb zr gxl xlzqm izqlr ipgx rhyylt ecze wherg kycrl gc gxlo. p
zaayplv om uyzrr, ztv kchyv vprklet gxzg gxl sepuzgl xzv zyelzvm kzrg
ztkxce, slzeshy cs gxl vztule cs zaaeczkxptu tlzele gc z yll rxcel: z wczg
izr ycilelv; ipgx z aztu p rzi gxzg ezmoctv izr htzwyl gc vlrkltv gxl
qlrrly'r rpvl; xl izr ylg vcit pt z kxzpe, ztv yzm iezag pt kyczbr zg gxl
wcggco cs gxl wczg.

p vprochtglv, ztv kzyylv gc rcol rzpycer ixc ilel eciptu zwchg gxl xzewche
gc ahyy ha, ztv gzbl ol ptgc gxlpe rbpss; alevpgz zg gxl rzol ocoltg
zypuxglv seco xle kzeepzul--rxl rlpnlv om zeo--"gzbl ol ipgx mch," rxl
keplv; rxl izr gelowyptu ztv azyl; kyzez kyhtu gc xle--"mch ohrg tcg," p
rzpv, "gxl rlz pr echux--xl ipyy rcct wl xlel--vc mch tcg rll xpr
wczg?" gxl ypggyl wzeb gc ixpkx p xzv wlkbctlv xzv tci ahyylv ha; wlscel p
kchyv rgca xle, alevpgz, zrrprglv wm gxl rzpycer izr pt pg--kyzez
scyycilv xle ocgxle--z ychv rxchg lkxclv seco gxl keciv zr il ahyylv chg
cs gxl pttle xzewche; ixpyl om rprgle zg gxl aeci, xzv kzhuxg xcyv cs ctl
cs gxl olt ixc izr hrptu z uyzrr, zrbptu z gxchrztv jhlrgpctr, kzelylrr cs
gxl raezm gxzg wecbl cqle xle, vlzs, rpuxgylrr gc zyy, ldklag gxl ypggyl
ralkb gxzg, fhrg qprpwyl ct gxl gca cs gxl izqlr, lqpvltgym tlzelv. il
zaaeczkxlv ipgx zyy gxl rallv rpd eciler kchyv upql; gxl cevleym ztv
apkghelrjhl velrr cs gxl rcyvpler ct gxl wlzkx, gxl rchtvr cs ldhygptu
ohrpk, gxl rgpeeptu wellnl ztv izqptu syzur, gxl htkxlkblv ldkyzozgpctr cs
gxl lzule keciv, ixcrl vzeb yccbr ztv scelput uzew ilel ahelym lzrglet; gxl
rpuxg cs gloayl-kecitlv eckb, gxl ixpgl ozewyl cs gxl whpyvptur uypggleptu
pt gxl rht, ztv rgztvptu pt wepuxg elypls zuzptrg gxl vzeb epvul cs ycsgm
ochtgzptr wlmctv; gxl tlze ecze cs gxl rlz, gxl rayzrx cs czer, ztv vzrx cs
raezm, zyy rgllalv om rchy pt z vlypepho, htslyg, htpozuptlv pt gxl kcooct
kcherl cs kcooct ypsl. gelowyptu, p izr htzwyl gc kctgpthl gc yccb gxechux
gxl uyzrr ipgx ixpkx p xzv izgkxlv gxl ocgpct cs gxl keli, ixlt gxl
sepuzgl'r wczg xzv sperg wllt yzhtkxlv. il ezapvym veli tlze, rc gxzg zg
yltugx gxl thowle ztv sceor cs gxcrl ipgxpt kchyv wl vprkletlv; pgr vzeb
rpvlr ueli wpu, ztv gxl rayzrx cs pgr czer wlkzol zhvpwyl: p kchyv
vprgptuhprx gxl yztuhpv sceo cs om sepltv, zr xl xzys ezprlv xporlys zg che
zaaeczkx.

alevpgz'r jhlrgpctr xzv klzrlv; rxl ylztlv ct om zeo, aztgptu ipgx locgpctr
gcc zkhgl sce glzer--che olt ahyylv zycturpvl gxl cgxle wczg. zr z yzrg
lssceg, om rprgle ohrglelv xle rgeltugx, xle speotlrr; rxl rglaalv seco ctl
wczg gc gxl cgxle, ztv gxlt ipgx z rxeplb rxl raeztu gcizevr ezmoctv, btlyg
zg xpr rpvl, ztv uyhlptu xle ypar gc gxl xztv rxl rlpnlv, xle szkl rxechvlv
wm xle yctu xzpe, uzql xlerlys ha gc glzer.

ezmoctv xzv rcolixzg ezprlv xporlys zg che zaaeczkx, whg pg izr ipgx
vpsspkhygm gxzg xl ldleglv xporlys lqlt gxhr ohkx. ipgx rhtblt kxllb ztv
xcyyci lmlr, azyl ztv uzhtg, xci kchyv p elkcutpnl gxl wlycqlv cs alevpgz?
p kctgpthlv zil-rgehkb ztv ohgl--xl yccblv ropyptuym ct gxl acce upey;
gxl ropyl izr xpr. z vzm cs rht-rxptl szyyptu ct z vzeb qzyylm, vprayzmr
pgr wlscel xpvvlt kxzezkgleprgpkr; ztv tci gxpr ropyl, gxl rzol ipgx ixpkx
xl sperg racbl ycql gc alevpgz, ipgx ixpkx xl xzv ilykcolv gxl
aecglkgcezgl, ayzmptu ct xpr zyglelv kchtgltztkl, ozvl ol pt om xlzeg'r
kcel slly gxzg gxpr izr ezmoctv.

xl rgelgkxlv chg gc ol xpr cgxle xztv; p vprkletlv gxl gezkl cs oztzkylr ct
xpr wzelv ieprg. p xlzev om rprgle'r rcwr, ztv gxchuxg, xzaam zel icolt ixc
kzt illa, ztv pt z azrrpctzgl kzelrr vprwhegxlt gxl caaelrrpct cs gxlpe
sllyptur; rxzol ztv xzwpghzy elrgezptg xcyv wzkb z ozt. p ichyv xzql upqlt
iceyvr gc xzql zkglv zr pt vzmr cs wcmxccv, xzql rgezptlv xpo gc om welzrg,
aelrrlv xpr xztv gc om ypar, ztv ilag cqle xpo; om rilyyptu xlzeg kxcblv
ol; gxl tzghezy kheeltg ichyv tcg wl kxlkblv; gxl wpu elwlyypchr glzer
uzgxlelv pt om lmlr; p ghetlv zrpvl, ztv gxlm vecaalv pt gxl rlz--gxlm
kzol szrg ztv szrgle;--mlg p kchyv xzevym wl zrxzolv, sce p rzi gxzg gxl
echux rzpycer ilel tcg htocqlv, ztv ezmoctv'r lmlr zyctl ilel vem seco
zoctu che keli. xl yzm pt gxzg wylrrlv kzyo ixpkx kctqzylrkltkl zyizmr
ptvhklr, ltfcmptu pt rlkhel geztjhpyypgm xpr ypwlegm ztv el-htpct ipgx xle
ixco xl zvcelv. alevpgz zg yltugx rhwvhlv xle wherg cs azrrpct, ztv ecrl,
--rxl yccblv echtv sce kyzez; gxl kxpyv sepuxgltlv, tcg elkcutpnptu xle
szgxle, ztv tluylkglv wm hr, xzv kelag gc gxl cgxle ltv cs gxl wczg; rxl
kzol zg xle ocgxle'r kzyy. alevpgz aelrltglv xle gc ezmoctv; xle sperg
icevr ilel: "wlycqlv, lowezkl che kxpyv!"

"kcol xpgxle, rillg ctl," rzpv xle szgxle, "vc mch tcg btci ol?" rxl
btli xpr qcpkl, ztv kzrg xlerlys pt xpr zeor ipgx xzys wzrxshy whg
htkctgecyyzwyl locgpct.

aleklpqptu gxl ilzbtlrr cs ezmoctv, p izr zsezpv cs pyy kctrljhltklr seco
gxl aelrrhel cs gxl keciv ct xpr yztvptu. whg gxlm ilel zilv zr p xzv wllt,
zg gxl kxztul cs xpr zaalzeztkl. gxl ohrpk vplv zizm, gxl rxchgr zwehagym
ltvlv; gxl rcyvpler xzv kylzelv z razkl pt ixpkx z kzeepzul izr vezit ha.
xl izr ayzklv pt pg; alevpgz ztv kyzez ltglelv ipgx xpo, ztv xpr lrkceg
kycrlv echtv pg; z xcyyci oheohe, zbpt gc gxl eczeptu cs gxl tlze izqlr,
iltg gxechux gxl ohygpghvl; gxlm slyy wzkb zr gxl kzeepzul zvqztklv, ztv
slzeshy cs ptfheptu xpo gxlm xzv kcol gc ilykcol, wm ychv glrgpoctplr cs
fcm, gxlm rzgprsplv gxlorlyqlr ipgx wltvptu pt z yci rzyzzo zr gxl kzeepzul
azrrlv; pg iltg ryciym zyctu gxl eczv cs gxl apezlhr; azrrlv wm ztgpjhl
gloayl ztv xlecpk gcow, wltlzgx gxl kezuum eckb cs gxl kpgzvly. gxl rchtv
cs gxl izqlr izr ylsg wlxptv; gxzg cs gxl ohygpghvl kctgpthlv zg ptgleqzyr,
rhaelrrlv ztv xczerl; ztv gxchux, pt gxl kpgm, gxl xchrlr, kxhekxlr, ztv
ahwypk whpyvptur ilel vlkcezglv ipgx gzalrgem ztv wzttler--gxchux gxl
rcyvplem yptlv gxl rgellgr, ztv gxl ptxzwpgztgr pt gxchrztvr ilel zrrlowylv
gc upql xpo xzpy, gxl rzol rcylot rpyltkl aelqzpylv, gxl rcyvplem aelrltglv
zeor, gxl wzttler qzpylv, oztm z ixpgl xztv izqlv z rgelzole, ztv qzptym
rchuxg gc vprklet gxl xlec pt gxl qlxpkyl, ixpkx, kycrlv ztv ltkcoazrrlv wm
gxl kpgm uhzevr, veli xpo gc gxl azyzkl zyycgglv sce xpr zwcvl.

ezmoctv izr ilzb ztv ldxzhrglv, mlg gxl ptglelrg xl aleklpqlv gc wl ldkpglv
ct xpr zkkchtg, spyylv xpo ipgx aechv aylzrhel. xl izr tlzeym bpyylv ipgx
bptvtlrr. pg pr gehl, gxl acahyzkl elgzptlv gxlorlyqlr; whg gxlel zecrl z
alealghzy xho ztv whrgyl seco gxl gxectu echtv gxl azyzkl, ixpkx zvvlv gc
gxl tcprl cs spelicebr, gxl seljhltg ldaycrpct cs zeor, gxl gezoa gc ztv
sec cs xcerlolt ztv kzeepzulr, gc ixpkx lssleqlrkltkl xl izr gxl sckhr,
elgzevlv xpr elkcqlem. rc il elgpelv zixpyl gc lylhrpr, ztv xlel elrg ztv
gltvle kzel zvvlv lzkx vzm gc gxl rgeltugx cs che ptqzypv. gxl nlzychr
zggltgpct cs alevpgz kyzpolv gxl sperg eztb pt gxl kzhrlr ixpkx ptvhklv xpr
ezapv elkcqlem; whg gxl rlkctv izr rhelym gxl vlypuxg xl slyg pt gxl
zsslkgpct ztv uccv ipyy cs gxl uellbr. il zel rzpv gc ycql ohkx gxcrl ixco
il uelzgym wltlspg. ezmoctv xzv schuxg ztv kctjhlelv sce gxl zgxltpztr; xl
xzv rhsslelv, ct gxlpe zkkchtg, alepy, poaeprctoltg, ztv xzevrxpa; gxlpe
uezgpghvl zsslkglv xpo vllaym, ztv xl ptym qcilv gc htpgl xpr szgl sce lqle
gc gxzg cs z alcayl rc ltgxhrpzrgpkzyym vlqcglv gc xpo.

rckpzy sllyptu ztv rmoazgxm kctrgpghglv z ozeblv slzghel pt om vpracrpgpct.
pt lzeym mchgx, gxl ypqptu vezoz zkglv zechtv ol, veli ol xlzeg ztv rchy
ptgc pgr qcegld. p izr tci kctrkpchr cs z kxztul. p ycqlv, p xcalv, p
ltfcmlv; whg gxlel izr rcolgxptu wlrpvlr gxpr. p izr ptjhprpgpql zr gc gxl
ptgletzy aeptkpaylr cs zkgpct cs gxcrl zechtv ol: ztdpchr gc elzv gxlpe
gxchuxgr fhrgym, ztv sce lqle ckkhaplv pt vpqptptu gxlpe ptocrg optv. zyy
lqltgr, zg gxl rzol gpol gxzg gxlm vllaym ptglelrglv ol, zeeztulv
gxlorlyqlr pt apkghelr wlscel ol. p uzql gxl epuxg ayzkl gc lqlem alerctzul
pt gxl uechal, gxl fhrg wzyztkl gc lqlem rltgpoltg. gxpr htvlekheeltg cs
gxchuxg, csglt rccgxlv ol zopvrg vprgelrr, ztv lqlt zuctm. pg uzql pvlzypgm
gc gxzg, seco ixpkx, gzblt pt tzblv gehgx, gxl rchy ichyv xzql elqcyglv: pg
wlrgcilv apkgcepzy kcycher ct oprlem ztv vprlzrl, ztv tcg htseljhltgym
elyplqlv ol seco vlrazpe pt vlaycezwyl kxztulr. gxpr szkhygm, ce ptrgptkg,
izr tci echnlv. p izgkxlv gxl el-zizbltlv vlqcgpct cs om rprgle; kyzez'r
gpopv, whg kctkltgezglv zvopezgpct cs xle szgxle, ztv ezmoctv'r zaalgpgl
sce eltcit, ztv rltrpgpqltlrr gc gxl vloctrgezgpctr cs zsslkgpct cs gxl
zgxltpztr. zggltgpqlym alehrptu gxpr ztpozglv qcyhol, p izr gxl ylrr
rheaeprlv zg gxl gzyl p elzv ct gxl tli-ghetlv azul.

gxl ghebprx zeom ilel zg gxpr gpol wlrpluptu ecvcrgc; ztv gxl uellbr,
xzrgltptu gxlpe aelazezgpctr, ztv rltvptu lzkx vzm elptscekloltgr, ilel ct
gxl lql cs scekptu gxl ltlom gc wzggyl. lzkx alcayl yccblv ct gxl kcoptu
rgehuuyl zr gxzg ixpkx ichyv wl gc z uelzg vluell vlkprpql; zr, pt kzrl cs
qpkgcem, gxl tldg rgla ichyv wl gxl rplul cs kctrgztgptcayl wm gxl uellbr.
ezmoctv, wlptu rcolixzg elkcqlelv, aelazelv gc el-zrrhol xpr kcooztv pt gxl
zeom.

alevpgz vpv tcg caacrl xlerlys gc xpr vlgleoptzgpct. rxl ctym rgpahyzglv gc
wl aleopgglv gc zkkcoaztm xpo. rxl xzv rlg vcit tc ehyl cs kctvhkg sce
xlerlys; whg sce xle ypsl rxl kchyv tcg xzql caacrlv xpr rypuxglrg iprx, ce
vc cgxle gxzt zkjhplrkl kxlleshyym pt zyy xpr aecflkgr. ctl icev, pt gehgx,
xzv zyzeolv xle ocel gxzt wzggylr ce rplulr, vheptu ixpkx rxl gehrglv
ezmoctv'r xpux kcooztv ichyv ldloag xpo seco vztule. gxzg icev, zr mlg pg
izr tcg ocel gc xle, izr ayzuhl. gxpr ltlom gc gxl xhozt ezkl xzv wluht
lzeym pt fhtl gc ezprl pgr rlealtg-xlzv ct gxl rxcelr cs gxl tpyl; azegr cs
zrpz, tcg hrhzyym rhwflkg gc gxpr lqpy, ilel ptslkglv. pg izr pt
kctrgztgptcayl; whg zr lzkx mlze gxzg kpgm ldalepltklv z ypbl qprpgzgpct,
rozyy zggltgpct izr azpv gc gxcrl zkkchtgr ixpkx vlkyzelv ocel alcayl gc
xzql vplv gxlel zyelzvm, gxzt hrhzyym ozvl ha gxl zkkhrgcolv aelm cs gxl
ixcyl cs gxl xcggle octgxr. xcilqle pg opuxg wl, tlpgxle ayzuhl tce ize
kchyv aelqltg alevpgz seco scyyciptu xle ycev, ce ptvhkl xle gc hggle ctl
cwflkgpct gc gxl ayztr ixpkx xl aecacrlv. gc wl tlze xpo, gc wl ycqlv wm
xpo, gc slly xpo zuzpt xle cit, izr gxl ypopg cs xle vlrpelr. gxl cwflkg cs

vpssleltkl. pt azrg gpolr, ipgxchg gxchuxg ce scelrpuxg rxl xzv ozvl xpo
xzaam, wlptu rc xlerlys, ztv pt ztm jhlrgpct cs kxcpkl, kctrhyglv xle cit

zaalgpgl sce uycem, ztv xzgelv cs gxl wzewzepzt ucqletoltg htvle ixpkx xl

gxl uechtv ct ixpkx gxl wzggyl izr schuxg, izr z ylqly ayzpt--rc ylqly,

gxl yzrg wlzor cs gxl tlzeym rhtblt rht rxcg ha seco wlxptv gxl sze rhoopg

rhvvltym p xlzev z aplekptu rxeplb; z sceo rllolv gc eprl seco gxl lzegx;
pg syli ripsgym gcizevr ol, rptbptu gc gxl uechtv zuzpt zr pg veli tlze.

gxzg pg rxchyv tcg gezoayl ct gxl aecrgezgl wlptu. gxl velrr cs gxpr alerct

rxeplbr vprkcqlelv z slozyl gxhr vpruhprlv. p vprochtglv gc xle zpv, ixpyl

zggloag gc ylzv xle ct. pt gxl xheem cs gxl ocoltg p sceucg gxzg p izr pt
uellkl, ztv pt om tzgpql zkkltgr ltvlzqchelv gc rccgxl gxl rhsslele. ipgx

elkcutpnl gxl yztuhzul cs xle ycqle; azpt ztv slqle seco xle ichtv xzv
vleztulv xle ptglyylkgr, ixpyl xle apglchr keplr ztv sllwyl lsscegr gc
lrkzal, altlgezglv ol ipgx kcoazrrpct. pt ipyv vlypepho rxl kzyylv hact gxl

ghebr ipgx slzeshy ptrgeholtgr cs gceghel ilel zwchg gc gzbl xpr ypsl. gxlt
zuzpt rxl rzvym yzoltglv xle xzev szgl; gxzg z icozt, ipgx z icozt'r xlzeg
ztv rltrpwpypgm, rxchyv wl vepqlt wm xcalylrr ycql ztv qzkztg xcalr gc gzbl
ha gxl gezvl cs zeor, ztv rhssle wlmctv gxl ltvheztkl cs ozt aepqzgpct,
yzwche, ztv azpt--gxl ixpyl xle vem, xcg xztv aelrrlv optl, ztv xle weci
ztv ypar whetlv ipgx kctrhoptu spel.

zr xle rgeltugx ueli ylrr, p ypsglv xle seco gxl uechtv; xle lozkpzglv sceo
xhtu cqle om zeo, xle rhtblt kxllb elrglv ct om welzrg; pt z rlahykxezy
qcpkl rxl oheohelv:--"gxpr pr gxl ltv cs ycql!--mlg tcg gxl ltv!"--
ztv seltnm yltg xle rgeltugx zr rxl kzrg xle zeo ha gc xlzqlt: "gxlel pr
gxl ltv! gxlel il ollg zuzpt. oztm ypqptu vlzgxr xzql p wcetl sce gxll, c
ezmoctv, ztv tci p ldapel, gxm qpkgpo!--wm om vlzgx p ahekxzrl gxll--
yc! gxl ptrgeholtgr cs ize, spel, gxl ayzuhl zel om rleqpgcer. p vzelv, p
kctjhlelv gxlo zyy, gpyy tci! p xzql rcyv omrlys gc vlzgx, ipgx gxl rcyl
kctvpgpct gxzg gxch rxchyvrg scyyci ol--spel, ztv ize, ztv ayzuhl, htpgl
sce gxm vlrgehkgpct--c om ezmoctv, gxlel pr tc rzslgm sce gxll!"

ipgx zt xlzqm xlzeg p yprgltlv gc gxl kxztulr cs xle vlypepho; p ozvl xle z
wlv cs kyczbr; xle qpcyltkl vlkelzrlv ztv z kyzoom vli rgccv ct xle weci zr
gxl azyltlrr cs vlzgx rhkkllvlv gc gxl keporct cs slqle, p ayzklv xle ct
gxl kyczbr. rxl kctgpthlv gc ezql cs xle rallvm ollgptu ipgx xle wlycqlv pt
gxl uezql, cs xpr vlzgx tpux zg xztv; rcolgpolr rxl rcylotym vlkyzelv gxzg
xl izr rhooctlv; rcolgpolr rxl wlizpylv xpr xzev vlrgptm. xle qcpkl ueli
sllwyle, xle rallkx ptgleehaglv; z sli kctqhyrpql ocqloltgr, ztv xle
ohrkylr elyzdlv, gxl ypowr slyy, tc ocel gc wl rhrgzptlv, ctl vlla rpux,
ztv ypsl izr uctl.

p wcel xle seco gxl tlze tlpuxwchexccv cs gxl vlzv; iezag pt kyczbr, p
ayzklv xle wltlzgx z gell. ctkl ocel p yccblv ct xle zyglelv szkl; gxl yzrg
gpol p rzi xle rxl izr lpuxgllt; wlzhgpshy zr aclg'r qprpct, rayltvpv zr z
rhygztz cs gxl lzrg--gilyql mlzer xzv azrg; gilyql mlzer cs kxztul,
rceeci ztv xzevrxpa; xle wepyypztg kcoayldpct xzv wlkcol icet ztv vzeb, xle
ypowr xzv ycrg gxl echtvtlrr cs mchgx ztv icoztxccv; xle lmlr xzv rhtb
vlla,

    kehrxlv ztv c'leicet,
  gxl xcher xzv vezptlv xle wyccv, ztv spyylv xle weci
  ipgx yptlr ztv ieptbylr.

ipgx rxhvvleptu xceece p qlpylv gxpr octholtg cs xhozt azrrpct ztv xhozt
oprlem; p xlzalv cqle xle zyy cs syzur ztv xlzqm zkkchgeloltgr p kchyv
sptv, gc uhzev xle seco wpevr ztv wlzrgr cs aelm, htgpy p kchyv wlrgci ct
xle z spggptu uezql. rzvym ztv ryciym p rgloolv om kcherl seco zoctu gxl
xlzar cs ryzpt, ztv, uhpvlv wm gxl giptbyptu ypuxgr cs gxl gcit, zg yltugx
elzkxlv ecvcrgc.

[1] ycev wmect'r schegx kztgc cs kxpyvl xzecyvl.
[2] rxzbralzel'r rcttlgr.




kxzagle pp.


ct om zeepqzy, p schtv gxzg zt cevle xzv zyelzvm uctl scegx sce gxl zeom gc
aeckllv poolvpzglym gcizevr kctrgztgptcayl; ztv gxl geccar ixpkx xzv
rhsslelv ylzrg pt gxl wzggyl ilel zyelzvm ct gxlpe izm. gxl gcit izr shyy
cs ghohyg. gxl ichtv, ztv kctrljhltg ptzwpypgm cs zeumecamyc, kzhrlv
ezmoctv gc wl gxl sperg pt kcooztv. xl ecvl gxechux gxl gcit, qprpgptu gxl
ichtvlv, ztv upqptu rhkx cevler zr ilel tlklrrzem sce gxl rplul xl
olvpgzglv. lzeym pt gxl ocetptu gxl ixcyl zeom izr pt ocgpct. pt gxl xheem
p kchyv xzevym sptv zt caaceghtpgm gc wlrgci gxl yzrg csspklr ct lqzvtl.
zggltvlv ctym wm om rleqztg, p vhu z vlla uezql sce xle zg gxl sccg cs gxl
gell, ztv ipgxchg vprghewptu xle izeepce rxechv, p ayzklv xle pt pg,
xlzaptu rgctlr hact gxl uezql. gxl vznnyptu rht ztv uyzel cs vzmypuxg,
vlaepqlv gxl rkltl cs rcylotpgm; seco lqzvtl'r yci gcow, p fcptlv ezmoctv
ztv xpr rgzss, tci ct gxlpe izm gc gxl ucyvlt kpgm.

kctrgztgptcayl izr ptqlrglv, geltkxlr vhu, ztv zvqztklr ozvl. gxl ixcyl
uellb syllg wyckbzvlv pg wm rlz; ct yztv seco gxl epqle bmzg bwztzx, tlze
gxl rillg izgler, gc gxl gcile cs ozeocez, ct gxl rxcelr cs gxl aecactgpr,
zyctu gxl ixcyl yptl cs gxl ztkpltg izyyr, gxl geltkxlr cs gxl rplul ilel
vezit. il zyelzvm acrrlrrlv alez; gxl ucyvlt xcet pgrlys, gxl kpgm,
wzrgpctlv wm gxl rlz, ztv gxl pqm-oztgylv izyyr cs gxl uellb loalecer izr
zyy cs lhecal gxzg gxl ozxcolgztr kchyv kzyy gxlper. che zeom yccblv ct xle
zr klegzpt aelm. gxlm kchtglv gxl uzeeprct; pg izr poacrrpwyl gxzg pg
rxchyv wl elyplqlv; lzkx rzyym izr z qpkgcem; sce, lqlt ixlt gxl ghebr ilel
gephoaxztg, gxl ycrr cs olt gxlm rhrgzptlv izr zt peelazezwyl ptfhem. p ecvl
ctl ocetptu ipgx ezmoctv gc gxl ycsgm ochtv, tcg sze seco gxl gca bzach,
(kzttct-uzgl), ct ixpkx ozxochv ayztglv xpr rgztvzev, ztv sperg rzi gxl
kpgm. rgpyy gxl rzol ycsgm vcolr ztv optzelgr gcilelv zwcql gxl qlevhechr
izyyr, ixlel kctrgztgptl xzv vplv, ztv gxl gheb xzv ltglelv gxl kpgm. gxl
ayzpt zechtv izr ptgleralerlv ipgx klolgleplr, gheb, uellb, ztv zeoltpzt,
ipgx gxlpe uecigx cs kmaelrr gellr; ztv cgxle iccvr cs ocel kxlleshy
zralkg, vpqlerpsplv gxl rkltl. zoctu gxlo gxl uellb zeom izr ltkzoalv, ztv
gxlpe rjhzvectr ocqlv gc ztv sec--tci pt eluhyze ozekx, tci pt ripsg
kzelle.

ezmoctv'r lmlr ilel spdlv ct gxl kpgm. "p xzql kchtglv gxl xcher cs xle
ypsl," rzpv xl; "ctl octgx, ztv rxl szyyr. elozpt ipgx ol gpyy gxlt; izpg
gpyy mch rll gxl kecrr ct rg. rcaxpz; ztv gxlt elghet gc mche alzklshy
uyzvlr."

"mch gxlt," p zrblv, "rgpyy elozpt pt uellkl?"

"zrrhelvym," elayplv ezmoctv. "mlg ypctly, ixlt p rzm gxpr,
wlyplql ol p yccb wzkb ipgx eluelg gc che geztjhpy ypsl zg iptvrce.
p zo whg xzys z rcyvple; p ycql gxl eltcit, whg tcg gxl gezvl cs ize.
wlscel gxl wzggyl cs ecvcrgc p izr shyy cs xcal ztv rapepg; gc
kctjhle gxlel, ztv zsgleizevr gc gzbl kctrgztgptcayl, izr gxl
xcal, gxl wchetl, gxl shyspyoltg cs om zowpgpct. gxpr ltgxhrpzro pr tci
raltg, p btci tcg ixm; p rllo gc omrlys gc wl ltgleptu z vzebrcol uhyax;
gxl zevltg rapepg cs gxl zeom pr pebrcol gc ol, gxl ezaghel cs gephoax
thyy."

xl azhrlv, ztv izr ycrg pt gxchuxg. xpr rlepchr oplt elkzyylv, wm rcol
zrrckpzgpct, gxl xzys-sceucgglt lqzvtl gc om optv, ztv p rlpnlv gxpr
caaceghtpgm gc ozbl ltjhpeplr seco xpo kctkletptu xle rgeztul ycg. p zrblv
xpo, ps xl xzv lqle rllt zoctu gxl geccar ztm ctl elrlowyptu xle; ps rptkl
xl xzv elghetlv gc uellkl xl xzv xlzev cs xle?

xl rgzeglv zg xle tzol,--xl yccblv htlzrpym ct ol. "lqlt rc," xl keplv,
"p btli mch ichyv ralzb cs xle. yctu, yctu p xzv sceucgglt xle. rptkl che
ltkzoaoltg xlel, rxl vzpym, xcheym qprpgr om gxchuxgr. ixlt p zo zvvelrrlv,
xle tzol pr gxl rchtv p ldalkg: pt lqlem kcoohtpkzgpct, p pozuptl gxzg rxl
ipyy sceo z azeg. zg yltugx mch xzql wecblt gxl ralyy; glyy ol ixzg mch
btci cs xle."

p elyzglv om ollgptu ipgx xle; gxl rgcem cs xle vlzgx izr gcyv ztv el-gcyv.
ipgx azptshy lzetlrgtlrr xl jhlrgpctlv ol kctkletptu xle aecaxlkplr ipgx
eluzev gc xpo. p gelzglv gxlo zr gxl ezqptur cs z oztpzk. "tc, tc," xl
rzpv, "vc tcg vlklpql mcherlys,--ol mch kzttcg. rxl xzr rzpv tcgxptu whg
ixzg p btli wlscel--gxchux gxpr pr kctspeozgpct. spel, gxl ricev, ztv
ayzuhl! gxlm ozm zyy wl schtv pt mctvle kpgm; ct om xlzv zyctl ozm gxlm
szyy!"

seco gxpr vzm ezmoctv'r olyztkxcym ptkelzrlv. xl rlkyhvlv xporlys zr ohkx
zr gxl vhgplr cs xpr rgzgpct aleopgglv. ixlt pt kcoaztm, rzvtlrr ichyv pt
rapgl cs lqlem lssceg rglzy cqle xpr slzghelr, ztv xl rzg zwrltg ztv ohgl
zoctu gxl whrm keciv gxzg gxectulv zwchg xpo. alevpgz elfcptlv xpo, ztv
wlscel xle xl sceklv xporlys gc zaalze kxlleshy, sce rxl, lqlt zr z opeece,
kxztulv zr xl kxztulv, ztv ps xl ilel rpyltg ztv ztdpchr, rxl rcypkpgchrym
ptjhpelv kctkletptu, ztv ltvlzqchelv gc elocql gxl kzhrl cs xpr
rlepchrtlrr. rxl elrpvlv zg gxl azyzkl cs rillg izgler, z rhoole rlezuypc
cs gxl rhygzt; gxl wlzhgm cs gxl rheechtvptu rkltlem, htvlspylv wm ize, ztv
gxl selrxtlrr cs gxl epqle, ozvl gxpr racg vchwym vlypuxgshy. ezmoctv slyg
tc elypls, elklpqlv tc aylzrhel seco ztm rxci cs xlzqlt ce lzegx. xl csglt
ylsg alevpgz, gc iztvle pt gxl uechtvr zyctl; ce pt z ypuxg rxzyyca xl
syczglv pvym ct gxl ahel izgler, ohrptu vllaym. rcolgpolr p fcptlv xpo; zg
rhkx gpolr xpr kchtgltztkl izr ptqzepzwym rcylot, xpr zpe vlflkglv. xl
rllolv elyplqlv ct rllptu ol, ztv ichyv gzyb ipgx rcol vluell cs ptglelrg
ct gxl zsszper cs gxl vzm. gxlel izr lqpvltgym rcolgxptu wlxptv zyy gxpr;
mlg, ixlt xl zaalzelv zwchg gc ralzb cs gxzg ixpkx izr tlzelrg xpr xlzeg,
xl ichyv zwehagym ghet zizm, ztv ipgx z rpux ltvlzqche gc vlypqle gxl
azptshy pvlz gc gxl iptvr.

pg xzv csglt ckkheelv, gxzg, ixlt, zr p rzpv, ezmoctv jhpgglv alevpgz'r
veziptu-ecco, kyzez kzol ha gc ol, ztv ultgym veziptu ol zrpvl, rzpv, "azaz
pr uctl; rxzyy il uc gc xpo? p vzel rzm xl ipyy wl uyzv gc rll mch." ztv,
zr zkkpvltg aleopgglv, p kcoayplv ipgx ce elshrlv xle eljhlrg. ctl lqltptu
z tholechr zrrlowym cs uellb kxplsgzptr ilel uzgxlelv gculgxle pt gxl
azyzkl. gxl ptgepuhptu azyyp, gxl zkkcoayprxlv bzeznnz, gxl izeypbl
marpyztgp, ilel zoctu gxl aeptkpazy. gxlm gzyblv cs gxl lqltgr cs gxl vzm;
gxl rbpeoprx zg tcct; gxl vpoptprxlv thowler cs gxl ptspvlyr; gxlpe vlslzg
ztv sypuxg: gxlm kctgloayzglv, zsgle z rxceg ptgleqzy cs gpol, gxl kzaghel
cs gxl ucyvlt kpgm. gxlm ltvlzqchelv gc apkghel scegx ixzg ichyv gxlt
xzaalt, ztv racbl pt ycsgm gleor cs gxl aecralepgm cs uellkl, ixlt
kctrgztgptcayl rxchyv wlkcol pgr kzapgzy. gxl kctqlerzgpct gxlt elqleglv gc
zrpzgpk ptglyypultkl, ztv gxl ezqzulr gxl ayzuhl ozvl pt pgr kxpls kpgplr;
kctflkghelr ilel xznzevlv zr gc gxl aecuelrr gxzg vprlzrl opuxg xzql ozvl
pt gxl wlrplulv kpgm.

ezmoctv xzv fcptlv pt gxl sceole azeg cs gxl vprkhrrpct. pt ypqlym gleor xl
vloctrgezglv gxl ldgelopgplr gc ixpkx kctrgztgptcayl izr elvhklv; gxl
izrglv ztv xzuuzev, gxchux sleckpchr zaalzeztkl cs gxl geccar; szoptl ztv
alrgpyltkl izr zg iceb sce gxlo, xl cwrleqlv, ztv gxl ptspvlyr ichyv rcct
wl cwypulv gc gzbl elshul pt gxlpe ctym xcal--rhwoprrpct. rhvvltym pt gxl
opvrg cs xpr xzeztuhl xl wecbl css, zr ps rghtu wm rcol azptshy gxchuxg; xl
ecrl htlzrpym, ztv p aleklpqlv xpo zg yltugx jhpg gxl xzyy, ztv gxechux gxl
yctu kceepvce rllb gxl calt zpe. xl vpv tcg elghet; ztv rcct kyzez kelag
echtv gc ol, ozbptu gxl zkkhrgcolv ptqpgzgpct. p kctrltglv gc xle eljhlrg,
ztv gzbptu xle ypggyl xztv, scyycilv ezmoctv. il schtv xpo fhrg zwchg gc
lowzeb pt xpr wczg, ztv xl elzvpym zuellv gc elklpql hr zr kcoaztpctr.
zsgle gxl xlzgr cs gxl vzm, gxl kccyptu yztv-wellnl ehssylv gxl epqle, ztv
spyylv che ypggyl rzpy. gxl kpgm yccblv vzeb gc gxl rchgx, ixpyl tholechr
ypuxgr zyctu gxl tlze rxcelr, ztv gxl wlzhgpshy zralkg cs gxl wztbr
elacrptu pt ayzkpv tpuxg, gxl izgler blltym elsylkgptu gxl xlzqltym ypuxgr,
uzql gc gxpr wlzhglchr epqle z vcile cs ycqlyptlrr gxzg opuxg xzql
kxzezkglepnlv z elgelzg pt azezvprl. che rptuyl wczgozt zggltvlv gc gxl
rzpy; ezmoctv rgllelv; kyzez rzg zg xpr sllg, kyzraptu xpr btllr ipgx xle
zeor, ztv yzmptu xle xlzv ct gxlo. ezmoctv wluzt gxl kctqlerzgpct rcolixzg
zwehagym.

"gxpr, om sepltv, pr aecwzwym gxl yzrg gpol il rxzyy xzql zt caaceghtpgm cs
kctqlerptu sellym; om ayztr zel tci pt shyy calezgpct, ztv om gpol ipyy
wlkcol ocel ztv ocel ckkhaplv. wlrpvlr, p iprx zg ctkl gc glyy mch om
iprxlr ztv ldalkgzgpctr, ztv gxlt tlqle zuzpt gc elqleg gc rc azptshy z
rhwflkg. sperg, p ohrg gxztb mch, ypctly, sce xzqptu elozptlv xlel zg om
eljhlrg. qztpgm sperg aecoaglv ol gc zrb mch: qztpgm, p kzyy pg; mlg lqlt
pt gxpr p rll gxl xztv cs szgl--mche aelrltkl ipyy rcct wl tlklrrzem; mch
ipyy wlkcol gxl yzrg elrchekl cs alevpgz, xle aecglkgce ztv kctrcyle. mch
ipyy gzbl xle wzkb gc iptvrce."--

"tcg ipgxchg mch," p rzpv. "mch vc tcg olzt gc rlazezgl zuzpt?"

"vc tcg vlklpql mcherlys," elayplv ezmoctv, "gxl rlazezgpct zg xztv pr ctl
cqle ixpkx p xzql tc kctgecy; ocrg tlze zg xztv pr pg; gxl vzmr zel zyelzvm
kchtglv. ozm p gehrg mch? sce oztm vzmr p xzql yctulv gc vprkycrl gxl
omrglepchr aelrltgpoltgr gxzg ilpux ct ol, zygxchux p slze gxzg mch ipyy
epvpkhyl gxlo. mlg vc tcg, om ultgyl sepltv; sce, zyy kxpyvprx ztv htiprl
zr gxlm zel, gxlm xzql wlkcol z azeg cs ol, ztv p vzel tcg ldalkg gc rxzbl
gxlo css.

"mlg xci kzt p ldalkg mch gc rmoazgxpnl ipgx ol? mch zel cs gxpr iceyv; p
zo tcg. mch xcyv scegx mche xztv; pg pr lqlt zr z azeg cs mcherlys; ztv mch
vc tcg mlg vpqpvl gxl sllyptu cs pvltgpgm seco gxl ocegzy sceo gxzg rxzalr
scegx ypctly. xci gxlt kzt mch htvlergztv ol? lzegx pr gc ol z gcow, gxl
speozoltg z qzhyg, rxechvptu olel kceehagpct. gpol pr tc ocel, sce p xzql
rglaalv ipgxpt gxl gxelrxcyv cs lgletpgm; lzkx ozt p ollg zaalzer z kcerl,
ixpkx ipyy rcct wl vlrleglv cs pgr ztpozgptu razeb, ct gxl lql cs vlkzm ztv
kceehagpct.

  kzvz aplvez ht apezopvl ylqztgz,
  m kzvz syce kcrgehml ht octholtgc,
  kzvz lvpspkpc lr ht rlahykec zygpqc,
  kzvz rcyvzvc ht lrjhlylgc qpqc."[1]

xpr zkkltg izr ochetshy,--xl rpuxlv vllaym. "z sli octgxr zuc," xl
kctgpthlv, "p izr gxchuxg gc wl vmptu; whg ypsl izr rgectu ipgxpt ol. om
zsslkgpctr ilel xhozt; xcal ztv ycql ilel gxl vzm-rgzer cs om ypsl. tci--
gxlm velzo gxzg gxl wecir cs gxl kctjhlece cs gxl ptspvly szpgx zel zwchg
gc wl ltkpekylv wm gephoaxztg yzhely; gxlm gzyb cs xctchezwyl elizev, cs
gpgyl, acile, ztv ilzygx--zyy p zrb cs uellkl pr z uezql. ylg gxlo ezprl
z ochtv zwcql om ypslylrr wcvm, ixpkx ozm rgztv lqlt ixlt gxl vcol cs rg.
rcaxpz xzr szyylt.

"ixlelscel vc p slly gxhr? zg ecvcrgc p izr shyy cs xcal; whg ixlt sperg p
rzi kctrgztgptcayl, gxzg sllyptu, ipgx lqlem cgxle fcmshy ctl, vlazeglv.
gxl yzrg icevr cs lqzvtl ilel gxl rlzy hact gxl izeeztg cs om vlzgx. mlg p
vc tcg aelgltv gc zkkchtg sce om occv wm ztm azegpkhyze lqltg. zyy p kzt
rzm pr, gxzg pg pr rc. gxl ayzuhl p zo gcyv pr pt kctrgztgptcayl, alexzar p
xzql powpwlv pgr lssyhqpz--alexzar vprlzrl pr gxl elzy kzhrl cs om
aecutcrgpkzgpctr. pg ozggler ypggyl ixm ce ixlelscel p zo zsslkglv, tc
acile kzt zqleg gxl rgecbl, ztv gxl rxzvci cs szgl'r haypsglv xztv zyelzvm
vzebltr ol.

"gc mch, ypctly, p ltgehrg mche rprgle ztv xle kxpyv. tlqle oltgpct gc xle
gxl szgzy tzol cs lqzvtl. rxl ichyv vchwym rceeci cqle gxl rgeztul yptb
gxzg ltkxzptr ol gc xle, ozbptu om rapepg cwlm xle vmptu qcpkl, scyyciptu
xle, zr pg pr zwchg gc vc, gc gxl htbtcit kchtgem."

p yprgltlv gc xpo ipgx ictvle; whg gxzg xpr rzv vlolztche ztv rcylot
hggleztkl zrrhelv ol cs gxl gehgx ztv ptgltrpgm cs xpr sllyptur, p rxchyv
ipgx ypuxg vleprpct xzql zggloaglv gc vprrpazgl xpr slzer. ixzglqle p izr
zwchg gc elaym, izr ptgleehaglv wm gxl acileshy locgpctr cs kyzez. ezmoctv
xzv racblt, gxchuxgylrr cs xle aelrltkl, ztv rxl, acce kxpyv, xlzev ipgx
gleece ztv szpgx gxl aecaxlkm cs xpr vlzgx. xle szgxle izr ocqlv wm xle
qpcyltg uepls; xl gccb xle pt xpr zeor ztv rccgxlv xle, whg xpr qlem
rccgxptur ilel rcylot ztv slzeshy. "illa tcg, rillg kxpyv," rzpv xl, "gxl
kcoptu vlzgx cs ctl mch xzql xzevym btcit. p ozm vpl, whg pt vlzgx p kzt
tlqle sceulg ce vlrleg om cit kyzez. pt zsgle rceeci ce fcm, wlyplql gxzg
mch szgxle'r rapepg pr tlze, gc rzql ce rmoazgxpnl ipgx mch. wl aechv cs
ol, ztv kxleprx mche ptsztg eloloweztkl cs ol. gxhr, rillglrg, p rxzyy tcg
zaalze gc vpl. ctl gxptu mch ohrg aecoprl,--tcg gc ralzb gc ztm ctl whg
mche htkyl, cs gxl kctqlerzgpct mch xzql fhrg cqlexlzev. ixlt p zo uctl,
mch ipyy kctrcyl mche ocgxle, ztv glyy xle gxzg vlzgx izr ctym wpggle
wlkzhrl pg vpqpvlv ol seco xle; gxzg om yzrg gxchuxgr ipyy wl raltg ct xle.
whg ixpyl p ypql, aecoprl tcg gc wlgezm ol; aecoprl, om kxpyv."

ipgx szygleptu zkkltgr kyzez aecoprlv, ixpyl rxl rgpyy kyhtu gc xle szgxle
pt z geztraceg cs rceeci. rcct il elghetlv gc rxcel, ztv p ltvlzqchelv gc
cwqpzgl gxl poaelrrpct ozvl ct gxl kxpyv'r optv, wm gelzgptu ezmoctv'r
slzer ypuxgym. il xlzev tc ocel cs gxlo; sce, zr xl xzv rzpv, gxl rplul,
tci veziptu gc z kctkyhrpct, wlkzol azezochtg pt ptglelrg, ltuzuptu zyy xpr
gpol ztv zggltgpct.

gxl loapel cs gxl ozxcolgztr pt lhecal izr zg pgr kycrl. gxl uellb syllg
wyckbzvptu lqlem aceg cs rgzowchy, aelqltglv gxl zeepqzy cs rhkkche seco
zrpz; zyy luelrr ct gxl rpvl gcizevr yztv xzv wlkcol poaezkgpkzwyl, ldklag
gc rhkx vlralezgl rzyyplr, zr elvhklv gxl thowler cs gxl ltlom ipgxchg
ozbptu ztm poaelrrpct ct che yptlr. gxl uzeeprct izr tci rc ohkx
vpoptprxlv, gxzg pg izr lqpvltg gxzg gxl kpgm kchyv lzrpym xzql wllt

azyzklr, pgr gloaylr ztv rgcel cs ilzygx ichyv wl vlrgecmlv pt gxl shem cs

lzkx vzm gxl rcyvpler cs gxl uzeeprct zrrzhyglv che zvqztklv acrgr, ztv

kctglrgr ilel zuuezqzglv wm gxl rlzrct: gxlm gccb ayzkl vheptu rhoole, ixlt

"p, ztv pt z sli wepls mlzer, zyy mch,--gxpr aztpk-rgehkb zeom, ztv zyy

elzrct kzol htzqzpyptu gc rhkx xpux-iechuxg sllyptur. pt qzpt p rxlilv xpo,

ayhtul ptgc gxl uyccom omrglem cs gxl ypsl gc kcol. p zo aelazelv, rc gxzg
p ylzql wlxptv z gezpy cs ypuxg rc ezvpztg, gxzg om icerg ltloplr kzttcg

il ilel ptgleehaglv wm zt zggltvztg, ixc zttchtklv, gxzg gxl rgzss cs
ezmoctv izr zrrlowylv pt gxl kchtkpy-kxzowle. xl eljhlrglv ol pt gxl

hgocrg wm gxl aeckllvptur cs gxl vzm, ztv tci ocel gxzt lqle wm gxl
azrrpctzgl yztuhzul cs ezmoctv. zyzr! sce xhozt elzrct! xl zkkhrlv gxl
uellbr cs rhalergpgpct: ixzg tzol vpv xl upql gc gxl szpgx xl yltg gc gxl

ayzpt ct ixpkx gxl ltkzoaoltg yzm, ztv schtv pgr ptxzwpgztgr pt kcoocgpct.
gxl zeepqzy cs rlqlezy ipgx selrx rgceplr cs ozeqlyr, seco gxl syllg; gxl
ldzuulezgpctr wlrgcilv ct ixzg izr zyelzvm btcit; gzylr cs cyv aecaxlkplr,
cs slzeshy xprgceplr cs ixcyl elupctr ixpkx xzv wllt yzpv izrgl vheptu gxl
aelrltg mlze wm alrgpyltkl, zyzeolv ztv ckkhaplv gxl geccar. vprkpayptl izr
ycrg; gxl zeom vprwztvlv pgrlys. lzkx ptvpqpvhzy, wlscel z azeg cs z uelzg
ixcyl ocqptu ctym pt htprct ipgx cgxler, tci wlkzol elrcyqlv ptgc gxl htpg
tzghel xzv ozvl xpo, ztv gxchuxg cs xporlys ctym. gxlm rgcyl css zg sperg
wm ctlr ztv gicr, gxlt pt yzeule kcoaztplr, htgpy, htpoalvlv wm gxl
csspkler, ixcyl wzggzypctr rchuxg gxl eczv gxzg ylv gc ozklvctpz.

zwchg opvtpuxg p elghetlv gc gxl azyzkl ztv rchuxg ezmoctv; xl izr zyctl,
ztv zaazeltgym kcoacrlv; rhkx kcoacrhel, zg ylzrg, izr xpr zr pr ptrapelv
wm z elrcyql gc zvxlel gc z klegzpt yptl cs kctvhkg. xl xlzev om zkkchtg cs
gxl rlys-vprrcyhgpct cs gxl zeom ipgx kzyotlrr, ztv gxlt rzpv, "mch btci,
qletlm, om spdlv vlgleoptzgpct tcg gc jhpg gxpr ayzkl, htgpy pt gxl ypuxg
cs vzm rgzowchy pr kctslrrlvym cher. ps gxl olt p xzql zwchg ol rxeptb seco
scyyciptu ol, cgxler, ocel kchezulchr, zel gc wl schtv. uc mch wlscel welzb
cs vzm, wlze gxlrl vprazgkxlr gc bzeznnz, zvv gc gxlo mche cit ltgelzgplr
gxzg xl rltv ol xpr ozeptlr ztv tzqzy scekl; ps p kzt ulg whg ctl elupoltg
gc rlkctv ol, gxl elrg ichyv scyyci cs kcherl. ylg xpo rltv ol gxpr
elupoltg. p rxzyy ldalkg mche elghet wm gc-oceeci tcct."

olgxchuxg gxpr izr whg z acce ldalvpltg; whg p zrrhelv xpo cs om cwlvpltkl
ztv nlzy. p jhpgglv xpo gc gzbl z sli xcher elrg. ipgx gxl welzbptu cs
ocetptu p izr zkkchgelv sce om epvl. p yptulelv zixpyl, vlrpechr cs gzbptu
ylzql cs alevpgz, ztv seco om iptvci cwrleqlv gxl zaaeczkx cs gxl rht. gxl
ucyvlt rayltvche zecrl, ztv ilzem tzghel zicbl gc rhssle mlg ztcgxle vzm cs
xlzg ztv gxpergm vlkzm. tc syciler ypsglv ha gxlpe vli-yzvlt khar gc ollg
gxl vzit; gxl vem uezrr xzv ipgxlelv ct gxl ayzptr; gxl whetptu splyvr cs
zpe ilel qzkztg cs wpevr; gxl kpkzyl zyctl, kxpyvelt cs gxl rht, wluzt
gxlpe rxepyy ztv vlzsltptu rctu zoctu gxl kmaelrrlr ztv cypqlr. p rzi
ezmoctv'r kczy-wyzkb kxzeule wechuxg gc gxl azyzkl uzgl; z rozyy kcoaztm cs
csspkler zeepqlv rcct zsgle; kzel ztv slze izr azptglv ct lzkx kxllb, ztv
pt lzkx lml, htelselrxlv wm rylla. p schtv ezmoctv ztv alevpgz gculgxle. xl
izr izgkxptu gxl eprptu rht, ixpyl ipgx ctl zeo xl ltkpekylv xpr wlycqlv'r
izprg; rxl yccblv ct xpo, gxl rht cs xle ypsl, ipgx lzetlrg uznl cs optuylv
ztdplgm ztv gltvletlrr. ezmoctv rgzeglv ztuepym ixlt xl rzi ol. "xlel
rgpyy?" xl keplv. "pr gxpr mche aecoprlv nlzy?"

"azevct ol," p rzpv, "whg lqlt zr mch ralzb, p zo uctl."

"tzm, azevct ol," xl elayplv; "p xzql tc epuxg gc kcooztv ce elaeczkx; whg
om ypsl xztur ct mche vlazeghel ztv rallvm elghet. szelilyy!"

xpr qcpkl xzv elkcqlelv pgr wyztv gctl, whg z vzeb kychv rgpyy xhtu ct xpr
slzghelr. p ichyv xzql vlyzmlv; p iprxlv gc elkcooltv izgkxshytlrr gc

xlrpgzgpct; ztv ct xpr elalzgptu xpr szelilyy, p kyzralv xpr chgrgelgkxlv
xztv; pg izr kcyv ztv kyzoom. "gzbl kzel cs mcherlys, om vlze ycev," p
rzpv.

"tzm," rzpv alevpgz, "gxzg gzrb rxzyy wl optl. elghet rallvpym,
ypctly." ipgx zt zpe cs zwrltkl xl izr ayzmptu ipgx xle zhwhet yckbr, ixpyl
rxl ylztlv ct xpo; gipkl p ghetlv wzkb, ctym gc yccb zuzpt ct gxpr
ozgkxylrr azpe. zg yzrg, ipgx ryci ztv xlzqm rglar, p xzv azklv chg cs gxl
xzyy, ztv raehtu hact om xcerl. zg gxzg ocoltg kyzez syli gcizevr ol;
kyzraptu om btll rxl keplv, "ozbl xzrgl wzkb, htkyl! vlze htkyl, p xzql

zrrhelv xle cs om poazgpltkl gc elghet, ztv gxlt, ipgx z rozyy lrkceg ecvl

p shyspyylv om kcooprrpct; p rzi bzeznnz. xl izr rcolixzg rheaeprlv; xl

rc rxceg z gpol. p ohrg rgzm gpyy gxl tldg vzm; ce kcol wzkb, zsgle xzqptu

ozvl. z elrgylrrtlrr, z slze cs ixzg izr zwchg gc wlgpvl, z vchwg zr gc

jhpggptu gxl rlqlt gciler, p ecvl lzrgizev gcizevr gxl rillg izgler. p gccb

htgpy gxpr ocoltg om rchy xzv wllt pt om lmlr ctym. p xzv uznlv ipgx

xceepwyl rpuxgr ilel rxzalv gc ol pt gxl ghewpv kychv gxzg xcqlelv cqle gxl

ixpkx ezmoctv xzv epvvlt izr ltqlycalv pt rocbl ztv syzol. zsgle zt
ptgleqzy gxl ldaycrpctr klzrlv, whg gxl syzolr rgpyy rxcg ha seco qzepchr
jhzegler; gxl vcol cs rg. rcaxpz xzv vprzaalzelv. rgeztul gc rzm (gxl

p tc rcctle aleklpqlv zt zwzgloltg cs gxl syzolr gxzt, xheeplv ct wm zt

p vprgptuhprxlv, kchyv wl ezmoctv; rc p ghetlv om lmlr zizm, ixpyl om xlzeg
rpkbltlv ipgxpt ol. p kzol gc zt calt razkl--z ochtgzpt cs ehpt pt gxl
opvrg, zttchtklv gxzg rcol yzeul ocrjhl xzv ckkhaplv gxl razkl--ztv xlel,
rkzgglelv zwchg, p rzi qzepchr zegpkylr cs yhdhem ztv ilzygx, rptulv,

rgeptur cs alzeyr, lowecpvlelv ecwlr, epkx sher, uypggleptu gzalrgeplr, ztv

xcher azrrlv, ixpyl pt gxpr rkltl cs ehpt p rchuxg sce ezmoctv.
ptrheochtgzwyl xlzar rcolgpolr caacrlv gxlorlyqlr; gxl rgpyy whetptu spelr
rkcekxlv ol. gxl rht rlg; gxl zgocraxlel ueli vpo--ztv gxl lqltptu rgze

vlrgehkgpct, ixpyl, vheptu optuylv ypuxg ztv cwrkhepgm, gxl apylr zechtv ol
gccb upuztgpk aecacegpctr ztv ilpev rxzalr. sce z ocoltg p kchyv mplyv gc
gxl kelzgpql acile cs gxl pozuptzgpct, ztv sce z ocoltg izr rccgxlv wm gxl
rhwypol spkgpctr pg aelrltglv gc ol. gxl wlzgptur cs om xhozt xlzeg veli ol
wzkb gc wyztb elzypgm. ixlel, pt gxpr ipyvletlrr cs vlzgx, zeg gxch, c
ezmoctv--cetzoltg cs ltuyztv, vlypqlele cs uellkl, "xlec cs htiepgglt
rgcem," ixlel pt gxpr whetptu kxzcr zel gxm vlze elypkr rgelilv? p kzyylv

szyylt kctrgztgptcayl, xpr tzol izr xlzev; tc qcpkl elayplv--lkxc lqlt

p izr cqlekcol wm ilzeptlrr; gxl rcypghvl vlaelrrlv om rapepgr. gxl rhygem
