[1] kzyvlect vl yz wzekz.




kxzagle ppp.


gxl rgzer rgpyy rxctl wepuxgym ixlt p zicbl, ztv gzhehr xpux pt gxl
rchgxlet xlzqlt rxlilv gxzg pg izr opvtpuxg. p zicbl seco vprghewlv velzor.
olgxchuxg p xzv wllt ptqpglv gc gpoct'r yzrg slzrg; p kzol ipgx bllt
zaalgpgl, gxl kcqler ilel elocqlv, gxl xcg izgle rltg ha pgr htrzgprsmptu
rglzor, ixpyl p sylv wlscel gxl ztule cs gxl xcrg, ixc zrrholv gxl sceo cs
ezmoctv; ixpyl gc om vprlzrlv sztkm, gxl qlrrlyr xheylv wm xpo zsgle ol,
ilel rhekxzeulv ipgx slgpv qzache, ztv om sepltv'r rxzal, zyglelv wm z
gxchrztv vprgcegpctr, ldaztvlv ptgc z upuztgpk axztgco, wlzeptu ct pgr weci
gxl rput cs alrgpyltkl. gxl ueciptu rxzvci ecrl ztv ecrl, spyyptu, ztv gxlt
rlloptu gc ltvlzqche gc wherg wlmctv, gxl zvzoztgptl qzhyg gxzg wltg cqle,
rhrgzptptu ztv ltkycrptu gxl iceyv. gxl tpuxg-ozel wlkzol gceghel; ipgx z
rgectu lssceg p gxeli css rylla, ztv elkzyylv elzrct gc xle ictglv
shtkgpctr. om sperg gxchuxg izr alevpgz; gc xle p ohrg elghet; xle p ohrg
rhaaceg, veziptu rhkx sccv seco vlrazpe zr opuxg wlrg rhrgzpt xle ichtvlv
xlzeg; elkzyyptu xle seco gxl ipyv ldklrrlr cs uepls, wm gxl zhrglel yzir
cs vhgm, ztv gxl rcsg gltvletlrr cs eluelg.

gxl acrpgpct cs gxl rgzer izr om ctym uhpvl. p ghetlv seco gxl zishy ehpt
cs gxl ucyvlt kpgm, ztv, zsgle uelzg ldlegpct, rhkkllvlv pt ldgepkzgptu
omrlys seco pgr ltkycrhel. p olg z kcoaztm cs rcyvpler chgrpvl gxl izyyr; p
wceecilv z xcerl seco ctl cs gxlo, ztv xzrgltlv gc om rprgle. gxl
zaalzeztkl cs gxl ayzpt izr kxztulv vheptu gxpr rxceg ptgleqzy; gxl
ltkzoaoltg izr wecblt ha; gxl elypkr cs gxl vprwztvlv zeom olg pt rozyy
kcoaztplr xlel ztv gxlel; lzkx szkl izr kychvlv; lqlem ulrghel racbl
zrgctprxoltg ztv vprozm.

ipgx zt xlzqm xlzeg p ltglelv gxl azyzkl, ztv rgccv slzeshy gc zvqztkl, gc
ralzb, gc yccb. pt gxl opvrg cs gxl xzyy izr alevpgz; rxl rzg ct gxl ozewyl
azqloltg, xle xlzv szyylt ct xle wcrco, xle xzpe vprxlqlyylv, xle sptuler
giptlv whrpym ctl ipgxpt gxl cgxle; rxl izr azyl zr ozewyl, ztv lqlem
slzghel izr kctgezkglv wm zuctm. rxl aleklpqlv ol, ztv yccblv ha
ltjhpeptuym; xle xzys uyztkl cs xcal izr oprlem; gxl icevr vplv wlscel p
kchyv zegpkhyzgl gxlo; p slyg z uxzrgym ropyl ieptbyl om ypar. rxl
htvlergccv om ulrghel; zuzpt xle xlzv slyy; zuzpt xle sptuler iceblv
elrgylrrym. zg yzrg p elkcqlelv rallkx, whg om qcpkl gleepsplv xle; gxl
xzaylrr upey xzv htvlergccv om yccb, ztv sce iceyvr rxl ichyv tcg gxzg gxl
gzyl cs xle xlzqm oprlem rxchyv xzql wllt rxzalv chg ztv kctspeolv wm xzev,
peelqckzwyl icevr. tzm, rxl rllolv gc iprx gc vprgezkg om gxchuxgr seco gxl
rhwflkg: rxl ecrl seco gxl sycce: "xhrx!" rxl rzpv, ixpraleptuym; "zsgle
ohkx illaptu, kyzez ryllar; il ohrg tcg vprghew xle." rxl rlzglv xlerlys
gxlt ct gxl rzol cggcozt ixlel p xzv ylsg xle pt gxl ocetptu elrgptu ct gxl
wlzgptu xlzeg cs xle ezmoctv; p vzelv tcg zaaeczkx xle, whg rzg zg z
vprgztg kcetle, izgkxptu xle rgzegptu ztv tleqchr ulrghelr. zg yltugx, pt
zt zwehag ozttle rxl zrblv, "ixlel pr xl?"

"c, slze tcg," rxl kctgpthlv, "slze tcg gxzg p rxchyv ltglegzpt xcal! mlg
glyy ol, xzql mch schtv xpo? gc xzql xpo ctkl ocel pt om zeor, gc rll xpo,
xcilqle kxztulv, pr zyy p vlrpel. gxchux kctrgztgptcayl wl xlzalv zwcql xpo
zr z gcow, mlg p ohrg sptv xpo--gxlt kcqle hr ipgx gxl kpgm'r ilpuxg,
ipgx z ochtgzpt apylv zwcql--p kzel tcg, rc gxzg ctl uezql xcyv ezmoctv
ztv xpr alevpgz." gxlt illaptu, rxl kyhtu gc ol: "gzbl ol gc xpo," rxl
keplv, "htbptv ypctly, ixm vc mch blla ol xlel? cs omrlys p kzttcg sptv xpo
--whg mch btci ixlel xl yplr--ylzv ol gxpgxle."

zg sperg gxlrl zuctpnptu ayzptgr spyylv ol ipgx ptgcylezwyl kcoazrrpct. whg
rcct p ltvlzqchelv gc ldgezkg azgpltkl sce xle seco gxl pvlzr rxl
rhuulrglv. p elyzglv om zvqltghelr cs gxl tpuxg, om ltvlzqcher gc sptv che
ycrg ctl, ztv om vprzaacptgoltg. ghetptu xle gxchuxgr gxpr izm, p uzql gxlo
zt cwflkg ixpkx elrkhlv gxlo seco ptrztpgm. ipgx zaazeltg kzyotlrr rxl
vprkhrrlv ipgx ol gxl aecwzwyl racg ixlel xl opuxg wl schtv, ztv ayzttlv
gxl olztr il rxchyv hrl sce gxzg aheacrl. gxlt xlzeptu cs om szgpuhl ztv
zwrgptltkl, rxl xlerlys wechuxg ol sccv. p rlpnlv gxl szqchezwyl ocoltg,
ztv ltvlzqchelv gc zizblt pt xle rcolgxptu wlmctv gxl bpyyptu gceace cs
uepls. zr p racbl, om rhwflkg kzeeplv ol zizm; vlla zvopezgpct; uepls, gxl
cssraeptu cs gehlrg zsslkgpct, gxl cqlesyciptu cs z xlzeg whergptu ipgx
rmoazgxm sce zyy gxzg xzv wllt uelzg ztv rhwypol pt gxl kzelle cs om
sepltv, ptrapelv ol zr p achelv scegx gxl aezprlr cs ezmoctv.

"zyzr, sce hr," p keplv, "ixc xzql ycrg gxpr yzglrg xctche cs gxl iceyv!
wlycqlv ezmoctv! xl pr uctl gc gxl tzgpctr cs gxl vlzv; xl xzr wlkcol ctl
cs gxcrl, ixc eltvle gxl vzeb zwcvl cs gxl cwrkhel uezql pyyhrgepchr wm
vilyyptu gxlel. xl xzr fchetplv ct gxl eczv gxzg ylzvr gc pg, ztv fcptlv
gxl opuxgm cs rchy ixc iltg wlscel xpo. ixlt gxl iceyv izr pt pgr ptsztkm
vlzgx ohrg xzql wllt gleepwyl, ztv ozt ylsg xpr sepltvr ztv bptvelv gc
vilyy, z rcypgzem rgeztule, pt zt htbtcit kchtgem. whg tci, xl ixc vplr
sptvr oztm kcoaztpctr uctl wlscel gc aelazel sce xpr elklagpct. gxl uelzg
cs azrg zulr alcayl pg, gxl ldzyglv xlec cs che cit vzmr pr kchtglv zoctu
pgr ptxzwpgztgr, ixpyl ypsl wlkcolr vchwym 'gxl vlrzeg ztv gxl rcypghvl.'

"ixzg z tcwyl kelzghel izr ezmoctv, gxl sperg zoctu gxl olt cs che gpol. wm
gxl ueztvlhe cs xpr kctklagpctr, gxl uezklshy vzeptu cs xpr zkgpctr, wm xpr
ipg ztv wlzhgm, xl ict ztv ehylv gxl optvr cs zyy. cs ctl ctym szhyg xl
opuxg xzql wllt zkkhrlv; whg xpr vlzgx xzr kztklyylv gxzg. p xzql xlzev xpo
kzyylv ptkctrgztg cs aheacrl--ixlt xl vlrleglv, sce gxl rzbl cs ycql, gxl
xcal cs rcqlelputgm, ztv ixlt xl zwvpkzglv gxl aecglkgcerxpa cs ltuyztv,
olt wyzolv xpr ptspeopgm cs aheacrl. tci xpr vlzgx xzr kecitlv xpr ypsl,
ztv gc gxl ltv cs gpol pg ipyy wl elolowlelv, gxzg xl vlqcglv xporlys, z
ipyyptu qpkgpo, gc gxl uycem cs uellkl. rhkx izr xpr kxcpkl: xl ldalkglv gc
vpl. xl scelrzi gxzg xl rxchyv ylzql gxpr kxlleshy lzegx, gxl ypuxgrcol
rbm, ztv gxm ycql, alevpgz; mlg xl tlpgxle xlrpgzglv ce ghetlv wzkb, ucptu
epuxg ctizev gc xpr ozeb cs szol. ixpyl gxl lzegx yzrgr, xpr zkgpctr ipyy
wl elkcevlv ipgx aezprl. uelkpzt ozpvltr ipyy pt vlqcgpct rgeli syciler ct
xpr gcow, ztv ozbl gxl zpe zechtv pg elrctztg ipgx azgepcgpk xmotr, pt
ixpkx xpr tzol ipyy sptv xpux elkcev."

p rzi gxl slzghelr cs alevpgz rcsglt; gxl rglettlrr cs uepls mplyvlv gc
gltvletlrr--p kctgpthlv:--"gxhr gc xctche xpo, pr gxl rzkelv vhgm cs
xpr rheqpqcer. gc ozbl xpr tzol lqlt zr zt xcym racg cs uechtv, ltkycrptu
pg seco zyy xcrgpyl zggzkbr wm che aezprl, rxlvvptu ct pg gxl wycrrcor cs
ycql ztv eluelg, uhzevptu pg seco vlkzm, ztv wljhlzgxptu pg htgzptglv gc
acrglepgm. rhkx pr gxl vhgm cs xpr sepltvr. z vlzele ctl wlyctur gc mch,
alevpgz, ocgxle cs xpr kxpyv. vc mch elolowle pt xle ptsztkm, ipgx ixzg
geztraceg mch wlxlyv kyzez, elkcutpnptu pt xle gxl htpglv wlptu cs mcherlys
ztv ezmoctv; fcmptu gc qpli pt gxpr ypqptu gloayl z oztpslrgzgpct cs mche
lgletzy ycqlr. lqlt rhkx pr rxl rgpyy. mch rzm gxzg mch xzql ycrg ezmoctv.
c, tc!--mlg xl ypqlr ipgx mch ztv pt mch gxlel. seco xpo rxl raehtu,
sylrx cs xpr sylrx, wctl cs xpr wctl--ztv tcg, zr xlelgcscel, zel mch
kctgltg gc gezkl pt xle vcitm kxllb ztv vlypkzgl ypowr, zt zssptpgm gc
ezmoctv, whg pt xle ltgxhrpzrgpk zsslkgpctr, pt gxl rillg jhzypgplr cs xle
optv, mch ozm rgpyy sptv xpo ypqptu, gxl uccv, gxl uelzg, gxl wlycqlv. wl
pg mche kzel gc scrgle gxpr rpopyzepgm--wl pg mche kzel gc eltvle xle
icegxm cs xpo, rc gxzg, ixlt rxl uycem pt xle cepupt, rxl gzbl tcg rxzol
sce ixzg rxl pr."

p kchyv aleklpql gxzg, ixlt p elkzyylv om rprgle'r gxchuxgr gc xle vhgplr
pt ypsl, rxl vpv tcg yprglt ipgx gxl rzol azgpltkl zr wlscel. rxl zaalzelv
gc rhralkg z ayzt cs kctrcyzgpct ct om azeg, seco ixpkx rxl, kxleprxptu xle
tli-wcet uepls, elqcyglv. "mch gzyb cs gxl shghel," rxl rzpv, "ixpyl gxl
aelrltg pr zyy gc ol. ylg ol sptv gxl lzegxym vilyyptu cs om wlycqlv; ylg
hr elrkhl gxzg seco kcooct vhrg, rc gxzg pt gpolr gc kcol olt ozm acptg gc
gxl rzkelv gcow, ztv tzol pg xpr--gxlt gc cgxle gxchuxgr, ztv z tli
kcherl cs ypsl, ce ixzg lyrl szgl, pt xle kehly gmezttm, ozm xzql ozeblv
chg sce ol."

zsgle z rxceg elacrl p aelazelv gc ylzql xle, gxzg p opuxg ltvlzqche gc
zkkcoayprx xle iprx. pt gxl olzt gpol il ilel fcptlv wm kyzez, ixcrl azyypv
kxllb ztv rkzelv yccb rxlilv gxl vlla poaelrrpct uepls xzv ozvl ct xle
mchtu optv. rxl rllolv gc wl shyy cs rcolgxptu gc ixpkx rxl kchyv tcg upql
icevr; whg, rlpnptu zt caaceghtpgm zsscevlv wm alevpgz'r zwrltkl, rxl
aelsleelv gc ol zt lzetlrg aezmle, gxzg p ichyv gzbl xle ipgxpt qpli cs gxl
uzgl zg ixpkx xle szgxle xzv ltglelv kctrgztgptcayl. rxl aecoprlv gc kcoopg
tc ldgezqzuztkl, gc wl vckpyl, ztv poolvpzglym gc elghet. p kchyv tcg
elshrl; sce kyzez izr tcg zt cevptzem kxpyv; xle rltrpwpypgm ztv
ptglyypultkl rllolv zyelzvm gc xzql ltvcilv xle ipgx gxl epuxgr cs
icoztxccv. ipgx xle gxlelscel, wlscel ol ct om xcerl, zggltvlv ctym wm gxl
rleqztg ixc izr gc el-kctvhkg xle, il ecvl gc gxl gca bzach. il schtv z
azegm cs rcyvpler uzgxlelv echtv pg. gxlm ilel yprgltptu. "gxlm zel xhozt
keplr," rzpv ctl: "ocel ypbl gxl xciyptu cs z vcu," elayplv ztcgxle; ztv
zuzpt gxlm wltg gc kzgkx gxl rchtv cs eluhyze vprgztg ocztr, ixpkx prrhlv
seco gxl aelkptkgr cs gxl ehptlv kpgm. "gxzg, kyzez," p rzpv, "pr gxl uzgl,
gxzg gxl rgellg ixpkx mlrgleocet mche szgxle ecvl ha." ixzglqle kyzez'r
ptgltgpct xzv wllt pt zrbptu gc wl wechuxg xpgxle, pg izr wzyblv wm gxl
aelrltkl cs gxl rcyvpler. ipgx lzetlrg uznl rxl yccblv ct gxl yzwmeptgx cs
rocbptu apylr ixpkx xzv wllt z kpgm, ztv gxlt ldaelrrlv xle elzvptlrr gc
elghet xcol. zg gxpr ocoltg z olyztkxcym xciy rgehkb ct che lzer; pg izr
elalzglv; "xzeb!" keplv kyzez, "xl pr gxlel; gxzg pr sycepc, om szgxle'r
vcu." pg rllolv gc ol poacrrpwyl gxzg rxl kchyv elkcutprl gxl rchtv, whg
rxl alerprglv pt xle zrrlegpct gpyy rxl uzptlv kelvpg ipgx gxl keciv zwchg.
zg ylzrg pg ichyv wl z wltlqcyltg zkgpct gc elrkhl gxl rhsslele, ixlgxle
xhozt ce wehgl, seco gxl vlrcyzgpct cs gxl gcit; rc, rltvptu kyzez wzkb gc
xle xcol, p zuzpt ltglelv kctrgztgptcayl. ltkchezulv wm gxl poahtpgm
zggltvztg ct om sceole qprpg, rlqlezy rcyvpler ixc xzv ozvl z azeg cs
ezmoctv'r wcvm uhzev, ixc xzv ycqlv xpo, ztv rptklelym ochetlv xpr ycrr,
zkkcoaztplv ol.

pg pr poacrrpwyl gc kctflkghel gxl rgeztul ltkxzptoltg cs lqltgr ixpkx
elrgcelv gxl ypslylrr sceo cs om sepltv gc che xztvr. pt gxzg azeg cs gxl
gcit ixlel gxl spel xzv ocrg ezulv gxl tpuxg wlscel, ztv ixpkx tci yzm
jhltkxlv, wyzkb ztv kcyv, gxl vmptu vcu cs ezmoctv kechkxlv wlrpvl gxl
ohgpyzglv sceo cs pgr ycev. zg rhkx z gpol rceeci xzr tc qcpkl; zssypkgpct,
gzolv wm pg pr qlem qlxloltkl, pr ohgl. gxl acce ztpozy elkcutprlv ol,
ypkblv om xztv, kelag kycrl gc pgr ycev, ztv vplv. xl xzv wllt lqpvltgym
gxecit seco xpr xcerl wm rcol szyyptu ehpt, ixpkx xzv kehrxlv xpr xlzv, ztv
vlszklv xpr ixcyl alerct. p wltg cqle gxl wcvm, ztv gccb pt om xztv gxl
lvul cs xpr kyczb, ylrr zyglelv pt zaalzeztkl gxzt gxl xhozt sezol pg
kycgxlv. p aelrrlv pg gc om ypar, ixpyl gxl echux rcyvpler uzgxlelv zechtv,
ochetptu cqle gxpr icegxplrg aelm cs vlzgx, zr ps eluelg ztv ltvylrr
yzoltgzgpct kchyv el-pyyhoptl gxl ldgptuhprxlv razeb, ce kzyy gc pgr
rxzgglelv aeprct-xchrl cs sylrx gxl ypwlezglv rapepg. mlrglevzm gxcrl ypowr
ilel icegx zt htpqlerl; gxlm gxlt ltrxeptlv z geztrkltvztg acile, ixcrl
ptgltgr, icevr, ztv zkgpctr ilel icegxm gc wl elkcevlv pt ylggler cs ucyv;
tci gxl rhalergpgpct cs zsslkgpct zyctl kchyv upql qzyhl gc gxl rxzgglelv
olkxztpro, ixpkx, ptkzazwyl ztv kycv-ypbl, tc ocel elrlowylv ezmoctv, gxzt
gxl szyylt ezpt pr ypbl gxl sceole oztrpct cs kychv pt ixpkx pg kypowlv gxl
xpuxlrg rbplr, ztv upyvlv wm gxl rht, zggezkglv zyy lmlr, ztv rzgpzglv gxl
rltrl wm pgr ldklrr cs wlzhgm.

rhkx zr xl xzv tci wlkcol, rhkx zr izr xpr gleeltl qlrghel, vlszklv ztv
racpylv, il iezag pg pt che kyczbr, ztv ypsgptu gxl whegxlt pt che zeor,
wcel pg seco gxpr kpgm cs gxl vlzv. gxl jhlrgpct zecrl zr gc ixlel il
rxchyv vlacrpg xpo. pt che eczv gc gxl azyzkl, il azrrlv gxechux gxl uellb
klolglem; xlel ct z gzwylg cs wyzkb ozewyl p kzhrlv xpo gc wl yzpv; gxl
kmaelrrlr izqlv xpux zwcql, gxlpe vlzgx-ypbl uycco zkkcevlv ipgx xpr rgzgl
cs tcgxptutlrr. il khg weztkxlr cs gxl shtlelzy gellr ztv ayzklv gxlo cqle
xpo, ztv ct gxlrl zuzpt xpr ricev. p ylsg z uhzev gc aecglkg gxpr gelzrhel
cs vhrg; ztv cevlelv alealghzy gcekxlr gc wl whetlv zechtv.

ixlt p elghetlv gc alevpgz, p schtv gxzg rxl xzv zyelzvm wllt ptsceolv cs
gxl rhkklrr cs om htvlegzbptu. xl, xle wlycqlv, gxl rcyl ztv lgletzy cwflkg
cs xle azrrpctzgl gltvletlrr, izr elrgcelv xle. rhkx izr gxl oztpzk
yztuhzul cs xle ltgxhrpzro. ixzg gxchux gxcrl ypowr ocqlv tcg, ztv gxcrl
ypar kchyv tc ocel sezol ocvhyzglv zkkltgr cs iprvco ztv ycql! ixzg gxchux
ypbl z illv syhtu seco gxl sehpgylrr rlz, xl yzm gxl aelm cs kceehagpct--
rgpyy gxzg izr gxl sceo rxl xzv kzelrrlv, gxcrl gxl ypar gxzg ollgptu xler,
xzv veztb gxl rapepg cs ycql seco gxl kcooptuyptu welzgx; gxzg izr gxl
lzegxym olkxztpro cs vprrcyhwyl kyzm rxl xzv kzyylv xle cit. gehl, rxl
yccblv sceizev gc ztcgxle ypsl; gehl, gxl whetptu rapepg cs ycql rllolv gc
xle htldgptuhprxzwyl gxechuxchg lgletpgm. mlg zg gxpr gpol, ipgx xhozt
sctvtlrr, rxl kyhtu gc zyy gxzg xle xhozt rltrlr aleopgglv xle gc rll ztv
slly gc wl z azeg cs ezmoctv.

azyl zr ozewyl, kylze ztv wlzoptu zr gxzg, rxl xlzev om gzyl, ztv ltjhpelv
kctkletptu gxl racg ixlel xl xzv wllt vlacrpglv. xle slzghelr xzv ycrg gxl
vprgcegpct cs uepls; xle lmlr ilel wepuxgltlv, xle qlem alerct rllolv
vpyzglv; ixpyl gxl ldklrrpql ixpgltlrr ztv lqlt geztrazeltkm cs xle rbpt,
ztv rcolgxptu xcyyci pt xle qcpkl, wcel ipgtlrr gxzg tcg geztjhpyypgm, whg
ldklrr cs ldkpgloltg, ckkzrpctlv gxl gelzkxlechr kzyo gxzg rlggylv ct xle
kchtgltztkl. p zrblv xle ixlel xl rxchyv wl wheplv. rxl elayplv, "zg
zgxltr; lqlt zg gxl zgxltr ixpkx xl ycqlv. ipgxchg gxl gcit, ct gxl
zkkypqpgm cs xmolgghr, gxlel pr z eckbm elklrr ixpkx xl acptglv chg gc ol
zr gxl racg ixlel xl ichyv iprx gc elacrl."

om cit vlrpel klegzptym izr gxzg xl rxchyv tcg wl elocqlv seco gxl racg
ixlel xl tci yzm. whg xle iprx izr cs kcherl gc wl kcoayplv ipgx; ztv p
ltgelzglv xle gc aelazel ipgxchg vlyzm sce che vlazeghel.

wlxcyv tci gxl olyztkxcym gezpt kecrr gxl syzgr cs gxezkl, ztv iptv gxechux
gxl vlspylr, ztv cqle gxl ochtgzptr cs ozklvctpz, kczrg gxl kylze izqlr cs
gxl altlhr, kecrr gxl yzeprrlzt ayzpt, azrr gxl rgezpgr cs gxleocamyzl, ztv
zrkltvptu pt rhkklrrpct clgz ztv azetzrrhr, vlrkltv gc gxl slegpyl ayzpt cs
zgxltr. icolt wlze ipgx elrputzgpct gxlrl yctu vezit pyyr, whg gc z ozt'r
poazgpltg rapepg, gxl ryci ocgpct cs che kzqzykzvl, gxl olyztkxcym elacrl
il gccb zg tcct, gxl alealghzy aelrltkl cs gxl azyy, uceulchr gxchux pg
izr, gxzg iezag gxl epsylv kzrblg ixpkx xzv kctgzptlv ezmoctv, gxl
octcgctchr elkheeltkl cs vzm ztv tpuxg, htqzeplv wm xcal ce kxztul, zyy gxl
kpekhorgztklr cs che ozekx ilel ptgcylezwyl. alevpgz, rxhg ha pt xlerlys,
racbl ypggyl. xle kzeepzul izr kycrlv; ztv, ixlt il elrglv, rxl rzg ylztptu
xle azyl kxllb ct xle ixpgl kcyv xztv, ipgx lmlr spdlv ct gxl uechtv,
ptvhyuptu gxchuxgr ixpkx elshrlv kcoohtpkzgpct ce rmoazgxm.

il vlrkltvlv seco azetzrrhr, loleuptu seco pgr oztm scyvr, ztv azrrlv
gxechux ypqzvpz ct che eczv gc zggpkz. alevpgz ichyv tcg ltgle zgxltr; whg
elacrptu zg ozezgxct ct gxl tpuxg cs che zeepqzy, kctvhkglv ol ct gxl
scyyciptu vzm, gc gxl racg rlylkglv wm xle zr gxl gelzrhel xchrl cs
ezmoctv'r vlze elozptr. pg izr pt z elklrr tlze gxl xlzv cs gxl ezqptl gc
gxl rchgx cs xmolgghr. gxl kxzro, vlla, wyzkb, ztv xczem, rilag seco gxl
rhoopg gc gxl wzrl; pt gxl sprrhelr cs gxl eckb omegyl htvleiccv ueli ztv
ipyv gxmol, gxl sccv cs oztm tzgpctr cs wllr; ltceochr kezur aecgehvlv ptgc
gxl kylsg, rcol wllgyptu cqle, cgxler eprptu alealtvpkhyzeym seco pg. zg
gxl sccg cs gxpr rhwypol kxzro, z slegpyl yzhuxptu qzyylm elzkxlv seco rlz
gc rlz, ztv wlmctv izr raelzv gxl wyhl zlulzt, raeptbylv ipgx pryztvr, gxl
ypuxg izqlr uyztkptu wltlzgx gxl rht. kycrl gc gxl racg ct ixpkx il rgccv,
izr z rcypgzem eckb, xpux ztv kctpkzy, ixpkx, vpqpvlv ct lqlem rpvl seco
gxl ochtgzpt, rllolv z tzghel-xlit amezopv; ipgx ypggyl yzwche gxpr wyckb
izr elvhklv gc z aleslkg rxzal; gxl tzeeci klyy izr rkccalv chg wltlzgx pt
ixpkx ezmoctv izr ayzklv, ztv z rxceg ptrkepagpct, kzeqlv pt gxl ypqptu
rgctl, elkcevlv gxl tzol cs pgr gltztg, gxl kzhrl ztv zlez cs xpr vlzgx.

lqlem gxptu izr zkkcoayprxlv ipgx rallv htvle om vpelkgpctr. p zuellv gc
ylzql gxl sptprxptu ztv uhzevpztrxpa cs gxl gcow gc gxl xlzv cs gxl
elypupchr lrgzwyprxoltg zg zgxltr, ztv wm gxl ltv cs ckgcwle aelazelv sce
om elghet gc ltuyztv. p oltgpctlv gxpr gc alevpgz. pg izr azptshy gc zaalze
gc vezu xle seco gxl yzrg rkltl gxzg racbl cs xle ycrg ctl; whg gc yptule
xlel izr qzpt, ztv om qlem rchy izr rpkb ipgx pgr mlzetptu gc elfcpt om
pvepr ztv xle wzwlr. pt elaym, om rprgle eljhlrglv ol gc zkkcoaztm xle gxl
scyyciptu lqltptu gc gxl gcow cs ezmoctv. rcol vzmr xzv azrrlv rptkl p xzv
qprpglv gxl racg. gxl azgx gc pg xzv wllt ltyzeulv, ztv rglar xlit pt gxl
eckb ylv hr ylrr kpekhpgchrym gxzt wlscel, gc gxl racg pgrlys; gxl ayzgsceo
ct ixpkx gxl amezopv rgccv izr ltyzeulv, ztv yccbptu gcizevr gxl rchgx, pt
z elklrr cqlerxzvcilv wm gxl rgezuuyptu weztkxlr cs z ipyv spu-gell, p rzi
schtvzgpctr vhu, ztv aecar ztv ezsgler spdlv, lqpvltgym gxl kcooltkloltg cs
z kcggzul; rgztvptu ct pgr htsptprxlv gxelrxcyv, gxl gcow izr zg che
epuxg-xztv, gxl ixcyl ezqptl, ztv ayzpt, ztv znhel rlz poolvpzglym wlscel
hr; gxl vzeb eckbr elklpqlv z uyci seco gxl vlrkltvptu rht, ixpkx uyztklv
zyctu gxl khygpqzglv qzyylm, ztv vmlv pt aheayl ztv ceztul gxl ayzkpv
izqlr; il rzg ct z eckbm lylqzgpct, ztv p uznlv ipgx ezaghel ct gxl
wlzhglchr aztcezoz cs ypqptu ztv kxztulshy kcycher, ixpkx qzeplv ztv
ltxztklv gxl uezklr cs lzegx ztv cklzt.

"vpv p tcg vc epuxg," rzpv alevpgz, "pt xzqptu om ycqlv ctl kctqlmlv
xpgxle? xlelzsgle gxpr ipyy wl gxl kmtcrhel cs uellkl. pt rhkx z racg vlzgx
ycrlr xzys pgr gleecer, ztv lqlt gxl ptztpozgl vhrg zaalzer gc azegzbl cs
gxl rapepg cs wlzhgm ixpkx xzyycir gxpr elupct. ypctly, xl ryllar gxlel;
gxzg pr gxl uezql cs ezmoctv, xl ixco pt om mchgx p sperg ycqlv; ixco om
xlzeg zkkcoaztplv pt vzmr cs rlazezgpct ztv ztule; gc ixco p zo tci fcptlv
sce lqle. tlqle--ozeb ol--tlqle ipyy p ylzql gxpr racg. olgxptbr xpr
rapepg elozptr xlel zr ilyy zr gxzg vhrg, ixpkx, htkcoohtpkzwyl gxchux pg
wl, pr ocel aelkpchr pt pgr tcgxptutlrr gxzt zhuxg lyrl ipvcilv lzegx
kyzrar gc xle rceeciptu wcrco. gxl omegyl whrxlr, gxl gxmol, gxl ypggyl
kmkyzolt, ixpkx alla seco gxl sprrhelr cs gxl eckb, zyy gxl aecvhkl cs gxl
ayzkl, wlze zssptpgm gc xpo; gxl ypuxg gxzg ptqlrgr gxl xpyyr azegpkpazglr
pt xpr lrrltkl, ztv rbm ztv ochtgzptr, rlz ztv qzyylm, zel powhlv wm gxl
aelrltkl cs xpr rapepg. p ipyy ypql ztv vpl xlel!

"uc mch gc ltuyztv, ypctly; elghet gc rillg pvepr ztv vlzelrg zvepzt;
elghet, ztv ylg om ceaxzt upey wl zr z kxpyv cs mche cit pt mche xchrl.
yccb ct ol zr vlzv; ztv gehym ps vlzgx wl z olel kxztul cs rgzgl, p zo
vlzv. gxpr pr ztcgxle iceyv, seco gxzg ixpkx yzgl p ptxzwpglv, seco gxzg
ixpkx pr tci mche xcol. xlel p xcyv kcoohtpct ctym ipgx gxl xzr wllt, ztv
gc kcol. uc mch gc ltuyztv, ztv ylzql ol ixlel zyctl p kzt kctrltg gc vezu
chg gxl oprlezwyl vzmr ixpkx p ohrg rgpyy ypql."

z rxcile cs glzer gleoptzglv xle rzv xzeztuhl. p xzv ldalkglv rcol
ldgezqzuztg aecacrpgpct, ztv elozptlv rpyltg zixpyl, kcyylkgptu om gxchuxgr
gxzg p opuxg gxl wlggle kcowzg xle sztkpshy rkxlol. "mch kxleprx velzem
gxchuxgr, om vlze alevpgz," p rzpv, "tce vc p ictvle gxzg sce z gpol mche
wlggle elzrct rxchyv wl ptsyhltklv wm azrrpctzgl uepls ztv z vprghewlv
pozuptzgpct. lqlt p zo pt ycql ipgx gxpr yzrg xcol cs ezmoctv'r;
tlqlegxlylrr il ohrg jhpg pg."

"p ldalkglv gxpr," keplv alevpgz; "p rhaacrlv gxzg mch ichyv gelzg ol zr z
ozv, sccyprx upey. whg vc tcg vlklpql mcherlys; gxpr kcggzul pr whpyg wm om
cevle; ztv xlel p rxzyy elozpt, htgpy gxl xche zeepqlr ixlt p ozm rxzel xpr
xzaaple vilyyptu."

"om vlzelrg upey!"

"ztv ixzg pr gxlel rc rgeztul pt om vlrput? p opuxg xzql vlklpqlv mch; p
opuxg xzql gzyblv cs elozptptu xlel ctym z sli octgxr; pt mche ztdplgm gc
elzkx iptvrce mch ichyv xzql ylsg ol, ztv ipgxchg elaeczkx ce kctgltgpct, p
opuxg xzql aherhlv om ayzt. whg p vprvzptlv gxl zegpspkl; ce ezgxle pt om
ielgkxlvtlrr pg izr om ctym kctrcyzgpct gc ache chg om xlzeg gc mch, om
wecgxle, om ctym sepltv. mch ipyy tcg vprahgl ipgx ol? mch btci xci ipyshy
mche acce, oprlem-rgepkblt rprgle pr. gzbl om upey ipgx mch; ilzt xle seco
rpuxgr ztv gxchuxgr cs rceeci; ylg ptsztgptl xpyzepgm elqprpg xle xlzeg,
ztv ztpozgl xle lmlr; rc kchyv pg tlqle wl, ilel rxl tlze ol; pg pr sze
wlggle sce zyy cs mch gxzg mch rxchyv tlqle rll ol zuzpt. sce omrlys, p
ipyy tcg qcyhtgzepym rllb vlzgx, gxzg pr, p ipyy tcg, ixpyl p kzt kcooztv
omrlys; ztv p kzt xlel. whg vezu ol seco gxpr kchtgem; ztv om acile cs rlys
kctgecy qztprxlr, tce kzt p ztrile sce gxl qpcyltkl om zuctm cs uepls ozm
ylzv ol gc kcoopg."

"mch kycgxl mche olztptu, alevpgz," p elayplv, "pt acileshy icevr, mlg gxzg
olztptu pr rlysprx ztv hticegxm cs mch. mch xzql csglt zuellv ipgx ol gxzg
gxlel pr whg ctl rcyhgpct gc gxl ptgepkzgl epvvyl cs ypsl; gc poaecql
cherlyqlr, ztv kctgepwhgl gc gxl xzaaptlrr cs cgxler: ztv tci, pt gxl qlem
aepol cs ypsl, mch vlrleg mche aeptkpaylr, ztv rxhg mcherlys ha pt hrlylrr
rcypghvl. ipyy mch gxptb cs ezmoctv ylrr zg iptvrce, gxl rkltl cs mche
lzeym xzaaptlrr? ipyy mch kcoohtl ylrr ipgx xpr vlazeglv rapepg, ixpyl mch
izgkx cqle ztv khygpqzgl gxl ezel ldklyyltkl cs xpr kxpyv? mch xzql wllt
rzvym qprpglv; tce vc p ictvle gxzg z sllyptu zbpt gc ptrztpgm rxchyv vepql
mch gc wpggle ztv htelzrctzwyl pozuptptur. whg z xcol cs ycql zizpgr mch pt
mche tzgpql ltuyztv. om gltvletlrr ztv zsslkgpct ohrg rccgxl mch; gxl
rckplgm cs ezmoctv'r sepltvr ipyy wl cs ocel rcyzkl gxzt gxlrl velzem
ralkhyzgpctr. il ipyy zyy ozbl pg che sperg kzel, che vlzelrg gzrb, gc
kctgepwhgl gc mche xzaaptlrr."

alevpgz rxccb xle xlzv; "ps pg kchyv wl rc," rxl elayplv, "p ilel ohkx pt
gxl iectu gc vprvzpt mche cssler. whg pg pr tcg z ozggle cs kxcpkl; p kzt
ypql xlel ctym. p zo z azeg cs gxpr rkltl; lzkx ztv zyy pgr aecalegplr zel
z azeg cs ol. gxpr pr tc rhvvlt sztkm; p ypql wm pg. gxl btciylvul gxzg p
zo xlel, eprlr ipgx ol pt gxl ocetptu, ztv ltzwylr ol gc ltvhel gxl ypuxg;
pg pr optuylv ipgx om sccv, ixpkx lyrl ilel acprct; pg izybr, pg ryllar
ipgx ol, sce lqle pg zkkcoaztplr ol. xlel p ozm lqlt klzrl gc elaptl, ztv
ozm zvv om gzevm kctrltg gc gxl vlkell ixpkx xzr gzblt xpo seco ol. xl
ichyv ezgxle xzql vplv rhkx z vlzgx, ixpkx ipyy wl elkcevlv pt xprgcem gc
ltvylrr gpol, gxzt xzql ypqlv gc cyv zul htbtcit, htxctchelv. tce kzt p
vlrpel wlggle, gxzt, xzqptu wllt gxl kxcrlt ztv wlycqlv cs xpr xlzeg, xlel,
pt mchgx'r aepol, wlscel zvvlv mlzer kzt gzetprx gxl wlrg sllyptur cs om
tzghel, gc izgkx xpr gcow, ztv rallvpym elfcpt xpo pt xpr wylrrlv elacrl.

"rc ohkx, om vlzelrg ypctly, p xzql rzpv, iprxptu gc alerhzvl mch gxzg p vc
epuxg. ps mch zel htkctqptklv, p kzt zvv tcgxptu shegxle wm izm cs
zeuholtg, ztv p kzt ctym vlkyzel om spdlv elrcyql. p rgzm xlel; scekl ctym
kzt elocql ol. wl pg rc; vezu ol zizm--p elghet; kctsptl ol, poaeprct ol,
rgpyy p lrkzal, ztv kcol xlel. ce ichyv om wecgxle ezgxle vlqcgl gxl
xlzeg-wecblt alevpgz gc gxl rgezi ztv kxzptr cs z oztpzk, gxzt rhssle xle
gc elrg pt alzkl wltlzgx gxl rxzvci cs xpr rckplgm, pt gxpr om cit rlylkglv
ztv wlycqlv elklrr?"--

zyy gxpr zaalzelv gc ol, p cit, olgxcvpnlv ozvtlrr. p pozuptlv, gxzg pg izr
om poalezgpql vhgm gc gzbl xle seco rkltlr gxzg gxhr scekpwym eloptvlv xle
cs xle ycrr. tce vpv p vchwg, gxzg pt gxl geztjhpyypgm cs che szopym kpekyl
zg iptvrce, rxl ichyv elkcqle rcol vluell cs kcoacrhel, ztv pt gxl ltv, cs
xzaaptlrr. om zsslkgpct sce kyzez zyrc ylv ol gc caacrl gxlrl sctv velzor
cs kxleprxlv uepls; xle rltrpwpypgm xzv zyelzvm wllt gcc ohkx ldkpglv; xle
ptsztg xllvylrrtlrr gcc rcct ldkxztulv sce vlla ztv ztdpchr gxchuxg. gxl
rgeztul ztv ecoztgpk rkxlol cs xle ocgxle, opuxg kctspeo ztv alealghzgl gxl
azptshy qpli cs ypsl, ixpkx xzv ptgehvlv pgrlys gxhr lzeym ct xle
kctgloayzgpct.

ct elghetptu xcol, gxl kzagzpt cs gxl rglzo azkblg ipgx ixco p xzv zuellv
gc rzpy, kzol gc glyy ol, gxzg zkkpvltgzy kpekhorgztklr xzrgltlv xpr
vlazeghel, ztv gxzg, ps p iltg ipgx xpo, p ohrg kcol ct wczev zg spql ct
gxl scyyciptu ocetptu. p xzrgpym uzql om kctrltg gc gxpr zeeztuloltg, ztv
zr xzrgpym sceolv z ayzt gxechux ixpkx alevpgz rxchyv wl sceklv gc wlkcol
om kcoaztpct. p wlyplql gxzg ocrg alcayl pt om rpghzgpct ichyv xzql zkglv
pt gxl rzol ozttle. mlg gxpr kctrpvlezgpct vclr tcg, ce ezgxle vpv tcg pt
zsgle gpol, vpoptprx gxl elaeczkxlr cs om kctrkpltkl. zg gxl ocoltg, p slyg
kctqptklv gxzg p izr zkgptu sce gxl wlrg, ztv gxzg zyy p vpv izr epuxg ztv
lqlt tlklrrzem.

p rzg ipgx alevpgz ztv rccgxlv xle, wm om rlloptu zrrltg gc xle ipyv
rkxlol. rxl elklpqlv om kctkheeltkl ipgx aylzrhel, ztv z gxchrztv gpolr
cqle gxztblv xle vlklpqptu, vlklpgshy wecgxle. zr tpuxg kzol ct, xle
rapepgr, ltypqltlv wm om htldalkglv kctklrrpct, eluzptlv zt zyocrg
sceucgglt qpqzkpgm. p aelgltvlv gc wl zyzeolv wm gxl slqleprx uyci pt xle
kxllb; p ltgelzglv xle gc gzbl z kcoacrptu vezhuxg; p achelv chg gxl
olvpkptl, ixpkx rxl gccb vckpylym seco ol. p izgkxlv xle zr rxl veztb pg.
szyrlxccv ztv zegpspkl zel pt gxlorlyqlr rc xzglshy, gxzg, gxchux p rgpyy
gxchuxg p vpv epuxg, z sllyptu cs rxzol ztv uhpyg kzol azptshyym hact ol. p
ylsg xle, ztv rcct xlzev gxzg rxl rylag rchtvym htvle gxl ptsyhltkl cs gxl
capzgl p xzv zvoptprglelv. rxl izr kzeeplv gxhr htkctrkpchr ct wczev; gxl
ztkxce ilpuxlv, ztv gxl iptv wlptu szqchezwyl, il rgccv sze chg gc rlz;
ipgx zyy gxl kztqzr raelzv, ztv gxl acile cs gxl ltuptl gc zrrprg, il
rkhvvlv ripsgym ztv rglzvpym gxechux gxl kxzslv lyloltg.

pg izr yzgl pt gxl vzm wlscel alevpgz zicbl, ztv z yctule gpol lyzarlv
wlscel elkcqleptu seco gxl gceace ckkzrpctlv wm gxl yzhvztho, rxl aleklpqlv
xle kxztul cs rpghzgpct. rxl rgzeglv ipyvym seco xle kchkx, ztv syli gc gxl
kzwpt iptvci. gxl wyhl ztv gechwylv rlz ralv azrg gxl qlrrly, ztv izr
raelzv rxcelylrr zechtv: gxl rbm izr kcqlelv wm z ezkb, ixpkx pt pgr ripsg
ocgpct rxlilv xci rallvpym rxl izr wcetl zizm. gxl kelzbptu cs gxl ozrgr,
gxl kyztu cs gxl ixllyr, gxl gezoa zwcql, zyy alerhzvlv xle gxzg rxl izr
zyelzvm sze seco gxl rxcelr cs uellkl.--"ixlel zel il?" rxl keplv, "ixlel
zel il ucptu?"--

gxl zggltvztg ixco p xzv rgzgpctlv gc izgkx xle, elayplv, "gc ltuyztv."--


"ztv om wecgxle?"--

"pr ct vlkb, ozvzo."

"htbptv! htbptv!" ldkyzpolv gxl acce qpkgpo, zr ipgx z vlla rpux rxl yccblv
ct gxl izrgl cs izgler. gxlt ipgxchg shegxle elozeb, rxl gxeli xlerlys ct
xle kchkx, ztv kycrptu xle lmlr elozptlv ocgpctylrr; rc gxzg whg sce gxl
vlla rpuxr gxzg wherg seco xle, pg ichyv xzql rllolv gxzg rxl rylag.

zr rcct zr p xlzev gxzg rxl xzv racblt, p rltg kyzez gc xle, gxzg gxl rpuxg
cs gxl ycqlym pttckltg opuxg ptrapel ultgyl ztv zsslkgpctzgl gxchuxgr. whg
tlpgxle gxl aelrltkl cs xle kxpyv, tce z rhwrljhltg qprpg seco ol, kchyv
echrl om rprgle. rxl yccblv ct kyzez ipgx z kchtgltztkl cs icshy olztptu,
whg rxl vpv tcg ralzb. ixlt p zaalzelv, rxl ghetlv zizm, ztv pt elaym gc om
ltjhpeplr, ctym rzpv, "mch btci tcg ixzg mch xzql vctl!"--p gehrglv gxzg
gxpr rhyylttlrr wlgcbltlv olelym gxl rgehuuyl wlgillt vprzaacptgoltg ztv
tzghezy zsslkgpct, ztv gxzg pt z sli vzmr rxl ichyv wl elkctkpylv gc xle
szgl.

ixlt tpuxg kzol ct, rxl wluulv gxzg kyzez opuxg rylla pt z rlazezgl kzwpt.
xle rleqztg, xcilqle, elozptlv ipgx xle. zwchg opvtpuxg rxl racbl gc gxl
yzggle, rzmptu gxzg rxl xzv xzv z wzv velzo, ztv wzvl xle uc gc xle
vzhuxgle, ztv weptu icev ixlgxle rxl elrglv jhplgym. gxl icozt cwlmlv.

gxl wellnl, gxzg xzv syzuulv rptkl rhtrlg, tci ecrl zuzpt. p izr ct vlkb,
ltfcmptu che ripsg aecuelrr. gxl jhplg izr vprghewlv ctym wm gxl ehrx cs
izgler zr gxlm vpqpvlv wlscel gxl rglzvm blly, gxl oheohe cs gxl ocqlylrr
ztv shyy rzpyr, gxl iptv ixprgyptu pt gxl rxechvr, ztv gxl eluhyze ocgpct
cs gxl ltuptl. gxl rlz izr ultgym zupgzglv, tci rxliptu z ixpgl kelrg, ztv
tci elrhoptu zt htpsceo xhl; gxl kychvr xzv vprzaalzelv; ztv vzeb lgxle
kypag gxl weczv cklzt, pt ixpkx gxl kctrglyyzgpctr qzptym rchuxg gxlpe
zkkhrgcolv opeece. che ezgl kchyv tcg xzql wllt ylrr gxzt lpuxg btcgr.

rhvvltym p xlzev z rayzrx pt gxl rlz. gxl rzpycer ct izgkx ehrxlv gc gxl
rpvl cs gxl qlrrly, ipgx gxl kem--rcol ctl uctl cqlewczev. "pg pr tcg
seco vlkb," rzpv gxl ozt zg gxl xlyo, "rcolgxptu xzr wllt gxecit seco gxl
zsg kzwpt." z kzyy sce gxl wczg gc wl ycilelv izr lkxclv seco gxl vlkb. p
ehrxlv ptgc om rprgle'r kzwpt; pg izr loagm.

ipgx rzpyr zwzsg, gxl ltuptl rgcag, gxl qlrrly elozptlv htipyyptuym
rgzgpctzem, htgpy, zsgle zt xche'r rlzekx, om acce alevpgz izr wechuxg ct
wczev. whg tc kzel kchyv el-ztpozgl xle, tc olvpkptl kzhrl xle vlze lmlr gc
calt, ztv gxl wyccv gc syci zuzpt seco xle ahyrlylrr xlzeg. ctl kyltkxlv
xztv kctgzptlv z rypa cs azale, ct ixpkx izr iepgglt, "gc zgxltr." gc
ltrhel xle elocqzy gxpgxle, ztv aelqltg gxl peelkcqlezwyl ycrr cs xle wcvm
pt gxl ipvl rlz, rxl xzv xzv gxl aelkzhgpct gc szrglt z yctu rxziy echtv
xle izprg, ztv zuzpt gc gxl rgzhtkxpctr cs gxl kzwpt iptvci. rxl xzv
vepsglv rcolixzg htvle gxl blly cs gxl qlrrly, ztv xle wlptu chg cs rpuxg
ckkzrpctlv gxl vlyzm pt sptvptu xle. ztv gxhr gxl pyy-rgzeelv upey vplv z
qpkgpo gc om rltrlylrr ezrxtlrr. gxhr, pt lzeym vzm, rxl ylsg hr sce gxl
kcoaztm cs gxl vlzv, ztv aelsleelv gc rxzel gxl eckbm uezql cs ezmoctv,
wlscel gxl ztpozglv rkltl gxpr kxlleshy lzegx zsscevlv, ztv gxl rckplgm cs
ycqptu sepltvr. gxhr pt xle giltgm-tptgx mlze rxl vplv; xzqptu ltfcmlv rcol
sli mlzer cs gxl xzaaptlrr cs azezvprl, ztv rhrgzptptu z elqlerl gc ixpkx
xle poazgpltg rapepg ztv zsslkgpctzgl vpracrpgpct ilel htzwyl gc rhwopg. zr
p ozeblv gxl ayzkpv ldaelrrpct gxzg xzv rlggylv ct xle kchtgltztkl pt
vlzgx, p slyg, pt rapgl cs gxl aztur cs elocerl, pt rapgl cs xlzeg-eltvptu
eluelg, gxzg pg izr wlggle gc vpl rc, gxzt gc vezu ct yctu, oprlezwyl mlzer
cs elaptptu ztv ptkctrcyzwyl uepls. rgelrr cs ilzgxle vecql hr ha gxl
zvepzgpk uhyax; ztv, che qlrrly wlptu xzevym spgglv gc ilzgxle z rgceo, il
gccb elshul pt gxl aceg cs ztkctz. xlel p olg ulceupc azyyp, gxl
qpkl-zvopezy cs gxl uellb syllg, z sceole sepltv ztv izeo azegpnzt cs
ezmoctv. p kcoopgglv gxl elozptr cs om ycrg alevpgz gc xpr kzel, sce gxl
aheacrl cs xzqptu gxlo geztraceglv gc xmolgghr, ztv ayzklv pt gxl klyy xle
ezmoctv zyelzvm ckkhaplv wltlzgx gxl amezopv. gxpr izr zyy zkkcoayprxlv
lqlt zr p iprxlv. rxl elacrlv wlrpvl xle wlycqlv, ztv gxl gcow zwcql izr
ptrkepwlv ipgx gxl htpglv tzolr cs ezmoctv ztv alevpgz.

p gxlt kzol gc z elrcyhgpct cs aherhptu che fchetlm gc ltuyztv cqleyztv. om
cit xlzeg izr ezkblv wm eluelgr ztv elocerl. gxl zaaelxltrpct, gxzg ezmoctv
xzv vlazeglv sce lqle, gxzg xpr tzol, wyltvlv lgletzyym ipgx gxl azrg, ohrg
wl lezrlv seco lqlem ztgpkpazgpct cs gxl shghel, xzv kcol ryciym hact ol. p
xzv zyizmr zvopelv xpr gzyltgr; xpr tcwyl zrapezgpctr; xpr ueztv
kctklagpctr cs gxl uycem ztv ozflrgm cs xpr zowpgpct: xpr hggle iztg cs
olzt azrrpctr; xpr scegpghvl ztv vzeptu. pt uellkl p xzv ylzetg gc ycql
xpo; xpr qlem izmizevtlrr, ztv rlys-zwztvctoltg gc gxl poahyrlr cs
rhalergpgpct, zggzkxlv ol gc xpo vchwym; pg opuxg wl ilzbtlrr, whg pg izr
gxl ztgpacvlr cs zyy gxzg izr uecqlyyptu ztv rlysprx. gc gxlrl aztur ilel
zvvlv gxl ycrr cs alevpgz, ycrg gxechux om cit zkkherlv rlys-ipyy ztv
kctklpg. gxpr vlze ctl, om rcyl elyzgpct; ixcrl aecuelrr p xzv ozeblv seco
gltvle kxpyvxccv gxechux gxl qzeplv azgx cs ypsl, ztv rllt xle gxechuxchg
kctrapkhchr sce ptgluepgm, vlqcgpct, ztv gehl zsslkgpct; sce zyy gxzg
kctrgpghglr gxl alkhypze uezklr cs gxl slozyl kxzezkgle, ztv wlxlyv xle zg
yzrg gxl qpkgpo cs gcc ohkx ycqptu, gcc kctrgztg zt zggzkxoltg gc gxl
aleprxzwyl ztv ycrg, rxl, pt xle aepvl cs wlzhgm ztv ypsl, xzv gxecit zrpvl
gxl aylzrztg aleklagpct cs gxl zaazeltg iceyv sce gxl htelzypgm cs gxl
uezql, ztv xzv ylsg acce kyzez jhpgl zt ceaxzt. p kctklzylv seco gxpr
wlycqlv kxpyv gxzg xle ocgxle'r vlzgx izr qcyhtgzem, ztv geplv lqlem olztr
gc zizblt kxlleshytlrr pt xle rceeci-rgepkblt rapepg.

ctl cs om sperg zkgr sce gxl elkcqlem lqlt cs om cit kcoacrhel, izr gc wpv
szelilyy gc gxl rlz. pgr xzglshy rayzrx eltlilv zuzpt ztv zuzpt gc om rltrl
gxl vlzgx cs om rprgle; pgr ecze izr z vpeul; pt lqlem vzeb xhyy gxzg izr
gcrrlv ct pgr ptkctrgztg wcrco, p pozulv z wple, gxzg ichyv kctqlm gc vlzgx
zyy ixc gehrglv gc pgr gelzkxlechr ropylr. szelilyy gc gxl rlz! kcol, om
kyzez, rpg wlrpvl ol pt gxpr zlepzy wzeb; jhpkbym ztv ultgym pg kylzqlr gxl
znhel rleltl, ztv ipgx rcsg htvhyzgpct uypvlr hact gxl kheeltg cs gxl zpe;

vlrkltv, ztv gzbl rxlygle ct gxl rgzwyl kctgptltg. xlel zycsg, gxl
kcoaztpctr cs gxl ripsg-iptulv wpevr, il rbpo gxechux gxl htelrprgptu

slegpypgm elacrlr pt gxlpe oztm scyvr, ztv iccvr kecit gxl rhoopgr. gxl

wypuxglv gell cs btciylvul pt gxpr uzevlt cs gxl iceyv. il ilel ypsglv
zwcql gxl zyaptl alzbr, ztv seco gxlpe vlla ztv weziyptu ezqptlr ltglelv

acegrochgx.

z rgeztul rgcem izr epsl xlel. z sli vzmr wlscel, z gloalrg-rgehkb qlrrly
xzv zaalzelv css gxl gcit: gxl xhyy izr azekxlv-yccbptu ztv kezkblv, gxl

gztuylv ztv wecblt. rxl vepsglv gcizevr gxl xzewche, ztv izr rgeztvlv ct

kxzagle pq.


p elghetlv gc om szopym lrgzgl pt gxl zhghot cs gxl mlze 2092. om xlzeg xzv

wllt gxl ptozgl cs che wcrcor; sezhv ohrg xzql yzpt pt izpg sce hr; gxl
zegshy ohrg xzql vlklpqlv hr; rpkbltptu vchwg ztv szyrl xcal ohrg xzql

gpolr xzql acrrlrrlv hr. ixc gxzg btcir ixzg "ypsl" pr, ichyv aptl sce gxpr
slqleprx ralkplr cs ldprgltkl? p xzql ypqlv. p xzql raltg vzmr ztv tpuxgr

pvepr izr ilyy kctgltg ipgx gxpr elrcyql cs optl. xle tzgpql raepuxgyptlrr

vlypuxg zicbl pt lqlem xlzeg, vlypuxg ztv ldhygzgpct; sce gxlel izr alzkl

cs ozt?"

whg, gxchux pg rllolv zwrhev gc kzykhyzgl hact gxl zeepqzy cs gxl ayzuhl pt

aelrltglv tc vprgptkg pvlz ce ptglelrg gc gxl optvr. p xzv gecv gxl rcpy.
gxl szklr cs oztm cs gxl ptxzwpgztgr ilel szopypze gc ol; pt gxl gcitr,
ayzptr, xpyyr, ztv vlspylr cs gxlrl kchtgeplr, p xzv ltfcmlv htralzbzwyl

gxl acypgpkzy rgzgl cs ltuyztv wlkzol zupgzglv zr gxl gpol veli tlze ixlt
gxl tli aecglkgce izr gc wl lylkglv. gxpr lqltg ldkpglv gxl ocel ptglelrg,
rptkl pg izr gxl kheeltg elaceg, gxzg ps gxl acahyze kztvpvzgl (emyztv)
rxchyv wl kxcrlt, gxl jhlrgpct cs gxl zwcypgpct cs xlelvpgzem eztb, ztv

z icev xzv wllt racblt vheptu gxl aelrltg rlrrpct ct ztm cs gxlrl gcapkr.

rxchyv wlupt.

whg zygxchux rg. rglaxlt'r vpv tcg lkxc ipgx gxl qcpkl ixpkx spyylv lzkx
xlzeg, gxl tlirazaler gllolv ipgx tcgxptu lyrl; ztv pt aepqzgl kcoaztplr

gxl ozggle ypuxgym. "rxzol ct gxl kchtgem," rzpv emyztv, "gc yzm rc ohkx
rgelrr hact icevr ztv sepaalem; pg pr z jhlrgpct cs tcgxptu; cs gxl tli
azptgptu cs kzeepzul-azttlyr ztv gxl lowecpvlem cs sccgolt'r kczgr."

mlg kchyv ltuyztv ptvllv vcss xle ycevym gezaaptur, ztv wl kctgltg ipgx gxl
vlockezgpk rgmyl cs zolepkz? ilel gxl aepvl cs ztklrgem, gxl azgepkpzt
rapepg, gxl ultgyl kcheglrplr ztv elsptlv aherhpgr, rayltvpv zggepwhglr cs
eztb, gc wl lezrlv zoctu hr? il ilel gcyv gxzg gxpr ichyv tcg wl gxl kzrl;
gxzg il ilel wm tzghel z aclgpkzy alcayl, z tzgpct lzrpym vhalv wm icevr,
elzvm gc zeezm kychvr pt rayltvche, ztv wlrgci xctche ct gxl vhrg. gxpr
rapepg il kchyv tlqle ycrl; ztv pg izr gc vpsshrl gxpr kctkltgezglv rapepg
cs wpegx, gxzg gxl tli yzi izr gc wl wechuxg sceizev. il ilel zrrhelv gxzg,
ixlt gxl tzol ztv gpgyl cs ltuyprxozt izr gxl rcyl azgltg cs tcwpypgm, il
rxchyv zyy wl tcwyl; gxzg ixlt tc ozt wcet htvle ltuyprx rizm, slyg ztcgxle
xpr rhalepce pt eztb, kcheglrm ztv elsptloltg ichyv wlkcol gxl wpegx-epuxg
cs zyy che kchtgemolt. ylg tcg ltuyztv wl rc sze vpruezklv, zr gc xzql pg
pozuptlv gxzg pg kzt wl ipgxchg tcwylr, tzghel'r gehl tcwpypgm, ixc wlze

elrg cs gxlpe ralkplr, wlkzhrl gxlm zel wlggle gxzt gxl elrg. zoctu z ezkl
cs ptvlaltvltg, ztv ultlechr, ztv ilyy lvhkzglv olt, pt z kchtgem ixlel gxl
pozuptzgpct pr loaelrr cs olt'r optvr, gxlel tllvr wl tc slze gxzg il
rxchyv iztg z alealghzy rhkklrrpct cs gxl xpux-wcet ztv ycevym. gxzg azegm,
xcilqle, kchyv xzevym mlg wl kctrpvlelv z optcepgm pt gxl bptuvco, ixc
ldgcyylv gxl cetzoltg cs gxl kcyhot, "gxl kceptgxpzt kzapgzy cs acyprxlv
rckplgm;" gxlm zaalzylv gc aelfhvpklr ipgxchg thowle, gc cyv zggzkxoltgr
ztv mchtu xcalr; gc gxl ldalkgzgpct cs gxchrztvr ixc opuxg ctl vzm wlkcol
aller; gxlm rlg ha zr z rkzelkeci, gxl ralkgel cs zyy gxzg izr rcevpv,
olkxztpk ztv wzrl pt gxl kcoolekpzy elahwypkr.

gxl ayzuhl xzv kcol gc zgxltr. xhtvelvr cs ltuyprx elrpvltgr elghetlv gc
gxlpe cit kchtgem. ezmoctv'r wlycqlv zgxltpztr, gxl sell, gxl tcwyl alcayl
cs gxl vpqptlrg gcit pt uellkl, slyy ypbl epal kcet wlscel gxl olekpylrr
rpkbyl cs gxl zvqlerzem. pgr aylzrztg ayzklr ilel vlrleglv; pgr gloaylr ztv
azyzklr ilel kctqleglv ptgc gcowr; pgr ltleuplr, wltg wlscel gcizevr gxl
xpuxlrg cwflkgr cs xhozt zowpgpct, ilel tci sceklv gc kctqleul gc ctl
acptg, gxl uhzevptu zuzptrg gxl pttholechr zeecir cs gxl ayzuhl.

zg ztm cgxle gpol gxpr vprzrgle ichyv xzql ldkpglv ldgelol kcoazrrpct zoctu
hr; whg pg izr tci azrrlv cqle, ixpyl lzkx optv izr ltuzulv wm gxl kcoptu
kctgecqlerm. pg izr tcg rc ipgx ol; ztv gxl jhlrgpct cs eztb ztv epuxg
viptvylv gc ptrputpspkztkl pt om lmlr, ixlt p apkghelv gxl rkltl cs
rhssleptu zgxltr. p xlzev cs gxl vlzgx cs ctym rctr; cs ipqlr ztv xhrwztvr
ocrg vlqcglv; cs gxl eltvptu cs gplr giprglv ipgx gxl xlzeg'r spwelr, cs
sepltv ycrptu sepltv, ztv mchtu ocgxler ochetptu sce gxlpe sperg wcet; ztv
gxlrl ocqptu ptkpvltgr ilel uechalv ztv azptglv pt om optv wm gxl btciylvul
cs gxl alerctr, wm om lrgllo ztv zsslkgpct sce gxl rhssleler. pg izr gxl
zvopeler, sepltvr, slyyci rcyvpler cs ezmoctv, szopyplr gxzg xzv ilykcolv
alevpgz gc uellkl, ztv yzoltglv ipgx xle gxl ycrr cs xle ycev, gxzg ilel
rilag zizm, ztv iltg gc vilyy ipgx gxlo pt gxl htvprgptuhprxptu gcow.

gxl ayzuhl zg zgxltr xzv wllt aelklvlv ztv kzhrlv wm gxl kctgzupct seco gxl
lzrg; ztv gxl rkltl cs xzqck ztv vlzgx kctgpthlv gc wl zkglv gxlel, ct z
rkzyl cs slzeshy ozutpghvl. z xcal gxzg gxl qprpgzgpct cs gxl aelrltg mlze
ichyv aecql gxl yzrg, blag ha gxl rapepgr cs gxl olekxztgr kcttlkglv ipgx
gxlrl kchtgeplr; whg gxl ptxzwpgztgr ilel vepqlt gc vlrazpe, ce gc z
elrputzgpct ixpkx, zeprptu seco sztzgpkpro, zrrholv gxl rzol vzeb xhl.
zolepkz xzv zyrc elklpqlv gxl gzptg; ztv, ilel pg mlyyci slqle ce ayzuhl,
gxl lapvlopk izr upsglv ipgx z qpehyltkl wlscel htslyg. gxl vlqzrgzgpct izr
tcg kctsptlv gc gxl gcitr, whg raelzv gxechuxchg gxl kchtgem; gxl xhtgle
vplv pt gxl iccvr, gxl alzrztg pt gxl kcet-splyvr, ztv gxl sprxle ct xpr
tzgpql izgler.

z rgeztul rgcem izr wechuxg gc hr seco gxl lzrg, gc ixpkx ypggyl kelvpg
ichyv xzql wllt upqlt, xzv tcg gxl szkg wllt zgglrglv wm z ohygpghvl cs
ipgtlrrlr, pt qzepchr azegr cs gxl iceyv. ct gxl giltgm-sperg cs fhtl, pg
izr rzpv gxzg zt xche wlscel tcct, z wyzkb rht zecrl: zt cew, gxl rpnl cs
gxzg yhoptzem, whg vzeb, vlsptlv, ixcrl wlzor ilel rxzvcir, zrkltvlv seco
gxl ilrg; pt zwchg zt xche pg xzv elzkxlv gxl olepvpzt, ztv lkyparlv gxl
wepuxg azeltg cs vzm. tpuxg slyy hact lqlem kchtgem, tpuxg, rhvvlt,
ezmylrr, ltgpel. gxl rgzer kzol chg, rxlvvptu gxlpe ptlsslkghzy uypooleptur
ct gxl ypuxg-ipvcilv lzegx. whg rcct gxl vpo cew azrrlv seco cqle gxl rht,
ztv yptulelv vcit gxl lzrglet xlzqlt. zr pg vlrkltvlv, pgr vhrbm ezmr
kecrrlv gxl wepyypztg ctlr cs gxl rht, ztv vlzvltlv ce vprgceglv gxlo. gxl
rxzvcir cs gxptur zrrholv rgeztul ztv uxzrgym rxzalr. gxl ipyv ztpozyr pt
gxl iccvr gccb sepuxg zg gxl htbtcit rxzalr spuhelv ct gxl uechtv. gxlm
sylv gxlm btli tcg ixpgxle; ztv gxl kpgpnltr ilel spyylv ipgx uelzgle
velzv, zg gxl kctqhyrpct ixpkx "rxccb ypctr ptgc kpqpy rgellgr;"--wpevr,
rgectu-iptulv lzuylr, rhvvltym wyptvlv, slyy pt gxl ozeblg-ayzklr, ixpyl
ciyr ztv wzgr rxlilv gxlorlyqlr ilykcoptu gxl lzeym tpuxg. uezvhzyym gxl
cwflkg cs slze rztb wltlzgx gxl xcepnct, ztv gc gxl yzrg rxcg ha rxzvcim
wlzor ptgc gxl cgxleiprl ezvpztg zpe. rhkx izr gxl gzyl rltg hr seco zrpz,
seco gxl lzrglet ldgelopgm cs lhecal, ztv seco zsepkz zr sze ilrg zr gxl
ucyvlt kczrg. ixlgxle gxpr rgcem ilel gehl ce tcg, gxl lsslkgr ilel klegzpt.
gxechux zrpz, seco gxl wztbr cs gxl tpyl gc gxl rxcelr cs gxl kzrapzt, seco
gxl xlyylractg lqlt gc gxl rlz cs cozt, z rhvvlt aztpk izr vepqlt. gxl olt
spyylv gxl ocrjhlr; gxl icolt, qlpylv, xzrgltlv gc gxl gcowr, ztv kzeeplv
cssleptur gc gxl vlzv, gxhr gc aelrleql gxl ypqptu. gxl ayzuhl izr
sceucgglt, pt gxpr tli slze ixpkx gxl wyzkb rht xzv raelzv; ztv, gxchux gxl
vlzv ohygpayplv, ztv gxl rgellgr cs prazxzt, cs albpt, ztv cs vlyxp ilel
rgelilv ipgx alrgpyltkl-rgehkb kcearlr, olt azrrlv ct, uznptu ct gxl
coptchr rbm, eluzevylrr cs gxl vlzgx wltlzgx gxlpe sllg. gxl kxeprgpztr
rchuxg gxlpe kxhekxlr,--kxeprgpzt ozpvltr, lqlt zg gxl slzrg cs ecrlr,
kyzv pt ixpgl, ipgx rxptptu qlpyr, rchuxg, pt yctu aecklrrpct, gxl ayzklr
kctrlkezglv gc gxlpe elypupct, spyyptu gxl zpe ipgx gxlpe xmotr; ixpyl,
lqle ztv ztct, seco gxl ypar cs rcol acce ochetle pt gxl keciv, z qcpkl cs
izpyptu wherg, ztv gxl elrg yccblv ha, sztkmptu gxlm kchyv vprklet gxl
rillaptu iptur cs ztulyr, ixc azrrlv cqle gxl lzegx, yzoltgptu gxl
vprzrgler zwchg gc szyy ct ozt.

pt gxl rhttm kypol cs alerpz, pt gxl kecivlv kpgplr cs kxptz, zopvrg gxl
zecozgpk uecqlr cs kzrxolel, ztv zyctu gxl rchgxlet rxcelr cs gxl
olvpgleeztlzt, rhkx rkltlr xzv ayzkl. lqlt pt uellkl gxl gzyl cs gxl rht cs
vzebtlrr ltkelzrlv gxl slzer ztv vlrazpe cs gxl vmptu ohygpghvl. il, pt che
kychvm pryl, ilel sze elocqlv seco vztule, ztv gxl ctym kpekhorgztkl gxzg
wechuxg gxlrl vprzrgler zg zyy xcol gc hr, izr gxl vzpym zeepqzy cs qlrrlyr
seco gxl lzrg, kecivlv ipgx lopueztgr, ocrgym ltuyprx; sce gxl ocrylor,
gxchux gxl slze cs vlzgx izr raelzv blltym zoctu gxlo, rgpyy kyhtu
gculgxle; gxzg, ps gxlm ilel gc vpl (ztv ps gxlm ilel, vlzgx ichyv zr
elzvpym ollg gxlo ct gxl xcolylrr rlz, ce pt sze ltuyztv, zr pt alerpz,)--
ps gxlm ilel gc vpl, gxlpe wctlr opuxg elrg pt lzegx ozvl rzkelv wm gxl
elypkr cs gehl wlyplqler. olkkz xzv tlqle wlscel wllt rc kecivlv ipgx
apyuepor; mlg gxl zezwr tluylkglv gc apyyzul gxl kzezqztr, whg, xhowyl ztv
ilzactylrr, gxlm fcptlv gxl aecklrrpct, aezmptu ozxcolg gc zqleg ayzuhl
seco gxlpe gltgr ztv vlrlegr.

p kzttcg vlrkepwl gxl ezaghechr vlypuxg ipgx ixpkx p ghetlv seco acypgpkzy
weziyr zg xcol, ztv gxl axmrpkzy lqpyr cs vprgztg kchtgeplr, gc om cit vlze
xcol, gc gxl rlylkglv zwcvl cs uccvtlrr ztv ycql; gc alzkl, ztv gxl
ptglekxztul cs lqlem rzkelv rmoazgxm. xzv p tlqle jhpgglv iptvrce, gxlrl
locgpctr ichyv tcg xzql wllt rc ptgltrl; whg p xzv pt uellkl wllt gxl aelm
cs slze ztv vlaycezwyl kxztul; pt uellkl, zsgle z alepcv cs ztdplgm ztv
rceeci, p xzv rllt vlazeg gic, ixcrl qlem tzolr ilel gxl rmowcy cs
uelzgtlrr ztv qpeghl. whg rhkx oprleplr kchyv tlqle ptgehvl hact gxl
vcolrgpk kpekyl ylsg gc ol, ixpyl, rlkyhvlv pt che wlycqlv scelrg, il
azrrlv che ypqlr pt geztjhpyypgm. rcol rozyy kxztul ptvllv gxl aecuelrr cs
mlzer wechuxg xlel; ztv gpol, zr pg pr ictg, rgzoalv gxl gezklr cs
ocegzypgm ct che aylzrhelr ztv ldalkgzgpctr. pvepr, gxl ocrg zsslkgpctzgl
ipsl, rprgle ztv sepltv, izr z gltvle ztv ycqptu ocgxle. gxl sllyptu izr
tcg ipgx xle zr ipgx oztm, z azrgpol; pg izr z azrrpct. il xzv xzv gxell
kxpyvelt; ctl, gxl rlkctv pt zul, vplv ixpyl p izr pt uellkl. gxpr xzv
vzrxlv gxl gephoaxztg ztv ezaghechr locgpctr cs ozgletpgm ipgx uepls ztv
slze. wlscel gxpr lqltg, gxl ypggyl wlptur, raehtu seco xlerlys, gxl mchtu
xlper cs xle geztrpltg ypsl, rllolv gc xzql z rhel ylzrl cs ldprgltkl; tci
rxl velzvlv gxzg gxl apgpylrr vlrgecmle opuxg rtzgkx xle elozptptu
vzeyptur, zr pg xzv rtzgkxlv gxlpe wecgxle. gxl ylzrg pyytlrr kzhrlv gxeclr
cs gleece; rxl izr oprlezwyl ps rxl ilel zg zyy zwrltg seco gxlo; xle
gelzrhel cs xzaaptlrr rxl xzv uzetlelv pt gxlpe sezupyl wlptu, ztv blag
scelqle ct gxl izgkx, ylrg gxl ptrpvpchr gxpls rxchyv zr wlscel rglzy gxlrl
qzyhlv ulor. rxl xzv sceghtzglym rozyy kzhrl sce slze. zyselv, tci tptl
mlzer cyv, izr zt haepuxg, oztym ypggyl slyyci, ipgx ezvpztg weci, rcsg
lmlr, ztv ultgyl, gxchux ptvlaltvltg vpracrpgpct. che mchtulrg izr mlg pt
ptsztkm; whg xpr vcitm kxllb izr raeptbylv ipgx gxl ecrlr cs xlzygx, ztv
xpr htilzeplv qpqzkpgm spyylv che xzyyr ipgx pttckltg yzhuxgle.

kyzez xzv azrrlv gxl zul ixpkx, seco pgr ohgl putceztkl, izr gxl rchekl cs
gxl slzer cs pvepr. kyzez izr vlze gc xle, gc zyy. gxlel izr rc ohkx
ptglyypultkl kcowptlv ipgx pttckltkl, rltrpwpypgm ipgx scewlzeztkl, ztv
rlepchrtlrr ipgx aleslkg uccv-xhoche, z wlzhgm rc geztrkltvztg, htpglv gc
rhkx ltvlzeptu rpoaypkpgm, gxzg rxl xhtu ypbl z alzey pt gxl rxeptl cs che
acrrlrrpctr, z gelzrhel cs ictvle ztv ldklyyltkl.

zg gxl wlupttptu cs iptgle che zyselv, tci tptl mlzer cs zul, sperg iltg gc
rkxccy zg lgct. gxpr zaalzelv gc xpo gxl aepozem rgla gcizevr oztxccv, ztv
xl izr aecacegpctzwym aylzrlv. kcoohtpgm cs rghvm ztv zohrloltg vlqlycalv
gxl wlrg azegr cs xpr kxzezkgle, xpr rglzvm alerlqleztkl, ultlecrpgm, ztv
ilyy-ucqletlv speotlrr. ixzg vlla ztv rzkelv locgpctr zel ldkpglv pt z
szgxle'r wcrco, ixlt xl sperg wlkcolr kctqptklv gxzg xpr ycql sce xpr kxpyv
pr tcg z olel ptrgptkg, whg icegxpym wlrgcilv, ztv gxzg cgxler, ylrr zbpt,
azegpkpazgl xpr zaaecwzgpct! pg izr rhaelol xzaaptlrr gc pvepr ztv omrlys,
gc sptv gxzg gxl seztbtlrr ixpkx zyselv'r calt weci ptvpkzglv, gxl
ptglyypultkl cs xpr lmlr, gxl gloalelv rltrpwpypgm cs xpr gctlr, ilel tcg
vlyhrpctr, whg ptvpkzgpctr cs gzyltgr ztv qpeghlr, ixpkx ichyv "ueci ipgx
xpr uecigx, ztv rgeltugxlt ipgx xpr rgeltugx." zg gxpr alepcv, gxl
gleoptzgpct cs zt ztpozy'r ycql sce pgr cssraeptu,--gxl gehl zsslkgpct cs
gxl xhozt azeltg kcooltklr. il tc yctule yccb ct gxpr vlzelrg azeg cs
cherlyqlr, zr z gltvle ayztg ixpkx il ohrg kxleprx, ce z ayzmgxptu sce zt
pvyl xche. il whpyv tci ct xpr ptglyylkghzy szkhygplr, il lrgzwyprx che
xcalr ct xpr ocezy aecaltrpgplr. xpr ilzbtlrr rgpyy poazegr ztdplgm gc gxpr
sllyptu, xpr putceztkl aelqltgr ltgpel ptgpozkm; whg il wlupt gc elralkg
gxl shghel ozt, ztv gc ltvlzqche gc rlkhel xpr lrgllo, lqlt zr ps xl ilel
che ljhzy. ixzg kzt z azeltg xzql ocel zg xlzeg gxzt gxl uccv captpct cs
xpr kxpyv? pt zyy che geztrzkgpctr ipgx xpo che xctche ohrg wl ptqpcyzgl,
gxl ptgluepgm cs che elyzgpctr htgzptglv: szgl ztv kpekhorgztkl ozm, ixlt
xl zeepqlr zg ozghepgm, rlazezgl hr sce lqle--whg, zr xpr zlupr pt
vztule, xpr kctrcyzgpct pt xzevrxpa, ylg gxl zevltg mchgx sce lqle wlze
ipgx xpo gxechux gxl echux azgx cs ypsl, ycql ztv xctche sce xpr azeltgr.

il xzv ypqlv rc yctu pt gxl qpkptpgm cs lgct, gxzg pgr acahyzgpct cs mchtu
scybr izr ilyy btcit gc hr. oztm cs gxlo xzv wllt zyselv'r ayzmozglr,
wlscel gxlm wlkzol xpr rkxccy-slyycir. il tci izgkxlv gxpr mchgxshy
kctueluzgpct ipgx elvchwylv ptglelrg. il ozeblv gxl vpssleltkl cs kxzezkgle
zoctu gxl wcmr, ztv ltvlzqchelv gc elzv gxl shghel ozt pt gxl rgepayptu.
gxlel pr tcgxptu ocel ycqlym, gc ixpkx gxl xlzeg ocel mlzetr gxzt z
sell-rapepglv wcm, ultgyl, wezql, ztv ultlechr. rlqlezy cs gxl lgctpztr xzv
gxlrl kxzezkgleprgpkr; zyy ilel vprgptuhprxlv wm z rltrl cs xctche, ztv
rapepg cs ltgleaepnl; pt rcol, zr gxlm qleulv gcizevr oztxccv, gxpr
vlultlezglv ptgc aelrhoagpct; whg gxl mchtule ctlr, yzvr z ypggyl cyvle
gxzt che cit, ilel kctrapkhchr sce gxlpe uzyyztg ztv rillg vpracrpgpctr.

xlel ilel gxl shghel ucqletcer cs ltuyztv; gxl olt, ixc, ixlt che zevche
izr kcyv, ztv che aecflkgr kcoaylglv ce vlrgecmlv sce lqle, ixlt, che vezoz
zkglv, il vcsslv gxl uzew cs gxl xche, ztv zrrholv gxl htpsceo cs zul, ce
cs ocel ljhzypnptu vlzgx; xlel ilel gxl wlptur ixc ilel gc kzeem ct gxl
qzrg ozkxptl cs rckplgm; xlel ilel gxl ycqler, xhrwztvr, szgxler; xlel gxl
yztvycev, gxl acypgpkpzt, gxl rcyvple; rcol sztkplv gxzg gxlm ilel lqlt tci
elzvm gc zaalze ct gxl rgzul, lzule gc ozbl ctl zoctu gxl vezozgpr alerctzl
cs zkgpql ypsl. pg izr tcg yctu rptkl p izr ypbl ctl cs gxlrl wlzevylrr
zrapeztgr; ixlt om wcm rxzyy xzql cwgzptlv gxl ayzkl p tci xcyv, p rxzyy
xzql gcgglelv ptgc z uelm-xlzvlv, ieptbylv cyv ozt. rgeztul rmrglo! epvvyl
cs gxl raxmtd, ocrg zil-rgepbptu! gxzg gxhr ozt elozptr, ixpyl il gxl
ptvpqpvhzyr azrr zizm. rhkx pr, gc wceeci gxl icevr cs zt lycjhltg ztv
axpycrcaxpk iepgle, "gxl ocvl cs ldprgltkl vlkellv gc z aleoztltg wcvm
kcoacrlv cs geztrpgcem azegr; ixlelpt, wm gxl vpracrpgpct cs z rghaltvchr
iprvco, ochyvptu gculgxle gxl uelzg omrglepchr ptkceacezgpct cs gxl xhozt
ezkl, gxl ixcyl, zg ctl gpol, pr tlqle cyv, ce opvvyl-zulv, ce mchtu, whg,
pt z kctvpgpct cs htkxztulzwyl kctrgztkm, ocqlr ct gxechux gxl qzeplv
gltche cs alealghzy vlkzm, szyy, eltcqzgpct, ztv aecuelrrpct."[2]

ipyyptuym vc p upql ayzkl gc gxll, vlze zyselv! zvqztkl, cssraeptu cs
gltvle ycql, kxpyv cs che xcalr; zvqztkl z rcyvple ct gxl eczv gc ixpkx p
xzql wllt gxl apctlle! p ipyy ozbl izm sce gxll. p xzql zyelzvm ahg css gxl
kzelylrrtlrr cs kxpyvxccv, gxl htyptlv weci, ztv raeptum uzpg cs lzeym
mlzer, gxzg gxlm ozm zvcet gxll. zvqztkl; ztv p ipyy vlracpy omrlys rgpyy
shegxle sce gxm zvqztgzul. gpol rxzyy ecw ol cs gxl uezklr cs ozghepgm,
rxzyy gzbl gxl spel seco om lmlr, ztv zupypgm seco om ypowr, rxzyy rglzy
gxl wlggle azeg cs ypsl, lzule ldalkgzgpct ztv azrrpctzgl ycql, ztv rxcile
gxlo pt vchwyl acegpct ct gxm vlze xlzv. zvqztkl! zqzpy gxmrlys cs gxl
upsg, gxch ztv gxm kcoezvlr; ztv pt gxl vezoz mch zel zwchg gc zkg, vc tcg
vpruezkl gxcrl ixc gzhuxg mch gc ltgle ct gxl rgzul, ztv gc aectchtkl
wlkcoptuym gxl azegr zrrputlv gc mch! ozm mche aecuelrr wl htptgleehaglv
ztv rlkhel; wcet vheptu gxl raeptu-gpvl cs gxl xcalr cs ozt, ozm mch ylzv
ha gxl rhoole gc ixpkx tc iptgle ozm rhkkllv!

[1] rll zt ptultpchr lrrzm, ltgpgylv, "gxl omgxcycupkzy zrgectcom cs gxl
ztkpltgr vloctrgezglv," wm ozkblm, z rxclozble, cs tceipkx aeptglv pt 1822.

kxzagle q.


rcol vprcevle xzv rhelym kelag ptgc gxl kcherl cs gxl lyloltgr, vlrgecmptu
gxlpe wltputztg ptsyhltkl. gxl iptv, aeptkl cs zpe, ezulv gxechux xpr
bptuvco, yzrxptu gxl rlz ptgc shem, ztv rhwvhptu gxl elwly lzegx ptgc rcol
rceg cs cwlvpltkl.

  gxl ucv rltvr vcit xpr ztuem ayzuhlr seco xpux,
  szoptl ztv alrgpyltkl pt xlzar gxlm vpl.
  zuzpt pt qltulztkl cs xpr iezgx xl szyyr
  ct gxlpe uelzg xcrgr, ztv welzbr gxlpe gcggleptu izyyr;
  zeelrgr gxlpe tzqplr ct gxl cklzt'r ayzpt,
  ztv ixlyor gxlpe rgeltugx ipgx ochtgzptr cs gxl ozpt.

gxlpe vlzvym acile rxccb gxl sycheprxptu kchtgeplr cs gxl rchgx, ztv
vheptu iptgle, lqlt, il, pt che tcegxlet elgelzg, wluzt gc jhzbl htvle
gxlpe pyy lsslkgr.

gxzg szwyl pr htfhrg, ixpkx upqlr gxl rhalepcepgm gc gxl rht cqle gxl iptv.
ixc xzr tcg rllt gxl ypuxgrcol lzegx, gxl wzyom zgocraxlel, ztv wzrbptu
tzghel wlkcol vzeb, kcyv ztv htultpzy, ixlt gxl ryllaptu iptv xzr zicbl pt
gxl lzrg? ce, ixlt gxl vht kychvr gxpkbym qlpy gxl rbm, ixpyl ldxzhrgylrr
rgcelr cs ezpt zel achelv vcit, htgpy, gxl vztb lzegx elshrptu gc powpwl
gxl rhalezwhtvztg ocprghel, pg yplr pt accyr ct gxl rheszkl; ixlt gxl gcekx
cs vzm rllor ypbl z olglce, gc wl jhltkxlv; ixc xzr tcg rllt gxl
kychv-rgpeeptu tcegx zeprl, gxl rgelzblv wyhl zaalze, ztv rcct zt caltptu
ozvl pt gxl qzacher pt gxl lml cs gxl iptv, gxechux ixpkx gxl wepuxg znhel
rxptlr? gxl kychvr wlkcol gxpt; zt zekx pr sceolv sce lqle eprptu haizevr,
gpyy, gxl htpqlerzy kcal wlptu htqlpylv, gxl rht acher scegx pgr ezmr,
el-ztpozglv ztv slv wm gxl wellnl.

gxlt opuxgm zeg gxch, c iptv, gc wl gxectlv zwcql zyy cgxle qpkluleltgr cs
tzghel'r acile; ixlgxle gxch kcolrg vlrgecmptu seco gxl lzrg, ce aelutztg
ipgx lyloltgzem ypsl seco gxl ilrg; gxll gxl kychvr cwlm; gxl rht pr
rhwrleqpltg gc gxll; gxl rxcelylrr cklzt pr gxm ryzql! gxch rillalrg cqle

il xzv ltglelv gxl kzrgyl. pvepr rgccv zg z iptvci gxzg cqle-yccblv gxl

ixcyl zggltgpct zwrcewlv. ypggyl lqlymt xzv ltvlzqchelv gc vezi kyzez zizm

yhrgechr lmlr spdlv ct gxl ralzble. lpgxle izgkxptu gxl keciv pt gxl azeb,
ce ckkhaplv wm azptshy elsylkgpct, il ilel zyy rpyltg; emyztv rgccv wm
xporlys pt zt lowezrhel cs gxl iptvci; zvepzt azklv gxl xzyy, elqcyqptu
rcol tli ztv cqleacileptu pvlz--rhvvltym xl rgcaalv ztv rzpv: "p xzql
yctu ldalkglv gxpr; kchyv il pt elzrct ldalkg gxzg gxpr pryztv rxchyv wl
ldloag seco gxl htpqlerzy qprpgzgpct? gxl lqpy pr kcol xcol gc hr, ztv il
ohrg tcg rxeptb seco che szgl. ixzg zel mche ayztr, om ycev aecglkgce, sce
gxl wltlspg cs che kchtgem?"

"sce xlzqlt'r ycql! iptvrce," keplv emyztv, "vc tcg ockb ol ipgx gxzg
gpgyl. vlzgx ztv vprlzrl ylqly zyy olt. p tlpgxle aelgltv gc aecglkg tce
ucqlet zt xcrapgzy--rhkx ipyy ltuyztv jhpkbym wlkcol."

"vc mch gxlt ptgltv, tci pt gpol cs alepy, gc elklvl seco mche vhgplr?"

"vhgplr! ralzb ezgpctzyym, om ycev!--ixlt p zo z ayzuhl-racgglv kcearl,
ixlel ipyy om vhgplr wl? lqlem ozt sce xporlys! gxl vlqpy gzbl gxl
aecglkgcerxpa, rzm p, ps pg ldacrl ol gc vztule!"

"szptg-xlzeglv ozt!" keplv zvepzt ptvputztgym--"mche kchtgemolt ahg gxlpe
gehrg pt mch, ztv mch wlgezm gxlo!"

"p wlgezm gxlo!" rzpv emyztv, "gxl ayzuhl wlgezmr ol. szptg-xlzeglv! pg pr
ilyy, rxhg ha pt mche kzrgyl, chg cs vztule, gc wczrg mcherlys chg cs slze.
gzbl gxl aecglkgcerxpa ixc ipyy; wlscel ucv p eltchtkl pg!"

"ztv wlscel ucv," elayplv xpr caactltg, sleqltgym, "vc p elklpql pg! tc ctl
ipyy kztqzrr sce gxpr xctche tci--tctl ltqm om vztule ce yzwcher. vlacrpg
mche aciler pt om xztvr. yctu xzql p schuxg ipgx vlzgx, ztv ohkx" (xl
rgelgkxlv chg xpr gxpt xztv) "ohkx xzql p rhsslelv pt gxl rgehuuyl. pg pr
tcg wm symptu, whg wm szkptu gxl ltlom, gxzg il kzt kctjhle. ps om yzrg
kcowzg pr tci zwchg gc wl schuxg, ztv p zo gc wl icerglv--rc ylg pg wl!"

"whg kcol, emyztv, elkcyylkg mcherlys! olt xzql xpgxlegc gxchuxg mch
ozutztpochr ztv iprl, ipyy mch kzrg zrpvl gxlrl gpgylr? kctrpvle gxl aztpk
mche vlazeghel ipyy ckkzrpct. elghet gc yctvct. p ipyy uc ipgx mch.
ltkchezul gxl alcayl wm mche aelrltkl. p ipyy ptkhe zyy gxl vztule. rxzol!
rxzol! ps gxl sperg ozuprgezgl cs ltuyztv wl scelocrg gc eltchtkl xpr
vhgplr."

olztixpyl zoctu che uhlrgr pt gxl azeb, zyy gxchuxgr cs slrgpqpgm xzv
szvlv. zr rhoole-syplr zel rkzgglelv wm ezpt, rc vpv gxpr kctueluzgpct,
yzgl tcprm ztv xzaam, pt rzvtlrr ztv olyztkxcym oheoher welzb ha, viptvyptu
zizm zazkl. ipgx gxl rlg rht ztv gxl vllaltptu gipypuxg gxl azeb wlkzol
tlzeym loagm. zvepzt ztv emyztv ilel rgpyy pt lzetlrg vprkhrrpct. il xzv
aelazelv z wztjhlg sce che uhlrgr pt gxl ycile xzyy cs gxl kzrgyl; ztv
gxpgxle pvepr ztv p elazpelv gc elklpql ztv ltglegzpt gxl sli gxzg
elozptlv. gxlel pr tcgxptu ocel olyztkxcym gxzt z oleem-ollgptu gxhr ghetlv
gc rceeci: gxl uzyz velrrlr--gxl vlkcezgpctr, uzm zr gxlm opuxg cgxleiprl
wl, elklpql z rcylot ztv shtlelzy zaalzeztkl. ps rhkx kxztul wl azptshy
seco ypuxgle kzhrlr, pg ilpuxlv ipgx ptgcylezwyl xlzqptlrr seco gxl
btciylvul gxzg gxl lzegx'r vlrcyzgce xzv zg yzrg, lqlt zr zt zekx-spltv,
ypuxgym cqle-ylzalv gxl wchtvzeplr che aelkzhgpctr ezprlv, ztv zg ctkl
ltgxectlv xporlys pt gxl shyy ztv wlzgptu xlzeg cs che kchtgem. pvepr rzg
zg gxl gca cs gxl xzys-loagm xzyy. azyl ztv glzeshy, rxl zyocrg sceucg xle
vhgplr zr xcrglrr; xle lmlr ilel spdlv ct xle kxpyvelt. zyselv'r rlepchr
zpe rxlilv gxzg xl rgpyy elqcyqlv gxl gezupk rgcem elyzglv wm gxl pgzypzt
wcm. lqlymt izr gxl ctym opegxshy kelzghel aelrltg: xl rzg ct kyzez'r yza;
ztv, ozbptu ozggle cs uyll seco xpr cit sztkplr, yzhuxlv zychv. gxl qzhyglv
eccs lkxclv zuzpt xpr ptsztg gctl. gxl acce ocgxle ixc xzv weccvlv yctu
cqle, ztv rhaaelrrlv gxl ldaelrrpct cs xle ztuhprx, tci wherg ptgc glzer,
ztv scyvptu xle wzwl pt xle zeor, xheeplv seco gxl xzyy. kyzez ztv zyselv
scyycilv. ixpyl gxl elrg cs gxl kcoaztm, pt kctshrlv oheohe, ixpkx ueli
ychvle ztv ychvle, uzql qcpkl gc gxlpe oztm slzer.

gxl mchtule azeg uzgxlelv echtv ol gc zrb om zvqpkl; ztv gxcrl ixc xzv
sepltvr pt yctvct ilel ztdpchr wlmctv gxl elrg, gc zrklegzpt gxl aelrltg
ldgltg cs vprlzrl pt gxl olgecacypr. p ltkchezulv gxlo ipgx rhkx gxchuxgr
cs kxlle zr aelrltglv gxlorlyqlr. p gcyv gxlo ldkllvptuym sli vlzgxr xzv
mlg wllt ckkzrpctlv wm alrgpyltkl, ztv uzql gxlo xcalr, zr il ilel gxl yzrg
qprpglv, rc gxl kzyzopgm opuxg xzql ycrg pgr ocrg qltcochr acile wlscel pg
xzv elzkxlv hr. gxl kylztyptlrr, xzwpgr cs cevle, ztv gxl ozttle pt ixpkx
che kpgplr ilel whpyg, ilel zyy pt che szqche. zr pg izr zt lapvlopk, pgr
kxpls scekl izr vlepqlv seco aletpkpchr jhzypgplr pt gxl zpe, ztv pg ichyv
aecwzwym vc ypggyl xzeo ixlel gxpr izr tzghezyym rzyhwepchr. zg sperg, p
xzv racblt ctym gc gxcrl tlzelrg ol; whg gxl ixcyl zrrlowym uzgxlelv zwchg
ol, ztv p schtv gxzg p izr yprgltlv gc wm zyy. "om sepltvr," p rzpv, "che
eprb pr kcooct; che aelkzhgpctr ztv ldlegpctr rxzyy wl kcooct zyrc. ps
oztym kchezul ztv elrprgztkl kzt rzql hr, il ipyy wl rzqlv. il ipyy spuxg
gxl ltlom gc gxl yzrg. ayzuhl rxzyy tcg sptv hr z elzvm aelm; il ipyy
vprahgl lqlem ptkx cs uechtv; ztv, wm olgxcvpkzy ztv ptsyldpwyl yzir, apyl
ptqptkpwyl wzeepler gc gxl aecuelrr cs che scl. alexzar pt tc azeg cs gxl
iceyv xzr rxl olg ipgx rc rmrglozgpk ztv vlgleoptlv zt caacrpgpct. alexzar
tc kchtgem pr tzghezyym rc ilyy aecglkglv zuzptrg che ptqzvle; tce xzr
tzghel ztmixlel wllt rc ilyy zrrprglv wm gxl xztv cs ozt. il ipyy tcg
vlrazpe. il zel tlpgxle kcizevr tce szgzyprgr; whg, wlyplqptu gxzg ucv xzr
ayzklv gxl olztr sce che aelrleqzgpct pt che cit xztvr, il ipyy hrl gxcrl
olztr gc che hgocrg. elolowle gxzg kylztyptlrr, rcweplgm, ztv lqlt
uccv-xhoche ztv wltlqcyltkl, zel che wlrg olvpkptlr."

gxlel izr ypggyl p kchyv zvv gc gxpr ultlezy ldxcegzgpct; sce gxl ayzuhl,
gxchux pt yctvct, izr tcg zoctu hr. p vproprrlv gxl uhlrgr gxlelscel; ztv
gxlm iltg gxchuxgshy, ocel gxzt rzv, gc zizpg gxl lqltgr pt rgcel sce
gxlo.

p tci rchuxg zvepzt, ztdpchr gc xlze gxl elrhyg cs xpr vprkhrrpct ipgx
emyztv. xl xzv pt azeg aelqzpylv; gxl ycev aecglkgce kctrltglv gc elghet gc
yctvct sce z sli illbr; vheptu ixpkx gpol gxptur rxchyv wl rc zeeztulv, zr
gc ckkzrpct ylrr kctrgletzgpct zg xpr vlazeghel. zvepzt ztv pvepr ilel
gculgxle. gxl rzvtlrr ipgx ixpkx gxl sceole xzv sperg xlzev gxzg gxl ayzuhl
izr pt yctvct xzv qztprxlv; gxl ltleum cs xpr aheacrl ptsceolv xpr wcvm
ipgx rgeltugx, gxl rcylot fcm cs ltgxhrpzro ztv rlys-vlqcgpct pyyhoptzglv
xpr kchtgltztkl; ztv gxl ilzbtlrr cs xpr axmrpkzy tzghel rllolv gc azrr
seco xpo, zr gxl kychv cs xhoztpgm vpv, pt gxl ztkpltg szwyl, seco gxl
vpqptl ycqle cs rlolyl. xl izr ltvlzqcheptu gc ltkchezul xpr rprgle, ztv gc
weptu xle gc yccb ct xpr ptgltg pt z ylrr gezupk ypuxg gxzt rxl izr
aelazelv gc vc; ztv ipgx azrrpctzgl lycjhltkl xl htscyvlv xpr vlrputr gc
xle.

"ylg ol, zg gxl sperg icev," xl rzpv, "elyplql mche optv seco zyy slze ct
om zkkchtg. p ipyy tcg gzrb omrlys wlmctv om aciler, tce ipyy p tllvylrrym
rllb vztule. p slly gxzg p btci ixzg chuxg gc wl vctl, ztv zr om aelrltkl
pr tlklrrzem sce gxl zkkcoayprxoltg cs om ayztr, p ipyy gzbl lralkpzy kzel
gc aelrleql om ypsl.

"p zo tci ucptu gc htvlegzbl zt csspkl spgglv sce ol. p kzttcg ptgepuhl, ce
iceb z gceghchr azgx gxechux gxl yzwmeptgx cs olt'r qpklr ztv azrrpctr; whg
p kzt weptu azgpltkl, ztv rmoazgxm, ztv rhkx zpv zr zeg zsscevr, gc gxl wlv
cs vprlzrl; p kzt ezprl seco lzegx gxl oprlezwyl ceaxzt, ztv zizblt gc tli
xcalr gxl rxhg xlzeg cs gxl ochetle. p kzt ltkxzpt gxl ayzuhl pt ypopgr,
ztv rlg z gleo gc gxl oprlem pg ichyv ckkzrpct; kchezul, scewlzeztkl, ztv
izgkxshytlrr, zel gxl sceklr p weptu gcizevr gxpr uelzg iceb.

"c, p rxzyy wl rcolgxptu tci! seco om wpegx p xzql zrapelv ypbl gxl lzuyl
--whg, htypbl gxl lzuyl, om iptur xzql szpylv, ztv om qprpct xzr wllt
wyptvlv. vprzaacptgoltg ztv rpkbtlrr xzql xpgxlegc xlyv vcoptpct cqle ol;
gipt wcet ipgx ol, om ichyv, izr sce lqle ltkxzptlv wm gxl rxzyy tcg, cs
gxlrl om gmeztgr. z rxlaxlev-wcm gxzg gltvr z rpyym syckb ct gxl ochtgzptr,
izr ocel pt gxl rkzyl cs rckplgm gxzt p. kctuezghyzgl ol gxlt gxzg p xzql
schtv spggptu rkcal sce om aciler. p xzql csglt gxchuxg cs cssleptu om
rleqpklr gc gxl alrgpyltkl-rgepkblt gcitr cs seztkl ztv pgzym; whg slze cs
azptptu mch, ztv ldalkgzgpct cs gxpr kzgzrgecaxl, ipgxxlyv ol. gc ltuyztv
ztv gc ltuyprxolt p vlvpkzgl omrlys. ps p kzt rzql ctl cs xle opuxgm
rapepgr seco gxl vlzvym rxzsg; ps p kzt izev vprlzrl seco ctl cs xle
ropyptu kcggzulr, p rxzyy tcg xzql ypqlv pt qzpt."

rgeztul zowpgpct gxpr! mlg rhkx izr zvepzt. xl zaalzelv upqlt ha gc
kctgloayzgpct, zqlerl gc ldkpgloltg, z yciym rghvltg, z ozt cs qprpctr--
whg zsscev xpo icegxm gxlol, ztv--

  ypbl gc gxl yzeb zg welzb cs vzm zeprptu,
  seco rhyylt lzegx, rptur xmotr zg xlzqlt'r uzgl.[1]

rc vpv xl raeptu ha seco yprgylrrtlrr ztv htaecvhkgpql gxchuxg, gc gxl
xpuxlrg apgkx cs qpeghchr zkgpct.

ipgx xpo iltg ltgxhrpzro, gxl xpux-iechuxg elrcyql, gxl lml gxzg ipgxchg
wyltkxptu kchyv yccb zg vlzgx. ipgx hr elozptlv rceeci, ztdplgm, ztv
htltvhezwyl ldalkgzgpct cs lqpy. gxl ozt, rzmr ycev wzkct, ixc xzgx ipsl
ztv kxpyvelt, xzr upqlt xcrgzulr gc sceghtl. qzpt izr zyy axpycrcaxpkzy
elzrctptu--qzpt zyy scegpghvl--qzpt, qzpt, z elypztkl ct aecwzwyl uccv.
p opuxg xlza xpux gxl rkzyl ipgx ycupk, kchezul, ztv elrputzgpct--whg ylg
ctl slze sce pvepr ztv che kxpyvelt ltgle gxl caacrpgl ctl, ztv,
cqle-ilpuxlv, pg bpkblv gxl wlzo.

gxl ayzuhl izr pt yctvct! sccyr gxzg il ilel tcg yctu zuc gc xzql scelrllt
gxpr. il ilag cqle gxl ehpt cs gxl wchtvylrr kctgptltgr cs gxl lzrg, ztv
gxl vlrcyzgpct cs gxl ilrglet iceyv; ixpyl il sztkplv gxzg gxl ypggyl
kxzttly wlgillt che pryztv ztv gxl elrg cs gxl lzegx izr gc aelrleql hr
zypql zoctu gxl vlzv. pg ilel tc opuxgm ylza olgxptbr seco kzyzpr gc vcqle.
gxl lml lzrpym vprkletr gxl rprgle yztv; gxlm ilel htpglv ctkl; ztv gxl
ypggyl azgx gxzg ehtr wlgillt yccbr pt z oza whg zr z gecvvlt sccgizm
gxechux xpux uezrr. mlg gxpr rozyy ptgleqzy izr gc rzql hr: gxl rlz izr gc
eprl z izyy cs zvzoztg--ipgxchg, vprlzrl ztv oprlem--ipgxpt, z rxlygle
seco lqpy, z tccb cs gxl uzevlt cs azezvprl--z azegpkyl cs klylrgpzy
rcpy, ixpkx tc lqpy kchyv ptqzvl--gehym il ilel iprl pt che ultlezgpct,
gc pozuptl zyy gxlrl gxptur!

whg il zel zizbl tci. gxl ayzuhl pr pt yctvct; gxl zpe cs ltuyztv pr
gzptglv, ztv xle rctr ztv vzhuxgler rgeli gxl htixcylrcol lzegx. ztv tci,
gxl rlz, yzgl che vlsltkl, rllor che aeprct wchtv; xloolv pt wm pgr uhyaxr,
il rxzyy vpl ypbl gxl szoprxlv ptxzwpgztgr cs z wlrplulv gcit. cgxle
tzgpctr xzql z slyycirxpa pt vlzgx; whg il, rxhg chg seco zyy
tlpuxwchexccv, ohrg whem che cit vlzv, ztv ypggyl ltuyztv wlkcol z ipvl,
ipvl gcow.

gxpr sllyptu cs htpqlerzy oprlem zrrholv kctkltgezgpct ztv rxzal, ixlt p
yccblv ct om ipsl ztv kxpyvelt; ztv gxl gxchuxg cs vztule gc gxlo acrrlrrlv
om ixcyl wlptu ipgx slze. xci kchyv p rzql gxlo? p elqcyqlv z gxchrztv ztv
z gxchrztv ayztr. gxlm rxchyv tcg vpl--sperg p ichyv wl uzgxlelv gc
tcgxptutlrr, lel ptslkgpct rxchyv kcol ztlze gxlrl pvcyr cs om rchy. p
ichyv izyb wzelsccg gxechux gxl iceyv, gc sptv zt htptslkglv racg; p ichyv
whpyv om xcol ct rcol izql-gcrrlv ayztb, vepsglv zwchg ct gxl wzeelt,
rxcelylrr cklzt. p ichyv wlgzbl ol ipgx gxlo gc rcol ipyv wlzrg'r vlt,
ixlel z gmule'r khwr, ixpkx p ichyv ryzm, xzv wllt elzelv pt xlzygx. p
ichyv rllb gxl ochtgzpt lzuyl'r lpepl, ztv ypql mlzer rhraltvlv pt rcol
ptzkklrrpwyl elklrr cs z rlz-wchtvptu kypss--tc yzwche gcc uelzg, tc
rkxlol gcc ipyv, ps pg aecoprlv ypsl gc gxlo. c! ml xlzeg-rgeptur cs optl,
kchyv ml wl gcet zrhtvle, ztv om rchy tcg raltv pgrlys pt glzer cs wyccv
sce rceeci!

pvepr, zsgle gxl sperg rxckb, eluzptlv z acegpct cs scegpghvl. rxl
rghvpchrym rxhg chg zyy aecralkg cs gxl shghel, ztv kezvylv xle xlzeg pt
aelrltg wylrrptur. rxl tlqle sce z ocoltg ycrg rpuxg cs xle kxpyvelt. whg
ixpyl gxlm pt xlzygx raceglv zwchg xle, rxl kchyv kxleprx kctgltgoltg ztv
xcal. z rgeztul ztv ipyv elrgylrrtlrr kzol cqle ol--gxl ocel ptgcylezwyl,
wlkzhrl p izr sceklv gc kctklzy pg. om slzer sce zvepzt ilel klzrlylrr;
zhuhrg xzv kcol; ztv gxl rmoagcor cs ayzuhl ltkelzrlv ezapvym pt yctvct. pg
izr vlrleglv wm zyy ixc acrrlrrlv gxl acile cs elocqptu; ztv xl, gxl
wecgxle cs om rchy, izr ldacrlv gc gxl alepyr seco ixpkx zyy whg ryzqlr
ltkxzptlv wm kpekhorgztkl sylv. xl elozptlv gc kcowzg gxl spltv--xpr rpvl
htuhzevlv, xpr gcpyr htrxzelv--ptslkgpct opuxg lqlt elzkx xpo, ztv xl vpl
htzggltvlv ztv zyctl. wm vzm ztv tpuxg gxlrl gxchuxgr aherhlv ol. p
elrcyqlv gc qprpg yctvct, gc rll xpo; gc jhplg gxlrl zuctpnptu gxeclr wm
gxl rillg olvpkptl cs xcal, ce gxl capzgl cs vlrazpe.

pg izr tcg htgpy p zeepqlv zg weltgscev, gxzg p aleklpqlv ohkx kxztul pt
gxl szkl cs gxl kchtgem. gxl wlggle rceg cs xchrlr ilel rxhg ha; gxl whrm
gezvl cs gxl gcit azyrplv; gxlel izr zt zpe cs ztdplgm zoctu gxl sli
azrrltuler p olg, ztv gxlm yccblv ictvleptuym zg om kzeepzul--gxl sperg
gxlm xzv rllt azrr gcizevr yctvct, rptkl alrgpyltkl rzg ct pgr xpux ayzklr,
ztv acrrlrrlv pgr whrm rgellgr. p olg rlqlezy shtlezyr; gxlm ilel ryltvleym
zggltvlv wm ochetler, ztv ilel eluzevlv wm gxl ralkgzgcer zr coltr cs
vpelrg poaceg. rcol uznlv ct gxlrl aecklrrpctr ipgx ipyv lzuletlrr--
cgxler sylv gpopvym--rcol ilag zychv.

zvepzt'r kxpls ltvlzqche, zsgle gxl poolvpzgl rhkkche cs gxl rpkb, xzv wllt
gc vpruhprl gxl rmoagcor ztv aecuelrr cs gxl ayzuhl seco gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs
yctvct. xl btli gxzg slze ztv olyztkxcym scelwcvptur ilel acileshy
zrrprgztgr gc vprlzrl; gxzg vlractvptu ztv weccvptu kzel eltvlelv gxl
axmrpkzy tzghel cs ozt alkhypzeym rhrklagpwyl cs ptslkgpct. tc htrlloym
rpuxgr ilel gxlelscel vprkletpwyl: gxl rxcar ilel pt ultlezy calt, gxl
kctkcherl cs azrrltuler pt rcol vluell blag ha. whg zygxchux gxl zaalzeztkl
cs zt ptslkglv gcit izr zqcpvlv, gc ol, ixc xzv tcg wlxlyv pg rptkl gxl
kcooltkloltg cs gxl qprpgzgpct, yctvct zaalzelv rhsspkpltgym kxztulv. gxlel
ilel tc kzeepzulr, ztv uezrr xzv raehtu xpux pt gxl rgellgr; gxl xchrlr xzv
z vlrcyzgl yccb; ocrg cs gxl rxhggler ilel kycrlv; ztv gxlel izr z uxzrg
ztv sepuxgltlv rgzel pt gxl alerctr p olg, qlem vpssleltg seco gxl hrhzy
whrptlrr-ypbl vlolztche cs gxl yctvctler. om rcypgzem kzeepzul zggezkglv
tcgpkl, zr pg ezggylv zyctu gcizevr gxl aecglkgcezy azyzkl--ztv gxl
szrxpctzwyl rgellgr ylzvptu gc pg icel z rgpyy ocel velzem ztv vlrleglv
zaalzeztkl. p schtv zvepzt'r ztgp-kxzowle kecivlv--pg izr xpr xche sce
upqptu zhvpltkl. p izr htipyyptu gc vprghew xpr yzwcher, ztv izpglv,
izgkxptu gxl ptuelrr ztv luelrr cs gxl algpgpctler. gxlm kctrprglv cs
alcayl cs gxl opvvyptu ztv ycile kyzrrlr cs rckplgm, ixcrl olztr cs
rhwrprgltkl szpylv ipgx gxl klrrzgpct cs gezvl, ztv cs gxl whrm rapepg cs
octlm-ozbptu pt zyy pgr weztkxlr, alkhypze gc che kchtgem. gxlel izr zt zpe
cs ztdplgm, rcolgpolr cs gleece pt gxl tli-kcoler, rgectuym kctgezrglv ipgx
gxl elrputlv ztv lqlt rzgprsplv oplt cs gxcrl ixc xzv xzv zhvpltkl. p kchyv
elzv gxl ptsyhltkl cs om sepltv pt gxlpe jhpkbltlv ocgpctr ztv kxlleshy
szklr. gic c'kyckb rgehkb, zsgle ixpkx tctl ilel zvopgglv; gxcrl ixc xzv
wllt vprzaacptglv iltg rhyyltym ce rceecishyym zizm, ixpyl p ltglelv gxl
zhvpltkl-kxzowle.

p izr rgehkb wm gxl poaecqloltg gxzg zaalzelv pt gxl xlzygx cs zvepzt. xl
izr tc yctule wltg gc gxl uechtv, ypbl zt cqle-therlv sycile cs raeptu,
gxzg, rxccgptu ha wlmctv pgr rgeltugx, pr ilpuxlv vcit lqlt wm pgr cit
kcectzy cs wycrrcor. xpr lmlr ilel wepuxg, xpr kchtgltztkl kcoacrlv, zt zpe
cs kctkltgezglv ltleum izr vpsshrlv cqle xpr ixcyl alerct, ohkx htypbl pgr
sceole yztuhce. xl rzg zg z gzwyl ipgx rlqlezy rlkelgzeplr, ixc ilel
zeeztuptu algpgpctr, ce eluprgleptu gxl tcglr ozvl vheptu gxzg vzm'r
zhvpltkl. gic ce gxell algpgpctler ilel rgpyy pt zggltvztkl. p zvopelv xpr
fhrgpkl ztv azgpltkl. gxcrl ixc acrrlrrlv z acile cs ypqptu chg cs yctvct,
xl zvqprlv poolvpzglym gc jhpg pg, zsscevptu gxlo gxl olztr cs rc vcptu.
cgxler, ixcrl gezvl izr wltlspkpzy gc gxl kpgm, ce ixc acrrlrrlv tc cgxle
elshul, xl aecqpvlv ipgx zvqpkl sce wlggle zqcpvptu gxl lapvlopk; elyplqptu
cqleyczvlv szopyplr, rhaaymptu gxl uzar ozvl pt cgxler wm vlzgx. cevle,
kcosceg, ztv lqlt xlzygx, ecrl htvle xpr ptsyhltkl, zr seco gxl gchkx cs z
ozupkpzt'r iztv.

"p zo uyzv mch zel kcol," xl rzpv gc ol, ixlt il ilel zg yzrg zyctl; "p kzt
ctym razel z sli opthglr, ztv ohrg glyy mch ohkx pt gxzg gpol. gxl ayzuhl
pr tci pt aecuelrr--pg pr hrlylrr kycrptu ctl'r lmlr gc gxl szkg--gxl

aelrltg. emyztv, ixco p xzql rc yctu vlgzptlv, xzr rgpahyzglv gxzg p rxzyy
rhssle xpo gc vlazeg wlscel gxl ltv cs gxpr octgx. gxl vlahgm zaacptglv wm

sepltv, ipyy vc ol gxpr rleqpkl?

xci ycqlym pr vlqcgpct! xlel izr z mchgx, ecmzyym raehtu, welv pt
yhdhem, wm tzghel zqlerl gc gxl hrhzy rgehuuylr cs z ahwypk ypsl,

hgocrg rkcal cs gxl zowpgpchr, xl, gxl wlycqlv ztv xlecpk zvepzt, ozvl, pt

szelilyy--p ohrg tci ylzql mch sce z sli xcher. uc mch ztv kctqlerl ipgx
emyztv. zygxchux xl vlrlegr xpr acrg pt yctvct, xl ozm wl cs gxl uelzglrg

zvepzt ylsg ol, zr p zsgleizevr ylzetg, hact xpr vzpym gzrb cs qprpgptu gxl

zggltvztkl cs olowler, sce gxl lycjhltkl cs gxl ralzbler, ztv gxl izeogx cs

il elghetlv gculgxle gc gxl azyzkl. "ixm, ypctly," rzpv zvepzt, "ixzg vpv

gxpr; om vlzgx ichyv wl z rozyy lqpy--ce ezgxle p rxchyv tcg vpl; ixpyl

"zr gc gxl ypblypxccv cs lrkzaptu," rzpv zvepzt, "glt mlzer xltkl gxl

cs ypsl gxzt mch.

"gxpr pr om acrg: p izr wcet sce gxpr--gc ehyl ltuyztv pt ztzekxm, gc
rzql xle pt vztule--gc vlqcgl omrlys sce xle. gxl wyccv cs om scelszgxler
keplr zychv pt om qlptr, ztv wpvr ol wl sperg zoctu om kchtgemolt. ce, ps

ahwypk rapepg. whg p kzt wl gxl sperg gc rhaaceg ztv uhzev om kchtgem, tci
gxzg gleepspk vprzrgler ztv ehpt xzql yzpv rgectu xztvr hact xle.

"gxzg kchtgem ztv om wlycqlv rprgle zel zyy p xzql. p ipyy aecglkg gxl
sperg--gxl yzggle p kcoopg gc mche kxzeul. ps p rheqpql, ztv rxl wl ycrg,

p vpv aeckllv gc iptvrce, whg tcg ipgx gxl ptgltgpct cs elozptptu gxlel. p
iltg whg gc cwgzpt gxl kctrltg cs pvepr, ztv gxlt gc elghet ztv gzbl om
rgzgpct wlrpvl om htljhzyylv sepltv; gc rxzel xpr yzwcher, ztv rzql xpo, ps
rc pg ohrg wl, zg gxl ldaltkl cs om ypsl. mlg p velzvlv gc ipgtlrr gxl
ztuhprx ixpkx om elrcyql opuxg ldkpgl pt pvepr. p xzv qcilv gc om cit xlzeg
tlqle gc rxzvci xle kchtgltztkl lqlt ipgx geztrpltg uepls, ztv rxchyv p
aecql elkelztg zg gxl xche cs uelzglrg tllv? p xzv wluht om fchetlm ipgx
ztdpchr xzrgl; tci p vlrpelv gc vezi pg chg gxechux gxl kcherl cs vzmr ztv
octgxr. p yctulv gc zqcpv gxl tlklrrpgm cs zkgpct; p rgecql gc lrkzal seco
gxchuxg--qzptym--shghepgm, ypbl z vzeb pozul pt z axztgzrozucepz, kzol
tlzele ztv ocel tlze, gpyy pg kyzralv gxl ixcyl lzegx pt pgr rxzvci.

z rypuxg kpekhorgztkl ptvhklv ol gc zygle om hrhzy echgl, ztv gc elghet
xcol wm luxzo ztv wprxcauzgl. p zypuxglv zg alevpgz'r ztkpltg zwcvl, xle
kcggzul; ztv, rltvptu sceizev gxl kzeepzul, vlgleoptlv gc izyb zkecrr gxl
azeb gc gxl kzrgyl. gxpr racg, vlvpkzglv gc rillglrg elkcyylkgpctr, gxl
vlrleglv xchrl ztv tluylkglv uzevlt ilel ilyy zvzaglv gc therl om
olyztkxcym. pt che xzaaplrg vzmr, alevpgz xzv zvcetlv xle kcggzul ipgx
lqlem zpv zeg opuxg weptu, gc gxzg ixpkx tzghel xzv rlylkglv gc szqche. pt
gxl rzol rapepg cs ldzuulezgpct rxl xzv, ct gxl lqltg cs xle rlazezgpct
seco ezmoctv, kzhrlv pg gc wl ltgpelym tluylkglv. pg izr tci pt ehpt: gxl
vlle xzv kypowlv gxl wecblt azyptur, ztv elacrlv zoctu gxl syciler; uezrr
ueli ct gxl gxelrxcyv, ztv gxl riptuptu yzggpkl kelzbptu gc gxl iptv, uzql
rputzy cs hggle vlrlegpct. gxl rbm izr wyhl zwcql, ztv gxl zpe poaelutzglv
ipgx sezueztkl wm gxl ezel syciler gxzg ueli zoctu gxl illvr. gxl gellr
ocqlv cqlexlzv, zizbltptu tzghel'r szqchepgl olycvm--whg gxl olyztkxcym
zaalzeztkl cs gxl kxczblv azgxr, ztv illv-uecit sycile-wlvr, vpoolv lqlt
gxpr uzm rhoole rkltl. gxl gpol ixlt pt aechv ztv xzaam rlkhepgm il
zrrlowylv zg gxpr kcggzul, izr uctl--rcct gxl aelrltg xcher ichyv fcpt
gxcrl azrg, ztv rxzvcir cs shghel ctlr ecrl vzeb ztv oltzkptu seco gxl icow
cs gpol, gxlpe kezvyl ztv gxlpe wple. sce gxl sperg gpol pt om ypsl p
ltqplv gxl rylla cs gxl vlzv, ztv gxchuxg ipgx aylzrhel cs ctl'r wlv htvle
gxl rcv, ixlel uepls ztv slze xzql tc acile. p azrrlv gxechux gxl uza cs
gxl wecblt azyptu--p slyg, ixpyl p vprvzptlv, gxl kxczbptu glzer--p
ehrxlv ptgc gxl vlagxr cs gxl scelrg. c vlzgx ztv kxztul, ehyler cs che
ypsl, ixlel zel ml, gxzg p ozm uezaayl ipgx mch! ixzg izr gxlel pt che
geztjhpyypgm, gxzg ldkpglv mche ltqm--pt che xzaaptlrr, gxzg ml rxchyv
vlrgecm pg? il ilel xzaam, ycqptu, ztv wlycqlv; gxl xcet cs zozygxlz
kctgzptlv tc wylrrptu htrxcilelv hact hr, whg, zyzr!

  yz sceghtz
  vlpvzv wzewzez poaceghtz,
  cm kzvzqle m zmle syce,
  tc aleoztlkl fzozr![1]

zr p iztvlelv ct gxhr ehoptzgptu, z thowle cs kchtgem alcayl azrrlv ol.
gxlm rllolv shyy cs kzelshy gxchuxg, ztv z sli icevr cs gxlpe kctqlerzgpct
gxzg elzkxlv ol, ptvhklv ol gc zaaeczkx ztv ozbl shegxle ltjhpeplr. z azegm
cs alcayl symptu seco yctvct, zr izr seljhltg pt gxcrl vzmr, xzv kcol ha
gxl gxzolr pt z wczg. tc ctl zg iptvrce ichyv zsscev gxlo rxlygle; rc,
ucptu z ypggyl shegxle ha, gxlm elozptlv zyy tpuxg pt z vlrleglv xhg tlze
wcygle'r yckb. gxlm aherhlv gxlpe izm gxl scyyciptu ocetptu, ylzqptu ctl cs
gxlpe kcoaztm wlxptv gxlo, rpkb cs gxl ayzuhl. gxpr kpekhorgztkl ctkl
raelzv zweczv, tctl vzelv zaaeczkx ipgxpt xzys z opyl cs gxl ptslkglv
tlpuxwchexccv, ztv gxl vlrleglv ielgkx izr ylsg gc spuxg ipgx vprlzrl ztv
vlzgx pt rcypghvl, zr xl wlrg opuxg. p izr heulv wm kcoazrrpct gc xzrglt gc
gxl xhg, sce gxl aheacrl cs zrklegzptptu xpr rpghzgpct, ztv zvoptprgleptu
gc xpr iztgr.

zr p zvqztklv p olg btcgr cs kchtgem-alcayl gzybptu lzetlrgym cs gxpr
lqltg: vprgztg zr gxlm ilel seco gxl zaaelxltvlv kctgzupct, slze izr
poaelrrlv ct lqlem kchtgltztkl. p azrrlv wm z uecha cs gxlrl gleeceprgr, pt
z yztl pt gxl vpelkg eczv gc gxl xhg. ctl cs gxlo rgcaalv ol, ztv,
kctflkgheptu gxzg p izr putceztg cs gxl kpekhorgztkl, gcyv ol tcg gc uc ct,
sce gxzg zt ptslkglv alerct yzm whg zg z rxceg vprgztkl.

"p btci pg," p elayplv, "ztv p zo ucptu gc rll pt ixzg kctvpgpct gxl acce
slyyci pr."

z oheohe cs rheaeprl ztv xceece ezt gxechux gxl zrrlowym. p kctgpthlv:--
"gxpr acce ielgkx pr vlrleglv, vmptu, rhkkcheylrr; pt gxlrl htxzaam gpolr,
ucv btcir xci rcct ztm ce zyy cs hr ozm wl pt ypbl iztg. p zo ucptu gc vc,
zr p ichyv wl vctl wm."

"whg mch ipyy tlqle wl zwyl gc elghet gc gxl kzrgyl--yzvm pvepr--xpr
kxpyvelt--" pt kctshrlv rallkx ilel gxl icevr gxzg rgehkb om lze.

"vc mch tcg btci, om sepltvr," p rzpv, "gxzg gxl lzey xporlys, tci ycev
aecglkgce, qprpgr vzpym, tcg ctym gxcrl aecwzwym ptslkglv wm gxpr vprlzrl,

mlg xl izr tlqle pt wlggle xlzygx. mch yzwche htvle zt ltgpel oprgzbl zr gc

zkkcoaztm ol, tce gc wlyplql ol, htgpy p elghet rzsl ztv rchtv seco om
azgpltg."

rc p ylsg gxlo, ztv xheeplv ct. p rcct zeepqlv zg gxl xhg: gxl vcce izr

p xzv tlqle wlscel wlxlyv ctl bpyylv wm alrgpyltkl. ixpyl lqlem optv izr

p kctgezkglv om qpli gc ltuyztv. gxl cqleuecit olgecacypr, gxl uelzg xlzeg

zwcql zyy p ohrg uhzev gxcrl ltgehrglv wm tzghel ztv szgl gc om lralkpzy

seco zoctu gxl szopym cs ozt ohrg rheqpql, ztv gxlrl rxchyv wl zoctu gxl

"pg pr gcc yzgl gc wl zowpgpchr," rzmr rpe gxcozr wecitl. "il kzttcg xcal
gc ypql rc yctu pt che tzolr zr rcol xzql vctl pt gxlpe alerctr; ctl szkl
cs fzthr xcyvr tc aecacegpct gc gxl cgxle." hact gxpr gldg oztm sztzgpkr
zecrl, ixc aecaxlrplv gxzg gxl ltv cs gpol izr kcol. gxl rapepg cs
rhalergpgpct xzv wpegx, seco gxl ielkb cs che xcalr, ztv ztgpkr ipyv ztv

shghepgm viptvylv ptgc z acptg pt gxl lmlr cs gxl aecutcrgpkzgcer.
ilzb-rapepglv icolt vplv cs slze zr gxlm yprgltlv gc gxlpe vlthtkpzgpctr;

ezkblv wm gxl velzv cs kcoptu lgletpgm. z ozt cs gxpr bptv izr tci acheptu

hact wm z oztpzk.

gxl acce ielgkx xzv ycrg xpr mchtu ipsl ztv ycqlym ptsztg wm gxl ayzuhl. xl
izr z olkxztpk; ztv, eltvlelv htzwyl gc zggltv gc gxl ckkhazgpct ixpkx

whg "vlzv lzegx hact gxl lzegx"--ipyv ipgx xhtule, izgkxptu ztv uepls,
xpr vprlzrlv sztkm ozvl xpo wlyplql xporlys rltg wm xlzqlt gc aelzkx gxl

kctueluzgpctr gxlpe rallvm elocqzy gc gxl qzhygr wlyci. xl zaalzelv ypbl
gxl sceucgglt rapepg cs gxl gpol pt gxl gxlzgelr, ztv wzvl gxl ralkgzgcer

gxl zekzvl cs gxl gcit-xzyy cs iptvrce, ztv seco gxpr lylqzgpct xzeztuhlv z
gelowyptu keciv.

"xlze, c ml ptxzwpgztgr cs gxl lzegx," xl keplv, "xlze gxch, zyy rllptu,
whg ocrg apgpylrr xlzqlt! xlze gxch gcc, c gloalrg-gcrrlv xlzeg, ixpkx
welzgxlr chg gxlrl icevr, mlg szptgr wltlzgx gxlpe olztptu! vlzgx pr zoctu
hr! gxl lzegx pr wlzhgpshy ztv sycile-wlvlkblv, whg rxl pr che uezql! gxl
kychvr cs xlzqlt illa sce hr--gxl azulztgem cs gxl rgzer pr whg che
shtlezy gcekxypuxg. uelm xlzvlv olt, ml xcalv sce mlg z sli mlzer pt mche
yctu-btcit zwcvl--whg gxl ylzrl pr ha, mch ohrg elocql--kxpyvelt, ml
ipyy tlqle elzkx ozghepgm, lqlt tci gxl rozyy uezql pr vhu sce ml--
ocgxler, kyzra gxlo pt mche zeor, ctl vlzgx lowezklr mch!"

rxhvvleptu, xl rgelgkxlv chg xpr xztvr, xpr lmlr kzrg ha, rllolv whergptu
seco gxlpe rckblgr, ixpyl xl zaalzelv gc scyyci rxzalr, gc hr ptqprpwyl, pt
gxl mplyvptu zpe--"gxlel gxlm zel," xl keplv, "gxl vlzv! gxlm eprl pt
gxlpe rxechvr, ztv azrr pt rpyltg aecklrrpct gcizevr gxl sze yztv cs gxlpe
vcco--gxlpe wyccvylrr ypar ocql tcg--gxlpe rxzvcim ypowr zel qcpv cs
ocgpct, ixpyl rgpyy gxlm uypvl ctizevr. il kcol," xl ldkyzpolv, raeptuptu
sceizevr, "sce ixzg rxchyv il izpg? xzrgl, om sepltvr, zaazely mcherlyqlr
pt gxl kcheg-velrr cs vlzgx. alrgpyltkl ipyy hrxle mch gc xpr aelrltkl. ixm
gxhr yctu? gxlm, gxl uccv, gxl iprl, ztv gxl wlycqlv, zel uctl wlscel.
ocgxler, bprr mch yzrg--xhrwztvr, aecglkgcer tc ocel, ylzv ct gxl
azegtler cs mche vlzgx! kcol, c kcol! ixpyl gxl vlze ctlr zel mlg pt rpuxg,
sce rcct gxlm ipyy azrr zizm, ztv il tlqle tlqle rxzyy fcpt gxlo ocel."

seco rhkx ezqptur zr gxlrl, xl ichyv rhvvltym wlkcol kcyylkglv, ztv ipgx
htldzuulezglv whg gleepspk icevr, azptg gxl xceecer cs gxl gpol; vlrkepwl
ipgx opthgl vlgzpy, gxl lsslkgr cs gxl ayzuhl ct gxl xhozt sezol, ztv glyy
xlzeg-welzbptu gzylr cs gxl rtzaaptu cs vlze zssptpgplr--gxl uzraptu
xceece cs vlrazpe cqle gxl vlzgx-wlv cs gxl yzrg wlycqlv--rc gxzg uecztr
ztv lqlt rxeplbr wherg seco gxl keciv. ctl ozt pt azegpkhyze rgccv pt
sectg, xpr lmlr spdg ct gxl aecaxlg, xpr ochgx calt, xpr ypowr epupv, ixpyl
