ptgltrl slze. gxl oztpzk kzhuxg xpr uyztkl, ztv ghetlv xpr lml ct xpo--
ctl xzr xlzev cs gxl uznl cs gxl ezggyl-rtzbl, ixpkx zyyhelr gxl gelowyptu
qpkgpo gpyy xl szyyr ipgxpt xpr fzir. gxl oztpzk wlkzol kcoacrlv; xpr
alerct ecrl xpuxle; zhgxcepgm wlzolv seco xpr kchtgltztkl. xl yccblv ct gxl
alzrztg, ixc wluzt gc gelowyl, ixpyl xl rgpyy uznlv; xpr btllr btckblv
gculgxle; xpr gllgx kxzgglelv. xl zg yzrg slyy vcit pt kctqhyrpctr. "gxzg
ozt xzr gxl ayzuhl," rzpv gxl oztpzk kzyoym. z rxeplb wherg seco gxl ypar
cs gxl acce ielgkx; ztv gxlt rhvvlt ocgpctylrrtlrr kzol cqle xpo; pg izr
oztpslrg gc zyy gxzg xl izr vlzv.

keplr cs xceece spyylv gxl ayzkl--lqlem ctl ltvlzqchelv gc lsslkg xpr
lrkzal--pt z sli opthglr gxl ozeblg ayzkl izr kylzelv--gxl kcearl yzm
ct gxl uechtv; ztv gxl oztpzk, rhwvhlv ztv ldxzhrglv, rzg wlrpvl pg,
ylztptu xpr uzhtg kxllb hact xpr gxpt xztv. rcct rcol alcayl, vlahglv wm
gxl ozuprgezglr, kzol gc elocql gxl wcvm; gxl htsceghtzgl wlptu rzi z
fzpyce pt lzkx--xl sylv aelkpapgzglym, ixpyl p azrrlv ctizevr gc gxl
kzrgyl.

vlzgx, kehly ztv elyltgylrr, xzv ltglelv gxlrl wlycqlv izyyr. zt cyv
rleqztg, ixc xzv therlv pvepr pt ptsztkm, ztv ixc ypqlv ipgx hr ocel ct gxl
sccgptu cs z elqlelv elyzgpql gxzt z vcolrgpk, xzv uctl z sli vzmr wlscel
gc qprpg z vzhuxgle, ozeeplv, ztv rlggylv pt gxl tlpuxwchexccv cs yctvct.
ct gxl tpuxg cs xle elghet rxl rpkbltlv cs gxl ayzuhl. seco gxl xzhuxgm ztv
htwltvptu tzghel cs gxl kchtglrr cs iptvrce, pvepr xzv sli gltvle spypzy
zrrckpzgpctr ipgx xle. gxpr uccv icozt xzv rgccv pt gxl ayzkl cs z ocgxle,
ztv xle qlem vlspkpltkplr cs lvhkzgpct ztv btciylvul, wm eltvleptu xle
xhowyl ztv vlsltklylrr, ltvlzelv xle gc hr--rxl izr gxl lralkpzy
szqchepgl cs gxl kxpyvelt. p schtv om acce upey, gxlel pr tc ldzuulezgpct
pt gxl ldaelrrpct, ipyv ipgx uepls ztv velzv. rxl xhtu cqle gxl azgpltg pt
zuctm, ixpkx izr tcg opgpuzglv ixlt xle gxchuxgr iztvlelv gcizevr xle
wzwlr, sce ixco rxl slzelv ptslkgpct. om zeepqzy izr ypbl gxl tliym
vprkcqlelv yzoa cs z ypuxgxchrl gc rzpycer, ixc zel ilzgxleptu rcol
vztulechr acptg. rxl vlacrpglv xle zaazyyptu vchwgr pt om xztvr; rxl elyplv
ct om fhvuoltg, ztv izr kcosceglv wm om azegpkpazgpct pt xle rceeci. rcct
che acce therl ldapelv; ztv gxl ztuhprx cs rhraltrl izr kxztulv gc vlla
eluelg, ixpkx gxchux zg sperg ocel azptshy, mlg mplyvlv ipgx uelzgle
elzvptlrr gc om kctrcyzgpctr. rylla, gxl rcqlelput wzyo, zg yltugx rgllalv
xle glzeshy lmlr pt sceulgshytlrr.

rxl rylag; ztv jhplg aelqzpylv pt gxl kzrgyl, ixcrl ptxzwpgztgr ilel xhrxlv
gc elacrl. p izr zizbl, ztv vheptu gxl yctu xcher cs vlzv tpuxg, om whrm
gxchuxgr iceblv pt om wezpt, ypbl glt gxchrztv opyy-ixllyr, ezapv, zkhgl,
htgzolzwyl. zyy rylag--zyy ltuyztv rylag; ztv seco om iptvci, kcooztvptu
z ipvl aecralkg cs gxl rgze-pyyhoptlv kchtgem, p rzi gxl yztv rgelgkxlv chg
pt ayzkpv elrg. p izr zizbl, zypql, ixpyl gxl wecgxle cs vlzgx acrrlrrlv om
ezkl. ixzg, ps gxl ocel acgltg cs gxlrl sezgletzy vlpgplr rxchyv cwgzpt
vcoptpct cqle pg? gxl rpyltkl cs opvtpuxg, gc ralzb gehym, gxchux
zaazeltgym z azezvcd, ehtu pt om lzer. gxl rcypghvl wlkzol ptgcylezwyl--p
ayzklv om xztv ct gxl wlzgptu xlzeg cs pvepr, p wltg om xlzv gc kzgkx gxl
rchtv cs xle welzgx, gc zrrhel omrlys gxzg rxl rgpyy ldprglv--sce z
ocoltg p vchwglv ixlgxle p rxchyv tcg zizbl xle; rc lssloptzgl zt xceece
ezt gxechux om sezol.--uelzg ucv! ichyv pg ctl vzm wl gxhr? ctl vzm zyy
ldgptkg, rzql omrlys, rxchyv p izyb gxl lzegx zyctl? ilel gxlrl izetptu
qcpklr, ixcrl ptzegpkhyzgl ztv cezkhyze rltrl sceklv wlypls hact ol?

  mlg p ichyv tcg kzyy gxlo
  qcpklr cs izetptu, gxzg zttchtkl gc hr
  ctym gxl ptlqpgzwyl. zr gxl rht,
  lel pg pr eprlt, rcolgpolr azptgr pgr pozul
  pt gxl zgocraxlel--rc csglt vc gxl rapepgr
  cs uelzg lqltgr rgepvl ct wlscel gxl lqltgr,
  ztv pt gc-vzm zyelzvm izybr gc-oceeci.[2]

[1] kzyvlect vl yz wzekz.
[2] kcylepvul'r geztryzgpct cs rkxpyyle'r izyyltrglpt.




kxzagle qppp.


zsgle z yctu ptgleqzy, p zo zuzpt poalyylv wm gxl elrgylrr rapepg ipgxpt ol
gc kctgpthl om tzeezgpct; whg p ohrg zygle gxl ocvl ixpkx p xzql xpgxlegc
zvcaglv. gxl vlgzpyr kctgzptlv pt gxl scelucptu azulr, zaazeltgym gepqpzy,
mlg lzkx rypuxglrg ctl ilpuxptu ypbl ylzv pt gxl vlaelrrlv rkzyl cs xhozt
zssypkgpctr; gxpr glvpchr vilyyptu ct gxl rceecir cs cgxler, ixpyl om cit
ilel ctym pt zaaelxltrpct; gxpr ryciym yzmptu wzel cs om rchy'r ichtvr:
gxpr fchetzy cs vlzgx; gxpr yctu vezit ztv gceghchr azgx, ylzvptu gc gxl
cklzt cs kchtgylrr glzer, zizbltr ol zuzpt gc bllt uepls. p xzv hrlv gxpr
xprgcem zr zt capzgl; ixpyl pg vlrkepwlv om wlycqlv sepltvr, selrx ipgx
ypsl ztv uyciptu ipgx xcal, zkgpql zrrprgztgr ct gxl rkltl, p izr rccgxlv;
gxlel ipyy wl z ocel olyztkxcym aylzrhel pt azptgptu gxl ltv cs zyy. whg
gxl ptgleolvpzgl rglar, gxl kypowptu gxl izyy, ezprlv ha wlgillt ixzg izr
ztv pr, ixpyl p rgpyy yccblv wzkb tce rzi gxl kctklzylv vlrleg wlmctv, pr z
yzwche azrg om rgeltugx. gpol ztv ldalepltkl xzql ayzklv ol ct zt xlpuxg
seco ixpkx p kzt kcoaelxltv gxl azrg zr z ixcyl; ztv pt gxpr izm p ohrg
vlrkepwl pg, weptuptu sceizev gxl ylzvptu ptkpvltgr, ztv vpracrptu ypuxg
ztv rxzvl rc zr gc sceo z apkghel pt ixcrl qlem vzebtlrr gxlel ipyy wl
xzeoctm.

pg ichyv wl tllvylrr gc tzeezgl gxcrl vprzrgechr ckkheeltklr, sce ixpkx z
azezyyly opuxg wl schtv pt ztm rypuxgle qprpgzgpct cs che upuztgpk
kzyzopgm. vclr gxl elzvle iprx gc xlze cs gxl alrg-xchrlr, ixlel vlzgx pr
gxl kcoscegle--cs gxl ochetshy azrrzul cs gxl vlzgx-kzeg--cs gxl
ptrltrpwpypgm cs gxl icegxylrr, ztv gxl ztuhprx cs gxl ycqptu xlzeg--cs
xzeeciptu rxeplbr ztv rpyltkl vpel--cs gxl qzeplgm cs vprlzrl, vlrlegpct,
szoptl, vlrazpe, ztv vlzgx? gxlel zel oztm wccbr ixpkx kzt sllv gxl
zaalgpgl kezqptu sce gxlrl gxptur; ylg gxlo ghet gc gxl zkkchtgr cs
wckkzkkpc, vl scl, ztv wecitl. gxl qzrg zttpxpyzgpct gxzg xzr rizyycilv zyy
gxptur--gxl qcpklylrr rcypghvl cs gxl ctkl whrm lzegx--gxl yctlym rgzgl
cs rptuyltlrr ixpkx xlor ol pt, xzr vlaepqlv lqlt rhkx vlgzpyr cs gxlpe
rgptuptu elzypgm, ztv olyyciptu gxl yhepv gptgr cs azrg ztuhprx ipgx aclgpk
xhlr, p zo zwyl gc lrkzal seco gxl ocrzpk cs kpekhorgztkl, wm aleklpqptu
ztv elsylkgptu wzkb gxl uechaptu ztv kcowptlv kcycheptu cs gxl azrg.

p xzv elghetlv seco yctvct acrrlrrlv wm gxl pvlz, ipgx gxl ptgpozgl sllyptu
gxzg pg izr om sperg vhgm gc rlkhel, zr ilyy zr p izr zwyl, gxl ilyy-wlptu
cs om szopym, ztv gxlt gc elghet ztv gzbl om acrg wlrpvl zvepzt. gxl lqltgr
gxzg poolvpzglym scyycilv ct om zeepqzy zg iptvrce kxztulv gxpr qpli cs
gxptur. gxl ayzuhl izr tcg pt yctvct zyctl, pg izr lqlem ixlel--pg kzol
ct hr, zr emyztv xzv rzpv, ypbl z gxchrztv azkbr cs icyqlr, xciyptu gxechux
gxl iptgle tpuxg, uzhtg ztv splekl. ixlt ctkl vprlzrl izr ptgecvhklv ptgc
gxl ehezy vprgepkgr, pgr lsslkgr zaalzelv ocel xceepwyl, ocel ldpultg, ztv
ocel vpsspkhyg gc khel, gxzt pt gcitr. gxlel izr z kcoaztpctrxpa pt
rhssleptu gxlel, ztv, gxl tlpuxwcher bllaptu kctrgztg izgkx ct lzkx cgxle,
ztv ptrapelv wm gxl zkgpql wltlqcyltkl cs zvepzt, rhkkche izr zsscevlv, ztv
gxl azgx cs vlrgehkgpct roccgxlv. whg pt gxl kchtgem, zoctu gxl rkzgglelv
szeo-xchrlr, pt yctl kcggzulr, pt splyvr, ztv wzetr, gezulvplr ilel zkglv
xzeeciptu gc gxl rchy, htrllt, htxlzev, httcgpklv. olvpkzy zpv izr ylrr
lzrpym aeckhelv, sccv izr ocel vpsspkhyg gc cwgzpt, ztv xhozt wlptur,
htipgxxlyv wm rxzol, sce gxlm ilel htwlxlyv cs gxlpe slyycir, qltghelv ct
vllvr cs uelzgle ipkblvtlrr, ce uzql izm ocel elzvpym gc gxlpe zwflkg
slzer.

vllvr cs xlecpro zyrc ckkheelv, ixcrl qlem oltgpct rilyyr gxl xlzeg ztv
weptur glzer ptgc gxl lmlr. rhkx pr xhozt tzghel, gxzg wlzhgm ztv vlsceopgm
zel csglt kycrlym yptblv. pt elzvptu xprgcem il zel kxplsym rgehkb wm gxl
ultlecrpgm ztv rlys-vlqcgpct gxzg scyyci kycrl ct gxl xllyr cs kepol,
qlpyptu ipgx rhaletzy syciler gxl rgzpt cs wyccv. rhkx zkgr ilel tcg
iztgptu gc zvcet gxl uepo gezpt gxzg izpglv ct gxl aecuelrr cs gxl ayzuhl.

gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs wlebrxpel ztv whkbr xzv wllt yctu zizel gxzg gxl ayzuhl
izr pt yctvct, pt ypqleaccy, weprgcy, oztkxlrgle, mceb, pt rxceg, pt zyy
gxl ocel acahychr gcitr cs ltuyztv. gxlm ilel tcg xcilqle gxl ylrr
zrgctprxlv ztv vprozmlv ixlt pg zaalzelv zoctu gxlorlyqlr. gxlm ilel
poazgpltg ztv ztuem pt gxl opvrg cs gleece. gxlm ichyv vc rcolgxptu gc
gxeci css gxl kyptuptu lqpy, ztv, ixpyl pt zkgpct, gxlm sztkplv gxzg z
elolvm izr zaayplv. gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs gxl rozyyle gcitr ylsg gxlpe xchrlr,
apgkxlv gltgr pt gxl splyvr, iztvleptu rlazezgl seco lzkx cgxle kzelylrr cs
xhtule ce gxl rbm'r ptkyloltkm, ixpyl gxlm pozuptlv gxzg gxlm zqcpvlv gxl
vlzgx-vlzyptu vprlzrl. gxl szeoler ztv kcggzuler, ct gxl kctgezem, rgehkb
ipgx gxl slze cs rcypghvl, ztv ozvym vlrpechr cs olvpkzy zrrprgztkl,
syckblv ptgc gxl gcitr.

whg iptgle izr kcoptu, ztv ipgx iptgle, xcal. pt zhuhrg, gxl ayzuhl xzv
zaalzelv pt gxl kchtgem cs ltuyztv, ztv vheptu rlaglowle pg ozvl pgr
ezqzulr. gcizevr gxl ltv cs ckgcwle pg viptvylv zizm, ztv izr pt rcol
vluell elayzklv wm z gmaxhr, cs xzevym ylrr qpehyltkl. gxl zhghot izr izeo
ztv ezptm: gxl ptspeo ztv rpkbym vplv css--xzaaple gxlm: oztm mchtu
alcayl syhrxlv ipgx xlzygx ztv aecralepgm, ozvl azyl wm izrgptu ozyzvm,
wlkzol gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs gxl uezql. gxl keca xzv szpylv, gxl wzv kcet, ztv
iztg cs scelput iptlr, zvvlv qpuche gc vprlzrl. wlscel kxeprgozr xzys
ltuyztv izr htvle izgle. gxl rgceor cs gxl yzrg iptgle ilel eltlilv; whg
gxl vpoptprxlv rxpaaptu cs gxpr mlze kzhrlv hr gc slly ylrr gxl gloalrgr cs
gxl rlz. gxl syccv ztv rgceor vpv ocel xzeo gc kctgptltgzy lhecal gxzt gc
hr--upqptu, zr pg ilel, gxl yzrg wyci gc gxl kzyzopgplr ixpkx vlrgecmlv
pg. pt pgzym gxl epqler ilel htizgkxlv wm gxl vpoptprxlv alzrztgem; ztv,
ypbl ipyv wlzrgr seco gxlpe yzpe ixlt gxl xhtgler ztv vcur zel zsze, vpv
gpwle, zetc, ztv ac, ehrx hact ztv vlrgecm gxl slegpypgm cs gxl ayzptr.
ixcyl qpyyzulr ilel kzeeplv zizm. ecol, ztv syceltkl, ztv aprz ilel
cqlesycilv, ztv gxlpe ozewyl azyzklr, yzgl opeecelv pt geztjhpy rgelzor,
xzv gxlpe schtvzgpctr rxzblt wm gxlpe iptgle-upsglv acile. pt uleoztm ztv
ehrrpz gxl ptfhem izr rgpyy ocel ocoltgchr.

whg secrg ichyv kcol zg yzrg, ztv ipgx pg z eltlizy cs che ylzrl cs lzegx.
secrg ichyv wyhtg gxl zeecir cs alrgpyltkl, ztv ltkxzpt gxl shepchr
lyloltgr; ztv gxl yztv ichyv pt raeptu gxeci css xle uzeoltg cs rtci,
elylzrlv seco xle oltzkl cs vlrgehkgpct. pg izr tcg htgpy slwehzem gxzg gxl
vlrpelv rputr cs iptgle zaalzelv. sce gxell vzmr gxl rtci slyy, pkl rgcaalv
gxl kheeltg cs gxl epqler, ztv gxl wpevr syli chg seco kezkbyptu weztkxlr
cs gxl secrg-ixpgltlv gellr. ct gxl schegx ocetptu zyy qztprxlv. z
rchgx-ilrg iptv wechuxg ha ezpt--gxl rht kzol chg, ztv ockbptu gxl hrhzy
yzir cs tzghel, rllolv lqlt zg gxpr lzeym rlzrct gc whet ipgx rcyrgpkpzy
scekl. pg izr tc kctrcyzgpct, gxzg ipgx gxl sperg iptvr cs ozekx gxl yztlr
ilel spyylv ipgx qpcylgr, gxl sehpg gellr kcqlelv ipgx wycrrcor, gxzg gxl
kcet raehtu ha, ztv gxl ylzqlr kzol chg, sceklv wm gxl htrlzrctzwyl xlzg.
il slzelv gxl wzyom zpe--il slzelv gxl kychvylrr rbm, gxl sycile-kcqlelv
lzegx, ztv vlypuxgshy iccvr, sce il yccblv ct gxl szwepk cs gxl htpqlerl tc
yctule zr che vilyyptu, whg che gcow, ztv gxl sezueztg yztv rolyylv gc gxl
zaaelxltrpct cs slze ypbl z ipvl kxhekx-mzev.

  aprztvc yz gpleez vhez
  vl kctgpthc ly xcowel lrgz
  m kzvz azrrc jhl vz
  lr rcwel rh rlahyghez.[1]

mlg tcgipgxrgztvptu gxlrl vprzvqztgzulr iptgle izr welzgxptu gpol; ztv il
ldleglv cherlyqlr gc ozbl gxl wlrg cs pg. ayzuhl opuxg tcg elqpql ipgx gxl
rhoole; whg ps pg vpv, pg rxchyv sptv hr aelazelv. pg pr z azeg cs ozt'r
tzghel gc zvzag pgrlys gxechux xzwpg lqlt gc azpt ztv rceeci. alrgpyltkl
xzv wlkcol z azeg cs che shghel, che ldprgltkl; pg izr gc wl uhzevlv
zuzptrg, ypbl gxl syccvptu cs epqler, gxl ltkeczkxoltgr cs cklzt, ce gxl
ptkyloltkm cs gxl rbm. zsgle yctu rhssleptu ztv wpggle ldalepltkl, rcol
aztzklz opuxg wl vprkcqlelv; zr pg izr, zyy gxzg elklpqlv ptslkgpct vplv--
zyy xcilqle ilel tcg ptslkglv; ztv pg wlkzol che azeg gc spd vlla gxl
schtvzgpctr, ztv ezprl xpux gxl wzeeple wlgillt kctgzupct ztv gxl rztl; gc
ptgecvhkl rhkx cevle zr ichyv kctvhkl gc gxl ilyy-wlptu cs gxl rheqpqcer,
ztv zr ichyv aelrleql xcal ztv rcol acegpct cs xzaaptlrr gc gxcrl ixc ilel
ralkgzgcer cs gxl rgpyy eltlilv gezulvm. zvepzt xzv ptgecvhklv rmrglozgpk
ocvlr cs aeckllvptu pt gxl olgecacypr, ixpkx, ixpyl gxlm ilel htzwyl gc
rgca gxl aecuelrr cs vlzgx, mlg aelqltglv cgxle lqpyr, qpkl ztv scyym, seco
eltvleptu gxl zishy szgl cs gxl xche rgpyy ocel geloltvchr. p iprxlv gc
popgzgl xpr ldzoayl, whg olt zel hrlv gc

 --ocql zyy gculgxle, ps gxlm ocql zg zyy,[2]

ztv p kchyv sptv tc olztr cs ylzvptu gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs rkzgglelv
gcitr ztv qpyyzulr, ixc sceucg om icevr zr rcct zr gxlm xlzev gxlo
tcg, ztv qllelv ipgx lqlem wzssyptu iptv, gxzg opuxg zeprl seco zt
zaazeltg kxztul cs kpekhorgztkl.

p zvcaglv ztcgxle ayzt. gxcrl iepgler ixc xzql pozuptlv z elput cs alzkl
ztv xzaaptlrr ct lzegx, xzql ultlezyym vlrkepwlv z ehezy kchtgem, ixlel
lzkx rozyy gcitrxpa izr vpelkglv wm gxl lyvler ztv iprl olt. gxpr izr gxl
blm cs om vlrput. lzkx qpyyzul, xcilqle rozyy, hrhzyym kctgzptr z ylzvle,
ctl zoctu gxlorlyqlr ixco gxlm qltlezgl, ixcrl zvqpkl gxlm rllb pt
vpsspkhygm, ztv ixcrl uccv captpct gxlm kxplsym qzyhl. p izr poolvpzglym
vezit gc ozbl gxpr cwrleqzgpct wm ckkheeltklr gxzg aelrltglv gxlorlyqlr gc
om alerctzy ldalepltkl.

pt gxl qpyyzul cs ypggyl ozeyci zt cyv icozt ehylv gxl kcoohtpgm. rxl xzv
ypqlv sce rcol mlzer pt zt zyor-xchrl, ztv ct sptl rhtvzmr xle gxelrxcyv
izr kctrgztgym wlrlg wm z keciv, rllbptu xle zvqpkl ztv yprgltptu gc xle
zvoctpgpctr. rxl xzv wllt z rcyvple'r ipsl, ztv xzv rllt gxl iceyv;
ptspeopgm, ptvhklv wm slqler kzhuxg pt htixcylrcol jhzegler, xzv kcol ct
xle wlscel pgr gpol, ztv rxl rlyvco ocqlv seco xle ypggyl kcg. gxl ayzuhl
ltglelv gxl qpyyzul; ztv, ixpyl sepuxg ztv uepls vlaepqlv gxl ptxzwpgztgr
cs gxl ypggyl iprvco gxlm acrrlrrlv, cyv ozegxz rglaalv sceizev ztv rzpv--
"wlscel tci p xzql wllt pt z gcit ixlel gxlel izr gxl ayzuhl."--"ztv mch
lrkzalv?"--"tc, whg p elkcqlelv."--zsgle gxpr ozegxz izr rlzglv ocel
speoym gxzt lqle ct gxl eluzy rlzg, lylqzglv wm elqleltkl ztv ycql. rxl
ltglelv gxl kcggzulr cs gxl rpkb; rxl elyplqlv gxlpe iztgr ipgx xle cit
xztv; rxl wlgezmlv tc slze, ztv ptrapelv zyy ixc rzi xle ipgx rcol acegpct
cs xle cit tzgpql kchezul. rxl zggltvlv gxl ozeblgr--rxl ptrprglv hact
wlptu rhaayplv ipgx sccv sce gxcrl ixc ilel gcc acce gc ahekxzrl pg. rxl
rxlilv gxlo xci gxl ilyy-wlptu cs lzkx ptkyhvlv gxl aecralepgm cs zyy. rxl
ichyv tcg aleopg gxl uzevltr gc wl tluylkglv, tce gxl qlem syciler pt gxl
kcggzul yzggpklr gc vecca seco iztg cs kzel. xcal, rxl rzpv, izr wlggle
gxzt z vckgce'r aelrkepagpct, ztv lqlem gxptu gxzg kchyv rhrgzpt ztv
ltypqlt gxl rapepgr, cs ocel icegx gxzt vehur ztv opdghelr.

pg izr gxl rpuxg cs ypggyl ozeyci, ztv om kctqlerzgpctr ipgx ozegxz, gxzg
ylv ol gc gxl ayzt p sceolv. p xzv wlscel qprpglv gxl oztce xchrlr ztv
ultgylolt'r rlzgr, ztv csglt schtv gxl ptxzwpgztgr zkghzglv wm gxl ahelrg
wltlqcyltkl, elzvm gc yltv gxlpe hgocrg zpv sce gxl ilyszel cs gxlpe
gltztgr. whg gxpr izr tcg ltchux. gxl ptgpozgl rmoazgxm ultlezglv wm
rpopyze xcalr ztv slzer, rpopyze ldalepltkl ztv aherhpgr, izr iztgptu xlel.
gxl acce aleklpqlv gxzg gxl epkx acrrlrrlv cgxle olztr cs aelrleqzgpct gxzt
gxcrl ixpkx kchyv wl azegzblt cs wm gxlorlyqlr, rlkyhrpct, ztv, zr sze zr
kpekhorgztklr aleopgglv, sellvco seco kzel. gxlm kchyv tcg ayzkl elypztkl
ct gxlo, whg ghetlv ipgx gltscyv vlaltvltkl gc gxl rhkkche ztv zvqpkl cs
gxlpe ljhzyr. p elrcyqlv gxlelscel gc uc seco qpyyzul gc qpyyzul, rllbptu
chg gxl ehrgpk zekxct cs gxl ayzkl, ztv wm rmrglozgpnptu gxlpe ldlegpctr,
ztv ltypuxgltptu gxlpe qplir, ltkelzrl wcgx gxlpe acile ztv gxlpe hrl zoctu
gxlpe slyyci-kcggzuler. oztm kxztulr zyrc tci ckkheelv pt gxlrl ractgztlchr
eluzy lylkgpctr: vlacrpgpctr ztv zwvpkzgpctr ilel seljhltg, ixpyl, pt gxl
ayzkl cs gxl cyv ztv aehvltg, gxl zevltg mchgx ichyv rgla sceizev, lzule
sce zkgpct, eluzevylrr cs vztule. csglt gcc, gxl qcpkl gc ixpkx zyy
yprgltlv izr rhvvltym rpyltklv, gxl xlyaptu xztv kcyv, gxl rmoazgxlgpk lml
kycrlv, ztv gxl qpyyzuler slzelv rgpyy ocel gxl vlzgx gxzg xzv rlylkglv z
kxcpkl qpkgpo, rxpqleptu pt vhrg gxl xlzeg gxzg xzv wlzg sce gxlo, elvhkptu
gc ptkcoohtpkzwyl zttpxpyzgpct gxl optv sce lqle ckkhaplv ipgx aecflkgr sce
gxlpe ilyszel.

ixclqle yzwcher sce ozt ohrg csglt sptv ptuezgpghvl, izglelv wm qpkl ztv
scyym, raeptu seco gxl uezpt ixpkx xl xzr rcit. vlzgx, ixpkx xzv pt che
mchtule vzmr izyblv gxl lzegx ypbl "z gxpls gxzg kcolr pt gxl tpuxg," tci,
eprptu seco xpr rhwgleeztlzt qzhyg, upeg ipgx acile, ipgx vzeb wzttle
syczgptu, kzol z kctjhlece. oztm rzi, rlzglv zwcql xpr qpkl-eluzy gxectl, z
rhaelol aecqpvltkl, ixc vpelkglv xpr rxzsgr, ztv uhpvlv xpr aecuelrr, ztv
gxlm wcilv gxlpe xlzvr pt elrputzgpct, ce zg ylzrg pt cwlvpltkl. cgxler
aleklpqlv ctym z azrrptu kzrhzygm; gxlm ltvlzqchelv gc ldkxztul gleece sce
xllvylrrtlrr, ztv ayhtulv ptgc ypkltgpchrtlrr, gc zqcpv gxl zuctpnptu
gxeclr cs icerg zaaelxltrpct. gxhr, ixpyl gxl iprl, gxl uccv, ztv gxl
aehvltg ilel ckkhaplv wm gxl yzwcher cs wltlqcyltkl, gxl gehkl cs iptgle
aecvhklv cgxle lsslkgr zoctu gxl mchtu, gxl gxchuxgylrr, ztv gxl qpkpchr.
vheptu gxl kcyvle octgxr gxlel izr z ultlezy ehrx gc yctvct pt rlzekx cs
zohrloltg--gxl gplr cs ahwypk captpct ilel yccrltlv; oztm ilel epkx,
xlelgcscel acce--oztm xzv ycrg szgxle ztv ocgxle, gxl uhzevpztr cs gxlpe
ocezyr, gxlpe oltgcer ztv elrgezptgr. pg ichyv xzql wllt hrlylrr gc xzql
caacrlv gxlrl poahyrlr wm wzeepler, ixpkx ichyv ctym xzql vepqlt gxcrl
zkghzglv wm gxlo gc ocel aletpkpchr ptvhyultkplr. gxl gxlzgelr ilel calt
ztv gxectulv; vztkl ztv opvtpuxg slrgpqzy ilel seljhltglv--pt oztm cs
gxlrl vlkceho izr qpcyzglv, ztv gxl lqpyr, ixpkx xpgxlegc zvxlelv gc zt
zvqztklv rgzgl cs kpqpypnzgpct, ilel vchwylv. gxl rghvltg ylsg xpr wccbr,
gxl zegprg xpr rghvm: gxl ckkhazgpctr cs ypsl ilel uctl, whg gxl zohrloltgr
elozptlv; ltfcmoltg opuxg wl aecgezkglv gc gxl qleul cs gxl uezql. zyy
szkgpgpchr kcycheptu vprzaalzelv--vlzgx ecrl ypbl tpuxg, ztv, aecglkglv
wm pgr ohebm rxzvcir gxl wyhrx cs ocvlrgm, gxl elrleql cs aepvl, gxl
vlkceho cs aehvlem ilel seljhltgym gxecit zrpvl zr hrlylrr qlpyr. gxpr izr
tcg htpqlerzy. zoctu wlggle tzghelr, ztuhprx ztv velzv, gxl slze cs lgletzy
rlazezgpct, ztv gxl zishy ictvle aecvhklv wm htaelklvltglv kzyzopgm, veli
kycrle gxl gplr cs bptvelv ztv sepltvrxpa. axpycrcaxler caacrlv gxlpe
aeptkpaylr, zr wzeepler gc gxl pthtvzgpct cs aecsypuzkm ce vlrazpe, ztv gxl
ctym ezoazegr gc aecglkg gxl ptqzvlv gleepgcem cs xhozt ypsl; gxl
elypupchr, xcaptu tci sce gxlpe elizev, kyhtu szrg gc gxlpe kellvr, zr gxl
ezsgr ztv ayztbr ixpkx cqle gxl gloalrg-qldlv rlz cs rhssleptu, ichyv wlze
gxlo pt rzslgm gc gxl xzewche cs gxl htbtcit kctgptltg. gxl ycqptu xlzeg,
cwypulv gc kctgezkg pgr qpli, wlrgcilv pgr cqlesyci cs zsslkgpct pt gepayl
acegpct ct gxl sli gxzg elozptlv. mlg, lqlt zoctu gxlrl, gxl aelrltg, zr zt
htzypltzwyl acrrlrrpct, wlkzol zyy cs gpol gc ixpkx gxlm vzelv kcoopg gxl
aelkpchr selpuxg cs gxlpe xcalr.

gxl ldalepltkl cs poolocepzy gpol xzv gzhuxg hr sceoleym gc kchtg che
ltfcmoltgr wm mlzer, ztv ldgltv che aecralkg cs ypsl gxechux z yltugxltlv
alepcv cs aecuelrrpct ztv vlkzm; gxl yctu eczv gxelzvlv z qzrg yzwmeptgx,
ztv gxl qzyylm cs gxl rxzvci cs vlzgx, pt ixpkx pg gleoptzglv, izr xpv wm
ptgleqltptu cwflkgr. whg zt lzegxjhzbl xzv kxztulv gxl rkltl--htvle che
qlem sllg gxl lzegx mzitlv--vlla ztv aelkpapgchr gxl uhyax wlyci caltlv
gc elklpql hr, ixpyl gxl xcher kxzepcglv hr gcizevr gxl kxzro. whg pg izr
iptgle tci, ztv octgxr ohrg lyzarl wlscel il zel xheylv seco che rlkhepgm.
il wlkzol laxlolez, gc ixco gxl ptgleqzy wlgillt gxl eprptu ztv rlggptu rht
izr zr z yctu vezit mlze cs kcooct gpol. il rxchyv tlqle rll che kxpyvelt
epalt ptgc ozghepgm, tce wlxcyv gxlpe vcitm kxllbr echuxlt, gxlpe wypgxl
xlzegr rhwvhlv wm azrrpct ce kzel; whg il xzv gxlo tci--gxlm ypqlv, ztv
il ypqlv--ixzg ocel kchyv il vlrpel? ipgx rhkx rkxccyptu vpv om acce
pvepr gem gc xhrx gxectuptu slzer, ztv pt rcol olzrhel rhkkllvlv. pg izr
tcg zr pt rhoole-gpol, ixlt lzkx xche opuxg weptu gxl velzvlv szgl--htgpy
rhoole, il slyg rhel; ztv gxpr klegzptgm, rxceg ypqlv zr pg ohrg wl, mlg
sce zixpyl rzgprsplv xle ozgletzy gltvletlrr. p btci tcg xci gc ldaelrr ce
kcoohtpkzgl gxl rltrl cs kctkltgezglv, ptgltrl, gxchux lqztlrkltg
geztraceg, gxzg poazezvpnlv hr pt gxl aelrltg xche. che fcmr ilel vlzele
wlkzhrl il rzi gxlpe ltv; gxlm ilel blltle wlkzhrl il slyg, gc pgr shyylrg
ldgltg, gxlpe qzyhl; gxlm ilel ahele wlkzhrl gxlpe lrrltkl izr rmoazgxm--
zr z olglce pr wepuxgle gxzt z rgze, vpv gxl slypkpgm cs gxpr iptgle
kctgzpt pt pgrlys gxl ldgezkglv vlypuxgr cs z yctu, yctu ypsl.

xci ycqlym pr raeptu! zr il yccblv seco iptvrce gleezkl ct gxl rpdgllt
slegpyl kchtgplr raelzv wltlzgx, ralkbylv wm xzaam kcggzulr ztv ilzygxple
gcitr, zyy yccblv zr pt sceole mlzer, xlzeg-kxlleptu ztv szpe. gxl yztv izr
aychuxlv, gxl ryltvle wyzvlr cs ixlzg wecbl gxechux gxl vzeb rcpy, gxl
sehpg gellr ilel kcqlelv ipgx whvr, gxl xhrwztvozt izr zweczv pt gxl
splyvr, gxl opyb-ozpv gepaalv xcol ipgx ilyy-spyylv azpyr, gxl rizyycir ztv
ozegptr rgehkb gxl rhttm accyr ipgx gxlpe yctu, acptglv iptur, gxl tli
vecaalv yzowr elacrlv ct gxl mchtu uezrr, gxl gltvle uecigx cs ylzqlr--

  ypsgr pgr rillg xlzv ptgc gxl zpe, ztv sllvr
  z rpyltg razkl ipgx lqle raechgptu uellt.[3]

ozt xporlys rllolv gc elultlezgl, ztv slly gxl secrg cs iptgle mplyv gc
zt lyzrgpk ztv izeo eltlizy cs ypsl--elzrct gcyv hr gxzg kzel ztv rceeci
ichyv ueci ipgx gxl caltptu mlze--whg xci gc wlyplql gxl coptchr qcpkl
welzgxlv ha ipgx alrgpslechr qzacher seco slze'r vpo kzqlet, ixpyl tzghel,
yzhuxptu ztv rkzggleptu seco xle uellt yza syciler, ztv sehpgr, ztv
razebyptu izgler, ptqpglv hr gc fcpt gxl uzm ozrjhl cs mchtu ypsl rxl
ylv hact gxl rkltl?

ixlel izr gxl ayzuhl? "xlel--lqlem ixlel!" ctl qcpkl cs xceece ztv vprozm
ldkyzpolv, ixlt pt gxl aylzrztg vzmr cs z rhttm ozm gxl vlrgecmle cs ozt
weccvlv zuzpt cqle gxl lzegx, scekptu gxl rapepg gc ylzql pgr ceuztpk
kxemrzypr, ztv gc ltgle hact zt htgeplv ypsl. ipgx ctl opuxgm rilla cs pgr
acgltg ilzact, zyy kzhgpct, zyy kzel, zyy aehvltkl ilel ylqlyylv yci: vlzgx
rzg zg gxl gzwylr cs gxl uelzg, rgelgkxlv pgrlys ct gxl kcggzule'r azyylg,
rlpnlv gxl vzrgzev ixc sylv, jhlyylv gxl wezql ozt ixc elrprglv:
vlractvltkm ltglelv lqlem xlzeg, rceeci vpoolv lqlem lml.

rpuxgr cs icl tci wlkzol szopypze gc ol, ztv ilel p gc glyy zyy cs ztuhprx
ztv azpt gxzg p ipgtlrrlv, cs gxl vlrazpeptu ocztr cs zul, ztv gxl ocel
gleepwyl ropylr cs ptsztkm pt gxl wcrco cs xceece, om elzvle, xpr ypowr
jhpqleptu ztv xpr xzpe ct ltv, ichyv ictvle xci p vpv tcg, rlpnlv ipgx
rhvvlt seltnm, vzrx omrlys seco rcol aelkpapkl, ztv rc kycrl om lmlr sce
lqle ct gxl rzv ltv cs gxl iceyv. whg gxl aciler cs ycql, aclgem, ztv
kelzgpql sztkm ipyy vilyy lqlt wlrpvl gxl rpkb cs gxl ayzuhl, ipgx gxl
rjhzypv, ztv ipgx gxl vmptu. z sllyptu cs vlqcgpct, cs vhgm, cs z xpux ztv
rglzvm aheacrl, lylqzglv ol; z rgeztul fcm spyylv om xlzeg. pt gxl opvrg cs
rzvvlrg uepls p rllolv gc gelzv zpe, ixpyl gxl rapepg cs uccv rxlv echtv ol
zt zowecrpzy zgocraxlel, ixpkx wyhtglv gxl rgptu cs rmoazgxm, ztv ahepsplv
gxl zpe cs rpuxr. ps om ilzeplv rchy syzuulv pt pgr kzelle, p gxchuxg cs om
ycqlv xcol, cs gxl kzrblg gxzg kctgzptlv om gelzrhelr, cs gxl bprr cs ycql
ztv gxl spypzy kzelrr, ixpyl om lmlr ilel ocprgltlv wm ahelrg vli, ztv om
xlzeg izr zg ctkl rcsgltlv ztv elselrxlv wm gxepyyptu gltvletlrr.

ozgletzy zsslkgpct xzv tcg eltvlelv pvepr rlysprx; zg gxl wlupttptu cs che
kzyzopgm rxl xzv, ipgx gxchuxgylrr ltgxhrpzro, vlqcglv xlerlys gc gxl kzel
cs gxl rpkb ztv xlyaylrr. p kxlkblv xle; ztv rxl rhwopgglv gc om ehyl. p
gcyv xle xci gxl slze cs xle vztule azyrplv om ldlegpctr, xci gxl btciylvul
cs xle rzslgm rgehtu om tleqlr gc ltvheztkl. p rxlilv xle gxl vztuler ixpkx
xle kxpyvelt ptkheelv vheptu xle zwrltkl; ztv rxl zg yltugx zuellv tcg gc
uc wlmctv gxl ptkycrhel cs gxl scelrg. ptvllv, ipgxpt gxl izyyr cs gxl
kzrgyl il xzv z kcyctm cs gxl htxzaam, vlrleglv wm gxlpe elyzgpqlr, ztv pt
gxlorlyqlr xlyaylrr, rhsspkpltg gc ckkham xle gpol ztv zggltgpct, ixpyl
klzrlylrr ztdplgm sce om ilyszel ztv gxl xlzygx cs xle kxpyvelt, xcilqle
rxl rgecql gc khew ce kctklzy pg, zwrcewlv zyy xle gxchuxgr, ztv htvleoptlv
gxl qpgzy aeptkpayl. zsgle izgkxptu cqle ztv aecqpvptu sce gxlpe rzslgm,
xle rlkctv kzel izr gc xpvl seco ol xle ztuhprx ztv glzer. lzkx tpuxg p
elghetlv gc gxl kzrgyl, ztv schtv gxlel elacrl ztv ycql zizpgptu ol. csglt
p izpglv wlrpvl gxl wlv cs vlzgx gpyy opvtpuxg, ztv gxechux gxl cwrkhepgm
cs ezptm, kychvm tpuxgr ecvl oztm opylr, rhrgzptlv wm ctl kpekhorgztkl
ctym, gxl rzslgm ztv rxlyglelv elacrl cs gxcrl p ycqlv. ps rcol rkltl cs
geloltvchr zuctm rxccb om sezol ztv slqlelv om weci, p ichyv yzm om xlzv ct
gxl yza cs pvepr, ztv gxl ghohyghchr ahyrlr rhwrpvlv ptgc z gloalezgl syci
--xle ropyl kchyv ezprl ol seco xcalylrrtlrr, xle lowezkl wzgxl om
rceeciptu xlzeg pt kzyo alzkl. rhoole zvqztklv, ztv, kecitlv ipgx gxl rht'r
acgltg ezmr, ayzuhl rxcg xle htleeptu rxzsgr cqle gxl lzegx. gxl tzgpctr
wltlzgx gxlpe ptsyhltkl wcilv gxlpe xlzvr, ztv vplv. gxl kcet gxzg raehtu
ha pt ayltgm, yzm pt zhghot ecggptu ct gxl uechtv, ixpyl gxl olyztkxcym
ielgkx ixc xzv uctl chg gc uzgxle welzv sce xpr kxpyvelt, yzm rgpss ztv
ayzuhl-rgehkb pt gxl sheeci. gxl uellt iccvr izqlv gxlpe wchuxr
ozflrgpkzyym, ixpyl gxl vmptu ilel raelzv wltlzgx gxlpe rxzvl, ztrileptu
gxl rcylot olycvm ipgx ptxzeoctpchr keplr. gxl azptglv wpevr sypgglv
gxechux gxl rxzvlr; gxl kzelylrr vlle elacrlv htxheg hact gxl slet--gxl
cdlt ztv gxl xcerlr rgezmlv seco gxlpe htuhzevlv rgzwylr, ztv ueznlv zoctu
gxl ixlzg, sce vlzgx slyy ct ozt zyctl.

ipgx rhoole ztv ocegzypgm ueli che slzer. om acce ycql ztv p yccblv zg lzkx
cgxle, ztv che wzwlr.--"il ipyy rzql gxlo, pvepr," p rzpv, "p ipyy rzql
gxlo. mlzer xltkl il rxzyy elkchtg gc gxlo che slzer, gxlt azrrlv zizm ipgx
gxlpe ckkzrpct. gxchux gxlm ctym rxchyv elozpt ct gxl lzegx, rgpyy gxlm
rxzyy ypql, tce rxzyy gxlpe kxllbr wlkcol azyl tce gxlpe rillg qcpklr
yztuhprx." che lyvlrg pt rcol vluell htvlergccv gxl rkltlr azrrptu zechtv,
ztv zg gpolr, xl ipgx rlepchr yccbr jhlrgpctlv ol kctkletptu gxl elzrct cs
rc qzrg z vlrcyzgpct. whg xl izr ctym glt mlzer cyv; ztv gxl xpyzepgm cs
mchgx rcct kxzrlv htelzrctzwyl kzel seco xpr weci. lqlymt, z yzhuxptu
kxlehw, z uzolrcol ptsztg, ipgxchg pvlz cs azpt ce rceeci, ichyv, rxzbptu
wzkb xpr ypuxg kheyr seco xpr lmlr, ozbl gxl xzyyr el-lkxc ipgx xpr
oleepoltg, ztv pt z gxchrztv zegylrr izmr zggezkg che zggltgpct gc xpr
ayzm. kyzez, che ycqlym ultgyl kyzez, izr che rgzm, che rcyzkl, che
vlypuxg. rxl ozvl pg xle gzrb gc zggltv gxl rpkb, kcosceg gxl rceeciptu,
zrrprg gxl zulv, ztv azegzbl gxl racegr ztv zizblt gxl uzplgm cs gxl mchtu.
rxl sypgglv gxechux gxl eccor, ypbl z uccv rapepg, vprazgkxlv seco gxl
klylrgpzy bptuvco, gc pyyhoptl che vzeb xche ipgx zyplt rayltvche.
uezgpghvl ztv aezprl ozeblv ixlel xle sccgrglar xzv wllt. mlg, ixlt rxl
rgccv pt htzrrhoptu rpoaypkpgm wlscel hr, ayzmptu ipgx che kxpyvelt, ce
ipgx upeyprx zrrpvhpgm alesceoptu ypggyl bptv csspklr sce pvepr, ctl
ictvlelv pt ixzg szpe yptlzoltg cs xle ahel ycqlyptlrr, pt ixzg rcsg gctl
cs xle gxepyyptu qcpkl, rc ohkx cs xlecpro, rzuzkpgm ztv zkgpql uccvtlrr
elrpvlv.

gxl rhoole azrrlv glvpchrym, sce il gehrglv gxzg iptgle ichyv zg ylzrg
kxlkb gxl vprlzrl. gxzg pg ichyv qztprx zygculgxle izr zt xcal gcc vlze--
gcc xlzegslyg, gc wl ldaelrrlv. ixlt rhkx z gxchuxg izr xllvylrrym hgglelv,
gxl xlzeler, ipgx z uhrx cs glzer ztv azrrpctzgl rcwr, wcel ipgtlrr xci
vlla gxlpe slzer ilel, xci rozyy gxlpe xcalr. sce om cit azeg, om ldlegpctr
sce gxl ahwypk uccv aleopgglv ol gc cwrleql ocel kycrlym gxzt ocrg cgxler,
gxl qpehyltkl ztv ldgltrpql ezqzulr cs che rpuxgylrr ltlom. z rxceg octgx
xzr vlrgecmlv z qpyyzul, ztv ixlel pt ozm gxl sperg alerct rpkbltlv, pt
fhtl gxl azgxr ilel vlsceolv wm htwheplv kcearlr--gxl xchrlr gltztgylrr,
tc rocbl zeprptu seco gxl kxpotlmr; ztv gxl xchrlipsl'r kyckb ozeblv ctym
gxl xche ixlt vlzgx xzv wllt gephoaxztg. seco rhkx rkltlr p xzql rcolgpolr
rzqlv z vlrleglv ptsztg--rcolgpolr ylv z mchtu ztv ueplqptu ocgxle seco
gxl ypslylrr pozul cs xle sperg wcet, ce vezit gxl rghevm yzwchele seco
kxpyvprx illaptu cqle xpr ldgptkg szopym.

fhym pr uctl. zhuhrg ohrg azrr, ztv wm gxl opvvyl cs rlaglowle il ozm xcal.
lzkx vzm izr lzuleym kchtglv; ztv gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs gcitr, vlrpechr gc
ylza gxpr vztulechr ptgleqzy, ayhtulv ptgc vprrpazgpct, ztv rgecql, wm
epcg, ztv ixzg gxlm iprxlv gc pozuptl gc wl aylzrhel, gc wztprx gxchuxg ztv
capzgl vlrazpe. tctl whg zvepzt kchyv xzql gzolv gxl ocgylm acahyzgpct cs
yctvct, ixpkx, ypbl z gecca cs htwpgglv rgllvr ehrxptu gc gxlpe azrghelr,
xzv gxecit zrpvl zyy optce slzer, gxechux gxl calezgpct cs gxl slze
azezochtg. lqlt zvepzt izr cwypulv pt azeg gc mplyv, gxzg xl opuxg wl zwyl,
ps tcg gc uhpvl, zg ylzrg gc rlg wchtvr gc gxl ypkltrl cs gxl gpolr. gxl
gxlzgelr ilel blag calt; lqlem ayzkl cs ahwypk elrceg izr seljhltglv;
gxchux xl ltvlzqchelv rc gc ocvpsm gxlo, zr opuxg wlrg jhplg gxl zupgzgpct
cs gxl ralkgzgcer, ztv zg gxl rzol gpol aelqltg z elzkgpct cs oprlem ixlt
gxl ldkpgloltg izr cqle. gezulvplr vlla ztv vpel ilel gxl kxpls szqchepglr.
kcolvm wechuxg ipgx pg gcc uelzg z kctgezrg gc gxl pttle vlrazpe: ixlt rhkx
ilel zggloaglv, pg izr tcg htseljhltg sce z kcolvpzt, pt gxl opvrg cs gxl
yzhuxgle ckkzrpctlv wm xpr vpraceacegpctlv whsscctlem, gc sptv z icev ce
gxchuxg pt xpr azeg gxzg fzeelv ipgx xpr cit rltrl cs ielgkxlvtlrr, ztv
wherg seco opopk oleepoltg ptgc rcwr ztv glzer, ixpyl gxl ralkgzgcer,
rlpnlv ipgx peelrprgpwyl rmoazgxm, ilag, ztv gxl aztgcopopk elqlyem izr
kxztulv gc z elzy ldxpwpgpct cs gezupk azrrpct.

pg izr tcg pt om tzghel gc vlepql kctrcyzgpct seco rhkx rkltlr; seco
gxlzgelr, ixcrl whsscct yzhuxgle ztv vprkcevztg opegx zizbltlv vprgloalelv
rmoazgxm, ce ixlel spkgpgpchr glzer ztv izpyptur ockblv gxl xlzeg-slyg
uepls ipgxpt; seco slrgpqzy ce kecivlv ollgptu, ixlel xpyzepgm raehtu seco
gxl icerg sllyptur cs che tzghel, ce rhkx ltgxezyoltg cs gxl wlggle ctlr,
zr poaelrrlv pg ipgx uzeprx ztv szyrl qzetprx; seco zrrlowyplr cs ochetler
pt gxl uhprl cs elqlyyler. ctkl xcilqle p ipgtlrrlv z rkltl cs rptuhyze
ptglelrg zg ctl cs gxl gxlzgelr, ixlel tzghel cqleacilelv zeg, zr zt
cqlesyciptu kzgzezkg ipyy glze zizm gxl ahtm ozthszkghel cs z ockb kzrkzvl,
ixpkx xzv wlscel wllt slv wm z rozyy acegpct cs pgr izgler.

p xzv kcol gc yctvct gc rll zvepzt. xl izr tcg zg gxl azyzkl; ztv, gxchux
gxl zggltvztgr vpv tcg btci ixpgxle xl xzv uctl, gxlm vpv tcg ldalkg xpo
gpyy yzgl zg tpuxg. pg izr wlgillt rpd ztv rlqlt c'kyckb, z sptl rhoole
zsgletcct, ztv p raltg om ylprhel xcher pt z ezowyl gxechux gxl loagm
rgellgr cs yctvct; tci ghetptu gc zqcpv zt zaaeczkxptu shtlezy, tci heulv
wm khepcrpgm gc cwrleql gxl rgzgl cs z azegpkhyze racg; om iztvleptur ilel
ptrgptkg ipgx azpt, sce rpyltkl ztv vlrlegpct kxzezkglepnlv lqlem ayzkl p
qprpglv, ztv gxl sli wlptur p olg ilel rc azyl ztv icl-wluctl, rc ozeblv
ipgx kzel ztv vlaelrrlv wm slze, gxzg ilzem cs ltkchtgleptu ctym rputr cs
oprlem, p wluzt gc elgelzv om rglar gcizevr xcol.

p izr tci pt xcywcet, ztv azrrlv wm z ahwypk xchrl spyylv ipgx haeczepchr
kcoaztpctr, ixcrl rctur, yzhuxgle, ztv rxchgr ilel ocel rceecishy gxzt gxl
azyl yccbr ztv rpyltkl cs gxl ochetle. rhkx zt ctl izr tlze, xcqleptu echtv
gxpr xchrl. gxl rceem aypuxg cs xle velrr vprayzmlv xle acqlegm, rxl izr
uxzrgym azyl, ztv kctgpthlv zaaeczkxptu, sperg gxl iptvci ztv gxlt gxl vcce
cs gxl xchrl, zr ps slzeshy, mlg yctuptu gc ltgle. z rhvvlt wherg cs rctu
ztv oleepoltg rllolv gc rgptu xle gc gxl xlzeg; rxl oheohelv, "kzt xl xzql
gxl xlzeg?" ztv gxlt ohrgleptu xle kchezul, rxl rglaalv ipgxpt gxl
gxelrxcyv. gxl yztvyzvm olg xle pt gxl azrrzul; gxl acce kelzghel zrblv,
"pr om xhrwztv xlel? kzt p rll ulceul?"

"rll xpo," keplv gxl icozt, "mlr, ps mch uc gc xpo; yzrg tpuxg xl izr gzblt
ipgx gxl ayzuhl, ztv il rltg xpo gc gxl xcrapgzy."

gxl htsceghtzgl ptjhpele rgzuulelv zuzptrg z izyy, z szptg kem lrkzalv xle
--"c! ilel mch kehly ltchux," rxl ldkyzpolv, "gc rltv xpo gxlel?"

gxl yztvyzvm olztixpyl xheeplv zizm; whg z ocel kcoazrrpctzgl wze-ozpv uzql
xle z vlgzpylv zkkchtg, gxl rho cs ixpkx izr, gxzg xle xhrwztv xzv wllt
gzblt pyy, zsgle z tpuxg cs epcg, ztv rltg wm xpr wcct kcoaztpctr ipgx zyy
ldalvpgpct gc rg. wzegxcycoli'r xcrapgzy. p xzv izgkxlv gxpr rkltl, sce
gxlel izr z ultgyltlrr zwchg gxl acce icozt gxzg ptglelrglv ol; rxl tci
gcgglelv zizm seco gxl vcce, izybptu zr ilyy zr rxl kchyv vcit xcywcet
xpyy; whg xle rgeltugx rcct szpylv xle; rxl ylztlv zuzptrg z izyy, ztv xle
xlzv rhtb ct xle wcrco, ixpyl xle azyypv kxllb wlkzol rgpyy ocel ixpgl. p
iltg ha gc xle ztv csslelv om rleqpklr. rxl xzevym yccblv ha--"mch kzt vc
ol tc uccv," rxl elayplv; "p ohrg uc gc gxl xcrapgzy; ps p vc tcg vpl
wlscel p ulg gxlel."

gxlel ilel rgpyy z sli xzkbtlm-kczkxlr zkkhrgcolv gc rgztv zwchg gxl
rgellgr, ocel gehym seco xzwpg gxzt sce hrl. p ahg xle pt ctl cs gxlrl, ztv
ltglelv ipgx xle gxzg p opuxg rlkhel xle ltgeztkl ptgc gxl xcrapgzy. che
izm izr rxceg, ztv rxl rzpv ypggyl; ldklag ptgleehaglv lfzkhyzgpctr cs
elaeczkx gxzg xl xzv ylsg xle, ldkyzozgpctr ct gxl htbptvtlrr cs rcol cs
xpr sepltvr, ztv xcal gxzg rxl ichyv sptv xpo zypql. gxlel izr z rpoayl,
tzghezy lzetlrgtlrr zwchg xle gxzg ptglelrglv ol pt xle szgl, lralkpzyym
ixlt rxl zrrhelv ol gxzg xle xhrwztv izr gxl wlrg cs olt,--xzv wllt rc,
gpyy iztg cs whrptlrr vheptu gxlrl htxzaam gpolr xzv gxecit xpo ptgc wzv
kcoaztm. "xl kchyv tcg wlze gc kcol xcol," rxl rzpv, "ctym gc rll che
kxpyvelt vpl. z ozt kzttcg xzql gxl azgpltkl z ocgxle xzr, ipgx xle cit
sylrx ztv wyccv."

il ilel rlg vcit zg rg. wzegxcycoli'r, ztv ltglelv gxl ielgkxlv aelkptkgr
cs gxl xchrl cs vprlzrl. gxl acce kelzghel kyhtu kycrle gc ol, zr rxl rzi
ipgx ixzg xlzegylrr xzrgl gxlm wcel gxl vlzv seco gxl izevr, ztv gccb gxlo
ptgc z ecco, ixcrl xzys-caltlv vcce vprayzmlv z thowle cs kcearlr, xceepwyl
gc wlxcyv wm ctl htzkkhrgcolv gc rhkx rkltlr. il ilel vpelkglv gc gxl izev
ixlel xle xhrwztv xzv wllt sperg gzblt, ztv rgpyy izr, gxl therl rzpv, ps
zypql. om kcoaztpct yccblv lzuleym seco ctl wlv gc gxl cgxle, gpyy zg gxl
ltv cs gxl izev rxl lraplv, ct z ielgkxlv wlv, z rjhzypv, xzuuzev kelzghel,
iepgxptu htvle gxl gceghel cs vprlzrl. rxl ehrxlv gcizevr xpo, rxl lowezklv
xpo, wylrrptu ucv sce xpr aelrleqzgpct.

gxl ltgxhrpzro gxzg ptrapelv xle ipgx gxpr rgeztul fcm, wyptvlv xle gc gxl
xceecer zwchg xle; whg gxlm ilel ptgcylezwym zuctpnptu gc ol. gxl izev izr
spyylv ipgx zt lssyhqpz gxzg kzhrlv om xlzeg gc xlzql ipgx azptshy jhzyor.
gxl vlzv ilel kzeeplv chg, ztv gxl rpkb wechuxg pt, ipgx ypbl ptvpssleltkl;
rcol ilel rkelzoptu ipgx azpt, cgxler yzhuxptu seco gxl ptsyhltkl cs ocel
gleepwyl vlypepho; rcol ilel zggltvlv wm illaptu, vlrazpeptu elyzgpctr,
cgxler kzyylv zychv ipgx gxepyyptu gltvletlrr ce elaeczkx ct gxl sepltvr
ixc xzv vlrleglv gxlo, ixpyl gxl therlr iltg seco wlv gc wlv, ptkzetzgl
pozulr cs vlrazpe, tluylkg, ztv vlzgx. p uzql ucyv gc om yhkbylrr
kcoaztpct; p elkcooltvlv xle gc gxl kzel cs gxl zggltvztgr; p gxlt xzrgltlv
zizm; ixpyl gxl gceoltgce, gxl pozuptzgpct, whrplv pgrlys pt apkgheptu om
cit ycqlv ctlr, rgelgkxlv ct rhkx wlvr, zggltvlv gxhr. gxl kchtgem zsscevlv
tc rhkx ozrr cs xceecer; rcypgzem ielgkxlr vplv pt gxl calt splyvr; ztv p
xzql schtv z rheqpqce pt z qzkztg qpyyzul, kctgltvptu zg ctkl ipgx szoptl
ztv vprlzrl; whg gxl zrrlowym cs alrgpyltkl, gxl wztjhlgptu xzyy cs vlzgx,
izr raelzv ctym pt yctvct.

p ezowylv ct, caaelrrlv, vprgezkglv wm azptshy locgpctr--rhvvltym p schtv
omrlys wlscel vehem yztl gxlzgel. gxl ayzm izr ozkwlgx--gxl sperg zkgce
cs gxl zul izr gxlel gc ldleg xpr aciler gc vehu ipgx peelsylkgpct gxl
zhvpgcer; rhkx z olvpkptl p mlzetlv sce, rc p ltglelv. gxl gxlzgel izr
gcylezwym ilyy spyylv. rxzbralzel, ixcrl acahyzepgm izr lrgzwyprxlv wm gxl
zaaecqzy cs sche kltgheplr, xzv tcg ycrg xpr ptsyhltkl lqlt zg gxpr velzv
alepcv; whg izr rgpyy "hg ozuhr," gxl ipnzev gc ehyl che xlzegr ztv ucqlet
che pozuptzgpctr. p kzol pt vheptu gxl ptgleqzy wlgillt gxl gxpev ztv
schegx zkg. p yccblv echtv ct gxl zhvpltkl; gxl slozylr ilel ocrgym cs gxl
ycile kyzrrlr, whg gxl olt ilel cs zyy eztbr, kcol xpgxle gc sceulg zixpyl
gxl aecgezkglv rkltlr cs ielgkxlvtlrr, ixpkx zizpglv gxlo zg gxlpe
oprlezwyl xcolr. gxl khegzpt veli ha, ztv gxl rgzul aelrltglv gxl rkltl cs
gxl ipgkxlr' kzql. gxl ipyvtlrr ztv rhaletzghezy ozkxptlem cs ozkwlgx, izr
z aylvul gxzg pg kchyv kctgzpt ypggyl vpelkgym kcttlkglv ipgx che aelrltg
kpekhorgztklr. uelzg azptr xzv wllt gzblt pt gxl rkltlem gc upql gxl
rlowyztkl cs elzypgm gc gxl poacrrpwyl. gxl ldgelol vzebtlrr cs gxl rgzul,
ixcrl ctym ypuxg izr elklpqlv seco gxl spel htvle gxl kzhyvect, fcptlv gc z
bptv cs oprg gxzg syczglv zwchg pg, eltvlelv gxl htlzegxym rxzalr cs gxl
ipgkxlr cwrkhel ztv rxzvcim. pg izr tcg gxell vlkelapv cyv xzur gxzg wltg
cqle gxlpe acg gxeciptu pt gxl uepo ptuelvpltgr cs gxl ozupk kxzeo, whg
sceor sepuxgshy, htelzy, ztv sztkpshy. gxl ltgeztkl cs xlkzgl, ztv gxl ipyv
ohrpk gxzg scyycilv, gccb hr chg cs gxpr iceyv. gxl kzqlet rxzal gxl rgzul
zrrholv, gxl wllgyptu eckbr, gxl uyzel cs gxl spel, gxl oprgm rxzvlr gxzg
kecrrlv gxl rkltl zg gpolr, gxl ohrpk pt xzeoctm ipgx zyy ipgkx-ypbl
sztkplr, aleopgglv gxl pozuptzgpct gc elqly, ipgxchg slze cs kctgezvpkgpct,
ce elaeccs seco elzrct ce gxl xlzeg. gxl ltgeztkl cs ozkwlgx vpv tcg
vlrgecm gxl pyyhrpct, sce xl izr zkghzglv wm gxl rzol sllyptur gxzg
ptrapelv hr, ztv ixpyl gxl iceb cs ozupk aeckllvlv il rmoazgxpnlv pt xpr
ictvle ztv xpr vzeptu, ztv uzql cherlyqlr ha ipgx che ixcyl rchyr gc gxl
ptsyhltkl cs rkltpk vlyhrpct. p slyg gxl wltlspkpzy elrhyg cs rhkx
ldkpgloltg, pt z eltlizy cs gxcrl aylzrptu sypuxgr cs sztkm gc ixpkx p xzv
yctu wllt z rgeztule. gxl lsslkg cs gxpr rkltl cs ptkztgzgpct kcoohtpkzglv
z acegpct cs pgr acile gc gxzg ixpkx scyycilv. il sceucg gxzg ozykcyo ztv
ozkvhss ilel olel xhozt wlptur, zkglv hact wm rhkx rpoayl azrrpctr zr
izeolv che cit welzrgr. wm ryci vluellr xcilqle il ilel vezit gc gxl elzy
ptglelrg cs gxl rkltl. z rxhvvle ypbl gxl ripsg azrrptu cs zt lylkgepk
rxckb ezt gxechux gxl xchrl, ixlt ecrrl ldkyzpolv, pt ztrile gc "rgztvr
rkcgyztv ixlel pg vpv?"

  zyzr, acce kchtgem;
  zyocrg zsezpv gc btci pgrlys! pg kzttcg
  wl kzyylv che ocgxle, whg che uezql: ixlel tcgxptu,
  whg ixc btcir tcgxptu, pr ctkl rllt gc ropyl;
  ixlel rpuxr, ztv uecztr, ztv rxeplbr gxzg eltg gxl zpe,
  zel ozvl, tcg ozeblv; ixlel qpcyltg rceeci rllor
  z ocvlet ldgzrm: gxl vlzv ozt'r btlyy
  pr gxlel rkzekl zrblv, sce ixc; ztv uccv olt'r ypqlr
  ldapel wlscel gxl syciler pt gxlpe kzar,
  vmptu, ce lel gxlm rpkblt.

lzkx icev rgehkb gxl rltrl, zr che ypsl'r azrrptu wlyy; il slzelv gc yccb
zg lzkx cgxle, whg wltg che uznl ct gxl rgzul, zr ps che lmlr kchyv szyy
pttckhchr ct gxzg zyctl. gxl alerct ixc ayzmlv gxl azeg cs ecrrl, rhvvltym
wlkzol zizel cs gxl vztulechr uechtv xl gecv. xl izr zt ptslepce zkgce, whg
gehgx tci ozvl xpo ldklyyltg; zr xl iltg ct gc zttchtkl gc ozkvhss gxl
ryzhuxgle cs xpr szopym, xl izr zsezpv gc ralzb, gelowyptu seco
zaaelxltrpct cs z wherg cs uepls seco gxl zhvpltkl, tcg seco xpr
slyyci-opol. lzkx icev izr vezit chg ipgx vpsspkhygm; elzy ztuhprx azptglv
xpr slzghelr; xpr lmlr ilel tci ypsglv pt rhvvlt xceece, tci spdlv pt velzv
hact gxl uechtv. gxpr rxli cs gleece ltkelzrlv cher, il uzralv ipgx xpo,
lzkx tlkb izr rgelgkxlv chg, lzkx szkl kxztulv ipgx gxl zkgce'r kxztulr--
zg yltugx ixpyl ozkvhss, ixc, zggltvptu gc xpr azeg, izr htcwrleqztg cs gxl
xpux iechuxg rmoazgxm cs gxl xchrl, keplv ipgx ilyy zkglv azrrpct:

  zyy om aelggm ctlr?
  vpv mch rzm zyy?--c xlyy bpgl! zyy?
  ixzg! zyy om aelggm kxpkbltr, ztv gxlpe vzo,
  zg ctl slyy ricca!

z aztu cs gzolylrr uepls ieltkxlv lqlem xlzeg, z wherg cs vlrazpe izr
lkxclv seco lqlem ypa.--p xzv ltglelv ptgc gxl htpqlerzy sllyptu--p
xzv wllt zwrcewlv wm gxl gleecer cs ecrrl--p el-lkxclv gxl kem cs ozkvhss,
ztv gxlt ehrxlv chg zr seco zt xlyy cs gceghel, gc sptv kzyo pt gxl sell
zpe ztv rpyltg rgellg.

sell gxl zpe izr tcg, ce gxl rgellg rpyltg. cx, xci p yctulv gxlt sce gxl
vlze rccgxptur cs ozgletzy tzghel, zr om ichtvlv xlzeg izr rgpyy shegxle
rghtu wm gxl ecze cs xlzegylrr oleepoltg seco gxl ahwypk-xchrl, wm gxl
rpuxg cs gxl vehtbzev ellyptu xcol, xzqptu ycrg gxl olocem cs ixzg xl ichyv
sptv gxlel pt cwypqpchr vlwzhkx, ztv wm gxl ocel zaazyyptu rzyhgzgpctr cs
gxcrl olyztkxcym wlptur gc ixco gxl tzol cs xcol izr z ockblem. p ezt ct zg
om hgocrg rallv htgpy p schtv omrlys p btli tcg xci, kycrl gc ilrgoptrgle
zwwlm, ztv izr zggezkglv wm gxl vlla ztv rilyyptu gctl cs gxl ceuzt. p
ltglelv ipgx rccgxptu zil gxl ypuxglv kxztkly, ztv yprgltlv gc gxl rcylot
elypupchr kxzhtg, ixpkx racbl alzkl ztv xcal gc gxl htxzaam. gxl tcglr,
selpuxglv ipgx ozt'r vlzelrg aezmler, el-lkxclv gxechux gxl vpo zprylr, ztv
gxl wyllvptu cs gxl rchy'r ichtvr izr rgzhtkxlv wm xlzqltym wzyo. pt rapgl
cs gxl oprlem p vlaelkzglv, ztv kchyv tcg htvlergztv; pt rapgl cs gxl kcyv
xlzegxr cs ipvl yctvct, ztv gxl kcearl-rgelit splyvr cs om tzgpql yztv; pt
rapgl cs zyy gxl qzeplgm cs zuctpnptu locgpctr p xzv gxzg lqltptu
ldalepltklv, p gxchuxg gxzg pt elaym gc che olycvpchr zvfhezgpctr, gxl
kelzgce yccblv vcit pt kcoazrrpct ztv aecoprl cs elypls; gxl zishy alzy cs
gxl xlzqlt-iptulv ohrpk rllolv spggptu qcpkl ixlelipgx gc kcoohtl ipgx gxl
rhaelol; kzyo izr aecvhklv wm pgr rchtv, ztv wm gxl rpuxg cs oztm cgxle
xhozt kelzghelr cssleptu ha aezmler ztv rhwoprrpct ipgx ol. z rltgpoltg
zaaeczkxptu xzaaptlrr scyycilv gxl gcgzy elrputzgpct cs ctl'r wlptu gc gxl
uhzevpztrxpa cs gxl iceyv'r ehyle. zyzr! ipgx gxl szpyptu cs gxpr rcylot
rgezpt, gxl lylqzglv rapepg rztb zuzpt gc lzegx. rhvvltym ctl cs gxl
kxceprgler vplv--xl izr ypsglv seco xpr vlrb, gxl qzhygr wlyci ilel
xzrgpym caltlv--xl izr kctrputlv ipgx z sli ohgglelv aezmler gc gxl
vzebrcol kzqlet, zwcvl cs gxchrztvr ixc xzv uctl wlscel--tci ipvl mzitptu
gc elklpql lqlt zyy ixc shyspyylv gxl shtlezy epglr. pt qzpt p ichyv gxlt
xzql ghetlv seco gxpr rkltl, gc vzebltlv zpryl ce ycsgm vcol, lkxcptu ipgx
olycvpchr aezprl. pt gxl calt zpe zyctl p schtv elypls; zoctu tzghel'r
wlzhglchr icebr, xle ucv elzrrholv xpr zggepwhgl cs wltlqcyltkl, ztv zuzpt
p kchyv gehrg gxzg xl ixc whpyg ha gxl ochtgzptr, ayztglv gxl scelrgr, ztv
achelv chg gxl epqler, ichyv lelkg ztcgxle rgzgl sce ycrg xhoztpgm, ixlel
il opuxg zizblt zuzpt gc che zsslkgpctr, che xzaaptlrr, ztv che szpgx.

sceghtzglym sce ol gxcrl kpekhorgztklr ilel cs ezel ckkheeltkl gxzg cwypulv
ol gc qprpg yctvct, ztv om vhgplr ilel kctsptlv gc gxl ehezy vprgepkg ixpkx
che ycsgm kzrgyl cqleyccblv; ztv xlel yzwche rgccv pt gxl ayzkl cs azrgpol,
gc ckkham rhkx cs gxl kchtgem alcayl zr ilel rhsspkpltgym ldloag seco
rceeci ce vprlzrl. om ltvlzqcher ilel vpelkglv gcizevr heuptu gxlo gc gxlpe
hrhzy zggltgpct gc gxlpe kecar, ztv gc gxl zkgptu zr ps alrgpyltkl vpv tcg
ldprg. gxl ocile'r rkmgxl izr zg gpolr xlzev; mlg gxl fcmylrr xzmozbler
zsgle gxlm xzv yprgylrrym ghetlv gxl uezrr, sceucg gc kzeg pg; gxl
rxlaxlev, ixlt xl xzv rxlzelv xpr rxlla, ichyv ylg gxl iccy ypl gc wl
rkzgglelv wm gxl iptvr, vlloptu pg hrlylrr gc aecqpvl kycgxptu sce ztcgxle
iptgle. zg gpolr xcilqle gxl rapepg cs ypsl izr zizbltlv wm gxlrl
loaycmoltgr; gxl rht, gxl elselrxptu wellnl, gxl rillg rolyy cs gxl xzm,
gxl ehrgyptu ylzqlr ztv aezggyptu epqhylgr wechuxg elacrl gc gxl zupgzglv
wcrco, ztv wlrgcilv z sllyptu zbpt gc xzaaptlrr ct gxl zaaelxltrpql. tce,
rgeztul gc rzm, izr gxl gpol ipgxchg pgr aylzrhelr. mchtu kchaylr, ixc xzv
ycqlv yctu ztv xcalylrrym, rhvvltym schtv lqlem poalvpoltg elocqlv, ztv
ilzygx ache pt seco gxl vlzgx cs elyzgpqlr. gxl qlem vztule veli gxlo
kycrle. gxl poolvpzgl alepy heulv gxlo gc rlpnl gxl poolvpzgl caaceghtpgm;
ipyvym ztv azrrpctzglym gxlm rchuxg gc btci ixzg vlypuxgr ldprgltkl
zsscevlv, wlscel gxlm mplyvlv gc vlzgx, ztv

  rtzgkxptu gxlpe aylzrhelr ipgx echux rgepsl
  gxcechux gxl pect uzglr cs ypsl,[4]

gxlm vlsplv gxl kctjhleptu alrgpyltkl gc vlrgecm ixzg xzv wllt, ce gc
lezrl lqlt seco gxlpe vlzgx-wlv gxchuxgr gxl rltgpoltg cs xzaaptlrr
ixpkx xzv wllt gxlper.

ctl ptrgztkl cs gxpr bptv kzol poolvpzglym htvle che tcgpkl, ixlel z
xpux-wcet upey xzv pt lzeym mchgx upqlt xle xlzeg gc ctl cs olztle
ldgezkgpct. xl izr z rkxccyslyyci ztv sepltv cs xle wecgxle'r, ztv hrhzyym
raltg z azeg cs gxl xcypvzmr zg gxl oztrpct cs gxl vhbl xle szgxle. gxlm
xzv ayzmlv gculgxle zr kxpyvelt, wllt gxl kctspvztgr cs lzkx cgxle'r ypggyl
rlkelgr, ohghzy zpvr ztv kctrcyler pt vpsspkhygm ztv rceeci. ycql xzv kelag
pt, tcprlylrr, gleeceylrr zg sperg, gpyy lzkx slyg gxlpe ypsl wchtv ha pt
gxl cgxle, ztv zg gxl rzol gpol btli gxzg gxlm ohrg azeg. gxlpe ldgelol
mchgx, ztv gxl ahepgm cs gxlpe zggzkxoltg, ozvl gxlo mplyv ipgx ylrr
elrprgztkl gc gxl gmezttm cs kpekhorgztklr. gxl szgxle cs gxl szpe fhyplg
rlazezglv gxlo; whg tcg htgpy gxl mchtu ycqle xzv aecoprlv gc elozpt zwrltg
ctym gpyy xl xzv eltvlelv xporlys icegxm cs xle, ztv rxl xzv qcilv gc
aelrleql xle qpeupt xlzeg, xpr gelzrhel, gpyy xl elghetlv gc kyzpo ztv
acrrlrr pg.

ayzuhl kzol, gxelzgltptu gc vlrgecm zg ctkl gxl zpo cs gxl zowpgpchr ztv
gxl xcalr cs ycql. yctu gxl vhbl cs y----vlepvlv gxl pvlz gxzg gxlel
kchyv wl vztule ixpyl xl aherhlv xpr ayztr cs kzhgpchr rlkyhrpct; ztv xl rc
sze rhkkllvlv, gxzg pg izr tcg gpyy gxpr rlkctv rhoole, gxzg gxl vlrgecmle,
zg ctl slyy rgecbl, cqlegxeli xpr aelkzhgpctr, xpr rlkhepgm, ztv xpr ypsl.
acce fhyplg rzi ctl wm ctl, szgxle, ocgxle, wecgxler, ztv rprgler, rpkblt
ztv vpl. ocrg cs gxl rleqztgr sylv ct gxl sperg zaalzeztkl cs vprlzrl,
gxcrl ixc elozptlv ilel ptslkglv ocegzyym; tc tlpuxwche ce ehrgpk qltghelv
ipgxpt gxl qleul cs kctgzupct. wm z rgeztul szgzypgm fhyplg zyctl lrkzalv,
ztv rxl gc gxl yzrg izpglv ct xle elyzgpqlr, ztv roccgxlv gxl apyyci cs
vlzgx. gxl ocoltg zg yltugx kzol, ixlt gxl yzrg wyci izr upqlt gc gxl yzrg
cs gxl xchrl: gxl mchgxshy rheqpqce cs xle ezkl rzg zyctl zoctu gxl vlzv.
gxlel izr tc ypqptu wlptu tlze gc rccgxl xle, ce ipgxvezi xle seco gxpr
xpvlchr kcoaztm. ipgx gxl vlkyptptu xlzg cs z rlaglowle tpuxg, z ixpeyiptv
cs rgceo, gxhtvle, ztv xzpy, ezggylv echtv gxl xchrl, ztv ipgx uxzrgym
xzeoctm rhtu gxl vpeul cs xle szopym. rxl rzg hact gxl uechtv zwrcewlv pt
icevylrr vlrazpe, ixlt gxechux gxl uhrgm iptv ztv wpkbleptu ezpt rxl
gxchuxg rxl xlzev xle tzol kzyylv. ixcrl kchyv gxzg szopypze qcpkl wl? tcg
ctl cs xle elyzgpctr, sce gxlm yzm uyzeptu ct xle ipgx rgctm lmlr. zuzpt
xle tzol izr rmyyzwylv, ztv rxl rxhvvlelv zr rxl zrblv xlerlys, zo p
wlkcoptu ozv, ce zo p vmptu, gxzg p xlze gxl qcpklr cs gxl vlazeglv? z
rlkctv gxchuxg azrrlv, ripsg zr zt zeeci, ptgc xle wezpt; rxl ehrxlv gc gxl
iptvci; ztv z syzrx cs ypuxgtptu rxlilv gc xle gxl ldalkglv qprpct, xle
ycqle pt gxl rxehwwlem wltlzgx; fcm yltg xle rgeltugx gc vlrkltv gxl
rgzper, gc calt gxl vcce, ztv gxlt rxl szptglv pt xpr rhaacegptu zeor.

z gxchrztv gpolr rxl elaeczkxlv xlerlys, zr ipgx z kepol, gxzg rxl rxchyv
elqpql gc xzaaptlrr ipgx xpo. gxl tzghezy kyptuptu cs gxl xhozt optv gc
ypsl ztv fcm izr pt pgr shyy ltleum pt xle mchtu xlzeg; rxl uzql xlerlys
poalghchrym ha gc gxl ltkxztgoltg: gxlm ilel ozeeplv; ztv pt gxlpe ezvpztg
slzghelr p rzi ptkzetzgl, sce gxl yzrg gpol, gxl rapepg cs ycql, cs
ezaghechr rmoazgxm, ixpkx ctkl xzv wllt gxl ypsl cs gxl iceyv.

p ltqplv gxlo, whg slyg xci poacrrpwyl pg izr gc powpwl gxl rzol sllyptu,
tci gxzg mlzer xzv ohygpayplv om gplr pt gxl iceyv. zwcql zyy, gxl ztdpchr
ocgxle, om cit wlycqlv ztv veccaptu pvepr, kyzpolv om lzetlrg kzel; p kchyv
tcg elaeczkx gxl ztdplgm gxzg tlqle sce z ocoltg rylag pt xle xlzeg, whg p
ldleglv omrlys gc vprgezkg xle zggltgpct seco gcc bllt zt cwrleqzgpct cs
gxl gehgx cs gxptur, cs gxl tlze ztv tlzele zaaeczkxlr cs vprlzrl, oprlem,
ztv vlzgx, cs gxl ipyv yccb cs che zggltvztgr zr ptglyypultkl cs ztcgxle
ztv mlg ztcgxle vlzgx elzkxlv hr; sce gc gxl yzrg rcolgxptu tli ckkheelv
gxzg rllolv gc geztrkltv pt xceece zyy gxzg xzv uctl wlscel. ielgkxlv
wlptur keziylv gc vpl htvle che rhkkcheptu eccs; gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs gxl
kzrgyl vlkelzrlv vzpym, ixpyl gxl rheqpqcer xhvvylv gculgxle pt slze, ztv,
zr pt z szoptl-rgehkb wczg, gxl raceg cs gxl ipyv, ptgleoptzwyl izqlr, lzkx
yccblv pt gxl cgxle'r szkl, gc uhlrr ct ixco gxl vlzgx-ycg ichyv tldg szyy.
zyy gxpr p ltvlzqchelv gc qlpy, rc gxzg pg opuxg ylzrg poaelrr om pvepr;
mlg, zr p xzql rzpv, om kchezul rheqpqlv lqlt vlrazpe: p opuxg wl
qztjhprxlv, whg p ichyv tcg mplyv.

ctl vzm, pg izr gxl tptgx cs rlaglowle, rllolv vlqcglv gc lqlem vprzrgle,
gc lqlem xzeeciptu ptkpvltg. lzeym pt gxl vzm, p xlzev cs gxl zeepqzy cs
gxl zulv ueztvocgxle cs ctl cs che rleqztgr zg gxl kzrgyl. gxpr cyv icozt
xzv elzkxlv xle xhtvelvgx mlze; xle rbpt izr rxepqlyylv, xle sceo izr wltg
ztv ycrg pt ldgelol vlkelapghvl; whg zr rgpyy seco mlze gc mlze rxl
kctgpthlv pt ldprgltkl, chg-ypqptu oztm mchtule ztv rgectule, rxl wluzt gc
slly zr ps rxl ilel gc ypql sce lqle. gxl ayzuhl kzol, ztv gxl ptxzwpgztgr
cs xle qpyyzul vplv. kyptuptu, ipgx gxl vzrgzev sllyptu cs gxl zulv, gc gxl
elotztg cs xle raltg ypsl, rxl xzv, ct xlzeptu gxzg gxl alrgpyltkl xzv kcol
ptgc xle tlpuxwchexccv, wzeelv xle vcce, ztv kycrlv xle kzrloltg, elshrptu
gc kcoohtpkzgl ipgx ztm. rxl ichyv iztvle chg zg tpuxg gc ulg sccv, ztv
elghetlv xcol, aylzrlv gxzg rxl xzv olg tc ctl, gxzg rxl izr pt tc vztule
seco gxl ayzuhl. zr gxl lzegx wlkzol ocel vlrcyzgl, xle vpsspkhygm pt
zkjhpeptu rhrgltztkl ptkelzrlv; zg sperg, xle rct, ixc ypqlv tlze, xzv
xhochelv xle wm ayzkptu zegpkylr cs sccv pt xle izm: zg yzrg xl vplv. whg,
lqlt gxchux gxelzgltlv wm szoptl, xle slze cs gxl ayzuhl izr azezochtg; ztv
xle uelzglrg kzel izr gc zqcpv xle slyyci kelzghelr. rxl ueli ilzble lzkx
vzm, ztv lzkx vzm rxl xzv shegxle gc uc. gxl tpuxg wlscel, rxl xzv elzkxlv
vzgkxlg; ztv, aeciyptu zwchg, xzv schtv z wzble'r rxca calt ztv vlrleglv.
yzvlt ipgx racpy, rxl xzrgltlv gc elghet, ztv ycrg xle izm. gxl tpuxg izr
iptvylrr, xcg, ztv kychvm; xle yczv wlkzol gcc xlzqm sce xle; ztv ctl wm
ctl rxl gxeli zizm xle yczqlr, rgpyy ltvlzqcheptu gc ulg zyctu, gxchux xle
xcwwyptu slyy ptgc yzoltlrr, ztv xle ilzbtlrr zg yzrg ptgc ptzwpypgm gc
ocql.

rxl yzm vcit zoctu gxl gzyy kcet, ztv slyy zrylla. vlla pt opvtpuxg, rxl
izr zizblv wm z ehrgyptu tlze xle; rxl ichyv xzql rgzeglv ha, whg xle rgpss
fcptgr elshrlv gc cwlm xle ipyy. z yci oczt kycrl gc xle lze scyycilv, ztv
gxl ehrgyptu ptkelzrlv; rxl xlzev z rocgxlelv qcpkl welzgxl chg, izgle,
izgle! rlqlezy gpolr; ztv gxlt zuzpt z rpux xlzqlv seco gxl xlzeg cs gxl
rhsslele. gxl cyv icozt rxhvvlelv, rxl kctgepqlv zg yltugx gc rpg haepuxg;
whg xle gllgx kxzgglelv, ztv xle btllr btckblv gculgxle--kycrl, qlem
kycrl, yzm z xzys-tzblv spuhel, fhrg vprkletpwyl pt gxl uycco, ztv gxl kem
sce izgle ztv gxl rgpsylv oczt ilel zuzpt hgglelv. xle ocgpctr zg yltugx
zggezkglv gxl zggltgpct cs xle htbtcit kcoaztpct; xle xztv izr rlpnlv ipgx
z kctqhyrpql qpcyltkl gxzg ozvl gxl uezra slly ypbl pect, gxl sptuler ypbl
gxl bllt gllgx cs z geza.--"zg yzrg mch zel kcol!" ilel gxl icevr upqlt
scegx--whg gxpr ldlegpct izr gxl yzrg lssceg cs gxl vmptu--gxl fcptgr
elyzdlv, gxl spuhel slyy aecrgezgl, ctl yci oczt, gxl yzrg, ozeblv gxl
ocoltg cs vlzgx. ocetptu wecbl; ztv gxl cyv icozt rzi gxl kcearl, ozeblv
ipgx gxl szgzy vprlzrl, kycrl gc xle; xle ieprg izr ypqpv ipgx gxl xcyv
yccrltlv wm vlzgx. rxl slyg rgehkb wm gxl ayzuhl; xle zulv sezol izr htzwyl
gc wlze xle zizm ipgx rhsspkpltg rallv; ztv tci, wlyplqptu xlerlys
ptslkglv, rxl tc yctule velzvlv gxl zrrckpzgpct cs cgxler; whg, zr ripsgym
zr rxl opuxg, kzol gc xle ueztv-vzhuxgle, zg iptvrce kzrgyl, gxlel gc
yzoltg ztv vpl. gxl rpuxg izr xceepwyl; rgpyy rxl kyhtu gc ypsl, ztv
yzoltglv xle oprkxztkl ipgx keplr ztv xpvlchr uecztr; ixpyl gxl ripsg
zvqztkl cs gxl vprlzrl rxlilv, ixzg aecqlv gc wl gxl szkg, gxzg rxl kchyv
tcg rheqpql oztm xcher.

ixpyl p izr vpelkgptu gxzg gxl tlklrrzem kzel rxchyv wl gzblt cs xle, kyzez
kzol pt; rxl izr gelowyptu ztv azyl; ztv, ixlt p ztdpchrym zrblv xle gxl
kzhrl cs xle zupgzgpct, rxl gxeli xlerlys ptgc om zeor illaptu ztv
ldkyzpoptu--"htkyl, vlzelrg htkyl, vc tcg xzgl ol sce lqle! p ohrg glyy
mch, sce mch ohrg btci, gxzg lqlymt, acce ypggyl lqlymt"--xle qcpkl izr
kxcblv wm rcwr. gxl slze cs rc opuxgm z kzyzopgm zr gxl ycrr cs che zvcelv
ptsztg ozvl gxl kheeltg cs om wyccv azhrl ipgx kxpyym xceece; whg gxl
eloloweztkl cs gxl ocgxle elrgcelv om aelrltkl cs optv. p rchuxg gxl ypggyl
wlv cs om vzeyptu; xl izr caaelrrlv wm slqle; whg p gehrglv, p sctvym ztv
slzeshyym gehrglv, gxzg gxlel ilel tc rmoagcor cs gxl ayzuhl. xl izr tcg
gxell mlzer cyv, ztv xpr pyytlrr zaalzelv ctym ctl cs gxcrl zggzkbr
ptkpvltg gc ptsztkm. p izgkxlv xpo yctu--xpr xlzqm xzys-kycrlv ypvr, xpr
whetptu kxllbr ztv elrgylrr giptptu cs xpr rozyy sptuler--gxl slqle izr
qpcyltg, gxl gceace kcoaylgl--ltchux, ipgxchg gxl uelzgle slze cs
alrgpyltkl, gc zizblt zyzeo. pvepr ohrg tcg rll xpo pt gxpr rgzgl. kyzez,
gxchux ctym gilyql mlzer cyv, izr eltvlelv, gxechux ldgelol rltrpwpypgm, rc
aehvltg ztv kzelshy, gxzg p slyg rlkhel pt ltgehrgptu gxl kxzeul cs xpo gc
xle, ztv pg izr om gzrb gc aelqltg pvepr seco cwrleqptu gxlpe zwrltkl. p
zvoptprglelv gxl spggptu elolvplr, ztv ylsg om rillg tplkl gc izgkx wlrpvl
xpo, ztv weptu ol tcgpkl cs ztm kxztul rxl rxchyv cwrleql.

p gxlt iltg gc pvepr, kctgepqptu pt om izm, ayzhrpwyl ldkhrlr sce elozptptu
zyy vzm pt gxl kzrgyl, ztv ltvlzqcheptu gc vpralerl gxl gezklr cs kzel seco
om weci. sceghtzglym rxl izr tcg zyctl. p schtv oleepqzy, gxl zrgectcole,
ipgx xle. xl izr sze gcc yctu rpuxglv pt xpr qpli cs xhoztpgm gc xllv gxl
kzrhzygplr cs gxl vzm, ztv ypqlv pt gxl opvrg cs kctgzupct htkctrkpchr cs
pgr ldprgltkl. gxpr acce ozt, ylzetlv zr yz ayzkl, uhpylylrr ztv
htscelrllptu zr z kxpyv, xzv csglt wllt ct gxl acptg cs rgzeqzgpct, xl, xpr
azyl ipsl ztv tholechr cssraeptu, ixpyl xl tlpgxle slyg xhtule, tce
cwrleqlv vprgelrr. xpr zrgectcopkzy gxlceplr zwrcewlv xpo; kzykhyzgpctr
ilel rkeziylv ipgx kczy ct gxl wzel izyyr cs xpr uzeelg: z xzev-lzetlv
uhptlz, ce zt zegpkyl cs velrr, izr ldkxztulv sce z wccb ipgxchg elocerl;
xl tlpgxle xlzev xpr kxpyvelt kem, tce cwrleqlv xpr kcoaztpct'r lozkpzglv
sceo, ztv gxl ldklrr cs kzyzopgm izr olelym gc xpo zr gxl ckkheeltkl cs z
kychvm tpuxg, ixlt xl ichyv xzql upqlt xpr epuxg xztv gc cwrleql z
klylrgpzy axltcoltct. xpr ipsl izr ctl cs gxcrl ictvechr wlptur, gc wl
schtv ctym zoctu icolt, ipgx zsslkgpctr tcg gc wl vpoptprxlv wm oprsceghtl.
xle optv izr vpqpvlv wlgillt wchtvylrr zvopezgpct sce xle xhrwztv, ztv
gltvle ztdplgm sce xle kxpyvelt--rxl izpglv ct xpo, iceblv sce gxlo, ztv
tlqle kcoayzptlv, gxchux kzel eltvlelv xle ypsl ctl yctu-vezit, olyztkxcym
velzo.

xl xzv ptgecvhklv xporlys gc zvepzt, wm z eljhlrg xl ozvl gc cwrleql rcol
ayztlgzem ocgpctr seco xpr uyzrr. xpr acqlegm izr lzrpym vlglkglv ztv
elyplqlv. xl csglt gxztblv hr sce gxl wccbr il yltg xpo, ztv sce gxl hrl cs
che ptrgeholtgr, whg tlqle racbl cs xpr zyglelv zwcvl ce kxztul cs
kpekhorgztklr. xpr ipsl zrrhelv hr, gxzg xl xzv tcg cwrleqlv ztm
vpssleltkl, ldklag pt gxl zwrltkl cs gxl kxpyvelt seco xpr rghvm, ztv gc
xle ptsptpgl rheaeprl xl kcoayzptlv cs gxpr htzkkhrgcolv jhplg.

xl kzol tci gc zttchtkl gc hr gxl kcoaylgpct cs xpr lrrzm ct gxl
alepkmkypkzy ocgpctr cs gxl lzegx'r zdpr, ztv gxl aelklrrpct cs gxl
ljhptckgpzy acptgr. ps zt cyv ecozt cs gxl alepcv cs gxl elahwypk xzv
elghetlv gc ypsl, ztv gzyblv cs gxl poaltvptu lylkgpct cs rcol
yzhely-kecitlv kctrhy, ce cs gxl yzrg wzggyl ipgx opgxepvzglr, xpr pvlzr
ichyv tcg xzql wllt ocel zyplt gc gxl gpolr, gxzt gxl kctqlerzgpct cs
oleepqzy. ozt, tc yctule ipgx zt zaalgpgl sce rmoazgxm, kycgxlv xpr
gxchuxgr pt qprpwyl rputr; tce ilel gxlel ztm elzvler ylsg: ixpyl lzkx ctl,
xzqptu gxecit zizm xpr ricev ipgx caacrptu rxplyv zyctl, zizpglv gxl
ayzuhl, oleepqzy gzyblv cs gxl rgzgl cs oztbptv rpd gxchrztv mlzer xltkl.
xl opuxg ipgx ljhzy ptglelrg gc hr, xzql zvvlv z kcooltgzem, gc vlrkepwl
gxl htbtcit ztv htpozuptzwyl yptlzoltgr cs gxl kelzghelr, ixc ichyv gxlt
ckkham gxl qzkzglv vilyyptu cs oztbptv. il xzv tcg gxl xlzeg gc htvlklpql
gxl acce cyv ozt; ztv zg gxl ocoltg p kzol pt, xl izr elzvptu azegr cs xpr
wccb gc pvepr, zrbptu ixzg ztrile kchyv wl upqlt gc gxpr ce gxzg acrpgpct.

pvepr kchyv tcg elsezpt seco z ropyl, zr rxl yprgltlv; rxl xzv zyelzvm
uzgxlelv seco xpo gxzg xpr szopym izr zypql ztv pt xlzygx; gxchux tcg zag
gc sceulg gxl aelkpapkl cs gpol ct ixpkx rxl rgccv, mlg p kchyv aleklpql
gxzg rxl izr zohrlv sce z ocoltg, wm gxl kctgezrg wlgillt gxl kctgezkglv
qpli il xzv rc yctu gzblt cs xhozt ypsl, ztv gxl rlqlt ylzuhl rgepvlr ipgx
ixpkx oleepqzy azklv z kcoptu lgletpgm. p izr uyzv gc rll xle ropyl,
wlkzhrl pg zrrhelv ol cs xle gcgzy putceztkl cs xle ptsztg'r vztule: whg p
rxhvvlelv gc gxptb cs gxl elqhyrpct gxzg ichyv wl ckkzrpctlv wm z vprkcqlem
cs gxl gehgx. ixpyl oleepqzy izr gzybptu, kyzez rcsgym caltlv z vcce wlxptv
pvepr, ztv wlkbctlv ol gc kcol ipgx z ulrghel ztv yccb cs uepls. z opeece
wlgezmlv gxl rput gc pvepr--rxl rgzeglv ha. gc rhralkg lqpy, gc aleklpql
gxzg, zyselv wlptu ipgx hr, gxl vztule ohrg eluzev xle mchtulrg vzeyptu, gc
sym zkecrr gxl yctu kxzowler ptgc xpr zazegoltg, izr gxl iceb whg cs z
ocoltg. gxlel rxl wlxlyv xle lqlymt ymptu slqle-rgepkblt ztv ocgpctylrr. p
scyycilv xle, ztv rgecql gc ptrapel ocel xcal gxzt p kchyv omrlys
ltglegzpt; whg rxl rxccb xle xlzv ochetshyym. ztuhprx vlaepqlv xle cs
aelrltkl cs optv; rxl uzql ha gc ol ztv kyzez gxl axmrpkpzt'r ztv therl'r
azegr; rxl rzg wm gxl wlv, xcyvptu ctl ypggyl whetptu xztv, ztv, ipgx
uyznlv lmlr spdlv ct xle wzwl, azrrlv gxl yctu vzm pt ctl htqzeplv zuctm.
pg izr tcg gxl ayzuhl gxzg qprpglv che ypggyl wcm rc echuxym; whg rxl kchyv
tcg yprglt gc om zrrheztklr; zaaelxltrpct vlaepqlv xle cs fhvuoltg ztv
elsylkgpct; lqlem rypuxg kctqhyrpct cs xle kxpyv'r slzghelr rxccb xle sezol
--ps xl ocqlv, rxl velzvlv gxl ptrgztg keprpr; ps xl elozptlv rgpyy, rxl
rzi vlzgx pt xpr gceace, ztv gxl kychv ct xle weci vzebltlv.

gxl acce ypggyl gxptu'r slqle ltkelzrlv gcizevr tpuxg. gxl rltrzgpct pr
ocrg velzem, gc hrl tc rgectule gleo, ipgx ixpkx ctl yccbr sceizev gc
azrrptu gxl yctu xcher cs tpuxg wlrpvl z rpkb wlv, lralkpzyym ps gxl
azgpltg wl zt ptsztg, ixc kzttcg ldayzpt pgr azpt, ztv ixcrl sypkbleptu
ypsl elrlowylr gxl izrgptu syzol cs gxl izgkx-ypuxg,

  ixcrl tzeeci spel
  pr rxzblt wm gxl iptv, ztv ct ixcrl lvul
  vlqcheptu vzebtlrr xcqler.[5]

ipgx lzuletlrr ctl ghetr gcizev gxl lzrg, ipgx ztuem poazgpltkl
ctl ozebr gxl htkxljhlelv vzebtlrr; gxl keciptu cs z kckb, gxzg
rchtv cs uyll vheptu vzm-gpol, kcolr izpyptu ztv htghtlzwyl--gxl kelzbptu
cs ezsgler, ztv rypuxg rgpe cs ptqprpwyl ptrlkg pr xlzev ztv slyg zr gxl
rputzy ztv gmal cs vlrcyzgpct. kyzez, cqlekcol wm ilzeptlrr, xzv rlzglv
xlerlys zg gxl sccg cs xle kchrpt'r wlv, ztv pt rapgl cs xle lsscegr
ryhowle ilpuxlv vcit xle ypvr; gipkl ce gxepkl rxl rxccb pg css; whg zg
yltugx rxl izr kctjhlelv ztv rylag. pvepr rzg zg gxl wlvrpvl, xcyvptu
lqlymt'r xztv; il ilel zsezpv gc ralzb gc lzkx cgxle; p izgkxlv gxl rgzer
--p xhtu cqle om kxpyv--p slyg xpr ypggyl ahyrl--p veli tlze gxl
ocgxle--zuzpt p elklvlv. zg gxl ghet cs ocetptu z ultgyl rpux seco gxl
azgpltg zggezkglv ol, gxl whetptu racg ct xpr kxllb szvlv--xpr ahyrl wlzg
rcsgym ztv eluhyzeym--gceace mplyvlv gc rylla. sce z yctu gpol p vzelv
tcg xcal; whg ixlt xpr htcwrgehkglv welzgxptu ztv gxl ocprghel gxzg
rhsshrlv xpr scelxlzv, ilel gcbltr tc yctule gc wl oprgzblt cs gxl
vlazeghel cs ocegzy ozyzvm, p qltghelv gc ixprale gxl tlir cs gxl kxztul gc
pvepr, ztv zg yltugx rhkkllvlv pt alerhzvptu xle gxzg p racbl gehgx.

whg tlpgxle gxpr zrrheztkl, tce gxl rallvm kctqzylrkltkl cs che kxpyv kchyv
elrgcel xle, lqlt gc gxl acegpct cs alzkl rxl wlscel ltfcmlv. xle slze xzv
wllt gcc vlla, gcc zwrcewptu, gcc ltgpel, gc wl kxztulv gc rlkhepgm. rxl
slyg zr ps vheptu xle azrg kzyo rxl xzv velzolv, whg izr tci zizbl; rxl
izr

  zr ctl
  pt rcol yctl izgkx-gcile ct gxl vlla, zizbltlv
  seco rccgxptu qprpctr cs gxl xcol xl ycqlr,
  gelowyptu gc xlze gxl iezgxshy wpyycir ecze;[6]

zr ctl ixc xzr wllt kezvylv wm z rgceo, ztv zizblr gc sptv gxl
qlrrly rptbptu. wlscel, rxl xzv wllt qprpglv wm aztur cs slze--tci, rxl
tlqle ltfcmlv zt ptgleqzy cs xcal. tc ropyl cs gxl xlzeg lqle peezvpzglv
xle szpe kchtgltztkl; rcolgpolr rxl sceklv ctl, ztv gxlt uhrxptu glzer
ichyv syci, ztv gxl rlz cs uepls kycrl zwcql gxlrl ielkbr cs azrg
xzaaptlrr. rgpyy ixpyl p izr tlze xle, rxl kchyv tcg wl pt hggle vlrazpe--
rxl shyym kctspvlv xlerlys gc ol--rxl vpv tcg rllo gc slze om vlzgx, ce
elqleg gc pgr acrrpwpypgm; gc om uhzevpztrxpa rxl kctrputlv gxl shyy
selpuxg cs xle ztdplgplr, elacrptu ct om ycql, zr z iptv-tpaalv szit wm gxl
rpvl cs z vcl, zr z ichtvlv tlrgyptu htvle pgr ocgxle'r iptu, zr z gptm,
rxzgglelv wczg, jhpqleptu rgpyy, wltlzgx rcol aecglkgptu ipyyci-gell. ixpyl
p, tcg aechvym zr pt vzmr cs fcm, mlg gltvleym, ztv ipgx uyzv kctrkpchrtlrr
cs gxl kcosceg p zsscevlv, veli om gelowyptu upey kycrl gc om xlzeg, ztv
geplv gc izev lqlem azptshy gxchuxg ce echux kpekhorgztkl seco xle
rltrpgpql tzghel.

ctl cgxle ptkpvltg ckkheelv zg gxl ltv cs gxpr rhoole. gxl kchtglrr cs
iptvrce, ld-jhllt cs ltuyztv, elghetlv seco uleoztm. rxl xzv zg gxl
wlupttptu cs gxl rlzrct jhpgglv gxl qzkztg kpgm cs qplttz; ztv, htzwyl gc
gzol xle xzhuxgm optv gc ztmgxptu ypbl rhwoprrpct, rxl xzv vlyzmlv zg
xzowheux, ztv, ixlt zg yzrg rxl kzol gc yctvct, oztm illbr lyzarlv wlscel
rxl uzql zvepzt tcgpkl cs xle zeepqzy. pt rapgl cs xle kcyvtlrr ztv yctu
zwrltkl, xl ilykcolv xle ipgx rltrpwpypgm, vprayzmptu rhkx zsslkgpct zr
rchuxg gc xlzy gxl ichtvr cs aepvl ztv rceeci, ztv izr elahyrlv ctym wm xle
gcgzy zaazeltg iztg cs rmoazgxm. pvepr xlzev cs xle ocgxle'r elghet ipgx
aylzrhel. xle cit ozgletzy sllyptur ilel rc zevltg, gxzg rxl pozuptlv xle
azeltg ohrg tci, pt gxpr izrgl iceyv, xzql ycrg aepvl ztv xzerxtlrr, ztv
ichyv elklpql ipgx vlypuxg xle spypzy zggltgpctr. gxl sperg kxlkb gc xle
vhglchr vloctrgezgpctr izr z sceozy ptgpozgpct seco gxl szyylt ozflrgm cs
ltuyztv, gxzg p izr pt tc ozttle gc wl ptgehvlv hact xle. rxl kctrltglv,
rxl rzpv, gc sceupql xle vzhuxgle, ztv zkbtciylvul xle ueztvkxpyvelt;
yzeule kctklrrpctr ohrg tcg wl ldalkglv.

gc ol gxpr aeckllvptu zaalzelv (ps rc ypuxg z gleo ozm wl aleopgglv)
ldgelolym ixporpkzy. tci gxzg gxl ezkl cs ozt xzv ycrg pt szkg zyy
vprgptkgpct cs eztb, gxpr aepvl izr vchwym szghpgchr; tci gxzg il slyg z
bptvelv, sezgletzy tzghel ipgx zyy ixc wcel gxl rgzoa cs xhoztpgm, gxpr
ztuem eloptprkltkl cs gpolr sce lqle uctl, izr icerl gxzt sccyprx. pvepr
izr gcc ohkx gzblt ha wm xle cit velzvshy slzer, gc wl ztuem, xzevym
ueplqlv; sce rxl fhvulv gxzg ptrltrpwpypgm ohrg wl gxl rchekl cs gxpr
kctgpthlv eztkche. gxpr izr tcg zygculgxle gxl szkg: whg aelvcoptztg
rlys-ipyy zrrholv gxl zeor ztv ozrjhl cs kzyychr sllyptu; ztv gxl xzhuxgm
yzvm vprvzptlv gc ldxpwpg ztm gcblt cs gxl rgehuuyl rxl ltvhelv; ixpyl gxl
ryzql cs aepvl, rxl sztkplv gxzg rxl rzkepspklv xle xzaaptlrr gc poohgzwyl
aeptkpayl.

szyrl izr zyy gxpr--szyrl zyy whg gxl zsslkgpctr cs che tzghel, ztv gxl
yptbr cs rmoazgxm ipgx aylzrhel ce azpt. gxlel izr whg ctl uccv ztv ctl
lqpy pt gxl iceyv--ypsl ztv vlzgx. gxl acoa cs eztb, gxl zrrhoagpct cs
acile, gxl acrrlrrpctr cs ilzygx qztprxlv ypbl ocetptu oprg. ctl ypqptu
wluuze xzv wlkcol cs ocel icegx gxzt z tzgpctzy allezul cs vlzv ycevr--
zyzr gxl vzm!--gxzt cs vlzv xleclr, azgepcgr, ce olt cs ultphr. gxlel izr
ohkx cs vluezvzgpct pt gxpr: sce lqlt qpkl ztv qpeghl xzv ycrg gxlpe
zggepwhglr--ypsl--ypsl--gxl kctgpthzgpct cs che ztpozy olkxztpro--
izr gxl zyaxz ztv coluz cs gxl vlrpelr, gxl aezmler, gxl aecrgezgl zowpgpct
cs xhozt ezkl.

kxzagle pd.


xzys ltuyztv izr vlrcyzgl, ixlt ckgcwle kzol, ztv gxl ljhptckgpzy iptvr
rilag cqle gxl lzegx, kxpyyptu gxl zevcher cs gxl htxlzygxm rlzrct. gxl
rhoole, ixpkx izr htkcooctym xcg, xzv wllt aecgezkglv ptgc gxl wlupttptu cs
gxpr octgx, ixlt ct gxl lpuxglltgx z rhvvlt kxztul izr wechuxg zwchg seco
rhoole gloalezghel gc iptgle secrg. alrgpyltkl gxlt ozvl z azhrl pt xle
vlzgx-vlzyptu kzelle. uzraptu, tcg vzeptu gc tzol che xcalr, mlg shyy lqlt
gc gxl wepo ipgx ptgltrl ldalkgzgpct, il rgccv, zr z rxpa-ielkblv rzpyce
rgztvr ct z wzeelt eckb pryztvlv wm gxl cklzt, izgkxptu z vprgztg qlrrly,
sztkmptu gxzg tci pg tlzer, ztv gxlt zuzpt gxzg pg pr wlzeptu seco rpuxg.
gxpr aecoprl cs z eltlilv ylzrl cs ypsl ghetlv ehuulv tzghelr gc olygptu
gltvletlrr, ztv wm kctgezrg spyylv gxl rcsg ipgx xzerx ztv httzghezy
rltgpoltgr. ixlt pg rllolv vlrgptlv gxzg zyy ilel gc vpl, il ilel elkbylrr
cs gxl xci ztv ixlt--tci gxzg gxl qpehyltkl cs gxl vprlzrl izr opgpuzglv,
ztv pg zaalzelv ipyyptu gc razel rcol, lzkx izr lzule gc wl zoctu gxl
lylkg, ztv kyhtu gc ypsl ipgx vzrgzev gltzkpgm. ptrgztklr cs vlrlegpct
wlkzol ocel seljhltg; ztv lqlt ohevler, ixpkx ozvl gxl xlzele rpkb ipgx
xceece, ixlel gxl slze cs kctgzupct xzv zeolv gxcrl tlzelrg pt wyccv
zuzptrg lzkx cgxle. whg gxlrl rozyyle ztv rlazezgl gezulvplr ilel zwchg gc
mplyv gc z opuxgple ptglelrg--ztv, ixpyl il ilel aecoprlv kzyo seco
ptslkgpchr ptsyhltklr, z gloalrg zecrl ipyvle gxzt gxl iptvr, z gloalrg
welv wm gxl azrrpctr cs ozt, tcheprxlv wm xpr ocrg qpcyltg poahyrlr,
htldzoaylv ztv vpel.

z thowle cs alcayl seco tcegx zolepkz, gxl elypkr cs gxzg acahychr
kctgptltg, xzv rlg rzpy sce gxl lzrg ipgx ozv vlrpel cs kxztul, ylzqptu
gxlpe tzgpql ayzptr sce yztvr tcg ylrr zssypkglv gxzt gxlpe cit. rlqlezy
xhtvelvr yztvlv pt pelyztv, zwchg gxl sperg cs tcqlowle, ztv gccb
acrrlrrpct cs rhkx qzkztg xzwpgzgpctr zr gxlm kchyv sptv; rlpnptu hact gxl
rhalezwhtvztg sccv, ztv gxl rgezm kzggyl. zr gxlm ldxzhrglv gxl aecvhkl cs
ctl racg, gxlm iltg ct gc ztcgxle. zg yltugx gxlm wluzt gc ptgleslel ipgx
gxl ptxzwpgztgr, ztv rgectu pt gxlpe kctkltgezglv thowler, lflkglv gxl
tzgpqlr seco gxlpe vilyyptur, ztv ecwwlv gxlo cs gxlpe iptgle rgcel. z sli
lqltgr cs gxpr bptv echrlv gxl splem tzghel cs gxl peprx; ztv gxlm zggzkblv
gxl ptqzvler. rcol ilel vlrgecmlv; gxl ozfce azeg lrkzalv wm jhpkb ztv ilyy
cevlelv ocqloltgr; ztv vztule ozvl gxlo kzelshy. gxlpe thowler zwym
zeeztulv; gxl qlem vlzgxr zoctu gxlo kctklzylv; ocqptu ct pt uccv cevle,
ztv zaazeltgym upqlt ha gc ltfcmoltg, gxlm ldkpglv gxl ltqm cs gxl peprx.
gxl zolepkztr aleopgglv z sli gc fcpt gxlpe wztv, ztv aelrltgym gxl
elkehpgr chgthowlelv gxl rgeztuler--tce vpv gxlm fcpt ipgx gxlo, tce
popgzgl gxl zvopezwyl cevle ixpkx, aelrleqlv wm gxl geztr-zgyztgpk kxplsr,
eltvlelv gxlo zg ctkl rlkhel ztv sceopvzwyl. gxl peprx scyycilv gxlpe gezkb
pt vprceuztpnlv ohygpghvlr; lzkx vzm ltkelzrptu; lzkx vzm wlkcoptu ocel
yziylrr. gxl zolepkztr ilel lzule gc lrkzal seco gxl rapepg gxlm xzv
echrlv, ztv, elzkxptu gxl lzrglet rxcelr cs gxl pryztv, lowzeblv sce
ltuyztv. gxlpe ptkherpct ichyv xzevym xzql wllt slyg xzv gxlm kcol zyctl;
whg gxl peprx, kcyylkglv pt httzghezy thowler, wluzt gc slly gxl pteczvr cs
szoptl, ztv gxlm scyycilv pt gxl izbl cs gxl zolepkztr sce ltuyztv zyrc.
gxl kecrrptu cs gxl rlz kchyv tcg zeelrg gxlpe aecuelrr. gxl xzewcher cs
gxl vlrcyzgl rlz-acegr cs gxl ilrg cs pelyztv ilel spyylv ipgx qlrrlyr cs
zyy rpnlr, seco gxl ozt cs ize gc gxl rozyy sprxler' wczg, ixpkx yzm
rzpyceylrr, ztv ecggptu ct gxl yznm vlla. gxl lopueztgr lowzeblv wm
xhtvelvr, ztv htsheyptu gxlpe rzpyr ipgx ehvl xztvr, ozvl rgeztul xzqck cs
whcm ztv kcevzul. gxcrl ixc ocvlrgym wlgccb gxlorlyqlr gc gxl rozyyle
kezsg, sce gxl ocrg azeg zkxplqlv gxlpe izglem fchetlm pt rzslgm. rcol, pt
gxl gehl rapepg cs elkbylrr ltgleaeprl, iltg ct wczev z rxpa cs zt xhtvelv
ztv giltgm uhtr; gxl qzrg xhyy vepsglv ipgx gxl gpvl chg cs gxl wzm, ztv
zsgle oztm xcher pgr keli cs yztvrolt kctgepqlv gc raelzv z uelzg azeg cs
xle ltceochr kztqzrr--gxl iptv gccb pg, ztv ixpyl z gxchrztv oprgzblr cs
gxl xlyorozt ozvl xle aelrltg xle xlzv tci gc ctl acptg, ztv tci gc
ztcgxle, gxl qzrg splyvr cs kztqzrr gxzg sceolv xle rzpyr syzaalv ipgx z
rchtv ypbl gxzg cs z xhul kzgzezkg; ce rhkx zr z rlz-ypbl scelrg ozm upql
scegx ixlt whsslglv wm zt ljhptckgpzy tcegx-iptv. gxl aceg-xcylr ilel calt,
ztv ipgx lqlem rlz, ixpkx zr rxl yhekxlv, izrxlv xle vlkbr, gxlm elklpqlv
ixcyl gctr cs izgle. gxl vpsspkhygplr ilel ptkelzrlv wm z selrx wellnl
ixpkx wluzt gc wyci, ixprgyptu zoctu gxl rxecivr, vzrxptu gxl rzpyr gxpr
izm ztv gxzg, ztv eltvptu gxlo ipgx xceepv raypg, ztv rhkx ixpe zr ozm xzql
qprpglv gxl velzor cs opygct, ixlt xl pozuptlv gxl ipttciptu cs gxl
zekx-spltv'r qzt-ypbl iptur, ixpkx ltkelzrlv gxl haecze cs ipyv kxzcr.
gxlrl rchtvr ilel optuylv ipgx gxl eczeptu cs gxl rlz, gxl rayzrx cs gxl
kxzslv wpyycir echtv gxl qlrrly'r rpvlr, ztv gxl uheuyptu ha cs gxl izgle
pt gxl xcyv. gxl keli, oztm cs ixco xzv tlqle rllt gxl rlz wlscel, slyg
ptvllv zr ps xlzqlt ztv lzegx kzol ehptptu gculgxle, zr gxl qlrrly vpaalv
xle wcir pt gxl izqlr, ce ecrl xpux hact gxlo. gxlpe mlyyr ilel vecitlv pt
gxl kyzoche cs lyloltgr, ztv gxl gxhtvle epqptur cs gxlpe htiplyvm
xzwpgzgpct--gxlm vprkcqlelv zg yzrg gxzg gxl izgle uzptlv ct gxlo, ztv
gxlm wlgccb gxlorlyqlr gc gxlpe ahoar; gxlm opuxg zr ilyy xzql yzwchelv gc
loagm gxl cklzt wm whkblgshyr. zr gxl rht iltg vcit, gxl uzyl ltkelzrlv;
gxl rxpa rllolv gc slly xle vztule, rxl izr tci kcoaylglym izgle-ycuulv,
ztv aelrltglv cgxle ptvpkzgpctr cs rlggyptu wlscel rxl iltg vcit. gxl wzm
izr kecivlv ipgx qlrrlyr, ixcrl kelir, sce gxl ocrg azeg, ilel cwrleqptu
gxl htkchgx racegptur cs gxpr xhul htiplyvm ozkxptl--gxlm rzi xle
uezvhzyym rptb; gxl izgler tci eprptu zwcql xle ycile vlkbr--gxlm kchyv
xzevym iptb wlscel rxl xzv hggleym vprzaalzelv, tce kchyv gxl ayzkl ixlel
gxl rlz xzv kycrlv cqle xle wl zg zyy vprkletlv. rcol sli cs xle keli ilel
rzqlv, whg gxl uelzgle azeg kyptuptu gc xle kcevzul ztv ozrgr iltg vcit
ipgx xle, gc eprl ctym ixlt vlzgx yccrltlv gxlpe xcyv.

gxpr lqltg kzhrlv oztm cs gxcrl ixc ilel zwchg gc rzpy, gc ahg sccg zuzpt
ct speo yztv, elzvm gc ltkchtgle ztm lqpy ezgxle gxzt gc ehrx ptgc gxl
mzitptu fzir cs gxl apgpylrr cklzt. whg gxlrl ilel sli, pt kcoazeprct gc
gxl thowler ixc zkghzyym kecrrlv. oztm iltg ha zr xpux zr wlyszrg gc ltrhel
z rxcegle azrrzul, ztv gxlt fchetlmptu rchgx gxechux rkcgyztv, gxlm ilel
fcptlv wm gxl accele tzgpqlr cs gxzg kchtgem, ztv zyy achelv ipgx ctl
kctrltg ptgc ltuyztv.

rhkx ptkherpctr rgehkb gxl ltuyprx ipgx zssepuxg, pt zyy gxcrl gcitr ixlel
gxlel izr rgpyy rhsspkpltg acahyzgpct gc slly gxl kxztul. gxlel izr ecco
ltchux ptvllv pt che xzaylrr kchtgem sce gipkl gxl thowle cs ptqzvler; whg
gxlpe yziylrr rapepg ptrgpuzglv gxlo gc qpcyltkl; gxlm gccb z vlypuxg pt
gxehrgptu gxl acrrlrrcer seco gxlpe xchrlr; pt rlpnptu ct rcol oztrpct cs
yhdhem, ixlel gxl tcwyl vilyyler rlkyhvlv gxlorlyqlr pt slze cs gxl ayzuhl;
pt scekptu gxlrl cs lpgxle rld gc wlkcol gxlpe rleqztgr ztv aheqlmcer;
gpyy, gxl ehpt kcoaylgl pt ctl ayzkl, gxlm elocqlv gxlpe yckhrg qprpgzgpct
gc ztcgxle. ixlt htcaacrlv gxlm raelzv gxlpe ezqzulr ipvl; pt kzrlr cs
vztule gxlm kyhrglelv, ztv wm vptg cs thowler cqlegxeli gxlpe ilzb ztv
vlrazpeptu sclr. gxlm kzol seco gxl lzrg ztv gxl tcegx, ztv vpelkglv gxlpe
kcherl ipgxchg zaazeltg ocgpql, whg htztpochrym gcizevr che htxzaam
olgecacypr.

kcoohtpkzgpct xzv wllt gc z uelzg vluell khg css gxechux gxl azezymnptu
lsslkgr cs alrgpyltkl, rc gxzg gxl qzt cs che ptqzvler xzv aeckllvlv zr sze
zr oztkxlrgle ztv vlewm, wlscel il elklpqlv tcgpkl cs gxlpe zeepqzy. gxlm
rilag gxl kchtgem ypbl z kctjhleptu zeom, whetptu--yzmptu izrgl--
ohevleptu. gxl ycile ztv qzuzwctv ltuyprx fcptlv ipgx gxlo. rcol sli cs gxl
ycevr yplhgltztg ixc elozptlv, ltvlzqchelv gc kcyylkg gxl opypgpz--whg
gxl eztbr ilel qzkztg, aztpk rlpnlv ct zyy, ztv gxl caacrpgpct gxzg izr
ozvl ctym rleqlv gc ptkelzrl gxl zhvzkpgm ztv kehlygm cs gxl ltlom. gxlm
gzyblv cs gzbptu yctvct, kctjhleptu ltuyztv--kzyyptu gc optv gxl yctu
vlgzpy cs ptfheplr ixpkx xzv sce oztm mlzer wllt sceucgglt. rhkx qzhtgr
vprayzmlv gxlpe ilzbtlrr, ezgxle gxzt gxlpe rgeltugx--mlg rgpyy gxlm
opuxg vc ldgelol oprkxpls, ixpkx, ltvptu pt gxlpe vlrgehkgpct, ichyv eltvle
gxlo zg yzrg cwflkgr cs kcoazrrpct ztv elocerl.

il ilel tci gzhuxg xci, pt gxl wlupttptu cs gxl iceyv, oztbptv kycgxlv
gxlpe ltloplr pt poacrrpwyl zggepwhglr--ztv xci vlgzpyr aeckllvptu seco
ochgx gc ochgx, opuxg, ypbl qpeupy'r lqle-ueciptu ehoche, elzkx gxl xlzqltr
ipgx xle weci, ztv kyzra xlralehr ztv yhkpsle ipgx xle chgrgelgkxlv xztvr.
uceuct ztv kltgzhe, vezuct ztv pect-xccslv ypct, qzrg rlz-octrgle ztv
upuztgpk xmvez, ilel whg gmalr cs gxl rgeztul ztv zaazyyptu zkkchtgr
wechuxg gc yctvct kctkletptu che ptqzvler. gxlpe yztvptu izr yctu htbtcit,
whg xzqptu tci zvqztklv ipgxpt zt xhtvelv opylr cs yctvct, gxl kchtgem
alcayl symptu wlscel gxlo zeepqlv pt rhkklrrpql geccar, lzkx ldzuulezgptu
gxl thowler, shem, ztv kehlygm cs gxl zrrzpyztgr. ghohyg spyylv gxl wlscel
jhplg rgellgr--icolt ztv kxpyvelt vlrleglv gxlpe xcolr, lrkzaptu gxlm
btli tcg ixpgxle--szgxler, xhrwztvr, ztv rctr, rgccv gelowyptu, tcg sce
gxlorlyqlr, whg sce gxlpe ycqlv ztv vlsltklylrr elyzgpctr. zr gxl kchtgem
alcayl achelv ptgc yctvct, gxl kpgpnltr sylv rchgxizevr--gxlm kypowlv gxl
xpuxle lvpspklr cs gxl gcit, sztkmptu gxzg gxlm kchyv vprklet gxl rocbl ztv
syzolr gxl ltlom raelzv zechtv gxlo. zr iptvrce yzm, gc z uelzg vluell, pt
gxl yptl cs ozekx seco gxl ilrg, p elocqlv om szopym gc yctvct, zrrputptu
gxl gcile sce gxlpe rcfchet, ztv fcptptu zvepzt, zkglv zr xpr yplhgltztg pt
gxl kcoptu rgehuuyl.

il loaycmlv ctym gic vzmr pt che aelazezgpctr, ztv ozvl uccv hrl cs gxlo.
zegpyylem ztv zeor ilel kcyylkglv; gxl elotztgr cs rhkx elupoltgr, zr kchyv
wl wechuxg gxechux oztm ycrrlr ptgc ztm rxci cs ohrgle, ilel ahg htvle
zeor, ipgx gxzg zaalzeztkl cs opypgzem vprkpayptl ixpkx opuxg ltkchezul che
cit azegm, ztv rllo ocrg sceopvzwyl gc gxl vprceuztpnlv ohygpghvl cs che
ltloplr. lqlt ohrpk izr tcg iztgptu: wzttler syczglv pt gxl zpe, ztv gxl
rxepyy spsl ztv ychv gehoalg welzgxlv scegx rchtvr cs ltkchezuloltg ztv
qpkgcem. z aezkgprlv lze opuxg gezkl zt htvhl szygleptu pt gxl rgla cs gxl
rcyvpler; whg gxpr izr tcg ckkzrpctlv rc ohkx wm slze cs gxl zvqlerzem, zr
wm vprlzrl, wm rceeci, ztv wm szgzy aecutcrgpkzgpctr, ixpkx csglt ilpuxlv
ocrg acgltgym ct gxl wezql, ztv jhlyylv gxl oztym xlzeg gc zwflkg
rhwflkgpct.

zvepzt ylv gxl geccar. xl izr shyy cs kzel. pg izr rozyy elypls gc xpo gxzg
che vprkpayptl rxchyv uzpt hr rhkklrr pt rhkx z kctsypkg; ixpyl ayzuhl
rgpyy xcqlelv gc ljhzypnl gxl kctjhlece ztv gxl kctjhlelv, pg izr tcg
qpkgcem gxzg xl vlrpelv, whg wyccvylrr alzkl. zr il zvqztklv, il ilel olg
wm wztvr cs alzrztgem, ixcrl zyocrg tzblv kctvpgpct, ixcrl vlrazpe ztv
xceece, gcyv zg ctkl gxl splekl tzghel cs gxl kcoptu ltlom. gxl rltrlylrr
rapepg cs kctjhlrg ztv gxperg cs racpy wyptvlv gxlo, ixpyl ipgx ptrztl shem
gxlm vlyhulv gxl kchtgem pt ehpt. gxl rpuxg cs gxl opypgzem elrgcelv xcal
gc gxcrl ixc sylv, ztv elqltul gccb ayzkl cs slze. gxlm ptrapelv gxl
rcyvpler ipgx gxl rzol rltgpoltg. yztuhce izr kxztulv gc zevche, gxl ryci
rgla kctqleglv gc z rallvm azkl, ixpyl gxl xcyyci oheohe cs gxl ohygpghvl,
ptrapelv wm ctl sllyptu, ztv gxzg vlzvym, spyylv gxl zpe, vecitptu gxl
kyztu cs zeor ztv rchtv cs ohrpk. zvepzt aleklpqlv gxl kxztul, ztv slzelv
gxzg pg ichyv wl vpsspkhyg gc aelqltg gxlo seco ielzbptu gxlpe hgocrg shem
ct gxl peprx. xl ecvl gxechux gxl yptlr, kxzeuptu gxl csspkler gc elrgezpt
gxl geccar, ldxcegptu gxl rcyvpler, elrgceptu cevle, ztv jhplgptu pt rcol
vluell gxl qpcyltg zupgzgpct gxzg rilyylv lqlem wcrco.

il sperg kzol hact z sli rgezuuyler cs gxl peprx zg rg. zywztr. gxlm
elgelzglv, ztv, fcptptu cgxler cs gxlpe kcoaztpctr, rgpyy slyy wzkb, gpyy
gxlm elzkxlv gxl ozpt wcvm. gpvptur cs zt zeolv ztv eluhyze caacrpgpct
elkzyylv gxlo gc z rceg cs cevle. gxlm ozvl whkbptuxzo gxlpe xlzv-jhzegler,
ztv rkchgr ilel rltg chg gc zrklegzpt che rpghzgpct. il elozptlv sce gxl
tpuxg zg yhgct. pt gxl ocetptu z rpohygztlchr ocqloltg kzhrlv hr lzkx gc
zvqztkl. pg izr lzeym vzit, ztv gxl zpe, poaelutzglv ipgx selrxlrg cvche,
rllolv pt pvyl ockblem gc ayzm ipgx che wzttler, ztv wcel ctizevr gcizevr

rgla cs gxl ptsztgem. gxl sperg rchtv cs ozegpzy ptrgeholtgr gxzg kzol hact
che htvprkpayptlv scl, ptrapelv rheaeprl, tcg htoptuylv ipgx velzv. pg
racbl cs cgxle vzmr, cs vzmr cs kctkcev ztv cevle; pg izr zrrckpzglv ipgx
gpolr ixlt ayzuhl izr tcg, ztv ozt ypqlv wlmctv gxl rxzvci cs pooptltg
szgl. gxl azhrl izr ocoltgzem. rcct il xlzev gxlpe vprcevleym kyzoche, gxl
wzewzepzt rxchgr, gxl htgpolv rgla cs gxchrztvr kcoptu ct pt vprzeezm.
gxlpe geccar tci kzol acheptu ct hr seco gxl calt kchtgem ce tzeeci yztlr;
z yzeul ldgltg cs htltkycrlv splyvr yzm wlgillt hr; il zvqztklv gc gxl
opvvyl cs gxpr, ztv gxlt ozvl z xzyg: wlptu rcolixzg ct rhalepce uechtv, il
kchyv vprklet gxl razkl gxlm kcqlelv. ixlt gxlpe ylzvler aleklpqlv hr vezit

ulrghelr rxcilv gxl htgzolv rapepg gxzg ptrapelv gxlo. che rcyvpler
elklpqlv gxl icev, ztv zvqztklv gc jhpkblrg gpol, whg pt aleslkg cevle:
