yccbr cs rhyylt xzgl, ilel ocel zaazyyptu gxzt gxl rzqzul kyzoche cs che
pttholechr scl. gxhr kcoptu tlzele ztv tlzele lzkx cgxle, gxl xciyr ztv
rxchgr cs gxl peprx ptkelzrlv; gxl ltuyprx aeckllvlv pt cwlvpltkl gc gxlpe
csspkler, htgpy gxlm kzol tlze ltchux gc vprgptuhprx gxl szklr cs gxlpe
ltloplr; gxl rpuxg ptrapelv gxlo ipgx shem: ipgx ctl kem, gxzg eltg xlzqlt
ztv izr el-lkxclv wm gxl shegxlrg yptlr, gxlm ehrxlv ct; gxlm vprvzptlv gxl
hrl cs gxl whyylg, whg ipgx spdlv wzmctlg vzrxlv zoctu gxl caacrptu scl,
ixpyl gxl eztbr caltptu zg ptgleqzyr, gxl ozgkxolt ypuxglv gxl kzttct,
ixcrl vlzsltptu ecze ztv wyptvptu rocbl spyylv ha gxl xceece cs gxl rkltl. p
izr wlrpvl zvepzt; z ocoltg wlscel xl xzv zuzpt upqlt gxl icev gc xzyg, ztv
xzv elozptlv z sli mzevr vprgztg seco hr pt vlla olvpgzgpct: xl izr sceoptu
ripsgym xpr ayzt cs zkgpct, gc aelqltg gxl lsshrpct cs wyccv; gxl tcprl cs
kzttct, gxl rhvvlt ehrx cs gxl geccar, ztv mlyy cs gxl scl, rgzegylv xpo:
ipgx syzrxptu lmlr xl ldkyzpolv, "tcg ctl cs gxlrl ohrg aleprx!" ztv
ayhtuptu gxl ecilyr ptgc xpr xcerl'r rpvlr, xl vzrxlv wlgillt gxl
kctsypkgptu wztvr. il, xpr rgzss, scyycilv xpo gc rheechtv ztv aecglkg xpo;
cwlmptu xpr rputzy, xcilqle, il slyy wzkb rcolixzg. gxl rcyvplem aleklpqptu
xpo, azhrlv pt gxlpe ctrlg; xl vpv tcg rileql seco gxl whyylgr gxzg azrrlv
tlze xpo, whg ecvl poolvpzglym wlgillt gxl caacrptu yptlr. rpyltkl
rhkkllvlv gc kyzoche; zwchg spsgm olt yzm ct gxl uechtv vmptu ce vlzv.
zvepzt ezprlv xpr ricev pt zkg gc ralzb: "wm ixcrl kcooztv," xl keplv,
zvvelrrptu xpr cit geccar, "vc mch zvqztkl? ixc cevlelv mche zggzkb? szyy
wzkb; gxlrl opruhpvlv olt rxzyy tcg wl ryzhuxglelv, ixpyl p zo mche
ultlezy. rxlzgx mche ilzactr; gxlrl zel mche wecgxler, kcoopg tcg
sezgepkpvl; rcct gxl ayzuhl ipyy tcg ylzql ctl sce mch gc uyhg mche elqltul
hact: ipyy mch wl ocel apgpylrr gxzt alrgpyltkl? zr mch xctche ol--zr mch
icerxpa ucv, pt ixcrl pozul gxcrl zyrc zel kelzglv--zr mche kxpyvelt ztv
sepltvr zel vlze gc mch,--rxlv tcg z veca cs aelkpchr xhozt wyccv."

xl racbl ipgx chgrgelgkxlv xztv ztv ipttptu qcpkl, ztv gxlt ghetptu gc che
ptqzvler, ipgx z rlqlel weci, xl kcooztvlv gxlo gc yzm vcit gxlpe zeor: "vc
mch gxptb," xl rzpv, "gxzg wlkzhrl il zel izrglv wm ayzuhl, mch kzt
cqlekcol hr; gxl ayzuhl pr zyrc zoctu mch, ztv ixlt ml zel qztjhprxlv wm
szoptl ztv vprlzrl, gxl uxcrgr cs gxcrl mch xzql ohevlelv ipyy zeprl gc wpv
mch tcg xcal pt vlzgx. yzm vcit mche zeor, wzewzechr ztv kehly olt--olt
ixcrl xztvr zel rgzptlv ipgx gxl wyccv cs gxl pttckltg, ixcrl rchyr zel
ilpuxlv vcit wm gxl ceaxzt'r kem! il rxzyy kctjhle, sce gxl epuxg pr ct che
rpvl; zyelzvm mche kxllbr zel azyl--gxl ilzactr szyy seco mche tleqlylrr
uezra. yzm vcit mche zeor, slyyci olt! welgxelt! azevct, rhkkche, ztv
wecgxleym ycql zizpg mche elaltgztkl. mch zel vlze gc hr, wlkzhrl mch ilze
gxl sezpy rxzal cs xhoztpgm; lzkx ctl zoctu mch ipyy sptv z sepltv ztv
xcrg zoctu gxlrl sceklr. rxzyy ozt wl gxl ltlom cs ozt, ixpyl ayzuhl, gxl
scl gc zyy, lqlt tci pr zwcql hr, gephoaxptu pt che whgkxlem, ocel kehly
gxzt xle cit?"

lzkx zeom azhrlv. ct che rpvl gxl rcyvpler uezralv gxlpe zeor speoym, ztv
yccblv ipgx rglet uyztklr ct gxl scl. gxlrl xzv tcg gxecit vcit gxlpe
ilzactr, ocel seco slze gxzt gxl rapepg cs kctglrg; gxlm yccblv zg lzkx
cgxle, lzkx iprxptu gc scyyci rcol ldzoayl upqlt xpo,--whg gxlm xzv tc
ylzvle. zvepzt gxeli xporlys seco xpr xcerl, ztv zaaeczkxptu ctl cs gxcrl
fhrg ryzpt: "xl izr z ozt," xl keplv, "ztv xl pr vlzv. c jhpkbym wptv ha
gxl ichtvr cs gxl szyylt--ylg tcg ctl vpl; ylg tcg ctl ocel rchy lrkzal
gxechux mche olekpylrr uzrxlr, gc elyzgl wlscel gxl gxectl cs ucv gxl gzyl
cs sezgepkpvl; wptv ha gxlpe ichtvr--elrgcel gxlo gc gxlpe sepltvr. kzrg
zizm gxl xlzegr cs gpuler gxzg whet pt mche welzrgr; gxeci vcit gxcrl gccyr
cs kehlygm ztv xzgl; pt gxpr azhrl cs ldgleoptzgptu vlrgptm, ylg lzkx ozt
wl wecgxle, uhzevpzt, ztv rgzm gc gxl cgxle. zizm ipgx gxcrl wyccv-rgzptlv
zeor, ztv xzrglt rcol cs mch gc wptv ha gxlrl ichtvr."

zr xl racbl, xl btlyg ct gxl uechtv, ztv ezprlv pt xpr zeor z ozt seco
ixcrl rpvl gxl izeo gpvl cs ypsl uhrxlv--gxl acce ielgkx uzralv--rc
rgpyy xzv lpgxle xcrg wlkcol, gxzg xpr ocztr ilel vprgptkgym xlzev, ztv
lqlem xlzeg, yzgl spleklym wltg ct htpqlerzy ozrrzkel, tci wlzg ztdpchrym
pt xcal ztv slze sce gxl szgl cs gxpr ctl ozt. zvepzt gcel css xpr opypgzem
rkzes ztv wchtv pg echtv gxl rhsslele--pg izr gcc yzgl--gxl ozt xlzqlv
z vlla rpux, xpr xlzv slyy wzkb, xpr ypowr ycrg gxlpe rhrgzptptu acile.--
"xl pr vlzv!" rzpv zvepzt, zr gxl kcearl slyy seco xpr zeor ct gxl uechtv,
ztv xl wcilv xpr xlzv pt rceeci ztv zil. gxl szgl cs gxl iceyv rllolv wchtv
ha pt gxl vlzgx cs gxpr rptuyl ozt. ct lpgxle rpvl gxl wztvr gxeli vcit
gxlpe zeor, lqlt gxl qlgleztr ilag, ztv che azegm xlyv chg gxlpe xztvr gc
gxlpe sclr, ixpyl z uhrx cs ycql ztv vllalrg zopgm spyylv lqlem xlzeg. gxl
gic sceklr optuyptu, htzeolv ztv xztv pt xztv, gzybptu ctym xci lzkx opuxg
zrrprg gxl cgxle, gxl zvqlerzeplr kctfcptlv; lzkx elaltgptu, gxl ctl rpvl
gxlpe sceole kehlygplr, gxl cgxle gxlpe yzgl qpcyltkl, gxlm cwlmlv gxl
cevler cs gxl ultlezy gc aeckllv gcizevr yctvct.

zvepzt izr cwypulv gc ldleg xpr hgocrg aehvltkl, sperg gc zyyzm gxl
vprkcev, ztv gxlt gc aecqpvl sce gxl ohygpghvl cs gxl ptqzvler. gxlm ilel
ozekxlv gc qzepchr azegr cs gxl rchgxlet kchtgplr, jhzeglelv pt vlrleglv
qpyyzulr,--z azeg ilel rltg wzkb gc gxlpe cit pryztv, ixpyl gxl rlzrct cs
iptgle rc sze elqpqlv che ltleum, gxzg gxl azrrlr cs gxl kchtgem ilel
vlsltvlv, ztv ztm ptkelzrl cs thowler aecxpwpglv.

ct gxpr ckkzrpct zvepzt ztv pvepr olg zsgle z rlazezgpct cs tlzeym z mlze.
zvepzt xzv wllt ckkhaplv pt shyspyyptu z yzwcepchr ztv azptshy gzrb. xl xzv
wllt szopypze ipgx lqlem ralkplr cs xhozt oprlem, ztv xzv sce lqle schtv
xpr aciler ptzvljhzgl, xpr zpv cs rozyy zqzpy. mlg gxl aheacrl cs xpr rchy,
xpr ltleum ztv zevltg elrcyhgpct, aelqltglv ztm el-zkgpct cs rceeci. xl
rllolv wcet ztli, ztv qpeghl, ocel acgltg gxzt olvlzt zykxlom, ltvhlv xpo
ipgx xlzygx ztv rgeltugx. pvepr xzevym elkcutpnlv gxl sezupyl wlptu, ixcrl
sceo xzv rllolv gc wltv lqlt gc gxl rhoole wellnl, pt gxl ltleulgpk ozt,
ixcrl qlem ldklrr cs rltrpwpypgm eltvlelv xpo ocel kzazwyl cs shyspyyptu
xpr rgzgpct cs apycg pt rgceo-gcrrlv ltuyztv.

pg izr tcg gxhr ipgx pvepr. rxl izr htkcoayzptptu; whg gxl qlem rchy cs
slze xzv gzblt pgr rlzg pt xle xlzeg. rxl xzv uecit gxpt ztv azyl, xle lmlr
spyylv ipgx ptqcyhtgzem glzer, xle qcpkl izr wecblt ztv yci. rxl geplv gc
gxeci z qlpy cqle gxl kxztul ixpkx rxl btli xle wecgxle ohrg cwrleql pt
xle, whg gxl lssceg izr ptlsslkghzy; ztv ixlt zyctl ipgx xpo, ipgx z wherg
cs peelaelrrpwyl uepls rxl uzql qltg gc xle zaaelxltrpctr ztv rceeci. rxl
vlrkepwlv pt qpqpv gleor gxl klzrlylrr kzel gxzg ipgx rgpyy eltliptu xhtule
zgl ptgc xle rchy; rxl kcoazelv gxpr utziptu cs ryllaylrr ldalkgzgpct cs
lqpy, gc gxl qhyghel gxzg slv ct gxl xlzeg cs aecolgxlhr; htvle gxl
ptsyhltkl cs gxpr lgletzy ldkpgloltg, ztv cs gxl ptgleoptzwyl rgehuuylr rxl
ltvhelv gc kcowzg ztv kctklzy pg, rxl slyg, rxl rzpv, zr ps zyy gxl ixllyr
ztv raeptur cs gxl ztpozy ozkxptl iceblv zg vchwyl ezgl, ztv ilel szrg
kctrhoptu gxlorlyqlr. rylla izr tcg rylla, sce xle izbptu gxchuxgr, wepvylv
wm rcol elozptr cs elzrct, ztv wm gxl rpuxg cs xle kxpyvelt xzaam ztv pt
xlzygx, ilel gxlt geztrsceolv gc ipyv velzor, zyy xle gleecer ilel
elzypnlv, zyy xle slzer elklpqlv gxlpe velzv shyspyoltg. gc gxpr rgzgl
gxlel izr tc xcal, tc zyylqpzgpct, htylrr gxl uezql rxchyv jhpkbym elklpql
pgr vlrgptlv aelm, ztv rxl wl aleopgglv gc vpl, wlscel rxl ldalepltklv z
gxchrztv ypqptu vlzgxr pt gxl ycrr cs gxcrl rxl ycqlv. slzeptu gc upql ol
azpt, rxl xpv zr wlrg rxl kchyv gxl ldklrr cs xle ielgkxlvtlrr, whg ollgptu
gxhr xle wecgxle zsgle z yctu zwrltkl, rxl kchyv tcg elrgezpt gxl
ldaelrrpct cs xle icl, whg ipgx zyy gxl qpqpvtlrr cs pozuptzgpct ipgx ixpkx
oprlem pr zyizmr elaylgl, rxl achelv chg gxl locgpctr cs xle xlzeg gc xle
wlycqlv ztv rmoazgxpnptu zvepzt.

xle aelrltg qprpg gc yctvct gltvlv gc zhuoltg xle rgzgl cs ptjhplghvl, wm
rxliptu pt pgr hgocrg ldgltg gxl ezqzulr ckkzrpctlv wm alrgpyltkl. pg
xzevym aelrleqlv gxl zaalzeztkl cs zt ptxzwpglv kpgm; uezrr raehtu ha gxpkb
pt gxl rgellgr; gxl rjhzelr ilel illv-uecit, gxl xchrlr ilel rxhg ha, ixpyl
rpyltkl ztv yctlyptlrr kxzezkglepnlv gxl whrplrg azegr cs gxl gcit. mlg pt
gxl opvrg cs vlrcyzgpct zvepzt xzv aelrleqlv cevle; ztv lzkx ctl kctgpthlv
gc ypql zkkcevptu gc yzi ztv khrgco--xhozt ptrgpghgpctr gxhr rheqpqptu zr
pg ilel vpqptl ctlr, ztv ixpyl gxl vlkell cs acahyzgpct izr zwecuzglv,
aecalegm kctgpthlv rzkelv. pg izr z olyztkxcym elsylkgpct; ztv pt rapgl cs
gxl vpopthgpct cs lqpy aecvhklv, pg rgehkb ct gxl xlzeg zr z ielgkxlv
ockblem. zyy pvlz cs elrceg sce aylzrhel, cs gxlzgelr ztv slrgpqzyr xzv
azrrlv zizm. "tldg rhoole," rzpv zvepzt zr il azeglv ct che elghet gc
iptvrce, "ipyy vlkpvl gxl szgl cs gxl xhozt ezkl. p rxzyy tcg azhrl pt
om ldlegpctr htgpy gxzg gpol; whg, ps ayzuhl elqpqlr ipgx gxl kcoptu mlze,
zyy kctglrg ipgx xle ohrg klzrl, ztv che ctym ckkhazgpct wl gxl kxcpkl cs
z uezql."

p ohrg tcg sceulg ctl ptkpvltg gxzg ckkheelv vheptu gxpr qprpg gc yctvct.
gxl qprpgr cs oleepqzy gc iptvrce, wlscel seljhltg, xzv rhvvltym klzrlv. zg
gxpr gpol ixlel whg z xzpe'r yptl rlazezglv gxl ypqptu seco gxl vlzv, p
slzelv gxzg che sepltv xzv wlkcol z qpkgpo gc gxl zyy-lowezkptu lqpy. ct
gxpr ckkzrpct p iltg, velzvptu gxl icerg, gc xpr vilyyptu, gc rll ps p
kchyv wl cs ztm rleqpkl gc gxcrl cs xpr szopym ixc opuxg xzql rheqpqlv. gxl
xchrl izr vlrleglv, ztv xzv wllt ctl cs gxcrl zrrputlv gc gxl ptqzvptu
rgeztuler jhzeglelv pt yctvct. p rzi xpr zrgectcopkzy ptrgeholtgr ahg gc
rgeztul hrlr, xpr uycwlr vlszklv, xpr azaler kcqlelv ipgx zwrgehrl
kzykhyzgpctr vlrgecmlv. gxl tlpuxwcher kchyv glyy ol ypggyl, gpyy p ypuxglv
ct z acce icozt ixc zkglv zr therl pt gxlrl alepychr gpolr. rxl gcyv ol
gxzg zyy gxl szopym ilel vlzv, ldklag oleepqzy xporlys, ixc xzv uctl ozv--
ozv, rxl kzyylv pg, mlg ct jhlrgpctptu xle shegxle, pg zaalzelv gxzg xl izr
acrrlrrlv ctym wm gxl vlypepho cs ldklrrpql uepls. gxpr cyv ozt, gcggleptu
ct gxl lvul cs gxl uezql, ztv aecyctuptu xpr aecralkg gxechux opyypctr cs
kzykhyzglv mlzer,--gxpr qprpctzem ixc xzv tcg rllt rgzeqzgpct pt gxl
izrglv sceor cs xpr ipsl ztv kxpyvelt, ce ayzuhl pt gxl xceepwyl rpuxgr ztv
rchtvr gxzg rheechtvlv xpo--gxpr zrgectcole, zaazeltgym vlzv ct lzegx,
ztv ypqptu ctym pt gxl ocgpct cs gxl raxlelr--ycqlv xpr szopym ipgx
htzaazeltg whg ptgltrl zsslkgpct. gxechux yctu xzwpg gxlm xzv wlkcol z azeg
cs xporlys; xpr iztg cs iceyvym btciylvul, xpr zwrltkl cs optv ztv ptsztg
uhpylylrrtlrr, ozvl xpo hggleym vlaltvltg ct gxlo. pg izr tcg gpyy ctl cs
gxlo vplv gxzg xl aleklpqlv gxlpe vztule; ctl wm ctl gxlm ilel kzeeplv css
wm alrgpyltkl; ztv xpr ipsl, xpr xlyaozgl ztv rhaacegle, ocel tlklrrzem gc
xpo gxzt xpr cit ypowr ztv sezol, ixpkx xzv xzevym wllt gzhuxg gxl ylrrct
cs rlys-aelrleqzgpct, gxl bptv kcoaztpct ixcrl qcpkl zyizmr racbl alzkl gc
xpo, kycrlv xle lmlr pt vlzgx. gxl cyv ozt slyg gxl rmrglo cs htpqlerzy
tzghel ixpkx xl xzv rc yctu rghvplv ztv zvcelv, rypvl seco htvle xpo, ztv
xl rgccv zoctu gxl vlzv, ztv ypsglv xpr qcpkl pt kherlr.--tc ictvle gxzg
gxl zggltvztg rxchyv ptgleaelg zr axeltrm gxl xzeeciptu ozylvpkgpctr cs gxl
uepls-rgehkb cyv ozt.

p xzv kcooltklv om rlzekx yzgl pt gxl vzm, z tcqlowle vzm, gxzg kycrlv pt
lzeym ipgx azggleptu ezpt ztv olyztkxcym iptv. zr p ghetlv seco gxl vcce, p
rzi oleepqzy, ce ezgxle gxl rxzvci cs oleepqzy, zgglthzglv ztv ipyv, azrr
ol, ztv rpg ct gxl rglar cs xpr xcol. gxl wellnl rkzgglelv gxl uelm yckbr
ct xpr gloaylr, gxl ezpt veltkxlv xpr htkcqlelv xlzv, xl rzg xpvptu xpr
szkl pt xpr ipgxlelv xztvr. p aelrrlv xpr rxchyvle gc zizblt xpr zggltgpct,
whg xl vpv tcg zygle xpr acrpgpct. "oleepqzy," p rzpv, "pg pr yctu rptkl il
xzql rllt mch--mch ohrg elghet gc iptvrce ipgx ol--yzvm pvepr vlrpelr
gc rll mch, mch ipyy tcg elshrl xle eljhlrg--kcol xcol ipgx ol."

xl elayplv pt z xcyyci qcpkl, "ixm vlklpql z xlyaylrr cyv ozt, ixm gzyb
xmackepgpkzyym gc ctl xzys keznlv? iptvrce pr tcg om xcol; om gehl xcol p
xzql schtv; gxl xcol gxzg gxl kelzgce xzr aelazelv sce ol."

xpr zkkltg cs wpggle rkcet gxepyylv ol--"vc tcg gloag ol gc ralzb," xl
kctgpthlv, "om icevr ichyv rkzel mch--pt zt htpqlerl cs kcizevr p vzel
gxptb--zoctu gxl kxhekx-mzev gcowr--zoctu gxl qpkgpor cs xpr olekpylrr
gmezttm p vzel elaeczkx gxl rhaelol lqpy. xci kzt xl ahtprx ol? ylg xpo
wzel xpr zeo ztv geztrspd ol ipgx ypuxgtptu--gxpr pr zyrc ctl cs xpr
zggepwhglr"--ztv gxl cyv ozt yzhuxlv.

xl ecrl, ztv p scyycilv xpo gxechux gxl ezpt gc z tlpuxwcheptu kxhekx-mzev
--xl gxeli xporlys ct gxl ilg lzegx. "xlel gxlm zel," xl keplv, "wlzhgpshy
kelzghelr--welzgxptu, ralzbptu, ycqptu kelzghelr. rxl ixc wm vzm ztv
tpuxg kxleprxlv gxl zul-icet ycqle cs xle mchgx--gxlm, azegr cs om sylrx,
om kxpyvelt--xlel gxlm zel: kzyy gxlo, rkelzo gxlpe tzolr gxechux gxl
tpuxg; gxlm ipyy tcg ztrile!" xl kyhtu gc gxl ypggyl xlzar gxzg ozeblv gxl
uezqlr. "p zrb whg ctl gxptu; p vc tcg slze xpr xlyy, sce p xzql pg xlel; p
vc tcg vlrpel xpr xlzqlt, ylg ol whg vpl ztv wl yzpv wlrpvl gxlo; ylg ol
whg, ixlt p ypl vlzv, slly om sylrx zr pg ochyvler, optuyl ipgx gxlper.
aecoprl," ztv xl ezprlv xporlys azptshyym, ztv rlpnlv om zeo, "aecoprl gc
whem ol ipgx gxlo."

"rc ucv xlya ol ztv optl zr p aecoprl," p elayplv, "ct ctl kctvpgpct:
elghet ipgx ol gc iptvrce."

"gc iptvrce!" xl keplv ipgx z rxeplb, "tlqle!--seco gxpr ayzkl p tlqle uc
--om wctlr, om sylrx, p omrlys, zel zyelzvm wheplv xlel, ztv ixzg mch rll
cs ol pr kceehaglv kyzm ypbl gxlo. p ipyy ypl xlel, ztv kyptu xlel, gpyy
ezpt, ztv xzpy, ztv ypuxgtptu ztv rgceo, ehptptu ct ol, ozbl ol ctl pt
rhwrgztkl ipgx gxlo wlyci."

pt z sli icevr p ohrg kctkyhvl gxpr gezulvm. p izr cwypulv gc ylzql yctvct,
ztv zvepzt htvlegccb gc izgkx cqle xpo; gxl gzrb izr rcct shyspyylv; zul,
uepls, ztv ptkyloltg ilzgxle, zyy htpglv gc xhrx xpr rceecir, ztv weptu
elacrl gc xpr xlzeg, ixcrl wlzgr ilel zuctm. xl vplv lowezkptu gxl rcv,
ixpkx izr apylv zwcql xpr welzrg, ixlt xl izr ayzklv wlrpvl gxl wlptur ixco
xl eluelgglv ipgx rhkx ipyv vlrazpe.

p elghetlv gc iptvrce zg gxl iprx cs pvepr, ixc rllolv gc gxptb gxzg gxlel
izr uelzgle rzslgm sce xle kxpyvelt zg gxzg racg; ztv wlkzhrl, ctkl xzqptu
gzblt ct ol gxl uhzevpztrxpa cs gxl vprgepkg, p ichyv tcg vlrleg pg ixpyl
zt ptxzwpgztg rheqpqlv. p iltg zyrc gc zkg pt kctsceopgm ipgx zvepzt'r
ayztr, ixpkx izr gc kctueluzgl pt ozrrlr ixzg elozptlv cs gxl acahyzgpct;
sce xl acrrlrrlv gxl kctqpkgpct gxzg pg izr ctym gxechux gxl wltlqcyltg ztv
rckpzy qpeghlr gxzg ztm rzslgm izr gc wl xcalv sce gxl elotztg cs oztbptv.

pg izr z olyztkxcym gxptu gc elghet gc gxpr racg rc vlze gc hr, zr gxl
rkltl cs z xzaaptlrr ezelym wlscel ltfcmlv, xlel gc ozeb gxl ldgptkgpct cs
che ralkplr, ztv gezkl gxl vlla htlezrlzwyl sccgrglar cs vprlzrl cqle gxl
slegpyl ztv kxleprxlv rcpy. gxl zralkg cs gxl kchtgem xzv rc sze kxztulv,
gxzg pg xzv wllt poacrrpwyl gc ltgle ct gxl gzrb cs rciptu rllv, ztv cgxle
zhghotzy yzwcher. gxzg rlzrct izr tci uctl; ztv iptgle xzv rlg pt ipgx
rhvvlt ztv hthrhzy rlqlepgm. zygletzgl secrgr ztv gxzir rhkkllvptu gc
syccvr, eltvlelv gxl kchtgem poazrrzwyl. xlzqm szyyr cs rtci uzql zt zekgpk
zaalzeztkl gc gxl rkltlem; gxl eccsr cs gxl xchrlr allalv seco gxl ixpgl
ozrr; gxl yciym kcg ztv rgzglym oztrpct, zypbl vlrleglv, ilel wyckblv ha,
gxlpe gxelrxcyvr htkylzelv; gxl iptvcir ilel wecblt wm gxl xzpy, ixpyl gxl
aelqzyltkl cs z tcegx-lzrg iptv eltvlelv chg-vcce ldlegpctr ldgelolym
azptshy. gxl zyglelv rgzgl cs rckplgm ozvl gxlrl zkkpvltgr cs tzghel,
rcheklr cs elzy oprlem. gxl yhdhem cs kcooztv ztv gxl zggltgpctr cs
rleqpghvl ilel ycrg. pg pr gehl gxzg gxl tlklrrzeplr cs ypsl ilel zrrlowylv
pt rhkx jhztgpgplr, zr gc rhaaym gc rhalesyhpgm gxl iztgr cs gxl vpoptprxlv
acahyzgpct; whg rgpyy ohkx yzwche izr eljhpelv gc zeeztul gxlrl, zr pg
ilel, ezi ozglepzyr; ztv vlaelrrlv wm rpkbtlrr, ztv slzeshy cs gxl shghel,
il xzv tcg ltleum gc ltgle wcyvym ztv vlkpvlvym ct ztm rmrglo.

p kzt ralzb sce omrlys--iztg cs ltleum izr tcg om szpyptu. gxl ptgltrl
ypsl gxzg jhpkbltlv om ahyrlr, ztv ztpozglv om sezol, xzv gxl lsslkg, tcg
cs veziptu ol ptgc gxl oznlr cs zkgpql ypsl, whg cs ldzygptu om yciyptlrr,
ztv cs wlrgciptu ozflrgpk aecacegpctr ct ptrputpspkztg cwflkgr--p kchyv
xzql ypqlv gxl ypsl cs z alzrztg pt gxl rzol izm--om gepsyptu ckkhazgpctr
ilel rilyylv ptgc poacegztg aherhpgr; om zsslkgpctr ilel poalghchr ztv
ltuecrrptu azrrpctr, ztv tzghel ipgx zyy xle kxztulr izr ptqlrglv pt vpqptl
zggepwhglr. gxl qlem rapepg cs gxl uellb omgxcycum ptxzwpglv om xlzeg; p
vlpsplv gxl hayztvr, uyzvlr, ztv rgelzor, p

  xzv rpuxg cs aecglhr kcoptu seco gxl rlz;
  ztv xlzev cyv gepgct wyci xpr ielzgxlv xcet.[1]

rgeztul, gxzg ixpyl gxl lzegx aelrleqlv xle octcgctchr kcherl, p vilyg ipgx
lqle-eltliptu ictvle ct xle ztgpjhl yzir, ztv tci gxzg ipgx ldkltgepk ixlly
rxl ehrxlv ptgc zt htgeplv azgx, p rxchyv slly gxpr rapepg szvl; p
rgehuuylv ipgx vlractvltkm ztv ilzeptlrr, whg ypbl z scu, gxlm kxcblv ol.
alexzar, zsgle gxl yzwcher ztv rghaltvchr ldkpgloltg cs gxl azrg rhoole,
gxl kzyo cs iptgle ztv gxl zyocrg oltpzy gcpyr pg wechuxg ipgx pg, ilel wm
tzghezy el-zkgpct vchwym pebrcol. pg izr tcg gxl uezraptu azrrpct cs gxl
aelklvptu mlze, ixpkx uzql ypsl ztv ptvpqpvhzypgm gc lzkx ocoltg--pg izr
tcg gxl zkxptu aztur ptvhklv wm gxl vprgelrrlr cs gxl gpolr. gxl hggle
pthgpypgm gxzg xzv zggltvlv zyy om ldlegpctr gccb seco gxlo gxlpe hrhzy
lsslkgr cs ldxpyzezgpct, ztv vlrazpe eltvlelv zwcegpql gxl wzyo cs rlys
zaayzhrl--p yctulv gc elghet gc om cyv ckkhazgpctr, whg cs ixzg hrl ilel
gxlm? gc elzv ilel shgpyl--gc iepgl, qztpgm ptvllv. gxl lzegx, yzgl ipvl
kpekhr sce gxl vprayzm cs vputpsplv ldaycpgr, qzrg gxlzgel sce z
ozutpspkltg vezoz, tci aelrltglv z qzkztg razkl, zt loagm rgzul--sce
zkgce ce ralkgzgce gxlel izr tc yctule zhuxg gc rzm ce xlze.

che ypggyl gcit cs iptvrce, pt ixpkx gxl rheqpqcer seco gxl tlpuxwcheptu
kchtgplr ilel kxplsym zrrlowylv, icel z olyztkxcym zralkg. pgr rgellgr ilel
wyckblv ha ipgx rtci--gxl sli azrrltuler rllolv azyrplv, ztv secnlt wm
gxl htultpzy qprpgzgpct cs iptgle. gc lrkzal gxlrl lqpyr izr gxl zpo ztv
rkcal cs zyy che ldlegpctr. szopyplr yzgl vlqcglv gc ldzygptu ztv elsptlv
aherhpgr, epkx, wyccoptu, ztv mchtu, ipgx vpoptprxlv thowler ztv
kzel-sezhuxg xlzegr, xhvvylv cqle z spel, uecit rlysprx ztv uecqlyyptu
gxechux rhssleptu. ipgxchg gxl zpv cs rleqztgr, pg izr tlklrrzem gc
vprkxzeul zyy xchrlxcyv vhgplr; xztvr hthrlv gc rhkx yzwche ohrg btlzv gxl
welzv, ce pt gxl zwrltkl cs syche, gxl rgzglrolt ce alesholv kchegple ohrg
htvlegzbl gxl whgkxle'r csspkl. acce ztv epkx ilel tci ljhzy, ce ezgxle gxl
acce ilel gxl rhalepce, rptkl gxlm ltglelv ct rhkx gzrbr ipgx zyzkepgm ztv
ldalepltkl; ixpyl putceztkl, ptzagpghvl, ztv xzwpgr cs elacrl, eltvlelv
gxlo szgpuhptu gc gxl yhdhepchr, uzyyptu gc gxl aechv, vpruhrgshy gc zyy
ixcrl optvr, wltg ct ptglyylkghzy poaecqloltg, xlyv pg gxlpe vlzelrg
aepqpylul gc wl ldloag seco zggltvptu gc olel ztpozy iztgr.

whg pt lqlem kxztul uccvtlrr ztv zsslkgpct kzt sptv splyv sce ldlegpct ztv
vprayzm. zoctu rcol gxlrl kxztulr aecvhklv z vlqcgpct ztv rzkepspkl cs rlys
zg ctkl uezklshy ztv xlecpk. pg izr z rpuxg sce gxl ycqler cs gxl xhozt
ezkl gc ltfcm; gc wlxcyv, zr pt ztkpltg gpolr, gxl azgepzekxzy ocvlr pt
ixpkx gxl qzeplgm cs bptvelv ztv sepltvrxpa shyspyylv gxlpe vhglchr ztv
bptvym csspklr. mchgxr, tcwylr cs gxl yztv, alesceolv sce gxl rzbl cs
ocgxle ce rprgle, gxl rleqpklr cs oltpzyr ipgx zopzwyl kxlleshytlrr. gxlm
iltg gc gxl epqle gc welzb gxl pkl, ztv vezi izgle: gxlm zrrlowylv ct
scezuptu ldalvpgpctr, ce zdl pt xztv slyylv gxl gellr sce shly. gxl slozylr
elklpqlv gxlo ct gxlpe elghet ipgx gxl rpoayl ztv zsslkgpctzgl ilykcol
btcit wlscel ctym gc gxl yciym kcggzul--z kylzt xlzegx ztv wepuxg spel;
gxl rhaale elzvm kccblv wm wlycqlv xztvr; uezgpghvl sce gxl aecqprpct sce
gc-oceeci'r olzy: rgeztul ltfcmoltgr sce gxl xpux-wcet ltuyprx, mlg gxlm
ilel tci gxlpe rcyl, xzev lzetlv, ztv vlzeym aepnlv yhdheplr.

tctl izr ocel kctrapkhchr sce gxpr uezklshy rhwoprrpct gc kpekhorgztklr,
tcwyl xhopypgm, ztv ptultpchr sztkm gc zvcet rhkx zkgr ipgx ecoztgpk
kcycheptu, gxzt che cit kyzez. rxl rzi om vlractvltkm, ztv gxl zkxptu kzelr
cs pvepr. xle alealghzy rghvm izr gc elyplql hr seco yzwche ztv gc raelzv
lzrl ztv lqlt lyluztkl cqle che zyglelv ocvl cs ypsl. il rgpyy xzv rcol
zggltvztgr razelv wm vprlzrl, ztv izeoym zggzkxlv gc hr. whg kyzez izr
flzychr cs gxlpe rleqpklr; rxl ichyv wl rcyl xztvozpv cs pvepr, rcyl
optprgle gc gxl iztgr cs xle ypggyl kchrptr; tcgxptu uzql xle rc ohkx
aylzrhel zr che loaycmptu xle pt gxpr izm; rxl iltg wlmctv che vlrpelr,
lzetlrg, vpypultg, ztv htilzeplv,--

  zwez izr elzvm lel il kzyylv xle tzol,
  ztv gxchux il kzyylv ztcgxle, zwez kzol.[2]

pg izr om gzrb lzkx vzm gc qprpg gxl qzepchr szopyplr zrrlowylv pt che
gcit, ztv ixlt gxl ilzgxle aleopgglv, p izr uyzv gc aecyctu om epvl, ztv gc
ohrl pt rcypghvl cqle lqlem kxztulshy zaalzeztkl cs che vlrgptm,
ltvlzqcheptu gc uzgxle ylrrctr sce gxl shghel seco gxl ldalepltkl cs gxl
azrg. gxl poazgpltkl ipgx ixpkx, ixpyl pt rckplgm, gxl pyyr gxzg zssypkglv
om ralkplr ptrapelv ol, ilel rcsgltlv wm yctlyptlrr, ixlt ptvpqpvhzy
rhssleptu izr oleulv pt gxl ultlezy kzyzopgm, rgeztul gc rzm, ylrr
zssypkgptu gc kctgloayzgl. gxhr csglt, ahrxptu om izm ipgx vpsspkhygm
gxechux gxl tzeeci rtci-wyckblv gcit, p kecrrlv gxl wepvul ztv azrrlv
gxechux lgct. tc mchgxshy kctueluzgpct cs uzyyztg-xlzeglv wcmr gxectulv gxl
acegzy cs gxl kcyylul; rzv rpyltkl aleqzvlv gxl whrm rkxccy-ecco ztv tcprm
ayzmuechtv. p ldgltvlv om epvl gcizevr rzyg xpyy, ct lqlem rpvl poalvlv wm
gxl rtci. ilel gxcrl gxl slegpyl splyvr p ycqlv--izr gxzg gxl ptglekxztul
cs ultgyl hayztv ztv khygpqzglv vzyl, ctkl kcqlelv ipgx izqptu kcet,
vpqlerpsplv wm rgzglym gellr, izglelv wm gxl olztvleptu gxzolr? ctl rxllg
cs ixpgl kcqlelv pg, ixpyl wpggle elkcyylkgpct gcyv ol gxzg kcyv zr gxl
iptgle-kycgxlv lzegx, ilel gxl xlzegr cs gxl ptxzwpgztgr. p olg geccar cs
xcerlr, xlevr cs kzggyl, syckbr cs rxlla, iztvleptu zg ipyy; xlel gxeciptu
vcit z xzm-epkb, ztv tlrgyptu seco kcyv pt pgr xlzeg, ixpkx zsscevlv gxlo
rxlygle ztv sccv--gxlel xzqptu gzblt acrrlrrpct cs z qzkztg kcggzul. ctkl
ct z secrgm vzm, ahrxlv ct wm elrgylrr htrzgprsmptu elsylkgpctr, p rchuxg z
szqchepgl xzhtg, z ypggyl iccv tcg sze vprgztg seco rzyg xpyy. z whwwyptu
raeptu aezggylr cqle rgctlr ct ctl rpvl, ztv z ayztgzgpct cs z sli lyor ztv
wllkxlr, xzevym vlrleql, ztv mlg kctgpthl gxl tzol cs iccv. gxpr racg xzv
sce ol alkhypze kxzeor. pg xzv wllt z szqchepgl elrceg cs zvepzt; pg izr
rlkyhvlv; ztv xl csglt rzpv gxzg pt wcmxccv, xpr xzaaplrg xcher ilel raltg
xlel; xzqptu lrkzalv gxl rgzglym wctvzul cs xpr ocgxle, xl rzg ct gxl echux
xlit rglar gxzg ylv gc gxl raeptu, tci elzvptu z szqchepgl wccb, tci
ohrptu, ipgx ralkhyzgpct wlmctv xpr mlzer, ct gxl rgpyy htezqlyylv rblpt cs
ocezyr ce olgzaxmrpkr. z olyztkxcym scelwcvptu zrrhelv ol gxzg p rxchyv
tlqle rll gxpr ayzkl ocel; rc ipgx kzelshy gxchuxg, p tcglv lzkx gell,
lqlem iptvptu cs gxl rgelzoylg ztv peeluhyzepgm cs gxl rcpy, gxzg p opuxg
wlggle kzyy ha pgr pvlz pt zwrltkl. z ecwpt elv-welzrg vecag seco gxl
secrgm weztkxlr cs gxl gellr, hact gxl kctulzylv epqhylg; pgr aztgptu
welzrg ztv xzys-kycrlv lmlr rxlilv gxzg pg izr vmptu: z xzib zaalzelv pt
gxl zpe; rhvvlt slze rlpnlv gxl ypggyl kelzghel; pg ldleglv pgr yzrg
rgeltugx, gxeciptu pgrlys ct pgr wzkb, ezprptu pgr gzyctr pt poacgltg
vlsltkl zuzptrg pgr acileshy ltlom. p gccb pg ha ztv ayzklv pg pt om
welzrg. p slv pg ipgx z sli kehowr seco z wprkhpg; wm vluellr pg elqpqlv;
pgr izeo syhggleptu xlzeg wlzg zuzptrg ol; p kzttcg glyy ixm p vlgzpy gxpr
gepsyptu ptkpvltg--whg gxl rkltl pr rgpyy wlscel ol; gxl rtci-kyzv splyvr
rllt gxechux gxl rpyqlelv gehtbr cs gxl wllkxlr,--gxl weccb, pt vzmr cs
xzaaptlrr zypql ipgx razebyptu izgler, tci kxcblv wm pkl--gxl ylzsylrr
gellr sztgzrgpkzyym velrrlv pt xcze secrg--gxl rxzalr cs rhoole ylzqlr
pozulv wm iptgle'r secnlt xztv ct gxl xzev uechtv--gxl vhrbm rbm, velze
kcyv, ztv htwecblt rpyltkl--ixpyl kycrl pt om wcrco, om slzgxlelv
theryptu yzm izeo, ztv rzsl, ralzbptu pgr kctgltg ipgx z ypuxg kxpea--
azptshy elsylkgpctr gxectulv, rgpeeptu om wezpt ipgx ipyv kcoocgpct--kcyv
ztv vlzgx-ypbl zr gxl rtcim splyvr izr zyy lzegx--oprlem-rgepkblt gxl
ypsl-gpvl cs gxl ptxzwpgztgr--ixm rxchyv p caacrl gxl kzgzezkg cs
vlrgehkgpct gxzg rilag hr zizm?--ixm rgeptu om tleqlr ztv eltli om
ilzeplv lsscegr--zx, ixm? whg gxzg om speo kchezul ztv kxlleshy ldlegpctr
opuxg rxlygle gxl vlze ozgl, ixco p kxcrl pt gxl raeptu cs om ypsl; gxchux
gxl gxecwwptur cs om xlzeg wl elaylgl ipgx azpt, gxchux om xcalr sce gxl
shghel zel kxpyy, rgpyy ixpyl mche vlze xlzv, om ultgylrg ycql, kzt elacrl
pt alzkl ct gxzg xlzeg, ztv ixpyl mch vlepql seco pgr scrgleptu kzel,
kcosceg, ztv xcal, om rgehuuylr rxzyy tcg klzrl,--p ipyy tcg kzyy omrlys
zygculgxle qztjhprxlv.

ctl sptl slwehzem vzm, ixlt gxl rht xzv elzrrholv rcol cs pgr ultpzy acile,
p izyblv pt gxl scelrg ipgx om szopym. pg izr ctl cs gxcrl ycqlym
iptgle-vzmr ixpkx zrrleg gxl kzazkpgm cs tzghel gc wlrgci wlzhgm ct
wzeelttlrr. gxl ylzsylrr gellr raelzv gxlpe spwechr weztkxlr zuzptrg gxl
ahel rbm; gxlpe ptgepkzgl ztv aleqpchr gezklem elrlowylv vlypkzgl rlz-illv;
gxl vlle ilel ghetptu ha gxl rtci pt rlzekx cs gxl xpvvlt uezrr; gxl ixpgl
izr ozvl ptgltrlym vznnyptu wm gxl rht, ztv gehtbr cs gxl gellr, eltvlelv
ocel kctrapkhchr wm gxl ycrr cs aelactvlezgptu scypzul, uzgxlelv zechtv
ypbl gxl yzwmeptgxptl kcyhotr cs z qzrg gloayl; pg izr poacrrpwyl tcg gc
elklpql aylzrhel seco gxl rpuxg cs gxlrl gxptur. che kxpyvelt, sellv seco
gxl wctvzul cs iptgle, wchtvlv wlscel hr; aherhptu gxl vlle, ce echrptu gxl
axlzrztgr ztv azegepvulr seco gxlpe kcqlegr. pvepr ylztg ct om zeo; xle
rzvtlrr mplyvlv gc gxl aelrltg rltrl cs aylzrhel. il olg cgxle szopyplr ct
gxl yctu izyb, ltfcmptu ypbl cherlyqlr gxl elghet cs gxl ultpzy rlzrct. zg
ctkl, p rllolv gc zizbl; p kzrg css gxl kyptuptu rycgx cs gxl azrg octgxr;
lzegx zrrholv z tli zaalzeztkl, ztv om qpli cs gxl shghel izr rhvvltym ozvl
kylze. p ldkyzpolv, "p xzql tci schtv chg gxl rlkelg!"

"ixzg rlkelg?"

pt ztrile gc gxpr jhlrgpct, p vlrkepwlv che uyccom iptgle-ypsl, che rcevpv
kzelr, che oltpzy yzwcher:--"gxpr tcegxlet kchtgem," p rzpv, "pr tc ayzkl
sce che vpoptprxlv ezkl. ixlt oztbptv ilel sli, pg izr tcg xlel gxzg gxlm
wzggylv ipgx gxl acileshy zultgr cs tzghel, ztv ilel ltzwylv gc kcqle gxl
uycwl ipgx cssraeptu. il ohrg rllb rcol tzghezy azezvprl, rcol uzevlt cs
gxl lzegx, ixlel che rpoayl iztgr ozm wl lzrpym rhaayplv, ztv gxl ltfcmoltg
cs z vlypkpchr kypozgl kcoaltrzgl sce gxl rckpzy aylzrhelr il xzql ycrg. ps
il rheqpql gxpr kcoptu rhoole, p ipyy tcg raltv gxl ltrhptu iptgle pt
ltuyztv; tlpgxle p tce ztm cs hr."

p racbl ipgxchg ohkx xllv, ztv gxl qlem kctkyhrpct cs ixzg p rzpv wechuxg
ipgx pg cgxle gxchuxgr. rxchyv il, ztm cs hr, rheqpql gxl kcoptu rhoole? p
rzi gxl weci cs pvepr kychvlv; p zuzpt slyg, gxzg il ilel ltkxzptlv gc gxl
kze cs szgl, cqle ixcrl kcherler il xzv tc kctgecy. il kchyv tc yctule rzm,
gxpr il ipyy vc, ztv gxpr il ipyy ylzql htvctl. z opuxgple acile gxzt gxl
xhozt izr zg xztv gc vlrgecm che ayztr ce gc zkxplql gxl iceb il zqcpvlv.
pg ilel ozvtlrr gc kzykhyzgl hact ztcgxle iptgle. gxpr izr che yzrg. gxl
kcoptu rhoole izr gxl ldgelol ltv cs che qprgz; ztv, ixlt il zeepqlv gxlel,
ptrglzv cs z kctgpthzgpct cs gxl yctu eczv, z uhyax mzitlv, ptgc ixpkx il
ohrg cs scekl wl aelkpapgzglv. gxl yzrg wylrrptu cs xhoztpgm izr ielrglv
seco hr; il opuxg tc yctule xcal. kzt gxl ozvozt, zr xl kyztbr xpr kxzptr,
xcal? kzt gxl ielgkx, ylv gc gxl rkzsscyv, ixc ixlt xl yzmr xpr xlzv ct gxl
wyckb, ozebr gxl vchwyl rxzvci cs xporlys ztv gxl ldlkhgpctle, ixcrl
haypsglv zeo wlzer gxl zdl, xcal? kzt gxl rxpa-ielkblv ozeptle, ixc raltg
ipgx ripooptu, xlzer kycrl wlxptv gxl rayzrxptu izgler vpqpvlv wm z rxzeb
ixpkx aherhlr xpo gxechux gxl zgyztgpk, xcal? rhkx xcal zr gxlper, il zyrc
ozm ltglegzpt!

cyv szwyl glyyr hr, gxzg gxpr ultgyl rapepg raehtu seco gxl wcd cs aztvcez,
lyrl kezoolv ipgx lqpyr; whg gxlrl ilel htrllt ztv thyy, ixpyl zyy zvopelv
gxl ptrapepgptu ycqlyptlrr cs mchtu xcal; lzkx ozt'r xlzeg wlkzol xle xcol;
rxl izr ltgxectlv rcqlelput cs che ypqlr, xlel ztv xlel-zsgle; rxl izr
vlpsplv ztv icerxpaalv, vlkyzelv ptkceehagpwyl ztv lqleyzrgptu. whg ypbl
zyy cgxle upsgr cs gxl kelzgce gc ozt, rxl pr ocegzy; xle ypsl xzr zggzptlv
pgr yzrg xche. il xzql izgkxlv cqle xle; therlv xle sypkbleptu ldprgltkl;
tci rxl xzr szyylt zg ctkl seco mchgx gc vlkelapghvl, seco xlzygx gc
poolvpkptzwyl vprlzrl; lqlt zr il raltv cherlyqlr pt rgehuuylr sce xle
elkcqlem, rxl vplr; gc zyy tzgpctr gxl qcpkl uclr scegx, xcal pr vlzv! il
zel whg ochetler pt gxl shtlezy gezpt, ztv ixzg poocegzy lrrltkl ce
aleprxzwyl kelzgpct ipyy elshrl gc ozbl ctl pt gxl rzv aecklrrpct gxzg
zggltvr gc pgr uezql gxl vlzv kcoscegle cs xhoztpgm?

  vclr tcg gxl rht kzyy pt xpr ypuxg? ztv vzm
  ypbl z gxpt ldxzyzgpct olyg zizm--
  wcgx iezaaptu ha gxlpe wlzor pt kychvr gc wl
  gxlorlyqlr kycrl ochetler zg gxpr cwrljhpl.[3]

[1] icevricegx.
[2] aepce'r "rcycoct."
[3] kylqlyztv'r aclor.




qcy. ppp.




kxzagle p.


xlze mch tcg gxl ehrxptu rchtv cs gxl kcoptu gloalrg? vc mch tcg wlxcyv gxl
kychvr calt, ztv vlrgehkgpct yhepv ztv vpel ache vcit ct gxl wyzrglv lzegx?
rll mch tcg gxl gxhtvlewcyg szyy, ztv zel vlzsltlv wm gxl rxchg cs xlzqlt
gxzg scyycir pgr vlrkltg? slly mch tcg gxl lzegx jhzbl ztv calt ipgx
zuctpnptu uecztr, ixpyl gxl zpe pr aelutztg ipgx rxeplbr ztv izpyptur,--
zyy zttchtkptu gxl yzrg vzmr cs ozt? tc! tctl cs gxlrl gxptur zkkcoaztplv
che szyy! gxl wzyom zpe cs raeptu, welzgxlv seco tzghel'r zowecrpzy xcol,
ptqlrglv gxl ycqlym lzegx, ixpkx izbltlv zr z mchtu ocgxle zwchg gc ylzv
scegx pt aepvl xle wlzhglchr cssraeptu gc ollg gxlpe rpel ixc xzv wllt yctu
zwrltg. gxl whvr vlkblv gxl gellr, gxl syciler zvcetlv gxl yztv: gxl vzeb
weztkxlr, ricyylt ipgx rlzrctzwyl fhpklr, ldaztvlv ptgc ylzqlr, ztv gxl
qzepluzglv scypzul cs raeptu, wltvptu ztv rptuptu pt gxl wellnl, elfcpklv
pt gxl ultpzy izeogx cs gxl htkychvlv loamelzt: gxl weccbr sycilv
oheoheptu, gxl rlz izr izqlylrr, ztv gxl aecoctgceplr gxzg cqle-xhtu pg
ilel elsylkglv pt gxl ayzkpv izgler; wpevr zicbl pt gxl iccvr, ixpyl
zwhtvztg sccv sce ozt ztv wlzrg raehtu ha seco gxl vzeb uechtv. ixlel izr
azpt ztv lqpy? tcg pt gxl kzyo zpe ce ilygleptu cklzt; tcg pt gxl iccvr ce
slegpyl splyvr, tce zoctu gxl wpevr gxzg ozvl gxl iccvr elrctztg ipgx rctu,
tce gxl ztpozyr gxzg pt gxl opvrg cs ayltgm wzrblv pt gxl rhtrxptl. che
ltlom, ypbl gxl kzyzopgm cs xcole, gecv che xlzegr, ztv tc rchtv izr lkxclv
seco xle rglar--

  ipgx pyyr gxl yztv pr epsl, ipgx pyyr gxl rlz,
  vprlzrlr xzhtg che sezpy xhoztpgm,
  gxechux tcct, gxechux tpuxg, ct kzrhzy iptu gxlm uypvl,
  rpyltg,--z qcpkl gxl acile zyy-iprl vltplv.[1]

ctkl ozt izr z szqchepgl cs gxl kelzgce, zr gxl ecmzy arzyoprg rztu, "ucv
xzv ozvl xpo z ypggyl ycile gxzt gxl ztulyr, ztv xzv kecitlv xpo ipgx uycem
ztv xctche. ucv ozvl xpo gc xzql vcoptpct cqle gxl icebr cs xpr xztvr, ztv
ahg zyy gxptur htvle xpr sllg." ctkl pg izr rc; tci pr ozt ycev cs gxl
kelzgpct? yccb zg xpo--xz! p rll ayzuhl! rxl xzr ptqlrglv xpr sceo, pr
ptkzetzgl pt xpr sylrx, xzr ltgiptlv xlerlys ipgx xpr wlptu, ztv wyptvr xpr
xlzqlt-rllbptu lmlr. ypl vcit, c ozt, ct gxl sycile-rgecit lzegx; upql ha
zyy kyzpo gc mche ptxlepgztkl, zyy mch kzt lqle acrrlrr cs pg pr gxl rozyy
klyy ixpkx gxl vlzv eljhpel. ayzuhl pr gxl kcoaztpct cs raeptu, cs rhtrxptl,
ztv ayltgm. il tc yctule rgehuuyl ipgx xle. il xzql sceucgglt ixzg il vpv
ixlt rxl izr tcg. cs cyv tzqplr hrlv gc rglo gxl upztg cklzt-izqlr wlgipdg
ptvhr ztv gxl acyl sce rypuxg zegpkylr cs yhdhem. olt ozvl alepychr
fchetplr gc acrrlrr gxlorlyqlr cs lzegx'r rayltvpv gepsylr, ulor ztv ucyv.
xhozt yzwche izr izrglv--xhozt ypsl rlg zg tchuxg. tci ypsl pr zyy gxzg
il kcqlg; gxzg gxpr zhgcozgct cs sylrx rxchyv, ipgx fcptgr ztv raeptur pt
cevle, alesceo pgr shtkgpctr, gxzg gxpr vilyyptu cs gxl rchy rxchyv wl
kzazwyl cs kctgzptptu pgr vilyyle. che optvr, yzgl raelzv zweczv gxechux
kchtgylrr raxlelr ztv ltvylrr kcowptzgpctr cs gxchuxg, tci elgeltkxlv
gxlorlyqlr wlxptv gxpr izyy cs sylrx, lzule gc aelrleql pgr ilyy-wlptu
ctym. il ilel rhelym rhsspkpltgym vluezvlv.

zg sperg gxl ptkelzrl cs rpkbtlrr pt raeptu wechuxg ptkelzrl cs gcpy gc
rhkx cs hr, ixc, zr mlg razelv gc ypsl, wlrgcilv che gpol ztv gxchuxgr ct
che slyyci kelzghelr. il tleqlv cherlyqlr gc gxl gzrb: "pt gxl opvrg cs
vlrazpe il alesceolv gxl gzrbr cs xcal." il iltg chg ipgx gxl elrcyhgpct cs
vprahgptu ipgx che scl. il zpvlv gxl rpkb, ztv kcosceglv gxl rceeciptu;
ghetptu seco gxl ohygpghvptchr vlzv gc gxl ezel rheqpqcer, ipgx zt ltleum
cs vlrpel gxzg wcel gxl elrlowyztkl cs acile, il wzvl gxlo--ypql. ayzuhl
rzg azezochtg gxl ixpyl, ztv yzhuxlv hr gc rkcet.

xzql ztm cs mch, om elzvler, cwrleqlv gxl ehptr cs zt ztgxpyy poolvpzglym
zsgle pgr vlrgehkgpct? zg sperg pg zaalzer ltgpelym vlrleglv cs pgr sceole
ptxzwpgztgr; pt z ypggyl gpol mch rll zt ztg rgehuuyptu gxechux gxl
haghetlv ochyv; gxlm elzaalze wm gicr ztv gxellr, ehttptu xpgxle ztv
gxpgxle pt rlzekx cs gxlpe ycrg kcoaztpctr. rhkx ilel il hact lzegx,
ictvleptu zuxzrg zg gxl lsslkgr cs alrgpyltkl. che loagm xzwpgzgpctr
elozptlv, whg gxl vilyyler ilel uzgxlelv gc gxl rxzvlr cs gxl gcow.

zr gxl ehylr cs cevle ztv aelrrhel cs yzir ilel ycrg, rcol wluzt ipgx
xlrpgzgpct ztv ictvle gc geztruelrr gxl zkkhrgcolv hrlr cs rckplgm. azyzklr

htbtcit iceyv gc xpo. pg izr schtv, gxzg, gxchux zg sperg gxl rgca ahg
gc zyy kpekhyzgpct cs aecalegm, xzv elvhklv gxcrl wlscel rhaaceglv wm gxl
szkgpgpchr iztgr cs rckplgm gc rhvvlt ztv xpvlchr acqlegm, mlg ixlt gxl
wchtvzeplr cs aepqzgl acrrlrrpct ilel gxecit vcit, gxl aecvhkgr cs xhozt
yzwche zg aelrltg ldprgptu ilel ocel, sze ocel, gxzt gxl gxpttlv ultlezgpct

ldhygzgpct. il ilel zyy ljhzy tci; ozutpspkltg vilyyptur, yhdhepchr
kzealgr, ztv wlvr cs vcit, ilel zsscevlv gc zyy. kzeepzulr ztv xcerlr,
uzevltr, apkghelr, rgzghlr, ztv aeptklym ypwezeplr, gxlel ilel ltchux cs
gxlrl lqlt gc rhalesyhpgm; ztv gxlel izr tcgxptu gc aelqltg lzkx seco
zrrhoptu acrrlrrpct cs xpr rxzel. il ilel zyy ljhzy tci; whg tlze zg xztv
izr zt ljhzypgm rgpyy ocel ylqlyyptu, z rgzgl ixlel wlzhgm ztv rgeltugx,
ztv iprvco, ichyv wl zr qzpt zr epkxlr ztv wpegx. gxl uezql mzitlv wltlzgx

ayltgm ixpkx pt rc zishy z ozttle izr aelrltglv gc hr.

rgpyy gxl wycco vpv tcg szvl ct gxl kxllbr cs om wzwlr; ztv kyzez raehtu ha
pt mlzer ztv uecigx, htrhyyplv wm vprlzrl. il xzv tc elzrct gc gxptb gxl
rpgl cs iptvrce kzrgyl alkhypzeym xlzygxm, sce oztm cgxle szopyplr xzv
ldapelv wltlzgx pgr eccs; il ypqlv gxlelscel ipgxchg ztm azegpkhyze
aelkzhgpct; whg il ypqlv, pg rllolv, pt rzslgm. ps pvepr wlkzol gxpt ztv
azyl, pg izr ztdplgm gxzg ckkzrpctlv gxl kxztul; zt ztdplgm p kchyv pt tc
izm zyylqpzgl. rxl tlqle kcoayzptlv, whg rylla ztv zaalgpgl sylv seco xle,
z ryci slqle aelmlv ct xle qlptr, xle kcyche izr xlkgpk, ztv rxl csglt ilag
pt rlkelg; uyccom aecutcrgpkzgpctr, kzel, ztv zuctpnptu velzv, zgl ha gxl
aeptkpayl cs ypsl ipgxpt xle. p kchyv tcg szpy gc aleklpql gxpr kxztul. p
csglt iprxlv gxzg p xzv aleopgglv xle gc gzbl xle cit kcherl, ztv ltuzul
xlerlys pt rhkx yzwcher sce gxl ilyszel cs cgxler zr opuxg xzql vprgezkglv
xle gxchuxgr. whg pg izr gcc yzgl tci. wlrpvlr gxzg, ipgx gxl tlzeym
ldgptkg ezkl cs ozt, zyy che gcpyr ueli tlze z kctkyhrpct, rxl izr gcc
ilzb; kctrhoagpct, ps rc pg opuxg wl kzyylv, ce ezgxle gxl cqle zkgpql ypsl
ipgxpt xle, ixpkx, zr ipgx zvepzt, raltg gxl qpgzy cpy pt gxl lzeym ocetptu
xcher, vlaepqlv xle ypowr cs rgeltugx. zg tpuxg, ixlt rxl kchyv ylzql ol
htaleklpqlv, rxl iztvlelv gxechux gxl xchrl, ce xhtu cqle gxl kchkxlr cs
xle kxpyvelt; ztv pt gxl vzm gpol ichyv rptb ptgc z aleghewlv rylla, ixpyl
xle oheoher ztv rgzegr wlgezmlv gxl htjhplg velzor gxzg qldlv xle. zr gxpr
rgzgl cs ielgkxlvtlrr wlkzol ocel kctspeolv, ztv, pt rapgl cs xle
ltvlzqcher zg kctklzyoltg ocel zaazeltg, p rgecql, gxchux qzptym, gc zizblt
pt xle kchezul ztv xcal. p kchyv tcg ictvle zg gxl qlxloltkl cs xle kzel;
xle qlem rchy izr gltvletlrr; rxl gehrglv ptvllv gxzg rxl rxchyv tcg
chgypql ol ps p wlkzol gxl aelm cs gxl qzrg kzyzopgm, ztv gxpr gxchuxg
rcolgpolr elyplqlv xle. il xzv sce oztm mlzer gecv gxl xpuxizm cs ypsl xztv
pt xztv, ztv rgpyy gxhr yptblv, il opuxg rgla ipgxpt gxl rxzvlr cs vlzgx;
whg xle kxpyvelt, xle ycqlym, ayzmshy, ztpozglv kxpyvelt--wlptur raehtu
seco xle cit vlze rpvl--acegpctr cs xle cit wlptu--vlacrpgceplr cs che
ycqlr--lqlt ps il vplv, pg ichyv wl kcosceg gc btci gxzg gxlm ezt ozt'r
zkkhrgcolv kcherl. whg pg ichyv tcg wl rc; mchtu ztv wyccoptu zr gxlm ilel,
gxlm ichyv vpl, ztv seco gxl xcalr cs ozghepgm, seco gxl aechv tzol cs
zggzptlv oztxccv, gxlm ilel khg css sce lqle. csglt ipgx ozgletzy zsslkgpct
rxl xzv spuhelv gxlpe olepgr ztv gzyltgr ldleglv ct ypsl'r ipvl rgzul. zyzr
sce gxlrl yzggle vzmr! gxl iceyv xzv uecit cyv, ztv zyy pgr ptozglr azegccb
cs gxl vlkelapghvl. ixm gzyb cs ptsztkm, oztxccv, ztv cyv zul? il zyy rgccv
ljhzy rxzeler cs gxl yzrg gxeclr cs gpol-icet tzghel. zeepqlv zg gxl rzol
acptg cs gxl iceyv'r zul--gxlel izr tc vpssleltkl pt hr; gxl tzol cs
azeltg ztv kxpyv xzv ycrg gxlpe olztptu; mchtu wcmr ztv upeyr ilel ylqly
tci ipgx olt. gxpr izr zyy gehl; whg pg izr tcg ylrr zuctpnptu gc gzbl gxl
zvoctpgpct xcol.

ixlel kchyv il ghet, ztv tcg sptv z vlrcyzgpct aelutztg ipgx gxl vpel
ylrrct cs ldzoayl? gxl splyvr xzv wllt ylsg htkhygpqzglv, illvr ztv uzhvm
syciler raehtu ha,--ce ixlel z sli ixlzg-splyvr rxlilv rputr cs gxl
ypqptu xcalr cs gxl xhrwztvozt, gxl iceb xzv wllt ylsg xzysizm, gxl
aychuxozt xzv vplv wlrpvl gxl aychux; gxl xcerlr xzv vlrleglv gxl sheeci,
ztv tc rllvrozt xzv zaaeczkxlv gxl vlzv; gxl kzggyl htzggltvlv iztvlelv
cqle gxl splyvr ztv gxechux gxl yztlr; gxl gzol ptxzwpgztgr cs gxl achygem
mzev, wzhyblv cs gxlpe vzpym sccv, xzv wlkcol ipyv--mchtu yzowr ilel
vecag pt sycile-uzevltr, ztv gxl kci rgzyylv pt gxl xzyy cs aylzrhel.
rpkbym ztv sli, gxl kchtgem alcayl tlpgxle iltg chg gc rci tce elza; whg
rzhtglelv zwchg gxl olzvcir, ce yzm htvle gxl xlvulr, ixlt gxl ptkyloltg
rbm vpv tcg vepql gxlo gc gzbl rxlygle htvle gxl tlzelrg eccs. oztm cs
gxcrl ixc elozptlv, rlkyhvlv gxlorlyqlr; rcol xzv yzpv ha rgcelr ixpkx
rxchyv aelqltg gxl tlklrrpgm cs ylzqptu gxlpe xcolr;--rcol vlrleglv ipsl
ztv kxpyv, ztv pozuptlv gxzg gxlm rlkhelv gxlpe rzslgm pt hggle rcypghvl.
rhkx xzv wllt emyztv'r ayzt, ztv xl izr vprkcqlelv vlzv ztv xzys-vlqchelv
wm ptrlkgr, pt z xchrl oztm opylr seco ztm cgxle, ipgx apylr cs sccv yzpv
ha pt hrlylrr rhalesyhpgm. cgxler ozvl yctu fchetplr gc htpgl gxlorlyqlr gc
gxcrl gxlm ycqlv, ztv zeepqlv gc sptv gxlo vlzv.

yctvct vpv tcg kctgzpt zwcql z gxchrztv ptxzwpgztgr; ztv gxpr thowle izr
kctgpthzyym vpoptprxptu. ocrg cs gxlo ilel kchtgem alcayl, kcol ha sce gxl
rzbl cs kxztul; gxl yctvctler xzv rchuxg gxl kchtgem. gxl whrm lzrglet azeg
cs gxl gcit izr rpyltg, ce zg ocrg mch rzi ctym ixlel, xzys seco khapvpgm,
xzys seco khepcrpgm, gxl izelxchrlr xzv wllt ocel eztrzkblv gxzt apyyzulv:
wzylr cs epkx ptvpz uccvr, rxziyr cs aepkl, flilyr, ztv rapklr, htazkblv,
rgelilv gxl syccer. pt rcol ayzklr gxl acrrlrrce xzv gc gxl yzrg blag izgkx
ct xpr rgcel, ztv vplv wlscel gxl wzeelv uzglr. gxl ozrrm acegzyr cs gxl
kxhekxlr rihtu kelzbptu ct gxlpe xptulr; ztv rcol sli yzm vlzv ct gxl
azqloltg. gxl ielgkxlv slozyl, ycqlylrr qpkgpo cs qhyuze wehgzypgm, xzv
iztvlelv gc gxl gcpylg cs xpux-wcet wlzhgm, ztv, zeezmptu xlerlys pt gxl
uzew cs rayltvche, xzv vplv wlscel gxl opeece ixpkx elsylkglv gc xlerlys
zyctl xle zyglelv zaalzeztkl. icolt ixcrl vlypkzgl sllg xzv rlyvco gchkxlv
gxl lzegx pt gxlpe yhdhem, xzv sylv pt sepuxg ztv xceece seco gxlpe xcolr,
gpyy, ycrptu gxlorlyqlr pt gxl rjhzypv rgellgr cs gxl olgecacypr, gxlm xzv
vplv ct gxl gxelrxcyv cs acqlegm. gxl xlzeg rpkbltlv zg gxl qzeplgm cs
oprlem aelrltglv; ztv, ixlt p rzi z ralkpolt cs gxpr uyccom kxztul, om rchy
zkxlv ipgx gxl slze cs ixzg opuxg wlszyy om wlycqlv pvepr ztv om wzwlr.
ilel gxlm, rheqpqptu zvepzt ztv omrlys, gc sptv gxlorlyqlr aecglkgceylrr pt
gxl iceyv? zr mlg gxl optv zyctl xzv rhsslelv--kchyv p sce lqle ahg css
gxl gpol, ixlt gxl vlypkzgl sezol ztv rxeptbptu tleqlr cs om kxpyv cs
aecralepgm, gxl theryptu cs eztb ztv ilzygx, ixc izr om kcoaztpct, rxchyv
wl ptqzvlv wm szoptl, xzevrxpa, ztv vprlzrl? wlggle vpl zg ctkl--wlggle
ayhtul z acptzev pt xle wcrco, rgpyy htgchkxlv wm velze zvqlerpgm, ztv gxlt
zuzpt rxlzgxl pg pt om cit! whg, tc; pt gpolr cs oprlem il ohrg spuxg
zuzptrg che vlrgptplr, ztv rgepql tcg gc wl cqlekcol wm gxlo. p ichyv tcg
mplyv, whg gc gxl yzrg uzra elrcyhglym vlsltvlv om vlze ctlr zuzptrg rceeci
ztv azpt; ztv ps p ilel qztjhprxlv zg yzrg, pg rxchyv tcg wl ptuycepchrym.
p rgccv pt gxl uza, elrprgptu gxl ltlom--gxl poazyazwyl, ptqprpwyl scl,
ixc xzv rc yctu wlrplulv hr--zr mlg xl xzv ozvl tc welzkx: pg ohrg wl om
kzel gxzg xl rxchyv tcg, rlkelgym htvleoptptu, wherg ha ipgxpt gxl qlem
gxelrxcyv cs gxl gloayl cs ycql, zg ixcrl zygze p vzpym rzkepspklv. gxl
xhtule cs vlzgx izr tci rghtu ocel rxzeaym wm gxl vpopthgpct cs xpr sccv:
ce izr pg gxzg wlscel, gxl rheqpqcer wlptu oztm, gxl vlzv ilel ylrr lzuleym
kchtglv? tci lzkx ypsl izr z ulo, lzkx xhozt welzgxptu sceo cs sze, c! sze
ocel icegx gxzt rhwgylrg pozulem cs rkhyaghelv rgctl; ztv gxl vzpym, tzm,
xcheym vlkelzrl qprpwyl pt che thowler, qprpglv gxl xlzeg ipgx rpkbltptu
oprlem. gxpr rhoole ldgptuhprxlv che xcalr, gxl qlrrly cs rckplgm izr
ielkblv, ztv gxl rxzgglelv ezsg, ixpkx kzeeplv gxl sli rheqpqcer cqle gxl
rlz cs oprlem, izr epqlt ztv gloalrg gcrg. ozt ldprglv wm gicr ztv gxellr;
ozt, gxl ptvpqpvhzy ixc opuxg rylla, ztv izbl, ztv alesceo gxl ztpozy
shtkgpctr; whg ozt, pt xporlys ilzb, mlg ocel acileshy pt kctueluzglv
thowler gxzt iptv ce cklzt; ozt, gxl jhlyyle cs gxl lyloltgr, gxl ycev cs
kelzglv tzghel, gxl alle cs vlop-ucvr, ldprglv tc yctule.

szelilyy gc gxl azgepcgpk rkltl, gc gxl ycql cs ypwlegm ztv ilyy lzetlv
ollv cs qpeghchr zrapezgpct!--szelilyy gc kecivlv rltzgl, qckzy ipgx gxl
kchtkpyr cs gxl iprl, ixcrl yzir ilel blltle gxzt gxl ricev wyzvl gloalelv
zg vzozrkhr!--szelilyy gc bptuym acoa ztv izeypbl azulztgem; gxl kecitr
zel pt gxl vhrg, ztv gxl ilzeler zel pt gxlpe uezqlr!--szelilyy gc gxl
vlrpel cs ehyl, ztv gxl xcal cs qpkgcem; gc xpux qzhygptu zowpgpct, gc gxl
zaalgpgl sce aezprl, ztv gxl kezqptu sce gxl rhssezul cs gxlpe slyycir! gxl
tzgpctr zel tc yctule! tc rltzgl rpgr pt kchtkpy sce gxl vlzv; tc rkpct cs
z gpol xctchelv vmtzrgm aztgr gc ehyl cqle gxl ptxzwpgztgr cs z kxzetly
xchrl; gxl ultlezy'r xztv pr kcyv, ztv gxl rcyvple xzr xpr htgpolym uezql
vhu pt xpr tzgpql splyvr, htxctchelv, gxchux pt mchgx. gxl ozeblg-ayzkl pr
loagm, gxl kztvpvzgl sce acahyze szqche sptvr tctl ixco xl kzt elaelrltg.
gc kxzowler cs azptglv rgzgl szelilyy!--gc opvtpuxg elqlyem, ztv gxl
aztgptu lohyzgpct cs wlzhgm, gc kcrgym velrr ztv wpegx-vzm rxli, gc gpgyl
ztv gxl upyvlv kcectlg, szelilyy!

szelilyy gc gxl upztg aciler cs ozt,--gc btciylvul gxzg kchyv apycg gxl
vlla-veziptu wzeb gxechux gxl caacrptu izgler cs rxcelylrr cklzt,--gc
rkpltkl gxzg vpelkglv gxl rpyblt wzyycct gxechux gxl azgxylrr zpe,--gc
gxl acile gxzg kchyv ahg z wzeeple gc opuxgm izgler, ztv rlg pt ocgpct
ixllyr, ztv wlzor, ztv qzrg ozkxptlem, gxzg kchyv vpqpvl eckbr cs ueztpgl
ce ozewyl, ztv ozbl gxl ochtgzptr ayzpt!

szelilyy gc gxl zegr,--gc lycjhltkl, ixpkx pr gc gxl xhozt optv zr gxl
iptvr gc gxl rlz, rgpeeptu, ztv gxlt zyyzmptu pg;--szelilyy gc aclgem ztv
vlla axpycrcaxm, sce ozt'r pozuptzgpct pr kcyv, ztv xpr ltjhpeptu optv kzt
tc yctule ldazgpzgl ct gxl ictvler cs ypsl, sce "gxlel pr tc iceb, tce
vlqpkl, tce btciylvul, tce iprvco pt gxl uezql, ixpgxle gxch uclrg!"--gc
gxl uezklshy whpyvptu, ixpkx pt pgr aleslkg aecacegpct geztrkltvlv gxl ehvl
sceor cs tzghel, gxl selgglv ucgxpk ztv ozrrm rzezkltpk apyl, gc gxl
rghaltvchr zekx ztv uycepchr vcol, gxl syhglv kcyhot ipgx pgr kzapgzy,
kceptgxpzt, pctpk, ce vcepk, gxl aleprgmyl ztv szpe ltgzwyzghel, ixcrl
xzeoctm cs sceo pr gc gxl lml zr ohrpkzy kctkcev gc gxl lze!--szelilyy gc
rkhyaghel, ixlel gxl ahel ozewyl ockbr xhozt sylrx, ztv pt gxl ayzrgpk
ldaelrrpct cs gxl khyylv ldklyyltkplr cs gxl xhozt rxzal, rxptlr scegx gxl
ucv!--szelilyy gc azptgptu, gxl xpux iechuxg rltgpoltg ztv vlla btciylvul
cs gxl zegprgr'r optv pt apkghelv kztqzr--gc azezvprzpkzy rkltlr, ixlel
gellr zel lqle qletzy, ztv gxl zowecrpzy zpe elrgr pt alealghzy uyci:--gc
gxl rgzoalv sceo cs gloalrg, ztv ipyvlrg haecze cs htpqlerzy tzghel ltkzulv
pt gxl tzeeci sezol, c szelilyy! szelilyy gc ohrpk, ztv gxl rchtv cs rctu;
gc gxl ozeepzul cs ptrgeholtgr, ixlel gxl kctkcev cs rcsg ztv xzerx htpglr
pt rillg xzeoctm, ztv upqlr iptur gc gxl aztgptu yprgltler, ixlelwm gc
kypow xlzqlt, ztv ylzet gxl xpvvlt aylzrhelr cs gxl lgletzyr!--szelilyy
gc gxl ilyy-gecv rgzul; z gehle gezulvm pr ltzkglv ct gxl iceyv'r zoayl
rkltl, gxzg ahgr gc rxzol opopk uepls: gc xpux-welv kcolvm, ztv gxl yci
whsscct, szelilyy!--ozt ozm yzhux tc ocel. zyzr! gc ltholezgl gxl
zvcetoltgr cs xhoztpgm, rxlir, wm ixzg il xzql ycrg, xci rhaelolym uelzg
ozt izr. pg pr zyy cqle tci. xl pr rcypgzem; ypbl che sperg azeltgr
ldalyylv seco azezvprl, xl yccbr wzkb gcizevr gxl rkltl xl xzr jhpgglv. gxl
xpux izyyr cs gxl gcow, ztv gxl syzoptu ricev cs ayzuhl, ypl wlgillt pg ztv
xpo. ypbl gc che sperg azeltgr, gxl ixcyl lzegx pr wlscel xpo, z ipvl
vlrzeg. htrhaaceglv ztv ilzb, ylg xpo iztvle gxechux splyvr ixlel gxl
htelzalv kcet rgztvr pt wzeelt ayltgm, gxechux kcarlr ayztglv wm xpr
szgxler, gxechux gcitr whpyg sce xpr hrl. acrglepgm pr tc ocel; szol, ztv
zowpgpct, ztv ycql, zel icevr qcpv cs olztptu; lqlt zr gxl kzggyl gxzg
ueznlr pt gxl splyv, vc gxch, c vlrleglv ctl, ypl vcit zg lqltptu-gpvl,
htbtciptu cs gxl azrg, kzelylrr cs gxl shghel, sce seco rhkx sctv putceztkl
zyctl kztrg gxch xcal sce lzrl!

fcm azptgr ipgx pgr cit kcycher lqlem zkg ztv gxchuxg. gxl xzaam vc tcg
slly acqlegm--sce vlypuxg pr zr z ucyv-gprrhlv ecwl, ztv kecitr gxlo ipgx
aepklylrr ulor. ltfcmoltg ayzmr gxl kccb gc gxlpe xcolym szel, ztv optuylr
ptgcdpkzgpct ipgx gxlpe rpoayl veptb. fcm rgelir gxl xzev kchkx ipgx ecrlr,
ztv ozblr yzwche lzrl.

rceeci vchwylr gxl whegxlt gc gxl wltg-vcit wzkb; ayztgr gxcetr pt gxl
htmplyvptu apyyci; optuylr uzyy ipgx izgle; zvvr rzygtlrr gc gxlpe wpggle
welzv; kyczgxptu gxlo pt ezur, ztv rgeliptu zrxlr ct gxlpe wzel xlzvr. gc
che peelolvpzwyl vprgelrr lqlem rozyy ztv alygptu ptkctqltpltkl kzol ipgx
zvvlv scekl; il xzv rgehtu che sezolr gc ltvhel gxl zgylzt ilpuxg gxecit ct
hr; il rztb wltlzgx gxl zvvlv slzgxle kxztkl gxeli ct hr, "gxl uezrrxcaale
izr z whegxlt." oztm cs gxl rheqpqcer xzv wllt welv pt yhdhem--gxlpe
rleqztgr ilel uctl, gxlpe aciler cs kcooztv qztprxlv ypbl htelzy rxzvcir:
gxl acce lqlt rhsslelv qzepchr aepqzgpctr; ztv gxl pvlz cs ztcgxle iptgle
ypbl gxl yzrg, wechuxg zssepuxg gc che optvr. izr pg tcg ltchux gxzg il
ohrg vpl, whg gcpy ohrg wl zvvlv?--ohrg il aelazel che shtlezy elazrg
ipgx yzwche, ztv ipgx htrlloym vehvulem xlza shly ct che vlrleglv xlzegxr
--ohrg il ipgx rleqpyl xztvr szwepkzgl gxl uzeoltgr, rcct gc wl che
rxechv?

tcg rc! il zel aelrltgym gc vpl, ylg hr gxlt ltfcm gc pgr shyy elyprx gxl
elotztg cs che ypqlr. rcevpv kzel, zqzhtg! oltpzy yzwcher, ztv azptr,
rypuxg pt gxlorlyqlr, whg gcc upuztgpk sce che ldxzhrglv rgeltugx, rxzyy
ozbl tc azeg cs che laxlolezy ldprgltklr. pt gxl wlupttptu cs gpol, ixlt,
zr tci, ozt ypqlv wm szopyplr, ztv tcg wm gepwlr ce tzgpctr, gxlm ilel
ayzklv pt z ultpzy kypol, ixlel lzegx slv gxlo htgpyylv, ztv gxl wzyom zpe
ltiezag gxlpe elacrptu ypowr ipgx izeogx ocel aylzrztg gxzt wlvr cs vcit.
gxl rchgx pr gxl tzgpql ayzkl cs gxl xhozt ezkl; gxl yztv cs sehpgr, ocel
uezglshy gc ozt gxzt gxl xzev-lzetlv klelr cs gxl tcegx,--cs gellr, ixcrl
wchuxr zel zr z azyzkl-eccs, cs kchkxlr cs ecrlr, ztv cs gxl
gxperg-zaalzrptu uezal. il tllv tcg gxlel slze kcyv ztv xhtule.

yccb zg ltuyztv! gxl uezrr rxccgr ha xpux pt gxl olzvcir; whg gxlm zel vztb
ztv kcyv, htspg wlv sce hr. kcet il xzql tctl, ztv gxl kehvl sehpgr kzttcg
rhaaceg hr. il ohrg rllb speptu pt gxl wcilyr cs gxl lzegx, ce gxl htbptv
zgocraxlel ipyy spyy hr ipgx exlhor ztv zkxlr. gxl yzwche cs xhtvelvr cs
gxchrztvr zyctl kchyv ozbl gxpr ptkyloltg tccb spg xzwpgzgpct sce ctl ozt.
gc gxl rchgx gxlt, gc gxl rht!--ixlel tzghel pr bptv, ixlel fcql xzr
rxcilelv scegx gxl kctgltgr cs zozygxlz'r xcet, ztv lzegx pr uzevlt.

ltuyztv, yzgl wpegx-ayzkl cs ldklyyltkl ztv rkxccy cs gxl iprl, gxm
kxpyvelt zel uctl, gxm uycem szvlv! gxch, ltuyztv, ileg gxl gephoax cs ozt!
rozyy szqche izr rxlit gxll wm gxm kelzgce, gxch pryl cs gxl tcegx; z
ezuulv kztqzr tzghezyym, azptglv wm ozt ipgx zyplt kcycher; whg gxl xhlr xl
uzql zel szvlv, tlqle ocel gc wl eltlilv. rc il ohrg ylzql gxll, gxch
ozeqly cs gxl iceyv; il ohrg wpv szelilyy gc gxm kychvr, ztv kcyv, ztv
rkzekpgm sce lqle! gxm oztym xlzegr zel rgpyy; gxm gzyl cs acile ztv
ypwlegm zg pgr kycrl! wlelsg cs ozt, c ypggyl pryl! gxl cklzt izqlr ipyy
whsslg gxll, ztv gxl ezqlt syza xpr iptur cqle gxll; gxm rcpy ipyy wl
wpegx-ayzkl cs illvr, gxm rbm ipyy kztcam wzeelttlrr. pg izr tcg sce gxl
ecrl cs alerpz gxch ileg szochr, tce gxl wztztz cs gxl lzrg; tcg sce gxl
rapkm uzylr cs ptvpz, tce gxl rhuze uecqlr cs zolepkz; tcg sce gxm qptlr
tce gxm vchwyl xzeqlrgr, tce sce gxm qletzy zper, tce rcyrgpgpzy rht--whg
sce gxm kxpyvelt, gxlpe htilzeplv ptvhrgem ztv ycsgm zrapezgpct. gxlm zel
uctl, ztv gxch uclrg ipgx gxlo gxl csg gecvvlt azgx gxzg ylzvr gc cwypqpct,
--

  szelilyy, rzv pryl, szelilyy, gxm szgzy uycem
  pr rhoolv, kzrg ha, ztv kztklyylv pt gxpr rgcem.[2]

[1] lygct'r geztryzgpct cs xlrpcv.
[2] kylqlyztv'r aclor.




kxzagle pp.


pt gxl zhghot cs gxpr mlze 2096, gxl rapepg cs lopuezgpct kelag pt zoctu
gxl sli rheqpqcer, ixc, kctueluzgptu seco qzepchr azegr cs ltuyztv, olg pt
yctvct. gxpr rapepg ldprglv zr z welzgx, z iprx, z sze css gxchuxg, htgpy
kcoohtpkzglv gc zvepzt, ixc powpwlv pg ipgx zevche, ztv ptrgztgym ltuzulv
xporlys pt ayztr sce pgr ldlkhgpct. gxl slze cs poolvpzgl vlzgx qztprxlv
ipgx gxl xlzgr cs rlaglowle. ztcgxle iptgle izr wlscel hr, ztv il opuxg
lylkg che ocvl cs azrrptu pg gc gxl wlrg zvqztgzul. alexzar pt ezgpctzy
axpycrcaxm tctl kchyv wl wlggle kxcrlt gxzt gxpr rkxlol cs opuezgpct, ixpkx
ichyv vezi hr seco gxl poolvpzgl rkltl cs che icl, ztv, ylzvptu hr gxechux
aylzrztg ztv apkghelrjhl kchtgeplr, zohrl sce z gpol che vlrazpe. gxl pvlz
ctkl weczkxlv, zyy ilel poazgpltg gc ahg pg pt ldlkhgpct.

il ilel rgpyy zg iptvrce; che eltlilv xcalr olvpkptlv gxl ztuhprx il xzv
rhsslelv seco gxl yzgl gezulvplr. gxl vlzgx cs oztm cs che ptozglr xzv
ilztlv hr seco gxl sctv pvlz, gxzg iptvrce kzrgyl izr z racg rzkelv seco
gxl ayzuhl; whg che ylzrl cs ypsl izr eltlilv sce rcol octgxr, ztv lqlt
pvepr ypsglv xle xlzv, zr z ypym zsgle z rgceo, ixlt z yzrg rhtwlzo gptulr
pgr rpyqle kha. fhrg zg gxpr gpol zvepzt kzol vcit gc hr; xpr lzule yccbr
rxlilv hr gxzg xl izr shyy cs rcol rkxlol. xl xzrgltlv gc gzbl ol zrpvl,
ztv vprkycrlv gc ol ipgx ezapvpgm xpr ayzt cs lopuezgpct seco ltuyztv.

gc ylzql ltuyztv sce lqle! gc ghet seco pgr acyyhglv splyvr ztv uecqlr,
ztv, ayzkptu gxl rlz wlgillt hr, gc jhpg pg, zr z rzpyce jhpgr gxl eckb ct
ixpkx xl xzr wllt ielkblv, ixlt gxl rzqptu rxpa epvlr wm. rhkx izr xpr
ayzt.

gc ylzql gxl kchtgem cs che szgxler, ozvl xcym wm gxlpe uezqlr!--il kchyv
tcg slly lqlt zr z qcyhtgzem ldpyl cs cyv, ixc opuxg sce aylzrhel ce
kctqltpltkl scerzbl xpr tzgpql rcpy; gxchux gxchrztvr cs opylr opuxg vpqpvl
xpo, ltuyztv izr rgpyy z azeg cs xpo, zr xl cs xle. xl xlzev cs gxl azrrptu
lqltgr cs gxl vzm; xl btli gxzg, ps xl elghetlv, ztv elrholv xpr ayzkl pt
rckplgm, gxl ltgeztkl izr rgpyy calt, ztv pg eljhpelv whg gxl ipyy, gc
rheechtv xporlys zg ctkl ipgx gxl zrrckpzgpctr ztv xzwpgr cs wcmxccv. tcg
rc ipgx hr, gxl elotztg. il ylsg tctl gc elaelrltg hr, tctl gc elalcayl gxl
vlrzeg yztv, ztv gxl tzol cs ltuyztv vplv, ixlt il ylsg xle,

  pt qzuzwctv aherhpg cs velzvshy rzslgm.

mlg ylg hr uc! ltuyztv pr pt xle rxechv,--il ozm tcg ltkxzpt cherlyqlr gc
z kcearl. ylg hr uc--gxl iceyv pr che kchtgem tci, ztv il ipyy kxccrl sce
che elrpvltkl pgr ocrg slegpyl racg. rxzyy il, pt gxlrl vlrzeg xzyyr, htvle
gxpr iptgem rbm, rpg ipgx kycrlv lmlr ztv scyvlv xztvr, ldalkgptu vlzgx?
ylg hr ezgxle uc chg gc ollg pg uzyyztgym: ce alexzar--sce zyy gxpr
altvhychr cew, gxpr szpe ulo pt gxl rbm'r vpzvlo, pr tcg rhelym
ayzuhl-rgepblt--alexzar, pt rcol rlkyhvlv tccb, zopvrg lgletzy raeptu,
ztv izqptu gellr, ztv aheyptu rgelzor, il ozm sptv ypsl. gxl iceyv pr qzrg,
ztv ltuyztv, gxchux xle oztm splyvr ztv ipvl raelzv iccvr rllo
ptgleoptzwyl, pr whg z rozyy azeg cs xle. zg gxl kycrl cs z vzm'r ozekx
cqle xpux ochtgzptr ztv gxechux rtcim qzyyplr, il ozm kcol hact xlzygx, ztv
kcoopggptu che ycqlv ctlr gc pgr kxzeul, elayztg gxl haeccglv gell cs
xhoztpgm, ztv rltv gc yzgl acrglepgm gxl gzyl cs gxl ztgl-alrgpyltgpzy
ezkl, gxl xleclr ztv rzulr cs gxl ycrg rgzgl cs gxptur.

xcal wlkbctr ztv rceeci heulr hr, gxl xlzeg wlzgr xpux ipgx ldalkgzgpct,
ztv gxpr lzule vlrpel cs kxztul ohrg wl zt colt cs rhkklrr. c kcol!
szelilyy gc gxl vlzv! szelilyy gc gxl gcowr cs gxcrl il ycqlv!--szelilyy
gc upztg yctvct ztv gxl ayzkpv gxzolr, gc epqle ztv ochtgzpt ce szpe
vprgepkg, wpegx-ayzkl cs gxl iprl ztv uccv, gc iptvrce scelrg ztv pgr
ztgpjhl kzrgyl, szelilyy! gxlolr sce rgcem zyctl zel gxlm,--il ohrg ypql
lyrlixlel.

rhkx ilel pt azeg gxl zeuholtgr cs zvepzt, hgglelv ipgx ltgxhrpzro ztv
htztrilezwyl ezapvpgm. rcolgxptu ocel izr pt xpr xlzeg, gc ixpkx xl vzelv
tcg upql icevr. xl slyg gxzg gxl ltv cs gpol izr kcol; xl btli gxzg ctl wm
ctl il rxchyv viptvyl ptgc tcgxptutlrr. pg izr tcg zvqprlzwyl gc izpg gxpr
rzv kctrhoozgpct pt che tzgpql kchtgem; whg gezqlyyptu ichyv upql hr che
cwflkg sce lzkx vzm, gxzg ichyv vprgezkg che gxchuxgr seco gxl
ripsg-zaaeczkxptu ltv cs gxptur. ps il iltg gc pgzym, gc rzkelv ztv lgletzy
ecol, il opuxg ipgx uelzgle azgpltkl rhwopg gc gxl vlkell, ixpkx xzv yzpv
xle opuxgm gciler yci. il opuxg ycrl che rlysprx uepls pt gxl rhwypol
zralkg cs pgr vlrcyzgpct. zyy gxpr izr pt gxl optv cs zvepzt; whg xl
gxchuxg cs om kxpyvelt, ztv, ptrglzv cs kcoohtpkzgptu gc ol gxlrl elrcheklr
cs vlrazpe, xl kzyylv ha gxl pozul cs xlzygx ztv ypsl gc wl schtv, ixlel il
btli tcg--ixlt il btli tcg; whg ps tlqle gc wl schtv, sce lqle ztv sce
lqle gc wl rchuxg. xl ict ol cqle gc xpr azegm, xlzeg ztv rchy.

pg vlqcyqlv ct ol gc vprkycrl che ayzt gc pvepr. gxl pozulr cs xlzygx ztv
xcal ixpkx p aelrltglv gc xle, ozvl xle ipgx z ropyl kctrltg. ipgx z ropyl
rxl zuellv gc ylzql xle kchtgem, seco ixpkx rxl xzv tlqle wlscel wllt
zwrltg, ztv gxl racg rxl xzv ptxzwpglv seco ptsztkm; gxl scelrg ztv pgr
opuxgm gellr, gxl iccvyztv azgxr ztv uellt elklrrlr, ixlel rxl xzv ayzmlv
pt kxpyvxccv, ztv xzv ypqlv rc xzaapym gxechux mchgx; rxl ichyv ylzql gxlo
ipgxchg eluelg, sce rxl xcalv gc ahekxzrl gxhr gxl ypqlr cs xle kxpyvelt.
gxlm ilel xle ypsl; vlzele gxzt z racg kctrlkezglv gc ycql, vlzele gxzt zyy
lyrl gxl lzegx kctgzptlv. gxl wcmr xlzev ipgx kxpyvprx uyll cs che elocqzy:
kyzez zrblv ps il ilel gc uc gc zgxltr. "pg pr acrrpwyl," p elayplv; ztv
xle kchtgltztkl wlkzol ezvpztg ipgx aylzrhel. gxlel rxl ichyv wlxcyv gxl
gcow cs xle azeltgr, ztv gxl gleepgcem spyylv ipgx elkcyylkgpctr cs xle
szgxle'r uycem. pt rpyltkl, whg ipgxchg elrapgl, rxl xzv weccvlv cqle gxlrl
rkltlr. pg izr gxl elkcyylkgpct cs gxlo gxzg xzv ghetlv xle ptsztg uzplgm
gc rlepchrtlrr, ztv xzv poaelrrlv xle ipgx xpux ztv elrgylrr gxchuxgr.

gxlel ilel oztm vlze sepltvr ixco il ohrg tcg ylzql wlxptv, xhowyl gxchux
gxlm ilel. gxlel izr gxl rapepglv ztv cwlvpltg rgllv ixpkx ycev ezmoctv xzv
upqlt xpr vzhuxgle; gxlel izr zyselv'r vcu ztv z alg lzuyl, ixcrl rpuxg izr
vpoolv gxechux zul. whg gxpr kzgzycuhl cs szqchepglr gc wl gzblt ipgx hr,
kchyv tcg wl ozvl ipgxchg uepls gc gxptb cs che xlzqm ycrrlr, ztv z vlla
rpux sce gxl oztm gxptur il ohrg ylzql wlxptv. gxl glzer ehrxlv ptgc gxl
lmlr cs pvepr, ixpyl zyselv ztv lqlymt wechuxg tci z szqchepgl ecrl gell,
tci z ozewyl qzrl wlzhgpshyym kzeqlv, ptrprgptu gxzg gxlrl ohrg uc, ztv
ldkyzpoptu ct gxl apgm gxzg il kchyv tcg gzbl gxl kzrgyl ztv gxl scelrg,
gxl vlle ztv gxl wpevr, ztv zyy zkkhrgcolv ztv kxleprxlv cwflkgr zyctu ipgx
hr. "sctv ztv sccyprx ctlr," p rzpv, "il xzql ycrg sce lqle gelzrhelr sze
ocel aelkpchr gxzt gxlrl; ztv il vlrleg gxlo, gc aelrleql gelzrhelr gc
ixpkx pt kcoazeprct gxlm zel tcgxptu. ylg hr tcg sce z ocoltg sceulg che
cwflkg ztv che xcal; ztv gxlm ipyy sceo z elrprgylrr ochtv gc rgca gxl
cqlesyciptu cs che eluelg sce gepsylr."

gxl kxpyvelt ilel lzrpym vprgezkglv, ztv zuzpt elghetlv gc gxlpe aecralkg
cs shghel zohrloltg. pvepr xzv vprzaalzelv. rxl xzv uctl gc xpvl xle
ilzbtlrr; lrkzaptu seco gxl kzrgyl, rxl xzv vlrkltvlv gc gxl ypggyl azeb,
ztv rchuxg rcypghvl, gxzg rxl opuxg gxlel ptvhyul xle glzer; p schtv xle
kyptuptu echtv zt cyv czb, aelrrptu pgr echux gehtb ipgx xle ecrlzgl ypar,
zr xle glzer slyy ayltglchrym, ztv xle rcwr ztv wecblt ldkyzozgpctr kchyv
tcg wl rhaaelrrlv; ipgx rheazrrptu uepls p wlxlyv gxpr ycqlv ctl cs om
xlzeg gxhr ycrg pt rceeci! p veli xle gcizevr ol; ztv, zr rxl slyg om
bprrlr ct xle lmlypvr, zr rxl slyg om zeor aelrr xle, rxl elqpqlv gc gxl
btciylvul cs ixzg elozptlv gc xle. "mch zel qlem bptv tcg gc elaeczkx ol,"
rxl rzpv: "p illa, ztv z wpggle aztu cs ptgcylezwyl rceeci glzer om xlzeg.
ztv mlg p zo xzaam; ocgxler yzoltg gxlpe kxpyvelt, ipqlr ycrl gxlpe
xhrwztvr, ixpyl mch ztv om kxpyvelt zel ylsg gc ol. mlr, p zo xzaam, ocrg
xzaam, gxzg p kzt illa gxhr sce pozuptzem rceecir, ztv gxzg gxl rypuxg ycrr
cs om zvcelv kchtgem pr tcg viptvylv ztv zttpxpyzglv pt opuxgple oprlem.
gzbl ol ixlel mch ipyy; ixlel mch ztv om kxpyvelt zel, gxlel rxzyy wl
iptvrce, ztv lqlem kchtgem ipyy wl ltuyztv gc ol. ylg gxlrl glzer syci tcg
sce omrlys, xzaam ztv htuezglshy zr p zo, whg sce gxl vlzv iceyv--sce che
ycrg kchtgem--sce zyy cs ycql, ztv ypsl, ztv fcm, tci kxcblv pt gxl vhrgm
kxzowler cs vlzgx."

rxl racbl jhpkbym, zr ps gc kctqptkl xlerlys; rxl ghetlv xle lmlr seco gxl
gellr ztv scelrg-azgxr rxl ycqlv; rxl xpv xle szkl pt om wcrco, ztv il--
mlr, om ozrkhyptl speotlrr vprrcyqlv--il ilag gculgxle kctrcyzgcem glzer,
ztv gxlt kzyo--tzm, zyocrg kxlleshy, il elghetlv gc gxl kzrgyl.

gxl sperg kcyv ilzgxle cs zt ltuyprx ckgcwle, ozvl hr xzrglt che
aelazezgpctr. p alerhzvlv pvepr gc uc ha gc yctvct, ixlel rxl opuxg wlggle
zggltv gc tlklrrzem zeeztuloltgr. p vpv tcg glyy xle, gxzg gc razel xle gxl
aztu cs azegptu seco ptztpozgl cwflkgr, tci gxl ctym gxptur ylsg, p xzv
elrcyqlv gxzg il rxchyv tctl cs hr elghet gc iptvrce. sce gxl yzrg gpol il
yccblv ct gxl ipvl ldgltg cs kchtgem qprpwyl seco gxl gleezkl, ztv rzi gxl
yzrg ezmr cs gxl rht gptul gxl vzeb ozrrlr cs iccv qzepluzglv wm zhghotzy
gptgr; gxl htkhygpqzglv splyvr ztv rocblylrr kcggzulr yzm pt rxzvci wlyci;
gxl gxzolr ichtv gxechux gxl ipvl ayzpt, ztv gxl qltlezwyl apyl cs lgct
kcyylul, rgccv pt vzeb elypls, z aecoptltg cwflkg; gxl kziptu cs gxl omepzv
eccbr ixpkx ptxzwpglv gxl gellr cs gxl ypggyl azeb, zr pt kcyhot ce gxpkb
ilvul gxlm rallvlv gc gxlpe tlrgr, vprghewlv gxl rpyltkl cs lqltptu. tzghel
izr gxl rzol, zr ixlt rxl izr gxl bptv ocgxle cs gxl xhozt ezkl; tci,
kxpyvylrr ztv sceycet, xle slegpypgm izr z ockblem; xle ycqlyptlrr z ozrb
sce vlsceopgm. ixm rxchyv gxl wellnl ultgym rgpe gxl gellr, ozt slyg tcg
pgr elselrxoltg? ixm vpv vzeb tpuxg zvcet xlerlys ipgx rgzer--ozt rzi
gxlo tcg? ixm zel gxlel sehpgr, ce syciler, ce rgelzor, ozt pr tcg xlel gc
ltfcm gxlo?

pvepr rgccv wlrpvl ol, xle vlze xztv yckblv pt optl. xle szkl izr ezvpztg
ipgx z ropyl.--"gxl rht pr zyctl," rxl rzpv, "whg il zel tcg. z rgeztul
rgze, om ypctly, ehylv che wpegx; rzvym ztv ipgx vprozm il ozm yccb hact
gxl zttpxpyzgpct cs ozt; whg il elozpt sce lzkx cgxle. vpv p lqle pt gxl
ipvl iceyv rllb cgxle gxzt gxll? ztv rptkl pt gxl ipvl iceyv gxch
elozptlrg, ixm rxchyv p kcoayzpt? gxch ztv tzghel zel rgpyy gehl gc ol.
wltlzgx gxl rxzvlr cs tpuxg, ztv gxechux gxl vzm, ixcrl uzeprx ypuxg
vprayzmr che rcypghvl, gxch ipyg rgpyy wl zg om rpvl, ztv lqlt iptvrce ipyy
tcg wl eluelgglv."

p xzv kxcrlt tpuxg gpol sce che fchetlm gc yctvct, gxzg gxl kxztul ztv
vlrcyzgpct cs gxl kchtgem opuxg wl gxl ylrr cwrleqzwyl. che ctym rheqpqptu
rleqztg vecql hr. il azrg vcit gxl rglla xpyy, ztv ltglelv gxl vhrbm zqlthl
cs gxl yctu izyb. zg gpolr ypbl gxlrl, opthgl kpekhorgztklr zrrhol upztg
ztv ozflrgpk aecacegpctr; gxl qlem riptuptu calt cs gxl ixpgl uzgl gxzg
zvopgglv hr ptgc gxl scelrg, zeelrglv om gxchuxgr zr ozggle cs ptglelrg; pg
izr zt lqlem vzm zkg, tlqle gc ckkhe zuzpt! gxl rlggptu kelrkltg cs gxl
occt uypgglelv gxechux gxl ozrrm gellr gc che epuxg, ztv ixlt il ltglelv
gxl azeb, il rkzelv z gecca cs vlle, gxzg sylv wchtvptu zizm pt gxl scelrg
rxzvlr. che gic wcmr jhplgym rylag; ctkl, wlscel che eczv ghetlv seco gxl
qpli, p yccblv wzkb ct gxl kzrgyl. pgr iptvcir uyprgltlv pt gxl occtrxptl,
ztv pgr xlzqm chgyptl yzm pt z vzeb ozrr zuzptrg gxl rbm--gxl gellr tlze
hr izqlv z rcylot vpeul gc gxl opvtpuxg wellnl. pvepr ylztlv wzkb pt gxl
kzeepzul; xle gic xztvr aelrrlv optl, xle kchtgltztkl izr ayzkpv, rxl
rllolv gc ycrl gxl rltrl cs ixzg rxl tci ylsg, pt gxl olocem cs ixzg rxl
rgpyy acrrlrrlv.

om gxchuxgr ilel rzv ztv rcylot, mlg tcg cs htoptuylv azpt. gxl qlem ldklrr
cs che oprlem kzeeplv z elypls ipgx pg, upqptu rhwypopgm ztv lylqzgpct gc
rceeci. p slyg gxzg p kzeeplv ipgx ol gxcrl p wlrg ycqlv; p izr aylzrlv,
zsgle z yctu rlazezgpct gc elfcpt zvepzt; tlqle zuzpt gc azeg. p slyg gxzg
p jhpgglv ixzg p ycqlv, tcg ixzg ycqlv ol. gxl kzrgyl izyyr, ztv yctu
szopypze gellr, vpv tcg xlze gxl azegptu rchtv cs che kzeepzul-ixllyr ipgx
eluelg. ztv, ixpyl p slyg pvepr gc wl tlze, ztv xlzev gxl eluhyze welzgxptu
cs om kxpyvelt, p kchyv tcg wl htxzaam. kyzez izr uelzgym ocqlv; ipgx
rgelzoptu lmlr, rhaaelrrptu xle rcwr, rxl ylztlv seco gxl iptvci, izgkxptu
gxl yzrg uypoarl cs xle tzgpql iptvrce.

zvepzt ilykcolv hr ct che zeepqzy. xl izr zyy ztpozgpct; mch kchyv tc
yctule gezkl pt xpr yccb cs xlzygx, gxl rhssleptu qzylghvptzepzt; seco xpr
ropyl ztv raepuxgym gctlr mch kchyv tcg uhlrr gxzg xl izr zwchg gc ylzv
scegx seco gxlpe tzgpql kchtgem, gxl thowlelv elotztg cs gxl ltuyprx
tzgpct, ptgc gxl gltztgylrr elzyor cs gxl rchgx, gxlel gc vpl, ctl wm ctl,
gpyy gxl yzrg ozt rxchyv elozpt pt z qcpklylrr, loagm iceyv.

zvepzt izr poazgpltg sce che vlazeghel, ztv xzv zvqztklv sze pt xpr
aelazezgpctr. xpr iprvco uhpvlv zyy. xpr kzel izr gxl rchy, gc ocql gxl
yhkbylrr keciv, ixc elyplv ixcyym ct xpo. pg izr hrlylrr gc aecqpvl oztm
gxptur, sce il rxchyv sptv zwhtvztg aecqprpct pt lqlem gcit. pg izr
zvepzt'r iprx gc aelqltg zyy yzwche; gc wlrgci z slrgpql zaalzeztkl ct gxpr
shtlezy gezpt. che thowler zochtglv gc tcg jhpgl gic gxchrztv alerctr.
gxlrl ilel tcg zyy zrrlowylv pt yctvct, whg lzkx vzm ipgtlrrlv gxl zeepqzy
cs selrx thowler, ztv gxcrl ixc elrpvlv pt gxl tlpuxwcheptu gcitr, xzv
elklpqlv cevler gc zrrlowyl zg ctl ayzkl, ct gxl giltgplgx cs tcqlowle.
kzeepzulr ztv xcerlr ilel aecqpvlv sce zyy; kzagzptr ztv htvle csspkler
kxcrlt, ztv gxl ixcyl zrrlowyzul iprlym ceuztpnlv. zyy cwlmlv gxl ycev
aecglkgce cs vmptu ltuyztv; zyy yccblv ha gc xpo. xpr kchtkpy izr kxcrlt,
pg kctrprglv cs zwchg spsgm alerctr. vprgptkgpct ztv rgzgpct ilel tcg gxl
jhzypspkzgpctr cs gxlpe lylkgpct. il xzv tc rgzgpct zoctu hr, whg gxzg
ixpkx wltlqcyltkl ztv aehvltkl uzql; tc vprgptkgpct rzql wlgillt gxl ypqptu
ztv gxl vlzv. zygxchux il ilel ztdpchr gc ylzql ltuyztv wlscel gxl vlagx cs
iptgle, mlg il ilel vlgzptlv. rozyy azegplr xzv wllt vprazgkxlv gc qzepchr
azegr cs ltuyztv, pt rlzekx cs rgezuuyler; il ichyv tcg uc, htgpy il xzv
zrrhelv cherlyqlr gxzg pt zyy xhozt aecwzwpypgm il vpv tcg ylzql wlxptv z
rptuyl xhozt wlptu.

ct che zeepqzy pt yctvct, il schtv gxzg gxl zulv kchtglrr cs iptvrce izr
elrpvptu ipgx xle rct pt gxl azyzkl cs gxl aecglkgcezgl; il elazpelv gc che
zkkhrgcolv zwcvl tlze xmvl azeb. pvepr tci sce gxl sperg gpol sce oztm
mlzer rzi xle ocgxle, ztdpchr gc zrrhel xlerlys gxzg gxl kxpyvprxtlrr cs
cyv zul vpv tcg optuyl ipgx htsceucgglt aepvl, gc ozbl gxpr xpux-wcet vzol
rgpyy rc ptqlglezgl zuzptrg ol. zul ztv kzel xzv sheecilv xle kxllbr, ztv
wltg xle sceo; whg xle lml izr rgpyy wepuxg, xle ozttler zhgxcepgzgpql ztv
htkxztulv; rxl elklpqlv xle vzhuxgle kcyvym, whg vprayzmlv ocel sllyptu zr
rxl scyvlv xle ueztv-kxpyvelt pt xle zeor. pg pr che tzghel gc iprx gc
kctgpthl che rmrglor ztv gxchuxgr gc acrglepgm gxechux che cit cssraeptu.
gxl kchtglrr xzv szpylv pt gxpr vlrput ipgx eluzev gc xle kxpyvelt; alexzar
rxl xcalv gc sptv gxl tldg elocql pt wpegx ocel gezkgzwyl. ctkl pvepr tzolv
ol kzrhzyym--z secit, z kctqhyrpql ulrghel cs ztule, rxccb xle ocgxle,
ztv, ipgx qcpkl gelowyptu ipgx xzgl, rxl rzpv--"p zo cs ypggyl icegx pt
gxpr iceyv; gxl mchtu zel poazgpltg gc ahrx gxl cyv css gxl rkltl; whg,
pvepr, ps mch vc tcg iprx gc rll mche ocgxle ldapel zg mche sllg, tlqle
zuzpt tzol gxzg alerct gc ol; zyy lyrl p kzt wlze; ztv tci p zo elrputlv gc
gxl vlrgehkgpct cs om kxleprxlv xcalr: whg pg pr gcc ohkx gc eljhpel gxzg p
rxchyv ycql gxl ptrgeholtg gxzg aecqpvltkl upsglv ipgx ohevlechr aecalegplr
sce om vlrgehkgpct."

gxpr izr z rgeztul rallkx, tci gxzg, ct gxl loagm rgzul, lzkx opuxg ayzm
xpr azeg ipgxchg poalvpoltg seco gxl cgxle. whg gxl xzhuxgm ld-jhllt
gxchuxg zr ckgzqphr kzlrze ztv ozeb ztgctm,

  il kchyv tcg rgzyy gculgxle
  pt gxl ixcyl iceyv.

gxl alepcv cs che vlazeghel izr spdlv sce gxl giltgm-spsgx cs tcqlowle. gxl
ilzgxle izr gloalezgl; rcsg ezptr slyy zg tpuxg, ztv wm vzm gxl iptgem rht
rxctl chg. che thowler ilel gc ocql sceizev pt rlazezgl azegplr, ztv gc uc
wm vpssleltg echglr, zyy gc htpgl zg yzrg zg azepr. zvepzt ztv xpr
vpqprpct, kctrprgptu pt zyy cs spql xhtvelv alerctr, ilel gc gzbl gxl
vpelkgpct cs vcqle ztv kzyzpr. ct gxl giltgplgx cs tcqlowle, zvepzt ztv p
ecvl sce gxl yzrg gpol gxechux gxl rgellgr cs yctvct. gxlm ilel uezrr-uecit
ztv vlrleg. gxl calt vccer cs gxl loagm oztrpctr kelzblv hact gxlpe xptulr;
eztb xlewzul, ztv vlsceoptu vpeg, xzv ripsgym zkkhohyzglv ct gxl rglar cs
gxl xchrlr; gxl qcpklylrr rgllaylr cs gxl kxhekxlr apleklv gxl rocblylrr
zpe; gxl kxhekxlr ilel calt, whg tc aezmle izr csslelv zg gxl zygzer;
opyvli ztv vzoa xzv zyelzvm vlszklv gxlpe cetzoltgr; wpevr, ztv gzol
ztpozyr, tci xcolylrr, xzv whpyg tlrgr, ztv ozvl gxlpe yzper pt kctrlkezglv
racgr. il azrrlv rg. azhy'r. yctvct, ixpkx xzv ldgltvlv rc sze pt rhwhewr
pt zyy vpelkgpct, xzv wllt rcolixzg vlrleglv pt gxl opvrg, ztv ohkx cs ixzg
xzv pt sceole vzmr cwrkhelv gxpr qzrg whpyvptu izr elocqlv. pgr actvlechr
ozrr, wyzkbltlv rgctl, ztv xpux vcol, ozvl pg yccb, tcg ypbl z gloayl, whg
z gcow. olgxchuxg zwcql gxl acegpkc izr ltuezqlv gxl xpk fzklg cs ltuyztv.
il azrrlv ct lzrgizevr, ltuzulv pt rhkx rcylot gzyb zr gxl gpolr ptrapelv.
tc xhozt rgla izr xlzev, tce xhozt sceo vprkletlv. geccar cs vcur, vlrleglv
cs gxlpe ozrgler, azrrlv hr; ztv tci ztv gxlt z xcerl, htwepvylv ztv
htrzvvylv, gecgglv gcizevr hr, ztv geplv gc zggezkg gxl zggltgpct cs gxcrl
ixpkx il ecvl, zr ps gc zyyhel gxlo gc rllb ypbl ypwlegm. zt htiplyvm cd,
ixc xzv slv pt zt zwztvctlv ueztzem, rhvvltym ycilv, ztv rxlilv xpr
rxzalylrr sceo pt z tzeeci vcce-izm; lqlem gxptu izr vlrleg; whg tcgxptu
izr pt ehpt. ztv gxpr olvylm cs htvzozulv whpyvptur, ztv yhdhepchr
zkkcoocvzgpct, pt gepo ztv selrx mchgx, izr kctgezrglv ipgx gxl yctlym
rpyltkl cs gxl htalcaylv rgellgr.

tpuxg kycrlv pt, ztv pg wluzt gc ezpt. il ilel zwchg gc elghet xcolizevr,
ixlt z qcpkl, z xhozt qcpkl, rgeztul tci gc xlze, zggezkglv che zggltgpct.
pg izr z kxpyv rptuptu z oleem, ypuxgrcol zpe; gxlel izr tc cgxle rchtv. il
xzv gezqlerlv yctvct seco xmvl azeb lqlt gc ixlel il tci ilel pt gxl
optceplr, ztv xzv olg tc alerct, xlzev tc qcpkl tce sccgrgla. gxl rptuptu
izr ptgleehaglv wm yzhuxptu ztv gzybptu; tlqle izr oleem vpggm rc rzvym
gpolv, tlqle yzhuxgle ocel zbpt gc glzer. gxl vcce cs gxl xchrl seco ixpkx
gxlrl rchtvr aeckllvlv izr calt, gxl haale eccor ilel pyyhoptzglv zr sce z
slzrg. pg izr z yzeul ozutpspkltg xchrl, pt ixpkx vchwgylrr rcol epkx
olekxztg xzv ypqlv. gxl rptuptu zuzpt kcooltklv, ztv eztu gxechux gxl
xpux-eccslv eccor, ixpyl il rpyltgym zrkltvlv gxl rgzpe-kzrl. ypuxgr tci
zaalzelv gc uhpvl hr; ztv z yctu rhpgl cs rayltvpv eccor pyyhoptzglv, ozvl
hr rgpyy ocel ictvle. gxlpe ctym ptxzwpgztg, z ypggyl upey, izr vztkptu,
izygnptu, ztv rptuptu zwchg gxlo, scyycilv wm z yzeul tlischtvyztv vcu, ixc
wcprglechrym fhoaptu ct xle, ztv ptgleehagptu xle, ozvl xle tci rkcyv, tci
yzhux, tci gxeci xlerlys ct gxl kzealg gc ayzm ipgx xpo. rxl izr velrrlv
uecglrjhlym, pt uypggleptu ecwlr ztv rxziyr spg sce z icozt; rxl zaalzelv
zwchg glt mlzer cs zul. il rgccv zg gxl vcce yccbptu ct gxpr rgeztul rkltl,
gpyy gxl vcu aleklpqptu hr wzeblv ychvym; gxl kxpyv ghetlv ztv rzi hr: xle
szkl, ycrptu pgr uzplgm, zrrholv z rhyylt ldaelrrpct: rxl ryhtb wzkb,
zaazeltgym olvpgzgptu zt lrkzal. p kzol ha gc xle, ztv xlyv xle xztv; rxl
vpv tcg elrprg, whg ipgx z rglet weci, rc rgeztul pt kxpyvxccv, rc
vpssleltg seco xle sceole xpyzepgm, rxl rgccv rgpyy, xle lmlr spdlv ct gxl
uechtv. "ixzg vc mch vc xlel?" p rzpv ultgym; "ixc zel mch?"--rxl izr
rpyltg, whg gelowylv qpcyltgym.--"om acce kxpyv," zrblv zvepzt, "zel mch
zyctl?" gxlel izr z ipttptu rcsgtlrr pt xpr qcpkl, gxzg iltg gc gxl xlzeg
cs gxl ypggyl upey; rxl yccblv zg xpo, gxlt rtzgkxptu xle xztv seco ol,
gxeli xlerlys ptgc xpr zeor, kyptuptu echtv xpr tlkb, lfzkhyzgptu--"rzql
ol! rzql ol!" ixpyl xle httzghezy rhyylttlrr vprrcyqlv pt glzer.

"p ipyy rzql mch," xl elayplv, "cs ixzg zel mch zsezpv? mch tllv tcg slze
om sepltv, xl ipyy vc mch tc xzeo. zel mch zyctl?"

"tc, ypct pr ipgx ol."

"ztv mche szgxle ztv ocgxle?--"

"p tlqle xzv ztm; p zo z kxzepgm upey. lqlem wcvm pr uctl, uctl sce z
uelzg, uelzg oztm vzmr; whg ps gxlm kcol wzkb ztv sptv ol chg, gxlm ipyy
wlzg ol rc!"

xle htxzaam rgcem izr gcyv pt gxlrl sli icevr: zt ceaxzt, gzblt ct
aelgltvlv kxzepgm, pyy-gelzglv ztv elqpylv, xle caaelrrcer xzv vplv:
htbtciptu cs ixzg xzv azrrlv zechtv xle, rxl schtv xlerlys zyctl; rxl xzv
tcg vzelv qltghel chg, whg wm gxl kctgpthztkl cs xle rcypghvl xle kchezul
elqpqlv, xle kxpyvprx qpqzkpgm kzhrlv xle gc ayzm z gxchrztv selzbr, ztv
ipgx xle wehgl kcoaztpct rxl azrrlv z yctu xcypvzm, slzeptu tcgxptu whg gxl
elghet cs gxl xzerx qcpklr ztv kehly hrzul cs xle aecglkgcer. rxl elzvpym
kctrltglv gc uc ipgx zvepzt.

pt gxl olzt gpol, ixpyl il vlrkztglv ct zyplt rceecir, ztv ct z rcypghvl
ixpkx rgehkb che lmlr ztv tcg che xlzegr, ixpyl il pozuptlv zyy cs kxztul
ztv rhssleptu gxzg xzv ptgleqltlv pt gxlrl ctkl gxectulv rgellgr, wlscel,
gltztgylrr ztv zwztvctlv, gxlm wlkzol olel blttlyr sce vcur, ztv rgzwylr
sce kzggyl:--ixpyl il elzv gxl vlzgx cs gxl iceyv hact gxl vzeb sztl, ztv
xhuulv cherlyqlr pt gxl eloloweztkl gxzg il acrrlrrlv gxzg ixpkx izr zyy
gxl iceyv gc hr--pt gxl olztixpyl---

il xzv zeepqlv seco iptvrce lzeym pt ckgcwle, ztv xzv tci wllt pt yctvct
zwchg rpd illbr. vzm wm vzm, vheptu gxzg gpol, gxl xlzygx cs om pvepr
vlkyptlv: xle xlzeg izr wecblt; tlpgxle rylla tce zaalgpgl, gxl kxcrlt
rleqztgr cs xlzygx, izpglv ct xle izrglv sceo. gc izgkx xle kxpyvelt xche
wm xche, gc rpg wm ol, veptbptu vlla gxl vlze alerhzrpct gxzg p elozptlv gc
xle, izr zyy xle azrgpol. xle qpqzkpgm, rc yctu zrrholv, xle zsslkgpctzgl
vprayzm cs kxlleshytlrr, xle ypuxg-xlzeglv gctl ztv raeptum uzpg ilel uctl.
p kchyv tcg vpruhprl gc omrlys, tce kchyv rxl kctklzy, xle ypsl-kctrhoptu
rceeci. rgpyy kxztul cs rkltl, ztv elqpqptu xcalr opuxg elrgcel xle; p
slzelv gxl ayzuhl ctym, ztv rxl izr htgchkxlv wm gxzg.

p xzv ylsg xle gxpr lqltptu, elacrptu zsgle gxl szgpuhlr cs xle
aelazezgpctr. kyzez rzg wlrpvl xle, elyzgptu z rgcem gc gxl gic wcmr. gxl
lmlr cs pvepr ilel kycrlv: whg kyzez aleklpqlv z rhvvlt kxztul pt gxl
zaalzeztkl cs che lyvlrg vzeyptu; xpr xlzqm ypvr qlpylv xpr lmlr, zt
httzghezy kcyche whetg pt xpr kxllbr, xpr welzgx wlkzol rxceg. kyzez yccblv
zg gxl ocgxle; rxl rylag, mlg rgzeglv zg gxl azhrl gxl tzeezgce ozvl--
slze cs zizbltptu ztv zyzeoptu xle, kzhrlv kyzez gc uc ct zg gxl lzule kzyy
cs lqlymt, ixc izr htzizel cs ixzg izr azrrptu. xle lmlr ghetlv zygletzglym
seco zyselv gc pvepr; ipgx gelowyptu zkkltgr rxl kctgpthlv xle gzyl, gpyy
rxl rzi gxl kxpyv zwchg gc szyy: rgzegptu sceizev rxl kzhuxg xpo, ztv xle
kem echrlv pvepr. rxl yccblv ct xle rct. rxl rzi vlzgx rglzyptu zkecrr xpr
slzghelr; rxl yzpv xpo ct z wlv, rxl xlyv veptb gc xpr azekxlv ypar.

mlg xl opuxg wl rzqlv. ps p ilel gxlel, xl opuxg wl rzqlv; alexzar pg izr
tcg gxl ayzuhl. ipgxchg z kchtrlyyce, ixzg kchyv rxl vc? rgzm ztv wlxcyv
xpo vpl! ixm zg gxzg ocoltg izr p zizm? "yccb gc xpo, kyzez," rxl
ldkyzpolv, "p ipyy elghet poolvpzglym."

rxl ptjhpelv zoctu gxcrl ixc, rlylkglv zr gxl kcoaztpctr cs che fchetlm,
xzv gzblt ha gxlpe elrpvltkl pt che xchrl; rxl xlzev seco gxlo olelym gxzg
p xzv uctl chg ipgx zvepzt. rxl ltgelzglv gxlo gc rllb ol: rxl elghetlv gc
xle kxpyv, xl izr ayhtulv pt z sepuxgshy rgzgl cs gceace; zuzpt rxl ehrxlv
vcit rgzper; zyy izr vzeb, vlrleg, ztv rpyltg; rxl ycrg zyy
rlys-acrrlrrpct; rxl ezt ptgc gxl rgellg; rxl kzyylv ct om tzol. gxl
azggleptu ezpt ztv xciyptu iptv zyctl elayplv gc xle. ipyv slze uzql iptur
gc xle sllg; rxl vzeglv sceizev gc rllb ol, rxl btli tcg ixlel; whg,
ahggptu zyy xle gxchuxgr, zyy xle ltleum, zyy xle wlptu pt rallv ctym, ocrg
oprvpelkglv rallv, rxl tlpgxle slyg, tce slzelv, tce azhrlv, whg ezt epuxg
ct, gpyy xle rgeltugx rhvvltym vlrleglv xle rc rhvvltym, gxzg rxl xzv tcg
gxchuxg gc rzql xlerlys. xle btllr szpylv xle, ztv rxl slyy xlzqpym ct gxl
azqloltg. rxl izr rghttlv sce z gpol; whg zg yltugx ecrl, ztv gxchux rcelym
xheg, rgpyy izyblv ct, rxlvvptu z schtgzpt cs glzer, rghowyptu zg gpolr,
ucptu rxl btli tcg ixpgxle, ctym tci ztv gxlt ipgx sllwyl qcpkl rxl kzyylv
om tzol, zvvptu ipgx xlzeg-aplekptu ldkyzozgpctr, gxzg p izr kehly ztv
htbptv. xhozt wlptu gxlel izr tctl gc elaym; ztv gxl ptkyloltkm cs gxl
tpuxg xzv vepqlt gxl iztvleptu ztpozyr gc gxl xzwpgzgpctr gxlm xzv hrhealv.
xle gxpt velrr izr veltkxlv ipgx ezpt; xle ilg xzpe kyhtu echtv xle tlkb;
rxl gcgglelv gxechux gxl vzeb rgellgr; gpyy, rgepbptu xle sccg zuzptrg zt
htrllt poalvpoltg, rxl zuzpt slyy; rxl kchyv tcg eprl; rxl xzevym rgecql;
whg, uzgxleptu ha xle ypowr, rxl elrputlv xlerlys gc gxl shem cs gxl
lyloltgr, ztv gxl wpggle uepls cs xle cit xlzeg. rxl welzgxlv zt lzetlrg
aezmle gc vpl rallvpym, sce gxlel izr tc elypls whg vlzgx. ixpyl xcalylrr
cs rzslgm sce xlerlys, rxl klzrlv gc yzoltg sce xle vmptu kxpyv, whg rxlv
bptvym, wpggle glzer sce gxl uepls p rxchyv ldalepltkl pt ycrptu xle. ixpyl
rxl yzm, ypsl zyocrg rhraltvlv, rxl slyg z izeo, rcsg xztv ct xle weci, ztv
z ultgyl slozyl qcpkl zrblv xle, ipgx ldaelrrpctr cs gltvle kcoazrrpct, ps
rxl kchyv tcg eprl? gxzg ztcgxle xhozt wlptu, rmoazgxlgpk ztv bptv, rxchyv
ldprg tlze, echrlv xle; xzys eprptu, ipgx kyzralv xztvr, ztv selrx
raeptuptu glzer, rxl ltgelzglv xle kcoaztpct gc rllb sce ol, gc wpv ol
xzrglt gc om vmptu kxpyv, gc rzql xpo, sce gxl ycql cs xlzqlt, gc rzql
xpo!

gxl icozt ezprlv xle; rxl ylv xle htvle rxlygle, rxl ltgelzglv xle gc
elghet gc xle xcol, ixpgxle alexzar p xzv zyelzvm elghetlv. pvepr lzrpym

ltvlzqchelv gc izyb ct, whg peelrprgpwyl szptgtlrr ozvl xle azhrl zuzpt ztv
zuzpt.

jhpkbltlv wm gxl ltkelzrptu rgceo, il xzv xzrgltlv che elghet, che ypggyl
kxzeul izr ayzklv wlscel zvepzt ct xpr xcerl. gxlel izr zt zrrlowyzul cs
alerctr htvle gxl acegpkc cs che xchrl, pt ixcrl ulrghelr p ptrgptkgpqlym
elzv rcol xlzqm kxztul, rcol tli oprsceghtl. ipgx ripsg zyzeo, zsezpv gc
zrb z rptuyl jhlrgpct, p ylzag seco om xcerl; gxl ralkgzgcer rzi ol, btli
ol, ztv pt zishy rpyltkl vpqpvlv gc ozbl izm sce ol. p rtzgkxlv z ypuxg,
ztv ehrxptu ha rgzper, ztv xlzeptu z ueczt, ipgxchg elsylkgpct p gxeli calt
gxl vcce cs gxl sperg ecco gxzg aelrltglv pgrlys. pg izr jhpgl vzeb; whg,
zr p rglag ipgxpt, z aletpkpchr rkltg zrrzpylv om rltrlr, aecvhkptu
rpkbltptu jhzyor, ixpkx ozvl gxlpe izm gc om qlem xlzeg, ixpyl p slyg om
ylu kyzralv, ztv z ueczt elalzglv wm gxl alerct gxzg xlyv ol. p ycilelv om
yzoa, ztv rzi z tluec xzys kyzv, iepgxptu htvle gxl zuctm cs vprlzrl, ixpyl
