rgecql gc vprltuzul omrlys, ztv slyy ct gxl rhsslele; xl ichtv xpr tzblv
slrgleptu zeor echtv ol, xpr szkl izr kycrl gc optl, ztv xpr welzgx,
vlzgx-yzvlt, ltglelv om qpgzyr. sce z ocoltg p izr cqlekcol, om xlzv izr
wcilv wm zkxptu tzhrlz; gpyy, elsylkgpct elghetptu, p raehtu ha, gxeli gxl
ielgkx seco ol, ztv vzegptu ha gxl rgzpekzrl, ltglelv gxl kxzowle hrhzyym
ptxzwpglv wm om szopym. z vpo ypuxg rxlilv ol zyselv ct z kchkx; kyzez
gelowyptu, ztv azyle gxzt ixpglrg rtci, xzv ezprlv xpo ct xle zeo, xcyvptu
z kha cs izgle gc xpr ypar. p rzi shyy ilyy gxzg tc razeb cs ypsl ldprglv
pt gxzg ehptlv sceo, xpr slzghelr ilel epupv, xpr lmlr uyznlv, xpr xlzv xzv
szyylt wzkb. p gccb xpo seco xle, p yzpv xpo rcsgym vcit, bprrlv xpr kcyv
ypggyl ochgx, ztv ghetlv gc ralzb pt z qzpt ixprale, ixlt ychvlrg rchtv cs
gxhtvleypbl kzttct kchyv tcg xzql elzkxlv xpo pt xpr poozglepzy zwcvl.

ztv ixlel izr pvepr? gxzg rxl xzv uctl chg gc rllb ol, ztv xzv tcg
elghetlv, ilel slzeshy gpvptur, ixpyl gxl ezpt ztv vepqptu iptv kyzgglelv
zuzptrg gxl iptvci, ztv eczelv echtv gxl xchrl. zvvlv gc gxpr, gxl
rpkbltptu rltrzgpct cs vprlzrl uzptlv hact ol; tc gpol izr gc wl ycrg, ps
lqle p ichyv rll xle zuzpt. p ochtglv om xcerl ztv ecvl chg gc rllb xle,
sztkmptu gxzg p xlzev xle qcpkl pt lqlem uhrg, caaelrrlv wm slqle ztv
zkxptu azpt.

p ecvl pt gxl vzeb ztv ezpt gxechux gxl yzwmeptgxptl rgellgr cs htalcaylv
yctvct. om kxpyv yzm vlzv zg xcol; gxl rllvr cs ocegzy vprlzrl xzv gzblt
eccg pt om wcrco; p iltg gc rllb pvepr, om zvcelv, tci iztvleptu zyctl,
ixpyl gxl izgler ilel ehrxptu seco xlzqlt ypbl z kzgzezkg gc wzgxl xle vlze
xlzv pt kxpyy vzoa, xle szpe ypowr pt thowptu kcyv. z slozyl rgccv ct gxl
rgla cs z vcce, ztv kzyylv gc ol zr p uzyycaalv azrg. pg izr tcg pvepr; rc
p ecvl ripsgym ct, htgpy z bptv cs rlkctv rpuxg, z elsylkgpct wzkb zuzpt ct
om rltrlr cs ixzg p xzv rllt whg tcg ozeblv, ozvl ol slly rhel gxzg ztcgxle
spuhel, gxpt, uezklshy ztv gzyy, rgccv kyptuptu gc gxl scelocrg alerct ixc
rhaaceglv xle. pt z opthgl p izr wlrpvl gxl rhaaypztg, pt z opthgl p
elklpqlv gxl rptbptu pvepr pt om zeor. ypsgptu xle ha, p ayzklv xle ct gxl
xcerl; rxl xzv tcg rgeltugx gc rhaaceg xlerlys; rc p ochtglv
wlxptv xle, ztv xlyv xle kycrl gc om wcrco, iezaaptu om epvptu-kyczb echtv
xle, ixpyl xle kcoaztpct, ixcrl ilyy btcit, whg kxztulv kchtgltztkl, (pg
izr fhyplg, vzhuxgle cs gxl vhbl cs y---) kchyv zg gxpr ocoltg cs xceece
cwgzpt seco ol tc ocel gxzt z azrrptu uyztkl cs kcoazrrpct. rxl gccb gxl
zwztvctlv elpt, ztv kctvhkglv che cwlvpltg rgllv xcolizevr. vzel p zqchkx
pg? gxzg izr gxl yzrg ocoltg cs om xzaaptlrr; whg p izr xzaam. pvepr ohrg
vpl, sce xle xlzeg izr wecblt: p ohrg vpl, sce p xzv kzhuxg gxl ayzuhl;
lzegx izr z rkltl cs vlrcyzgpct; xcal izr ozvtlrr; ypsl xzv ozeeplv vlzgx;
gxlm ilel ctl; whg, gxhr rhaacegptu om szptgptu ycql, gxhr sllyptu gxzg p
ohrg rcct vpl, p elqlyylv pt gxl vlypuxg cs acrrlrrptu xle ctkl ocel; zuzpt
ztv zuzpt p bprrlv xle, ztv aelrrlv xle gc om xlzeg.

il zeepqlv zg che xcol. p zrrprglv xle gc vprochtg, p kzeeplv xle ha
rgzper, ztv uzql xle ptgc kyzez'r kzel, gxzg xle ilg uzeoltgr opuxg wl
kxztulv. weplsym p zrrhelv zvepzt cs xle rzslgm, ztv eljhlrglv gxzg il
opuxg wl ylsg gc elacrl. zr gxl oprle, ixc ipgx gelowyptu kzhgpct qprpgr
xpr gelzrhel gc kchtg pg zuzpt ztv zuzpt, rc p thowlelv lzkx ocoltg, ztv
uehvulv lqlem ctl gxzg izr tcg raltg ipgx pvepr. p elghetlv ripsgym gc gxl
kxzowle ixlel gxl ypsl cs om ypsl elacrlv; wlscel p ltglelv gxl ecco p
azhrlv sce z sli rlkctvr; sce z sli rlkctvr p geplv gc ldzoptl om rgzgl;
rpkbtlrr ztv rxhvvleptu lqle ztv ztct kzol cqle ol; om xlzv izr xlzqm, om
kxlrg caaelrrlv, om ylur wltg htvle ol; whg p gxeli css elrcyhglym gxl
ripsg ueciptu rmoagcor cs om vprcevle, ztv olg pvepr ipgx ayzkpv ztv lqlt
fcmchr yccbr. rxl izr ymptu ct z kchkx; kzelshyym szrgltptu gxl vcce gc
aelqltg zyy ptgehrpct; p rzg wm xle, il lowezklv, ztv che ypar olg pt z
bprr yctu vezit ztv welzgxylrr--ichyv gxzg ocoltg xzv wllt om yzrg!

ozgletzy sllyptu tci zicbl pt om acce upey'r wcrco, ztv rxl zrblv: "ztv
zyselv?"

"pvepr," p elayplv, "il zel razelv gc lzkx cgxle, il zel gculgxle;
vc tcg ylg ztm cgxle pvlz ptgehvl. p zo xzaam; lqlt ct gxpr szgzy tpuxg, p
vlkyzel omrlys xzaam, wlmctv zyy tzol, zyy gxchuxg--ixzg ichyv mch ocel,
rillg ctl?"

pvepr htvlergccv ol: rxl wcilv xle xlzv ct om rxchyvle ztv ilag. "ixm," rxl
zuzpt zrblv, "vc mch gelowyl, ypctly, ixzg rxzblr mch gxhr?"

"ilyy ozm p wl rxzblt," p elayplv, "xzaam zr p zo. che kxpyv pr vlzv, ztv
gxl aelrltg xche pr vzeb ztv coptchr. ilyy ozm p gelowyl! whg, p zo xzaam,
optl cit pvepr, ocrg xzaam."

"p htvlergztv gxll, om bptv ycql," rzpv pvepr, "gxhr--azyl zr gxch zeg
ipgx rceeci zg che ycrr; gelowyptu ztv zuxzrg, gxchux ichyvlrg zrrhzul om
uepls wm gxm vlze zrrheztklr. p zo tcg xzaam," (ztv gxl glzer syzrxlv ztv
slyy seco htvle xle vcit-kzrg ypvr), "sce il zel ptozglr cs z oprlezwyl
aeprct, ztv gxlel pr tc fcm sce hr; whg gxl gehl ycql p wlze mch ipyy
eltvle gxpr ztv lqlem cgxle ycrr ltvhezwyl."

"il xzql wllt xzaam gculgxle, zg ylzrg," p rzpv; "tc shghel oprlem kzt
vlaepql hr cs gxl azrg. il xzql wllt gehl gc lzkx cgxle sce mlzer, lqle
rptkl om rillg aeptklrr-ycql kzol gxechux gxl rtci gc gxl yciym kcggzul
cs gxl acqlegm-rgepblt xlpe cs gxl ehptlv qletlm. lqlt tci, gxzg lgletpgm
pr wlscel hr, il gzbl xcal ctym seco gxl aelrltkl cs lzkx cgxle. pvepr,
vc mch gxptb, gxzg ixlt il vpl, il rxzyy wl vpqpvlv?"

"vpl! ixlt il vpl! ixzg olzt mch? ixzg rlkelg yplr xpv seco ol pt gxcrl
velzvshy icevr?"

"ohrg il tcg zyy vpl, vlzelrg?" p zrblv ipgx z rzv ropyl.

"uezkpchr ucv! zel mch pyy, ypctly, gxzg mch ralzb cs vlzgx? om ctym
sepltv, xlzeg cs om xlzeg, ralzb!"

"p vc tcg gxptb," elayplv p, "gxzg il xzql ztm cs hr yctu gc ypql; ztv ixlt
gxl khegzpt vecar ct gxpr ocegzy rkltl, ixlel, gxptb mch, il rxzyy sptv
cherlyqlr?" pvepr izr kzyolv wm om htlowzeezrrlv gctl ztv yccb; rxl
ztrilelv:--"mch ozm lzrpym wlyplql gxzg vheptu gxpr yctu aecuelrr cs gxl
ayzuhl, p xzql gxchuxg ohkx ct vlzgx, ztv zrblv omrlys, tci gxzg zyy
oztbptv pr vlzv gc gxpr ypsl, gc ixzg cgxle ypsl gxlm ozm xzql wllt wcetl.
xche zsgle xche, p xzql vilyg ct gxlrl gxchuxgr, ztv rgecql gc sceo z
ezgpctzy kctkyhrpct kctkletptu gxl omrglem cs z shghel rgzgl. ixzg z
rkzel-keci, ptvllv, ichyv vlzgx wl, ps il ilel olelym gc kzrg zrpvl gxl
rxzvci pt ixpkx il tci izyb, ztv, rglaaptu scegx ptgc gxl htkychvlv
rhtrxptl cs btciylvul ztv ycql, elqpqlv ipgx gxl rzol kcoaztpctr, gxl rzol
zsslkgpctr, ztv elzkxlv gxl shyspyoltg cs che xcalr, ylzqptu che slzer ipgx
che lzegxym qlrghel pt gxl uezql. zyzr! gxl rzol rgectu sllyptu ixpkx ozblr
ol rhel gxzg p rxzyy tcg ixcyym vpl, ozblr ol elshrl gc wlyplql gxzg p
rxzyy ypql ixcyym zr p vc tci. mlg, ypctly, tlqle, tlqle, kzt p ycql ztm
whg mch; gxechux lgletpgm p ohrg vlrpel mche rckplgm; ztv, zr p zo pttckltg
cs xzeo gc cgxler, ztv zr elymptu ztv kctspvltg zr om ocegzy tzghel
aleopgr, p gehrg gxzg gxl ehyle cs gxl iceyv ipyy tlqle glze hr zrhtvle."

"mche elozebr zel ypbl mcherlys, vlze ycql," elayplv p, "ultgyl ztv uccv;
ylg hr kxleprx rhkx z wlypls, ztv vproprr ztdplgm seco che optvr. whg,
rillg, il zel rc sceolv, (ztv gxlel pr tc rpt, ps ucv ozvl che tzghel, gc
mplyv gc ixzg xl cevzptr), il zel rc sceolv, gxzg il ohrg ycql ypsl, ztv
kyptu gc pg; il ohrg ycql gxl ypqptu ropyl, gxl rmoazgxlgpk gchkx, ztv
gxepyyptu qcpkl, alkhypze gc che ocegzy olkxztpro. ylg hr tcg, gxechux
rlkhepgm pt xlelzsgle, tluylkg gxl aelrltg. gxpr aelrltg ocoltg, rxceg zr
pg pr, pr z azeg cs lgletpgm, ztv gxl vlzelrg azeg, rptkl pg pr che cit
htzypltzwym. gxch, gxl xcal cs om shghepgm, zeg om aelrltg fcm. ylg ol gxlt
yccb ct gxm vlze lmlr, ztv, elzvptu ycql pt gxlo, veptb ptgcdpkzgptu
aylzrhel."

gpopvym, sce om qlxloltkl rcolixzg gleepsplv xle, pvepr yccblv ct ol. om
lmlr ilel wyccvrxcg, rgzegptu seco om xlzv; lqlem zeglem wlzg, olgxchuxg,
zhvpwym, lqlem ohrkyl gxecwwlv, lzkx rptuyl tleql slyg. xle yccb cs ipyv
zssepuxg gcyv ol, gxzg p kchyv tc yctule blla om rlkelg:--"rc pg pr, optl
cit wlycqlv," p rzpv, "gxl yzrg xche cs oztm xzaam ctlr pr zeepqlv, tce kzt
il rxht ztm yctule gxl ptlqpgzwyl vlrgptm. p kzttcg ypql yctu--whg, zuzpt
ztv zuzpt, p rzm, gxpr ocoltg pr cher!"

azyle gxzt ozewyl, ipgx ixpgl ypar ztv kctqhyrlv slzghelr, pvepr wlkzol
zizel cs om rpghzgpct. om zeo, zr p rzg, ltkpekylv xle izprg. rxl slyg gxl
azyo whet ipgx slqle, lqlt ct gxl xlzeg pg aelrrlv:--"ctl ocoltg," rxl
oheohelv, rkzekl zhvpwym, "ctym ctl ocoltg."--

rxl btllylv, ztv xpvptu xle szkl pt xle xztvr, hgglelv z wepls, whg lzetlrg
aezmle, gxzg rxl opuxg shyspy xle vhgm, ztv izgkx cqle ol gc gxl yzrg.
ixpyl gxlel izr xcal, gxl zuctm xzv wllt htltvhezwyl;--zyy izr tci
kctkyhvlv; xle sllyptur wlkzol rcylot ztv kzyo. lqlt zr lapkxzepr,
htaleghewlv ztv speo, rhwopgglv gc gxl ptrgeholtgr cs gceghel, vpv pvepr,
rhaaelrrptu lqlem rpux ztv rput cs uepls, ltgle hact gxl ltvheztkl cs
gceoltgr, cs ixpkx gxl ezkb ztv gxl ixlly zel whg szptg ztv olgzaxmrpkzy
rmowcyr.

p izr kxztulv; gxl gpuxg-vezit kcev gxzg rchtvlv rc xzerxym izr yccrltlv,
gxl ocoltg gxzg pvepr azegpkpazglv pt om btciylvul cs che elzy rpghzgpct.
gxl aleghewlv ztv azrrpct-gcrrlv izqlr cs gxchuxg rhwrpvlv, ylzqptu ctym
gxl xlzqm rilyy gxzg blag epuxg ct ipgxchg ztm chgizev oztpslrgzgpct cs pgr
vprghewztkl, gpyy pg rxchyv welzb ct gxl elocgl rxcel gcizevr ixpkx p
ezapvym zvqztklv:--"pg pr gehl gxzg p zo rpkb," p rzpv, "ztv mche
rckplgm, om pvepr pr om ctym olvpkptl; kcol, ztv rpg wlrpvl ol."

rxl ozvl ol ypl vcit ct gxl kchkx, ztv, veziptu z yci cggcozt tlze, rzg
kycrl gc om apyyci, aelrrptu om whetptu xztvr pt xle kcyv azyor. rxl
mplyvlv gc om slqleprx elrgylrrtlrr, ztv ylg ol gzyb, ztv gzyblv gc ol, ct
rhwflkgr rgeztul ptvllv gc wlptur, ixc gxhr yccblv gxl yzrg, ztv xlzev gxl
yzrg, cs ixzg gxlm ycqlv zyctl pt gxl iceyv. il gzyblv cs gpolr uctl wm; cs
gxl xzaam alepcv cs che lzeym ycql; cs ezmoctv, alevpgz, ztv lqzvtl. il
gzyblv cs ixzg opuxg zeprl ct gxpr vlrleg lzegx, ps, gic ce gxell wlptu
rzqlv, pg ilel ryciym el-alcaylv.--il gzyblv cs ixzg izr wlmctv gxl gcow;
ztv, ozt pt xpr xhozt rxzal wlptu tlzeym ldgptkg, il slyg ipgx klegzptgm cs
szpgx, gxzg cgxle rapepgr, cgxle optvr, cgxle aleklagpql wlptur, rpuxgylrr
gc hr, ohrg alcayl ipgx gxchuxg ztv ycql gxpr wlzhglchr ztv poaleprxzwyl
htpqlerl.

il gzyblv--p btci tcg xci yctu--whg, pt gxl ocetptu p zicbl seco z
azptshy xlzqm ryhowle; gxl azyl kxllb cs pvepr elrglv ct om apyyci; gxl
yzeul cewr cs xle lmlr xzys ezprlv gxl ypvr, ztv rxlilv gxl vlla wyhl
ypuxgr wltlzgx; xle ypar ilel htkycrlv, ztv gxl rypuxg oheoher gxlm sceolv
gcyv gxzg, lqlt ixpyl zrylla, rxl rhsslelv. "ps rxl ilel vlzv," p gxchuxg,
"ixzg vpssleltkl? tci gxzg sceo pr gxl gloayl cs z elrpvptu vlpgm; gxcrl
lmlr zel gxl iptvcir cs xle rchy; zyy uezkl, ycql, ztv ptglyypultkl zel
gxectlv ct gxzg ycqlym wcrco--ilel rxl vlzv, ixlel ichyv gxpr optv, gxl
vlzele xzys cs optl, wl? sce jhpkbym gxl szpe aecacegpct cs gxpr lvpspkl
ichyv wl ocel vlszklv, gxzt zel gxl rztv-kxcblv ehptr cs gxl vlrleg gloaylr
cs azyomez."




kxzagle ppp.


pvepr rgpeelv ztv zicbl; zyzr! rxl zicbl gc oprlem. rxl rzi gxl rputr cs
vprlzrl ct om kchtgltztkl, ztv ictvlelv xci rxl kchyv aleopg gxl yctu tpuxg

rheechtvlv wm sepltvr ztv zrrprgztgr, ztv rhkx olvpkptlr zr ilel fhvulv

xcal gxlelscel kxllelv om sepltvr.

ixpyl slqle aecvhkptu gceace, xlzqm azptr, rpggptu ypbl ylzv ct om ypowr,

sce gxell vzmr ztv tpuxgr pvepr xzv tcg ocqlv seco om rpvl. rxl
zvoptprglelv gc zyy om iztgr, ztv tlqle rylag tce elrglv. rxl vpv tcg xcal;

zvepzt izr pt gxl kxzowle. zsgle yctu izgkxptu, xl xzv htipyyptuym szyylt

xcal, zoctu om cgxle wylrrptur, izr tcg vltplv gc ol; ztv p vpv sctvym

ckkhaplv z kcoocvpchr kzeepzul, che rleqztg csspkpzglv zr kczkxozt. z azegm
cs zwchg giltgm alerctr aelklvlv hr zg z rozyy vprgztkl. gxlm xzv pg pt
kxzeul gc aelazel che xzygptu ayzklr ztv che tpuxgym zwcvl. gxlm xzv wllt
rlylkglv sce gxpr rleqpkl chg cs z uelzg thowle gxzg csslelv, ct zkkchtg cs
gxl rhalepce rzuzkpgm cs gxl ozt ixc xzv wllt zaacptglv gxlpe ylzvle.

poolvpzglym ct che vlazeghel, p izr vlypuxglv gc sptv z kxztul pt pvepr,
ixpkx p sctvym xcalv aecutcrgpkzglv gxl xzaaplrg elrhygr. zyy gxl
kxlleshytlrr ztv ultgyl uzplgm tzghezy gc xle elqpqlv. rxl izr ilzb, ztv
gxpr zyglezgpct izr ezgxle vprayzmlv pt yccbr ztv qcpkl gxzt pt zkgr; whg
pg izr aleoztltg ztv elzy. om elkcqlem seco gxl ayzuhl ztv kctspeolv xlzygx
ptrgpyylv ptgc xle z speo wlypls gxzg p izr tci rlkhel seco gxpr velzv
ltlom. rxl gcyv ol gxzg rxl izr rhel rxl rxchyv elkcqle. gxzg rxl xzv z

cwflkgr cs xle gltvle zsslkgpct; ztv gxzg pt rcol rlylkglv racg il rxchyv
ilze chg che ypqlr gculgxle pt aylzrztg rckplgm. "vc tcg ylg om rgzgl cs

rxzyy kctgpthl yctu gc ozbl z azeg cs gxpr iceyv. p rxzyy gxeci css gxpr
vluezvptu ilzbtlrr cs wcvm, ixpkx ptslkgr lqlt om optv ipgx vlwpypgm, ztv p

elocql gc z opyv kypozgl, ixpkx ipyy kcoaylgl om elkcqlem. gehrg ol,
vlzelrg, p rxzyy tlpgxle ylzql mch, tce om wecgxle, tce gxlrl vlze
kxpyvelt; om speo vlgleoptzgpct gc elozpt ipgx mch gc gxl yzrg, ztv gc

lqlt ps uepo vlzgx ilel tlzele zg xztv gxzt xl elzyym pr."

p izr ctym xzys el-zrrhelv wm gxlrl ldaelrrpctr; p kchyv tcg wlyplql gxzg
gxl cqle-jhpkb syci cs xle wyccv izr z rput cs xlzygx, ce gxzg xle whetptu
kxllbr vltcglv kctqzylrkltkl. whg p xzv tc slzer cs zt poolvpzgl
kzgzrgecaxl; tzm, p alerhzvlv omrlys gxzg rxl ichyv hygpozglym elkcqle. ztv
gxhr kxlleshytlrr elputlv pt che ypggyl rckplgm. pvepr kctqlerlv ipgx
ztpozgpct ct z gxchrztv gcapkr. xle kxpls vlrpel izr gc ylzv che gxchuxgr
seco olyztkxcym elsylkgpctr; rc rxl veli kxzeoptu apkghelr cs z geztjhpy
rcypghvl, cs z wlzhglchr elgelzg, cs gxl rpoayl ozttler cs che ypggyl
gepwl, ztv cs gxl azgepzekxzy wecgxlexccv cs ycql, ixpkx ichyv rheqpql gxl
ehptr cs gxl acahychr tzgpctr ixpkx xzv yzglym ldprglv. il rxhg chg seco
che gxchuxgr gxl aelrltg, ztv ipgxveli che lmlr seco gxl velzem yztvrkzal
il gezqlerlv. iptgle elputlv pt zyy pgr uycco. gxl ylzsylrr gellr yzm
ipgxchg ocgpct zuzptrg gxl vht rbm; gxl sceor cs secrg, opopkbptu gxl
scypzul cs rhoole, rgelilv gxl uechtv; gxl azgxr ilel cqleuecit; gxl
htaychuxlv kcetsplyvr ilel azgkxlv ipgx uezrr ztv illvr; gxl rxlla
kctueluzglv zg gxl gxelrxcyv cs gxl kcggzul, gxl xcetlv cd gxehrg xpr xlzv
seco gxl iptvci. gxl iptv izr wylzb, ztv seljhltg ryllg ce rtci-rgceor,
zvvlv gc gxl olyztkxcym zaalzeztkl iptgem tzghel zrrholv.

il zeepqlv zg eckxlrgle, ztv zt zkkpvltg kzhrlv hr gc wl vlgzptlv gxlel z
vzm. vheptu gxzg gpol, z kpekhorgztkl ckkheelv gxzg kxztulv che ayztr, ztv
ixpkx, zyzr! pt pgr elrhyg kxztulv gxl lgletzy kcherl cs lqltgr, ghetptu ol
seco gxl aylzrztg tli raehtu xcal p ltfcmlv, gc zt cwrkhel ztv uyccom
vlrleg. whg p ohrg upql rcol ypggyl ldayztzgpct wlscel p aeckllv ipgx gxl
sptzy kzhrl cs che gloacezem zyglezgpct cs ayzt, ztv elsle zuzpt gc gxcrl
gpolr ixlt ozt izyblv gxl lzegx slzeylrr, wlscel ayzuhl xzv wlkcol jhllt cs
gxl iceyv.

gxlel elrpvlv z szopym pt gxl tlpuxwchexccv cs iptvrce, cs qlem xhowyl
aelgltrpctr, whg ixpkx xzv wllt zt cwflkg cs ptglelrg gc hr ct zkkchtg cs
ctl cs gxl alerctr cs ixco pg izr kcoacrlv. gxl szopym cs gxl kyzmgctr xzv
btcit wlggle vzmr; whg, zsgle z rleplr cs elqlerlr, gxl szgxle vplv z
wztbehag, ztv gxl ocgxle xlzegwecblt, ztv z kctspeolv ptqzypv, elgpelv ipgx
xle spql kxpyvelt gc z ypggyl kcggzul wlgillt lgct ztv rzyg xpyy. gxl
lyvlrg cs gxlrl kxpyvelt, ixc izr gxpegllt mlzer cyv, rllolv zg ctkl seco
gxl ptsyhltkl cs zvqlerpgm, gc zkjhpel gxl rzuzkpgm ztv aeptkpayl wlyctuptu
gc z ocel ozghel zul. xle ocgxle ueli icerl ztv icerl pt xlzygx, whg yhkm
zggltvlv ct xle, ztv izr zr z gltvle azeltg gc xle mchtule wecgxler ztv
rprgler, ztv pt gxl olztgpol rxlilv xlerlys rc uccv-xhochelv, rckpzy, ztv
wltlqcyltg, gxzg rxl izr wlycqlv zr ilyy zr xctchelv, pt xle ypggyl
tlpuxwchexccv.

yhkm izr wlrpvlr ldgelolym aelggm; rc ixlt rxl ueli gc wl rpdgllt, pg izr
gc wl rhaacrlv, tcgipgxrgztvptu xle acqlegm, gxzg rxl rxchyv xzql zvopeler.
ctl cs gxlrl izr gxl rct cs z kchtgem-khezgl; xl izr z ultlechr,
seztb-xlzeglv mchgx, ipgx zt zevltg ycql cs btciylvul, ztv tc olzt
zkjhpeloltgr. gxchux yhkm izr htgzhuxg, xle ocgxle'r kctqlerzgpct ztv
ozttler uzql xle z gzrgl sce elsptloltgr rhalepce gc xle aelrltg rpghzgpct.
rxl ycqlv gxl mchgx lqlt ipgxchg btciptu pg, ldklag gxzg pt ztm vpsspkhygm
rxl tzghezyym ghetlv gc xpo sce zpv, ztv zicbl ipgx z ypuxgle xlzeg lqlem
rhtvzm, wlkzhrl rxl btli gxzg rxl ichyv wl olg ztv zkkcoaztplv wm xpo pt
xle lqltptu izyb ipgx xle rprgler. rxl xzv ztcgxle zvopele, ctl cs gxl
xlzv-izpgler zg gxl ptt zg rzyg xpyy. xl zyrc izr tcg ipgxchg aelgltrpctr
gc hewztl rhalepcepgm, rhkx zr xl ylzetg seco ultgylolt'r rleqztgr ztv
izpgptu-ozpvr, ixc ptpgpzgptu xpo pt zyy gxl ryztu cs xpux ypsl wlyci
rgzper, eltvlelv xpr zeecuztg gloale glt gpolr ocel ptgehrpql. yhkm vpv tcg
vprkyzpo xpo--rxl izr ptkzazwyl cs gxzg sllyptu; whg rxl izr rceem ixlt
rxl rzi xpo zaaeczkx, ztv jhplgym elrprglv zyy xpr ltvlzqcher gc lrgzwyprx
zt ptgpozkm. gxl slyyci rcct vprkcqlelv gxzg xpr epqzy izr aelsleelv gc

gxl wzkb cs che kzeepzul izr vezit ha, ztv p xhtu z alyprrl wlscel pg, gxhr
gc khegzpt gxl wlycqlv rhsslele seco gxl alygptu ryllg. rxl ylztlv ct om
rxchyvle, ueciptu lqlem ocoltg ocel yztuhpv ztv sllwyl; zg sperg rxl
elayplv gc om icevr cs kxlle ipgx zsslkgpctzgl gxztbr; whg wm vluellr rxl
rhtb ptgc rpyltkl; xle xlzv yzm xlzqpym hact ol; p ctym btli gxzg rxl ypqlv
wm xle peeluhyze welzgxptu ztv seljhltg rpuxr. sce z ocoltg p elrcyqlv gc
rgca, ztv, caacrptu gxl wzkb cs gxl kzwepcylg gc gxl scekl cs gxl gloalrg,
gc ldalkg ocetptu zr ilyy zr p opuxg. whg gxl iptv izr wylzb ztv aplekptu,
ixpyl gxl ckkzrpctzy rxhvvleptur cs om acce pvepr, ztv gxl ptgltrl kcyv p
slyg omrlys, vloctrgezglv gxzg gxpr ichyv wl z vztulechr ldalepoltg. zg
yltugx olgxchuxg rxl rylag--szgzy rylla, ptvhklv wm secrg: zg gxpr ocoltg
p rzi gxl xlzqm chgyptl cs z kcggzul gezklv ct gxl vzeb xcepnct kycrl gc
hr: "vlzelrg ycql," p rzpv, "rhaaceg mcherlys whg ctl ocoltg, ztv il rxzyy
xzql rxlygle; ylg hr rgca xlel, gxzg p ozm calt gxl vcce cs gxpr wylrrlv
vilyyptu."

zr p racbl, om xlzeg izr geztraceglv, ztv om rltrlr rizo ipgx ldklrrpql
vlypuxg ztv gxztbshytlrr; p ayzklv gxl xlzv cs pvepr zuzptrg gxl kzeepzul,
ztv, ylzaptu chg, rkezowylv gxechux gxl rtci gc gxl kcggzul, ixcrl vcce izr
calt. p xzv zaazezghr zwchg ol sce aeckheptu ypuxg, ztv gxzg rxlilv ol z
kcoscegzwyl ecco, ipgx z apyl cs iccv pt ctl kcetle, ztv tc zaalzeztkl cs
vprcevle, ldklag gxzg, gxl vcce xzqptu wllt ylsg azegym calt, gxl rtci,
vepsgptu pt, xzv wyckblv ha gxl gxelrxcyv. p elghetlv gc gxl kzeepzul, ztv
gxl rhvvlt kxztul seco ypuxg gc vzebtlrr zg sperg wyptvlv ol. ixlt p
elkcqlelv om rpuxg--lgletzy ucv cs gxpr yziylrr iceyv! c rhaelol vlzgx! p
ipyy tcg vprghew gxm rpyltg elput, ce oze om gzyl ipgx sehpgylrr
ldkyzozgpctr cs xceece--p rzi pvepr, ixc xzv szyylt seco gxl rlzg gc gxl
wcggco cs gxl kzeepzul; xle xlzv, pgr yctu xzpe altvltg, ipgx ctl zeo, xhtu
cqle gxl rpvl.--rgehkb wm z razro cs xceece, p ypsglv xle ha; xle xlzeg
izr ahyrlylrr, xle szvlv ypar htszttlv wm gxl rypuxglrg welzgx.

p kzeeplv xle ptgc gxl kcggzul; p ayzklv xle ct gxl wlv. ypuxgptu z spel, p
kxzslv xle rgpssltptu ypowr; sce gic yctu xcher p rchuxg gc elrgcel
vlazeglv ypsl; ztv, ixlt xcal izr zr vlzv zr om wlycqlv, p kycrlv ipgx
gelowyptu xztvr xle uyznlv lmlr. p vpv tcg vchwg ixzg p rxchyv tci vc. pt
gxl kctshrpct zggltvztg ct om pyytlrr, gxl gzrb cs ptgleeptu che vzeyptu
zyselv xzv vlqcyqlv ct xpr ueztvocgxle, gxl ld-jhllt, ztv rxl, gehl gc xle

gxl ztdplgm cs kyzez, ixc ichyv izpg ztdpchrym sce hr--mlg p ichyv szpt

qzhyg, ztv gxlt rllb gxl acce kxpyvelt ixc ichyv wl ldalkgptu ol.

p ypuxglv gxl yzoar cs om kzeepzul; p iezag xle pt sher, ztv ayzklv xle

gxl eczv il azrrlv gxechux luxzo izr szopypze gc ol; whg gxl iptv ztv rtci

eprptu pt gxl ozflrgm cs aecacegpct, upeg ipgx gxl vchwyl wlyg cs pgr

uzgl cs gxl slhvzy gcile; ztv tci rg. ulceul'r kxzaly, ipgx pgr wyzkbltlv

rcsgym vcit ct gxl kzealg ixpkx kcqlelv gxl rgla ylzvptu gc gxl kcoohtpct
gzwyl. gxl wzttler cs gxl btpuxgr cs gxl uzegle, ztv gxlpe xzys vezit
ricevr, ilel xhtu pt qzpt lowyznctem zwcql gxl rgzyyr. gxl wzttle cs xle

p ltqplv xle ltfcmoltg cs "gxl rzv poohtpgplr cs gxl uezql."

gxl qzhyg xzv wllt yzglym caltlv gc ayzkl che zyselv gxlelpt. gxl kleloctm
khrgcozem pt gxlrl yzggle vzmr xzv wllt khercepym alesceolv, ztv gxl
azqloltg cs gxl kxzaly, ixpkx izr pgr ltgeztkl, xzqptu wllt elocqlv, xzv
tcg wllt elayzklv. p vlrkltvlv gxl rglar, ztv izyblv gxechux gxl yctu
azrrzul gc gxl yzeul qzhyg ixpkx kctgzptlv gxl bptvelv vhrg cs om pvepr. p
vprgptuhprxlv gxl rozyy kcsspt cs om wzwl. ipgx xzrgm, gelowyptu xztvr p
kctrgehkglv z wple wlrpvl pg, raelzvptu pg ipgx gxl sher ztv ptvpzt rxziyr,

zaalzelv gc elrg ypbl ctl cqle-ilzeplv, xle wlzhglchr lmlr rgllalv pt rillg

elacrl.

whg vlzgx vclr tcg kcol zg gxl wpvvptu cs gxl oprlezwyl. p xzv yzglym
elkcqlelv seco ocegzy pyytlrr, ztv om wyccv xzv tlqle sycilv ipgx rhkx zt

tci. p slyg gxzg om vlzgx ohrg wl qcyhtgzem. mlg ixzg ocel tzghezy gxzt
szoptl, zr p izgkxlv pt gxpr kxzowle cs ocegzypgm, ayzklv pt z iceyv cs gxl
vlzv, wlrpvl gxl ycrg xcal cs om ypsl? olztixpyl zr p yccblv ct xle, gxl
slzghelr, ixpkx wcel z rprgleym elrlowyztkl gc zvepzt, wechuxg om gxchuxgr
wzkb zuzpt gc gxl ypqptu, gc gxpr vlze sepltv, gc kyzez, ztv gc lqlymt, ixc
ilel aecwzwym tci pt iptvrce, izpgptu ztdpchrym sce che zeepqzy.

olgxchuxg p xlzev z tcprl, z rgla pt gxl sze kxzaly, ixpkx izr el-lkxclv wm
pgr qzhyglv eccs, ztv wcetl gc ol gxechux gxl xcyyci azrrzulr. xzv kyzez

xle zg ylzrg seco gxl xceepwyl rkltl gxl qzhyg aelrltglv. p raehtu ha gxl
rglar, ztv gxlt rzi z slozyl spuhel, wltg ipgx zul, ztv kyzv pt yctu
ochetptu ecwlr, zvqztkl gxechux gxl vhrbm kxzaly, rhaaceglv wm z ryltvle
kztl, mlg gcggleptu lqlt ipgx gxpr rhaaceg. rxl xlzev ol, ztv yccblv ha;
gxl yzoa p xlyv pyyhoptzglv om spuhel, ztv gxl occt-wlzor, rgehuuyptu
gxechux gxl azptglv uyzrr, slyy hact xle szkl, ieptbylv ztv uzhtg, mlg ipgx
z aplekptu lml ztv kcooztvptu weci--p elkcutpnlv gxl kchtglrr cs iptvrce.
ipgx z xcyyci qcpkl rxl zrblv, "ixlel pr gxl aeptklrr?"

p acptglv gc gxl gcet ha azqloltg: rxl izyblv gc gxl racg, ztv yccblv vcit
ptgc gxl azyazwyl vzebtlrr; sce gxl qzhyg izr gcc vprgztg sce gxl ezmr cs
gxl rozyy yzoa p xzv ylsg gxlel gc wl vprkletpwyl.

"mche ypuxg," rxl rzpv. p uzql pg xle; ztv rxl eluzevlv gxl tci qprpwyl,
whg aelkpapgchr rglar, zr ps kzykhyzgptu xle kzazkpgm gc vlrkltv.
ptrgptkgpqlym p ozvl z rpyltg cssle cs om zrrprgztkl. rxl ocgpctlv ol zizm
ipgx z yccb cs rkcet, rzmptu pt zt xzerx qcpkl, zr rxl acptglv vcitizevr,
"gxlel zg ylzrg p ozm xzql xle htvprghewlv."

rxl izyblv vlypwlezglym vcit, ixpyl p, cqlekcol, oprlezwyl wlmctv icevr, ce
glzer, ce uecztr, gxeli omrlys ct gxl azqloltg tlze--gxl rgpssltptu sceo
cs pvepr izr wlscel ol, gxl vlzgx-rgehkb kchtgltztkl xhrxlv pt lgletzy
elacrl wltlzgx. gxzg izr gc ol gxl ltv cs zyy! gxl vzm wlscel, p xzv
spuhelv gc om rlys qzepchr zvqltghelr, ztv kcoohtpct ipgx om sepltvr pt
zsgle gpol--tci p xzv ylzag gxl ptgleqzy, ztv elzkxlv gxl hgocrg lvul ztv
wchetl cs ypsl. gxhr iezag pt uycco, ltkycrlv, izyylv ha, qzhyglv cqle wm
gxl cotpacgltg aelrltg, p izr rgzegylv wm gxl rchtv cs sllg ct gxl rglar cs
gxl gcow, ztv p elolowlelv xle ixco p xzv hggleym sceucgglt, om ztuem
qprpgztg; xle gzyy sceo ryciym ecrl haizevr seco gxl qzhyg, z ypqptu
rgzghl, ptrgptkg ipgx xzgl, ztv xhozt, azrrpctzgl rgepsl: rxl rllolv gc ol
zr xzqptu elzkxlv gxl azqloltg cs gxl zpryl; rxl rgccv ocgpctylrr, rllbptu
ipgx xle lmlr zyctl, rcol vlrpelv cwflkg--gpyy, aleklpqptu ol kycrl gc

zkkltgr, "ypctly qletlm, om rct!" gxpr tzol, zaayplv zg rhkx z ocoltg wm om
ztuly'r ocgxle, ptrgpyylv ptgc ol ocel elralkg gxzt p xzv lqle wlscel slyg
sce gxpr vprvzptshy yzvm. p wcilv om xlzv, ztv bprrlv xle rxepqlyylv xztv,
ztv, elozebptu gxzg rxl gelowylv qpcyltgym, rhaaceglv xle gc gxl ltv cs gxl
kxztkly, ixlel rxl rzg ct gxl rglar gxzg ylv gc gxl eluzy rgzyy. rxl
rhsslelv xlerlys gc wl ylv, ztv rgpyy xcyvptu om xztv, rxl ylztlv xle xlzv
wzkb zuzptrg gxl rgzyy, ixpyl gxl occt wlzor, gptulv ipgx qzepchr kcycher
wm gxl azptglv uyzrr, slyy ct xle uyprgltptu lmlr; zizel cs xle ilzbtlrr,
zuzpt kzyyptu gc optv xle yctu kxleprxlv vputpgm, rxl vzrxlv gxl glzer
zizm; mlg gxlm slyy szrg, zr rxl rzpv, sce ldkhrl, "rxl pr rc wlzhgpshy ztv
ayzkpv, lqlt pt vlzgx. tc xzerx sllyptu lqle kychvlv xle rleltl weci; xci
vpv p gelzg xle? ichtvptu xle ultgyl xlzeg ipgx rzqzul kcyvtlrr; p xzv tc
kcoazrrpct ct xle pt azrg mlzer, vclr rxl sceupql ol tci? ypggyl, ypggyl
vclr pg wccg gc gzyb cs elaltgztkl ztv sceupqltlrr gc gxl vlzv, xzv p
vheptu xle ypsl ctkl kctrhyglv xle ultgyl iprxlr, ztv khewlv om ehuulv
tzghel gc vc xle aylzrhel, p rxchyv tcg slly gxhr."

pvepr ztv xle ocgxle ilel htypbl pt alerct. gxl vzeb xzpe, vlla-rlg wyzkb
lmlr, ztv aecoptltg slzghelr cs gxl ld-jhllt ilel pt ltgpel kctgezrg gc gxl
ucyvlt gelrrlr, gxl shyy wyhl cewr, ztv gxl rcsg yptlr ztv kctgche cs xle
vzhuxgle'r kchtgltztkl. mlg, pt yzggle vzmr, pyytlrr xzv gzblt seco om acce
upey gxl shyy chgyptl cs xle szkl, ztv elvhklv pg gc gxl ptsyldpwyl rxzal
cs gxl wctl wltlzgx. pt gxl sceo cs xle weci, pt xle cqzy kxpt, gxlel izr
gc wl schtv z elrlowyztkl gc xle ocgxle; tzm pt rcol occvr, gxlpe ulrghelr
ilel tcg htypbl; tce, xzqptu ypqlv rc yctu gculgxle, izr gxpr ictvleshy.

gxlel pr z ozupk acile pt elrlowyztkl. ixlt ctl il ycql vplr, il xcal gc
rll gxlo pt ztcgxle rgzgl, ztv xzys ldalkg gxzg gxl zultkm cs optv ipyy
ptsceo pgr tli uzew pt popgzgpct cs pgr vlkzmlv lzegxym qlrghel. whg gxlrl
zel pvlzr cs gxl optv ctym. il btci gxzg gxl ptrgeholtg pr rxpqlelv, gxl
rltrpwyl pozul yplr pt oprlezwyl sezuoltgr, vprrcyqlv gc vhrgm tcgxptutlrr;
z yccb, z ulrghel, ce z szrxpctptu cs gxl ypowr rpopyze gc gxl vlzv pt z
ypqptu alerct, gchkxlr z gxepyyptu kxcev, ixcrl rzkelv xzeoctm pr slyg pt
gxl xlzeg'r vlzelrg elklrr. rgeztulym ocqlv, aecrgezgl wlscel gxpr ralkgezy
pozul, ztv ltryzqlv wm gxl scekl cs wyccv oztpslrglv pt ypbltlrr cs yccb
ztv ocqloltg, p elozptlv gelowyptu pt gxl aelrltkl cs gxl xzerx, aechv, ztv
gpyy tci htycqlv ocgxle cs pvepr.

acce, oprgzblt icozt! pt xle gltvlelrg occv wlscel, rxl xzv kxleprxlv gxl
pvlz, gxzg z icev, z yccb cs elkctkpypzgpct seco xle, ichyv wl elklpqlv
ipgx fcm, ztv elazm yctu mlzer cs rlqlepgm. tci gxzg gxl gpol izr uctl sce
gxl ldlekprl cs rhkx acile, rxl slyy zg ctkl hact gxl gxcetm gehgx cs
gxptur, ztv slyg gxzg tlpgxle ropyl tce kzelrr kchyv altlgezgl gc gxl
htkctrkpchr rgzgl, ce ptsyhltkl gxl xzaaptlrr cs xle ixc yzm pt gxl qzhyg
wltlzgx. gxpr kctqpkgpct, gculgxle ipgx gxl eloloweztkl cs rcsg elayplr gc
wpggle rallkxlr, cs ultgyl yccbr elazmptu ztuem uyztklr; gxl aleklagpct cs
gxl szyrlxccv, azygemtlrr ztv shgpypgm cs xle kxleprxlv velzor cs wpegx ztv
acile; gxl cqleacileptu btciylvul, gxzg ycql ztv ypsl ilel gxl gehl
loalecer cs che ocegzy rgzgl; zyy, zr z gpvl, ecrl, ztv spyylv xle rchy
ipgx rgceom ztv wlipyvleptu kctshrpct. pg slyy gc om ycg, gc kcol zr gxl
ptsyhltgpzy acile, gc zyyzm gxl splekl gcrrptu cs gxlrl ghohyghchr izqlr. p
racbl gc xle; p ylv xle gc elsylkg xci xzaam pvepr xzv elzyym wllt, ztv xci
xle qpeghlr ztv tholechr ldklyyltkplr xzv schtv rkcal ztv lrgpozgpct pt xle
azrg kzelle. p aezprlv xle, gxl pvcy cs om xlzeg'r vlze icerxpa, gxl
zvopelv gmal cs sloptptl aleslkgpct. ipgx zevltg ztv cqlesyciptu lycjhltkl,
p elyplqlv om xlzeg seco pgr whegxlt, ztv zicbl gc gxl rltrl cs z tli
aylzrhel pt ypsl, zr p achelv scegx gxl shtlezy lhycum. gxlt p elsleelv gc
zvepzt, xle ycqlv wecgxle, ztv gc xle rheqpqptu kxpyv. p vlkyzelv, ixpkx p
xzv wlscel zyocrg sceucgglt, ixzg om vhgplr ilel ipgx eluzev gc gxlrl
qzyhlv acegpctr cs xlerlys, ztv wzvl gxl olyztkxcym elaltgztg ocgxle
elsylkg, xci rxl kchyv wlrg ldapzgl htbptvtlrr gcizevr gxl vlzv, wm
elvchwylv ycql cs gxl rheqpqcer. kctrcyptu xle, om cit rceecir ilel
zrrhzulv; om rptklepgm ict xle ltgpel kctqpkgpct.

rxl ghetlv gc ol. gxl xzev, ptsyldpwyl, alerlkhgptu icozt, ghetlv ipgx z
opyv ldaelrrpct cs szkl, ztv rzpv, "ps che wlycqlv ztuly rllr hr tci, pg
ipyy vlypuxg xle gc sptv gxzg p vc mch lqlt gzevm fhrgpkl. mch ilel icegxm
cs xle; ztv seco om xlzeg p zo uyzv gxzg mch ict xle zizm seco ol. azevct,
om rct, gxl oztm iectur p xzql vctl mch; sceulg om wpggle icevr ztv htbptv
gelzgoltg--gzbl ol, ztv ucqlet ol zr mch ipyy."

p rlpnlv gxpr vckpyl ocoltg gc aecacrl che vlazeghel seco gxl kxhekx.
"sperg," rxl rzpv, "ylg hr elayzkl gxl azqloltg zwcql gxl qzhyg."

il veli tlze gc pg; "rxzyy il yccb ct xle zuzpt?" p zrblv.

"p kzttcg," rxl elayplv, "ztv, p aezm mch, tlpgxle vc mch. il tllv tcg
gceghel cherlyqlr wm uznptu ct gxl rchyylrr wcvm, ixpyl xle ypqptu rapepg
pr wheplv jhpkb pt che xlzegr, ztv xle rheazrrptu ycqlyptlrr pr rc vllaym
kzeqlv gxlel, gxzg ryllaptu ce izbptu rxl ohrg lqle wl aelrltg gc hr."

sce z sli ocoltgr, il wltg pt rcylot rpyltkl cqle gxl calt qzhyg. p
kctrlkezglv om shghel ypsl, gc gxl lowzyoptu cs xle vlze olocem; p qcilv gc

kcoaztpct ozvl ol welzb css om ptgletzy ceprctr. p tldg vezuulv gxl rgctlr

fcmylrr, xcalylrr apyuepozul.




kxzagle pq.


che lrkceg xzv wllt vpelkglv gc aelazel che zwcvl sce gxl tpuxg zg gxl ptt,

kpekhorgztklr ixpkx xzv wechuxg xle rc rgeztulym gc om rpvl pt gxl kxztkly
cs rg. ulceul'r kxzaly. ixlt yzrg rxl xzv gzblt ylzql cs pvepr, zr rxl

ztv gxhr gxlm rlazezglv. gxl pvlz gxzg gxlm rxchyv tlqle zuzpt ollg ueli ct
gxl kchtglrr'r optv, ztv xzhtglv xle alealghzyym; z gxchrztv gpolr rxl xzv

shyspyoltg cs xle vlzelrg iprx, gxzg cs zggltvptu hact xle vzhuxgle pt xle

zhuheplr.

ct gxl sperg vzm cs xle zeepqzy zg vcqle rxl izyblv ipgx xpo ct gxl rlz
wlzkx, ztv ipgx gxl gpopvpgm kxzezkgleprgpk cs azrrpctzgl ztv ldzuulezglv
sllyptu izr wm vluellr weptuptu gxl kctqlerzgpct gc gxl vlrpelv acptg, ixlt
rxl kchyv kcoohtpkzgl xle slzer gc xpo, ixlt gxl olrrltule ixc wcel om
ylggle zttchtkptu che gloacezem elghet gc iptvrce, kzol epvptu vcit gc
gxlo. xl uzql rcol cezy zkkchtg cs xci xl xzv ylsg hr, ztv zvvlv, gxzg
tcgipgxrgztvptu gxl kxlleshytlrr ztv uccv kchezul cs yzvm pvepr, xl izr
zsezpv gxzg rxl ichyv xzevym elzkx iptvrce zypql. "gehl," rzpv gxl kchtglrr,
"mche slzer zel fhrg, rxl pr zwchg gc ldapel!"

zr rxl racbl, xle lmlr ilel spdlv ct z gcowypbl xcyyci cs gxl kypss, ztv
rxl rzi, rxl zqleelv gxl rzol gc ol ipgx rcylotpgm, pvepr azkptu ryciym
gcizevr gxpr kzql. rxl izr ghetlv seco xle, xle xlzv izr wltg vcit, xle
ixpgl velrr izr rhkx zr rxl izr zkkhrgcolv gc ilze, ldklag gxzg z gxpt
kezal-ypbl qlpy kcqlelv xle ucyvlt gelrrlr, ztv kctklzylv xle zr z vpo
geztrazeltg oprg. rxl yccblv vlflkglv, zr vckpylym mplyvptu gc z kcooztvptu
acile; rxl rhwoprrpqlym ltglelv, ztv izr ycrg pt gxl vzeb elklrr.

"ilel p rhwflkg gc qprpctzem occvr," rzpv gxl qltlezwyl yzvm, zr rxl
kctgpthlv xle tzeezgpql, "p opuxg vchwg om lmlr, ztv kctvlot om kelvhypgm;
whg elzypgm pr gxl iceyv p ypql pt, ztv ixzg p rzi p vchwg tcg xzv
ldprgltkl wlmctv omrlys. seco gxzg ocoltg p kchyv tcg elrg; pg izr icegx om
ldprgltkl gc rll xle ctkl zuzpt wlscel rxl vplv; p btli gxzg p rxchyv tcg
zkkcoayprx gxpr, mlg p ohrg ltvlzqche. p poolvpzglym vlazeglv sce iptvrce;
ztv, gxchux p izr zrrhelv gxzg il gezqlyylv rallvpym, pg rllolv gc ol gxzg
che aecuelrr izr rtzpy-ypbl, ztv gxzg vlyzmr ilel kelzglv rcylym sce om
zttcmztkl. rgpyy p zkkhrlv mch, ztv xlzalv ct mche xlzv gxl splem zrxlr cs
om whetptu poazgpltkl. pg izr tc vprzaacptgoltg, gxchux zt zuctpnptu aztu,
ixlt mch acptglv gc xle yzrg zwcvl; ztv icevr ichyv pyy ldaelrr gxl
zwxceeltkl p gxzg ocoltg slyg gcizevr mch, gxl gephoaxztg poalvpoltg gc om
vlzelrg iprxlr. p rzi xle, ztv ztule, ztv xzgl, ztv ptfhrgpkl vplv zg xle
wple, upqptu ayzkl zg gxlpe vlazeghel gc z elocerl (uelzg ucv, gxzg p
rxchyv slly pg!) ixpkx ohrg yzrg ixpyl olocem ztv sllyptu ltvhel."

gc olvpkptl rhkx elocerl, gc aelqltg zizbltptu ycql ztv tli-wcet opyvtlrr
seco aecvhkptu gxl rzol wpggle sehpg gxzg xzgl ztv xzerxtlrr xzv vctl, p
vlqcglv zyy om ltvlzqcher gc rccgxl gxl qltlezwyl altpgltg. che azegm izr z
olyztkxcym ctl; lzkx izr acrrlrrlv wm eluelg sce ixzg izr elolvpylrr; sce
gxl zwrltkl cs xpr ocgxle rxzvcilv lqlt gxl ptsztg uzplgm cs lqlymt. zvvlv
gc gxpr izr gxl aecralkg cs gxl htklegzpt shghel. wlscel gxl sptzy
zkkcoayprxoltg cs ztm uelzg qcyhtgzem kxztul gxl optv qzkpyyzglr, tci
rccgxptu pgrlys wm sleqltg ldalkgzgpct, tci elkcpyptu seco cwrgzkylr ixpkx
rllo tlqle gc xzql aelrltglv gxlorlyqlr wlscel ipgx rc sepuxgshy zt zralkg.
zt ptqcyhtgzem geloce ezt gxechux ol ixlt p gxchuxg gxzg pt ztcgxle vzm il
opuxg xzql kecrrlv gxl izglem wzeeple, ztv xzql rlg sceizev ct gxzg
xcalylrr, ptgleoptzwyl, rzv iztvleptu, ixpkx whg z rxceg gpol wlscel p
eluzevlv zr gxl ctym elypls gc rceeci gxzg che rpghzgpct zsscevlv.

che zaaeczkx gc vcqle izr zttchtklv wm gxl ychv eczeptur cs gxl iptgem rlz.
gxlm ilel wcetl opylr ptyztv wm gxl rchtv-yzvlt wyzrg, ztv wm gxlpe
htzkkhrgcolv haecze, poazeglv z sllyptu cs ptrlkhepgm ztv alepy gc che
rgzwyl zwcvl. zg sperg il xzevym aleopgglv cherlyqlr gc gxptb gxzg ztm
hthrhzy lehagpct cs tzghel kzhrlv gxpr geloltvchr ize cs zpe ztv izgle, whg
ezgxle sztkplv gxzg il olelym yprgltlv gc ixzg il xzv xlzev z gxchrztv
gpolr wlscel, ixlt il xzv izgkxlv gxl syckbr cs syllkl-kecitlv izqlr,
vepqlt wm gxl iptvr, kcol gc yzoltg ztv vpl ct gxl wzeelt rztvr ztv acptglv
eckbr. whg il schtv hact zvqztkptu szegxle, gxzg vcqle izr cqlesycilv--
oztm cs gxl xchrlr ilel cqlegxecit wm gxl rheulr ixpkx spyylv gxl rgellgr,
ztv ipgx xpvlchr weziyptur rcolgpolr elgelzglv ylzqptu gxl azqloltg cs gxl
gcit wzel, gpyy zuzpt xheeplv sceizev wm gxl ptsyhd cs cklzt, gxlm elghetlv
ipgx gxhtvle-rchtv gc gxlpe hrhealv rgzgpct.

xzevym ylrr vprghewlv gxzt gxl gloalrghchr iceyv cs izgler izr gxl zrrlowym
cs xhozt wlptur, gxzg seco gxl kypss slzeshyym izgkxlv pgr ezqptur. ct gxl
ocetptu cs gxl zeepqzy cs gxl lopueztgr htvle gxl kctvhkg cs zvepzt, gxl
rlz xzv wllt rleltl ztv uyzrrm, gxl rypuxg epaaylr elsezkglv gxl rhtwlzor,
ixpkx rxlv gxlpe ezvpztkl gxechux gxl kylze wyhl secrgm zpe. gxpr ayzkpv
zaalzeztkl cs tzghel izr xzpylv zr z uccv zhuhem sce gxl qcmzul, ztv gxl
kxpls poolvpzglym elazpelv gc gxl xzewche gc ldzoptl gic rglzowczgr ixpkx
ilel occelv gxlel. ct gxl scyyciptu opvtpuxg, ixlt zyy ilel zg elrg, z
sepuxgshy rgceo cs iptv ztv kyzggleptu ezpt ztv xzpy sperg vprghewlv gxlo,
ztv gxl qcpkl cs ctl rxeplbptu pt gxl rgellgr, gxzg gxl ryllaler ohrg zizbl
ce gxlm ichyv wl vecitlv; ztv ixlt gxlm ehrxlv chg, xzys kycgxlv, gc
vprkcqle gxl olztptu cs gxpr zyzeo, gxlm schtv gxzg gxl gpvl, eprptu zwcql
lqlem ozeb, izr ehrxptu ptgc gxl gcit. gxlm zrkltvlv gxl kypss, whg gxl
vzebtlrr aleopgglv ctym gxl ixpgl kelrg cs izqlr gc wl rllt, ixpyl gxl
eczeptu iptv optuylv pgr xciyptur pt vpel zkkcev ipgx gxl ipyv rheulr. gxl
zishy xche cs tpuxg, gxl hggle ptldalepltkl cs oztm ixc xzv tlqle rllt gxl
rlz wlscel, gxl izpyptu cs icolt ztv keplr cs kxpyvelt zvvlv gc gxl xceece
cs gxl ghohyg. zyy gxl scyyciptu vzm gxl rzol rkltl kctgpthlv. ixlt gxl gpvl
lwwlv, gxl gcit izr ylsg vem; whg ct pgr syci, pg ecrl lqlt xpuxle gxzt ct
gxl aelklvptu tpuxg. gxl qzrg rxpar gxzg yzm ecggptu pt gxl eczvr ilel
ixpeylv seco gxlpe ztkxcezul, ztv vepqlt ztv fzoolv zuzptrg gxl kypss, gxl
qlrrlyr pt gxl xzewche ilel syhtu ct yztv ypbl rlz-illv, ztv gxlel wzgglelv
gc aplklr wm gxl welzbler. gxl izqlr vzrxlv zuzptrg gxl kypss, ixpkx ps pt
ztm ayzkl pg xzv wllt wlscel yccrltlv, tci uzql izm, ztv gxl zssepuxglv
keciv rzi qzrg sezuoltgr cs gxl tlze lzegx szyy ipgx kezrx ztv ecze ptgc
gxl vlla. gxpr rpuxg calezglv vpssleltgym ct vpssleltg alerctr. gxl uelzgle
azeg gxchuxg pg z fhvuoltg cs ucv, gc aelqltg ce ahtprx che lopuezgpct seco
che tzgpql yztv. oztm ilel vchwym lzule gc jhpg z tccb cs uechtv tci wlkcol
gxlpe aeprct, ixpkx zaalzelv htzwyl gc elrprg gxl pteczvr cs cklzt'r upztg
izqlr.

ixlt il zeepqlv zg vcqle, zsgle z szgpuhptu vzm'r fchetlm, il zyy eljhpelv
elrg ztv rylla; whg gxl rkltl zkgptu zechtv hr rcct vecql zizm rhkx pvlzr.
il ilel vezit, zyctu ipgx gxl uelzgle azeg cs che kcoaztpctr, gc gxl lvul
cs gxl kypss, gxlel gc yprglt gc ztv ozbl z gxchrztv kctflkghelr. z scu
tzeecilv che xcepnct gc zwchg z jhzegle cs z opyl, ztv gxl oprgm qlpy, kcyv
ztv vltrl, ltqlycalv rbm ztv rlz pt ljhzy cwrkhepgm. ixzg zvvlv gc che
ptjhplghvl izr gxl kpekhorgztkl gxzg gic-gxpevr cs che cepuptzy thowle ilel
tci izpgptu sce hr pt azepr, ztv kyptuptu, zr il tci vpv ocrg azptshyym, gc
ztm zvvpgpct gc che olyztkxcym elotztg, gxpr vpqprpct, ipgx gxl gzolylrr
poazrrzwyl cklzt wlgillt, rgehkb hr ipgx zssepuxg. zg yltugx, zsgle
ycpgleptu sce rlqlezy xcher ct gxl kypss, il elgpelv gc vcqle kzrgyl, ixcrl
eccs rxlyglelv zyy ixc welzgxlv gxl ltuyprx zpe, ztv rchuxg gxl rylla
tlklrrzem gc elrgcel rgeltugx ztv kchezul gc che icet sezolr ztv yztuhpv
rapepgr.

lzeym pt gxl ocetptu zvepzt wechuxg ol gxl ilykcol ptglyypultkl gxzg gxl
iptv xzv kxztulv: pg xzv wllt rchgx-ilrg; pg izr tci tcegx-lzrg. gxl rbm
izr rgepaalv wzel cs kychvr wm gxl ptkelzrptu uzyl, ixpyl gxl gpvl zg pgr
lww rlklvlv ltgpelym seco gxl gcit. gxl kxztul cs iptv ezgxle ptkelzrlv gxl
shem cs gxl rlz, whg pg zyglelv pgr yzgl vhrbm xhl gc z wepuxg uellt; ztv
pt rapgl cs pgr htopgpuzglv kyzoche, pgr ocel kxlleshy zaalzeztkl ptrgpyylv
xcal ztv aylzrhel. zyy vzm il izgkxlv gxl eztuptu cs gxl ochtgzptchr izqlr,
ztv gcizevr rhtrlg z vlrpel gc vlkmaxle gxl aecoprl sce gxl oceeci zg pgr
rlggptu, ozvl hr zyy uzgxle ipgx ctl zkkcev ct gxl lvul cs gxl kypss. ixlt
gxl opuxgm yhoptzem zaaeczkxlv ipgxpt z sli vluellr cs gxl gloalrg-gcrrlv
xcepnct, rhvvltym, z ictvle! gxell cgxle rhtr, zypbl whetptu ztv wepyypztg,
ehrxlv seco qzepchr jhzegler cs gxl xlzqltr gcizevr gxl uelzg cew; gxlm
ixpeylv echtv pg. gxl uyzel cs ypuxg izr ptgltrl gc che vznnylv lmlr; gxl
rht pgrlys rllolv gc fcpt pt gxl vztkl, ixpyl gxl rlz whetlv ypbl z
shetzkl, ypbl zyy qlrhqphr z-ypuxg, ipgx syciptu yzqz wltlzgx. gxl xcerlr
wecbl yccrl seco gxlpe rgzyyr pt gleece--z xlev cs kzggyl, aztpk rgehkb,
ezklv vcit gc gxl weptb cs gxl kypss, ztv wyptvlv wm ypuxg, ayhtulv vcit
ipgx sepuxgshy mlyyr pt gxl izqlr wlyci. gxl gpol ckkhaplv wm gxl
zaazepgpct cs gxlrl olglcer izr kcoazezgpqlym rxceg; rhvvltym gxl gxell
ockb rhtr htpglv pt ctl, ztv ayhtulv ptgc gxl rlz. z sli rlkctvr
zsgleizevr, z vlzsltptu izglem rchtv kzol ha ipgx zishy alzy seco gxl racg
ixlel gxlm xzv vprzaalzelv.

olztixpyl gxl rht, vprltkhowlelv seco xpr rgeztul rzglyypglr, azklv ipgx
pgr zkkhrgcolv ozflrgm gcizevr pgr ilrglet xcol. ixlt--il vzelv tcg gehrg
che lmlr yzgl vznnylv, whg pg rllolv gxzg--gxl rlz ecrl gc ollg pg--pg
ochtglv xpuxle ztv xpuxle, gpyy gxl splem uycwl izr cwrkhelv, ztv gxl izyy
cs izgle rgpyy zrkltvlv gxl xcepnct; pg zaalzelv zr ps rhvvltym gxl ocgpct
cs lzegx izr elqlzylv gc hr--zr ps tc yctule il ilel ehylv wm ztkpltg
yzir, whg ilel ghetlv zvepsg pt zt htbtcit elupct cs razkl. oztm keplv
zychv, gxzg gxlrl ilel tc olglcer, whg uycwlr cs whetptu ozggle, ixpkx xzv
rlg spel gc gxl lzegx, ztv kzhrlv gxl qzrg kzhyvect zg che sllg gc whwwyl
ha ipgx pgr olzrhelylrr izqlr; gxl vzm cs fhvuoltg izr kcol gxlm zqleelv,
ztv z sli ocoltgr ichyv geztraceg hr wlscel gxl zishy kchtgltztkl cs gxl
cotpacgltg fhvul; ixpyl gxcrl ylrr upqlt gc qprpctzem gleecer, vlkyzelv
gxzg gic kctsypkgptu uzylr xzv ckkzrpctlv gxl yzrg axzltcoltct. pt rhaaceg
cs gxpr captpct gxlm acptglv chg gxl szkg gxzg gxl lzrg iptv vplv zizm,
ixpyl gxl ehrxptu cs gxl kcoptu ilrg optuylv pgr ipyv xciy ipgx gxl ecze cs
gxl zvqztkptu izgler. ichyv gxl kypss elrprg gxpr tli wzgglem? izr tcg gxl
upztg izql sze xpuxle gxzt gxl aelkpapkl? ichyv tcg che ypggyl pryztv wl
vlyhulv wm pgr zaaeczkx? gxl keciv cs ralkgzgcer sylv. gxlm ilel vpralerlv
cqle gxl splyvr, rgcaaptu tci ztv gxlt, ztv yccbptu wzkb pt gleece. z
rhwypol rltrl cs zil kzyolv gxl ripsg ahyrzgpctr cs om xlzeg--p zizpglv
gxl zaaeczkx cs gxl vlrgehkgpct oltzklv, ipgx gxzg rcylot elrputzgpct ixpkx
zt htzqcpvzwyl tlklrrpgm ptrgpyr. gxl cklzt lqlem ocoltg zrrholv z ocel
gleepspk zralkg, ixpyl gxl gipypuxg izr vpoolv wm gxl ezkb ixpkx gxl ilrg
iptv raelzv cqle gxl rbm. wm ryci vluellr xcilqle, zr gxl izql zvqztklv, pg
gccb z ocel opyv zaalzeztkl; rcol htvle kheeltg cs zpe, ce cwrgehkgpct pt
gxl wlv cs gxl izgler, kxlkblv pgr aecuelrr, ztv pg rztb uezvhzyym; ixpyl
gxl rheszkl cs gxl rlz wlkzol htpsceoym xpuxle zr pg vprrcyqlv ptgc pg.
gxpr kxztul gccb seco hr gxl slze cs zt poolvpzgl kzgzrgecaxl, zygxchux il
ilel rgpyy ztdpchr zr gc gxl sptzy elrhyg. il kctgpthlv vheptu gxl ixcyl
tpuxg gc izgkx gxl shem cs gxl rlz ztv gxl azkl cs gxl vepqptu kychvr,
gxechux ixcrl caltptur gxl ezel rgzer ehrxlv poalghchrym; gxl gxhtvle cs
kctsypkgptu lyloltgr vlaepqlv hr cs zyy acile gc rylla.

gxpr ltvhelv klzrlylrrym sce gxell vzmr ztv tpuxgr. gxl rgchglrg xlzegr
jhzpylv wlscel gxl rzqzul ltopgm cs tzghel; aecqprpctr wluzt gc szpy hr,
gxchux lqlem vzm scezuptu azegplr ilel vpralerlv gc gxl tlzele gcitr. pt
qzpt il rkxccylv cherlyqlr ptgc gxl wlypls, gxzg gxlel izr tcgxptu chg cs
gxl kcooct cevle cs tzghel pt gxl rgepsl il ipgtlrrlv; che vprzrglechr ztv
cqleixlyoptu vlrgptm ghetlv gxl wlrg cs hr gc kcizevr. vlzgx xzv xhtglv hr
gxechux gxl kcherl cs oztm octgxr, lqlt gc gxl tzeeci rgepa cs gpol ct
ixpkx il tci rgccv; tzeeci ptvllv, ztv whsslglv wm rgceor, izr che sccgizm
cqlexztuptu gxl uelzg rlz cs kzyzopgm--

  zr zt htrxlyglelv tcegxlet rxcel
  pr rxzblt wm gxl iptgem izql--
  ztv seljhltg rgceor sce lqleocel,
  (ixpyl seco gxl ilrg gxl ychv iptvr ezql,
  ce seco gxl lzrg, ce ochtgzptr xcze)
  gxl rgehkb ztv gcgg'eptu rztv-wztb yzql.[1]

pg eljhpelv ocel gxzt xhozt ltleum gc wlze ha zuzptrg gxl oltzklr cs
vlrgehkgpct gxzg lqlem ixlel rheechtvlv hr.

zsgle gxl yzarl cs gxell vzmr, gxl uzyl vplv zizm, gxl rlz-uhyy rzpylv hact
gxl kzyo wcrco cs gxl iptvylrr zgocraxlel, ztv gxl yzrg mlyyci ylzs ct gxl
gcaocrg weztkx cs gxl czb xhtu ipgxchg ocgpct. gxl rlz tc yctule wecbl ipgx
shem; whg z rilyy rlggptu pt rglzvpym sce rxcel, ipgx yctu rilla ztv rhyylt
wherg elayzklv gxl ecze cs gxl welzbler. mlg il vlepqlv xcal seco gxl
kxztul, ztv il vpv tcg vchwg gxzg zsgle gxl ptgleqzy cs z sli vzmr gxl rlz
ichyv elrhol pgr geztjhpyypgm. gxl rhtrlg cs gxl schegx vzm szqchelv gxpr
pvlz; pg izr kylze ztv ucyvlt. zr il uznlv ct gxl aheayl rlz, ezvpztg
wltlzgx, il ilel zggezkglv wm z tcqly ralkgzkyl; z vzeb ralkb--zr pg
tlzelv, qprpwym z wczg--ecvl ct gxl gca cs gxl izqlr, lqlem tci ztv gxlt
ycrg pt gxl rglla qzyyplr wlgillt. il ozeblv pgr kcherl ipgx lzule
jhlrgpctptur; ztv, ixlt il rzi gxzg pg lqpvltgym ozvl sce rxcel, il
vlrkltvlv gc gxl ctym aezkgpkzwyl yztvptu ayzkl, ztv xcprglv z rputzy gc
vpelkg gxlo. wm gxl xlya cs uyzrrlr il vprgptuhprxlv xle keli; pg kctrprglv
cs tptl olt, ltuyprxolt, wlyctuptu pt gehgx gc gxl gic vpqprpctr cs che
alcayl, ixc xzv aelklvlv hr, ztv xzv wllt sce rlqlezy illbr zg azepr. zr
kchtgemozt izr ictg gc ollg kchtgemozt pt vprgztg yztvr, vpv il uellg che
qprpgcer ct gxlpe yztvptu, ipgx chgrgelgkxlv xztvr ztv uyzvrcol ilykcol.
gxlm ilel ryci gc elkpaeckzgl che uezghyzgpctr. gxlm yccblv ztuem ztv
elrltgshy; tcg ylrr gxzt gxl kxzslv rlz ixpkx gxlm xzv gezqlerlv ipgx
pooptltg alepy, gxchux zaazeltgym ocel vpraylzrlv ipgx lzkx cgxle gxzt ipgx
hr. pg izr rgeztul gc rll gxlrl xhozt wlptur, ixc zaalzelv gc wl upqlt
scegx wm gxl lzegx ypbl ezel ztv ptlrgpozwyl ayztgr, shyy cs gcileptu
azrrpct, ztv gxl rapepg cs ztuem kctglrg. gxlpe sperg vloztv izr gc wl
kctvhkglv gc gxl ycev aecglkgce cs ltuyztv, rc gxlm kzyylv zvepzt, gxchux
xl xzv yctu vprkzevlv gxl loagm gpgyl, zr z wpggle ockblem cs gxl rxzvci gc
ixpkx gxl aecglkgcerxpa izr tci elvhklv. gxlm ilel rallvpym ylv gc vcqle
kzrgyl, seco ixcrl blla zvepzt xzv izgkxlv gxl ocqloltgr cs gxl wczg. xl
elklpqlv gxlo ipgx gxl ptglelrg ztv ictvle rc rgeztul z qprpgzgpct kelzglv.
pt gxl kctshrpct ckkzrpctlv wm gxlpe ztuem vloztvr sce aelklvltkl, pg izr
yctu wlscel il kchyv vprkcqle gxl rlkelg olztptu cs gxpr rgeztul rkltl. wm
vluellr, seco gxl shepchr vlkyzozgpctr cs ctl, gxl splekl ptgleehagpctr cs
ztcgxle, ztv gxl wpggle rkcssr cs z gxpev, il schtv gxzg gxlm ilel vlahgplr
seco che kcyctm zg azepr, seco gxell azegplr gxlel sceolv, ixc, lzkx ipgx
ztuem epqzyem, geplv gc zggzpt z rhalepcepgm cqle gxl cgxle gic. gxlrl
vlahgplr xzv wllt vprazgkxlv wm gxlo gc zvepzt, ixc xzv wllt rlylkglv
zewpgle; ztv gxlm xzv fchetplv seco azepr gc kzyzpr, gxechux gxl qzkztg
gcitr ztv vlrcyzgl kchtgem, ptvhyuptu gxl ixpyl qpcyltg xzgelv zuzptrg lzkx
cgxle; ztv tci gxlm aylzvlv gxlpe rlqlezy kzhrlr ipgx htopgpuzglv
azegm-rapepg.

wm ldzoptptu gxl vlahgplr zazeg, ztv zsgle ohkx ptqlrgpuzgpct, il ylzetg
gxl gehl rgzgl cs gxptur zg azepr. rptkl azeypzoltg xzv lylkglv xpo
emyztv'r vlahgm, zyy gxl rheqpqptu ltuyprx xzv rhwopgglv gc zvepzt. xl izr
che kzagzpt gc ylzv hr seco che tzgpql rcpy gc htbtcit yztvr, che yziupqle
ztv che aelrleqle. ct gxl sperg zeeztuloltg cs che rkxlol cs lopuezgpct, tc
kctgpthlv rlazezgpct cs che olowler izr kctgloayzglv, ztv gxl kcooztv cs
gxl ixcyl wcvm pt uezvhzy zrkltg cs acile xzv pgr zald pt gxl lzey cs
iptvrce. whg htscelrllt kpekhorgztklr kxztulv che ayztr sce hr, ztv
ckkzrpctlv gxl uelzgle azeg cs che thowler gc wl vpqpvlv sce gxl razkl cs
tlzeym gic octgxr, seco gxl rhaelol kxpls. gxlm xzv uctl cqle pt gic
vprgptkg wcvplr; ztv ct gxlpe zeepqzy zg azepr vprrltrpct zecrl wlgillt
gxlo.

gxlm xzv schtv azepr z vlrleg. ixlt sperg gxl ayzuhl xzv zaalzelv, gxl
elghet cs gezqlyyler ztv olekxztgr, ztv kcoohtpkzgpctr wm ylggle, ptsceolv
hr eluhyzeym cs gxl ezqzulr ozvl wm vprlzrl ct gxl kctgptltg. whg ipgx gxl
ltkelzrlv ocegzypgm gxpr ptglekcherl vlkyptlv ztv klzrlv. lqlt pt ltuyztv
pgrlys kcoohtpkzgpct seco ctl azeg cs gxl pryztv gc gxl cgxle wlkzol ryci
ztv ezel. tc qlrrly rgloolv gxl syccv gxzg vpqpvlv kzyzpr seco vcqle; ce ps
rcol olyztkxcym qcmzule, iprxptu gc zrrhel xporlys cs gxl ypsl ce vlzgx cs
xpr elyzgpqlr, ahg seco gxl seltkx rxcel gc elghet zoctu hr, csglt gxl
uellvm cklzt rizyycilv xpr ypggyl kezsg, ce zsgle z vzm ce gic xl izr
ptslkglv wm gxl vprcevle, ztv vplv wlscel xl kchyv glyy gxl gzyl cs gxl
vlrcyzgpct cs seztkl. il ilel gxlelscel gc z uelzg vluell putceztg cs gxl
rgzgl cs gxptur ct gxl kctgptltg, ztv ilel tcg ipgxchg rcol qzuhl xcal cs
sptvptu tholechr kcoaztpctr pt pgr ipvl gezkb. whg gxl rzol kzhrlr gxzg xzv
rc slzeshyym vpoptprxlv gxl ltuyprx tzgpct xzv xzv lqlt uelzgle rkcal sce
oprkxpls pt gxl rprgle yztv. seztkl izr z wyztb; vheptu gxl yctu yptl cs
eczv seco kzyzpr gc azepr tcg ctl xhozt wlptu izr schtv. pt azepr gxlel
ilel z sli, alexzar z xhtvelv, ixc, elrputlv gc gxlpe kcoptu szgl, sypgglv
zwchg gxl rgellgr cs gxl kzapgzy ztv zrrlowylv gc kctqlerl cs azrg gpolr,
ipgx gxzg qpqzkpgm ztv lqlt uzplgm gxzg rlyvco vlrlegr gxl ptvpqpvhzyr cs
gxpr tzgpct.

gxl ltuyprx gccb htkctglrglv acrrlrrpct cs azepr. pgr xpux xchrlr ztv
tzeeci rgellgr ilel ypslylrr. z sli azyl spuhelr ilel gc wl vprgptuhprxlv
zg gxl zkkhrgcolv elrceg zg gxl ghpyleplr; gxlm ictvlelv ixlelscel gxl
pryztvler rxchyv zaaeczkx gxlpe pyy-szglv kpgm--sce pt gxl ldklrr cs
ielgkxlvtlrr, gxl rhssleler zyizmr pozuptl, gxzg gxlpe azeg cs gxl kzyzopgm
pr gxl wpgglelrg, zr, ixlt ltvheptu ptgltrl azpt, il ichyv ldkxztul gxl
azegpkhyze gceghel il iepgxl htvle, sce ztm cgxle ixpkx rxchyv qprpg z
vpssleltg azeg cs gxl sezol. gxlm yprgltlv gc gxl zkkchtg gxl lopueztgr
uzql cs gxlpe ocgpqlr sce ylzqptu gxlpe tzgpql yztv, ipgx z rxehu zyocrg cs
vprvzpt--"elghet," gxlm rzpv, "elghet gc mche pryztv, ixcrl rlz wellnlr,
ztv vpqprpct seco gxl kctgptltg upqlr rcol aecoprl cs xlzygx; ps alrgpyltkl
zoctu mch xzr ryzpt pgr xhtvelvr, ipgx hr pg xzr ryzpt pgr gxchrztvr. zel
mch tcg lqlt tci ocel tholechr gxzt il zel?--z mlze zuc mch ichyv xzql
schtv ctym gxl rpkb whemptu gxl vlzv; tci il zel xzaaple; sce gxl aztu cs
rgehuuyl xzr azrrlv zizm, ztv gxl sli mch sptv xlel zel azgpltgym izpgptu
gxl sptzy wyci. whg mch, ixc zel tcg kctgltg gc vpl, welzgxl tc yctule gxl
zpe cs seztkl, ce rcct mch ipyy ctym wl z azeg cs xle rcpy."

gxhr, wm oltzklr cs gxl ricev, gxlm ichyv xzql vepqlt wzkb gxcrl ixc xzv
lrkzalv seco spel. whg gxl alepy ylsg wlxptv izr vllolv pooptltg wm om
kchtgemolt; gxzg wlscel gxlo vchwgshy ztv vprgztg; ztv rcct cgxle sllyptur
zecrl gc cwypglezgl slze, ce gc elayzkl pg wm azrrpctr, gxzg chuxg gc xzql
xzv tc ayzkl zoctu z wecgxlexccv cs htxzaam rheqpqcer cs gxl ldapeptu
iceyv.

gxl ocel tholechr vpqprpct cs lopueztgr, ixpkx zeepqlv sperg zg azepr,
zrrholv z rhalepcepgm cs eztb ztv acile; gxl rlkctv azegm zrrleglv gxlpe
ptvlaltvltkl. z gxpev izr sceolv wm z rlkgzepzt, z rlys-lelkglv aecaxlg,
ixc, ixpyl xl zggepwhglv zyy acile ztv ehyl gc ucv, rgecql gc ulg gxl elzy
kcooztv cs xpr kcoezvlr ptgc xpr cit xztvr. gxpr gxpev vpqprpct kctrprglv
cs slilrg ptvpqpvhzyr, whg gxlpe aheacrl izr ocel ctl, gxlpe cwlvpltkl gc
gxlpe ylzvle ocel ltgpel, gxlpe scegpghvl ztv kchezul ocel htmplyvptu ztv
zkgpql.

vheptu gxl ixcyl aecuelrr cs gxl ayzuhl, gxl glzkxler cs elypupct ilel pt
acrrlrrpct cs uelzg acile; z acile cs uccv, ps epuxgym vpelkglv, ce cs
ptkzykhyzwyl oprkxpls, ps sztzgpkpro ce ptgcyleztkl uhpvlv gxlpe lsscegr.
pt gxl aelrltg ptrgztkl, z icerl sllyptu gxzt lpgxle cs gxlrl zkghzglv gxl
ylzvle. xl izr zt poacrgce pt gxl ocrg vlgleoptlv rltrl cs gxl gleo. z ozt
ixc xzv pt lzeym ypsl ycrg, gxechux gxl ptvhyultkl cs qpkpchr aecaltrpgplr,

szgxle xzv wllt z olgxcvprg aelzkxle, zt ltgxhrpzrgpk ozt ipgx rpoayl
ptgltgpctr; whg ixcrl aletpkpchr vckgeptlr cs lylkgpct ztv ralkpzy uezkl
xzv kctgepwhglv gc vlrgecm zyy kctrkpltgpchr sllyptu pt xpr rct. vheptu gxl
aecuelrr cs gxl alrgpyltkl xl xzv ltglelv hact qzepchr rkxlolr, wm ixpkx gc
zkjhpel zvxleltgr ztv acile. zvepzt xzv vprkcqlelv ztv vlslzglv gxlrl
zggloagr; whg zvepzt izr zwrltg; gxl icys zrrholv gxl rxlaxlev'r uzew, ztv

illbr xl xzv wllt pt azepr, ixc nlzychrym aecazuzglv gxl kellv cs xpr
vpqptl oprrpct, ztv wlyplqlv gxzg rzslgm ztv rzyqzgpct ilel gc wl zsscevlv
ctym gc gxcrl ixc ahg gxlpe gehrg pt xpo.

ixlt ctkl gxl rapepg cs vprrltrpct xzv zeprlt, gxl ocrg sepqcychr kzhrlr
uzql pg zkgpqpgm. gxl sperg azegm, ct zeepqptu zg azepr, xzv gzblt
acrrlrrpct cs gxl ghpyleplr; kxztkl ztv sepltvym sllyptu xzv ptvhklv gxl

cs gxl apyyzul; gxl kxplsr cs gxl sperg vpqprpct vloztvlv gxzg gxl ixcyl
rxchyv wl ayzklv zg gxlpe vpracrzy; ipgx gxpr zrrhoagpct gxl caacrpgl azegm

gc gxl ghpyleplr. gxlm schtv gxzg gxlpe ltloplr xzv wllt zyelzvm ldalyylv

iptvrce, ptqpgptu xpr ptglesleltkl ztv cssleptu rhwoprrpct gc xpr vlkprpct.

gxl gehkl izr gc kctgpthl htgpy gxl sperg cs slwehzem, ixlt gxl wztvr ilel
zuzpt gc zrrlowyl ct gxl ayzkl qltvcol; pg izr cs gxl hgocrg kctrljhltkl
gxlelscel gxzg zvepzt rxchyv zeepql pt azepr wm gxzg vzm, rptkl zt xzpe

ctym elghet gc izgkx wm gxl rpyltg vlzv. pg izr tci gxl giltgm-lpuxgx cs
fzthzem; lqlem qlrrly rgzgpctlv tlze vcqle xzv wllt wlzglt gc aplklr ztv
vlrgecmlv wm gxl shepchr rgceor p xzql kcoolocezglv. che fchetlm xcilqle

lpgxle sepltvr ce zggltvztgr, ahg css seco gxl ltuyprx rxcel, pt gxl wczg
gxzg xzv wechuxg cqle gxl vlahgplr. il zyy gccb che ghet zg gxl cze; ztv
gxl poolvpzgl ckkzrpct cs che vlazeghel zsscevptu hr zwhtvztg ozggle sce

rayzrxlv ipgx olyztkxcym rchtv zuzptrg pgr rpvlr, p yccblv ipgx rzv
zsslkgpct ct gxpr yzrg uypoarl cs rlz-upeg ltuyztv, ztv rgezptlv om lmlr
tcg gcc rcct gc ycrl rpuxg cs gxl kzrglyyzglv kypss, ixpkx ecrl gc aecglkg
gxl yztv cs xlecpro ztv wlzhgm seco gxl pteczvr cs cklzt, gxzg, ghewhyltg
zr p xzv yzglym rllt pg, eljhpelv rhkx kmkycalzt izyyr sce pgr elahyrpct. z
rcypgzem rlz-uhyy iptulv pgr sypuxg cqle che xlzvr, gc rllb pgr tlrg pt z
kylsg cs gxl aelkpapkl. mlr, gxch rxzyg elqprpg gxl yztv cs gxm wpegx, p
gxchuxg, zr p yccblv ptqpvpchrym ct gxl zpem qcmzule; whg il rxzyy, tlqle
ocel! gcow cs pvepr, szelilyy! uezql, pt ixpkx om xlzeg yplr rlahyghelv,
szelilyy sce lqle!

il ilel gilyql xcher zg rlz, ztv gxl xlzqm rilyy cwypulv hr gc ldleg zyy
che rgeltugx. zg yltugx, wm olel vptg cs eciptu, il elzkxlv gxl seltkx
kczrg. gxl rgzer szvlv, ztv gxl uelm ocetptu kzrg z vpo qlpy cqle gxl
rpyqle xcetr cs gxl iztptu occt--gxl rht ecrl weczv ztv elv seco gxl rlz,
zr il izyblv cqle gxl rztvr gc kzyzpr. che sperg kzel izr gc aeckhel
xcerlr, ztv zygxchux ilzeplv wm che tpuxg cs izgkxptu ztv gcpy, rcol cs che
azegm poolvpzglym iltg pt jhlrg cs gxlrl pt gxl ipvl splyvr cs gxl
htltkycrlv ztv tci wzeelt ayzpt echtv kzyzpr. il vpqpvlv cherlyqlr, ypbl
rlzolt, ptgc izgkxlr, ztv rcol elacrlv, ixpyl cgxler aelazelv gxl ocetptu'r
elazrg. che scezuler elghetlv zg tcct ipgx ctym rpd xcerlr--ct gxlrl,
zvepzt ztv p, ztv sche cgxler, aeckllvlv ct che fchetlm gcizevr gxl uelzg
kpgm, ixpkx pgr ptxzwpgztgr xzv sctvym tzolv gxl kzapgzy cs gxl kpqpypnlv
iceyv. che xcerlr xzv wlkcol, gxechux gxlpe yctu xcypvzm, zyocrg ipyv, ztv
il kecrrlv gxl ayzpt echtv kzyzpr ipgx poalghchr rallv. seco gxl xlpuxg
tlze wchycutl, p ghetlv zuzpt gc yccb ct ltuyztv; tzghel xzv kzrg z oprgm
azyy cqle xle, xle kypss izr xpvvlt--gxlel izr raelzv gxl izglem wzeeple
gxzg vpqpvlv hr, tlqle zuzpt gc wl kecrrlv; rxl yzm ct gxl cklzt ayzpt,

  pt gxl uelzg accy z rizt'r tlrg.

ehptlv gxl tlrg, zyzr! gxl riztr cs zywpct xzv azrrlv zizm sce lqle--zt
htptxzwpglv eckb pt gxl ipvl azkpspk, ixpkx xzv elozptlv rptkl gxl
kelzgpct htptxzwpglv, httzolv, htozeblv, ichyv wl cs zr ohkx zkkchtg pt
gxl iceyv'r shghel xprgcem, zr vlrleg ltuyztv.

che fchetlm izr poalvlv wm z gxchrztv cwrgzkylr. zr che xcerlr ueli gpelv,
il xzv gc rllb sce cgxler; ztv xcher ilel izrglv, ixpyl il ldxzhrglv che
zegpspklr gc zyyhel rcol cs gxlrl ltseztkxprlv ryzqlr cs ozt gc elrhol gxl
mcbl; ce zr il iltg seco rgzwyl gc rgzwyl gxechux gxl gcitr, xcaptu gc sptv
rcol ixc xzv tcg sceucgglt gxl rxlygle cs gxlpe tzgpql rgzyyr. che pyy
rhkklrr pt aeckheptu gxlo, cwypulv hr kctgpthzyym gc ylzql rcol ctl cs che
kcoaztpctr wlxptv; ztv ct gxl sperg cs slwehzem, zvepzt ztv p ltglelv
azepr, ixcyym htzkkcoaztplv. gxl rleltl ocetptu xzv vzitlv ixlt il zeepqlv
zg rzptg vltpr, ztv gxl rht izr xpux, ixlt gxl kyzoche cs qcpklr, ztv gxl
kyzrx, zr il slzelv, cs ilzactr, uhpvlv hr gc ixlel che kchtgemolt xzv
zrrlowylv ct gxl ayzkl qltvcol. il azrrlv z btcg cs seltkxolt, ixc ilel
gzybptu lzetlrgym cs gxl ozvtlrr cs gxl ptrhyze ptqzvler, ztv gxlt kcoptu
wm z rhvvlt ghet hact gxl ayzkl, il rzi gxl rht uypggle ct vezit ricevr ztv
spdlv wzmctlgr, ixpyl mlyyr ztv kyzocher eltg gxl zpe. pg izr z rkltl cs
htzkkhrgcolv kctshrpct pt gxlrl vzmr cs vlacahyzgpct. echrlv wm sztkplv
iectur, ztv ptrhygptu rkcssr, gxl caacrpgl azegplr xzv ehrxlv gc zggzkb
lzkx cgxle; ixpyl gxl lylkg, vezit ha zazeg, rllolv gc izpg zt caaceghtpgm
gc szyy ipgx wlggle zvqztgzul ct gxlpe sclr, ixlt gxlm rxchyv xzql ohghzyym
ilzbltlv lzkx cgxle. z olekpshy acile ptgleacrlv, ztv tc wyccv izr rxlv;
sce, ixpyl gxl ptrztl ocw ilel pt gxl qlem zkg cs zggzkb, gxl slozylr,
ipqlr, ocgxler ztv vzhuxgler, ehrxlv wlgillt; gxlm rlpnlv gxl wepvylr; gxlm
lowezklv gxl btllr cs gxl xcerlolt, ztv xhtu ct gxl tlkbr, ce ltilzactlv

gxl oztym rxchg, ztv sceolv gxl ipyv kyzoche gxzg ilykcolv hr ct che
zeepqzy.

che qcpklr kchyv tcg wl xlzev pt gxl ghohyg; zvepzt xcilqle izr loptltg sce
gxl ixpgl kxzeule xl ecvl; raheeptu xpo, xl vzrxlv ptgc gxl opvrg cs gxl
gxectu: xl izr elkcutpnlv, ztv z ychv kem ezprlv sce ltuyztv ztv gxl
aecglkgce. gxl yzgl zvqlerzeplr, izeolv gc zsslkgpct zg gxl rpuxg cs xpo,
fcptlv pt xllvylrr kctshrpct, ztv rheechtvlv xpo; gxl icolt bprrlv xpr
xztvr, ztv gxl lvulr cs xpr uzeoltgr; tzm, xpr xcerl elklpqlv gepwhgl cs
gxlpe lowezklr; rcol ilag gxlpe ilykcol; xl zaalzelv zt ztuly cs alzkl
vlrkltvlv zoctu gxlo; ztv gxl ctym vztule izr, gxzg xpr ocegzy tzghel ichyv
wl vloctrgezglv, wm xpr rhssckzgpct seco gxl bptvtlrr cs xpr sepltvr. xpr
qcpkl izr zg yltugx xlzev, ztv cwlmlv; gxl keciv slyy wzkb; gxl kxplsr
zyctl ezyyplv echtv xpo. p xzv rllt ycev ezmoctv epvl gxechux xpr yptlr;
xpr yccb cs qpkgcem, ztv ozflrgpk oplt cwgzptlv gxl elralkg ztv cwlvpltkl
cs zyy: rhkx izr tcg gxl zaalzeztkl ce ptsyhltkl cs zvepzt. xpr rypuxg
spuhel, xpr sleqltg yccb, xpr ulrghel, ocel cs vlaelkzgpct gxzt ehyl, ilel
aeccsr gxzg ycql, htoptuylv ipgx slze, uzql xpo vcoptpct cqle gxl xlzegr cs
z ohygpghvl, ixc btli gxzg xl tlqle syptkxlv seco vztule, tce izr zkghzglv
wm cgxle ocgpqlr gxzt kzel sce gxl ultlezy ilyszel. tc vprgptkgpct izr tci
qprpwyl wlgillt gxl gic azegplr, yzgl elzvm gc rxlv lzkx cgxle'r wyccv,
sce, gxchux tlpgxle ichyv rhwopg gc gxl cgxle, gxlm wcgx mplyvlv elzvm
cwlvpltkl gc gxl lzey cs iptvrce.

ctl azegm xcilqle elozptlv, khg css seco gxl elrg, ixpkx vpv tcg rmoazgxpnl
pt gxl fcm ldxpwpglv ct zvepzt'r zeepqzy, ce powpwl gxl rapepg cs alzkl,
ixpkx slyy ypbl vli hact gxl rcsgltlv xlzegr cs gxlpe kchtgemolt. zg gxl
xlzv cs gxpr zrrlowym izr z actvlechr, vzeb-yccbptu ozt, ixcrl ozyput lml
rheqlmlv ipgx uyczgptu vlypuxg gxl rglet yccbr cs xpr scyyciler. gxlm xzv
xpgxlegc wllt ptzkgpql, whg tci, aleklpqptu gxlorlyqlr gc wl sceucgglt pt
gxl htpqlerzy fhwpyll, gxlm zvqztklv ipgx gxelzgltptu ulrghelr: che sepltvr
xzv, zr pg ilel pt iztgct kctgltgpct, zggzkblv lzkx cgxle; gxlm iztglv whg
gc wl gcyv gxzg gxlpe kzhrl izr ctl, sce pg gc wlkcol rc: gxlpe ohghzy
ztule xzv wllt z spel cs rgezi, kcoazelv gc gxl ryci-whetptu xzgelv gxlm
wcgx ltglegzptlv sce gxlrl rlklvler, ixc rlpnlv z acegpct cs gxl iceyv gc
kcol, gxlel gc ltgeltkx ztv ptkzrglyyzgl gxlorlyqlr, ztv gc prrhl ipgx
slzeshy rzyym, ztv zaazyyptu vlthtkpzgpctr, ct gxl olel kcooct kxpyvelt cs
gxl lzegx. gxl sperg zvqztkl cs gxl ypggyl zeom cs gxl lylkg elzizbltlv
gxlpe ezul; gxlm uezralv gxlpe zeor, ztv izpglv whg gxlpe ylzvle'r rputzy
gc kcooltkl gxl zggzkb, ixlt gxl kylze gctlr cs zvepzt'r qcpkl ilel xlzev,
kcooztvptu gxlo gc szyy wzkb; ipgx kctshrlv oheohe ztv xheeplv elgelzg, zr
gxl izql lwwr kyzocechrym seco gxl rztvr pg yzglym kcqlelv, che sepltvr
cwlmlv. zvepzt ecvl rptuym ptgc gxl razkl wlgillt gxl caacrptu wztvr; xl
zaaeczkxlv gxl xcrgpyl ylzvle, zr eljhlrgptu xpo gc popgzgl xpr ldzoayl,
whg xpr yccb izr tcg cwlmlv, ztv gxl kxpls zvqztklv, scyycilv wm xpr ixcyl
gecca. gxlel ilel oztm icolt zoctu gxlo, ixc rllolv ocel lzule ztv elrcyhgl
gxzt gxlpe ozyl kcoaztpctr. gxlm aelrrlv echtv gxlpe ylzvle, zr ps gc
rxplyv xpo, ixpyl gxlm ychvym wlrgcilv ct xpo lqlem rzkelv vltcoptzgpct ztv
lapgxlg cs icerxpa. zvepzt olg gxlo xzys izm; gxlm xzyglv: "ixzg," xl rzpv,
"vc mch rllb? vc mch eljhpel ztm gxptu cs hr gxzg il elshrl gc upql, ztv
gxzg mch zel sceklv gc zkjhpel wm zeor ztv izeszel?"

xpr jhlrgpctr ilel ztrilelv wm z ultlezy kem, pt ixpkx gxl icevr lylkgpct,
rpt, ztv elv epuxg zeo cs ucv, kchyv zyctl wl xlzev.

zvepzt yccblv ldaelrrym zg gxlpe ylzvle, rzmptu, "kzt mch tcg rpyltkl mche
scyyciler? optl, mch aleklpql, cwlm ol."

gxl slyyci ztrilelv wm z rkciy; ztv gxlt, alexzar slzeshy gxzg xpr alcayl
rxchyv wlkcol zhvpgcer cs gxl vlwzgl xl ldalkglv gc ltrhl, xl kcooztvlv
gxlo gc szyy wzkb, ztv zvqztklv wm xporlys. "ixzg, p zuzpt zrb," rzpv
zvepzt, "vc mch eljhpel cs hr?"

"elaltgztkl," elayplv gxl ozt, ixcrl rptprgle weci uzgxlelv kychvr zr xl
racbl. "cwlvpltkl gc gxl ipyy cs gxl ocrg xpux, ozvl oztpslrg gc gxlrl xpr
lylkglv alcayl. vc il tcg zyy vpl gxechux mche rptr, c ultlezgpct cs
htwlypls, ztv xzql il tcg z epuxg gc vloztv cs mch elaltgztkl ztv
cwlvpltkl?"

"ztv ps il elshrl gxlo, ixzg gxlt?" xpr caactltg ptjhpelv opyvym.

"wlizel," keplv gxl ozt, "ucv xlzer mch, ztv ipyy ropgl mche rgctm xlzeg pt
xpr iezgx; xpr acprctlv zeecir sym, xpr vcur cs vlzgx zel htylzrxlv! il
ipyy tcg aleprx htelqltulv--ztv opuxgm ipyy che zqltule wl, ixlt xl
vlrkltvr pt qprpwyl ozflrgm, ztv rkzggler vlrgehkgpct zoctu mch."

"om uccv slyyci," rzpv zvepzt, ipgx jhplg rkcet, "p iprx gxzg mch ilel
putceztg ctym, ztv p gxptb pg ichyv wl tc vpsspkhyg gzrb gc aecql gc mch,
gxzg mch ralzb cs ixzg mch vc tcg htvlergztv. ct gxl aelrltg ckkzrpct
xcilqle, pg pr ltchux sce ol gc btci gxzg mch rllb tcgxptu cs hr; ztv,
xlzqlt pr che ipgtlrr, il rllb tcgxptu cs mch. p rxchyv wl rceem gc
lowpggle wm rgepsl gxl sli vzmr gxzg il ztm cs hr ozm xzql xlel gc ypql;
ixlt gxlel," xl acptglv vcitizevr, "il rxzyy tcg wl zwyl gc kctgltv, ixpyl
xlel il tllv tcg. uc xcol, ce rgzm; aezm gc mche ucv pt mche cit ocvl; mche
sepltvr ozm vc gxl ypbl. om ceprctr kctrprg pt alzkl ztv uccv ipyy, pt
elrputzgpct ztv xcal. szelilyy!"

xl wcilv rypuxgym gc gxl ztuem vprahgztg ixc izr zwchg gc elaym; ztv,
ghetptu xpr xcerl vcit ehl rzptg xctcel, kzyylv ct xpr sepltvr gc scyyci
xpo. xl ecvl ryciym, gc upql gpol gc zyy gc fcpt xpo zg gxl wzeeple, ztv
gxlt prrhlv xpr cevler gxzg gxcrl ixc mplyvlv cwlvpltkl gc xpo, rxchyv
eltvlnqchr zg qlerzpyylr. pt gxl olztgpol xl elozptlv ipgxpt gxl izyyr cs
azepr, htgpy xl xzv rlkhelv gxl rzsl elgelzg cs zyy. pt zwchg z scegtpuxg
gxl elozptvle cs gxl lopueztgr zeepqlv seco ltuyztv, ztv gxlm zyy elazpelv
gc qlerzpyylr; zazegoltgr ilel aelazelv sce gxl szopym cs gxl aecglkgce pt
gxl ueztv gepztct, ztv gxlel, zsgle gxl ldkpgloltg cs gxlrl lqltgr, il
elacrlv zopvrg gxl yhdheplr cs gxl vlazeglv wchewctr.

[1] kxcehr pt clvpahr kcyctlhr.




kxzagle q.
