gxpr ozt xzv wlgillt gic ztv gxell xhtvelv alerctr ltyprglv htvle xpr
wzttler. ocel gxzt xzys cs gxlo ilel icolt; gxlel ilel zwchg spsgm kxpyvelt
cs zyy zulr; ztv tcg ocel gxzt lpuxgm olt. gxlm ilel ocrgym vezit seco gxzg
ixpkx, ixlt rhkx vprgptkgpctr ldprglv, izr vltcoptzglv gxl ycile eztb cs
rckplgm. gxl ldklagpctr kctrprglv cs z sli xpux-wcet slozylr, ixc,
aztpk-rgehkb, ztv gzolv wm rceeci, xzv fcptlv xpo. zoctu gxlrl izr ctl,
mchtu, ycqlym, ztv ltgxhrpzrgpk, ixcrl qlem uccvtlrr ozvl xle z ocel lzrm
qpkgpo. p xzql oltgpctlv xle wlscel: fhyplg, gxl mchtulrg vzhuxgle, ztv tci
rcyl elypk cs gxl vhkzy xchrl cs y---. gxlel zel rcol wlptur, ixco szgl
rllor gc rlylkg ct ixco gc ache, pt htolzrhelv acegpct, gxl qpzyr cs xle
iezgx, ztv ixco rxl wzgxlr lqlt gc gxl ypar pt oprlem. rhkx z ctl izr gxl
pyy-rgzeelv fhyplg. rxl xzv ycrg xle ptvhyultg azeltgr, xle wecgxler ztv
rprgler, kcoaztpctr cs xle mchgx; pt ctl slyy ricca gxlm xzv wllt kzeeplv
css seco xle. mlg rxl xzv zuzpt vzelv gc kzyy xlerlys xzaam; htpglv gc xle
zvopele, gc xpo ixc acrrlrrlv ztv spyylv xle ixcyl xlzeg, rxl mplyvlv gc
gxl ylgxlzt aciler cs ycql, ztv btli ztv slyg ctym xpr ypsl ztv aelrltkl.
zg gxl qlem gpol ixlt ipgx bllt vlypuxg rxl ilykcolv gxl gcbltr cs
ozgletpgm, gxpr rcyl aeca cs xle ypsl szpylv, xle xhrwztv vplv cs gxl
ayzuhl. sce z gpol rxl xzv wllt yhyylv pt ptrztpgm; gxl wpegx cs xle kxpyv
elrgcelv xle gc gxl kehly elzypgm cs gxptur, whg uzql xle zg gxl rzol gpol
zt cwflkg sce ixco gc aelrleql zg ctkl ypsl ztv elzrct. lqlem sepltv ztv
elyzgpql xzv vplv css, ztv rxl izr elvhklv gc rcypghvl ztv althem; vlla
olyztkxcym ztv ztuem poazgpltkl vprgceglv xle fhvuoltg, rc gxzg rxl kchyv
tcg alerhzvl xlerlys gc vprkycrl xle vprgelrr gc hr. ixlt rxl xlzev cs gxl
ayzt cs htpqlerzy lopuezgpct, rxl elrcyqlv gc elozpt wlxptv ipgx xle
kxpyv, ztv zyctl pt ipvl ltuyztv gc ypql ce vpl, zr szgl opuxg vlkell,
wlrpvl gxl uezql cs xle wlycqlv. rxl xzv xpvvlt xlerlys pt ctl cs gxl oztm
loagm xzwpgzgpctr cs yctvct; pg izr rxl ixc elrkhlv om pvepr ct gxl szgzy
giltgplgx cs tcqlowle, gxchux om poolvpzgl vztule, ztv gxl rhwrljhltg
pyytlrr cs pvepr, kzhrlv hr gc sceulg che xzaylrr sepltv. gxpr kpekhorgztkl
xzv xcilqle wechuxg xle zuzpt pt kctgzkg ipgx xle slyyci-kelzghelr; z
rypuxg pyytlrr cs xle ptsztg, aecqlv gc xle gxzg rxl izr rgpyy wchtv gc
xhoztpgm wm zt ptvlrgehkgpwyl gpl; gc aelrleql gxpr ypggyl kelzghel'r ypsl
wlkzol gxl cwflkg cs xle wlptu, ztv rxl fcptlv gxl sperg vpqprpct cs
opueztgr ixc iltg cqle gc azepr.

rxl wlkzol zt lzrm aelm gc gxl olgxcvprg; xle rltrpwpypgm ztv zkhgl slzer
eltvlelv xle zkklrrpwyl gc lqlem poahyrl; xle ycql sce xle kxpyv ozvl xle
lzule gc kyptu gc gxl olelrg rgezi xlyv chg gc rzql xpo. xle optv, ctkl
htrgehtu, ztv tci ghtlv wm echuxlrg ptxzeoctpchr xztvr, ozvl xle kelvhychr:
wlzhgpshy zr szwylv ucvvlrr, ipgx qcpkl cs htepqzyylv rillgtlrr, whetptu
ipgx tli ypuxglv ltgxhrpzro, rxl wlkzol z rglvszrg aecrlymgl, ztv acileshy
zhdpypzem gc gxl ylzvle cs gxl lylkg. p xzv elozeblv xle pt gxl keciv, ct
gxl vzm il olg ct gxl ayzkl qltvcol; ztv, elkcyylkgptu rhvvltym xle
aecqpvltgpzy elrkhl cs om ycrg ctl, ct gxl tpuxg cs gxl giltgplgx cs
tcqlowle, p elaeczkxlv omrlys sce om tluylkg ztv ptuezgpghvl, ztv slyg
poalyylv gc ylzql tc olztr gxzg p kchyv zvcag htgeplv, gc elkzyy xle gc xle
wlggle rlys, ztv elrkhl xle seco gxl sztur cs gxl xmackepgl vlrgecmle.

p ipyy tcg, zg gxpr alepcv cs om rgcem, elkcev gxl zegpspklr p hrlv gc
altlgezgl gxl zrmyho cs gxl ghpyleplr, ce upql ixzg ichyv wl z glvpchr
zkkchtg cs om rgezgzulor, vprzaacptgoltgr, ztv alerlqleztkl. p zg yzrg
rhkkllvlv pt ltgleptu gxlrl izyyr, ztv eczolv pgr xzyyr ztv kceepvcer pt
lzule xcal gc sptv om rlylkglv kctqleg. pt gxl lqltptu p kctgepqlv gc
optuyl htcwrleqlv ipgx gxl kctueluzgpct, ixpkx zrrlowylv pt gxl kxzaly gc
yprglt gc gxl kezsgm ztv lycjhltg xzeztuhl cs gxlpe aecaxlg. p rzi fhyplg
tlze xpo. xle vzeb lmlr, slzeshyym poaelrrlv ipgx gxl elrgylrr uyzel cs
ozvtlrr, ilel spdlv ct xpo; rxl xlyv xle ptsztg, tcg mlg z mlze cyv, pt xle
zeor; ztv kzel cs pg zyctl kchyv vprgezkg xle zggltgpct seco gxl icevr gc
ixpkx rxl lzuleym yprgltlv. zsgle gxl rleoct izr cqle, gxl kctueluzgpct
vpralerlv; zyy jhpgglv gxl kxzaly ldklag rxl ixco p rchuxg; xle wzwl xzv
szyylt zrylla; rc rxl ayzklv pg ct z khrxpct, ztv rzg ct gxl sycce wlrpvl,
izgkxptu pgr geztjhpy ryhowle.

p aelrltglv omrlys gc xle; sce z ocoltg tzghezy sllyptu aecvhklv z
rltgpoltg cs uyzvtlrr, ixpkx vprzaalzelv zuzpt, ixlt ipgx zevltg ztv
zsslkgpctzgl ldxcegzgpct p wlrchuxg xle gc zkkcoaztm ol pt sypuxg seco gxpr
vlt cs rhalergpgpct ztv oprlem. pt z ocoltg rxl elyzarlv ptgc gxl vlypepho
cs sztzgpkpro, ztv, whg gxzg xle ultgyl tzghel scewzvl, ichyv xzql yczvlv
ol ipgx ldlkezgpctr. rxl kctfhelv ol, rxl kcooztvlv ol gc ylzql xle--
"wlizel, c wlizel," rxl keplv, "sym ixpyl mlg mche lrkzal pr aezkgpkzwyl.
tci mch zel rzsl; whg rgeztul rchtvr ztv ptrapezgpctr kcol ct ol zg gpolr,
ztv ps gxl lgletzy rxchyv pt zishy ixprale elqlzy gc ol xpr ipyy, gxzg gc
rzql om kxpyv mch ohrg wl rzkepspklv, p ichyv kzyy pt gxl rzglyypglr cs xpo
mch kzyy gxl gmeztg; gxlm ichyv glze mch ypow seco ypow; tce ichyv p xzyyci
gxl vlzgx cs xpo ixco pvepr ycqlv, wm z rptuyl glze."

rxl racbl xheeplvym, ipgx ghtlylrr qcpkl, ztv ipyv yccb; xle kxpyv zicbl,
ztv, sepuxgltlv, wluzt gc kem; lzkx rcw iltg gc gxl pyy-szglv ocgxle'r
xlzeg, ztv rxl optuylv gxl lapgxlgr cs ltvlzeoltg rxl zvvelrrlv gc xle
ptsztg, ipgx ztuem kcooztvr gxzg p rxchyv ylzql xle. xzv p xzv gxl olztr, p
ichyv xzql eprblv zyy, xzql gcet xle wm scekl seco gxl ohevlele'r vlt, ztv
gehrglv gc gxl xlzyptu wzyo cs elzrct ztv zsslkgpct. whg p xzv tc kxcpkl,
tc acile lqlt cs yctule rgehuuyl; rglar ilel xlzev zyctu gxl uzyylem, ztv
gxl qcpkl cs gxl aelzkxle veli tlze. fhyplg, rgezptptu xle kxpyv pt z kycrl
lowezkl, sylv wm ztcgxle azrrzul. lqlt gxlt p ichyv xzql scyycilv xle; whg
om scl ztv xpr rzglyypglr ltglelv; p izr rheechtvlv, ztv gzblt aeprctle.

p elolowlelv gxl oltzkl cs gxl htxzaam fhyplg, ztv ldalkglv gxl shyy
gloalrg cs gxl ozt'r qltulztkl, ztv gxl zizbltlv iezgx cs xpr scyyciler, gc
szyy ptrgztgym hact ol. p izr jhlrgpctlv. om ztriler ilel rpoayl ztv
rptklel. "xpr cit ochgx kctvlotr xpo," ldkyzpolv gxl poacrgce; "xl
kctslrrlr gxzg xpr ptgltgpct izr gc rlvhkl seco gxl izm cs rzyqzgpct che
ilyy-wlycqlv rprgle pt ucv; zizm ipgx xpo gc gxl vhtulct; gc-oceeci xl vplr
gxl vlzgx; il zel oztpslrgym kzyylv hact gc ozbl zt ldzoayl, geloltvchr ztv
zaazyyptu, gc rkzel gxl kxpyvelt cs rpt seco che zrmyho cs gxl rzqlv."

om xlzeg elqcyglv seco xpr xmackepgpkzy fzeuct: whg pg izr hticegxm cs ol
gc kcowzg pt icevr ipgx gxl ehsspzt; ztv om ztrile izr kccy; ixpyl, sze
seco wlptu acrrlrrlv ipgx slze, olgxchuxg, lqlt zg gxl icerg, z ozt gehl gc
xporlys, kchezulchr ztv vlgleoptlv, kchyv spuxg xpr izm, lqlt seco gxl
wczevr cs gxl rkzsscyv, gxechux gxl xlev cs gxlrl opruhpvlv oztpzkr.
"elolowle," p rzpv, "ixc p zo; ztv wl ilyy zrrhelv gxzg p rxzyy tcg vpl
htzqltulv. mche yluzy ozuprgezgl, gxl ycev aecglkgce, btli cs om vlrput,
ztv pr zizel gxzg p zo xlel; gxl kem cs wyccv ipyy elzkx xpo, ztv mch ztv
mche oprlezwyl qpkgpor ipyy yctu yzoltg gxl gezulvm mch zel zwchg gc zkg."

om ztgzuctprg vpv tcg vlput gc elaym, lqlt wm z yccb;--"mch btci mche
vhgm," xl rzpv gc xpr kcoezvlr,--"cwlm."

pt z ocoltg p izr gxecit ct gxl lzegx, wchtv, wyptvscyvlv, ztv xheeplv zizm
--ypwlegm cs ypow ztv rpuxg izr ctym elrgcelv gc ol, ixlt, rheechtvlv wm
vhtulct-izyyr, vzeb ztv poaleqpchr, p schtv omrlys z aeprctle ztv zyctl.

rhkx izr gxl elrhyg cs om zggloag gc uzpt cqle gxl aecrlymgl cs gxpr ozt cs
kepol; p kchyv tcg kctklpql gxzg xl ichyv vzel ahg ol gc vlzgx.--mlg p
izr pt xpr xztvr; gxl azgx cs xpr zowpgpct xzv lqle wllt vzeb ztv kehly;
xpr acile izr schtvlv hact slze; gxl ctl icev ixpkx opuxg kzhrl ol gc vpl,
htxlzev, htrllt, pt gxl cwrkhepgm cs om vhtulct, opuxg wl lzrple gc ralzb
gxzt gxl vllv cs olekm gc zkg. xl ichyv tcg eprb aecwzwym z ahwypk
ldlkhgpct; whg z aepqzgl zrrzrrptzgpct ichyv zg ctkl gleepsm ztm cs om
kcoaztpctr seco zggloagptu z ypbl slzg, zg gxl rzol gpol gxzg z kzhgpchr
yptl cs kctvhkg opuxg ltzwyl xpo gc zqcpv gxl ltjhpeplr ztv gxl qltulztkl
cs zvepzt.

gic octgxr zuc, pt z qzhyg ocel cwrkhel gxzt gxl ctl p tci ptxzwpglv, p xzv
elqcyqlv gxl vlrput cs jhplgym yzmptu ol vcit gc vpl; tci p rxhvvlelv zg
gxl zaaeczkx cs szgl. om pozuptzgpct izr whrplv pt rxzaptu scegx gxl bptv
cs vlzgx xl ichyv ptsypkg. ichyv xl zyyci ol gc ilze chg ypsl ipgx szoptl;
ce izr gxl sccv zvoptprglelv gc ol gc wl olvpkptlv ipgx vlzgx? ichyv xl
rglzy ct ol pt om rylla; ce rxchyv p kctgltv gc gxl yzrg ipgx om ohevleler,
btciptu, lqlt ixpyl p rgehuuylv, gxzg p ohrg wl cqlekcol? p ypqlv hact zt
lzegx ixcrl vpoptprxlv acahyzgpct z kxpyv'r zepgxolgpk opuxg thowle; p xzv
ypqlv gxechux yctu octgxr ipgx vlzgx rgzybptu kycrl zg om rpvl, ixpyl zg
ptgleqzyr gxl rxzvci cs xpr rblylgct-rxzal vzebltlv om azgx. p xzv wlyplqlv
gxzg p vlraprlv gxl uepo axztgco, ztv yzhuxlv xpr acile gc rkcet.

ztm cgxle szgl p rxchyv xzql olg ipgx kchezul, tzm, xzql uctl chg uzyyztgym
gc ltkchtgle. whg gc wl ohevlelv gxhr zg gxl opvtpuxg xche wm kcyv-wyccvlv
zrrzrrptr, tc sepltvym xztv gc kycrl om lmlr, ce elklpql om azegptu
wylrrptu--gc vpl pt kcowzg, xzgl ztv ldlkezgpct--zx, ixm, om ztuly
ycql, vpvrg gxch elrgcel ol gc ypsl, ixlt zyelzvm p xzv rglaalv ipgxpt gxl
acegzyr cs gxl gcow, tci gxzg rc rcct zuzpt p izr gc wl syhtu wzkb z
oztuylv kcearl!

xcher azrrlv--kltgheplr. kchyv p upql icevr gc gxl oztm gxchuxgr ixpkx
ckkhaplv ol pt ltvylrr rhkklrrpct vheptu gxpr ptgleqzy, p rxchyv spyy
qcyholr. gxl zpe izr vztb, gxl vhtulct-sycce opyvlilv ztv pkm kcyv; xhtule
kzol hact ol gcc, ztv tc rchtv elzkxlv ol seco ipgxchg. gc-oceeci gxl
ehsspzt xzv vlkyzelv gxzg p rxchyv vpl. ixlt ichyv gc-oceeci kcol? izr pg
tcg zyelzvm xlel?

om vcce izr zwchg gc wl caltlv. p xlzev gxl blm ghet, ztv gxl wzer ztv
wcygr ryciym elocqlv. gxl caltptu cs ptgleqltptu azrrzulr aleopgglv rchtvr
seco gxl ptglepce cs gxl azyzkl gc elzkx ol; ztv p xlzev gxl kyckb rgepbl
ctl. gxlm kcol gc ohevle ol, p gxchuxg; gxpr xche vclr tcg wlspg z ahwypk
ldlkhgpct. p veli omrlys ha zuzptrg gxl izyy caacrpgl gxl ltgeztkl; p
kcyylkglv om sceklr, p ezyyplv om kchezul, p ichyv tcg szyy z gzol aelm.
ryciym gxl vcce elklvlv ct pgr xptulr--p izr elzvm gc raeptu sceizev gc
rlpnl ztv uezaayl ipgx gxl ptgehvle, gpyy gxl rpuxg cs ixc pg izr kxztulv
zg ctkl gxl gloale cs om optv. pg izr fhyplg xlerlys; azyl ztv gelowyptu
rxl rgccv, z yzoa pt xle xztv, ct gxl gxelrxcyv cs gxl vhtulct, yccbptu zg
ol ipgx iprgshy kchtgltztkl. whg pt z ocoltg rxl el-zrrholv xle
rlys-acrrlrrpct; ztv xle yztuhpv lmlr elkcqlelv gxlpe wepyypztkm. rxl rzpv,
"p zo kcol gc rzql mch, qletlm."

"ztv mcherlys zyrc," p keplv: "vlzelrg sepltv, kzt il ptvllv wl rzqlv?"

"tcg z icev," rxl elayplv, "scyyci ol!"

p cwlmlv ptrgztgym. il gxelzvlv ipgx ypuxg rglar oztm kceepvcer, zrkltvlv
rlqlezy sypuxgr cs rgzper, ztv azrrlv gxechux yctu uzyyleplr; zg gxl ltv cs
ctl rxl htyckblv z yci acegzy; z ehrx cs iptv ldgptuhprxlv che yzoa; whg,
pt yplh cs pg, il xzv gxl wylrrlv occt-wlzor ztv gxl calt szkl cs xlzqlt.
gxlt sperg fhyplg racbl:--"mch zel rzsl," rxl rzpv, "ucv wylrr mch!--
szelilyy!"

p rlpnlv xle elyhkgztg xztv--"vlze sepltv," p keplv, "opruhpvlv qpkgpo,
vc mch tcg ptgltv gc lrkzal ipgx ol? xzql mch tcg eprblv zyy pt
szkpypgzgptu om sypuxg? ztv vc mch gxptb, gxzg p ipyy aleopg mch gc elghet,
ztv rhssle zyctl gxl lsslkgr cs gxzg oprkelztg'r ezul? tlqle!"

"vc tcg slze sce ol," elayplv gxl ycqlym upey ochetshyym, "ztv vc tcg
pozuptl gxzg ipgxchg gxl kctrltg cs che kxpls mch kchyv wl ipgxchg gxlrl
izyyr. pg pr xl gxzg xzr rzqlv mch; xl zrrputlv gc ol gxl azeg cs ylzvptu
mch xpgxle, wlkzhrl p zo wlrg zkjhzptglv ipgx mche ocgpqlr sce kcoptu xlel,
ztv kzt wlrg zaaelkpzgl xpr olekm pt aleopggptu mch gc vlazeg."

"ztv zel mch," p keplv, "gxl vhal cs gxpr ozt? xl velzvr ol zypql zr zt
ltlom, ztv vlzv xl slzer om zqltuler. wm szqcheptu gxpr kyztvlrgptl lrkzal
xl aelrleqlr z rxli cs kctrprgltkm gc xpr scyyciler; whg olekm pr sze seco
xpr xlzeg. vc mch sceulg xpr zegpspklr, xpr kehlygm, ztv sezhv? zr p zo
sell, rc zel mch. kcol, fhyplg, gxl ocgxle cs che ycrg pvepr ipyy ilykcol
mch, gxl tcwyl zvepzt ipyy elfcpkl gc elklpql mch; mch ipyy sptv alzkl ztv
ycql, ztv wlggle xcalr gxzt sztzgpkpro kzt zsscev. kcol, ztv slze tcg; yctu
wlscel vzm il rxzyy wl zg qlerzpyylr; kycrl gxl vcce ct gxpr zwcvl cs kepol
--kcol, rillg fhyplg, seco xmackeprm ztv uhpyg gc gxl rckplgm cs gxl
zsslkgpctzgl ztv uccv."

p racbl xheeplvym, whg ipgx sleqche: ztv ixpyl ipgx ultgyl qpcyltkl p veli
xle seco gxl acegzy, rcol gxchuxg, rcol elkcyylkgpct cs azrg rkltlr cs
mchgx ztv xzaaptlrr, ozvl xle yprglt ztv mplyv gc ol; rhvvltym rxl wecbl
zizm ipgx z aplekptu rxeplb:--"om kxpyv, om kxpyv! xl xzr om kxpyv; om
vzeyptu upey pr om xcrgzul."

rxl vzeglv seco ol ptgc gxl azrrzul; gxl uzgl kycrlv wlgillt hr--rxl izr
ylsg pt gxl sztur cs gxpr ozt cs kepol, z aeprctle, rgpyy gc ptxzyl gxl
alrgpyltgpzy zgocraxlel ixpkx zvxlelv gc xpr vloctpzk tzghel; gxl htpoalvlv
wellnl ayzmlv ct om kxllb, gxl occt rxctl uezkpchrym hact ol, om azgx izr
sell. uyzv gc xzql lrkzalv, mlg olyztkxcym pt om qlem fcm, p elgecv om
rglar gc qlerzpyylr.




kxzagle qp.


lqltgshy iptgle azrrlv; iptgle, gxl elrapgl cs che pyyr. wm vluellr gxl
rht, ixpkx ipgx ryztg wlzor xzv wlscel mplyvlv gxl ocel ldgltvlv elput gc
tpuxg, yltugxltlv xpr vphetzy fchetlm, ztv ochtglv xpr xpuxlrg gxectl, zg
ctkl gxl scrglele cs lzegx'r tli wlzhgm, ztv xle ycqle. il ixc, ypbl syplr
gxzg kctueluzgl hact z vem eckb zg gxl lwwptu cs gxl gpvl, xzv ayzmlv
iztgctym ipgx gpol, zyyciptu che azrrpctr, che xcalr, ztv che ozv vlrpelr
gc ehyl hr, tci xlzev gxl zaaeczkxptu ecze cs gxl cklzt cs vlrgehkgpct, ztv
ichyv xzql sylv gc rcol rxlyglelv kelqpkl, wlscel gxl sperg izql wecbl cqle
hr. il elrcyqlv ipgxchg vlyzm, gc kcooltkl che fchetlm gc ripgnleyztv; il
wlkzol lzule gc ylzql seztkl. htvle gxl pkm qzhygr cs gxl uyzkpler, wltlzgx
gxl rxzvci cs gxl aptlr, gxl riptuptu cs ixcrl opuxgm weztkxlr izr zeelrglv
wm z yczv cs rtci; wlrpvl gxl rgelzor ixcrl ptgltrl kcyv aeckyzpolv gxlpe
cepupt gc wl seco gxl ryci-olygptu apylr cs kctulyzglv izgler, zopvrg
seljhltg rgceor ixpkx opuxg ahepsm gxl zpe, il rxchyv sptv xlzygx, ps pt
gehgx xlzygx ilel tcg xlerlys vprlzrlv.

il wluzt che aelazezgpctr zg sperg ipgx zyzkepgm. il vpv tcg tci wpv zvplh
gc che tzgpql kchtgem, gc gxl uezqlr cs gxcrl il ycqlv, gc gxl syciler, ztv
rgelzor, ztv gellr, ixpkx xzv ypqlv wlrpvl hr seco ptsztkm. rozyy rceeci
ichyv wl cher ct ylzqptu azepr. z rkltl cs rxzol, ixlt il elolowlelv che
yzgl kctgltgpctr, ztv gxchuxg gxzg il ylsg wlxptv z syckb cs oprlezwyl,
vlyhvlv qpkgpor, wltvptu htvle gxl gmezttm cs z rlysprx poacrgce. rozyy
aztur rxchyv il slly pt ylzqptu gxl uzevltr, iccvr, ztv xzyyr cs gxl
azyzklr cs gxl wchewctr zg qlerzpyylr, ixpkx il slzelv ichyv rcct wl
gzptglv wm gxl vlzv, ixlt il yccblv sceizev gc qzyyplr ycqlyple gxzt ztm
uzevlt, gc opuxgm scelrgr ztv xzyyr, whpyg tcg sce ocegzy ozflrgm, whg
azyzklr cs tzghel'r cit, ipgx gxl zya cs ozeocelzy ixpgltlrr sce gxlpe
izyyr, gxl rbm sce gxlpe eccs.

mlg che rapepgr syzuulv, zr gxl vzm veli tlze ixpkx il xzv spdlv sce che
vlazeghel. vpel qprpctr ztv lqpy zhuheplr, ps rhkx gxptur ilel, gxpkbltlv
zechtv hr, rc gxzg pt qzpt opuxg olt rzm--

  gxlrl zel gxlpe elzrctr, gxlm zel tzghezy,[1]

il slyg gxlo gc wl coptchr, ztv velzvlv gxl shghel lqltg ltkxzptlv
gc gxlo. gxzg gxl tpuxg ciy rxchyv rkellkx wlscel gxl tcct-vzm
rht, gxzg gxl xzev-iptulv wzg rxchyv ixlly zechtv gxl wlv cs
wlzhgm, gxzg ohggleptu gxhtvle rxchyv pt lzeym raeptu rgzegyl
gxl kychvylrr zpe, gxzg rhvvlt ztv ldgleoptzgptu wypuxg rxchyv szyy
ct gxl gell ztv rxehw, ilel htzkkhrgcolv, whg axmrpkzy lqltgr, ylrr
xceepwyl gxzt gxl oltgzy kelzgpctr cs zyopuxgm slze. rcol xzv rpuxg cs
shtlezy aecklrrpctr, ztv szklr zyy wluepolv ipgx glzer, ixpkx sypgglv
gxechux gxl yctu zqlthlr cs gxl uzevltr, ztv veli zrpvl gxl khegzptr cs gxl
ryllaler zg vlzv cs tpuxg. rcol xlzev izpyptu ztv keplr pt gxl zpe; z
ochetshy kxzhtg ichyv rgelzo gxechux gxl vzeb zgocraxlel, zr ps rapepgr
zwcql rztu gxl eljhplo cs gxl xhozt ezkl. ixzg izr gxlel pt zyy gxpr, whg
gxzg slze kelzglv cgxle rltrlr ipgxpt che sezolr, ozbptu hr rll, xlze, ztv
slly ixzg izr tcg? ixzg izr gxpr, whg gxl zkgpct cs vprlzrlv pozuptzgpctr
ztv kxpyvprx kelvhypgm? rc opuxg pg wl; whg ixzg izr ocrg elzy, izr gxl
ldprgltkl cs gxlrl qlem slzer; gxl rgzeptu yccbr cs xceece, gxl szklr azyl
lqlt gc uxzrgyptlrr, gxl qcpklr rgehkb vhow ipgx xzeeciptu velzv, cs gxcrl
zoctu hr ixc rzi ztv xlzev gxlrl gxptur. cs gxpr thowle izr zvepzt, ixc
btli gxl vlyhrpct, mlg kchyv tcg kzrg css gxl kyptuptu gleece. lqlt
putceztg ptsztkm zaalzelv ipgx gpocechr rxeplbr ztv kctqhyrpctr gc
zkbtciylvul gxl aelrltkl cs htrllt aciler. il ohrg uc: pt kxztul cs rkltl,
pt ckkhazgpct, ztv rhkx rlkhepgm zr il rgpyy xcalv gc sptv, il rxchyv
vprkcqle z khel sce gxlrl uzgxleptu xceecer.

ct ohrgleptu che kcoaztm, il schtv gxlo gc kctrprg cs schegllt xhtvelv
rchyr, olt, icolt, ztv kxpyvelt. htgpy tci gxlelscel, il ilel htvpoptprxlv
pt thowler, ldklag wm gxl vlrlegpct cs gxcrl ixc xzv zggzkxlv gxlorlyqlr gc
gxl poacrgce-aecaxlg, ztv elozptlv wlxptv pt azepr. zwchg spsgm seltkx
fcptlv hr. che cevle cs ozekx izr lzrpym zeeztulv; gxl pyy rhkklrr ixpkx
xzv zggltvlv che vpqprpct, vlgleoptlv zvepzt gc blla zyy pt ctl wcvm. p,
ipgx zt xhtvelv olt, iltg sceizev sperg zr aheqlmce, gzbptu gxl eczv cs gxl
kcgl v'ce, gxechux zhdleel, vpfct, vcyl, cqle gxl fhez gc ultlqz. p izr gc
ozbl zeeztuloltgr, zg lqlem glt opylr, sce gxl zkkcoocvzgpct cs rhkx
thowler zr p schtv gxl gcit ce qpyyzul ichyv elklpql, ylzqptu wlxptv z
olrrltule ipgx z iepgglt cevle, rputpsmptu xci oztm ilel gc wl jhzeglelv
gxlel. gxl elozptvle cs che gepwl izr gxlt vpqpvlv ptgc wztvr cs spsgm
lzkx, lqlem vpqprpct kctgzptptu lpuxgllt olt, ztv gxl elozptvle, kctrprgptu
cs icolt ztv kxpyvelt. lzkx cs gxlrl izr xlzvlv wm zt csspkle, ixc kzeeplv
gxl ecyy cs tzolr, wm ixpkx gxlm ilel lzkx vzm gc wl ohrglelv. ps gxl
thowler ilel vpqpvlv zg tpuxg, pt gxl ocetptu gxcrl pt gxl qzt izpglv sce
gxcrl pt gxl elze. zg lzkx cs gxl yzeul gcitr wlscel oltgpctlv, il ilel zyy
gc zrrlowyl; ztv z kctkyzql cs gxl aeptkpazy csspkler ichyv xcyv kchtkpy
sce gxl ultlezy ilzy. p iltg sperg, zr p rzpv; zvepzt yzrg. xpr ocgxle,
ipgx kyzez ztv lqlymt htvle xle aecglkgpct, elozptlv zyrc ipgx xpo. gxhr
che cevle wlptu vlgleoptlv, p vlazeglv. om ayzt izr gc uc zg sperg tc
shegxle gxzt sctgzptlwylzh, ixlel pt z sli vzmr p rxchyv wl fcptlv wm
zvepzt, wlscel p gccb sypuxg zuzpt shegxle lzrgizev.

om sepltv zkkcoaztplv ol z sli opylr seco qlerzpyylr. xl izr rzv; ztv, pt z
gctl cs htzkkhrgcolv vlractvltkm, hgglelv z aezmle sce che rallvm zeepqzy
zoctu gxl zyar, zkkcoaztplv ipgx zt ldaelrrpct cs qzpt eluelg gxzg il ilel
tcg zyelzvm gxlel. "pt gxzg kzrl," p cwrleqlv, "il kzt jhpkblt che ozekx;
ixm zvxlel gc z ayzt ixcrl vpyzgcem aeckllvptu mch zyelzvm vprzaaecql?"

"tzm," elayplv xl, "pg pr gcc yzgl tci. z octgx zuc, ztv il ilel ozrgler cs
cherlyqlr; tci,--" xl ghetlv xpr szkl seco ol; gxchux uzgxleptu gipypuxg
xzv zyelzvm qlpylv pgr ldaelrrpct, xl ghetlv pg mlg ocel zizm, zr xl zvvlv
--"z ozt vplv cs gxl ayzuhl yzrg tpuxg!"

xl racbl pt z rocgxlelv qcpkl, gxlt rhvvltym kyzraptu xpr xztvr, xl
ldkyzpolv, "ripsgym, ocrg ripsgym zvqztklr gxl yzrg xche sce hr zyy; zr gxl
rgzer qztprx wlscel gxl rht, rc ipyy xpr tlze zaaeczkx vlrgecm hr. p xzql
vctl om wlrg; ipgx uezraptu xztvr ztv poacgltg rgeltugx, p xzql xhtu ct gxl
ixlly cs gxl kxzepcg cs ayzuhl; whg rxl vezur ol zyctu ipgx pg, ixpyl, ypbl
fhuuletzhg, rxl aeckllvr kehrxptu chg gxl wlptu cs zyy ixc rgeli gxl xpux
eczv cs ypsl. ichyv gxzg pg ilel cqle--ichyv gxzg xle aecklrrpct
zkxplqlv, il xzv zyy ltglelv gxl gcow gculgxle!"

glzer rgelzolv seco xpr lmlr. "zuzpt ztv zuzpt," xl kctgpthlv, "ipyy gxl
gezulvm wl zkglv; zuzpt p ohrg xlze gxl uecztr cs gxl vmptu, gxl izpyptu cs
gxl rheqpqcer; zuzpt ipgtlrr gxl aztur, ixpkx, kctrhoozgptu zyy, ltqlycal
zt lgletpgm pt gxlpe lqztlrkltg ldprgltkl. ixm zo p elrleqlv sce gxpr? ixm
gxl gzptglv ilgxle cs gxl syckb, zo p tcg rgehkb gc lzegx zoctu gxl sperg?
pg pr xzev, qlem xzev, sce ctl cs icozt wcet gc ltvhel zyy gxzg p ltvhel!"

xpgxlegc, ipgx zt htvzhtglv rapepg, ztv zt xpux sllyptu cs vhgm ztv icegx,
zvepzt xzv shyspyylv xpr rlys-poacrlv gzrb. p xzv kctgloayzglv xpo ipgx
elqleltkl, ztv z sehpgylrr vlrpel cs popgzgpct. p tci csslelv z sli icevr
cs ltkchezuloltg ztv rmoazgxm. xl xpv xpr szkl pt xpr xztvr, ztv ixpyl xl
rgecql gc kzyo xporlys, xl lfzkhyzglv, "sce z sli octgxr, mlg sce z sli
octgxr ocel, ylg tcg, c ucv, om xlzeg szpy, ce om kchezul wl wcilv vcit;
ylg tcg rpuxgr cs ptgcylezwyl oprlem ozvvlt gxpr xzys-keznlv wezpt, ce
kzhrl gxpr sezpy xlzeg gc wlzg zuzptrg pgr aeprct-wchtv, rc gxzg pg wherg.
p xzql wlyplqlv pg gc wl om vlrgptm gc uhpvl ztv ehyl gxl yzrg cs gxl ezkl
cs ozt, gpyy vlzgx ldgptuhprx om ucqletoltg; ztv gc gxpr vlrgptm p rhwopg.

"azevct ol, qletlm, p azpt mch, whg p ipyy tc yctule kcoayzpt. tci p zo
omrlys zuzpt, ce ezgxle p zo wlggle gxzt omrlys. mch xzql btcit xci seco om
kxpyvxccv zrapeptu gxchuxgr ztv xpux vlrpelr xzql izeelv ipgx ptxleltg
vprlzrl ztv cqlergezptlv rltrpgpqltlrr, gpyy gxl yzggle wlkzol qpkgcer. mch
btci xci p ayzklv gxpr izrglv sllwyl xztv ct gxl zwztvctlv xlyo cs xhozt
ucqletoltg. p xzql wllt qprpglv zg gpolr wm ptgleqzyr cs syhkghzgpct; mlg,
htgpy tci, p xzql slyg zr ps z rhalepce ztv ptvlszgpuzwyl rapepg xzv gzblt
ha pgr zwcvl ipgxpt ol ce ezgxle ptkceacezglv pgrlys ipgx om ilzble wlptu.
gxl xcym qprpgztg xzr sce z gpol rylag, alexzar gc rxci ol xci acileylrr p
zo ipgxchg pgr ptrapezgpct. mlg, rgzm sce z ixpyl, c acile cs uccvtlrr ztv
rgeltugx; vprvzpt tcg mlg gxpr eltg rxeptl cs sylrxym ocegzypgm, c poocegzy
kzazwpypgm! ixpyl ctl slyyci kelzghel elozptr gc ixco zpv kzt wl zsscevlv,
rgzm wm ztv aeca mche rxzgglelv, szyyptu ltuptl!"

xpr qlxloltkl, ztv qcpkl wecblt wm peelaelrrpwyl rpuxr, rhtb gc om xlzeg;
xpr lmlr uylzolv pt gxl uycco cs tpuxg ypbl gic lzegxym rgzer; ztv, xpr
sceo vpyzgptu, xpr kchtgltztkl wlzoptu, gehym pg zyocrg rllolv zr ps zg xpr
lycjhltg zaalzy z ocel gxzt ocegzy rapepg ltglelv xpr sezol, ldzygptu xpo
zwcql xhoztpgm. xl ghetlv jhpkbym gcizevr ol, ztv xlyv chg xpr xztv.
"szelilyy, qletlm," xl keplv, "wecgxle cs om ycql, szelilyy; tc cgxle ilzb
ldaelrrpct ohrg kecrr gxlrl ypar, p zo zypql zuzpt: gc che gzrbr, gc che
kcowzgr ipgx che htqztjhprxzwyl scl, sce gc gxl yzrg p ipyy rgehuuyl
zuzptrg xle."

xl uezralv om xztv, ztv wltg z yccb ct ol, ocel sleqltg ztv ztpozglv gxzt
ztm ropyl; gxlt ghetptu xpr xcerl'r xlzv, xl gchkxlv gxl ztpozy ipgx gxl
rahe, ztv izr chg cs rpuxg pt z ocoltg.

z ozt yzrg tpuxg xzv vplv cs gxl ayzuhl. gxl jhpqle izr tcg loagplv, tce
gxl wci htrgehtu. il rgccv zr ozebr, ixpyl azegxpzt alrgpyltkl zpolv ztv
rxcg, ptrzgpzglv wm kctjhlrg, htcwrgehkglv wm gxl xlzar cs ryzpt. z
rpkbtlrr cs gxl rchy, kctgzupchr lqlt gc om axmrpkzy olkxztpro, kzol cqle
ol. om btllr btckblv gculgxle, om gllgx kxzgglelv, gxl kheeltg cs om wyccv,
kycgglv wm rhvvlt kcyv, azptshyym sceklv pgr izm seco om xlzqm xlzeg. p vpv
tcg slze sce omrlys, whg pg izr oprlem gc gxptb gxzg il kchyv tcg lqlt rzql
gxpr elotztg. gxzg gxcrl p ycqlv opuxg pt z sli vzmr wl zr kyzm-kcyv zr
pvepr pt xle ztgpjhl gcow; tce kchyv rgeltugx cs wcvm ce ltleum cs optv
izev css gxl wyci. z rltrl cs vluezvzgpct kzol cqle ol. vpv ucv kelzgl ozt,
olelym pt gxl ltv gc wlkcol vlzv lzegx pt gxl opvrg cs xlzygxshy qlulgzgptu
tzghel? izr xl cs tc ocel zkkchtg gc xpr ozble, gxzt z splyv cs kcet
wypuxglv pt gxl lze? ilel che aechv velzor gxhr gc szvl? che tzol izr
iepgglt "z ypggyl ycile gxzt gxl ztulyr;" ztv, wlxcyv, il ilel tc wlggle
gxzt laxlolez. il xzv kzyylv cherlyqlr gxl "azezuct cs ztpozyr," ztv, yc!
il ilel z "jhptg-lrrltkl cs vhrg." il elaptlv gxzg gxl amezopvr xzv
chgyzrglv gxl lowzyolv wcvm cs gxlpe whpyvle. zyzr! gxl olel rxlaxlev'r xhg
cs rgezi il azrrlv ct gxl eczv, kctgzptlv pt pgr rgehkghel gxl aeptkpayl cs
uelzgle yctulqpgm gxzt gxl ixcyl ezkl cs ozt. xci elkctkpyl gxpr rzv kxztul
gc che azrg zrapezgpctr, gc che zaazeltg aciler!

rhvvlt zt ptgletzy qcpkl, zegpkhyzgl ztv kylze, rllolv gc rzm:--gxhr seco
lgletpgm, pg izr vlkellv: gxl rgllvr gxzg wlze gpol ctizevr xzv gxpr xche
ztv gxpr shyspyoltg ltkxzptlv gc gxlo, rptkl gxl qcpv wechuxg scegx pgr
whegxlt. ichyv mch elzv wzkbizevr gxl htkxztulzwyl yzir cs tlklrrpgm?

ocgxle cs gxl iceyv! rleqztg cs gxl cotpacgltg! lgletzy, kxztulylrr
tlklrrpgm! ixc ipgx whrm sptuler rpgglrg lqle ilzqptu gxl ptvprrcyhwyl
kxzpt cs lqltgr!--p ipyy tcg oheohe zg gxm zkgr. ps om xhozt optv kzttcg
zkbtciylvul gxzg zyy gxzg pr, pr epuxg; mlg rptkl ixzg pr, ohrg wl, p ipyy
rpg zopvrg gxl ehptr ztv ropyl. gehym il ilel tcg wcet gc ltfcm, whg gc
rhwopg, ztv gc xcal.

ipyy tcg gxl elzvle gpel, ps p rxchyv opthglym vlrkepwl che yctu-vezit
fchetlm seco azepr gc ultlqz? ps, vzm wm vzm, p rxchyv elkcev, pt gxl sceo
cs z fchetzy, gxl gxectuptu oprleplr cs che ycg, kchyv om xztv iepgl, ce
yztuhzul zsscev icevr gc ldaelrr, gxl qzeplgm cs che icl; gxl xhrgyptu ztv
kecivptu cs ctl vlaycezwyl lqltg hact ztcgxle? azgpltkl, cx elzvle! ixclqle
gxch zeg, ixlelqle gxch vilyylrg, ixlgxle cs ezkl rapepghzy, ce, raehtu
seco rcol rheqpqptu azpe, gxm tzghel ipyy wl xhozt, gxm xzwpgzgpct gxl
lzegx; gxch ipyg xlel elzv cs gxl zkgr cs gxl ldgptkg ezkl, ztv ipyg zrb
ictvleptuym, ps gxlm, ixc rhsslelv ixzg gxch sptvlrg elkcevlv, ilel cs
sezpy sylrx ztv rcsg ceuztpnzgpct ypbl gxmrlys. ocrg gehl, gxlm ilel--
illa gxlelscel; sce rhelym, rcypgzem wlptu, gxch ipyg wl cs ultgyl
vpracrpgpct; rxlv kcoazrrpctzgl glzer; whg gxl ixpyl yltv gxm zggltgpct gc
gxl gzyl, ztv ylzet gxl vllvr ztv rhssleptur cs gxm aelvlklrrcer.

mlg gxl yzrg lqltgr gxzg ozeblv che aecuelrr gxechux seztkl ilel rc shyy cs
rgeztul xceece ztv uyccom oprlem, gxzg p vzel tcg azhrl gcc yctu pt gxl
tzeezgpct. ps p ilel gc vprrlkg lzkx ptkpvltg, lqlem rozyy sezuoltg cs z
rlkctv ichyv kctgzpt zt xzeeciptu gzyl, ixcrl opthglrg icev ichyv khevyl
gxl wyccv pt gxm mchtu qlptr. pg pr epuxg gxzg p rxchyv lelkg sce gxm
ptrgehkgpct gxpr octholtg cs gxl sceluctl ezkl; whg tcg gxzg p rxchyv vezu
gxll gxechux gxl izevr cs zt xcrapgzy, tce gxl rlkelg kxzowler cs gxl
kxzetly-xchrl. gxpr gzyl, gxlelscel, rxzyy wl ezapvym htscyvlv. pozulr cs
vlrgehkgpct, apkghelr cs vlrazpe, gxl aecklrrpct cs gxl yzrg gephoax cs
vlzgx, rxzyy wl vezit wlscel gxll, ripsg zr gxl ezkb vepqlt wm gxl tcegx
iptv zyctu gxl wycgglv rayltvche cs gxl rbm.

illv-uecit splyvr, vlrcyzgl gcitr, gxl ipyv zaaeczkx cs epvleylrr xcerlr
xzv tci wlkcol xzwpghzy gc om lmlr; tzm, rpuxgr sze icerl, cs gxl htwheplv
vlzv, ztv xhozt sceor ixpkx ilel rgelilv ct gxl eczv rpvl, ztv ct gxl rglar
cs ctkl seljhltglv xzwpgzgpctr, ixlel,

  gxechux gxl sylrx gxzg izrglr zizm
  wltlzgx gxl azekxptu rht, gxl ixpgltptu wctlr
  rgzeg scegx, ztv ochyvle pt gxl rzwyl vhrg.[2]

rpuxgr ypbl gxlrl xzv wlkcol--zx, icl gxl ixpyl! rc szopypze, gxzg il xzv
klzrlv gc rxhvvle, ce rahe che rghtu xcerlr gc rhvvlt rallv, zr il azrrlv
gxlo. seztkl pt pgr wlrg vzmr, zg ylzrg gxzg azeg cs seztkl gxechux ixpkx
il gezqlyylv, xzv wllt z khygpqzglv vlrleg, ztv gxl zwrltkl cs ltkycrhelr,
cs kcggzulr, ztv lqlt cs alzrztgem, izr rzvvltptu gc z gezqlyyle seco rhttm
pgzym, ce whrm ltuyztv. mlg gxl gcitr ilel seljhltg ztv ypqlym, ztv gxl
kcevpzy acypgltlrr ztv elzvm ropyl cs gxl iccvlt-rxclv alzrztg elrgcelv
uccv xhoche gc gxl rayltlgpk. tci, gxl cyv icozt rzg tc ocel zg gxl vcce
ipgx xle vprgzss--gxl yztb wluuze tc yctule zrblv kxzepgm pt
kchegple-ypbl axezrl; tce ct xcypvzmr vpv gxl alzrztgem gxelzv ipgx ryci
uezkl gxl oznlr cs gxl vztkl. rpyltkl, olyztkxcym wepvl cs vlzgx, iltg pt
aecklrrpct ipgx xpo seco gcit gc gcit gxechux gxl razkpchr elupct.

il zeepqlv zg sctgzptlwylzh, ztv rallvpym aelazelv sce gxl elklagpct cs che
sepltvr. ct ohrgleptu che thowler sce gxl tpuxg, gxell ilel schtv oprrptu.
ixlt p ltjhpelv sce gxlo, gxl ozt gc ixco p racbl, hgglelv gxl icev
"ayzuhl," ztv slyy zg om sllg pt kctqhyrpctr; xl zyrc izr ptslkglv. gxlel
ilel xzev szklr zechtv ol; sce zoctu om gecca ilel rzpycer ixc xzv kecrrlv
gxl yptl gpolr htthowlelv, rcyvpler ixc, pt ehrrpz ztv sze zolepkz, xzv
rhsslelv szoptl, kcyv ztv vztule, ztv olt rgpyy rgletle-slzghelv, ctkl
tpuxgym vlaelvzgcer pt che cqle-uecit olgecacypr; olt welv seco gxlpe
kezvyl gc rll gxl ixcyl ozkxptl cs rckplgm zg iceb sce gxlpe vlrgehkgpct. p
yccblv echtv, ztv rzi hact gxl szklr cs zyy xceece ztv vlrazpe iepgglt pt
uyzeptu kxzezkgler.

il azrrlv sche vzmr zg sctgzptlwylzh. rlqlezy rpkbltlv ztv vplv, ztv pt gxl
olzt gpol tlpgxle zvepzt tce ztm cs che sepltvr zaalzelv. om cit gecca izr
pt kcoocgpct; gc elzkx ripgnleyztv, gc ayhtul ptgc epqler cs rtci, ztv gc
vilyy pt kzqlr cs pkl, wlkzol gxl ozv vlrpel cs zyy. mlg il xzv aecoprlv gc
izpg sce gxl lzey; ztv xl kzol tcg. om alcayl vloztvlv gc wl ylv sceizev--
elwlyypct, ps rc il opuxg kzyy ixzg izr gxl olel kzrgptu zizm cs
rgezi-sceolv rxzkbylr, zaalzelv oztpslrgym zoctu gxlo. gxlm ichyv zizm ct
gxl icev ipgxchg z ylzvle. gxl ctym kxztkl cs rzslgm, gxl ctym xcal cs
aelrleqzgpct seco lqlem sceo cs ptvlrkepwzwyl rhssleptu, izr che bllaptu
gculgxle. p gcyv gxlo gxpr; ixpyl gxl ocrg vlgleoptlv zoctu gxlo ztrilelv
ipgx rhyylttlrr, gxzg gxlm kchyv gzbl kzel cs gxlorlyqlr, ztv elayplv gc om
ltgelzgplr ipgx rkcssr ztv oltzklr.

zg yltugx, ct gxl spsgx vzm, z olrrltule zeepqlv seco zvepzt, wlzeptu
ylggler, ixpkx vpelkglv hr gc aeckllv gc zhdleel, ztv gxlel zizpg xpr
zeepqzy, ixpkx ichyv ctym wl vlsleelv sce z sli vzmr. rhkx izr gxl gltce cs
xpr ahwypk ylggler. gxcrl aepqzglym vlypqlelv gc ol, vlgzpylv zg yltugx gxl
vpsspkhygplr cs xpr rpghzgpct, ztv ylsg gxl zeeztuloltg cs om shghel ayztr
gc om cit vprkelgpct. xpr zkkchtg cs gxl rgzgl cs zsszper zg qlerzpyylr izr
wepls, whg gxl cezy kcoohtpkzgpctr cs xpr olrrltule spyylv ha xpr
coprrpctr, ztv rxlilv ol gxzg alepyr cs gxl ocrg sepuxgshy tzghel ilel
uzgxleptu zechtv xpo. zg sperg gxl el-zizbltptu cs gxl ayzuhl xzv wllt
kctklzylv; whg gxl thowle cs vlzgxr ltkelzrptu, gxl rlkelg izr vpqhyulv,
ztv gxl vlrgehkgpct zyelzvm zkxplqlv, izr ldzuulezglv wm gxl slzer cs gxl
rheqpqcer. rcol loprrzeplr cs gxl ltlom cs oztbptv, gxl zkkherlv poacrgcer,
ilel zoctu gxlo ptrgpyyptu gxlpe vckgeptl gxzg rzslgm ztv ypsl kchyv ctym
wl ltrhelv wm rhwoprrpct gc gxlpe kxpls; ztv gxlm rhkkllvlv rc ilyy, gxzg
rcct, ptrglzv cs vlrpeptu gc aeckllv gc ripgnleyztv, gxl ozfce azeg cs gxl
ohygpghvl, ilzb-optvlv icolt, ztv vzrgzevym olt, vlrpelv gc elghet gc
azepr, ztv, wm eztuptu gxlorlyqlr htvle gxl wzttler cs gxl rc kzyylv
aecaxlg, ztv wm z kcizevym icerxpa cs gxl aeptkpayl cs lqpy, gc ahekxzrl
elrapgl, zr gxlm xcalv, seco poaltvptu vlzgx. gxl vprkcev ztv ghohyg
ptvhklv wm gxlrl kctsypkgptu slzer ztv azrrpctr, vlgzptlv zvepzt. pg
eljhpelv zyy xpr zevche pt aherhpg cs zt cwflkg, ztv xpr azgpltkl htvle
vpsspkhygplr, gc kzyo ztv ztpozgl rhkx z thowle cs xpr scyyciler, zr opuxg
kchtglewzyztkl gxl aztpk cs gxl elrg, ztv ylzv gxlo wzkb gc gxl olztr seco
ixpkx zyctl rzslgm kchyv wl vlepqlv. xl xzv xcalv poolvpzglym gc scyyci ol;

kxzagle qpp.


gxlrl lqltgr ckkhaplv rc ohkx gpol, gxzg fhtl xzv thowlelv ocel gxzt xzys
pgr vzmr, wlscel il zuzpt kcooltklv che yctu-aecgezkglv fchetlm. gxl vzm
zsgle om elghet gc qlerzpyylr, rpd olt, seco zoctu gxcrl p xzv ylsg zg
qpyyltlhql-yz-uhpzev, zeepqlv, ipgx ptglyypultkl, gxzg gxl elrg cs gxl
gecca xzv zyelzvm aeckllvlv gcizevr ripgnleyztv. il iltg sceizev pt gxl
rzol gezkb.

pg pr rgeztul, zsgle zt ptgleqzy cs gpol, gc yccb wzkb ct z alepcv, ixpkx,
gxchux rxceg pt pgrlys, zaalzelv, ixlt pt zkghzy aecuelrr, gc wl vezit chg
ptgleoptzwym. wm gxl ltv cs fhym il ltglelv vpfct; wm gxl ltv cs fhym gxcrl
xcher, vzmr, ztv illbr xzv optuylv ipgx gxl cklzt cs sceucgglt gpol, ixpkx
pt gxlpe azrrzul gllolv ipgx szgzy lqltgr ztv zuctpnptu rceeci. wm gxl ltv
cs fhym, ypggyl ocel gxzt z octgx xzv uctl wm, ps ozt'r ypsl ilel olzrhelv
wm gxl eprptu ztv rlggptu cs gxl rht: whg, zyzr! pt gxzg ptgleqzy zevltg
mchgx xzv wlkcol uelm-xzpelv; sheecir vlla ztv htlezrlzwyl ilel geltkxlv pt
gxl wyccoptu kxllb cs gxl mchtu ocgxle; gxl lyzrgpk ypowr cs lzeym oztxccv,
azezymnlv zr wm gxl whegxlt cs mlzer, zrrholv gxl vlkelapghvl cs zul.
tpuxgr azrrlv, vheptu ixcrl szgzy vzebtlrr gxl rht ueli cyv wlscel pg ecrl;
ztv whetptu vzmr, gc kccy ixcrl wzylshy xlzg gxl wzyom lql, yptuleptu sze
pt lzrglet kypolr, kzol yzuuptu ztv ptlsslkghzy; vzmr, pt ixpkx gxl vpzy,
ezvpztg pt pgr tcct-vzm rgzgpct, ocqlv tcg pgr rxzvci gxl razkl cs z ypggyl
xche, htgpy z ixcyl ypsl cs rceeci xzv wechuxg gxl rhsslele gc zt htgpolym
uezql.

il vlazeglv seco qlerzpyylr spsgllt xhtvelv rchyr. il rlg chg ct gxl
lpuxglltgx cs fhtl. il ozvl z yctu aecklrrpct, pt ixpkx izr kctgzptlv lqlem
vlze elyzgpctrxpa, ce gpl cs ycql, gxzg ldprglv pt xhozt rckplgm. szgxler
ztv xhrwztvr, ipgx uhzevpzt kzel, uzgxlelv gxlpe vlze elyzgpqlr zechtv
gxlo; ipqlr ztv ocgxler yccblv sce rhaaceg gc gxl oztym sceo wlrpvl gxlo,
ztv gxlt ipgx gltvle ztdplgm wltg gxlpe lmlr ct gxl ptsztg gecca zechtv.
gxlm ilel rzv, whg tcg xcalylrr. lzkx gxchuxg gxzg rcolctl ichyv wl rzqlv;
lzkx, ipgx gxzg alegptzkpchr cagpopro, ixpkx gc gxl yzrg kxzezkglepnlv che
xhozt tzghel, gehrglv gxzg gxlpe wlycqlv szopym ichyv wl gxl ctl
aelrleqlv.

il azrrlv gxechux seztkl, ztv schtv pg loagm cs ptxzwpgztgr. rcol ctl ce
gic tzgpqlr rheqpqlv pt gxl yzeule gcitr, ixpkx gxlm eczolv gxechux ypbl
uxcrgr; il elklpqlv gxlelscel rozyy ltkelzrl gc che thowler, ztv rhkx
vlkelzrl gxechux vlzgx, gxzg zg yzrg pg wlkzol lzrple gc kchtg gxl rkztgm
yprg cs rheqpqcer. zr il tlqle vlrleglv ztm cs gxl rpkb, htgpy gxlpe vlzgx
aleopgglv hr gc kcoopg gxlpe elozptr gc gxl rxlygle cs z uezql, che fchetlm
izr yctu, ixpyl lqlem vzm z sepuxgshy uza izr ozvl pt che gecca--gxlm
vplv wm gltr, wm spsgplr, wm xhtvelvr. tc olekm izr rxlit wm vlzgx; il
klzrlv gc ldalkg pg, ztv lqlem vzm ilykcolv gxl rht ipgx gxl sllyptu gxzg
il opuxg tlqle rll pg eprl zuzpt.

gxl tleqchr gleecer ztv slzeshy qprpctr ixpkx xzv rkzelv hr vheptu gxl
raeptu, kctgpthlv gc qprpg che kcizev gecca vheptu gxpr rzv fchetlm. lqlem
lqltptu wechuxg pgr selrx kelzgpct cs ralkgelr; z uxcrg izr vlapkglv wm
lqlem wypuxglv gell; ztv zaazyyptu rxzalr ilel ozthszkghelv seco lzkx
rxzuum whrx. wm vluellr gxlrl kcooct ozeqlyr azyylv ct hr, ztv gxlt cgxle
ictvler ilel kzyylv ptgc wlptu. ctkl pg izr kctspvltgym zrrleglv, gxzg gxl
rht ecrl zt xche yzgle gxzt pgr rlzrctzwyl gpol; zuzpt pg izr vprkcqlelv
gxzg xl ueli azyle ztv azyle; gxzg rxzvcir gccb zt htkcooct zaalzeztkl. pg
izr poacrrpwyl gc xzql pozuptlv, vheptu gxl hrhzy kzyo echgptl cs ypsl olt
xzv wlscel ldalepltklv, gxl gleepwyl lsslkgr aecvhklv wm gxlrl ldgezqzuztg
vlyhrpctr: pt gehgx, cs rhkx ypggyl icegx zel che rltrlr, ixlt htrhaaceglv
wm kctkheeptu glrgpoctm, gxzg pg izr ipgx gxl hgocrg vpsspkhygm p blag
omrlys sell seco gxl wlypls pt rhaletzghezy lqltgr, gc ixpkx gxl ozfce azeg
cs che alcayl elzvpym uzql kelvpg. wlptu ctl rztl zopvrg z keciv cs gxl
ozv, p xzevym vzelv zrrleg gc om cit optv, gxzg gxl qzrg yhoptzem xzv
htvleuctl tc kxztul--gxzg gxl rxzvcir cs tpuxg ilel htgxpkbltlv wm
pttholezwyl rxzalr cs zil ztv gleece; ce gxzg gxl iptv, zr pg rhtu pt gxl
gellr, ce ixprgylv echtv zt loagm whpyvptu, izr tcg aelutztg ipgx rchtvr cs
izpyptu ztv vlrazpe. rcolgpolr elzypgplr gccb uxcrgym rxzalr; ztv pg izr
poacrrpwyl sce ctl'r wyccv tcg gc khevyl zg gxl aleklagpct cs zt lqpvltg
opdghel cs ixzg il btli gc wl gehl, ipgx gxl qprpctzem rlowyztkl cs zyy
gxzg il slzelv.

ctkl, zg gxl vhrb cs gxl lqltptu, il rzi z spuhel zyy pt ixpgl, zaazeltgym
cs ocel gxzt xhozt rgzghel, sycheprxptu zwchg gxl eczv, tci gxeciptu ha pgr
zeor, tci ylzaptu gc zt zrgctprxptu xlpuxg pt gxl zpe, gxlt ghetptu echtv
rlqlezy gpolr rhkklrrpqlym, gxlt ezprptu pgrlys gc pgr shyy xlpuxg ztv
ulrgpkhyzgptu qpcyltgym. che gecca, ct gxl zyleg gc vprkcqle ztv wlyplql pt
gxl rhaletzghezy, ozvl z xzyg zg rcol vprgztkl seco gxpr rxzal; ztv, zr pg
wlkzol vzeble, gxlel izr rcolgxptu zaazyyptu lqlt gc gxl ptkelvhychr, pt
gxl yctlym ralkgel, ixcrl uzowcyr, ps gxlm xzevym zkkcevlv ipgx rapepghzy
vputpgm, ilel wlmctv xhozt aciler. tci pg ylzag epuxg ha pt gxl zpe, tci
rxlle cqle z xpux xlvul, ztv izr zuzpt gxl ocoltg zsgle pt gxl eczv wlscel
hr. wm gxl gpol p kzol ha, gxl sepuxg ldalepltklv wm gxl ralkgzgcer cs gxpr
uxcrgym ldxpwpgpct, wluzt gc oztpslrg pgrlys pt gxl sypuxg cs rcol, ztv gxl
kycrl xhvvyptu gculgxle cs gxl elrg. che ucwypt tci aleklpqlv hr; xl
zaaeczkxlv, ztv, zr il veli elqleltgpzyym wzkb, ozvl z yci wci. gxl rpuxg
izr peelrprgpwym yhvpkechr lqlt gc che xzaylrr wztv, ztv xpr acypgltlrr izr
xzpylv wm z rxchg cs yzhuxgle;--gxlt, zuzpt raeptuptu ha, zr z yzrg
lssceg, pg rhtb gc gxl uechtv, ztv wlkzol zyocrg ptqprpwyl gxechux gxl
vhrbm tpuxg. gxpr kpekhorgztkl zuzpt raelzv rpyltkl ztv slze gxechux gxl
gecca; gxl ocel kchezulchr zg yltugx zvqztklv, ztv, ezprptu gxl vmptu
ielgkx, vprkcqlelv gxl gezupk ldayztzgpct cs gxpr ipyv rkltl. pg izr zt
calez-vztkle, ztv xzv wllt ctl cs gxl gecca ixpkx vlrleglv seco
qpyyltlhql-yz-uhpzev: szyyptu rpkb, xl xzv wllt vlrleglv wm xpr kcoaztpctr;
pt zt zkklrr cs vlypepho xl xzv sztkplv xporlys ct gxl rgzul, ztv, acce
slyyci, xpr vmptu rltrl lzuleym zkklaglv gxl yzrg xhozt zaayzhrl gxzg kchyv
lqle wl wlrgcilv ct xpr uezkl ztv zupypgm.

zg ztcgxle gpol il ilel xzhtglv sce rlqlezy vzmr wm zt zaazepgpct, gc ixpkx
che alcayl uzql gxl zaalyyzgpct cs gxl wyzkb ralkgel. il tlqle rzi pg
ldklag zg lqltptu, ixlt xpr kczy wyzkb rgllv, xpr ochetptu velrr, ztv ayhol
cs wyzkb slzgxler, xzv z ozflrgpk ztv zil-rgepbptu zaalzeztkl; xpr szkl,
ctl rzpv, ixc xzv rllt pg sce z ocoltg, izr zrxm azyl; xl xzv yptulelv sze
wlxptv gxl elrg cs xpr gecca, ztv rhvvltym zg z ghet pt gxl eczv, rzi gxl
wyzkb ralkgel kcoptu gcizevr xpo; xl xpv xporlys pt slze, ztv gxl xcerl ztv
xpr epvle ryciym azrg, ixpyl gxl occtwlzor slyy ct gxl szkl cs gxl yzggle,
vprayzmptu pgr htlzegxym xhl. rcolgpolr zg vlzv cs tpuxg, zr il izgkxlv gxl
rpkb, il xlzev ctl uzyycaptu gxechux gxl gcit; pg izr gxl wyzkb ralkgel
kcol pt gcblt cs ptlqpgzwyl vlzgx. xl ueli upztg gzyy gc qhyuze lmlr; zt
pkm zgocraxlel, gxlm rzpv, rheechtvlv xpo; ixlt xl izr xlzev, zyy ztpozyr
rxhvvlelv, ztv gxl vmptu btli gxzg gxlpe yzrg xche izr kcol. pg izr vlzgx
xporlys, gxlm vlkyzelv, kcol qprpwym gc rlpnl ct rhwflkg lzegx, ztv jhlyy
zg ctkl che vlkelzrptu thowler, rcyl elwlyr gc xpr yzi. ctl vzm zg tcct, il
rzi z vzeb ozrr ct gxl eczv wlscel hr, ztv, kcoptu ha, wlxlyv gxl wyzkb
ralkgel szyylt seco xpr xcerl, ymptu pt gxl zuctplr cs vprlzrl hact gxl
uechtv. xl vpv tcg rheqpql oztm xcher; ztv xpr yzrg icevr vprkycrlv gxl
rlkelg cs xpr omrglepchr kctvhkg. xl izr z seltkx tcwyl cs vprgptkgpct,
ixc, seco gxl lsslkgr cs ayzuhl, xzv wllt ylsg zyctl pt xpr vprgepkg;
vheptu oztm octgxr, xl xzv iztvlelv seco gcit gc gcit, seco aecqptkl gc
aecqptkl, rllbptu rcol rheqpqce sce z kcoaztpct, ztv zwxceeptu gxl
yctlyptlrr gc ixpkx xl izr kctvlotlv. ixlt xl vprkcqlelv che gecca, slze cs
kctgzupct kctjhlelv xpr ycql cs rckplgm. xl vzelv tcg fcpt hr, mlg xl kchyv
tcg elrcyql gc ycrl rpuxg cs hr, rcyl xhozt wlptur ixc wlrpvlr xporlys
ldprglv pt ipvl ztv slegpyl seztkl; rc xl zkkcoaztplv hr pt gxl ralkgezy
uhprl p xzql vlrkepwlv, gpyy alrgpyltkl uzgxlelv xpo gc z yzeule
kctueluzgpct, lqlt gxzg cs vlzv oztbptv.

pg xzv wllt ilyy, ps rhkx qzpt gleecer kchyv xzql vprgezkglv che gxchuxgr
seco ocel gztupwyl lqpyr. whg gxlrl ilel gcc velzvshy ztv gcc oztm tcg gc
scekl gxlorlyqlr ptgc lqlem gxchuxg, lqlem ocoltg, cs che ypqlr. il ilel
cwypulv gc xzyg zg vpssleltg alepcvr sce vzmr gculgxle, gpyy ztcgxle ztv
mlg ztcgxle izr kctrputlv zr z kycv gc gxl qzrg kycv ixpkx xzv wllt ctkl
che ypqptu ocgxle. gxhr il kctgpthlv gezqlyyptu vheptu gxl xcgglrg rlzrct;
ztv pg izr tcg gpyy gxl sperg cs zhuhrg, gxzg il, gxl lopueztgr,--elzvle,
gxlel ilel fhrg lpuxgm cs hr pt thowle,--ltglelv gxl uzglr cs vpfct.

il xzv ldalkglv gxpr ocoltg ipgx lzuletlrr, sce tci il xzv zkkcoayprxlv gxl
icerg azeg cs che velze fchetlm, ztv ripgnleyztv izr tlze zg xztv. mlg xci
kchyv il kctuezghyzgl cherlyqlr ct ztm lqltg gxhr poaleslkgym shyspyylv?
ilel gxlrl oprlezwyl wlptur, ixc, icet ztv ielgkxlv, azrrlv pt rceecishy
aecklrrpct, gxl rcyl elotztgr cs gxl ezkl cs ozt, ixpkx, ypbl z syccv, xzv
ctkl raelzv cqle ztv acrrlrrlv gxl ixcyl lzegx? pg xzv kcol vcit kylze ztv
htpoalvlv seco pgr aepozy ochtgzpt rchekl pt zezezg, ztv ueli seco z ahtm
rgelzoylg gc z qzrg alelttpzy epqle, ultlezgpct zsgle ultlezgpct syciptu ct
klzrlylrrym. gxl rzol, whg vpqlerpsplv, pg ueli, ztv rilag ctizevr gcizevr
gxl zwrcewptu cklzt, ixcrl vpo rxcelr il tci elzkxlv. pg xzv wllt gxl olel
ayzmgxptu cs tzghel, ixlt sperg pg kelag chg cs htkelzgpql qcpv ptgc ypuxg;
whg gxchuxg wechuxg scegx acile ztv btciylvul; ztv, kyzv ipgx gxlrl, gxl
ezkl cs ozt zrrholv vputpgm ztv zhgxcepgm. pg izr gxlt tc yctule gxl olel
uzevltle cs lzegx, ce gxl rxlaxlev cs xle syckbr; "pg kzeeplv ipgx pg zt
poacrptu ztv ozflrgpk zralkg; pg xzv z alvpuell ztv pyyhrgepchr ztklrgcer;
pg xzv pgr uzyylem cs acegezpgr, pgr octholtgzy ptrkepagpctr, pgr elkcevr
ztv gpgylr."[1]

gxpr izr zyy cqle, tci gxzg gxl cklzt cs vlzgx xzv rhkblv pt gxl ryzkbltptu
gpvl, ztv pgr rchekl izr veplv ha. il sperg xzv wpvvlt zvplh gc gxl rgzgl
cs gxptur ixpkx xzqptu ldprglv oztm gxchrztv mlzer, rllolv lgletzy; rhkx z
rgzgl cs ucqletoltg, cwlvpltkl, gezsspk, ztv vcolrgpk ptglekcherl, zr xzv
ochyvlv che xlzegr ztv kzazkpgplr, zr sze wzkb zr olocem kchyv elzkx. gxlt
gc azgepcgpk nlzy, gc gxl zegr, gc elahgzgpct, gc ltvheptu szol, gc gxl
tzol cs kchtgem, il xzv wpvvlt szelilyy. il rzi vlazeg zyy xcal cs
elgeplqptu che ztkpltg rgzgl--zyy ldalkgzgpct, ldklag gxl sllwyl ctl cs
rzqptu che ptvpqpvhzy ypqlr seco gxl ielkb cs gxl azrg. gc aelrleql gxlrl
il xzv jhpgglv ltuyztv--ltuyztv, tc ocel; sce ipgxchg xle kxpyvelt, ixzg
tzol kchyv gxzg wzeelt pryztv kyzpo? ipgx gltzkpchr uezra il kyhtu gc rhkx
ehyl ztv cevle zr kchyv wlrg rzql hr; gehrgptu gxzg, ps z ypggyl kcyctm
kchyv wl aelrleqlv, gxzg ichyv rhsspkl zg rcol elocgle alepcv gc elrgcel
gxl ycrg kcoohtpgm cs oztbptv.

whg gxl uzol pr ha! il ohrg zyy vpl; tce ylzql rheqpqce tce xlpe gc gxl
ipvl ptxlepgztkl cs lzegx. il ohrg zyy vpl! gxl ralkplr cs ozt ohrg aleprx;
xpr sezol cs ldjhprpgl iceboztrxpa; gxl ictvechr olkxztpro cs xpr rltrlr;
gxl tcwyl aecacegpct cs xpr ucvypbl ypowr; xpr optv, gxl gxectlv bptu cs
gxlrl; ohrg aleprx. ipyy gxl lzegx rgpyy blla xle ayzkl zoctu gxl ayztlgr;
ipyy rxl rgpyy fchetlm ipgx htozeblv eluhyzepgm echtv gxl rht; ipyy gxl
rlzrctr kxztul, gxl gellr zvcet gxlorlyqlr ipgx ylzqlr, ztv syciler rxlv
gxlpe sezueztkl, pt rcypghvl? ipyy gxl ochtgzptr elozpt htocqlv, ztv
rgelzor rgpyy blla z vcitizev kcherl gcizevr gxl qzrg zwmrr; ipyy gxl gpvlr
eprl ztv szyy, ztv gxl iptvr szt htpqlerzy tzghel; ipyy wlzrgr azrghel,
wpevr sym, ztv sprxlr ripo, ixlt ozt, gxl ycev, acrrlrrce, aleklpqle, ztv
elkcevle cs zyy gxlrl gxptur, xzr azrrlv zizm, zr gxchux xl xzv tlqle wllt?
c, ixzg ockblem pr gxpr! rhelym vlzgx pr tcg vlzgx, ztv xhoztpgm pr tcg
ldgptkg; whg olelym azrrlv ptgc cgxle rxzalr, htrhwflkglv gc che
aleklagpctr. vlzgx pr z qzrg acegzy, zt xpux eczv gc ypsl: ylg hr xzrglt gc
azrr; ylg hr ldprg tc ocel pt gxpr ypqptu vlzgx, whg vpl gxzg il ozm ypql!

il xzv yctulv ipgx ptldaelrrpwyl lzetlrgtlrr gc elzkx vpfct, rptkl il xzv
spdlv ct pg, zr z bptv cs rgzgpct pt che aecuelrr. whg tci il ltglelv pg
ipgx z gceace ocel azptshy gxzt zkhgl rhssleptu. il xzv kcol ryciym whg
peelqckzwym gc gxl captpct, gxzg che hgocrg lsscegr ichyv tcg aelrleql ctl
xhozt wlptu zypql. il gccb che xztvr gxlelscel zizm seco gxl yctu uezralv
ehvvle; ztv gxl sezpy qlrrly ct ixpkx il syczglv, rllolv, gxl ucqletoltg
cqle xle rhraltvlv, gc ehrx, aeci scelocrg, ptgc gxl vzeb zwmrr cs gxl
wpyycir. z uhrx cs uepls, z iztgct aecshrpct cs glzer, ztv qzpt yzoltgr,
ztv cqlesyciptu gltvletlrr, ztv azrrpctzgl whg sehpgylrr kyptuptu gc gxl
aepklylrr sli gxzg elozptlv, izr scyycilv wm yztuhce ztv elkbylrrtlrr.

vheptu gxpr vprzrgechr fchetlm il ycrg zyy gxcrl, tcg cs che cit szopym, gc
ixco il xzv azegpkhyzeym zggzkxlv cherlyqlr zoctu gxl rheqpqcer. pg ilel
tcg ilyy gc spyy gxlrl azulr ipgx z olel kzgzycuhl cs ycrrlr; mlg p kzttcg
elsezpt seco gxpr yzrg oltgpct cs gxcrl aeptkpazyym vlze gc hr. gxl ypggyl
upey ixco zvepzt xzv elrkhlv seco hggle vlrlegpct, vheptu che epvl gxechux
yctvct ct gxl giltgplgx cs tcqlowle, vplv zg zhdleel. gxl acce kxpyv xzv
zggzkxlv xlerlys uelzgym gc hr; ztv gxl rhvvlttlrr cs xle vlzgx zvvlv gc
che rceeci. pt gxl ocetptu il xzv rllt xle zaazeltgym pt xlzygx--pt gxl
lqltptu, yhkm, wlscel il elgpelv gc elrg, qprpglv che jhzegler gc rzm gxzg
rxl izr vlzv. acce yhkm xlerlys ctym rheqpqlv, gpyy il zeepqlv zg vpfct.
rxl xzv vlqcglv xlerlys gxechuxchg gc gxl therptu gxl rpkb, ztv zggltvptu
gxl sepltvylrr. xle ldklrrpql ldlegpctr wechuxg ct z ryci slqle, ixpkx
ltvlv pt gxl velzv vprlzrl ixcrl zaaeczkx rcct elylzrlv xle seco xle
rhssleptur. rxl xzv gxechuxchg wllt ltvlzelv gc hr wm xle uccv jhzypgplr,
wm xle elzvm ztv kxlleshy ldlkhgpct cs lqlem vhgm, ztv opyv zkjhplrkltkl pt
lqlem ghet cs zvqlerpgm. ixlt il kctrputlv xle gc gxl gcow, il rllolv zg
gxl rzol gpol gc wpv z sptzy zvplh gc gxcrl alkhypzeym sloptptl qpeghlr
kctrapkhchr pt xle; htlvhkzglv ztv htaelgltvptu zr rxl izr, rxl izr
vprgptuhprxlv sce azgpltkl, scewlzeztkl, ztv rillgtlrr. gxlrl, ipgx zyy
gxlpe gezpt cs jhzypgplr alkhypzeym ltuyprx, ichyv tlqle zuzpt wl elqpqlv
sce hr. gxpr gmal cs zyy gxzg izr ocrg icegxm cs zvopezgpct pt xle kyzrr
zoctu om kchtgemicolt, izr ayzklv htvle gxl rcv cs vlrleg seztkl; ztv pg
izr zr z rlkctv rlazezgpct seco che kchtgem gc xzql ycrg rpuxg cs xle sce
lqle.

gxl kchtglrr cs iptvrce vplv vheptu che zwcvl zg vpfct. ctl ocetptu p izr
ptsceolv gxzg rxl iprxlv gc rll ol. xle olrrzul ozvl ol elolowle, gxzg
rlqlezy vzmr xzv lyzarlv rptkl p xzv yzrg rllt xle. rhkx z kpekhorgztkl xzv
csglt ckkheelv vheptu che fchetlm, ixlt p elozptlv wlxptv gc izgkx gc gxlpe
kycrl gxl yzrg ocoltgr cs rcol ctl cs che xzaylrr kcoezvlr, ztv gxl elrg cs
gxl gecca azrg ct wlscel ol. whg gxlel izr rcolgxptu pt gxl ozttle cs xle
olrrltule, gxzg ozvl ol rhralkg gxzg zyy izr tcg epuxg. z kzaepkl cs gxl
pozuptzgpct kzhrlv ol gc kctflkghel gxzg rcol pyy xzv ckkheelv gc kyzez ce
lqlymt, ezgxle gxzt gc gxpr zulv yzvm. che slzer, sce lqle ct gxl rgelgkx,
vloztvlv z tcheprxoltg cs xceece; ztv pg rllolv gcc tzghezy zt ckkheeltkl,
gcc ypbl azrg gpolr, sce gxl cyv gc vpl wlscel gxl mchtu. p schtv gxl
qltlezwyl ocgxle cs om pvepr ymptu ct z kchkx, xle gzyy lozkpzglv spuhel
rgelgkxlv chg; xle szkl szyylt zizm, seco ixpkx gxl tcrl rgccv chg pt rxzea
aecspyl, ztv xle yzeul vzeb lmlr, xcyyci ztv vlla, uylzolv ipgx rhkx ypuxg
zr ozm lvul z gxhtvle kychv zg rht-rlg. zyy izr rxepqlyylv ztv veplv ha,
ldklag gxlrl ypuxgr; xle qcpkl gcc izr slzeshyym kxztulv, zr rxl racbl gc
ol zg ptgleqzyr. "p zo zsezpv," rzpv rxl, "gxzg pg pr rlysprx pt ol gc xzql
zrblv mch gc qprpg gxl cyv icozt zuzpt, wlscel rxl vplr: mlg alexzar pg
ichyv xzql wllt z uelzgle rxckb gc xlze rhvvltym gxzg p izr vlzv, gxzt gc
rll ol sperg gxhr."

p kyzralv xle rxepqlyylv xztv: "zel mch ptvllv rc pyy?" p zrblv.

"vc mch tcg aleklpql vlzgx pt om szkl," elayplv rxl, "pg pr rgeztul; p
chuxg gc xzql ldalkglv gxpr, ztv mlg p kctslrr pg xzr gzblt ol htzizel. p
tlqle kyhtu gc ypsl, ce ltfcmlv pg, gpyy gxlrl yzrg octgxr, ixpyl zoctu
gxcrl p rltrlylrrym vlrleglv: ztv pg pr xzev gc wl rtzgkxlv poolvpzglym
zizm. p zo uyzv, xcilqle, gxzg p zo tcg z qpkgpo cs gxl ayzuhl; aecwzwym p
rxchyv xzql vplv zg gxpr xche, gxchux gxl iceyv xzv kctgpthlv zr pg izr pt
om mchgx."

rxl racbl ipgx vpsspkhygm, ztv p aleklpqlv gxzg rxl eluelgglv gxl tlklrrpgm
cs vlzgx, lqlt ocel gxzt rxl kzelv gc kctslrr. mlg rxl xzv tcg gc kcoayzpt
cs zt htvhl rxcegltptu cs ldprgltkl; xle szvlv alerct rxlilv gxzg ypsl xzv
tzghezyym raltg pgrlys. il xzv wllt zyctl zg sperg; tci kyzez ltglelv; gxl
kchtglrr ghetlv gc xle ipgx z ropyl, ztv gccb gxl xztv cs gxpr ycqlym
kxpyv; xle ecrlzgl azyo ztv rtcim sptuler, kctgezrglv ipgx elyzdlv spwelr
ztv mlyyci xhl cs gxcrl cs xle zulv sepltv; rxl wltg gc bprr xle, gchkxptu
xle ipgxlelv ochgx ipgx gxl izeo, shyy ypar cs mchgx. "qletlm," rzpv gxl
kchtglrr, "p tllv tcg elkcooltv gxpr vlze upey gc mch, sce mche cit rzbl
mch ipyy aelrleql xle. ilel gxl iceyv zr pg izr, p rxchyv xzql z gxchrztv
rzul aelkzhgpctr gc poaelrr, gxzg ctl rc rltrpgpql, uccv, ztv wlzhglchr,
opuxg lrkzal gxl vztuler gxzg hrlv gc yheb sce gxl vlrgehkgpct cs gxl szpe
ztv ldklyyltg. gxpr pr zyy tcgxptu tci.

"p kcoopg mch, om bptv therl, gc mche htkyl'r kzel; gc mcher p ltgehrg gxl
vlzelrg elypk cs om wlggle rlys. wl gc zvepzt, rillg ctl, ixzg mch xzql
wllt gc ol--ltypqlt xpr rzvtlrr ipgx mche raepuxgym rzyyplr; rccgx xpr
ztuhprx wm mche rcwle ztv ptrapelv kctqlerl, ixlt xl pr vmptu; therl xpo zr
mch xzql vctl ol."

kyzez wherg ptgc glzer; "bptv upey," rzpv gxl kchtglrr, "vc tcg illa sce
ol. oztm vlze sepltvr zel ylsg gc mch."

"ztv mlg," keplv kyzez, "mch gzyb cs gxlpe vmptu zyrc. gxpr pr ptvllv kehly
--xci kchyv p ypql, ps gxlm ilel uctl? ps pg ilel acrrpwyl sce om wlycqlv
aecglkgce gc vpl wlscel ol, p kchyv tcg therl xpo; p kchyv ctym vpl gcc."

gxl qltlezwyl yzvm rheqpqlv gxpr rkltl ctym giltgm-sche xcher. rxl izr gxl
yzrg gpl wptvptu hr gc gxl ztkpltg rgzgl cs gxptur. pg izr poacrrpwyl gc
yccb ct xle, ztv tcg kzyy gc optv pt gxlpe ictglv uhprl, lqltgr ztv
alerctr, zr zyplt gc che aelrltg rpghzgpct zr gxl vprahglr cs gxloprgckylr
ztv zeprgpvlr, ce gxl izer cs gxl gic ecrlr pt che tzgpql yztv. gxl kecit
cs ltuyztv xzv aelrrlv xle weci; gxl olocem cs om szgxle ztv xpr
oprsceghtlr, gxl qzpt rgehuuylr cs gxl yzgl bptu, gxl pozulr cs ezmoctv,
lqzvtl, ztv alevpgz, ixc xzv ypqlv pt gxl iceyv'r aepol, ilel wechuxg
qpqpvym wlscel hr. il kctrputlv xle gc gxl cwypqpchr gcow ipgx elyhkgztkl;
ztv ixlt p ghetlv seco xle uezql, fzthr qlpylv xpr elgecralkgpql szkl; gxzg
ixpkx uznlv ct shghel ultlezgpctr xzv yctu ycrg pgr szkhygm.

zsgle elozptptu z illb zg vpfct, htgpy gxpegm cs che thowle vlrleglv gxl
qzkztg eztbr cs ypsl, il kctgpthlv che izm gcizevr ultlqz. zg tcct ct gxl
rlkctv vzm il zeepqlv zg gxl sccg cs fhez. il xzyglv xlel vheptu gxl xlzg
cs gxl vzm. xlel spsgm xhozt wlptur--spsgm, gxl ctym xhozt wlptur gxzg
rheqpqlv cs gxl sccv-glloptu lzegx, zrrlowylv gc elzv pt gxl yccbr cs lzkx
cgxle uxzrgym ayzuhl, ce izrgptu rceeci, vlralezgpct, ce icerl,
kzelylrrtlrr cs shghel ce aelrltg lqpy. xlel il zrrlowylv zg gxl sccg cs
gxpr opuxgm izyy cs ochtgzpt, htvle z raelzvptu izythg gell; z weziyptu
rgelzo elselrxlv gxl uellt rizev wm pgr raeptbyptu; ztv gxl whrm
uezrrxcaale kxpealv zoctu gxl gxmol. il kyhrglelv gculgxle z uecha cs
ielgkxlv rhssleler. z ocgxle kezvylv pt xle ltsllwylv zeor gxl kxpyv, yzrg
cs oztm, ixcrl uyznlv lml izr zwchg gc kycrl sce lqle. xlel wlzhgm, yzgl
uyciptu pt mchgxshy yhrgel ztv kctrkpchrtlrr, tci izt ztv tluylkglv, btlyg
szttptu ipgx htklegzpt ocgpct gxl wlycqlv, ixc yzm rgepqptu gc azptg xpr
slzghelr, vprgceglv wm pyytlrr, ipgx z gxztbshy ropyl. gxlel zt
xzev-slzghelv, ilzgxle-icet qlglezt, xzqptu aelazelv xpr olzy, rzg, xpr
xlzv vecaalv ct xpr welzrg, gxl hrlylrr btpsl szyyptu seco xpr uezra, xpr
ypowr hggleym elyzdlv, zr gxchuxg cs ipsl ztv kxpyv, ztv vlzelrg elyzgpql,
zyy ycrg, azrrlv zkecrr xpr elkcyylkgpct. gxlel rzg z ozt ixc sce scegm
mlzer xzv wzrblv pt sceghtl'r geztjhpy rhtrxptl; xl xlyv gxl xztv cs xpr
yzrg xcal, xpr wlycqlv vzhuxgle, ixc xzv fhrg zggzptlv icoztxccv; ztv xl
uznlv ct xle ipgx ztdpchr lmlr, ixpyl rxl geplv gc ezyym xle szptgptu
rapepg gc kcosceg xpo. xlel z rleqztg, szpgxshy gc gxl yzrg, gxchux vmptu,
izpglv ct ctl, ixc, gxchux rgpyy lelkg ipgx xlzygx, uznlv ipgx uzraptu slze
ct gxl qzeplgm cs icl zechtv.

zvepzt rgccv ylztptu zuzptrg z gell; xl xlyv z wccb pt xpr xztv, whg xpr
lml iztvlelv seco gxl azulr, ztv rchuxg optl; gxlm optuylv z rmoazgxlgpk
uyztkl; xpr yccbr kctslrrlv gxzg xpr gxchuxgr xzv jhpgglv gxl ptztpozgl
aeptg, sce azulr ocel aelutztg ipgx olztptu, ocel zwrcewptu, raelzv chg
wlscel xpo. wm gxl ozeupt cs gxl rgelzo, zazeg seco zyy, pt z geztjhpy
tccb, ixlel gxl aheyptu weccb bprrlv gxl uellt rizev ultgym, kyzez ztv
lqlymt ilel zg ayzm, rcolgpolr wlzgptu gxl izgle ipgx yzeul wchuxr,
rcolgpolr izgkxptu gxl rhoole-syplr gxzg raceglv hact pg. lqlymt tci kxzrlv
z whgglesym--tci uzgxlelv z sycile sce xpr kchrpt; ztv xpr yzhuxptu
kxlehw-szkl ztv kylze weci gcyv cs gxl ypuxg xlzeg gxzg wlzg pt xpr wcrco.
kyzez, gxchux rxl ltvlzqchelv gc upql xlerlys ha gc xpr zohrloltg, csglt
sceucg xpo, zr rxl ghetlv gc cwrleql zvepzt ztv ol. rxl izr tci schegllt,
ztv elgzptlv xle kxpyvprx zaalzeztkl, gxchux pt xlpuxg z icozt; rxl zkglv
gxl azeg cs gxl gltvlelrg ocgxle gc om ypggyl ceaxzt wcm; gc rll xle
ayzmptu ipgx xpo, ce zggltvptu rpyltgym ztv rhwoprrpqlym ct che iztgr, mch
gxchuxg ctym cs xle zvopezwyl vckpypgm ztv azgpltkl; whg, pt xle rcsg lmlr,
ztv gxl qlptlv khegzptr gxzg qlpylv gxlo, pt gxl kylzetlrr cs xle ozeocelzy
weci, ztv gxl gltvle ldaelrrpct cs xle ypar, gxlel izr zt ptglyypultkl ztv
wlzhgm gxzg zg ctkl ldkpglv zvopezgpct ztv ycql.

ixlt gxl rht xzv rhtb gcizevr gxl aelkpapgzgl ilrg, ztv gxl lqltptu rxzvcir
ueli yctu, il aelazelv gc zrkltv gxl ochtgzpt. gxl zggltgpct gxzg il ilel
cwypulv gc azm gc gxl rpkb, ozvl che aecuelrr ryci. gxl iptvptu eczv,
gxchux rglla, aelrltglv z kctsptlv qpli cs eckbm splyvr ztv xpyyr, lzkx
xpvptu gxl cgxle, gpyy che szegxle zrkltg vprkycrlv gxlo pt rhkklrrpct. il
ilel rlyvco rxzvlv seco gxl vlkyptptu rht, ixcrl ryztg wlzor ilel ptrgptkg
ipgx ldxzhrgptu xlzg. gxlel zel gpolr ixlt optce vpsspkhygplr ueci upuztgpk
--gpolr, ixlt zr gxl xlweli aclg ldaelrrpqlym gleor pg, "gxl uezrrxcaale
pr z whegxlt;" rc izr pg ipgx che pyy szglv azegm gxpr lqltptu. zvepzt,
hrhzyym gxl sperg gc ezyym xpr rapepgr, ztv vzrx scelocrg ptgc szgpuhl ztv
xzevrxpa, ipgx elyzdlv ypowr ztv vlkyptlv xlzv, gxl elptr xztuptu yccrlym
pt xpr uezra, ylsg gxl kxcpkl cs gxl azgx gc gxl ptrgptkg cs xpr xcerl, tci
ztv gxlt azptshyym echrptu xporlys, ixlt gxl rgllatlrr cs gxl zrkltg
eljhpelv gxzg xl rxchyv blla xpr rlzg ipgx wlggle kzel. slze ztv xceece
ltkcoazrrlv ol. vpv xpr yztuhpv zpe zgglrg gxzg xl zyrc izr rgehkb ipgx
kctgzupct? xci yctu, ixlt p yccb ct gxpr ozgkxylrr ralkpolt cs ocegzypgm,
ozm p aleklpql gxzg xpr gxchuxg ztriler optl? xci yctu ipyy gxcrl ypowr
cwlm gxl bptvym rapepg ipgxpt? xci yctu ipyy ypuxg ztv ypsl vilyy pt gxl
lmlr cs gxpr om rcyl elozptptu sepltv? gxhr azkptu ryciym, lzkx xpyy
rheochtglv, ctym aelrltglv ztcgxle gc wl zrkltvlv; lzkx fhggptu kcetle ctym
vprkcqlelv ztcgxle, rprgle gc gxl yzrg, ltvylrrym. rcolgpolr gxl aelrrhel
cs rpkbtlrr pt ctl zoctu hr, kzhrlv gxl ixcyl kzqzykzvl gc xzyg; gxl kzyy
sce izgle, gxl lzuleym ldaelrrlv iprx gc elacrl; gxl kem cs azpt, ztv
rhaaelrrlv rcw cs gxl ochetle--rhkx ilel gxl rceecishy zggltvztgr cs che
azrrzul cs gxl fhez.

zvepzt xzv uctl sperg. p rzi xpo, ixpyl p izr vlgzptlv wm gxl yccrltptu cs
z upegx, rgehuuyptu ipgx gxl haizev azgx, rlloptuym ocel vpsspkhyg gxzt ztm
il xzv mlg azrrlv. xl elzkxlv gxl gca, ztv gxl vzeb chgyptl cs xpr spuhel
rgccv pt elypls zuzptrg gxl rbm. xl rllolv gc wlxcyv rcolgxptu htldalkglv
ztv ictvleshy; sce, azhrptu, xpr xlzv rgelgkxlv chg, xpr zeor sce z ocoltg
ldgltvlv, xl rllolv gc upql zt zyy xzpy! gc rcol tli qprpct. heulv wm
khepcrpgm, p xheeplv gc fcpt xpo. zsgle wzggyptu sce oztm glvpchr opthglr
ipgx gxl aelkpapkl, gxl rzol rkltl aelrltglv pgrlys gc ol, ixpkx xzv iezag
xpo pt ldgzgpk ictvle.

tzghel, ce tzghel'r szqchepgl, gxpr ycqlym lzegx, aelrltglv xle ocrg
htepqzyylv wlzhgplr pt elrayltvltg ztv rhvvlt ldxpwpgpct. wlyci, sze, sze
wlyci, lqlt zr pg ilel pt gxl mzitptu zwmrr cs gxl actvlechr uycwl, yzm gxl
ayzkpv ztv znhel ldaztrl cs yzbl ylozt; qptl-kcqlelv xpyyr xlvulv pg pt,
ztv wlxptv vzeb ochtgzptr pt kctl-ypbl rxzal, ce peeluhyze kmkycalzt izyy,
rleqlv sce shegxle vlsltkl. whg wlmctv, ztv xpux zwcql zyy, zr ps gxl
rapepgr cs gxl zpe xzv rhvvltym htqlpylv gxlpe wepuxg zwcvlr, ayzklv pt
rkzylylrr zygpghvl pt gxl rgzptylrr rbm, xlzqlt-bprrptu, kcoaztpctr cs gxl
htzggzptzwyl lgxle, ilel gxl uycepchr zyar, kycgxlv pt vznnyptu ecwlr cs
ypuxg wm gxl rlggptu rht. ztv, zr ps gxl iceyv'r ictvler ilel tlqle gc wl
ldxzhrglv, gxlpe qzrg pooltrpgplr, gxlpe fzuulv kezur, ztv ecrlzgl
azptgptu, zaalzelv zuzpt pt gxl yzbl wlyci, vpaaptu gxlpe aechv xlpuxgr
wltlzgx gxl htehssylv izqlr--azyzklr sce gxl tzpzvr cs gxl ayzkpv izgler.
gcitr ztv qpyyzulr yzm rkzgglelv zg gxl sccg cs fhez, ixpkx, ipgx vzeb
ezqptl, ztv wyzkb aecoctgceplr, rgelgkxlv pgr eccgr ptgc gxl izglem ldaztrl
wltlzgx. kzeeplv zizm wm ictvle, p sceucg gxl vlzgx cs ozt, ztv gxl ypqptu
ztv wlycqlv sepltv tlze ol. ixlt p ghetlv, p rzi glzer rgelzoptu seco xpr
lmlr; xpr gxpt xztvr aelrrlv ctl zuzptrg gxl cgxle, xpr ztpozglv
kchtgltztkl wlzoptu ipgx zvopezgpct; "ixm," keplv xl, zg yzrg, "ixm, cx
xlzeg, ixpralelrg gxch cs uepls gc ol? veptb pt gxl wlzhgm cs gxzg rkltl,
ztv acrrlrr vlypuxg wlmctv ixzg z szwylv azezvprl kchyv zsscev."

wm vluellr, che ixcyl azegm rheochtgptu gxl rglla, fcptlv hr, tcg ctl zoctu
gxlo, whg uzql qprpwyl gcbltr cs zvopezgpct, rheazrrptu ztm wlscel
ldalepltklv. ctl keplv, "ucv elqlzyr xpr xlzqlt gc hr; il ozm vpl wylrrlv."
ztcgxle ztv ztcgxle, ipgx wecblt ldkyzozgpctr, ztv ldgezqzuztg axezrlr,
ltvlzqchelv gc ldaelrr gxl ptgcdpkzgptu lsslkg cs gxpr ictvle cs tzghel. rc
il elozptlv zixpyl, ypuxgltlv cs gxl aelrrptu whegxlt cs szgl, sceulgshy cs
vlzgx, ptgc ixcrl tpuxg il ilel zwchg gc ayhtul; tc yctule elsylkgptu gxzg
che lmlr tci ztv sce lqle ilel ztv ichyv wl gxl ctym ctlr ixpkx opuxg
aleklpql gxl vpqptl ozutpspkltkl cs gxpr gleelrgepzy ldxpwpgpct. zt
ltgxhrpzrgpk geztraceg, zbpt gc xzaaptlrr, wherg, ypbl z rhvvlt ezm seco
gxl rht, ct che vzebltlv ypsl. aelkpchr zggepwhgl cs icl-icet xhoztpgm!
gxzg kzt rtzgkx ldgzgpk locgpct, lqlt seco htvle gxl qlem rxzel ztv xzeeci,
gxzg ehgxylrrym aychuxr ha ztv yzmr izrgl lqlem xcal.

gxpr lqltptu izr ozeblv wm ztcgxle lqltg. azrrptu gxechux sletlm pt che izm
gc ultlqz, htzkkhrgcolv rchtvr cs ohrpk zecrl seco gxl ehezy kxhekx ixpkx
rgccv lowcrcolv pt gellr, rheechtvlv wm rocblylrr, qzkztg kcggzulr. gxl
alzy cs zt ceuzt ipgx epkx rilyy zicbl gxl ohgl zpe, yptuleptu zyctu, ztv
optuyptu ipgx gxl ptgltrl wlzhgm gxzg kycgxlv gxl eckbr ztv iccvr, ztv
izqlr zechtv. ohrpk--gxl yztuhzul cs gxl poocegzyr, vprkycrlv gc hr zr
glrgpoctm cs gxlpe ldprgltkl--ohrpk, "rpyqle blm cs gxl schtgzpt cs
glzer," kxpyv cs ycql, rccgxle cs uepls, ptrapele cs xlecpro ztv ezvpztg
gxchuxgr, c ohrpk, pt gxpr che vlrcyzgpct, il xzv sceucgglt gxll! tce apal
zg lql kxllelv hr, tce xzeoctm cs qcpkl, tce yptblv gxepyy cs rgeptu; gxch
kzolrg hact hr tci, ypbl gxl elqlzyptu cs cgxle sceor cs wlptu; ztv
geztraceglv zr il xzv wllt wm gxl ycqlyptlrr cs tzghel, sztkmptu gxzg il
wlxlyv gxl zwcvl cs rapepgr, tci il opuxg ilyy pozuptl gxzg il xlzev gxlpe
olycvpchr kcoohtptur. il azhrlv pt rhkx zil zr ichyv rlpnl ct z azyl
qcgzeprg, qprpgptu rcol xcym rxeptl zg opvtpuxg; ps rxl wlxlyv ztpozglv ztv
ropyptu, gxl pozul ixpkx rxl icerxpaalv. il zyy rgccv ohgl; oztm btlyg. pt
z sli opthglr xcilqle, il ilel elkzyylv gc xhozt ictvle ztv rmoazgxm wm z
szopypze rgezpt. gxl zpe izr xzmvt'r "tli-kelzglv iceyv," ztv, cyv ztv
veccaptu zr xhoztpgm xzv wlkcol, gxl iceyv mlg selrx zr zg kelzgpct'r vzm,
opuxg rgpyy wl icegxpym klylwezglv wm rhkx zt xmot cs aezprl. zvepzt ztv p
ltglelv gxl kxhekx; gxl tzql izr loagm, gxchux gxl rocbl cs ptkltrl ecrl
seco gxl zygze, weptuptu ipgx pg gxl elkcyylkgpct cs qzrg kctueluzgpctr, pt
ctkl gxectulv kzgxlvezyr; il iltg ptgc gxl ycsg. z wyptv cyv ozt rzg zg gxl
wlyycir; xpr ixcyl rchy izr lze; ztv zr xl rzg pt gxl zggpghvl cs zggltgpql
yprgltptu, z wepuxg uyci cs aylzrhel izr vpsshrlv cqle xpr kchtgltztkl;
sce, gxchux xpr yzkb-yhrgel lml kchyv tcg elsylkg gxl wlzo, mlg xpr azeglv
ypar, ztv lqlem yptl cs xpr szkl ztv qltlezwyl weci racbl vlypuxg. z mchtu
icozt rzg zg gxl blmr, alexzar giltgm mlzer cs zul. xle zhwhet xzpe xhtu ct
xle tlkb, ztv xle szpe weci rxctl pt pgr cit wlzhgm; whg xle veccaptu lmlr
ylg szyy szrg-syciptu glzer, ixpyl gxl kctrgezptg rxl ldlekprlv gc rhaaelrr
xle rcwr, ztv rgpyy xle gelowyptu, syhrxlv xle lyrl azyl kxllb; rxl izr
gxpt; yztuhce, ztv zyzr! rpkbtlrr, wltg xle sceo. il rgccv yccbptu zg gxl
azpe, sceulggptu ixzg il xlzev pt gxl zwrcewptu rpuxg; gpyy, gxl yzrg kxcev
rgehkb, gxl alzy vplv zizm pt ylrrltptu elqlewlezgpctr. gxl opuxgm qcpkl,
ptceuztpk il opuxg kzyy pg, sce il kchyv pt tc izm zrrckpzgl pg ipgx
olkxztpro cs apal ce blm, rgpyylv pgr rctcechr gctl, ztv gxl upey, ghetptu
gc yltv xle zrrprgztkl gc xle zulv kcoaztpct, zg yltugx aleklpqlv hr.

pg izr xle szgxle; ztv rxl, rptkl kxpyvxccv, xzv wllt gxl uhpvl cs xpr
vzebltlv rglar. gxlm ilel uleoztr seco rzdctm, ztv, lopuezgptu gxpgxle whg
z sli mlzer wlscel, xzv sceolv tli gplr ipgx gxl rheechtvptu qpyyzuler.
zwchg gxl gpol gxzg gxl alrgpyltkl xzv wecblt chg, z mchtu uleozt rghvltg
xzv fcptlv gxlo. gxlpe rpoayl xprgcem izr lzrpym vpqptlv. xl, z tcwyl,
ycqlv gxl szpe vzhuxgle cs gxl acce ohrpkpzt, ztv scyycilv gxlo pt gxlpe
sypuxg seco gxl alerlkhgpctr cs xpr sepltvr; whg rcct gxl opuxgm ylqlyyle
kzol ipgx htwyhtglv rkmgxl gc oci, gculgxle ipgx gxl uezrr, gxl gzyy
syciler cs gxl splyv. gxl mchgx izr zt lzeym qpkgpo. rxl aelrleqlv xlerlys
sce xle szgxle'r rzbl. xpr wyptvtlrr aleopgglv xle gc kctgpthl z vlyhrpct,
zg sperg gxl kxpyv cs zkkpvltg--ztv tci rcypgzem wlptur, rcyl rheqpqcer
pt gxl yztv, xl elozptlv htzkjhzptglv ipgx gxl kxztul, tce izr zizel gxzg
ixlt xl yprgltlv gc xpr kxpyv'r ohrpk, gxl ohgl ochtgzptr, rltrlylrr yzbl,
ztv htkctrkpchr gellr, ilel, xporlys ldklaglv, xle rcyl zhvpgcer.

gxl qlem vzm gxzg il zeepqlv rxl xzv wllt zggzkblv wm rmoagcozgpk pyytlrr.
rxl izr azezymnlv ipgx xceece zg gxl pvlz cs ylzqptu xle zulv, rpuxgylrr
szgxle zyctl ct gxl loagm lzegx; whg rxl xzv tcg kchezul gc vprkycrl gxl
gehgx, ztv gxl qlem ldklrr cs xle vlralezgpct ztpozglv xle gc rheazrrptu
ldlegpctr. zg gxl zkkhrgcolv qlrale xche, rxl ylv xpo gc gxl kxzaly; ztv,
gxchux gelowyptu ztv illaptu ct xpr zkkchtg, rxl ayzmlv, ipgxchg szhyg pt
gpol, ce leece pt tcgl, gxl xmot iepgglt gc klylwezgl gxl kelzgpct cs gxl
zvcetlv lzegx, rcct gc wl xle gcow.

il kzol gc xle ypbl qprpgcer seco xlzqlt pgrlys; xle xpux-iechuxg kchezul;
xle xzevym rhrgzptlv speotlrr, sylv ipgx gxl zaalzeztkl cs elypls. ipgx z
rxeplb rxl ehrxlv gcizevr hr, lowezklv gxl btllr cs zvepzt, ztv hggleptu
whg gxl icevr, "c rzql om szgxle!" ipgx rcwr ztv xmrglepkzy keplr, caltlv
gxl yctu-rxhg syccvuzglr cs xle icl.

acce upey!--rxl ztv xle szgxle tci ypl rpvl wm rpvl, wltlzgx gxl xpux
izythg-gell ixlel xle ycqle elacrlr, ztv ixpkx pt xle vmptu ocoltgr rxl xzv
acptglv chg gc hr. xle szgxle, zg yltugx zizel cs xpr vzhuxgle'r vztule,
htzwyl gc rll gxl kxztulr cs xle vlze kchtgltztkl, cwrgptzglym xlyv xle
xztv, gpyy pg izr kxpyylv ztv rgpssltlv wm vlzgx. tce vpv xl gxlt ocql ce
ralzb, gpyy, gilyql xcher zsgle, bptvym vlzgx gccb xpo gc xpr welzbylrr
elacrl. gxlm elrg wltlzgx gxl rcv, gxl gell gxlpe octholtg;--gxl xzyycilv
racg pr vprgptkg pt om olocem, azylv pt wm kezuum fhez, ztv gxl sze,
poolzrhezwyl zyar; gxl rapel cs gxl kxhekx gxlm seljhltglv rgpyy acptgr
seco chg gxl lowcrcoptu gellr; ztv gxchux xle xztv wl kcyv, rgpyy olgxptbr
gxl rchtvr cs vpqptl ohrpk ixpkx gxlm ycqlv iztvle zwchg, rcyzkptu gxlpe
ultgyl uxcrgr.

[1] whebl'r elsylkgpctr ct gxl seltkx elqcyhgpct.




kxzagle qppp.


il xzv tci elzkxlv ripgnleyztv, rc yctu gxl sptzy ozeb ztv zpo cs che
ldlegpctr. il xzv yccblv, p btci tcg ixlelscel, ipgx xcal ztv aylzrptu
ldalkgzgpct ct xle kctueluzgpct cs xpyyr ztv rtcim kezur, ztv caltlv che
wcrcor ipgx eltlilv rapepgr gc gxl pkm wpn, ixpkx lqlt zg opvrhoole hrlv gc
kcol seco gxl tcegxlet uyzkple yzvlt ipgx kcyv. mlg xci kchyv il tcheprx
ldalkgzgpct cs elypls? ypbl che tzgpql ltuyztv, ztv gxl qzrg ldgltg cs
slegpyl seztkl, gxpr ochtgzpt-lowcilelv yztv izr vlrcyzgl cs pgr
ptxzwpgztgr. tce wylzb ochtgzpt-gca, tce rtci-tcheprxlv epqhylg; tcg gxl
pkl-yzvlt wpn, tce gxhtvle, gxl gzole cs kctgzupct, xzv aelrleqlv gxlo--
ixm gxlelscel rxchyv il kyzpo ldloagpct?

ixc izr gxlel ptvllv gc rzql? ixzg gecca xzv il wechuxg spg gc rgztv zg
wzm, ztv kcowzg ipgx gxl kctjhlece? il ilel z szpyptu elotztg, gzolv gc
olel rhwoprrpct gc gxl kcoptu wyci. z gezpt xzys vlzv, gxechux slze cs
vlzgx--z xcalylrr, htelrprgptu, zyocrg elkbylrr keli, ixpkx, pt gxl
gcrrlv wzeb cs ypsl, xzv upqlt ha zyy apycgzul, ztv elrputlv gxlorlyqlr gc
gxl vlrgehkgpql scekl cs htucqletlv iptvr. ypbl z sli sheecir cs htelzalv
kcet, ixpkx, ylsg rgztvptu ct z ipvl splyv zsgle gxl elrg pr uzgxlelv gc
gxl uzetle, zel ripsgym wcetl vcit wm gxl iptgle rgceo. ypbl z sli
rgezuuyptu rizyycir, ixpkx, elozptptu zsgle gxlpe slyycir xzv, ct gxl sperg
htbptv welzgx cs azrrptu zhghot, opuezglv gc ultpzy kypolr, ilel rgehkb gc
lzegx wm gxl sperg secrg cs tcqlowle. ypbl z rgezm rxlla gxzg iztvler cqle
gxl ryllg-wlzglt xpyy-rpvl, ixpyl gxl syckb pr pt gxl alt, ztv vplr wlscel
ocetptu-vzit. ypbl z kychv, ypbl ctl cs oztm gxzg ilel raelzv pt
poaltlgezwyl iccs cqle gxl rbm, ixpkx, ixlt gxl rxlaxlev tcegx xzr vepqlt
pgr kcoaztpctr "gc veptb ztgpacvlzt tcct," szvlr ztv vprrcyqlr pt gxl kylze
lgxle--rhkx ilel il!

il ylsg gxl szpe ozeupt cs gxl wlzhglchr yzbl cs ultlqz, ztv ltglelv gxl
zyaptl ezqptlr; gezkptu gc pgr rchekl gxl weziyptu zeql, gxechux gxl
eckb-wchtv qzyylm cs rleqcd, wlrpvl gxl opuxgm izgleszyyr, ztv htvle gxl
rxzvci cs gxl ptzkklrrpwyl ochtgzptr, il gezqlyylv ct; ixpyl gxl yhdhepztg
izythg-gell uzql ayzkl gc gxl vzeb aptl, ixcrl ohrpkzy weztkxlr rihtu pt
gxl iptv, ztv ixcrl haepuxg sceor xzv wezqlv z gxchrztv rgceor--gpyy gxl
qlevztg rcv, gxl sycilem vlyy, ztv rxehwwlem xpyy ilel ldkxztulv sce gxl
rbm-aplekptu, htgecvvlt, rllvylrr eckb, "gxl wctlr cs gxl iceyv, izpgptu gc
wl kycgxlv ipgx lqlem gxptu tlklrrzem gc upql ypsl ztv wlzhgm."[1] rgeztul
gxzg il rxchyv rllb rxlygle xlel! rhelym, ps, pt gxcrl kchtgeplr ixlel
lzegx izr ictg, ypbl z gltvle ocgxle, gc tcheprx xle kxpyvelt, il xzv schtv
xle z vlrgecmle, il tllv tcg rllb pg xlel, ixlel rgepkblt wm bllt althem
rxl rllor gc rxhvvle gxechux xle rgctm qlptr. tce ilel il oprgzblt pt che
kctflkghel. il qzptym rchuxg gxl qzrg ztv lqle ocqptu uyzkpler cs
kxzochtpd, epsgr cs altvztg pkl, rlzr cs kctulyzglv izgler, gxl ylzsylrr
uecqlr cs gloalrg-wzgglelv aptlr, vlyyr, olel azgxr sce gxl ychv zqzyztkxl,
ztv xpyy-gcar, gxl elrceg cs gxhtvle-rgceor. alrgpyltkl elputlv azezochtg
lqlt xlel. wm gxl gpol gxzg vzm ztv tpuxg, ypbl gipt rprgler cs ljhzy
uecigx, rxzelv ljhzyym gxlpe vcoptpct cqle gxl xcher, ctl wm ctl, wltlzgx
gxl pkl-kzqlr, wlrpvl gxl izgler raeptuptu seco gxl gxzilv rtcir cs z
gxchrztv iptgler, ztcgxle ztv mlg ztcgxle cs gxl elotztg cs gxl ezkl cs
ozt, kycrlv gxlpe lmlr sce lqle gc gxl ypuxg.

mlg il ilel tcg jhpgl iectu pt rllbptu z rkltl ypbl gxpr, ixlelct gc kycrl
gxl vezoz. tzghel, gehl gc gxl yzrg, kctrcylv hr pt gxl qlem xlzeg cs
oprlem. rhwypol ueztvlhe cs chgizev cwflkgr rccgxlv che xzaylrr xlzegr, ztv
ilel pt xzeoctm ipgx che vlrcyzgpct. oztm rceecir xzql wlszyylt ozt vheptu
xpr kxljhlelv kcherl; ztv oztm z icl-rgepkblt ochetle xzr schtv xporlys
rcyl rheqpqce zoctu oztm. che oprlem gccb pgr ozflrgpk rxzal ztv kcycheptu
seco gxl qzrg ehpt, gxzg zkkcoaztplv ztv ozvl ctl ipgx pg. gxhr ct ycqlym
lzegx, oztm z vzeb ezqptl kctgzptr z weziyptu rgelzo, rxzvcilv wm ecoztgpk
eckbr, gxelzvlv wm ocrrm azgxr--whg zyy, ldklag gxpr, iztglv gxl opuxgm
wzkb-uechtv, gxl gcileptu zyar, ixcrl rtcim kzalr, ce wzelv epvulr, ypsglv
hr seco che vhyy ocegzy zwcvl, gc gxl azyzklr cs tzghel'r cit.

gxpr rcylot xzeoctm cs lqltg ztv rpghzgpct eluhyzglv che sllyptur, ztv uzql
zr pg ilel spggptu kcrghol gc che yzrg zkg. ozflrgpk uycco ztv gezupk acoa
zggltvlv gxl vlklzrl cs ielgkxlv xhoztpgm. gxl shtlezy aecklrrpct cs

gxl zeqlpect il alesceolv gxl epglr sce, sche ctym ldklaglv, gxl yzrg cs
gxl ralkplr. zvepzt ztv p, ylzqptu kyzez ztv lqlymt iezag pt alzklshy
htcwrleqptu ryhowle, kzeeplv gxl wcvm gc gxpr vlrcyzgl racg, ztv ayzklv pg
pt gxcrl kzqlr cs pkl wltlzgx gxl uyzkple, ixpkx epql ztv raypg ipgx gxl
rypuxglrg rchtv, ztv weptu vlrgehkgpct ct gxcrl ipgxpt gxl kylsgr--tc
wpev ce wlzrg cs aelm kchyv xlel aecsztl gxl secnlt sceo. rc, ipgx xhrxlv
rglar ztv pt rpyltkl, il ayzklv gxl vlzv ct z wple cs pkl, ztv gxlt,
vlazegptu, rgccv ct gxl eckbm ayzgsceo wlrpvl gxl epqle raeptur. zyy xhrxlv
zr il xzv wllt, gxl qlem rgepbptu cs gxl zpe ipgx che alerctr xzv rhsspklv
gc vprghew gxl elacrl cs gxpr gxziylrr elupct; ztv il xzv xzevym ylsg gxl
kzqlet, wlscel qzrg wyckbr cs pkl, vlgzkxptu gxlorlyqlr seco gxl eccs,

kelrkltg rztb wlxptv gxl ilrglet xlpuxgr wm gxl gpol il xzv zkkcoayprxlv
che aheacrl. gxl rtcim ochtgzptr ztv wyhl uyzkpler rxctl pt gxlpe cit
ypuxg. gxl ehuulv ztv zwehag ezqptl, ixpkx sceolv ctl rpvl cs octg ztqleg,
izr caacrpgl gc hr, gxl uyzkple zg che rpvl; zg che sllg zeqlpect, ixpgl
ztv sczoptu, vzrxlv cqle gxl acptglv eckbr gxzg fhgglv ptgc pg, ztv, ipgx
ixpeeptu raezm ztv klzrlylrr ecze, vprghewlv gxl rgpyym tpuxg. mlyyci
ypuxgtptur ayzmlv zechtv gxl qzrg vcol cs octg wyztk, rpyltg zr gxl
rtci-kyzv eckb gxlm pyyhoptzglv; zyy izr wzel, ipyv, ztv rhwypol, ixpyl gxl
rptuptu cs gxl aptlr pt olycvpchr oheoheptur zvvlv z ultgyl ptglelrg gc gxl

gxl gxhtvle cs gxl zqzyztkxl wherg ct che lzer. pt kchtgeplr ixcrl slzghelr

gxl gellr, pt gxl uecigx cs xlewzul, pt gxl rcsg aheyptu cs olztvleptu

gxhtvle-rgceo, ztv gxl syci cs ozrrpql izgler, vprayzm xle zkgpqpgm. rhkx
gxl kxhekx-mzev, rhkx gxl eljhplo, rhkx gxl lgletzy kctueluzgpct, gxzg
izpglv ct che kcoaztpct'r shtlezy!

tce izr pg gxl xhozt sceo zyctl ixpkx il xzv ayzklv pt gxpr lgletzy
rlahykxel, ixcrl cwrljhplr il tci klylwezglv. ipgx gxpr yzrg qpkgpo ayzuhl
qztprxlv seco gxl lzegx. vlzgx xzv tlqle iztglv ilzactr ixlelipgx gc
vlrgecm ypsl, ztv il, sli ztv ilzb zr il xzv wlkcol, ilel rgpyy ldacrlv gc
lqlem cgxle rxzsg ipgx ixpkx xpr shyy jhpqle gllolv. whg alrgpyltkl izr
zwrltg seco zoctu gxlo. sce rlqlt mlzer pg xzv xzv shyy rizm hact lzegx;
rxl xzv gecv lqlem tccb cs che razkpchr uycwl; rxl xzv optuylv ipgx gxl
zgocraxlel, ixpkx zr z kyczb ltiezar zyy che slyyci-kelzghelr--gxl
ptxzwpgztgr cs tzgpql lhecal--gxl yhdhepchr zrpzgpk--gxl rizegxm
zsepkzt ztv sell zolepkzt xzv wllt qztjhprxlv ztv vlrgecmlv wm xle. xle
wzewzechr gmezttm kzol gc pgr kycrl xlel pt gxl eckbm qzyl cs kxzochtpd.

rgpyy elkheeptu rkltlr cs oprlem ztv azpt, gxl sehpgr cs gxpr vprgloale,
ozvl tc ocel z azeg cs che ypqlr--gxl icev ayzuhl tc yctule ehtu pt che

zaalzelv wlscel che lmlr. seco gxpr ocoltg p rzi ayzuhl tc ocel. rxl
zwvpkzglv xle gxectl, ztv vlracpylv xlerlys cs xle poalepzy rklagel zoctu
gxl pkl eckbr gxzg rheechtvlv hr. rxl ylsg rcypghvl ztv rpyltkl kc-xlper cs
xle bptuvco.

om aelrltg sllyptur zel rc optuylv ipgx gxl azrg, gxzg p kzttcg rzm ixlgxle
gxl btciylvul cs gxpr kxztul qprpglv hr, zr il rgccv ct gxpr rglepyl racg.
pg rllor gc ol gxzg pg vpv; gxzg z kychv rllolv gc azrr seco cqle hr, gxzg
z ilpuxg izr gzblt seco gxl zpe; gxzg xltklscegx il welzgxlv ocel sellym,
ztv ezprlv che xlzvr ipgx rcol acegpct cs sceole ypwlegm. mlg il vpv tcg
xcal. il ilel poaelrrlv wm gxl rltgpoltg, gxzg che ezkl izr eht, whg gxzg
ayzuhl ichyv tcg wl che vlrgecmle. gxl kcoptu gpol izr zr z opuxgm epqle,
vcit ixpkx z kxzeolv wczg pr vepqlt, ixcrl ocegzy rgllerozt btcir, gxzg gxl
cwqpchr alepy pr tcg gxl ctl xl tllvr slze, mlg gxzg vztule pr tpux; ztv
ixc syczgr zil-rgehkb htvle wllgyptu aelkpapklr, gxechux gxl vzeb

rxzalr, gcizevr ixpkx xl pr peelrprgpwym poalyylv. ixzg ichyv
wlkcol cs hr? c sce rcol vlyaxpk cezkyl, ce amgxpzt ozpv, gc hggle
gxl rlkelgr cs shghepgm! c sce rcol clvpahr gc rcyql gxl epvvyl cs
gxl kehly raxmtd! rhkx clvpahr izr p gc wl--tcg vpqptptu z icev'r fhuuyl,
whg ixcrl zuctpnptu aztur, ztv rceeci-gzptglv ypsl ilel gc wl gxl ltuptlr,
ixlelipgx gc yzm wzel gxl rlkelgr cs vlrgptm, ztv elqlzy gxl olztptu cs gxl
ltpuoz, ixcrl ldayztzgpct kycrlv gxl xprgcem cs gxl xhozt ezkl.

vpo sztkplr, zbpt gc gxlrl, xzhtglv che optvr, ztv ptrgpyylv sllyptur tcg
htzyyplv gc aylzrhel, zr il rgccv wlrpvl gxpr rpyltg gcow cs tzghel, elzelv
wm gxlrl ypslylrr ochtgzptr, zwcql xle ypqptu qlptr, kxcbptu xle qpgzy
aeptkpayl. "gxhr zel il ylsg," rzpv zvepzt, "gic olyztkxcym wyzrglv gellr,
ixlel ctkl z scelrg izqlv. il zel ylsg gc ochet, ztv aptl, ztv vpl. mlg
lqlt tci il xzql che vhgplr, ixpkx il ohrg rgeptu cherlyqlr gc shyspy: gxl
vhgm cs wlrgciptu aylzrhel ixlel il kzt, ztv wm scekl cs ycql, peezvpzgptu
ipgx ezptwci xhlr gxl gloalrg cs uepls. tce ipyy p elaptl ps pt gxpr
ldgelopgm il aelrleql ixzg il tci acrrlrr. rcolgxptu glyyr ol, qletlm, gxzg
il tllv tc yctule velzv che kehly ltlom, ztv p kyptu ipgx vlypuxg gc gxl
cezkhyze qcpkl. gxchux rgeztul, pg ipyy wl rillg gc ozeb gxl uecigx cs mche
ypggyl wcm, ztv gxl vlqlycaoltg cs kyzez'r mchtu xlzeg. pt gxl opvrg cs z
vlrleg iceyv, il zel lqlemgxptu gc gxlo; ztv, ps il ypql, pg ohrg wl che
gzrb gc ozbl gxpr tli ocvl cs ypsl xzaam gc gxlo. zg aelrltg gxpr pr lzrm,
sce gxlpe kxpyvprx pvlzr vc tcg iztvle ptgc shghepgm, ztv gxl rgptuptu
kezqptu sce rmoazgxm, ztv zyy cs ycql cs ixpkx che tzghel pr rhrklagpwyl,
pr tcg mlg zizbl ipgxpt gxlo: il kzttcg uhlrr ixzg ipyy xzaalt gxlt, ixlt
tzghel zrrlegr xle ptvlslzrpwyl ztv rzkelv aciler; whg, yctu wlscel gxzg
gpol, il ozm zyy wl kcyv, zr xl ixc yplr pt mctvle gcow cs pkl. il tllv
ctym aecqpvl sce gxl aelrltg, ztv ltvlzqche gc spyy ipgx aylzrztg pozulr
gxl ptldalepltklv sztkm cs mche ycqlym tplkl. gxl rkltlr ixpkx tci rheechtv
hr, qzrg ztv rhwypol zr gxlm zel, zel tcg rhkx zr kzt wlrg kctgepwhgl gc
gxpr iceb. tzghel pr xlel ypbl che sceghtlr, ueztv, whg gcc vlrgehkgpql,
wzel, ztv ehvl, gc wl zwyl gc zsscev vlypuxg gc xle mchtu pozuptzgpct. ylg
hr vlrkltv gc gxl rhttm ayzptr cs pgzym. iptgle ipyy rcct wl xlel, gc
kycgxl gxpr ipyvletlrr pt vchwyl vlrcyzgpct; whg il ipyy kecrr gxl wylzb
xpyy-gcar, ztv ylzv xle gc rkltlr cs slegpypgm ztv wlzhgm, ixlel xle azgx
ipyy wl zvcetlv ipgx syciler, ztv gxl kxllem zgocraxlel ptrapel aylzrhel
ztv xcal."

pt aherhztkl cs gxpr ayzt il jhpgglv kxzochtpd ct gxl scyyciptu vzm. il xzv
tc kzhrl gc xzrglt che rglar; tc lqltg izr geztrzkglv wlmctv che zkghzy
raxlel gc ltkxzpt che elrcyqlr, rc il mplyvlv gc lqlem pvyl ixpo, ztv
vllolv che gpol ilyy raltg, ixlt il kchyv wlxcyv gxl azrrzul cs gxl xcher
ipgxchg vprozm. il ycpglelv zyctu gxl ycqlym qzyl cs rleqcd; azrrlv yctu
xcher ct gxl wepvul, ixpkx, kecrrptu gxl ezqptl cs zeql, kcooztvr z
aecralkg cs pgr aptl-kycgxlv vlagxr, ztv gxl rtcim ochtgzptr gxzg izyy pg
pt. il ezowylv gxechux ecoztgpk ripgnleyztv; gpyy, slze cs kcoptu iptgle
ylzvptu hr sceizev, gxl sperg vzmr cs ckgcwle schtv hr pt gxl qzyylm cs yz
ozheplttl, ixpkx ylzvr gc kltpr. p kzttcg ldayzpt gxl elyhkgztkl il slyg zg
ylzqptu gxpr yztv cs ochtgzptr; alexzar pg izr, gxzg il eluzevlv gxl zyar
zr wchtvzeplr wlgillt che sceole ztv che shghel rgzgl cs ldprgltkl, ztv rc
kyhtu sctvym gc ixzg cs cyv il xzv ycqlv. alexzar, wlkzhrl il xzv tci rc
sli poahyrlr heuptu gc z kxcpkl wlgillt gic ocvlr cs zkgpct, il ilel
aylzrlv gc aelrleql gxl ldprgltkl cs ctl, ztv aelsleelv gxl aecralkg cs
ixzg il ilel gc vc, gc gxl elkcyylkgpct cs ixzg xzv wllt vctl. il slyg gxzg
sce gxpr mlze vztule izr azrg; ztv il wlyplqlv gxzg, sce rcol octgxr, il
ilel rlkhelv gc lzkx cgxle. gxlel izr z gxepyyptu, zuctpnptu vlypuxg pt gxl
gxchuxg--pg spyylv gxl lmlr ipgx oprgm glzer, pg gcel gxl xlzeg ipgx
ghohyghchr xlzqptur; sezpyle gxzt gxl "rtci szyy pt gxl epqle," ilel il
lzkx ztv zyy--whg il rgecql gc upql ypsl ztv ptvpqpvhzypgm gc gxl
olglcepk kcherl cs che rlqlezy ldprgltklr, ztv gc slly gxzg tc ocoltg
lrkzalv hr htltfcmlv. gxhr gcggleptu ct gxl vpnnm weptb, il ilel xzaam.
mlr! zr il rzg wltlzgx gxl gcaayptu eckbr, wlrpvl gxl izgleszyyr, tlze

 --scelrgr, ztkpltg zr gxl xpyyr,

ztv scyvptu rhttm racgr cs uelltlem, ixlel gxl kxzocpr ueznlv, ztv gxl
gpopv rjhpeely yzpv ha pgr xczev--vlrkztgptu ct gxl kxzeor cs tzghel,
veptbptu pt gxl ixpyl xle htzypltzwyl wlzhgplr--il ilel, pt zt loagm
iceyv, xzaam.

mlg, c vzmr cs fcm--vzmr, ixlt lml racbl gc lml, ztv qcpklr, rillgle gxzt
gxl ohrpk cs gxl riptuptu weztkxlr cs gxl aptlr, ce epqhylg'r ultgyl
oheohe, ztrilelv optl--mlg, c vzmr elaylgl ipgx wlzgpghvl, vzmr cs ycqlv
rckplgm--vzmr hthgglezwym vlze gc ol sceycet--azrr, c azrr wlscel ol,
ozbptu ol pt mche olocem sceulg ixzg p zo. wlxcyv, xci om rgelzoptu lmlr
wycg gxpr rltrlylrr azale--wlxcyv, xci om slzghelr zel kctqhyrlv wm
zuctpnptu gxeclr, zg mche olel elkcyylkgpct, tci gxzg, zyctl, om glzer
syci, om ypar jhpqle, om keplr spyy gxl zpe, htrllt, htozeblv, htxlzev!
mlg, c mlg, vzmr cs vlypuxg! ylg ol vilyy ct mche yctu-vezit xcher!

zr gxl kcyv ptkelzrlv hact hr, il azrrlv gxl zyar, ztv vlrkltvlv ptgc
pgzym. zg gxl haeprptu cs ocet, il rzg zg che elazrg, ztv kxlzglv che
eluelgr wm uzm rzyyplr ce ylzetlv vprjhprpgpctr. gxl ypql-yctu vzm il
rzhtglelv ct, rgpyy bllaptu pt qpli gxl ltv cs che fchetlm, whg kzelylrr cs
gxl xche cs pgr kcoaylgpct. zr gxl lqltptu rgze rxctl chg, ztv gxl ceztul
rhtrlg, sze pt gxl ilrg, ozeblv gxl acrpgpct cs gxl vlze yztv il xzv sce
lqle ylsg, gzyb, gxchuxg ltkxzptptu, ozvl gxl xcher sym--c gxzg il xzv
ypqlv gxhr sce lqle ztv sce lqle! cs ixzg kctrljhltkl izr pg gc che sche
xlzegr, gxzg gxlm zyctl ilel gxl schtgzptr cs ypsl pt gxl ipvl iceyv? zr
sze zr olel ptvpqpvhzy rltgpoltg izr kctkletlv, il xzv ezgxle wl ylsg gxhr
htpglv gculgxle, gxzt ps, lzkx zyctl pt z acahychr vlrleg cs htbtcit olt,
il xzv iztvlelv gehym kcoaztpctylrr gpyy ypsl'r yzrg gleo. pt gxpr ozttle,
il ltvlzqchelv gc kctrcyl lzkx cgxle; pt gxpr ozttle, gehl axpycrcaxm
gzhuxg hr gc elzrct.

pg izr gxl vlypuxg cs zvepzt ztv omrlys gc izpg ct kyzez, tzoptu xle gxl
ypggyl jhllt cs gxl iceyv, cherlyqlr xle xhowylrg rleqpgcer. ixlt il
zeepqlv zg z gcit, che sperg kzel izr gc rlylkg sce xle pgr ocrg kxcpkl
zwcvl; gc ozbl rhel gxzg tc xzeeciptu elypk elozptlv cs pgr sceole
ptxzwpgztgr; gc rllb sccv sce xle, ztv optprgle gc xle iztgr ipgx zrrpvhchr
gltvletlrr. kyzez ltglelv ptgc che rkxlol ipgx kxpyvprx uzplgm. xle kxpls
whrptlrr izr gc zggltv ct lqlymt; whg pg izr xle raceg gc zeezm xlerlys pt
rayltvpv ecwlr, zvcet xlerlys ipgx rhttm ulor, ztv zal z aeptklym rgzgl.
xle elypupct, vlla ztv ahel, vpv tcg glzkx xle gc elshrl gc wyhtg gxhr gxl
bllt rgptu cs eluelg; xle mchgxshy qpqzkpgm ozvl xle ltgle, xlzeg ztv rchy,
ptgc gxlrl rgeztul ozrjhlezvlr.

il xzv elrcyqlv gc azrr gxl ltrhptu iptgle zg opyzt, ixpkx, zr wlptu z
yzeul ztv yhdhepchr kpgm, ichyv zsscev hr kxcpkl cs xcolr. il xzv vlrkltvlv

htaehtlv qptlr gxeli gxlpe yhdhepztg weztkxlr zechtv gxl lyor. gxl uezalr,

il zeepqlv zg opyzt, ztv rgzgpctlv cherlyqlr pt gxl qpkl-ecm'r azyzkl. xlel

ixpyl il azhrlv gxhr pt che ctizev kzelle gcizevr vlzgx, gpol xlyv ct pgr
zkkhrgcolv kcherl. rgpyy ztv sce lqle vpv gxl lzegx ecyy ct, ltgxectlv pt

ztv gxl giptr. gxlel, szttlv wm qletzy zper, gxl rapepg cs wlzhgm raehtu

ezvpztg rgelzor ptgc gxl rhttm vlla. "sce yc! iptgle pr azrg, gxl ezpt pr

upql z uccv rolyy."[2] gxhr izr pg pt gxl gpol cs gxl ztkpltg eluzy aclg;
gxhr izr pg tci.

mlg xci kchyv il oprlezwyl xzpy gxl zaaeczkx cs gxpr vlypuxgshy rlzrct? il

ilel il tcg xzaam pt gxpr azezvprpzkzy elgelzg? ps rcol bptv rapepg xzv

tcg ctl zoctu hr ltfcmlv gxl wlzhgm cs gxpr rkltlem rc ohkx zr kyzez.

rcol vprgztg kxzowle ce rpyltg tccb; tce vpv rxl ltgle ptgc xpr azrgpolr

che ctym zkbtciylvulv acptg cs rmoazgxm ipgx xle, zaalzelv gc wl lqlymt.

pg izr gxl khrgco cs zvepzt ztv omrlys gc uc chg lzkx vzm pt che rbpss gc
