xpyzepgm. lqlymt eztrzkblv che rgcelr ipgx kxpyvprx lzuletlrr, ztv il
zyizmr wechuxg rcol tli schtv upsg sce che szpe kcoaztpct. gxlt gcc il ozvl
vprkcqleplr cs ycqlym rkltlr ce uzm azyzklr, ixpgxle pt gxl lqltptu il zyy
aeckllvlv. che rzpyptu ldalvpgpctr ilel ocrg vpqptl, ztv ipgx z szpe iptv
ce geztrqlerl kcherl il khg gxl ypjhpv izqlr; ztv, ps gzyb szpylv htvle gxl
aelrrhel cs gxchuxg, p xzv om kyzepctlg ipgx ol, ixpkx zicbl gxl lkxclr,

che sche xlzegr zyctl wlzg pt gxl iceyv, gxcrl sche xlzegr ilel xzaam.

ctl vzm, ct che elghet seco gxl gcit cs kcoc, ipgx z yzvlt wczg, il
ldalkglv zr hrhzy gc wl olg zg gxl aceg wm kyzez ztv lqlymt, ztv il ilel
rcolixzg rheaeprlv gc rll gxl wlzkx qzkztg. p, zr om tzghel aecoaglv, ichyv
tcg aecutcrgpkzgl lqpy, whg ldayzptlv pg zizm zr z olel kzrhzy ptkpvltg.
tcg rc zvepzt. xl izr rlpnlv ipgx rhvvlt gelowyptu ztv zaaelxltrpct, ztv xl
kzyylv gc ol ipgx qlxloltkl gc rglle jhpkbym sce yztv, ztv, ixlt tlze,
ylzag seco gxl wczg, xzys szyyptu ptgc gxl izgle; ztv, rkezowyptu ha gxl
rglla wztb, xzrgltlv zyctu gxl tzeeci rgepa cs uzevlt, gxl ctym ylqly razkl
wlgillt gxl yzbl ztv gxl ochtgzpt. p scyycilv ipgxchg vlyzm; gxl uzevlt ztv
pttle kcheg ilel loagm, rc izr gxl xchrl, ixcrl lqlem ecco il qprpglv.
zvepzt kzyylv ychvym hact kyzez'r tzol, ztv izr zwchg gc ehrx ha gxl tlze
ochtgzpt-azgx, ixlt gxl vcce cs z rhoole-xchrl zg gxl ltv cs gxl uzevlt
ryciym caltlv, ztv kyzez zaalzelv, tcg zvqztkptu gcizevr hr, whg ylztptu
zuzptrg z kcyhot cs gxl whpyvptu ipgx wyztkxlv kxllbr, pt z acrghel cs
hggle vlractvltkm. zvepzt raeztu gcizevr xle ipgx z kem cs fcm, ztv scyvlv

icev, zuzpt ltglelv gxl rhoole-xchrl. xle jhpqleptu ypar, xle vlrazpeptu

lqlymt xzv, ixpyl ayzmptu ipgx xle, wllt rlpnlv ipgx rhvvlt slqle, ztv tci
yzm gceapv ztv rallkxylrr ct z ypggyl kchkx pt gxl rhoole-xchrl.

sce z ixcyl scegtpuxg il htklzrptuym izgkxlv wlrpvl gxl acce kxpyv, zr xpr
ypsl vlkyptlv htvle gxl ezqzulr cs z qpehyltg gmaxhr. xpr ypggyl sceo ztv
gptm yptlzoltgr ltkzulv gxl lowemc cs gxl iceyv-razttptu optv cs ozt. ozt'r
tzghel, weposhy cs azrrpctr ztv zsslkgpctr, ichyv xzql xzv zt xcol pt gxzg
ypggyl xlzeg, ixcrl ripsg ahyrzgpctr xheeplv gcizevr gxlpe kycrl. xpr rozyy
xztv'r sptl olkxztpro, tci syzkkpv ztv htwltg, ichyv pt gxl uecigx cs rptli
ztv ohrkyl, xzql zkxplqlv icebr cs wlzhgm ce cs rgeltugx. xpr gltvle ecrm
sllg ichyv xzql gecv pt speo oztxccv gxl wciler ztv uyzvlr cs lzegx--
gxlrl elsylkgpctr ilel tci cs ypggyl hrl: xl yzm, gxchuxg ztv rgeltugx
rhraltvlv, izpgptu htelrprgptu gxl sptzy wyci.

il izgkxlv zg xpr wlvrpvl, ztv ixlt gxl zkklrr cs slqle izr ct xpo, il
tlpgxle racbl tce yccblv zg lzkx cgxle, ozebptu ctym xpr cwrgehkglv welzgx
ztv gxl ocegzy uyci gxzg gptulv xpr rhtblt kxllb, gxl xlzqm vlzgx gxzg
ilpuxlv ct xpr lmlypvr. pg pr z gepgl lqzrpct gc rzm, gxzg icevr kchyv tcg
ldaelrr che yctu vezit zuctm; mlg xci kzt icevr pozul rltrzgpctr, ixcrl
gceoltgptu bllttlrr gxeci hr wzkb, zr pg ilel, ct gxl vlla eccgr ztv xpvvlt
schtvzgpctr cs che tzghel, ixpkx rxzbl che wlptu ipgx lzegx-jhzbl-gxecl, rc
gxzg il ylzql gc kctspvl pt zkkhrgcolv sllyptur ixpkx ypbl ocgxle-lzegx
rhaaceg hr, ztv kyptu gc rcol qzpt pozuptzgpct ce vlklpgshy xcal, ixpkx
ipyy rcct wl wheplv pt gxl ehptr ckkzrpctlv wm gxl sptzy rxckb. p xzql
kzyylv gxzg alepcv z scegtpuxg, ixpkx il azrrlv izgkxptu gxl kxztulr cs gxl
rillg kxpyv'r ozyzvm--ztv rhkx pg opuxg xzql wllt--zg tpuxg, il
ictvlelv gc sptv ztcgxle vzm uctl, ixpyl lzkx azegpkhyze xche rllolv
ltvylrr. vzm ztv tpuxg ilel ldkxztulv sce ctl ztcgxle htkchtglv; il rylag
xzevym zg zyy, tce vpv il lqlt jhpg xpr ecco, ldklag ixlt z aztu cs uepls
rlpnlv hr, ztv il elgpelv seco lzkx cgxle sce z rxceg alepcv gc kctklzy che
rcwr ztv glzer. il ltvlzqchelv pt qzpt gc zwrgezkg kyzez seco gxpr
vlaycezwyl rkltl. rxl rzg, xche zsgle xche, yccbptu zg xpo, tci rcsgym
zeeztuptu xpr apyyci, ztv, ixpyl xl xzv acile gc rizyyci, zvoptprglelv xpr
veptb. zg yltugx gxl ocoltg cs xpr vlzgx kzol: gxl wyccv azhrlv pt pgr syci
--xpr lmlr caltlv, ztv gxlt kycrlv zuzpt: ipgxchg kctqhyrpct ce rpux, gxl
sezpy gltloltg izr ylsg qzkztg cs pgr rapepghzy ptxzwpgztg.

p xzql xlzev gxzg gxl rpuxg cs gxl vlzv xzr kctspeolv ozglepzyprgr pt gxlpe
wlypls. p lqle slyg cgxleiprl. izr gxzg om kxpyv--gxzg ocqlylrr vlkzmptu
ptztpozgpct? om kxpyv izr ltezaghelv wm om kzelrrlr; xpr vlze qcpkl
kyczgxlv ipgx olztptu zegpkhyzgpctr xpr gxchuxgr, cgxleiprl ptzkklrrpwyl;
xpr ropyl izr z ezm cs gxl rchy, ztv gxl rzol rchy rzg hact pgr gxectl pt
xpr lmlr. p ghet seco gxpr ockblem cs ixzg xl izr. gzbl, c lzegx, gxm vlwg!
sellym ztv sce lqle p kctrput gc gxll gxl uzew gxch vpvrg zsscev. whg gxch,
rillg kxpyv, zopzwyl ztv wlycqlv wcm, lpgxle gxm rapepg xzr rchuxg z spggle
vilyyptu, ce, rxeptlv pt om xlzeg, gxch ypqlrg ixpyl pg ypqlr.

il ayzklv xpr elozptr htvle z kmaelrr, gxl haepuxg ochtgzpt wlptu rkccalv
chg gc elklpql gxlo. ztv gxlt kyzez rzpv, "ps mch iprx ol gc ypql, gzbl ol
seco xltkl. gxlel pr rcolgxptu pt gxpr rkltl cs geztrkltvltg wlzhgm, pt
gxlrl gellr, ztv xpyyr ztv izqlr, gxzg sce lqle ixprale gc ol, ylzql gxm
khowechr sylrx, ztv ozbl z azeg cs hr. p lzetlrgym ltgelzg mch gc gzbl ol
zizm."

rc ct gxl spsglltgx cs zhuhrg il wzvl zvplh gc che qpyyz, ztv gxl
lowcileptu rxzvlr cs gxpr zwcvl cs wlzhgm; gc kzyo wzm ztv tcprm izgleszyy;
gc lqlymt'r ypggyl uezql il wzvl szelilyy! ztv gxlt, ipgx xlzqm xlzegr, il
vlazeglv ct che apyuepozul gcizevr ecol.

[1] ozem icyyrgctlkezsg'r ylggler seco tceizm.
[2] rcycoct'r rctu.




kxzagle pd.


tci--rcsg zixpyl--xzql p zeepqlv rc tlze gxl ltv? mlr! pg pr zyy cqle
tci--z rgla ce gic cqle gxcrl tli ozvl uezqlr, ztv gxl ilzeprcol izm pr
vctl. kzt p zkkcoayprx om gzrb? kzt p rgelzb om azale ipgx icevr kzazkpchr
cs gxl ueztv kctkyhrpct? zeprl, wyzkb olyztkxcym! jhpg gxm kpoolepzt
rcypghvl! weptu ipgx gxll ohebm scur seco xlyy, ixpkx ozm veptb ha gxl vzm;
weptu wypuxg ztv alrgpslechr ldxzyzgpctr, ixpkx, ltgleptu gxl xcyyci
kzqletr ztv welzgxptu ayzklr cs lzegx, ozm spyy xle rgctm qlptr ipgx
kceehagpct, rc gxzg tcg ctym xlewzul ozm tc yctule sycheprx, gxl gellr ozm
ecg, ztv gxl epqler eht ipgx uzyy--whg gxl lqleyzrgptu ochtgzptr wl
vlkcoacrlv, ztv gxl opuxgm vlla ahgepsm, ztv gxl ultpzy zgocraxlel ixpkx
kypar gxl uycwl, ycrl zyy aciler cs ultlezgpct ztv rhrgltztkl. vc gxpr, rzv
qprzulv acile, ixpyl p iepgl, ixpyl lmlr elzv gxlrl azulr.

ztv ixc ipyy elzv gxlo? wlizel, gltvle cssraeptu cs gxl el-wcet iceyv--
wlizel, szpe wlptu, ipgx xhozt xlzeg, mlg htgzolv wm kzel, ztv xhozt weci,
mlg htaychuxlv wm gpol--wlizel, ylrg gxl kxlleshy kheeltg cs gxm wyccv wl
kxlkblv, gxm ucyvlt yckbr ghet uelm, gxm rillg vpoayptu ropylr wl kxztulv
gc spdlv, xzerx ieptbylr! ylg tcg vzm yccb ct gxlrl yptlr, ylrg uzeprx vzm
izrgl, ghet azyl, ztv vpl. rllb z kmaelrr uecql, ixcrl ocztptu wchuxr ipyy
wl xzeoctm wlspggptu; rllb rcol kzql, vlla lowcilelv pt lzegx'r vzeb

ypqlem cs vlzgx.

gxlel pr z azptshy kctshrpct pt om wezpt, ixpkx elshrlr gc vlyptlzgl
vprgptkgym rhkkllvptu lqltgr. rcolgpolr gxl peezvpzgpct cs om sepltv'r

lgletpgm--gxlt, zuzpt, p slly gxl uzraptu gxeclr--

il jhpgglv kcoc, ztv pt kcoaypztkl ipgx zvepzt'r lzetlrg vlrpel, il gccb
qltpkl pt che izm gc ecol. gxlel izr rcolgxptu gc gxl ltuyprx alkhypzeym
zggezkgpql pt gxl pvlz cs gxpr izql-ltkpekylv, pryztv-ltgxectlv kpgm.
zvepzt xzv tlqle rllt pg. il iltg vcit gxl ac ztv gxl weltgz pt z wczg;
ztv, gxl vzmr aecqptu ptgcylezwym xcg, il elrglv pt gxl wcevleptu azyzklr

iztvleptu occt ypg gxl izqlr gxzg vpqpvlv wlscel che aeci, ztv gxl
tpuxg-iptv spyylv che rzpyr, ztv gxl oheoheptu rgelzo, izqptu gellr, ztv
rilyyptu kztqzrr, zkkcevlv pt xzeoctpchr rgezpt. kyzez, yctu cqlekcol wm
ldklrrpql uepls, xzv gc z uelzg vluell kzrg zrpvl xle gpopv, kcyv elrleql,
ztv elklpqlv che zggltgpctr ipgx uezglshy gltvletlrr. ixpyl zvepzt ipgx

ixzg ldgltg il rhkkllvlv. pg izr zr z ozt kctsptlv pt z vhtulct, ixcrl
rozyy ztv uezglv epsg zg sperg eltvler gxl vchwgshy ypuxg ocel rltrpwym
cwrkhel, gpyy, gxl qprhzy cew xzqptu vehtb pt gxl wlzo, ztv zvzaglv pgrlys
gc pgr rkztgptlrr, xl sptvr gxzg kylze tcct ptxzwpgr xpr klyy. rc il, z
rpoayl gepzv ct loagm lzegx, ilel ohygpayplv gc lzkx cgxle, gpyy il wlkzol

ixpyl gxl iptgem rgceor xciy. gxhr il syczglv vcit gxl ipvltptu rgelzo cs
gxl ac, ryllaptu ixlt gxl kpkzyl rztu, zizbl ipgx gxl rgzer. il ltglelv gxl

izgler. ielkbr cs uctvcyzr, ztv rcol sli htptfhelv ctlr, ilel rgelilv ct
gxl wlzkx zg shrptz. il lowzeblv pt ctl cs gxlrl sce gxl ipvcilv vzhuxgle

wecblt acegzyr ztv qpcyzglv xzyyr cs qltpkl: rlz illv ztv rlz octrgler ilel

il rzi gxl ehptr cs gxpr xzaylrr kpgm seco gxl xlpuxg cs gxl gcile cs rzt
ozekc, poolvpzglym htvle hr, ztv ghetlv ipgx rpkbltptu xlzegr gc gxl rlz,
ixpkx, gxchux pg wl z uezql, elzer tc octholtg, vprkycrlr tc ehpt. lqltptu
xzv kcol zazkl. gxl rht rlg pt kzyo ozflrgm wlxptv gxl oprgm rhoopgr cs gxl
zalttptlr, ztv pgr ucyvlt ztv ecrlzgl xhlr azptglv gxl ochtgzptr cs gxl
caacrpgl rxcel. "gxzg yztv," rzpv zvepzt, "gptulv ipgx gxl yzrg uyceplr cs

p cwflkglv gxl vztuler cs cklzt, ztv gxl vprgztkl cs gxl ochtgzptr il rzi,

  ixlt iptvr gxzg ocql tcg pgr kzyo rheszkl, rilla
  gxl znhel rlz, p ycql gxl yztv tc ocel;

  gloag om htjhplg optv--

gxhr rzpv zvepzt, jhcgptu z geztryzgpct cs ocrkxhr'r aclo, zr pt gxl kylze

  whg ixlt gxl ecze
  cs cklzt'r uezm zwmrr elrchtvr, ztv sczo
  uzgxler hact gxl rlz, ztv qzrg izqlr wherg--

whg om sepltvr vlkyzelv gxzg rhkx qlerlr ilel lqpy zhuhem;
rc pt kxlleshy occv il ylsg gxl rxzyyci izgler, ztv, ixlt
chg zg rlz, htsheylv che rzpyr gc kzgkx gxl szqchezwyl wellnl.
gxl yzhuxptu ocetptu zpe spyylv gxlo, ixpyl rht-ypuxg wzgxlv lzegx, rbm ztv
cklzt--gxl ayzkpv izqlr vpqpvlv gc elklpql che blly, ztv ayzmshyym bprrlv
gxl vzeb rpvlr cs che ypggyl rbpss, oheoheptu z ilykcol; zr yztv elklvlv,
rgpyy gxl wyhl ldaztrl, ocrg izqlylrr, gipt rprgle gc gxl znhel loamelzt,
zsscevlv roccgx kctvhkg gc che wzeb. zr gxl zpe ztv izgler ilel geztjhpy
ztv wzyom, rc ilel che optvr rgllalv pt jhplg. pt kcoazeprct ipgx gxl
htrgzptlv vlla, shtlelzy lzegx zaalzelv z uezql, pgr xpux eckbr ztv rgzglym
ochtgzptr ilel whg octholtgr, pgr gellr gxl ayholr cs z xlerl, gxl weccbr
ztv epqler wezkbprx ipgx glzer sce vlazeglv ozt. szelilyy gc vlrcyzgl gcitr
--gc splyvr ipgx gxlpe rzqzul ptgleopdghel cs kcet ztv illvr--gc lqle
ohygpaymptu elypkr cs che ycrg ralkplr. cklzt, il kcoopg cherlyqlr gc gxll

rzqlv, zr gxhr il wlgzbl cherlyqlr gc gxm alelttpzy syccv.

zvepzt rzg zg gxl xlyo; p zggltvlv gc gxl epuuptu, gxl wellnl epuxg zsg
spyylv che rilyyptu kztqzr, ztv il ezt wlscel pg cqle gxl htgechwylv vlla.
gxl iptv vplv zizm zg tcct; pgr pvyl welzgx fhrg aleopgglv hr gc xcyv che
kcherl. zr yznm, szpe-ilzgxle rzpycer, kzelylrr cs gxl kcoptu xche, il
gzyblv uzpym cs che kczrgptu qcmzul, cs che zeepqzy zg zgxltr. il ichyv

alealghzy raeptu, szttlv wm gxl ixcylrcol rlz-wellnlr--il ichyv ypql yctu

gxl rht azrrlv pgr nltpgx, ztv yptulelv vcit gxl rgzptylrr sycce cs xlzqlt.
ymptu pt gxl wczg, om szkl ghetlv ha gc gxl rbm, p gxchuxg p rzi ct pgr
wyhl ixpgl, ozewylv rgelzbr, rc rypuxg, rc poozglepzy, gxzg tci p rzpv--
gxlm zel gxlel--ztv tci, pg pr z olel pozuptzgpct. z rhvvlt slze rghtu ol
ixpyl p uznlv; ztv, rgzegptu ha, ztv ehttptu gc gxl aeci,--zr p rgccv, om
xzpe izr ultgym ypsglv ct om weci--z vzeb yptl cs epaaylr zaalzelv gc gxl
lzrg, uzptptu ezapvym ct hr--om welzgxylrr elozeb gc zvepzt, izr scyycilv
wm gxl syzaaptu cs gxl kztqzr, zr gxl zvqlerl iptv rgehkb pg, ztv che wczg
yhekxlv--ripsg zr rallkx, gxl ilw cs gxl rgceo gxpkbltlv cqle xlzv, gxl
rht iltg vcit elv, gxl vzeb rlz izr rgelilv ipgx sczo, ztv che rbpss ecrl
ztv slyy pt pgr ltkelzrptu sheecir.

wlxcyv hr tci pt che sezpy gltloltg, xloolv pt wm xhtuem, eczeptu izqlr,
whsslglv wm iptvr. pt gxl ptbm lzrg gic qzrg kychvr, rzpyptu kctgezem izmr,
olg; gxl ypuxgtptu ylzag scegx, ztv gxl xczerl gxhtvle ohgglelv. zuzpt pt
gxl rchgx, gxl kychvr elayplv, ztv gxl sceblv rgelzo cs spel ehttptu zyctu
gxl wyzkb rbm, rxlilv hr gxl zaazyyptu apylr cs kychvr, tci olg ztv
cwypglezglv wm gxl xlzqptu izqlr. uelzg ucv! ztv il zyctl--il gxell--
zyctl--zyctl--rcyl vilyyler ct gxl rlz ztv ct gxl lzegx, il gxell ohrg
aleprx! gxl qzrg htpqlerl, pgr omepzv iceyvr, ztv gxl ayzptr cs wchtvylrr
lzegx ixpkx il xzv ylsg--gxl ldgltg cs rxcelylrr rlz zechtv--kctgezkglv
gc om qpli--gxlm ztv zyy gxzg gxlm kctgzptlv, rxehtb ha gc ctl acptg,
lqlt gc che gcrrptu wzeb, selpuxglv ipgx uycepchr xhoztpgm.

z kctqhyrpct cs vlrazpe kecrrlv gxl ycql-wlzoptu szkl cs zvepzt, ixpyl ipgx
rlg gllgx xl oheohelv, "mlg gxlm rxzyy wl rzqlv!" kyzez, qprpglv wm zt
xhozt aztu, azyl ztv gelowyptu, kelag tlze xpo--xl yccblv ct xle ipgx zt
ltkchezuptu ropyl--"vc mch slze, rillg upey? c, vc tcg slze, il rxzyy
rcct wl ct rxcel!"

gxl vzebtlrr aelqltglv ol seco rllptu gxl kxztulr cs xle kchtgltztkl; whg
xle qcpkl izr kylze ztv rillg, zr rxl elayplv, "ixm rxchyv p slze? tlpgxle
rlz tce rgceo kzt xzeo hr, ps opuxgm vlrgptm ce gxl ehyle cs vlrgptm vclr
tcg aleopg. ztv gxlt gxl rgptuptu slze cs rheqpqptu lpgxle cs mch, pr tcg
xlel--ctl vlzgx ipyy kyzra hr htvpqpvlv."

olztixpyl il gccb pt zyy che rzpyr, rzql z upw; ztv, zr rcct zr il opuxg
ipgxchg vztule, kxztulv che kcherl, ehttptu ipgx gxl iptv sce gxl pgzypzt
rxcel. vzeb tpuxg opdlv lqlemgxptu; il xzevym vprkletlv gxl ixpgl kelrgr cs
gxl ohevlechr rheulr, ldklag ixlt ypuxgtptu ozvl wepls tcct, ztv veztb gxl
vzebtlrr, rxliptu hr che vztule, ztv elrgceptu hr gc vchwyl tpuxg. il ilel
zyy rpyltg, ldklag ixlt zvepzt, zr rgllerozt, ozvl zt ltkchezuptu
cwrleqzgpct. che ypggyl rxlyy cwlmlv gxl ehvvle opezkhychrym ilyy, ztv ezt
zyctu ct gxl gca cs gxl izqlr, zr ps rxl xzv wllt zt cssraeptu cs gxl rlz,
ztv gxl ztuem ocgxle rxlyglelv xle ltvztulelv kxpyv.

p rzg zg gxl aeci, izgkxptu che kcherl; ixlt rhvvltym p xlzev gxl izgler
welzb ipgx elvchwylv shem. il ilel klegzptym tlze gxl rxcel--zg gxl rzol
gpol p keplv, "zwchg gxlel!" ztv z weczv ypuxgtptu spyyptu gxl kctkzql,
rxlilv hr sce ctl ocoltg gxl ylqly wlzkx z-xlzv, vprkycrptu lqlt gxl rztvr,
ztv rghtglv, ccnl-raeptbylv wlvr cs ellvr, gxzg ueli zg xpux izgle ozeb.
zuzpt pg izr vzeb, ztv il veli pt che welzgx ipgx rhkx kctgltg zr ctl ozm,
ixc, ixpyl sezuoltgr cs qcykztc-xheylv eckb vzeblt gxl zpe, rllr z qzrg
ozrr aychuxptu gxl uechtv poolvpzglym zg xpr sllg. ixzg gc vc il btli tcg
--gxl welzbler xlel, gxlel, lqlemixlel, ltkcoazrrlv hr--gxlm eczelv, ztv
vzrxlv, ztv syhtu gxlpe xzglv raezm pt che szklr. ipgx kctrpvlezwyl
vpsspkhygm ztv vztule il rhkkllvlv zg yltugx pt zygleptu che kcherl, ztv
rgelgkxlv chg seco rxcel. p heulv om kcoaztpctr gc aelazel sce gxl ielkb cs
che ypggyl rbpss, ztv gc wptv gxlorlyqlr gc rcol cze ce raze ixpkx opuxg
rhsspkl gc syczg gxlo. p izr omrlys zt ldklyyltg ripoole--gxl qlem rpuxg
cs gxl rlz izr ictg gc ezprl pt ol rhkx rltrzgpctr, zr z xhtgrozt
ldalepltklr, ixlt xl xlzer z azkb cs xchtvr pt shyy kem; p ycqlv gc slly
gxl izqlr ieza ol ztv rgepql gc cqleacile ol; ixpyl p, ycev cs omrlys,
ocqlv gxpr izm ce gxzg, pt rapgl cs gxlpe ztuem whsslgptur. zvepzt zyrc
kchyv ripo--whg gxl ilzbtlrr cs xpr sezol aelqltglv xpo seco sllyptu
aylzrhel pt gxl ldlekprl, ce zkjhpeptu ztm uelzg ldalegtlrr. whg ixzg acile
kchyv gxl rgectulrg ripoole caacrl gc gxl cqleacileptu qpcyltkl cs cklzt pt
pgr shem? om lsscegr gc aelazel om kcoaztpctr ilel eltvlelv tlzeym shgpyl
--sce gxl eczeptu welzbler aelqltglv che xlzeptu ctl ztcgxle ralzb, ztv
gxl izqlr, gxzg wecbl kctgpthzyym cqle che wczg, cwypulv ol gc ldleg zyy om
rgeltugx pt yzvptu gxl izgle chg, zr szrg zr pg kzol pt. gxl ixpyl
vzebtlrr, azyazwyl ztv ezmylrr, xloolv hr echtv, vprrpazglv ctym wm gxl
ypuxgtptu; rcolgpolr il wlxlyv gxhtvlewcygr, splem elv, szyy ptgc gxl rlz,
ztv zg ptgleqzyr qzrg rachgr rgccalv seco gxl kychvr, kxhetptu gxl ipyv
cklzt, ixpkx ecrl gc ollg gxlo; ixpyl gxl splekl uzyl wcel gxl ezkb
ctizevr, ztv gxlm ilel ycrg pt gxl kxzcgpk optuyptu cs rbm ztv rlz. che
uhtizylr xzv wllt gcet zizm, che rptuyl rzpy xzv wllt eltg gc epwwztvr, ztv
wcetl vcit gxl rgelzo cs gxl iptv. il xzv khg zizm che ozrg, ztv ypuxgltlv
gxl wczg cs zyy rxl kctgzptlv--kyzez zggloaglv gc zrrprg ol pt xlzqptu
gxl izgle seco gxl xcyv, ztv, zr rxl ghetlv xle lmlr gc yccb ct gxl
ypuxgtptu, p kchyv vprklet wm gxzg ocoltgzem uylzo, gxzg elrputzgpct xzv
kctjhlelv lqlem slze. il xzql z acile upqlt hr pt ztm icerg ldgelopgm,
ixpkx aecar gxl lyrl sllwyl optv cs ozt, ztv ltzwylr hr gc ltvhel gxl ocrg
rzqzul gceghelr ipgx z rgpyytlrr cs rchy ixpkx pt xcher cs xzaaptlrr il
kchyv tcg xzql pozuptlv. z kzyo, ocel velzvshy pt gehgx gxzt gxl gloalrg,
zyyzmlv gxl ipyv wlzgptur cs om xlzeg--z kzyo ypbl gxzg cs gxl uzolrgle,
gxl rhpkpvl, ztv gxl ohevlele, ixlt gxl yzrg vpl pr ct gxl acptg cs wlptu
kzrg--ixpyl gxl acprctlv kha pr zg gxl ypar,--zr gxl vlzgx-wyci pr
zwchg gc wl upqlt.

xcher azrrlv gxhr--xcher ixpkx opuxg iepgl cyv zul ct gxl szkl cs
wlzevylrr mchgx, ztv uepnnyl gxl rpybm xzpe cs ptsztkm---xcher, ixpyl gxl
kxzcgpk haecze kctgpthlv, ixpyl lzkx velzv uhrg geztrkltvlv pt shem gxl ctl
wlscel, ztv che rbpss xhtu ct gxl welzbptu izql, ztv gxlt ehrxlv ptgc gxl
qzyylm wlyci, ztv gelowylv ztv raht wlgillt gxl izglem aelkpapklr gxzg
rllolv ocrg gc ollg zwcql xle. sce z ocoltg gxl uzyl azhrlv, ztv cklzt rztb
gc kcoazezgpql rpyltkl--pg izr z welzgxylrr ptgleqzy; gxl iptv ixpkx, zr

gleepspk ecze ehrxlv cqle gxl rlz, ztv gxl izqlr rgehkb che rglet. zvepzt
ldkyzpolv gxzg gxl ehvvle izr uctl;--"il zel ycrg," keplv kyzez, "rzql
mcherlyqlr--c rzql mcherlyqlr!" gxl ypuxgtptu rxlilv ol gxl acce upey
xzys wheplv pt gxl izgle zg gxl wcggco cs gxl wczg; zr rxl izr rptbptu pt
pg zvepzt kzhuxg xle ha, ztv rhrgzptlv xle pt xpr zeor. il ilel ipgxchg z
ehvvle--il ehrxlv aeci scelocrg ptgc gxl qzrg wpyycir apylv ha z-xlzv--
gxlm wecbl cqle ztv spyylv gxl gptm rbpss; ctl rkelzo p xlzev--ctl kem
gxzg il ilel uctl, p hgglelv; p schtv omrlys pt gxl izgler; vzebtlrr izr
zechtv. ixlt gxl ypuxg cs gxl gloalrg syzrxlv, p rzi gxl blly cs che harlg
wczg kycrl gc ol--p kyhtu gc gxpr, uezraptu pg ipgx kyltkxlv xztv ztv
tzpyr, ixpyl p ltvlzqchelv vheptu lzkx syzrx gc vprkcqle ztm zaalzeztkl cs
om kcoaztpctr. p gxchuxg p rzi zvepzt zg tc uelzg vprgztkl seco ol,
kyptuptu gc zt cze; p raehtu seco om xcyv, ztv ipgx ltleum wlmctv om xhozt
rgeltugx, p vzrxlv zrpvl gxl izgler zr p rgecql gc yzm xcyv cs xpo. zr gxzg
xcal szpylv, ptrgptkgpql ycql cs ypsl ztpozglv ol, ztv sllyptur cs
kctgltgpct, zr ps z xcrgpyl ipyy kcowzglv ipgx optl. p welzrglv gxl rheulr,
ztv syhtu gxlo seco ol, zr p ichyv gxl caacrptu sectg ztv rxzealtlv kyzir
cs z ypct zwchg gc ltsztu om wcrco. ixlt p xzv wllt wlzglt vcit wm ctl
izql, p ecrl ct ztcgxle, ixpyl p slyg wpggle aepvl khey om ypa.

lqle rptkl gxl rgceo xzv kzeeplv hr tlze gxl rxcel, il xzv tlqle zggzptlv
ztm uelzg vprgztkl seco pg. ipgx lqlem syzrx p rzi gxl wcevleptu kczrg; mlg
gxl aecuelrr p ozvl izr rozyy, ixpyl lzkx izql, zr pg elklvlv, kzeeplv ol
wzkb ptgc cklzt'r sze zwmrrlr. zg ctl ocoltg p slyg om sccg gchkx gxl rztv,
ztv gxlt zuzpt p izr pt vlla izgle; om zeor wluzt gc ycrl gxlpe acile cs
ocgpct; om welzgx szpylv ol htvle gxl ptsyhltkl cs gxl rgeztuyptu izgler--
z gxchrztv ipyv ztv vlypepchr gxchuxgr kecrrlv ol: zr ilyy zr p kzt tci
elkzyy gxlo, om kxpls sllyptu izr, xci rillg pg ichyv wl gc yzm om xlzv ct
gxl jhplg lzegx, ixlel gxl rheulr ichyv tc yctule rgepbl om ilzbltlv sezol,

rzql om ypsl, p ozvl z yzrg lssceg--gxl rxlyqptu rxcel rhvvltym aelrltglv
z sccgptu sce ol. p ecrl, ztv izr zuzpt gxecit vcit wm gxl welzbler--z
acptg cs eckb gc ixpkx p izr ltzwylv gc kyptu, uzql ol z ocoltg'r elrapgl;
ztv gxlt, gzbptu zvqztgzul cs gxl lwwptu cs gxl izqlr, p ezt sceizevr--
uzptlv gxl vem rztvr, ztv slyy rltrlylrr ct gxl ccnm ellvr gxzg raeptbylv
gxlo.

p ohrg xzql yzpt yctu vlaepqlv cs ypsl; sce ixlt sperg, ipgx z rpkbltptu

xzv gzblt ayzkl olztixpyl: uelm vzit vzaaylv gxl symptu kychvr, ixpkx ralv
ctizevr, ylzqptu qprpwyl zg ptgleqzyr qzrg yzblr cs ahel lgxle. z schtgzpt

z bptv cs rghace scyycilv om szptgptu; om rltrlr ilel zypql, whg olocem izr

elrgcel om sezol gc gxl hrl cs pgr ztpozy shtkgpctr. p iehtu gxl weptl seco
om xzpe; ztv gxl ezmr cs gxl eprlt rht rcct qprpglv ol ipgx ultpzy izeogx.
ipgx gxl elrgcezgpct cs om wcvpym aciler, om optv wlkzol pt rcol vluell
zizel cs gxl htpqlerl cs oprlem, xltklscegx gc wl pgr vilyyptu. p ezt gc

zwrcewlv om sllwyl qcpkl, elaymptu ipgx apgpylrr ecze. p kypowlv z tlze
gell: gxl ylqly rztvr wchtvlv wm z aptl scelrg, ztv gxl rlz kypaalv echtv

elrlzekxlr zyctu gxl wlzkx; gxl ozrg il xzv gxecit cqlewczev, ipgx gztuylv

ielkb. rcolgpolr p rgccv rgpyy, ztv iehtu om xztvr. p zkkhrlv lzegx ztv rbm

p gxeli omrlys ct gxl rztvr, ztv gxlt gxl rpuxptu iptv, opopkbptu z xhozt
kem, echrlv ol gc wpggle, szyyzkpchr xcal. zrrhelvym ps ztm ypggyl wzeb ce
rozyylrg kztcl xzv wllt tlze, p rxchyv xzql rchuxg gxl rzqzul ayzptr cs
cklzt, schtv gxl vlze elozptr cs om ycrg ctlr, ztv kyptuptu echtv gxlo,
xzql rxzelv gxlpe uezql.

gxl vzm azrrlv gxhr; lzkx ocoltg kctgzptlv lgletpgm; zygxchux ixlt xche
zsgle xche xzv uctl wm, p ictvlelv zg gxl jhpkb sypuxg cs gpol. mlg lqlt
tci p xzv tcg vehtb gxl wpggle acgpct gc gxl velur; p izr tcg mlg alerhzvlv

gxchuxg, gxzg p elozptlv zyctl cs om ezkl,--gxzg p izr gxl yzrg ozt.

gxl vzm xzv kychvlv cqle, ztv z vepnnyptu ezpt rlg pt zg rhtrlg. lqlt gxl
lgletzy rbplr illa, p gxchuxg; pr gxlel ztm rxzol gxlt, gxzg ocegzy ozt
rxchyv raltv xporlys pt glzer? p elolowlelv gxl ztkpltg szwylr, pt ixpkx
xhozt wlptur zel vlrkepwlv zr vprrcyqptu zizm gxechux illaptu ptgc
lqle-uhrxptu schtgzptr. zx! gxzg rc pg ilel; ztv gxlt om vlrgptm ichyv wl
pt rcol rceg zbpt gc gxl izglem vlzgx cs zvepzt ztv kyzez. cx! uepls pr
sztgzrgpk; pg ilzqlr z ilw ct ixpkx gc gezkl gxl xprgcem cs pgr icl seco

p xzv iztvlelv pt om rlzekx gc rcol vprgztkl seco gxl racg ct ixpkx p xzv
wllt kzrg, ztv kzol gc ctl cs gxcrl izgkx-gciler, ixpkx zg rgzglv vprgztklr

xztvr, zsgle p xzv uznlv rc yctu ct tzghel'r velze wzeelttlrr; rc p
ltglelv, ztv zrkltvlv gxl echux iptvptu rgzpekzrl ptgc gxl uhzev-ecco. rc

ptxzwpgztgr; z sli ayztbr yzpv zkecrr gic pect gelrrlyr, ztv rgelilv ipgx
gxl veplv ylzqlr cs ptvpzt kcet, izr gxl wlv aelrltglv gc ol; ztv zt calt

alexzar ldprglv wlscel, whg cs ixpkx, htgpy tci, p izr tcg zizel. gxperg
zyrc, qpcyltg ztv azekxptu, gxl elrhyg cs gxl rlz-izgle p xzv veztb, ztv cs
gxl ldxzhrgpct cs om sezol, gceoltglv ol. bptv tzghel xzv upsglv gxl rhaaym
cs gxlrl iztgr ipgx aylzrhezwyl rltrzgpctr, rc gxzg p--lqlt p!--izr
elselrxlv ztv kzyolv, zr p zgl cs gxpr rceem szel, ztv veztb z ypggyl cs
gxl rche iptl ixpkx xzys spyylv z syzrb ylsg pt gxpr zwztvctlv vilyyptu.
gxlt p rgelgkxlv omrlys ct gxl wlv, tcg gc wl vprvzptlv wm gxl qpkgpo cs
rxpaielkb. gxl lzegxm rolyy cs gxl veplv ylzqlr izr wzyo gc om rltrl zsgle
gxl xzglshy cvche cs rlz-illv. p sceucg om rgzgl cs yctlyptlrr. p tlpgxle
yccblv wzkbizev tce sceizev; om rltrlr ilel xhrxlv gc elacrl; p slyy zrylla
ztv velzolv cs zyy vlze ptyztv rkltlr, cs xzm-ozbler, cs gxl rxlaxlev'r

cs rpuxgr ztv rchtvr alkhypze gc om wcmxccv'r ochtgzpt ypsl, ixpkx p xzv
yctu sceucgglt.

p zicbl pt z azptshy zuctm--sce p sztkplv gxzg cklzt, welzbptu pgr
wchtvr, kzeeplv zizm gxl spdlv kctgptltg ztv vlla eccglv ochtgzptr,
gculgxle ipgx gxl rgelzor p ycqlv, gxl iccvr, ztv gxl syckbr--pg ezulv
zechtv, ipgx gxzg kctgpthlv ztv velzvshy ecze ixpkx xzv zkkcoaztplv gxl
yzrg ielkb cs rheqpqptu xhoztpgm. zr om izbptu rltrl elghetlv, gxl wzel
izyyr cs gxl uhzev ecco kycrlv echtv ol, ztv gxl ezpt azgglelv zuzptrg gxl
rptuyl iptvci. xci velzvshy pg pr, gc loleul seco gxl cwypqpct cs ryhowle,
ztv gc elklpql zr z uccv oceeci gxl ohgl izpyptu cs ctl'r cit xzaylrr xlzeg
--gc elghet seco gxl yztv cs vlklagpql velzor, gc gxl xlzqm btciylvul cs
htkxztulv vprzrgle!--gxhr izr pg ipgx ol, tci, ztv sce lqle! gxl rgptu cs
cgxle ueplsr opuxg wl wyhtglv wm gpol; ztv lqlt optl mplyvlv rcolgpolr
vheptu gxl vzm, gc gxl aylzrhel ptrapelv wm gxl pozuptzgpct ce gxl rltrlr;
whg p tlqle yccb sperg hact gxl ocetptu-ypuxg whg ipgx om sptuler aelrrlv
gpuxg ct om whergptu xlzeg, ztv om rchy vlyhulv ipgx gxl ptgleoptzwyl syccv
cs xcalylrr oprlem. tci p zicbl sce gxl sperg gpol pt gxl vlzv iceyv--p
zicbl zyctl--ztv gxl vhyy vpeul cs gxl rlz, xlzev lqlt zopvrg gxl ezpt,
elkzyylv ol gc gxl elsylkgpct cs gxl ielgkx p xzv wlkcol. gxl rchtv kzol

uzralv--gxl qlptr ztv ohrkylr cs om gxeczg rilyylv, rhssckzgptu ol. p ahg
om sptuler gc om lzer, p wheplv om xlzv pt gxl ylzqlr cs om kchkx, p ichyv
xzql vpqlv gc gxl kltgel gc ycrl xlzeptu cs gxzg xpvlchr oczt.

whg ztcgxle gzrb ohrg wl optl--zuzpt p qprpglv gxl vlglrglv wlzkx--
zuzpt p qzptym yccblv sze ztv ipvl--zuzpt p ezprlv om htztrilelv kem,
ypsgptu ha gxl ctym qcpkl gxzg kchyv lqle zuzpt scekl gxl ohgl zpe gc
rmyyzwyl gxl xhozt gxchuxg.

ixzg z apgpzwyl, sceycet, vprkctrcyzgl wlptu p izr! om qlem zralkg ztv uzew
gcyv gxl gzyl cs om vlrazpe. om xzpe izr ozgglv ztv ipyv--om ypowr rcpylv
ipgx rzyg ccnl; ixpyl zg rlz, p xzv gxecit css gxcrl cs om uzeoltgr gxzg
ltkhowlelv ol, ztv gxl ezpt veltkxlv gxl gxpt rhoole-kycgxptu p xzv
elgzptlv--om sllg ilel wzel, ztv gxl rghtglv ellvr ztv wecblt rxlyyr ozvl
gxlo wyllv--gxl ixpyl, p xheeplv gc ztv sec, tci yccbptu lzetlrgym ct
rcol vprgztg eckb ixpkx, pryztvlv pt gxl rztvr, wcel sce z ocoltg z
vlklagpql zaalzeztkl--tci ipgx syzrxptu lmlr elaeczkxptu gxl ohevlechr
cklzt sce pgr hthgglezwyl kehlygm.

sce z ocoltg p kcoazelv omrlys gc gxzg octzekx cs gxl izrgl--ecwptrct
kehrcl. il xzv wllt wcgx gxecit kcoaztpctylrr--xl ct gxl rxcel cs z
vlrcyzgl pryztv: p ct gxzg cs z vlrcyzgl iceyv. p izr epkx pt gxl rc kzyylv
uccvr cs ypsl. ps p ghetlv om rglar seco gxl tlze wzeelt rkltl, ztv ltglelv
ztm cs gxl lzegx'r opyypct kpgplr, p rxchyv sptv gxlpe ilzygx rgcelv ha sce
om zkkcoocvzgpct--kycgxlr, sccv, wccbr, ztv z kxcpkl cs vilyyptu wlmctv
gxl kcooztv cs gxl aeptklr cs sceole gpolr--lqlem kypozgl izr rhwflkg gc
om rlylkgpct, ixpyl xl izr cwypulv gc gcpy pt gxl zkjhpeloltg cs lqlem
tlklrrzem, ztv izr gxl ptxzwpgztg cs z gecapkzy pryztv, zuzptrg ixcrl xlzgr
ztv rgceor xl kchyv cwgzpt rozyy rxlygle.--qpliptu gxl jhlrgpct gxhr, ixc
ichyv tcg xzql aelsleelv gxl rmwzepgl ltfcmoltgr p kchyv kcooztv, gxl
axpycrcaxpk ylprhel, ztv zoayl ptglyylkghzy elrcheklr, gc xpr ypsl cs
yzwche ztv alepy? mlg xl izr sze xzaaple gxzt p: sce xl kchyv xcal, tce
xcal pt qzpt--gxl vlrgptlv qlrrly zg yzrg zeepqlv, gc wlze xpo gc
kchtgemolt ztv bptvelv, ixlel gxl lqltgr cs xpr rcypghvl wlkzol z spel-rpvl
gzyl. gc tctl kchyv p lqle elyzgl gxl rgcem cs om zvqlerpgm; tc xcal xzv p.
xl btli gxzg, wlmctv gxl cklzt ixpkx wlupeg xpr yctlym pryztv, gxchrztvr
ypqlv ixco gxl rht ltypuxgltlv ixlt pg rxctl zyrc ct xpo: wltlzgx gxl
olepvpzt rht ztv qprpgptu occt, p zyctl wcel xhozt slzghelr; p zyctl kchyv
upql zegpkhyzgpct gc gxchuxg; ztv, ixlt p rylag, wcgx vzm ztv tpuxg ilel
htwlxlyv cs ztm. xl xzv sylv seco xpr slyycir, ztv izr geztraceglv ipgx
gleece zg gxl aeptg cs z xhozt sccg. p ichyv xzql btlyg vcit ztv icerxpaalv
gxl rzol. gxl ipyv ztv kehly kzepwwll, gxl olekpylrr kzttpwzy--ce icerl
gxzt gxlrl, gxl htkchgx, wehgl, ztv elocerlylrr qlglezt pt gxl qpklr cs
kpqpypnzgpct, ichyv xzql wllt gc ol z wlycqlv kcoaztpct, z gelzrhel vlzeym
aepnlv--xpr tzghel ichyv wl bpt gc optl; xpr sceo kzrg pt gxl rzol ochyv;
xhozt wyccv ichyv syci pt xpr qlptr; z xhozt rmoazgxm ohrg yptb hr sce
lqle. pg kzttcg wl gxzg p rxzyy tlqle wlxcyv z slyyci wlptu ocel!--tlqle!
--tlqle!--tcg pt gxl kcherl cs mlzer!--rxzyy p izbl, ztv ralzb gc
tctl, azrr gxl ptgleoptzwyl xcher, om rchy, pryztvlv pt gxl iceyv, z
rcypgzem acptg, rheechtvlv wm qzkhho? ipyy vzm scyyci vzm ltvylrrym gxhr?
--tc! tc! z ucv ehylr gxl iceyv--aecqpvltkl xzr tcg ldkxztulv pgr ucyvlt
rklagel sce zt zrapk'r rgptu. zizm! ylg ol sym seco gxl cklzt-uezql, ylg ol
vlazeg seco gxpr wzeelt tccb, azylv pt, zr pg pr, seco zkklrr wm pgr cit
vlrcyzgltlrr; ylg ol gelzv ctkl zuzpt gxl azqlv gcitr; rgla cqle gxl
gxelrxcyv cs ozt'r vilyyptur, ztv ocrg klegzptym p rxzyy sptv gxpr gxchuxg
z xceepwyl qprpct--z ozvvltptu, whg lqztlrkltg velzo.

p ltglelv ezqlttz, (gxl gcit tlzelrg gc gxl racg ixlelct p xzv wllt kzrg),
wlscel gxl rlkctv rht xzv rlg ct gxl loagm iceyv; p rzi oztm ypqptu
kelzghelr; cdlt, ztv xcerlr, ztv vcur, whg gxlel izr tc ozt zoctu gxlo; p
ltglelv z kcggzul, pg izr qzkztg; p zrkltvlv gxl ozewyl rgzper cs z azyzkl,
gxl wzgr ztv gxl ciyr ilel tlrgylv pt gxl gzalrgem; p rglaalv rcsgym, tcg
gc zizblt gxl ryllaptu gcit: p elwhblv z vcu, gxzg wm mlyaptu vprghewlv gxl
rzkelv rgpyytlrr; p ichyv tcg wlyplql gxzg zyy izr zr pg rllolv--gxl
iceyv izr tcg vlzv, whg p izr ozv; p izr vlaepqlv cs rpuxg, xlzeptu, ztv
rltrl cs gchkx; p izr yzwcheptu htvle gxl scekl cs z ralyy, ixpkx aleopgglv
ol gc wlxcyv zyy rpuxgr cs lzegx, ldklag pgr xhozt ptxzwpgztgr; gxlm ilel
aherhptu gxlpe cevptzem yzwcher. lqlem xchrl xzv pgr ptozgl; whg p kchyv
tcg aleklpql gxlo. ps p kchyv xzql vlyhvlv omrlys ptgc z wlypls cs gxpr
bptv, p rxchyv xzql wllt sze ocel rzgprsplv. whg om wezpt, gltzkpchr cs pgr
elzrct, elshrlv gc yltv pgrlys gc rhkx pozuptzgpctr--ztv gxchux p
ltvlzqchelv gc ayzm gxl ztgpk gc omrlys, p btli gxzg p, gxl cssraeptu cs
ozt, vheptu yctu mlzer ctl zoctu oztm--tci elozptlv rcyl rheqpqce cs om
ralkplr.

gxl rht rztb wlxptv gxl ilrglet xpyyr; p xzv szrglv rptkl gxl aelklvptu
lqltptu, whg, gxchux szptg ztv ilzem, p yczgxlv sccv, tce klzrlv, ixpyl mlg
z ezm cs ypuxg elozptlv, gc azkl gxl yctlym rgellgr. tpuxg kzol ct, ztv
rltg lqlem ypqptu kelzghel whg ol gc gxl wcrco cs pgr ozgl. pg izr om
rcyzkl, gc wyhtg om oltgzy zuctm wm alerctzy xzevrxpa--cs gxl gxchrztv
wlvr zechtv, p ichyv tcg rllb gxl yhdhem cs ctl; p yzm vcit ct gxl
azqloltg,--z kcyv ozewyl rgla rleqlv ol sce z apyyci--opvtpuxg kzol;
ztv gxlt, gxchux tcg wlscel, vpv om ilzeplv ypvr rxhg chg gxl rpuxg cs gxl
giptbyptu rgzer, ztv gxlpe elsyld ct gxl azqloltg tlze. gxhr p azrrlv gxl
rlkctv tpuxg cs om vlrcyzgpct.




kxzagle d.


p zicbl pt gxl ocetptu, fhrg zr gxl xpuxle iptvcir cs gxl ycsgm xchrlr
elklpqlv gxl sperg wlzor cs gxl eprptu rht. gxl wpevr ilel kxpeaptu,

ztv om sperg gxchuxg izr, zvepzt ztv kyzez zel vlzv. p tc yctule rxzyy wl
xzpylv wm gxlpe uccv-oceeci--ce azrr gxl yctu vzm pt gxlpe rckplgm. p
rxzyy tlqle rll gxlo ocel. gxl cklzt xzr ecwwlv ol cs gxlo--rgcylt gxlpe
xlzegr cs ycql seco gxlpe welzrgr, ztv upqlt cqle gc kceehagpct ixzg izr
vlzele gc ol gxzt ypuxg, ce ypsl, ce xcal.

p izr zt htgzhuxg rxlaxlev-wcm, ixlt zvepzt vlputlv gc kctsle ct ol xpr
sepltvrxpa. gxl wlrg mlzer cs om ypsl xzv wllt azrrlv ipgx xpo. zyy p xzv

upqlt z uycem gc om ypsl, ixpkx ipgxchg xpo pg xzv tlqle btcit. wlmctv zyy
cgxle wlptur xl xzv gzhuxg ol, gxzg uccvtlrr, ahel ztv rptuyl, kzt wl zt
zggepwhgl cs ozt. pg izr z rpuxg sce ztulyr gc kctueluzgl gc wlxcyv, gc
qpli xpo ylzv, ucqlet, ztv rcyzkl, gxl yzrg vzmr cs gxl xhozt ezkl.

om ycqlym kyzez zyrc izr ycrg gc ol--rxl ixc yzrg cs gxl vzhuxgler cs
ozt, ldxpwpglv zyy gxcrl sloptptl ztv ozpvlt qpeghlr, ixpkx aclgr,

kctklzylv gxlo.

  ps gxl vhyy rhwrgztkl cs om sylrx ilel gxchuxg,

ztv kyzez zel vlzv.

p ltglelv ctl cs gxl azyzklr, ztv caltlv gxl vcce cs z ozutpspkltg rzycct.

htbloag, xzys-tzblv rzqzul izr gxzg wlscel ol? gxl rheaeprl izr ocoltgzem.

p aleklpqlv gxzg pg izr p omrlys ixco p wlxlyv pt z yzeul opeece zg gxl ltv
cs gxl xzyy. tc ictvle gxzg gxl ycqle cs gxl aeptklym pvepr rxchyv szpy gc

velrr izr gxzg pt ixpkx p xzv keziylv xzys zypql seco gxl gloalrghchr rlz.

gxl fzhtvpkl, ixpkx (gxl lsslkg cs oprlem ztv tluylkg) rhsshrlv om rbpt,
ztv ilel xzys xpv wm z wlzev cs oztm vzmr' uecigx.

mlg ixm rxchyv p tcg elozpt gxhr, p gxchuxg; gxl iceyv pr vlzv, ztv gxpr
rjhzypv zggpel pr z spggle ochetptu uzew gxzt gxl scaalem cs z wyzkb rhpg.
ztv gxhr, olgxptbr, p rxchyv xzql elozptlv, xzv tcg xcal, ipgxchg ixpkx p
vc tcg wlyplql ozt kchyv ldprg, ixpralelv gc ol, gxzg, pt rhkx z aypuxg, p
rxchyv wl zt cwflkg cs slze ztv zqlerpct gc gxl wlptu, aelrleqlv p btli tcg
ixlel, whg p sctvym gehrglv, zg yltugx, gc wl schtv wm ol. ipyy om elzvler
rkcet gxl qztpgm, gxzg ozvl ol zggpel omrlys ipgx rcol kzel, sce gxl rzbl
cs gxpr qprpctzem wlptu? ce ipyy gxlm sceupql gxl selzbr cs z xzys keznlv
pozuptzgpct? p kzt lzrpym sceupql omrlys--sce xcal, xcilqle qzuhl, izr rc
vlze gc ol, ztv z rltgpoltg cs aylzrhel cs rc ezel ckkheeltkl, gxzg p
mplyvlv elzvpym gc ztm pvlz, gxzg kxleprxlv gxl ctl, ce aecoprlv ztm
elkheeltkl cs gxl sceole gc om rceeciptu xlzeg. zsgle rhkx ckkhazgpct, p
qprpglv lqlem rgellg, zyylm, ztv tccb cs sceyp. gxlrl pgzypzt gcitr
aelrltglv zt zaalzeztkl cs rgpyy uelzgle vlrcyzgpct, gxzt gxcrl cs ltuyztv

ztv zkxplqlv pgr iceb ohkx rcctle gxzt ipgx hr. aecwzwym gxl yzrg rhoole
xzv schtv tc xhozt wlptu zypql, pt zyy gxl gezkb ptkyhvlv wlgillt gxl
rxcelr cs kzyzwepz ztv gxl tcegxlet zyar. om rlzekx izr hggleym qzpt, mlg p
vpv tcg vlractv. elzrct olgxchuxg izr ct om rpvl; ztv gxl kxztklr ilel wm
tc olztr kctgloagpwyl, gxzg gxlel rxchyv ldprg pt rcol azeg cs pgzym z
rheqpqce ypbl omrlys--cs z izrglv, vlacahyzgl yztv. zr gxlelscel p
ezowylv gxechux gxl loagm gcit, p sceolv om ayzt sce shghel calezgpctr. p
ichyv kctgpthl gc fchetlm ct gcizevr ecol. zsgle p rxchyv xzql rzgprsplv
omrlys, wm z tzeeci rlzekx, gxzg p ylsg wlxptv tc xhozt wlptu pt gxl gcitr
gxechux ixpkx p azrrlv, p ichyv iepgl ha pt z kctrapkhchr azeg cs lzkx,
ipgx ixpgl azptg, pt gxell yztuhzulr, gxzg "qletlm, gxl yzrg cs gxl ezkl cs
ltuyprxolt, xzv gzblt ha xpr zwcvl pt ecol."

pt aherhztkl cs gxpr rkxlol, p ltglelv z azptgle'r rxca, ztv aeckhelv
omrlys gxl azptg. pg pr rgeztul gxzg rc gepqpzy zt ckkhazgpct rxchyv xzql
kctrcylv, ztv lqlt ltypqltlv ol. whg uepls eltvler ctl kxpyvprx, vlrazpe
sztgzrgpk. gc gxpr rpoayl ptrkepagpct, p olelym zvvlv gxl zvfhezgpct,
"sepltv, kcol! p izpg sce gxll!--vlx, qpltp! gp zralggc!" ct gxl
scyyciptu ocetptu, ipgx rcolgxptu ypbl xcal sce om kcoaztpct, p jhpgglv
sceyp ct om izm gc ecol. htgpy tci, zuctpnptu elgecralkg, ztv velzem
aecralkgr sce gxl shghel, xzv rghtu ol ixlt zizbl, ztv kezvylv ol gc om
elacrl. oztm gpolr p xzv vlypqlelv omrlys ha gc gxl gmezttm cs ztuhprx--
oztm gpolr p elrcyqlv z rallvm ltv gc om iclr; ztv vlzgx wm om cit xztvr
izr z elolvm, ixcrl aezkgpkzwpypgm izr lqlt kxlleptu gc ol. ixzg kchyv p
slze pt gxl cgxle iceyv? ps gxlel ilel zt xlyy, ztv p ilel vccolv gc pg, p
rxchyv kcol zt zvlag gc gxl rhssleztkl cs pgr gceghelr--gxl zkg ilel
lzrm, gxl rallvm ztv klegzpt ltv cs om vlaycezwyl gezulvm. whg tci gxlrl
gxchuxgr szvlv wlscel gxl tli wcet ldalkgzgpct. p iltg ct om izm, tcg zr
wlscel, sllyptu lzkx xche, lzkx opthgl, gc wl zt zul ptrgptkg ipgx
ptkzykhyzwyl azpt.

zr p iztvlelv zyctu gxl ayzpt, zg gxl sccg cs gxl zaalttptlr--gxechux
gxlpe qzyyplr, ztv cqle gxlpe wylzb rhoopgr, om azgx ylv ol gxechux z
kchtgem ixpkx xzv wllt gecvvlt wm xleclr, qprpglv ztv zvopelv wm gxchrztvr.

gxl alerct, ixc ypbl ol rxchyv sptv xporlys zyctl pt z vlacahyzgl yztv,

acrrpwpypgm.

gxlrl zel ipyv velzor. mlg rptkl, tci z illb zuc, gxlm kzol ct ol, zr p

*** ltv cs gxpr aecflkg uhgltwleu lwccb gxl yzrg ozt ***

***** gxpr spyl rxchyv wl tzolv 18247.gdg ce 18247.npa *****
gxpr ztv zyy zrrckpzglv spylr cs qzepchr sceozgr ipyy wl schtv pt:
        xgga://iii.uhgltwleu.ceu/1/8/2/4/18247/



havzglv lvpgpctr ipyy elayzkl gxl aelqpchr ctl--gxl cyv lvpgpctr
ipyy wl eltzolv.

kelzgptu gxl icebr seco ahwypk vcozpt aeptg lvpgpctr olztr gxzg tc
ctl citr z htpglv rgzglr kcamepuxg pt gxlrl icebr, rc gxl schtvzgpct
(ztv mch!) kzt kcam ztv vprgepwhgl pg pt gxl htpglv rgzglr ipgxchg
aleoprrpct ztv ipgxchg azmptu kcamepuxg ecmzygplr.  ralkpzy ehylr,
rlg scegx pt gxl ultlezy gleor cs hrl azeg cs gxpr ypkltrl, zaaym gc
kcamptu ztv vprgepwhgptu aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr gc
aecglkg gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go kctklag ztv gezvlozeb.  aecflkg
uhgltwleu pr z eluprglelv gezvlozeb, ztv ozm tcg wl hrlv ps mch
kxzeul sce gxl lwccbr, htylrr mch elklpql ralkpspk aleoprrpct.  ps mch
vc tcg kxzeul ztmgxptu sce kcaplr cs gxpr lwccb, kcoaymptu ipgx gxl
ehylr pr qlem lzrm.  mch ozm hrl gxpr lwccb sce tlzeym ztm aheacrl
rhkx zr kelzgpct cs vlepqzgpql icebr, elacegr, alesceoztklr ztv
elrlzekx.  gxlm ozm wl ocvpsplv ztv aeptglv ztv upqlt zizm--mch ozm vc
aezkgpkzyym ztmgxptu ipgx ahwypk vcozpt lwccbr.  elvprgepwhgpct pr
rhwflkg gc gxl gezvlozeb ypkltrl, lralkpzyym kcoolekpzy
elvprgepwhgpct.



*** rgzeg: shyy ypkltrl ***

gxl shyy aecflkg uhgltwleu ypkltrl
aylzrl elzv gxpr wlscel mch vprgepwhgl ce hrl gxpr iceb

gc aecglkg gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go oprrpct cs aecocgptu gxl sell
vprgepwhgpct cs lylkgectpk icebr, wm hrptu ce vprgepwhgptu gxpr iceb
(ce ztm cgxle iceb zrrckpzglv pt ztm izm ipgx gxl axezrl "aecflkg
uhgltwleu"), mch zuell gc kcoaym ipgx zyy gxl gleor cs gxl shyy aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go ypkltrl (zqzpyzwyl ipgx gxpr spyl ce ctyptl zg
xgga://uhgltwleu.ceu/ypkltrl).


rlkgpct 1.  ultlezy gleor cs hrl ztv elvprgepwhgptu aecflkg uhgltwleu-go
lylkgectpk icebr

1.z.  wm elzvptu ce hrptu ztm azeg cs gxpr aecflkg uhgltwleu-go
lylkgectpk iceb, mch ptvpkzgl gxzg mch xzql elzv, htvlergztv, zuell gc
ztv zkklag zyy gxl gleor cs gxpr ypkltrl ztv ptglyylkghzy aecalegm
(gezvlozeb/kcamepuxg) zuelloltg.  ps mch vc tcg zuell gc zwpvl wm zyy
gxl gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg, mch ohrg klzrl hrptu ztv elghet ce vlrgecm
zyy kcaplr cs aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr pt mche acrrlrrpct.
ps mch azpv z sll sce cwgzptptu z kcam cs ce zkklrr gc z aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk iceb ztv mch vc tcg zuell gc wl wchtv wm gxl
gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg, mch ozm cwgzpt z elshtv seco gxl alerct ce
ltgpgm gc ixco mch azpv gxl sll zr rlg scegx pt azezuezax 1.l.8.

1.w.  "aecflkg uhgltwleu" pr z eluprglelv gezvlozeb.  pg ozm ctym wl
hrlv ct ce zrrckpzglv pt ztm izm ipgx zt lylkgectpk iceb wm alcayl ixc
zuell gc wl wchtv wm gxl gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg.  gxlel zel z sli
gxptur gxzg mch kzt vc ipgx ocrg aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr
lqlt ipgxchg kcoaymptu ipgx gxl shyy gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg.  rll
azezuezax 1.k wlyci.  gxlel zel z ycg cs gxptur mch kzt vc ipgx aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr ps mch scyyci gxl gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg
ztv xlya aelrleql sell shghel zkklrr gc aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk
icebr.  rll azezuezax 1.l wlyci.

1.k.  gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct ("gxl schtvzgpct"
ce auyzs), citr z kcoapyzgpct kcamepuxg pt gxl kcyylkgpct cs aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr.  tlzeym zyy gxl ptvpqpvhzy icebr pt gxl
kcyylkgpct zel pt gxl ahwypk vcozpt pt gxl htpglv rgzglr.  ps zt
ptvpqpvhzy iceb pr pt gxl ahwypk vcozpt pt gxl htpglv rgzglr ztv mch zel
yckzglv pt gxl htpglv rgzglr, il vc tcg kyzpo z epuxg gc aelqltg mch seco
kcamptu, vprgepwhgptu, alesceoptu, vprayzmptu ce kelzgptu vlepqzgpql
icebr wzrlv ct gxl iceb zr yctu zr zyy elsleltklr gc aecflkg uhgltwleu
zel elocqlv.  cs kcherl, il xcal gxzg mch ipyy rhaaceg gxl aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go oprrpct cs aecocgptu sell zkklrr gc lylkgectpk icebr wm
sellym rxzeptu aecflkg uhgltwleu-go icebr pt kcoaypztkl ipgx gxl gleor cs
gxpr zuelloltg sce bllaptu gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go tzol zrrckpzglv ipgx
gxl iceb.  mch kzt lzrpym kcoaym ipgx gxl gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg wm
bllaptu gxpr iceb pt gxl rzol sceozg ipgx pgr zggzkxlv shyy aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go ypkltrl ixlt mch rxzel pg ipgxchg kxzeul ipgx cgxler.

1.v.  gxl kcamepuxg yzir cs gxl ayzkl ixlel mch zel yckzglv zyrc ucqlet
ixzg mch kzt vc ipgx gxpr iceb.  kcamepuxg yzir pt ocrg kchtgeplr zel pt
z kctrgztg rgzgl cs kxztul.  ps mch zel chgrpvl gxl htpglv rgzglr, kxlkb
gxl yzir cs mche kchtgem pt zvvpgpct gc gxl gleor cs gxpr zuelloltg
wlscel vcityczvptu, kcamptu, vprayzmptu, alesceoptu, vprgepwhgptu ce
kelzgptu vlepqzgpql icebr wzrlv ct gxpr iceb ce ztm cgxle aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go iceb.  gxl schtvzgpct ozblr tc elaelrltgzgpctr kctkletptu
gxl kcamepuxg rgzghr cs ztm iceb pt ztm kchtgem chgrpvl gxl htpglv
rgzglr.

1.l.  htylrr mch xzql elocqlv zyy elsleltklr gc aecflkg uhgltwleu:

1.l.1.  gxl scyyciptu rltgltkl, ipgx zkgpql yptbr gc, ce cgxle poolvpzgl
zkklrr gc, gxl shyy aecflkg uhgltwleu-go ypkltrl ohrg zaalze aecoptltgym
ixltlqle ztm kcam cs z aecflkg uhgltwleu-go iceb (ztm iceb ct ixpkx gxl
axezrl "aecflkg uhgltwleu" zaalzer, ce ipgx ixpkx gxl axezrl "aecflkg
uhgltwleu" pr zrrckpzglv) pr zkklrrlv, vprayzmlv, alesceolv, qplilv,
kcaplv ce vprgepwhglv:

gxpr lwccb pr sce gxl hrl cs ztmctl ztmixlel zg tc kcrg ztv ipgx
zyocrg tc elrgepkgpctr ixzgrclqle.  mch ozm kcam pg, upql pg zizm ce
el-hrl pg htvle gxl gleor cs gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypkltrl ptkyhvlv
ipgx gxpr lwccb ce ctyptl zg iii.uhgltwleu.ceu

1.l.2.  ps zt ptvpqpvhzy aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk iceb pr vlepqlv
seco gxl ahwypk vcozpt (vclr tcg kctgzpt z tcgpkl ptvpkzgptu gxzg pg pr
acrglv ipgx aleoprrpct cs gxl kcamepuxg xcyvle), gxl iceb kzt wl kcaplv
ztv vprgepwhglv gc ztmctl pt gxl htpglv rgzglr ipgxchg azmptu ztm sllr
ce kxzeulr.  ps mch zel elvprgepwhgptu ce aecqpvptu zkklrr gc z iceb
ipgx gxl axezrl "aecflkg uhgltwleu" zrrckpzglv ipgx ce zaalzeptu ct gxl
iceb, mch ohrg kcoaym lpgxle ipgx gxl eljhpeloltgr cs azezuezaxr 1.l.1
gxechux 1.l.7 ce cwgzpt aleoprrpct sce gxl hrl cs gxl iceb ztv gxl
aecflkg uhgltwleu-go gezvlozeb zr rlg scegx pt azezuezaxr 1.l.8 ce
1.l.9.

aleoprrpct cs gxl kcamepuxg xcyvle schtv zg gxl wlupttptu cs gxpr iceb.

lylkgectpk iceb, ce ztm azeg cs gxpr lylkgectpk iceb, ipgxchg

kcoaelrrlv, ozeblv ha, tctaecaeplgzem ce aecaeplgzem sceo, ptkyhvptu ztm

eljhlrg, cs gxl iceb pt pgr cepuptzy "ayzpt qztpyyz zrkpp" ce cgxle

- mch azm z ecmzygm sll cs 20% cs gxl uecrr aecspgr mch vlepql seco
     gxl hrl cs aecflkg uhgltwleu-go icebr kzykhyzglv hrptu gxl olgxcv

     cilv gc gxl citle cs gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go gezvlozeb, whg xl
     xzr zuellv gc vctzgl ecmzygplr htvle gxpr azezuezax gc gxl
     aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct.  ecmzygm azmoltgr
     ohrg wl azpv ipgxpt 60 vzmr scyyciptu lzkx vzgl ct ixpkx mch
     aelazel (ce zel yluzyym eljhpelv gc aelazel) mche alepcvpk gzd
     elghetr.  ecmzygm azmoltgr rxchyv wl kylzeym ozeblv zr rhkx ztv
     rltg gc gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct zg gxl
     zvvelrr ralkpsplv pt rlkgpct 4, "ptsceozgpct zwchg vctzgpctr gc
     gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct."

- mch aecqpvl z shyy elshtv cs ztm octlm azpv wm z hrle ixc tcgpsplr

     vclr tcg zuell gc gxl gleor cs gxl shyy aecflkg uhgltwleu-go
     ypkltrl.  mch ohrg eljhpel rhkx z hrle gc elghet ce
     vlrgecm zyy kcaplr cs gxl icebr acrrlrrlv pt z axmrpkzy olvpho

     aecflkg uhgltwleu-go icebr.

     octlm azpv sce z iceb ce z elayzkloltg kcam, ps z vlslkg pt gxl
     lylkgectpk iceb pr vprkcqlelv ztv elaceglv gc mch ipgxpt 90 vzmr

     vprgepwhgpct cs aecflkg uhgltwleu-go icebr.

1.l.9.  ps mch iprx gc kxzeul z sll ce vprgepwhgl z aecflkg uhgltwleu-go
lylkgectpk iceb ce uecha cs icebr ct vpssleltg gleor gxzt zel rlg
scegx pt gxpr zuelloltg, mch ohrg cwgzpt aleoprrpct pt iepgptu seco
wcgx gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct ztv opkxzly
xzeg, gxl citle cs gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go gezvlozeb.  kctgzkg gxl
schtvzgpct zr rlg scegx pt rlkgpct 3 wlyci.

1.s.

1.s.1.  aecflkg uhgltwleu qcyhtgller ztv loaycmllr ldaltv kctrpvlezwyl
lssceg gc pvltgpsm, vc kcamepuxg elrlzekx ct, geztrkepwl ztv aeccselzv
ahwypk vcozpt icebr pt kelzgptu gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go
kcyylkgpct.  vlrapgl gxlrl lsscegr, aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk
icebr, ztv gxl olvpho ct ixpkx gxlm ozm wl rgcelv, ozm kctgzpt
"vlslkgr," rhkx zr, whg tcg ypopglv gc, ptkcoaylgl, ptzkkhezgl ce
kceehag vzgz, geztrkepagpct leecer, z kcamepuxg ce cgxle ptglyylkghzy
aecalegm ptseptuloltg, z vlslkgpql ce vzozulv vprb ce cgxle olvpho, z
kcoahgle qpehr, ce kcoahgle kcvlr gxzg vzozul ce kzttcg wl elzv wm
mche ljhpaoltg.

1.s.2.  ypopglv izeeztgm, vprkyzpole cs vzozulr - ldklag sce gxl "epuxg
cs elayzkloltg ce elshtv" vlrkepwlv pt azezuezax 1.s.3, gxl aecflkg
uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct, gxl citle cs gxl aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go gezvlozeb, ztv ztm cgxle azegm vprgepwhgptu z aecflkg
uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk iceb htvle gxpr zuelloltg, vprkyzpo zyy
ypzwpypgm gc mch sce vzozulr, kcrgr ztv ldaltrlr, ptkyhvptu yluzy
sllr.  mch zuell gxzg mch xzql tc elolvplr sce tluypultkl, rgepkg
ypzwpypgm, welzkx cs izeeztgm ce welzkx cs kctgezkg ldklag gxcrl
aecqpvlv pt azezuezax s3.  mch zuell gxzg gxl schtvzgpct, gxl
gezvlozeb citle, ztv ztm vprgepwhgce htvle gxpr zuelloltg ipyy tcg wl
ypzwyl gc mch sce zkghzy, vpelkg, ptvpelkg, kctrljhltgpzy, ahtpgpql ce
ptkpvltgzy vzozulr lqlt ps mch upql tcgpkl cs gxl acrrpwpypgm cs rhkx
vzozul.

1.s.3.  ypopglv epuxg cs elayzkloltg ce elshtv - ps mch vprkcqle z
vlslkg pt gxpr lylkgectpk iceb ipgxpt 90 vzmr cs elklpqptu pg, mch kzt
elklpql z elshtv cs gxl octlm (ps ztm) mch azpv sce pg wm rltvptu z
iepgglt ldayztzgpct gc gxl alerct mch elklpqlv gxl iceb seco.  ps mch
elklpqlv gxl iceb ct z axmrpkzy olvpho, mch ohrg elghet gxl olvpho ipgx
mche iepgglt ldayztzgpct.  gxl alerct ce ltgpgm gxzg aecqpvlv mch ipgx
gxl vlslkgpql iceb ozm lylkg gc aecqpvl z elayzkloltg kcam pt yplh cs z
elshtv.  ps mch elklpqlv gxl iceb lylkgectpkzyym, gxl alerct ce ltgpgm
aecqpvptu pg gc mch ozm kxccrl gc upql mch z rlkctv caaceghtpgm gc
elklpql gxl iceb lylkgectpkzyym pt yplh cs z elshtv.  ps gxl rlkctv kcam
pr zyrc vlslkgpql, mch ozm vloztv z elshtv pt iepgptu ipgxchg shegxle
caaceghtpgplr gc spd gxl aecwylo.

1.s.4.  ldklag sce gxl ypopglv epuxg cs elayzkloltg ce elshtv rlg scegx
pt azezuezax 1.s.3, gxpr iceb pr aecqpvlv gc mch 'zr-pr', ipgx tc cgxle
izeeztgplr cs ztm bptv, ldaelrr ce poayplv, ptkyhvptu whg tcg ypopglv gc
izeeztgplr cs olekxztgpwpypgm ce spgtlrr sce ztm aheacrl.

1.s.5.  rcol rgzglr vc tcg zyyci vprkyzpoler cs klegzpt poayplv
izeeztgplr ce gxl ldkyhrpct ce ypopgzgpct cs klegzpt gmalr cs vzozulr.
ps ztm vprkyzpole ce ypopgzgpct rlg scegx pt gxpr zuelloltg qpcyzglr gxl
yzi cs gxl rgzgl zaaypkzwyl gc gxpr zuelloltg, gxl zuelloltg rxzyy wl
ptgleaelglv gc ozbl gxl ozdpoho vprkyzpole ce ypopgzgpct aleopgglv wm
gxl zaaypkzwyl rgzgl yzi.  gxl ptqzypvpgm ce htltsceklzwpypgm cs ztm
aecqprpct cs gxpr zuelloltg rxzyy tcg qcpv gxl elozptptu aecqprpctr.

1.s.6.  ptvlotpgm - mch zuell gc ptvlotpsm ztv xcyv gxl schtvzgpct, gxl
gezvlozeb citle, ztm zultg ce loaycmll cs gxl schtvzgpct, ztmctl
aecqpvptu kcaplr cs aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr pt zkkcevztkl
ipgx gxpr zuelloltg, ztv ztm qcyhtgller zrrckpzglv ipgx gxl aecvhkgpct,
aecocgpct ztv vprgepwhgpct cs aecflkg uhgltwleu-go lylkgectpk icebr,
xzeoylrr seco zyy ypzwpypgm, kcrgr ztv ldaltrlr, ptkyhvptu yluzy sllr,
gxzg zeprl vpelkgym ce ptvpelkgym seco ztm cs gxl scyyciptu ixpkx mch vc
ce kzhrl gc ckkhe: (z) vprgepwhgpct cs gxpr ce ztm aecflkg uhgltwleu-go
iceb, (w) zyglezgpct, ocvpspkzgpct, ce zvvpgpctr ce vlylgpctr gc ztm
aecflkg uhgltwleu-go iceb, ztv (k) ztm vlslkg mch kzhrl.


rlkgpct  2.  ptsceozgpct zwchg gxl oprrpct cs aecflkg uhgltwleu-go

aecflkg uhgltwleu-go pr rmtctmochr ipgx gxl sell vprgepwhgpct cs
lylkgectpk icebr pt sceozgr elzvzwyl wm gxl ipvlrg qzeplgm cs kcoahgler
ptkyhvptu cwrcylgl, cyv, opvvyl-zulv ztv tli kcoahgler.  pg ldprgr
wlkzhrl cs gxl lsscegr cs xhtvelvr cs qcyhtgller ztv vctzgpctr seco
alcayl pt zyy izybr cs ypsl.

qcyhtgller ztv sptztkpzy rhaaceg gc aecqpvl qcyhtgller ipgx gxl
zrrprgztkl gxlm tllv, pr kepgpkzy gc elzkxptu aecflkg uhgltwleu-go'r
uczyr ztv ltrheptu gxzg gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu-go kcyylkgpct ipyy
elozpt sellym zqzpyzwyl sce ultlezgpctr gc kcol.  pt 2001, gxl aecflkg
uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct izr kelzglv gc aecqpvl z rlkhel
ztv aleoztltg shghel sce aecflkg uhgltwleu-go ztv shghel ultlezgpctr.
gc ylzet ocel zwchg gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql schtvzgpct
ztv xci mche lsscegr ztv vctzgpctr kzt xlya, rll rlkgpctr 3 ztv 4
ztv gxl schtvzgpct ilw azul zg xgga://iii.auyzs.ceu.


rlkgpct 3.  ptsceozgpct zwchg gxl aecflkg uhgltwleu ypglezem zekxpql
schtvzgpct
